“Ye yewuŋuŋ nto kerenkeŋuŋ nye sokyiŋ nyi ye sewurte, yepte kulot oŋnkiwirte! Omnye kaykay ye kewo nyi wule mite soponto nye meponte yewut ake nto kerenket ake kusir ye kerip yewuniyek tukway oko kerenkok tukway oŋnkyewirciŋ wule mite mata nye momise.

Nteye koŋnta nyeŋuŋ nye sokyiŋ nyi ye sewurte, lotu kulot oŋnkiwirte! Omnye kaykay om wule mite nyi ye kewut wule mite soponto ponte koŋnta akenke pate kusir ye ponte konyek tukway oŋnkyewirciŋ wule mite mata nye momise.’’
“Möce okäs kule monte cenyil mpo akenke om lekok ce minkec ceyucu, omnye komwowok ani akwek kule, mite malaykanikwa om torot cepure okokoy taytap Papamwani.
[Omnye kico Weritap cito kule cosoru osop piko ce kipotyo.]

“Osoti akwek kulene? Mosukwiy kulene citake nye ponto kecirek pokol akenke oŋnkupot akenke om coto? Puryo kot kupokoktoy neto cut tomonwokik sokol ok sokol kupokokyi lakamet komos oŋnkuwo kuceŋat nyoto akenke nye potot?
Komwowok ani akwek kule, nteye kanyor kuŋerekyini keciryet nyoto akenke kupël cut tomonwokik sokol ok sokol co puryo kupotyo.
Kunyo om aret nye yunyoto kunye poru kule puryo kot kucöme Papamwoŋ nye mite torot kule kupot mpo akenke om lekok ce minkec ceyucu.
“Ye kokwiwuŋ yeyaŋuŋ miyotyet, roke iwo wule mite neto oŋnkiporci lelisnyi, ntene ayiy kuyunyoto om wule wuŋat ye akwek nkit. Nteye kolimuŋ ŋalek kukewec yoto yeyaŋuŋ.
Ntene ye katay molimuŋ, roke kwer opetekey citake nto piko alak oyeny sukuŋet kuporkey kutok ŋolyo ake tokol nyepo manta cepo piko muncururwanik oyeny nto somok, kuyu wulo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet.

Ntene nteye katay neto molimnci picoto ŋalek, roke mwoci ŋalecato tokol pikap Yiyintet. Nteye kotepe kot kutay molimnci mpo ŋalek pikap Yiyintet, roke sut nyi neto kwek ci nye lomin, nto kwek ci nye korurukintetap mosoret nye kicetay.

“Kunyo komwowok ani akwek tokol kule, ŋalek tokol ce korat akwek om wuli po koret ŋony, mosicerat ŋalek coto om wulin po torot. Nto ŋalek tokol ce kotyac akwek om wuli po koret ŋony, mosicityac coto om wulin po torot.
“Komwowok ani akwek yec kule, ye kocömncine piko oyenku om ŋolyo ake tokol nye kosom om wuli po koret, mosukwiwok Papamwani om torot.
Omnye om wulyo ake tokol wule keyomekey piko oyenku nto somok om kaynemwani omite ani yoto po kwenumwa.’’
Yoto kuco Petero ye kimite Yesu oŋnkutepe kule, “Mokoryontet, omuci akalye yeyamwani aret cetya ye kalel om wule omite ani? Omuci akalye aret tisap?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot omwowuŋ kule aret tisap, omwowuŋ kule aret tomonwokik tisap aret tisap.
Omnye kerkey poytoyisyetap torot oko kinko nye kamac kule oyit pesenutekyi ce ponto mutworikyi.
Nteye kimite kuyitisyi, cekwerci neto cito akenke om picoto nye kiponto pesento nyepo pesanik ce caŋ koromun.

Kipuryo kot kuponto cicoto pesanik ce yeme ce mokuyokune pesento. Kumwayta yoto mokoryontenyi kule kyalya cicoto kwek mutworin oko korkenyi oko lekokyi oko tukuk tokol ce kiponto sukuŋet kuyok pesento.
Kukutuny mutworintonoto om taytap mokoryontenyi oŋnkusaysay kumwoci kule, ‘Muytowo ani kuminiŋ, mosoyokuŋ tukuk tokol!’
Yoto kurire Mokoryontet cicoto okoy kukalya pesento, oŋnkwasta kuwecikey.
“Kuwo mutworintonoto okoy wokunyor mutworintet ake nye kiyoce neto pesan ce ŋeri pate. Kurotyi kunäm nyin katit oŋnkuket oŋnkumwoci kule, ‘Yokwo ani pesennyu nye ponte!’
Kukutuny mutworintet nyin oŋnkusaysay kumwoci kule, ‘Muytowo ani kuminiŋ, mosoyokuŋ pesenŋuŋ!’
Ntene kutoyis nyin, kunäm nyin oŋnkukoyito cekwer wecerotyi mopusi kule okoy kuyok pesento.
Ntowo kukäs mutworik cut alake ŋalek ce kokwiyokis, kunerekis kunyer koromun oŋnkupa wokumwoci mokoryontemwa ŋalek tokol.
Yoto kukur mokoryontet mutworintonoto oŋnkumwoci kule, ‘Yiku nyi mutworin nye miyat! Kyakalyiŋ pesentye tokol yo kisoysoyo ani nyi.
Kunyo puryo kot kurokeniŋ rire kalye mutworintet nyin kuyu wulo kyokolyiŋ ani nyi?’
Kunyer mokoryontenyi yoto, kunäm oŋnkukoyito mutworintonoto wocerat citaŋany okoy kuyok pesento tokol.’’
Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Kunyo yunyoto wule mosukwiytak akwek Papamwani nyepo torot, ye puryo kot kukolyoy ci ake tokol om akwek yeyanyi om mukuleynyi.’’
Yoto ntowo kuŋalal Yesu okoy kuwany ŋalecato, kunomene Kalilaya oŋnkuwo kuketitakey okoy kupunto koretap Yuteya om oyinetap Yortan pitonin.
Kurup luket nyepo piko ce caŋ neto. Kusop Yesu cekto om wuloto.
Kukwa Farasayek alake wule mite Yesu oŋnkwokusyem kulot kutepe kule, “Cömncini ra ntarastinekyo cito kukwet korkenyi om ŋolyo ake tokol?’’
Kuwec Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Tompo kot asuman akwek silutekap Yiyintet co mwowu kule: ‘Kitany Yiyintet om towunot moron oko korko?’
Oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Om ŋolyontoni, kuye sukuŋet kupakakta cito kwan oko kamet oŋnkuyomokey oko korkenyi, kwek picoto oyenku porto akenke.’
Kunyo komo ku pic oyeny, ntene kokwek porto akenke. Kunyo puryo kot kumisyini kupciy cito piko ce kikoyomo Yiyintet.’’
Kutepe Farasayek neto kule, “Kunyo omne sukukon Moses ntarastit nye muce kusil cito parwet nye kwetisye oŋnkukwet korket kuwecikey?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Kicömwok Moses akwet korukwok omnye oyiku wuyec koromun ye mocinetak. Ntene kipuryo kot kuyunyo ikye kunyo ye kicitonye koret.
Kunyo komwowok kule, ye kakwet citake tokol korkenyi, tos pate ye kasakwayan, oŋnkomüt ake kakwiy cicoto sakwayanat.’’
Kumwoci konomikyi neto kule, “Kunyo ye yunyo kopurto nyepo moron oko korkenyi, kupuryo kot kumisyini cekesyi koruk!’’
Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot kunöme ŋolyontoni ci tokol, ntene po piko pate co kikokoci Yiyintet.

Omnye mite ŋalek wok ce caŋ omne simokesyi ci tokol. Mite piko alake ce kiceyi kuyunyoto, kumite piko alake ce kikwiy piko sukuŋet kopur kuyunyoto, kumite piko alake ce puryo kot kukesyi omnye kicäm nkit om toponiyet nyepo poytoyisyetap torot. Kunyo möce kucäm ŋolyontoni cito nye cöme nkit.’’
Kukwer piko alake lekok kukwa wule mite Yesu kule sukuŋet kukemer neto yewuniyekyi metewokap lekocoto oŋnkusomnci, ntene kupolyi konomik kukerekta picoto.
Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Ayaste lekok kukwa wule omite ani, monte cekerekte omnye po poytoyisyetap torot lekok ceyucutecu.’’
Kukemer Yesu yewuniyekyi metewokap lekocoto, oŋnkunomen kuwecikey.
Yoto kuco citake oŋnkutepe kumwoy kule, “Konetintet, mosayiy ne ani ye sanyoru soponto nye mopoku?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Omne setepena ani nyi ŋolyo nye nöme toponiyet? Mite cito akenke pate nye topon. Rip ntarastinek ye möce kule sonyoru soponto nye mopoku.’’
Kutepe cicoto Yesu kule, “Ntarastinek oŋnkoco?’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kule, “Mente oporisye, mente asakwayan, mente acorsye, mente operperisye,
ywey kon oko komet, oŋnkicäm latyeŋuŋ kuyu wulo cömntoykey nyi nkit.’’
Kuwekyi oyiperyontonoto kumwoci neto kule, “Kyorip ntarastinek coto tokol, kiy ne ake yec nye potwo ani?’’
Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Ye möce kule onyolu, iwo weyalye tukuk tokol ce ponte oŋnkikoci pesanik pononik; mesenyoru mokoryontit om torot, oŋnkico cenäma cepetekey oko ani.’’
Ntowo kulim oyiperyontonoto ŋalecato, kunomen kunerekat kuwecikey omnye kimokoryo nye kiponto tukuk ce caŋ.
Kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosukuwuyit koromun yemo kowut cito nye mokoryo poytoyisyetap torot.
Komwowok ani akwek yec kule, lekit kupunte nkamiyet koŋntap sintanit kusir ye mokowut cito nye mokoryo nye ponto tukuk ce caŋ poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’’
Nteye kotolime konomik ŋalecato, kokite koromun oŋnkutep kumwoy kule, “Ku ŋo nyun cito nye cimuce kot cisop?’’
Kurotot Yesu cek, oŋnkuwec kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot komukoktos om wule mite piko, ntene mukoktos kiy ake tokol om wule mite Yiyintet.’’
Yoto kuwekyi Petero kumwoci neto kule, “Käs pa, kicepakakte acek tukuk tokol oŋnkyinamiŋ nyi. Mosicenyoru acek ne?’’

Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, om pesyosyek cepo kenyit nyelel, ye mosukopure Weritap cito ŋecerenyi nyewo nyepo woyinto, yoto ye mosopure mpo akwek konomikwani cu taman ok oyeny ŋecerok oŋnkomutyi musankunek arosyek taman ok oyeny cepo pikap Israel.

Nto om wule citake tokol nye kapakakta korik, nto mpo mutakwam, nto mpo cekwam, nto mpo kwan nto kamet, nto lekok, nto mosonok, omnye kacäm kaynemwani, mosukunyor cito nyoto cetosyi aret pokolwokik ce caŋ, oŋnkyikoci soponto nye mopoku.
Ntene piko ce caŋ ce mite yawut tayta, kuce mosukwokupoyit coto letut, nto piko ce mite yewut letut, kuce mosukwokupoyit coto tayta.’’
“Kerkey poytoyisyetap torot oko citap mparet nyepo ketik ce cekure sapipunek, nye kimusta kororn kuwo wokusil kopotik ce kepat mparenyi nyepo sapipunek.
Yoto kucömncin cicoto oko kopoticoto kule kukoci neto cekto silinkit akenke om yisyet nyepo pesyet akenke, oŋnkumwoci picoto kupa wokopotis mparetap sapipunek.
Kuwo cicoto yec motepo ye kimite sawet somok nyepo kororn, wokunyor piko alak ce kimite keyoŋ pate nye puryo yisyo nye yiye.
Kumwoci coto kule, ‘Ape mpo akwek woyiyisye mparetap sapipunek, mosokonok ani pesanik ce yeme.’
Yoto kupa cek. Kwiy cicoto kuyunyoto kuwo saŋ ye kimite sawet pet kwen, oko yec ye kimite sawet sokol nyepo kosoleny.

Nteye kimite sawet karik kupunto taman ok akenke nyepo kosoleny kuwo cicoto motepo wokunyor yec piko alak ce kimite keyoŋ pate, kutepe kule, ‘Omne sawurte akwek pesyet opurene yu nye puryo yisyo nye oyiye!’
Kuwekyi picoto kumwoci neto kule, ‘Omnye puryo ci nye kokonec acek yisyo nye mokyiy.’ Kumwoci cicoto cek kule, ‘Kunyo, ape mpo akwek woyiyisye mparetap sapipunek.’
“Ntowo kupunto kosoleny, kumwoci citap mparet cinyi nyewo kule, ‘Kur kopotik kukwa oŋnkipcici musyaremwa cece piko co kopo letut oŋnkuwewaŋnte piko co kopo tay co konyosyi kwiyis.’
Kukwa piko co kocec yisyet ye kimite sawet taman ok akenke, cikoci ci tokol silinkit akenke.
Yoto ntowo kukwa piko co konyosyi kwiyis yisyet kule cekonec pesanik, kusot co kule toskoy mocenyoru ce caŋ, ntene cikoci mpecek ci tokol silinkit akenke.
Ntowo kunäm cek pesanikwa, kuŋunyŋunyis om wule mite citap mparet,
kumwoy kule, ‘Kokwiyis piko cu kokwoni letut kuwany sawet akenke pate, kunyi keyoyekenec acek koci pesanik cete cicacek oŋnkurok kokyiyisye acek kupelec asis kwimen!’
Kuwekyi citap mparet kumwoci cito akenke om picoto kule, ‘Corwenyu, puryo kot kukolotuŋ ani, kopuryo kot cecömncine kunyo kule yiy nyi yisyet nyepo silinkit akenke?
Kunyo näm silinkit nyeŋuŋ oŋnkiwecikey kaŋuŋ, omöce ani kule akoci cito nyi kocece yisyet letut pesanik cete co kokoniŋ nyi.
Puryo kot oponte ani ne kamukeywek ce oyiyisye pesanikwani kuyu wule omoktoy? Nto kecoroku nyi so pate omnye kokolyoyisye ani.’ ’’
Kutosyi Yesu kumwoy kule, “Kunyo mosukwokupoyit piko co mite letut tayta, kupoyit piko co mite tayta letut.’’
Nteye kimite Yesu kuweti kuloŋntoy Yerusalem, yoto kukwer konomikyi taman ok oyeny kupa tapan, oŋnkuŋololyi cek nkit möt kupeti om aran.
Kumwoci kule, “Cemite cepeti celoŋntoy Yerusalem wule mowocenäme Weritap cito oŋnkyekwer kuwo wule mite tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek. Mosukuwosontyi co oŋnkumutyi musankut cepakäc kume,
oŋnkyikoyito kuwo wule mite lamek ce mokucup, oŋnkupas oŋnkuwuytoci murtowontet, nteye pesyet nyepo somok ciŋet kotutune met kusop yec.’’
Yoto kuco kametitap werikap Sepetayo oko werikyi okoy ye kimite Yesu, oŋnkukutuŋnkyi kusom kule cecäma.
Kutepe Yesu neto kule, “Möce nyi ne?’’ Kumwoy kule, “Kurtoci mwowu kule, mosukopure werikwani cutecu oyenku ake yewuŋuŋ nyepo tay nto ake kopurune yewuŋuŋ nyepo let om poytoyisyeŋuŋ.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Puryo kot oŋnketi akwek kito nye osome. Omuci akwek kot opunte toŋoŋutek ce karik opunte ani?’’ Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Cimuci’’.

Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Manta mosopunte toŋoŋutekwani, ntene puryo kot oponte ani kamukeywek akwey cito nye mokopurune yewumwani nyepo tay oko yewumwani nyepo let, po pate oteputek co piko co kikwiytoci Papamwani.’’
Ntowo kulim konomik cut tamanu ŋalecato, kunyerci picoto oyeny ce kitupco.
Yoto kukur Yesu cek tokol kukwa ye kimite neto oŋnkumwoci kule, “Oŋnket akwek kule, poytoyik cepo Lamek kuce ponto kamukeywek kupayta piko, kunyo poytoy cek piko.
Ntene puryo kot kuroke kuyuyit nyo om wule omite akwek. Ntene ye möce citake tokol om akwek kule oyiku nyewo, kuroke nyoto kwek mutworintetap piko tokol.
Nteye möce citake tokol om akwek kule oyiku nyepo tayta, kuroke nyoto kwek mutworintemwoŋ.
Kuyu Weritap cito nye kipuryo kot kuco kule cokwiwo piko yisyet, ntene kico cokwiyis oŋnkukoyito sopon nyi kwolis kusop piko ce caŋ.’’
Nteye kimite cek kunomene Yeriko. Kupa piko ce caŋ kurup Yesu let.
Yoto kulim piko oyeny ce kikoryo ce kimite kepur aret tapan kule Yesu nyitenyi nye mite kutile aran. Yoto kupol picoto kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, Weritap Tauti! Rirenec kalyec acek!’’
Kupolyi piko picoto kule kusisio, ntene kutosyikey kupol koromun kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, Weritap Tauti! Rirenec kalyec acek!’’
Kuyo Yesu oŋnkukur picoto oŋnkutepe kule, “Omöce akwek kule oyiwok ani ne?’’
Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, ce möce kule ŋoŋwec konyekyo!’’
Kurire Yesu kukalya cekto oŋnkunäm konyekwacek. Yoto pakenke kukästa cek oŋnkurup kupetakey Yesu.
Nteyu kowo kurik cek Yerusalem, kukwa okoy kupun Pesepake om tulwetap ketik ce cekure Seituninek. Yoto kuyokto Yesu konomikyi oyeny kupa tay
oŋnkumwoci ŋalecu kule, “Ape okoy opunte kayin nyin mite taymwoŋ, mosonyoru pakenke sikiryet nye ratat nye pontokey oko moyinyi. Atyac oŋnkokweru okoy yu omite ani.
Nteye katepenak citake ŋolyo, omwoci kule, ‘Möce Mokoryontet,’ mosukuketwok lakwar.’’
Kikwiyokis ŋalecu sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek ce kimwoy workoyontet kule:
“Omwoci pikap Siyon, käs coni yawut kinko nyeŋuŋ wule mite nyi, nye tala nye kalany sikiryet, cone moytap sikiryet, nkaryantet nye kotoceye.’’
Yoto kupa konomik kuntoye oŋnkuwokwiy kuyu wulo kokomwoci Yesu.
Kukwer cek sikiryet oko moyita oŋnkuyitoci sirokwa potoyikap sikirok, oŋnkukoci Yesu kulany parak.
Kuyitoci luket nyepo piko ce caŋ sirokwa aran.
Kucec luket nyepo piko ce kipeti om taytap Yesu oko ce kikwone letut kupol kumwoy kule, “Cikaste Weritap Tauti; Kukoci Yiyintet kupeyok neto nyi coni om kaynetap Mokoryontet! Cikaste Yiyintet!’’
Ntowo kupunto Yesu Yerusalem orit, kunäm polotet moŋet tokol kumukul, Kutep piko kumwoy kule, “Ŋo cici?’’ Kuwec luket nyepo piko kumwoy kule,
“Workoyontet Yesu nyi nyepo Nasaret om koretap Kalilaya.’’
Kowut Yesu kotap Yiyintet oŋnkukwetune orit piko ce kyolyoyisyi oko ce kyolisyi; kumil mesanikap piko co wöle pesanik, oko ŋecerok cepo piko co olyoy swororok,
oŋnkumwoci cek kule, “Kicesil om silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Mosicekure komwani koto nye cesome.’ Ntene kunyi kwawec akwek kwek kepenet nye wuŋeke corik!’’
Kukwa piko ce kikoryo oko ce kikomwolis okoy ye mite Yesu om kotap Yiyintet. Kusop Yesu cekto kusopco.
Yoto kunyer tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek ye kotoköse tukuk cepo kakitat ce kikwiye neto oko lekok ce kipole oŋnkurirtos om kotap Yiyintet kumwowu kule, “Cikasta Weritap Tauti.’’

Kumwoci cek Yesu kule, “Lime nyi ŋalek cu mwowu lekocu?’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Olime manta, ntene tompo kot asuman akwek mpo kisic silutekap Yiyintet ce mwowu kule, ‘Kyonet akwek lekok ce minkec oko ce rerye kukon kakastayeŋuŋ nye yeme!’ ’’
Kuwo yoto kupakakta cek oŋnkuwete moŋet okoy kupunto Pesaniya wule kiwo kuru.
Ntowo kuyekune kororn ye kimite Yesu kuweti moŋet, kwam neto rupet.
Yoto kukäs mokoywet nye kimite aret tapan, kuwo yepo ketoto ntene puryo kot wokunyorta kiy; sokek pate ce kimite. Kumwoci Yesu ketoto kule, “Kime yiye nyi kenyis omit!’’ Kuyam mokoywet yoto pakenke.
Kukäs konomik ŋalecato, kukite cek koromun oŋnkutep kumwoy kule, “Kayam mokoywet pakenke lakwar kulene?’’

Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ye oponte akwek koyenet nye puryo kot oponte yec kasoteywek alak, nto omuci kot omwoci tulwoni kule, ‘Ŋeyakisye oŋnkiwircikey ruretyet,’ Kwiyakay kuyunyoto.
Ye koyen akwek mosonyoru kiy ake tokol nye kosom om somsemwoŋ.’’
Ntowo kuco Yesu okoy kotap Yiyintet, nteye kimite kunetisyi, kukwa tisik cewoyec oko poyikap Yutayek ye kimite neto oŋnkutepe kule, “Po ŋo kamukeywek cu yiye nyi tukucu? Ŋo nyi kikoniŋ kamukeywecu?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Mosatepenak ani akwek teputyet akenke, nteye kowekwo ani akwek nyitenyi, mpo ani mosowekwok omwowok wule onyortoy ani kamukeywek ce oyiye tukucu.

Kicone potisonisyetap Yowana wulin po torot nto kicone wule mite piko?’’ Yoto kurwoke cek kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Mocemwowu kulene? Ye kocemwowu kule, ‘Kicone torot,’ Mosukuwekwec kumwoy kule, omne satay akwek moyen ŋalekyi?
Nteye kocemwowu kule, ‘Kicone wule mite piko,’ Ciku acek yec nyokorec ŋalek ce muce kwiy piko, omnye cöme piko tokol kule kiworkoyo Yowana manta.’’
Yoto kuwekyi cek Yesu kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot cinket.’’ Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Mpo ani puryo kot omuci kot omwowok akwek wule onyortoy ani kamukeywek ce oyiye tukucu.’’
“Kunyo osoti akwek kulene? Kimite citake nye kiponto werik oyeny. Kuweci kwan werit nyewo oŋnkumwoci kule, ‘Wenyo, iwo pesyoni weyiyisye mparetap ketik ce cekure Sapipunek.’
Kuwekyi weroto kumwoci kwan kule, ‘Puryo kot oweti.’ Ntene om letut kuwec kasoteywekyi oŋnkunomen wokwiyis mparetap Sapipunek.
Yoto kuweci kwan werit nyin ake oŋnkumwoci kuyunyoto. Kuwec nyo kumwoy kule, ‘Mokoryontet kacäm.’ Ntene oŋnkutay mowo.

Kunyo oŋnkono om wericoto oyeny nye kikwiy kito nye kimöce kwan?’’ Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Werit nyewo.’’ Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mite yawut korurukikap mosoret oko koruk cemoronisyek kupeti kunyosyenok akwek kupa wule mite poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.

Omnye kico Yowana potisonintet cokuporwok akwek aret nyepo manta nye misyini arup, ntene otay moyen ŋalekyi. Ntene kucäm korurukikap mosoret oko koruk cemoronisyek ŋalekyi. Nka mpo yu kowokäs akwek ŋalecato, kipuryo kot awec kasoteywekwok om letut oŋnkocäm ŋalekyi.’’

Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Alimnte pa tyonkocet ake. Kimite citake nye kiponto mparenyi nye kiwu ketik ce cekure sapipunek, oŋnkuker tuyita komut, oŋnkupal mwenet nye cirurunye matuntanik, oŋnkutec kitarit nye ceripse. Yoto kukoci kopotik kukotesan mparanato, oŋnkunomen kuwo toyek.
Nteyu kowo kupunto pesyosyek ce rurye omikap sapipunek, kuyok cicoto mutworikyi kukwa wule mite kopotik kule sukuŋet kukoci sapipunek kererya ce kiciyoyekyin.
Yoto kunäm kopoticoto mutworikap cicoto, kupir ake, kupakäc ake kume, oŋnkuwire ake rwontok.
Kuyok cicoto mutworik alak ce caŋ kusir ce kipo tay. Kutaŋany yec kopoticoto mutworik coto kuyu ce kipo tay.
Nto om letut kuyokto cicoto werinyi nkit kumwoy kule, ‘Mosukuywey cekto werimwani kupoyit manta!’
Nteye kotoköse kopotik werit, kurwoc cek kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, ‘Nyitenyi kunye kontiyintet, akany cepakäc kume, sukuŋet kwek nyinyacek kontiyisyet!’
Yoto kunäm cek neto oŋnkuwunuk kucone mparetap sapipunek oŋnkupakäc kume.’’
Kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Kunyo ye kaco citap mparet, mosukwiye ne kapoticoto?’’
Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Mosukupakäc kopoticoto miyotec, oŋnkukoci kopotik alak kukotesan mparetap sapipunek, ce mosukukoci neto sapipunek kererya ye koruryo.’’

Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Tompo kot asuman akwek mpo kisic silutekap Yiyintet co mwowu kule, ‘Rwantet nyo kitoye tekik kule puryo kot kuponto latik. kunye kiweckey kwek rwantet nye pële tokol nye tiye koto tapan. Mokoryontet nye kikwiye cutecu, kunyo po kakitat om konyekyacek!’ ’’
Kutosyikey Yesu kumwoy kule, “Kunyo komwowok ani kule, mosicinumunenok akwek poytoyisyetap Yiyintet oŋnkyikoci piko ce muce kwiy yisyet nyepo poytoyisyonoto.
[Ci ake tokol nye kowircikey rwantanato kutirtiroktos cito nyoto, nteye kowircikey rwantanato citake, kunyirnyire cicoto.]’’
Yoto kulim tisik cewoyec oko Farasayek tyonkocokap Yesu oŋnkunket kule koŋolole neto ŋalek ce nöme cekto.
Kusyem yoto kule cenäm neto. Ntene kuywey piko ce caŋ ce kinkete kule workoyo Yesu.
Kuŋololyi Yesu yec piko kwiyisye tyonkocok kumwoy kule,
“Kerkey poytoyisyetap torot oko kinko nye kikwici werinyi sakwet nye kemütisye.
Yoto kuyokto mutworikyi kupa wokukur toyek ce kucekur kukwa sakwet, ntene kutoyis makwa.
Yoto kuyokto mutworik alak kumwoci kule, ‘Womwoci toyek kule, akäs pa kayiyte ani yawut sakwemwani, kaceyeny yeyikwani oko tuka ce yokwoyec kunyo keceyiyta tukuk tokol, akwa sakwet.’
Ntene kukwes pate piko co kucekure oŋnkunomen kupa yisyonutekwa, kuwo ake kamonkesyantinyi.
Kunäm ce kiŋetune yoto mutworikap cicoto kokursyi, oŋnkupir kupakäc kupok.
Yoto kunyer Kinko koromun, kuyokto sikarekyi kupa wokupar kupok poricoto oŋnkupel moŋemwa.
Nto kopok kukur mutworikyi oŋnkumwoci kule, ‘Kaceyiyta sakwemwani, ntene puryo kot kucäm kukwa piko co kwokur ani.
Kunyo ape yawut wulo po orustunwekap moŋet, oŋnkokur piko tokol ce komuc kot onyoru kukwa sakwet.’
Kunomen mutworik kupa orustunwekap moŋet, wokoruruc piko tokol ce kimuc cekto kot kunyor; ce miyotec oko ce toponec, yoto kunyiw piko koto nyepo sakwetap komütisyet.
Kuwo kinko koto orit wokukäs toyek, yoto kukäs cito nye kipuryo kot kuloce sirok cepo sakwetap kamütisyet.
Kutepe kinko cicoto kule, ‘Corwenyu, kewut nyi koyi kulene yu meponte sirok cepo sakwetap komütisyet?’ Ntene kusis cicoto nye puryo kot kuwec ŋolyo.
Kumwoci kinko mutworik kule, ‘Arat cici yewuniyek oko kerenkok oŋnkuwunukte kuwo saŋ wule mite menonet, wule mowokurire oŋnkunyiy kelakyi.’ ’’
Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Omnye caŋ piko ce cekure, ntene ŋeri pate piko ce cekweye.’’
Kupa Farasayek oŋnkuwokurwoc ŋomnonet wule muce cekto kot kulot Yesu om tintenotet kutepe teputek.

Kuyokto cek konomikwa alak oko piko alak cepo luketap Erote kupa wule mite Yesu. Kumwoy picoto kule, “Konetintet, cinket acek kule yiku nyi ci nyepo manta, oŋnkineti ŋalekap Yiyintet nyepo manta om wule mite piko tokol, nye puryo kot soti wule yunto piko wulo po porto saŋ.
Kunyo, mwowec acek, soti nyi kulene? Comwec acek ra ntarastinekyo cekweci mosoret Kinko nyewo nto puryo?’’
Yoto kunket Yesu kasoteywekwa ce miyotec kumwoy kule, “Akwek kaperperoticu! Omne sasyem akwek kule celotwo ceteca ani?
Oporwo pa pesyantet nye cekweye mosoret?’’ Kusutyi cek neto yoto silinkit.
Kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Po ŋo metit nyi oko kaynet nyi silot silinkit?’’
Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Po Kinko nyewo.’’ Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Kunyo okocini kinko tukuk cepo Kinko, okocini Yiyintet tukuk cepo Yiyintet.’’
Ntowo kulim cek ŋalecato, kokite koromun oŋnkunomen kupecikey kupakakta neto.
Om pesyonoto akenke, kukwa Satusayek wule mite Yesu. (Coto ku piko co mwowu kule puryo kot komuce kot kotutune met piko ce kipok.)
Kumwoy cek kule, “Konetintet, kimwoy Moses kule, ‘Ye kame citake nye puryo kot kuyi lekok, kumisyini konti mutakwam korket nyo musuk, sukuŋet kuyici mutakwam nyo kime lekok.’
Kunyo kimite piko alake tisapu ce kitupco ce kiceminye acek tokol. Kukesyo nyewo komüt korket, kume nye puryo kot kuyi lekok. Yoto kupakakta korket nye kimüt mutakwam.
Kuyuyit nyoto kume mpo mutakwam nyepo oyeny, oko nyepo somok, okoy kuwoŋnkey kupok picoto tokol ku tisap.
Nto om letut kume mpene korket.
Kunyo om pesyet nyo citutune met, mosukupoyit ŋo korket? Omnye kikikomüt picoto tokol ku tisap!’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Oyiku akwek mosotin koromun! Omnye puryo kot oŋnket silutekap Yiyintet, oŋnkupuryo mpo kot oŋnket swametap Yiyintet.
Omnye pesyet nyo ciŋete kotutune met piko kuye mosukukerkeyitu cek oko Malaykanik ce mite torot, nye puryo kot komütisyi moronik oŋnkupuryo kot cimüte koruk.
Nto ŋalek ce nöme kotutunetap met, tompo so kot asuman akwek mpo kisic ŋalek ce kimwowok akwek Yiyintet? Omnye kimwoy kule,
‘Oyiku ani Yiyintetap Apram, oŋnku Yiyintet Isaka, oŋnku Yiyintetap Yakopo.’ Poru ŋalecu kule neto kunye Yiyintet nyepo ce soptos, ntene puryo kot ku Yiyintet nyepo piko ce kipok.’’
Ntowo kulim piko ŋalecato, kokite koromun konetisyenyi.
Ntowo kulim Farasayek kule koŋololyi Yesu Satusayek okoy komukta kusisio, yoto koruruckey mpecek.
Kusyem akenke om cekto nye konetintetap ntarastinek kule olotu Yesu om teputyoni kule,
“Konetintet, ntarastit oŋnkono nyewo nye pëlisyi?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Misyini cäm Mokoryontet Yiyinteŋuŋ om mukuleyŋuŋ tokol, oko soponŋuŋ tokol, oko kasoteywekuk tokol.
Ntarastit nyitenyi kunye po tayta nye pëlisyi.
Nto nyepo oyeny nye kerkey nyitenyi kunyi kule, ‘Misyini cäm latyeŋuŋ kuyu wulo cömntoykey nyi nkit.’
Yoŋune ntarastinekap Moses tokol oko konetisyetap workoyik ntarastinecutecu oyeny.’’
Nteyu kowo koruruckey Farasayek, kutepe Yesu cek kule,
“Osoti akwek kulene ce nöme Kristo nye Ŋapanet? Mosukwek keseniyantetap ŋo?’’ Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Yiku keseniyantetap Tauti.’’
Kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Kunyo omne sukuŋoŋnkyi Muyet Nyetilil Tauti kukure neto Mokoryontet?’’ Omnye kimwoy Tauti kule:
“Kimwoci Mokoryontet Mokoryontenyu kule, pure yu po yewumwani nyepo tay okoy okoci ani punikuk kwek ŋecerok cepo kerenkokuk.
“Kunyo ye kure Tauti neto, ‘Mokoryontet’, komuce kulene yec Ŋapanet kwek keseniyantetap Tauti?’’
Kipuryo yoto ci nye kitokomuc kot kuwekyi Yesu ŋolyo mpo akenke. Nto kuceke pesyonoto kuwo tay, kipuryo yec mpo ci nye kitokusyem kule atepe neto teputek alak.
Yoto kuŋololyi Yesu luket nyepo piko ce caŋ wanak oko konomikyi,
kumwoci kule, “Konetikap ntarastinek oko Farasayek kuce kicikoci kamukeywek kunet piko topon wule yunto ntarastinekap Moses.
Kunyo misyini oywey oŋnkorup ŋalek tokol ce komwowok akwek kule ayiy, ntene monte ceyiye kuyu wulo yiytoy cek, omnye ŋolole pate ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kwiye ŋalek co nete cekto.
Rote terekok ce nyikisec oŋnkutorci metewokap piko, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kutwoye terekocoto mornet.
Yiye cekto kiy ake tokol kule sukuŋet kukäsec piko. Akäs pa lolonik cewoyec cepo silutekap Yiyintet ce nömote tokoywekwa oko yewuniyek! Akäs pa koyinto nyepo kototokap sirokwa ce loce!
Cöme oteputek ce toponec ce toku om sokwonutek oko ŋecerok ce kweyotin om korikapkok.
Cöme kule ciyweyec cisupayec topon om moteponik oŋnkucäm kule kukurec piko kule, ‘Konetin.’
Ntene puryo kot kumisyini cekurok akwek kule, ‘Konetin.’ Omnye oponte akwek konetintet akenke, oŋnkotupce akwek tokol.
Kunyo puryo kot kumisyini kot okure akwek citake nye mite koret kule, ‘Papa,’ omnye oponte akwek Papa akenke pate nye mite torot.
Puryo kot kumisyini kot cekurenok akwek kule, ‘Kantoyin,’ omnye akenke pate kantoyintet nyimwoŋ, nyoto ku Kristo nye Ŋapanet.
Ci nyewo kupëlis om wule omite akwek kunye roke kwek nyoto mutworintemwoŋ.
Ci ake tokol nye sutekey parak, mosicirekune nyoto, nto ci ake tokol nye sutekey ŋony, mosicilaŋnta nyoto kwek nyewo nye mokupëlis.’’

“Omite kwapi koromun konetikap ntarastinek oko Farasayek! Oyiku kaperperot! Okere akwek kurket nyepo poytoyisyetap torot sukuŋet mente kowut piko, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot owuti akwek nkit orit, oŋnkoyete mpo piko alak ce syeme kule ciwut orit!
[“Omite akwek kwapi koromun konetikap ntarastinek oko Farasayek! Oyiku koperperot! Onyoponi korikap musukik, oŋnkosilkey osome sayutek ce caŋ. Mosicemutwok akwek musankut nyewo om ŋalecutecu!]

“Omite akwek kwapi koromun konetikap ntarastinek oko Farasayek! Oyiku kaperperot! Opesetoti ayay omutu ruretyet oŋnkopunte koret tokol omöce kule cewec cito akenke, nteye kowec cito nyoto, awurte yec kuwur cicoto kumiyatit aret oyeny kupëlok akwek, oŋnkuwo wule mite mata nye momise kuyu wule oyunte akwek nkit!

“Omite akwek kwapi koromun kantoyik ce koryotin! Onetisyi omwowu kule, ‘Ye kewalkey cito om kaynetap kotap Yiyintet, kupuryo kot ku ŋolyo nyewo koromun kawalenyi, ntene ye kewalkey cito om kaynetap saput nye mite kotap Yiyintet kupoyitu kawalenyi manta.’
Oyiku akwek pkoratis ce solontoy! Oŋnkono kito nyewo nyepo manta? Saput nto kotap Yiyintet nye wece saput kutililit?

Onetisyi akwek yec omwowu kule, ‘Ye kewalkey cito om kaynetap otepto nye cepele korosek om kotap Yiyintet, kupuryo kot ku ŋolyo nyewo koromun kawalenyi, ntene nteye kewalkey cito om kaynetap kokotutyet nye mite otepto nye cepele korosek om kotap Yiyintet, kupoyitu kawalenyi manta.’
Oyiku akwek pkoratis koromun! Oŋnkono kito nyewo nyepo manta, kokotutyet nto otepto nye pele korosek nye wece kokotutyet kutililit?
Kunyo ye kewalkey cito om kaynetap otepto nye cepele korosek, kukewalkey neto om kaynetap otepto nye cepele korosek wanak oko tukuk tokol ce mite orit.
Nteye kewalkey cito om kuynetap kotap Yiyintet kukewalkey om kaynetap Yiyintet nye minye koyoto.
Nteye kewalkey cito om kaynetap torot, kukewalkey neto om kaynet nyepo ŋeceretap Yiyintet oko neto nyo pure ŋeceranato.

“Omite akwek kwapi koromun konetikap ntarastinek oko Farasayek! Oyiku kaperperot! Okocini Yiyintet akenke nyepo taman cepo nkuyek alak tokol kuyu cepsoconik, oko lapotik, oko mutunkurunek, oŋnkotay moywey ntarastinek ce pëlisyi, kuyu amut musankunek om aret nyepo manta oko tolosyet oko koyenet. Möce kule oyiye cutecu, ntene nye puryo kot oyostoy cut alak.
Akwek kaperperotik ce koryotin! Onumu akwek kolyomwet nye mite tukuk ce omöce kule ceye, ntene oŋnkolukuy Nkamiyet!
“Omite akwek kwapi koromun konetikap ntarastinek oko Farasayek! Oyiku kaperperot! Osite cikompet oko sanit saŋ oŋnkurok kumite kinyiy orit tukuk ce kyonyapan oko soynonet.
Nyi Farasoyintet nye korat! Nyosye sit kunyo cikompet orit sukuŋet kunyol mpo wulo po saŋ.

“Omite akwek kwapi koromun konetikap ntarastinek oko Farasayek! Oyiku kaperperot! Akerkeyekey mwenon ce kicetupci piko ce kiciyil kulelakitu ce toku topon wulo po saŋ oŋnkurok kinyiy orit koyekap piko ce kipok oko tukuk tokol ce kinun.
Kunyo oporukey akwek wulo po saŋ kuyu pic ce toponec oŋnkurok kukinyiy montuwokwok orit mwiynanet oko miyotyonik.

“Omite akwek kwapi koromun konetikap ntarastinek oko Farasayek! Oyiku kaperperot! Otece akwek topon mwenonik co kicetupci workoyik oŋnkosat okararan mwenonik cepo piko ce tililec ce kipur kopurto nye topon,
oŋnkomwowu kule, ‘Nto kiceyiyec acek om kenyisyek co kipo mpo kukonyo, nto kipuryo kot kyiy acek ŋalek ce kikwiy cekto kupakäc workoyik.’
Kunyo ocöme akwek nkit kule ciku kesenisyekap piko co kipakäc workoyik!
Otosyikey nyun ape tay awaŋnte ayiy miyotyet nye kicece mpo kukomwoŋ.
Akwek erenoy! Lekokap erenoy! Osoti akwek kule cimuci kot cecilile mata nye momise?

Kunyo komwowok kule, mosoyoku ani kukwa wule omite akwek workoyik oko piko ce ŋomec oko konetik, mosopar akwek kupok alak, owuyitoci alak murtowontet, oŋnkopas alak om korikapkokwonikwok, okwet alak kupete moŋet ake okoy moŋet ake.

Kunyo om ŋalecutecu kuce mosonyoru akwek musankut nyepo piko co kicepar kupok ce kimoponto lelis, kuceke korotikap Apel nye kimoponto lelis nye kicepar kume, okoy porisyet nyo kicepore Sakariya weritap Parakiya nyo kyoporci akwek kwenutap otepto nye cepele korosek oko meset.
Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosukunyor piko cepo pinta nyepo pesyosyecu toŋoŋutek om ŋalecoto.’’

“Opo! Yerusalem! Yerusalem! Nyi nyo poköci workoyik, oŋnkiwire rwontok piko ce kiciyok kukwa wule mite nyi! Aret cetya ye kyamac ani kule oruruc lekokuk kukwa wule omite ani kuyu wulo ruruktoy nkokyet lekokyi koruruky kopopokyi orit, ntene toyisye nyi!
Akäs pa, mocepokokwok komwoŋ kwek kiratya.
Komwowuŋ kule, kuceke yawut kuwo tay, kemetekoso ani yec okoy ye mocemwowu kule, ‘Kukoci Yiyintet kupeyok neto nye coni om kaynetap Mokoryontet.’ ’’
Kunomen Yesu kumiŋnte kotap Yiyintet, nteye kiweti kukwa konomik kwokuporci neto wule kicetekta kotap Yiyintet.
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Komwowok ani kule, kokäs akwek rwontocu tokol cu mite yu, puryo rwantet mpo akenke nye mokuŋetune yu mite yawut, mosiciturpup tokol oŋnkyewirci ŋony.’’

Nteye kimite Yesu kukepur ŋony om tulwetap ketik ce cekure Seituninek, kukwa konomik ye kimite neto oŋnkutepe möt kumwoci kule, “Mwowec acek, mosukwiyokis ŋalecutecu pesyo ne? Oŋnkukiy ne pelutyet nye yiyoktos sukupor kule kopunto pesyet nyo cone nyi oko ye ŋete koret.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Oripkey koromun, monte kot kuperperak kumasak citake.
Omnye mosukukwa piko ce caŋ om kaynemwani oŋnkwokumwoy kule, ‘Oyiku ani Kristo nye Ŋapanet.’ Mosukuperperis kumas piko ce caŋ.
Mosolim akwek kancoyto nyepo poryosyek ce lekitec oko ce mite wule low; ntene monte cemuye, mosukwiyokis tukuk ceyucoto, ntene kupuryo kot kuporu kule kopunto pesyet nyepo letut.
Omnye mosukusetyi kuporye koret ake koret ake, kuporye poytoyisyet ake poytoyisyet ake; mosukuco rupet, oŋnkuriŋriŋ koret wulyo tokol.
Ntene poru ŋalecutecu yoto kule kacec mwonintap toŋoŋutek kuyu korko nye kaŋet moyet.
“Yoto kuye mosukunämak akwek piko oŋnkukoytok wocitaŋanyak, mosiceparak opoku. Mosukusenkerak piko cepo koret tokol omnye kocäm kaynemwani.
Pesyosyecoto kuye mosukutay piko ce caŋ koyenet nye kweyene. Mosukuŋomntokey cek nkit oŋnkusenkerkey kwicek nkit.
Mosukutok yoto workoyik cepo mwiynanet oŋnkuperper kumas piko ce caŋ.
Kutosyikey yoto kuwoyit miyotyet oŋnkuminiŋit koyenet nyepo piko ce caŋ.
Ntene ci ake tokol nye kotitir kuyo okoy pesyet nyepo letut kunye mosicesor kusop nyoto.
Mocemwayta lokoywecutecu toponec ce nöme poytoyisyetap torot kupunto koret tokol kumukul sukwek kasowunot om wule mite piko cepo koret tokol. Nteye kapok, kuye kupunto pesyet nyepo letut.’’
“Kunyo ye kokäs akwek, ‘Kiy nye miyat nyo kiŋolole Taniel kumite keyoŋe otepto nyetilil.’ (Möce kunket cito nye sumone kule mwowu ne ŋalecu!)
Misyini yoto kumwey piko ce mite Yuteya kupa lakomosyek.
Ye mite cito konyi kisyek, kupuryo kot kumisyini kurek oŋnkuwo wokunum tukukyi ce mite koto orit.
Nteye mite cito mparen, kupuryo kot kumisyini kuweckey wokunum sirenyi nye mite koto orit.
Mite kwapi koromun pesyosyecoto koruk ce koyotin oko ce rerisyi lekok!
Osom akwek Yiyintet sukuŋet mente kot kupoyit mweyotemwoŋ ye pesyosyek cepo peŋat ye kayitit koret, nto ye pesyetap Sapat!
Omnye mosukutok yoto toŋoŋutek cewoyec kupël alak tokol ce kikikwiyokis kuceke ye kicitany koret okoy pesyoni, oŋnkupuryo kot kwiyoktos yec kenyis kitake nye yunyoto.
Ntomo nye kikwiri Yiyintet kuŋerinitu pesyosyecoto, nto puryo ci mpo akenke nye cimuce kot cesor cisop, ntene kikwiri Yiyintet kuŋerinitu pesyosyecoto om toponiyetap pikyi ce kweyotin.
“Kunyo ye komwowok akwek citake pesyosyecoto kule, ‘Akäs oŋyi Kristo nye Ŋapanet’, nto, ‘Oŋyin mite yun’, monte ciyen ŋalekyi.

Omnye mosukutok piko ce kurekey kule ciku ŋapanik, oko piko ce kurekey kule ciku workoyik. Mosukwiy picoto pelutok cewoyec oko tukuk cepo kakitat kule ye kemukakay ciperper cemas piko cepo Yiyintet ce kicekwey.
Kunyo alimnte omnye komwowok ani kutompo kot kupunto pesyonoto.
“Nto mpo ye komwowok akwek piko kule, ‘Akäs, oŋyin mite kitela!’ Monte cipe wuloto; nto mpo ye komwowok kule, ‘Oŋyi kewuŋekey yu!’ Monte ciyen.
Omnye mosukuco Weritap cito kuyu kaweket nyepo ilat nyo wece kupunte koret parak kuceke koŋasis okoy raraktay.
“Wule mitowune musto ku wuloto wule rurukyinikey motomwek.’’
“Yoto pakenke om letutap toŋoŋutek cepo pesyosyecoto, mosukuweckey asista kutuyit, kutay arawet meluwu, mosukosuwune kokelik torot, oŋnkutimtimnkey swamet nyepo torot.
Mosukuporkey yoto pelutyet nyepo Weritap cito om torot, kuriryo kusyekey montuwek piko cepo koret tokol kumukul oŋnkukäs cekto Weritap cito kucone polyet nyepo torot kuponto swamet oko woyinto nyewo.
Mosukuciy kontit nyewo, mosukuyokto neto malaykanikyi kupa okoy toponutek amwan cepo koret. Mosukoruruc cek pikyi ce kweyanik kuceke koret tapanta ake okoy tapanta ake.’’
“Roke okäse akwek ketit mokoywet. Ye keŋot sokek ceci ce ŋorŋor, oŋnket yoto kule karik kuŋotyen kuropen koret.
Kuyunyoto ye kokäs akwek kwiyoktos ŋalecutecu kuye oŋnket kule karik kurkat poytoyisyetap Weritap cito.
Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosukwiyokis ŋalecutecu tokol kutompo kot kupok kuwoŋnkey piko tokol cepo pinta nyepo pesyosyecu ce soptos yawut.
Poku wulin po torot oko koret ŋony, ntene puryo kot kupoku ŋalekwani mpo kisic.’’
“Ntene puryo ci mpo akenke nye nkete kule coni pesyo ne pesyonoto, nto mpo kule sawet oŋnkono. Nka mpo Malaykanik om torot, nka mpo Werit. Papa nkit pate nye nkete.
Omnye kuyu wulo kiyunto tukuk ce kikwiyoktos om pesyosyek co kipo Nuwa, kuyunyoto wule mosukwiytakey om pesyet nyo coni Weritap cito.
Omnye om pesyosyecoto, ye kitompo kot kolum peko koret, kikwomisyi piko oŋnkuyesyi, komütisyi moronik, oŋnkyimüte koruk okoy pesyet nyo kilonye Nuwa kowute rapet.
Ntene kipuryo kot konkete piko kito nye kikwiyoktos okoy kunyiw peko koret oŋnkolum piko tokol. Kunyo yunyoto wule mosukwiytakey om pesyet nye cone Weritap cito.
Om pesyosyecoto, ye mite piko oyenku kwiyisyi om mparen, mosicesut ake cepakakta ake.
Ye mite koruk oyenku kuŋosye rwantetap paka akenke, mosicesut ake cepakakta ake.
Kunyo oripkey, omnye puryo kot oŋnketi akwek kule pesyo ne nye coni Mokoryontemwoŋ.
Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, nto yunye nkete citap koto sawet nye cone corintet, nto kösu nye puryo kot kurwe kot kwosyi corintet kuput konyi.
Kunyo misyini oyiytekey mpo akwek okoŋisye okokoy, omnye musukuco Weritap cito om sawet nye puryo kot oyityini kule coni neto.’’
“Kunyo omwowo ani pa akwek, ŋo mutworin nye cikenekey oŋnkuŋom? Nyoto kunye ye kokukoci mokoryontenyi kupayta mutworik alak, kupcicini cut omik om sawet nye cemokyini.
Ŋerekat koromun mutworintonoto nye ye kaco mokoryontenyi cokunyoru neto kwiyisyi kuyunyoto.
Komwowok ani ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosukukoci mokoryontet mutworintonoto kupayta tukukyi tokol.
Ntene ye mutworin nye miyat, mosukuŋalal kwine nkit kumwoy kule, ‘Tokulow ye mosukuco mokoryontemwani.’
Oŋnkucec kupir mutworik cut alak, oŋnkwomis oŋnkuyesyo oko pokitisyek.
Mosukuweckey kuco yoto mokoryontetap mutworintonoto om pesyet ake nye puryo kot koyityini kule coni oko om sawet nyo puryo kot kunkete.
Mosukuyepayep mokoryontet neto oŋnkukoyito kupot wanak oko koperperotik om wule mite rirek oŋnkyenyiy kelak.’’
“Om pesyonoto, mosukukerkeyit poytoyisyetap torot oko tipik taman ce mwenik ce kinäm tarinekwa oŋnkupa kutorokta cito nye kemütis.
Tipicoto taman, kiperper mutu kuŋomec mutu.
Kunämat co perper tarinekwa pate nye puryo kot kunämat mwaninek alak.
Ntene kunämat ce ŋomec tarinekwa oko mwaninek alak ce kimite cupanik.
Yoto kulilennkey cito nye kemütisyi okoy kunukis tipicoto kot kuruy.
“Ntowo kupunto komoy kwen, yoto kusesew polotet cemwoy kule, ‘Oŋyin kaco cito nyo kemütisyi! Ape atorokte!’
Kuŋetyo tipikey mwenik tokol oŋnkusat tarinekwa.
Yoto kumwoci tipik ce perper ce ŋomec kule, ‘Okonec mpo acek mwaninek cikwok omnye kapekune mwayta tarinek cico.’
Ntene kuwekyi ce ŋomec kumwoci cut kule, ‘Yunye puryo kot kuyemec cepcicine oko akwek, kunyo ape pate wule kyole wayal cikwok nkit.’
Kunomen yoto tipik mutu ce perper wokwolis, nteye kimite cek aran kupeti, kupun cito nyo kemütisyi. Yoto kupetakey tipik mwenik co kakayiytakey cito nyo kemütisyi wokwam sakwet, ceker kurket.
“Nto om letut kupun mpecek tipik cokey oŋnkwokukursyo kumwoy kule, ‘Mokoryontet, Mokoryontet, yotwec mpöcek kurket!’
Kuwekyi cito nyo kemütisyi kumwoci cek kule, ‘Komwowok ŋalek cepo manta kule, puryo kot oŋnketok ani akwek!’
Kuwaŋnta Yesu kumwoy kule, möce oripkey omnye puryo kot oŋnketi akwek pesyet nto sawet.
“Mosukukerkeyit poytoyisyetap torot oko ci nye karik kunomen kuwo toyek koret ake. Yoto kukur mutworikyi oŋnkukoci kupayta tukukyi.

Kukoci ci ake tokol om picoto kuyu wule kimuktoy yisyet. Kukoci ake silinkinek elifunek mut, nto ake kukoci nyo silinkinek elifunek oyeny, oŋnkukoci ake silinkinek elifut akenke, oŋnkunomen kuwo toyek koret ake.
Yoto pakenke kuwo mutworintet nyo kicikoci silinkinek elifunek mut oŋnkuwokwiyisye kamonkesyantit okoy kunyor latik silinkinek alak elifunek mut.
Kuyunyoto kwiyisye mutworintet nyo kicikoci silinkinek elifunek oyeny okoy kunyor latik silinkinek alak elifunek oyeny.
Ntene kuwo mutworintet nyo kicikoci silinkinek elifut akenke oŋnkupal mwenet oŋnkutupci kuwuny pesanikap mokoryontenyi.
“Nto om letut nyepo pesyosyek ce caŋ, kuweckey mokoryontetap mutworicoto oŋnkucokoyitis kusat pesanik oko picoto.

Kuco yoto mutworintet nyo kicikocini silinkinek elifunek mut oŋnkuco kukon oko latik silinkinek alak elifunek mut oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Mokoryontet, kikono ani nyi silinkinek elifunek mut, kunyo käs pa, kyoyiyisye kot onyoru silinkinek alak elifunek mut.’

Kumwoy mokoryontenyi kule, ‘Kiyiy topon, yiku nyi mutworin nye topon nye cikenekey! Omnye cikeneninkey nyi om tukuk ce tukusic, kunyo mokoniŋ ani payte tukuk ce caŋ, co ceyemnte ŋerekwekwani tukway oko nyi.’

Kuco mpene mutworintet nyo kicikocini silinkinek elifunek oyeny, oŋnkuco kumwoy kule, ‘Mokoryontet, kikono ani nyi silinkinek elifunek oyeny, kunyo käs pa, kyoyiyisye kot anyoru latik silinkinek alak elifunek oyeny.’

Kumwoci mokoryontenyi neto nyoto kule, ‘Kiyiy topon, yiku nyi mutworin nye topon nye cikeneninkey! Omnye cikeneninkey nyi om tukuk ce tukusic, kunyo mosokoniŋ ani nyi payte tukuk ce caŋ, co ceyemnte ŋerekwekwani tukway oko nyi!’

Ntene kuco mpene mutworintet nyo kicikocini silinkinek elifut akenke, oŋnkuco kumwoy kule, ‘Mokoryontet, kyonket ani kule yiku nyi ci nye wuy; kise nyi mpo mparet nye kipuryo kot kol, oŋnkiruruce omik wule kipuryo kot kol nyi kupuswek.
Kyanyokoritu ani, kunyo kyowo wopolyi pesanikuk ŋony. Käs okyu pesanikuk.’
Kumwoy mokoryontenyi kule, ‘Yiku nyi mutworin nye puren! Ye kinket nyi kule okise ani omik wule kipuryo kot akol, oŋnkoruruce omik wule kipuryo kot akol kupuswek.
Kunyo ye yunyo, kimisyiniŋ nyi konore pesanikwani Penki. Nto kwaconi kwocekono tokol oko latik.
Kunyo onumune neto silinkinek co ponto oŋnkokoci cito nyo ponto silinkinek elifunek mut.
Omnye ci ake tokol nye ponto tukuk, mosicetosyi kutosyikey tukukyi, nto cito nyo puryo kot kuponto tukuk, mosicinumune neto nyoto mpo tukusic co ponto.
Nto mutworintoni nyi moponto latik, owunukte kuwo saŋ wule mite menonet, wule mite rirek oŋnkyenyiy kelak.’ ’’
“Pesyet nye coni Weritap cito om woyinto kuyu Kinko, kupontonukey oko malaykanik tokol, mosucokopure yoto ŋecerenyi nyepo woyinto.
Mosiciruruc kukwa taynyi piko cepo koret tokol kumukul. Mosukukwey neto yoto cekto kupciwune oyeny kuyu wulo kweytoy mesewontet warek oko kecirek.
Mosukukoci kopurune kecirek yewunyi nyepo tay, oŋnkukoci kopurune warek yewunyi nyepo let.
Mosukumwoci Kinko yoto piko ce mitowune yewunyi nyepo tay kule, ‘Akwa! Kikonok akwek Papamwani kupeyok, akwa kwonyoru poytoyisyet nye kiceyiytowok keny kuceke ye kicitany koret.
Omnye kyoponte ani rupet, apaya akwek, kyoponte melelya, okono akwek peko, kyoyiku to, ntene atoroca ani akwek okwero korikwok.
Kyoweti pöc nye moponte sira, alaca ani akwek. Kyomnyoni, anyaya ani akwek, ye kyomite mopusi, akwa akwek kwakäsa ani.’
Mosukuwekyi yoto piko ce toponec kumwoci neto kule, ‘Mokoryontet, pesyo ne ye kicekösiŋ acek kwomiŋ rupet cepayiŋ, nto ye kyomiŋ melelya cekoniŋ peko iye?
Pesyo ne ye kicekösiŋ acek yiku to, cetorociŋ acek cekweriŋ korikyo, nto ye kimite pöc nye meponte sira cilaciŋ acek nyi?
Pesyo ne ye kicekosiŋ acek nyi mnyoni, nto ye kimite mopusi cekwa kwocekäsiŋ?’
Mosukuwekyi Kinko kumwoci picoto kule, ‘Kiy ake tokol nye kyoyici akwek akenke om mpo yeyamwani cutecu minkec kupëlis, kuce kyoyiwo ani akwek!’
“Mosukumwoci Kinko yoto mpo piko co mitowune yewutap let kule, ‘Aŋete yu omite ani akwek cu kicupok Yiyintet! Ape wule mite mata nye momise nye kiceyiytoci Setani nyewo nyepo oyik oko malaykanikyi!
Omnye kyoponte rupet, ntene otay akwek mopaya ani, kyoponte melelya, ntene oyetena mokono peko;
kyoyiku to; ntene otay akwek motoroca okwero ani korikwok, kyoweti ani pöc nye moponte sira, ntene otay akwek molaca ani; kyomnyoni ani, oko ye kyomite mopusi, ntene otay akwek monyaya ani.’

Mosukuwekyi mpecek picoto kumwoci neto kule, ‘Mokoryontet, pesyo ne ye kicekösiŋ acek nyi ponte rupet oŋnkyetay mocepayiŋ, nto ye kikwomiŋ melelya, nto ye kiyiku to, nto ye kiweti pöc nye meponte sira, nto ye kimnyoni, nto ye kimite mopusi oŋnkyetay acek mocikalyiŋ nyi?’
Mosukuwekyi Kinko kumwoci picoto kule, ‘Kiy ake tokol nye kyotay akwek mokalye akenke om piko ce minkec ceyucu, kunye kipuryo kot oyiwo ani akwek yoto yisyet.’
Mosukupa picoto wule mite toŋoŋutek cepo kenyis nye mopoku, ntene kupa piko ce toponec wule mite soponto nye mopoku.’’
Nteyu kowo kunetis Yesu okoy kuwany ŋalecutecu tokol, kumwoci konomikyi kule,
“Oŋnket akwek kule om pesyosyek oyeny ce kwoni, mosukwek sakwetap Yutayek nye cekure Keytayet. Kunyo mosicenäm Weritap cito oŋnkyikoyito wocewuyitoci murtowontet.’’
Yoto kutuyo tisik cewoyec oko poyikap Yutayek korurukyikey kaytap Tisintet nyewo nye cekure Kayafa,
oŋnkurwoc ŋomnonet kule cenäm Yesu nye puryo konkete ci oŋnkyepakäc kume.
Kumwoy cek kule, “Puryo kot kurok cenäm acek neto ye pesyet nyepo sakwet, omnye muce kwiy piko pararet.’’
Nteye kimite Yesu kotap Simon citap mutyenkenik om Pesaniya.
Yoto kuco korket ake wule mite neto nye kipontonu mwayta nye poŋu topon nye nyitat cupet nye kyole mwayata pesan ce caŋ. Kunäm mwayata oŋnkuroŋnkyi metitap Yesu ye kimite kukepur kwomisyi.
Nteye kotoköse konomik kuyunyo, kunyer cek kutep kumwoy kule, “Kociwurtoci ne mwayi tokol?
Omnye kocimuce kyalya mwayi oŋnkyenyor pesan oŋnkyikoci pononik!’’
Kunket Yesu ŋalecato kimwowu cekto, kumwoci kule, “Omne sayim akwek Cepyosyani? Kokwiwo ani neto ŋolyo nye nyolunot koromun.
Omnye opontekey okokoy oko pononik, ntene puryo kot opuri ani okokoy oko akwek.
Kito nye kakwiy neto kunyi koroŋnkyi pormwani mwayi poŋu topon kuyiytowo ani muyisyet.
Kunyo komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule! Om wulyo tokol wule mocemwayte lokoywecu toponec, mosiceŋolole mpo ŋolyontoni kokwiwo ani cepyosyani cisote neto.’’
Yoto kuwo akenke om konomik taman ok oyeny nye cekure Yuta Isikaryoti wule mite tisik cewoyec,
oŋnkuwo kumwoci kule; “Mosokono ani akwek ne ye kakonok ani Yesu okoy onäm?’’ Yoto kuyit tisik silinkinek sosom oŋnkukoci neto.
Kuceke yoto, kuceny Yuta poroyinto nye topon nye mokuŋomnte Yesu.

Nteye pesyet nyepo tayta nyepo sakwetap mukatyantet nye mokutunat, kukwa konomik ye kimite Yesu oŋnkutepe kumwoci kule, “Ono wule möce nyi kule woceyiytowuŋ acek wule meyomisye omikap kosoleny cepo sakwetap Keytayet?’’

Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Ape wule mite citake nye minye moŋet, womwoci kule, ‘Komwoy konetintet kule, kakwitita pesyemwani nye kicekwey. Kunyo mosoyomisye ani kaŋuŋyi oko konomikwani sekwetap Keytayet.’ ’’
Yoto kuyiyta konomik omik cepo kosoleny cepo sakwetap Keytayet kuyu wulo komwocini Yesu.
Ntowo kupunto kosoleny, kopur Yesu kwomis oko konomikyi taman ok oyeny.
Nteye kimite kwomisyi, kumwoy kule, “Komwowok ani akwek kule, mosukuŋomnto ani akenke om akwek.’’
Yoto kunerekis konomik oŋnkucec kutep ci ake tokol om cek kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, ani nyoto?’’
Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Akenke om akwek nye mite kunoknoktoy mukatyantet nyenyi sanit akenke oko ani kunye mosukuŋomnto.
Mosukume Weritap cito kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet ŋalek ce nöme neto, ntene mite kwapi koromun cito nyo mosukuŋomnto Weritap cito! Kitopon nto kipuryo kot ceyi cico mpo kisic!’’
Yoto kuŋalal ŋomntoyintet Yuta kumwoy kule, “Konetintet, ani nyoto mwowu nyi?’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Kemwowu nyi nkit.’’
Nteye kimite cek tokwomisyi, kunäm Yesu mukatyantet oŋnkusomnci kukasta Yiyintet, oŋnkukoci konomikyi oŋnkumwoy kule, “Onäm oyam, nyitenyi kunye pormwani.’’
Oŋnkunäm cikompet oŋnkusomnci kukasta Yiyintet, oŋnkukoci cek oŋnkumwoy kule,
“Oye akwek tokol cutecu, omnye korotikwani cutecu cepo kirotyet nyelel, ce citotocini piko ce caŋ sukuŋet kunum miyotyonik.
Komwowok ani kule, komo toye ani nfinyonicu okoy pesyet nye mosaye nfinyonik ce lelac oko akwek om wulin po poytoyisyetap Papamwani.’’
Yoto kutum cek tumnto oŋnkunomen kupa okoy tulwetap ketik ce cekure Seituninek.
Yoto kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Mosomwey akwek tokol om kwomuwutap pesyoni oŋnkopakakta ani nkit, omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Mosukupar Yiyintet mesewontet, yoto kuseret kecirek.’
Ntene om letut ye kaciŋeta ani atutune met, mosontowok anyosye awo Kalilaya.’’
Kuwekyi Petero kumwoci Yesu kule, “Nka kot komwey piko alak tokol, puryo kot oyostiŋ ani nyi mpo kisic!’’
Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Oŋnkisot ŋalecu! Kutompo kot koncur kurkonkit aret somok om kwomowutap pesyoni, mesetuckey nyi aret somok mwowu kule monketo ani.’’
Kuwekyi Petero kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot omuci ani mpo kisic kot atuckey omwowu kule monketiŋ nyi, nka kot koyek met cepoku mpo tukway.’’ Kumwoy konomik cut alake tokol kuyunyoto.
Yoto kuwo Yesu oko konomikyi okoy kupunto mparet ake nye cekure Kesesemane oŋnkumwoci konomikyi kule, “Opur yuteyu awo ani wosom om yun.’’
Kuwetokey neto Petero oko werikap Sepetayo oyeny. Yoto kucec Yesu kunerec kumuy oŋnkusot koromun.
Kumwoci neto cek kule, “Oponte nerekwek ce caŋ koromun om mukuleymwani kot karik kupakäca. Opur yuteyu, oŋnkokany cekösu oko ani monte ceruye.’’
Kuwo neto kunata tay kuminiŋ oŋnkuyim kukutuny, oŋnkusom kumwoy kule, “Papanyu, numuneno ani toŋoŋutecu ye mukoktos, ntene puryo kot kuyu wule omoktoy ani, ntene kuyu wulo moktoy nyi!’’
Yoto kuweckey kuco ye kimite konomik somoku, cokunyor kumite kukoruy. Kumwoci neto Petero kule, “Puryo so kot omuc akwek kot okösu oko ani awany mpo sawet akenke?
Kunyo okösu, oŋnkosom sukuŋet monte osuci syemutok. Cöme mukuleyto, ntene puren porto.’’
Kuwo Yesu yec nyepo oyeny oŋnkuwo kusom kumwoy kule, “Papanyu, ye puryo kot komukoktos kukeytena ani toŋoŋutecu, ntene möce nyi kule opunte ani, kante kwiyokis ce möce nyi.’’
Kuweckey yec kuco cokunyor konomik kumite kukoruy omnye kikinäm rwonto nyewo.
Kuwo Yesu yec kupakakta cek oŋnkuwo wokusom aret nyepo somok kumwoy ŋalek ce kerkey cokey co komwowu om panta nyepo tay.
Oŋnkuweckey kuco ye kimite konomik oŋnkuco kumwoci cek kule, “Tomite akwek oruytosi omunyi? Akäs! Karik sawet nye ce nöme Weritap cito oŋnkyikoyito kunäm piko co ponto miyotyonik.
Oŋetye cipe! Akäs oŋyi cito nyo ŋomnto ani!’’

Nteye kimite Yesu tokuŋolole, kupun Yuta akenke om konomik taman ok oyeny kupontonukey oko luket nyepo piko ce caŋ ce kiponto rotokap cok oko korokonik. Picoto kuce kiyoku tisik cewoyec oko poyikap Yutayek.
Kikikoporci Yuta picoto pelutyet kumwoci kule, “Cito nye katoroc ani aŋatut kunye cito nyoto, anäm nyoto!’’
Ntowo kupun Yuta, yoto kuwo pakenke okoy ye kimite Yesu, oŋnkusupay kule, “Konetintet, purte nyi kalyet.’’ Oŋnkuŋatut.
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Corwenyu! Sorci lakwar yiy kito nye möce kule ayiy.’’ Yoto kukwa piko cut kwokunäm Yesu oŋnkurat topon.
Kocut cito akenke nye kipontokey Yesu rotwetap cok oŋnkuyep kulot yitit nyepo mutworintetap tisintet nyewo.
Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Ketyi cokiŋuŋ ye komite! Omnye piko ce yiyisye rotokap cok kuce pore picoto rotokap cok.
Puryo kot nket nyi kule omuci ani kot okur kokolyoyisyet kucone wule mite Papamwani oŋnkuyokwo ani lakwar sikarek cepo Malaykanik ce keyite lukosyek taman ok oyeny?
Ntene ye yunyo, komuce kulene kwitita kupoyit manta silutekap Yiyintet co mwowu kule, musukwitita ŋalecutecu om aret nye yunyitenyi?’’

Yoto kuŋololyi Yesu luket nyepo piko kumwoci kule, “Kakwa akwek kuyunye omöce kule cenäm corin? Omnye kakwante rotokap cok oko runkunek. Nteyu kwopuri ani pesyosyek tokol onetisyi om kotap Yiyintet, ntene puryo kot anäma ani akwek yoto.
Ntene kokwiyokis ŋalecutecu tokol sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek co kisil workoyik om silutekap Yiyintet.’’ Yoto kumwey konomik tokol kupakakta Yesu.
Kunäm cek Yesu oŋnkukwer okoy kupunto kaytap Kayafa Tisintet nyewo, wule kikikorurukyikey konetikap ntarastinek oko poyik.
Kurup Petero cekto let kuloyityi kuminiŋ okoy kupunto saŋntap kaytap Tisintet nyewo. Yoto kuwo Petero kayta orit oŋnkopur ŋony wanak oko sikarek ce kiripsi kule sakas wule mukupeta ŋalek tokol.
Yoto kusyem yoto tisik cewoyec poyik oko piko cepo kokwet kule ceceny piko muncururwanik ce komwoy lelisto nye nöme Yesu kule sukuŋet cepakäc kume,
Ntene kipuryo kot kunyor ŋolyo nyepo lelis mpo akenke, nka kot kiyoŋ piko alake ce caŋ oŋnkumwoy ŋalek cepo mwiynan ce nöme neto. Nto om letut kukwa piko alake oyenku oŋnkwokuyoŋ tay,
oŋnkumwoy kule, “Kumwoy cici kule, ‘Omuci oturpup kotap Yiyintet oŋnkatec yec om pesyos somok pate.’ ’’
Kuyo Tisintet nyewo oŋnkumwoci Yesu kule, “Puryo kot ŋololi wec ŋalekyu cewosontyiŋ nyi?’’
Ntene kusis Yesu tokol. Kuŋalal Tisintet nyewo yec kumwoci kule, “Omöce ani kule walkey nyi yawut om kaynetap Yiyintet nye sopot! Mwowec acek, yiku nyi Ŋapanet Weritap Yiyintet?’’

Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Kemwowu nyi, Ntene komwowok ani akwek tokol kule kuceke yawut kuwo tay, mosokäs Weritap cito kumite kepure komostap yewut nyepo tay nyepo Yiyintet nyepo kamukeywek tokol, oŋnkucone polik cepo torot!’’
Om ŋalecato, kuye kupac Tisintet nyewo sirokyi oŋnkumwoy kule, “Kanyil Yiyintet? Komo cemöce acek yec piko muncururwanik alak! Kunyo kalim akwek om yuteyu ŋalekyi ce miyotec.
Osoti akwek kulene?’’ Kuwec piko kumwoy kule, “Lelat, kunyo misyini cepakäc kume.’’
Yoto kuŋutyi cek neto oŋnkutuluc, oŋnkusyec alake,
Kumwowu kule, “Nyi Ŋapanet, ŋor mwowec acek ŋo nyi kopiriŋ nyi!’’
Kimite Petero yoto kukepur yepo kayta saŋ, yoto kuco korko nye mutworin nyepo Tisintet nyewo ye kimite neto oŋnkumwoy kule, “Kepontekey mpenyi Yesu nyepo Kalilaya.’’
Ntene kutuckey kutoyis Petero om taytap piko tokol kuwec kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot oŋnket ani ŋalek ce mwowu nyi.’’
Kunomen Petero kuwo yepo kurket nyepo kayta saŋ. Yoto kukäs cepto ake nye mutworin Petero, kumwoci cepto piko ce kimite yoto kule, “Kopontokey cici oko Yesu nyepo Nasaret.’’
Kutuckey Petero yec kuwalkey kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot oŋnket ani cico.’’
Nto om letut yec kuminiŋ kukwa piko ce kimite keyoŋ om yoto kimite Petero oŋnkumwoci kule, “Yiku nyi manta akenke om cekto, omnye poru ŋalaleŋuŋ.’’
Yoto kuwalkey Petero kucupkey kumwoy kule, “Kupar asis! Puryo kot oŋnket ani cico.’’ Yoto pakenke koncur kurkonkit,
kusot Petero ŋalek co kumwowu Yesu, “Kutompo kot koncur kurkonkit aret somok, mesetuckey nyi taya ani aret somok mwowu kule monketo ani.’’ Yoto kuwo saŋ oŋnkurir lokik ce caŋ koromun.
Ntowo kuyec koret pate, kurwoc tisik cewoyec tokol oko poyikap Yutayek aret wule sukuŋet kupakäc Yesu kume.
Kurate cek neto nyororonik oŋnkukwer kuwo wule mite poytoyintet Pilato.
Nteyu kowo kukäs Yuta ŋomntoyintet kule kocemutyi Yesu musankut cepakäc kume, yoto kurenynkey oŋnkunäm silinkinekye sosom oŋnkusutyi tisik cewoyec oko poyik.
Kumwoy kule, “Kwalel ani ayiy miyotyet aŋomnte korotikap ci nye moponto lelis!’’ Ntene kuwec cekto kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot kunömec acek lelisto nyepo ŋalekyo, nyeŋuŋ lelisto nkit!’’
Kuwirci Yuta pesanik kotap Yiyintet, oŋnkunomen kuwo wokuketkey nkit.
Kukwey tisik cewoyec pesanik oŋnkumwoy kule, “Pesanicu kuce kucale koroti, kunyo puryo kot kucöme ntarastinekyacek cekonore wule mite pesanikap kotap Yiyintet.’’
Nteyu kowo kucömncin cek kwale pesanicato mparetap cito nye yiye terenik sukwek mparanato mparet nye cemucini toyek ce kopok.
Kunyo sukuŋet cekure maswanato, “Maswetap koroti’’, okoy kunyi.
Yoto kwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek ce kiŋalal workoyontet Yeremiya kumwoy kule, “Kinäm cek silinkinek sosom pesanik ce kikicäm pikap Israel kule kyale neto
oŋnkwiyisye cekto pesanicato kwale mparetap cito nye yiye terenik, kuyu wulo kikimwowo ani Mokoryontet.’’
Kuyoŋe Yesu taytap poytoyintet, kutepe poytoyintet neto kule, “Yiku nyi kinko nyepo Yutayek?’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Kemwowu nyi.’’
Kuwosontyi tisik cewoyec oko poyik Yesu, ntene kusis Yesu nye puryo kot kuwec ŋolyo.
Kumwoci Pilato neto kule, “Puryo kot lime ŋalek tokol cu wosontyiŋ nyi cek?’’
Yoto kutay Yesu mawec ŋolyo mpo akenke okoy kukite poytoyintet koromun.
Kwak okokoy ye pesyetap sakwet nyepo Keytayet, kiponto poytoyintet kopurto nye tyoktoy mopusyontet ake tokol nye kosom piko neto.
Kimite yoto mopusi mopusyontet ake nye sokoran nye cekure Parapa.
Nteyu kowo koruruckey piko kutepe Pilato cek kule, “Oŋnkono nye omöce akwek kule otyokwok ani, Parapa nto Yesu nye cekure Ŋapanet?’’
Omnye kinket Pilato kule kokwer cek Yesu kwokuwosontyine wule mite neto om corokyinot pate.

Nteye kimite Pilato kukepure ŋeceret nye mute musankunek, kuyok korkenyi ŋolyontet kumwoci kule, “Mente kot ayiye kiy cico moponto lelis, omnye kwetaŋanya ani koromun kirwotik cepo ŋalek ce nöme neto.’’
Ntene kowurur tisik cewoyec oko poyik luket nyepo piko kumwoci kusom Pilato kutyac Parapa oŋnkupakäc Yesu kume.
Ntene kutepe poytoyintet cek kule, “Oŋnkono om picutecu oyeny nye omöce kule otyokwok ani akwek?’’ Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Cemöce Parapa!’’
Kutepe Pilato cek kule, “Kunyo omöce akwek kule ayiye ani ne Yesu nye cekure Ŋapanet!’’ Kuwec piko tokol kumwoy kule, “Wuyitoci murtowontet!’’
Ntene kutepe Pilato cek kule, “Omne, kukwiy lelis ne?’’ Yoto kutosyikey piko kupol koromun kumwoy kule, “Wuyitoci murtowontet!’’

Ntowo kukäs Pilato kule komomuci kot akalye mpo kisic, oko yec kule muce kucec pararet, yoto kunäm peko oŋnkowun yewuniyekyi om taytap piko tokol, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Puryo kot oponte ani lelis om korotikap Cici! Nömok akwek nkit lelisto!’’
Kuwec piko tokol kumwoy kule, “Kunämec acek lelisto nyepo korotikyi oko lekokyacek!’’
Yoto kutyokyi Pilato cekto Parapa, oŋnkumwayta cepas Yesu oŋnkukoyito cekwer wocewuyitoci murtowontet.
Kukwer sikarekap Pilato Yesu kuwo kaytap Poytoyintet orit, oŋnkorurukyikey luket nyepo sikarek tokol komut Yesu.
Konumune sirokyi oŋnkulokyi siret nye mur kwarra,
oŋnkuta nkwatyet nyepo kotok oŋnkukoci metinyi, oŋnkukoci kunäme korokto yewutap tay, oŋnkukutuŋe yepo taynyi, oŋnkucasekey kumwoy kule, “Cisupoyiŋ kinko nyepo Yutayek! Ilaŋnte!’’
Kuŋutyi cek neto oŋnkunumune korokto kupire metit.
Nteyu kowo kucasekey cek okoy kupok, kunumune siret nye mur kwarra oŋnkuketyi kulokyi sirokyi oŋnkukwer kuwo wocewuyitoci murtowontet.
Nteye kimite cek kupeti, kutuye citake nyepo koretap Kurene nye cekure Simon, yoto kukerci cek neto koŋ kukonop murtowontetap Yesu.
Kupa cek okoy ye cekure, “Kolokosa’’ nye poru kule “Rokyetap Metit.’’
Kukoci cek neto kuye nfinyonik ce mwonec ce kacetase akatanet. Ntowo kucemcem Yesu, kutay maye.
Kuwuyitoci cekto neto murtowontet oŋnkupcicin sirokyi kuporci kirot.
Nto kapok, kopur cek ŋony oŋnkurip kukäs Yesu.
Kutore yepo metinyi parak ŋalek cepo musankunyi ce kicesil kule, “Nyi ku Yesu Kinko nyepo Yutayek.’’
Cewuyitoci corik oyeny murtowonik oko Yesu, kopurune ake yewunyi nyepo tay, nto ake kopurune yewunyi nyepo let.
Kulelec metewokwa piko ce kimite kupeti kutile om aran oŋnkucup cek neto kumwoy kule,
“Nyi nyo kwemöce kule aturpup kotap Yiyintet oŋnkitec yec om pesyosyek somok! Sopkey ra nkit rekune murtowontet ye yiku nyi Weritap Yiyintet. ’’
Koncurururis kuyunyoto mpecek tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek oko poyik kumwoy kule,
“Kwesope neto piko alak, ntene kunyo puryo kot komuce kusopkey neto nkit. Puryo kot ku Kinko neto nyepo Israel? Ye korekune neto yawut murtowontet, mosiciyen acek ŋalekyi.
Kwenekey neto Yiyintet, kumwowu kule oyiku Weritap Yiyintet, kunyo cemöce cekäs oŋnkomuce cokusop Yiyintet neto yawut!’’
Kucup mpo corik ce kicewuyitoy oko neto kumwoci ŋalek ceyucoto.
Ntowo kupunto sawet pet kwen, kunäm menonet kutuyit koret tokol nye kipur kuwany sawanik somok.
Ntowo kurik kupunto sawet sokol nyepo kosoleny kuŋalal Yesu kukurto om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Eli, Eli, lema sapaksani.’’ Ce mwowu ŋaleca kule, “Yiyintenyu, Yiyintenyu, omne seyasta ani nyi?’’
Nteye kotolime piko ce kimite keyoŋ yoto ŋalekyi, kumwoy cek kule, “Mite kukure Eriya!’’
Kulapat lakwar akenke om picoto oŋnkunum cankut oŋnkolumnta wule mite nfinyonik oŋnkurutyi tekantet oŋnkusyem kule cikoci kuye.
Ntene kumwoy piko alake kule, “Tekany pa, cekäs oŋnkuconi Eriya cokusop neto!’’
Kuŋalal Yesu yec om kutit nyewo, oŋnkomuny komuŋnto nyepo letut.
Yoto kukerer siret nye cepciye kotap Yiyintet kuceke met okoy kel, oŋnkuriŋriŋ koret, kutesis rwontok,
kuyotokis mwenonik ce kicetupci muswek, kuŋetye kotutune met piko cepo Yiyintet ce kipok.
Kuŋetye picoto mwenonik, nto om letut yu kowo kotutune met Yesu, kupa picoto okoy moŋet Nyetilil wule kiwo kukäse piko ce caŋ cek picoto.
Yoto kukäs nyewo nyepo sikarek oko sikarek ce kipontokey ce kiripe Yesu koriŋriŋetap koret oko tukuk tokol ce keyokis, kumuyo cek koromun kumwoy kule, “Koko Weritap Yiyintet cici manta!’’
Kimite yoto koruk ce caŋ ce kimite ye low kuminiŋ ce kimite kuköse Yesu. Korucoto kuce kikwoni kurupu Yesu kuceke Kalilaya sukukolyoy yisyet.
Om cek coto ku Mariyam nyepo Maktala, oko Mariyam Kametitap Yakopo oko Yosep, oko kametitap werikap Sepetayo.
Ntowo kupunto kosoleny, kuco citake nye mokoryo nyepo koretap Arimaseya nye cekure Yosep nye kikikwek konomintetap Yesu.
Yoto kuwo neto wule mite Pilato oŋnkusom cikoci portap Yesu. Kumwayta Pilato cikoci neto musto.
Kunumune Yosep porto murtowontet oŋnkurate suket nyelel,
oŋnkukoci mwenenyi nkit nye kutokupole yepo rwantet nye kepenet, oŋnkunäm rwantet nyewo kukere kurketap mwenet oŋnkunomen kuwecikey.
Kimite yoto kukepur kutokyikey mwenet Mariyam nyepo Maktala oko Mariyam nyin ake.
Nteye kipesyet nyepo oyeny, nyoto ku pesyet nye rupe pesyet nyo ceyiytoykey. Kutuyo tisik cewoyec oko Farasayek oko Pilato,
oŋnkumwoci cek Pilato kule, “Mokoryontet, kacisot acek ŋalek ce kimwoy mwintoni ye kitokusope kule, ‘Mosotutune met om letutap pesyosyek somok’.

Kunyo mwayte cerip mwenet topon okoy kupok pesyosyek somoku, sukuŋet mente kupa konomikyi wokucor musto oŋnkumwoci piko kule, ‘Kokotutune met.’ Mosukuwoyit koperperisyet nyepo letut kusir nye kipo tay kunyo.’’
Kumwoci Pilato cekto kule, “Oponte akwek sikarek ce ripsi, ape worip topon koromun kuyu wule omuktoy.’’
Kunomen cek kupa oŋnkuwokuker mwenet topon kukoci pelutyet nye poru oŋnkukoci sikarek kurip.
Ntowo kupok pesyetap Sapat, nye kerir koret pate ye pesyetap Santey, kuwo Mariyam nyepo Maktala oko Mariyam nyin ake wokukäs mwenet.
Yoto koriŋriŋ koret koromun, kucone malayketap Mokoryontet torot cokuwunukto rwantet oŋnkopure parak.
Kikerkey tonto nyenyi oko kaweket nyepo ilat, oŋnkulelac sirokyi piw kuyu plelityet nyepo koyantet.
Kumuyo kupoton sikarek ce kiripsi koromun kukerkeyitu pic ce kapok.
Kuŋololyi malayket korucoto kumwoci kule, “Monte cemuye, oŋnket ani kule ocenye akwek Yesu nyo kucewuyitocini murtowontet.
Puryo kot kumite yu, kokotutune met kuyu wulo kimwayta neto. Akwa pa yu kwakäs ye kucemuci.
Kunyo ape yawut asartekey lakwar womwoci konomikyi kule, ‘Kokotutune met’, kunyo mite yawut kontowok akwek kuweti Kalilaya wule mawanyorte! Kunyo möce asot ŋalek ce komwowok ani akwek.’’
Yoto kusartakey cek kupete yepo mwenet kukomuyo oŋnkuŋerekotin. Kurway cek wokumwoci konomikyi.
Yoto pakenke kutuye Yesu cek oŋnkutakwes kule, “Takwenyo.’’ Kukwa cek kuric Yesu oŋnkukutuny kunäm kerenkokyi kusay.
Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Monte cemuye, ape womwoci mpo yeyamwani konomik kupa Kalilaya wule mosukukäsena ani cekto.’’
Nteye kimite koruk aran kupeti, yoto kupa sikarek alake co kiripe mwenet okoy kupunto moŋet oŋnkuwo kumwoci tisik cewoyec ŋalek tokol ce kokwiyokis.
Koruruckey tisik cewoyec oko poyik oŋnkurwoc ŋomnonet. Kukoci cek sikarek pesanik ce caŋ,
oŋnkumwoci kule, “Möce omwowu kule, kukwa konomikyi komoy cemite acek koceruye oŋnkwokucor musnyi.
Nteye kalim poytoyintet ŋalecutecu, mosiceŋololyi acek neto okoy cimukte nye komo oponte akwek ŋolyo ake tokol nye omuye.’’
Kunäm sikarek co kiripsi pesanik, oŋnkwiy kuyu wulo kocemwoci cekto. Kutisto ŋolyontono om wule mite Yutayek tokol okoy pesyoni.
Kupa konomik tamanu ok akenke okoy tulwet ake om Kalilaya wule kikimwoci Yesu cek kupa wuloto.
Nteye kotoköse cek neto kukutuŋe yepo taynyi kusay nka kot kipuryo kot kucömis alake om cekto.
Kunokyi Yesu ye mite cekto oŋnkumwoci kule, “Kacekono ani kamukeywek tokol om torot oko koret ŋony.
Kunyo ape wule mite piko cepo koret tokol kumukul, wanet kwek konomik, wapatisan om kaynet nyepo Papa, oko nyepo Werit, oko nyepo Muyet Nyetilil,
oŋnkonet kuywey ŋalek tokol co kyomwowok ani akwek. Kunyo möce oŋnket kule opontekey ani oko akwek okokoy pesyet nyepo letut.’’
Yunyi wule yunto lokoywek ce toponec ce nöme Yesu Kristo, nye Weritap Yiyintet.
Kicec kuyu wulo kisil workoyontet Isaya kule: “Mwowu Yiyintet kule: Akäs pa, oyoku ani kiyokintenyu kuntowuŋ nyi; nye mosukutemuŋ areŋuŋ.
Kapole citake kitela; ayiytoci Mokoryontet arenyi, asat kurotakay arenyi nye mosukupunte!’’
Yoto koporkey Yowana om koretap kitela, oŋnkupatisan piko oŋnkumwoci lokoywekyi kule, “Arenynkey ayaste miyotyonikwok oŋnkyepatisanak sukuŋet kukalyak Yiyintet miyotyonikwok.’’
Yoto kupa piko tokol cepo koretap Yuteya oko cepo moŋetap Yerusalem wule mite Yowana wokulimnta ŋalekyi. Kurenynkey cek kuŋoŋ kupor miyotyonikwa oŋnkupatisan Yowana cek om oyinetap Yortan.
Kiloce Yowana yoto siret nye kicenape kororikap tyonyntake nye cekure nkamiyet oŋnkurate anwet suwenyi. Kikwome talamik oko kumnyatetap samiyita.
Kumwoci Yowana piko ŋalek kule, “Coni om letumwani citake nyewo nye ponto swamet kupëlo ani, nye puryo kot kuyemo oyimnci aŋnkatyac porokap kweyonikyi.
Opotisonenok ani yawut peko, ntene mosukupatisanenak Muyet Nyetilil.’’
Om pesyosyecoto, kucone Yesu moŋetap Nasaret om koretap Kalilaya, yoto kupatisan Yowana Yesu om oyinetap Yortan.
Nteye kimite neto kuloŋune peko, kukäs pakenke kuyatakay wulin po torot oŋnkuco kurekyi Muyet Nyetilil neto nye kerkey swarar.
Yoto kucone kutit torot kumwoy kule, “Yiku nyi Werimwani camanet, oŋerekyiŋ ani nyi koromun.’’
Yoto pakenke kukwer Muyet Nyetilil Yesu kuwo okoy kitela.
Kopur Yesu wuloto po kitela kuwany pesyosyek artam; kusyem Setani nyewo nyepo oyik, kule olotu Yesu. Kipontokey neto om wuloto tyoŋikap kitela pate. Ntene kukwa Malaykanik kwokukalya neto.
Nto om letut yu kowo cenäm Yowana cekerta mopusi, yoto kuwo Yesu okoy Kalilaya kumwoytoti lokoywek ce toponec ce kwone wule mite Yiyintet.
Kumwoy kule, “Kacontyok akwek pesyet nyo kicekwey, kunyo karik poytoyisyetap Yiyintet! Arenynkey ayaste miyotyonikwok oŋnkocäm lokoywek ce toponec.’’
Nteye kimite Yesu kuweti kurupe tapantap tampayayetap Kalilaya, yoto kukäs Yesu Simon oko mutakwam Antereya ce kimite kuwircini porok tampayayet omnye kinömik ce nöme purpurunek.
Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Akwa arupa cepetekey ani, mosokonok yisyet nye okweru piko.’’
Yoto pakenke kupakakta cek porokwa oŋnkurup kupetakey Yesu.
Yoto kuwo tay kuminiŋ, kukäs Yesu Yakopo oko Yowana werikap Sepetayo ce tupco ce kimite rapemwa kuyiytoy porokwa.
Yoto pakenke ntowo kukäs Yesu cek, yoto kukur cekto. Yoto kupakakta kwan Sepetayo kumite kupontokey oko piko ce kikwiyisyi oŋnkupetakey cek Yesu.
Kukwa cek okoy kupun moŋetap Kapernaum. Nteye kipesyetap Sapat nye kirupe, kuwo Yesu kotapkok oŋnkucec kunetis.
Kukite piko ŋalek ce kinet omnye kinet ŋalek ce nyikisec ce ponto kamukeywek ce puryo kot kukerkey oko wule netitoy konetikap ntarastinek.
Yoto pakenke kuco kotapkokwonoto citake nye kiponto oyinot nye miyat oŋnkupol kumwoy kule,
“Mokenec ne acek nyi Yesu nyepo Nasaret? Keco kule kyarantec acek? Oŋnketiŋ ani kule yiku nyi Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet!’’
Yoto kupolyi Yesu oyinot nye miyat kumwoci kule, “Sis! Ŋete cito!’’
Kunäm oyinoto nye miyat cicoto kupotan kwapi oŋnkupol om kutit nyewo oŋnkuŋet kuwecikey.
Kukite piko tokol koromun okoy kucec kutepekey nkit kumwoy kule, “Ŋolyo ne nyi? Konetisyet nyi nyelel? Ponto cici kamukeywek ce muce mpo kot kupayta kupolyi oyik ce miyotec oŋnkulimnci.’’
Yoto kutisto lokoywekap Yesu kupunte wulyo tokol om Kalilaya.
Kunomen cek kupete kotapkok okoy kupunto kotap mpo Simon oko Antereya; kupetakey Yakopo oko Yowana.
Kimite yoto kukoru kwiriri kumnyone yeset cepyosyetap pikoy nyepo Simon. Kumwoci piko Yesu portap cepyosyanato.
Kuwo Yesu okoy ye kimite neto, oŋnkunäm yewut kukalya kuŋet, yoto pakenke kusope cepyosyanato yeset oŋnkucec kukalya cek kwici yisyonutek.
Ntowo kwimen koret pesyonoto kacumukta asista, kukwer piko piko tokol ce kimnyontos oko ce kiponto oyik kukwa wule mite Yesu.
Yoto korurukyikey piko tokol cepo moŋet ye kipo kurketap koto nye kimite Yesu.
Kusop Yesu om yoto piko ce caŋ ce kimnyontos porwonik wok tokol, oŋnkukwet oyik ce caŋ. Kuyete Yesu oyik moŋalal ŋolyo, omnye kinkete oyik kule neto ku ŋo.
Nto kerir koret pate nye tokutuy; kuŋet Yesu kunomene moŋet kuwo okoy kupunto koret surukwenet wokusom om wuloto kwine nkit.
Ntene kupa mpo Simon oko piko ce kipontokey okoy surukwenet kuceŋoti neto.
Ntowo kunyor kumwoci kule, “Mite piko tokol kuceŋatiŋ nyi.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Okany cipe cetosyikey okoy cepunte soŋwek alak ce lekitec saŋet wamwayte wuloto ŋalek; omnye kyocontyi ani ŋalek coto.’’
Kuwesetot Yesu yoto komut koretap Kalilaya tokol kumwoytoti ŋalekap Yiyintet om korikapkokwonik oŋnkukwet oyik.
Kuco citake nye kinäm mutyenkenik okoy ye kimite Yesu, oŋnkukutuny kusom kakalyayet kumwoci kule, “Ye kecäm nyi nkit muci sopo ani!’’
Yoto kurotot Yesu cicoto okoy kurire kukalya, kuyito yewunyi oŋnkunäm cicoto kumwoy kule, “Omoce ani, kunyo sop nyolu!’’
Kusopco om yoto pakenke mutyenkenik ce kiponto cicoto.
Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kunomen kuwecikey oŋnkunkolontyi kumwoci kule,
“Lim pa, mente womwoci citake tokol ŋalecu, ntene iwo lakwar wule mite tisintet oŋnkikany kukäsiŋ, nteye kapok koyte kokotutyet nyo kimwoy Moses, sukuŋet porci kunket ci tokol kule kwesop nyi.’’

Ntene kunomen cicoto kuwo wokumwaytat ŋalecato om wulyo tokol. Kumwaytat kutisto ŋalek okoy komokomukoktos kot kuwo Yesu kowut moŋet koporukey, ntene kopurune neto surukwenet. Yoto kukwane piko koret wulyo tokol kukwa wule mite Yesu.
Om letutap pesyosyek ce ŋeri, kuweckey Yesu kuco okoy Kapernaum, yoto celim kule kaco neto kamwa.
Kukwa koruruckey piko ce caŋ okoy kupot poroyinto wule mokopure, nka mpo yepo kurket saŋ. Kimwocini Yesu cek yoto lokoywek cepo Yiyintet.
Yoto kukwa piko alake amwanu wule mite Yesu ce kitoronu citake nye kipok kerenkok.

Omnye kicaŋit piko nye kipuryo wule kimuce cek kopunte cicoto okoy wule mite Yesu. Kulany cek koto kisyek oŋnkuput kisyekut ye kimite Yesu. Nteyu kowo kuyatakay yosico, kopunte cicoto yoto kumite kwiririt nye korwoye.
Ntowo kukäs Yesu koyenet nye kiponto picoto, kumwoci cicoto kipok kerenkok kule, “Werinyu, kacikalyiŋ miyotyonikuk.’’
Kusot konetikap ntarastinek alake ce kimite yoto kukepur oŋnkuŋalal kwicek nkit kumwoy kule,
“Ŋo cici ŋolole ŋal ce nyile Yiyintet? Ŋo nye muce kukalya miyotyonik nye puryo kot ku Yiyintet nkit!’’
Yoto pakenke konket Yesu ŋalek ce kimite cek kusote om montuwokwa, kumwoci neto cek kule, “Omne sasot akwek ŋal ceyuco oŋnkotintentyine om kasoteywekwok?
Oŋnkono nye lekit, cemwoci cito nyi kipok kerenkok kule, ‘Kacikalyiŋ miyotyonikuk!’ Nto ye kocemwoci kule, ‘Ŋet yony, oŋnkinäm tor kwiririŋuŋ wesetote?’
Kunyo mosoporwok ani ŋalek cepo manta kule ponto Weritap cito kamukeywek om koret kukalya miyotyonik.’’ Yoto kumwoci Yesu cito nye kipok kerenkok kule,
“Komwowuŋ kule, ŋet yony, oŋnkinäm tor kwiririŋuŋ nomen iwo ka.’’

Kuŋet cicoto kuyunyoto oŋnkunäm kotor kwiririnyi oŋnkunomen kuwo kusartakey kuköse piko tokol. Kokite piko tokol koromun oŋnkukasta woyintap Yiyintet kumwoy kule, “Tompo kot cekäs kenyis ŋolyo nye yunyi.’’
Kuketitakey Yesu yec kuwo okoy kupunto tapantap Tampayayetap Kalilaya. Yoto kukwa luket nyepo piko ce caŋ wule mite neto, kucec kunet cekto.
Nteye kimite Yesu kuweti, yoto kukäs Lefi weritap Alufayo kukepur konyi nye cekweye mosoret. Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Rupa cepetekey oko ani.’’ Kuŋët Lefi oŋnkunomen kupetakey Yesu.
Nto om letut ye kimite Yesu kwomisyi om kotap Lefi. Kimite yoto kukepur wanak oko neto piko co ruruce mosoret oko piko co kicetay, omnye kicaŋ piko ce kipetoykey Yesu.

Yoto kukäs konetikap ntarastinek alak ce Farasayek kwomisyi Yesu oko piko co kicetay oko piko co ruruce mosoret. Kutepe cek konomikap Yesu kule, “Omne sukwomisyi neto oko pic ce ruruce mosoro oko pic ce kicetay?’’

Kulim Yesu ŋalek ce kimwowu cekto, kuwekyi kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot kumöce piko ce sopcotin cepsakityantet, ntene piko ce mnyontos ce möce. Kipuryo kot aco ani kule cokur piko ce toponec, ntene kyaco kule sukuŋet kurenynkey piko ce ponto miyotyonik.’’

Kimite pesyet ake kukire omik konomikap Yowana oko konomik cepo Farasayek. Yoto kukwa piko alake wule mite Yesu oŋnkutepe kule, “Omne sukukire omik konomikap Yowana oko konomik cepo Farasayek, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kukire omik konomikukyi?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Muce ra coronutekap cito nyo kemütis kukir omik ye tokupontokey cek cito nyo kemütisyi? Puryo komuce cek kot kukir omik ye tokupontokey cito nyo kemütisyi.
Ntene Mosukupunto pesyet nye mosicinumune cekto cito nyo kemütisyi, pesyoyecoto ye mosukukir cek omik.
“Puryo ci nye muce kwiyisye yokwontet kisic nyelel kunopci siret nye yoswaket, omnye ye kakwiy kuyunyoto, komuce yokwontet nyelel kupac siret nyo yoswaket kutok kuwoyit koŋnta.

Oŋnkupuryo mpo ci nye muce kuroŋnkyi finyonik ce mwonec wonkinek ce yoswak, omnye ye kakwiy kuyunyoto, komuce finyonik ce mwonec kuyeyi wonkinek co yoswak, kworon wonkinek oŋnkupa wuy finyonik. Puryo kot kuyunyo! Ceroŋnkyini komek ce mwonec wonkinek ce lelac!’’
Nteye kipesyetap Sapat, kuwo Yesu oko konomikyi kupunte mparosyekap nkanuk. Kucec konomikyi kuputot nkanuk.
Kumwoci Farasayek Yesu kule, “Käs pa! Omne sukwiri konomikuk ntarastinekap pesyetap Sapat?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Tompo kot asuman akwek mpo kisic kito nye kikwiy Tauti oko piko ce kipontokey om pesyet nye kipuryo kiy nye mokwam okoy kwam cek rupet?

Kiwo neto kowut kotap Yiyintet oŋnkunum kwam mukatyantet nyo kisoci kupoyit Yiyintet. Kikwiy neto kuyunyoto ye ki tisintet nyewo Apiyasar. Kunyo kuyu wule yunto ntarastinekyo, kipuryo ci nye kicecömncini kwam mukatyantanato, ntene tisintet nkit nye kyome. Ntene kwam Tauti yoto oŋnkukoci mpo pikyi ce kipontokey.’’
Yoto kumwoy Yesu kule, “Kicekon pesyetap Sapat sukuŋet kukalya cito, ntene kipuryo kot citany cito kupoyit Sapat.
Kunyo Weritap cito nye Mokoryontet nye poytoy mpo Sapat.’’
Yoto kuwo Yesu yec pesyet ake kotapkok. Kimite koyoto cito nye kime yewut.
Kurip piko alake ce kimite yoto kukäs topon Yesu kule sicekäs oŋnkomuce kusop cicoto ye pesyetap Sapat sukuŋet cewosontyi.
Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kime yewut kule, “Co ceyoŋe yu po tay.’’
Oŋnkuwekyikey piko kutepe kule. “Cömwec acek ntarastinekyo kyiy ne ye pesyetap Sapat? Cikalya nto ciwurta? Cisop sopontap cito nto cepakäc cipot?’’ Ntene kusisio cekto.
Kukäskästa Yesu kurotot cek tokol nye konyer, oŋnkukalya wuyinto oko solwontit nye kiponto. Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Yite yewuŋuŋ.’’ Kuyito yewunyi, yoto kusop yewunyi.
Kuŋetyo Farasayek kumiŋnto kupa saŋ oŋnkurwoc oko pikap Erote wule muktoy kunämnta Yesu oŋnkupakäc kume.
Kunomen Yesu oko konomikyi kupa okoy kupunto tapantap Tampayayetap Kalilaya. Kurup luket nyepo piko ce caŋ ce kikwone Kalilaya oko ce kikwone koretap Yuteya,

oko ce kikwone moŋetap Yerusalem, oko ce kikwone koretap Itumeya, oko ce kikwone koretap oyinetap Yortan pitonin, oko ce kikwone korosyekap moŋosyekap Tiro oko Siton. Kikwa picoto tokol wule mite Yesu omnye kikilim tukuk ce kikwiye.
Kucaŋit piko yoto koromun okoy kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule kuyiytoci rapet nye kepure sukuŋet mente kot kuwunukto oŋnkukic piko neto.
Omnye kikikusop piko ce caŋ, kunyo kimite yoto piko ce kimnyontos kuwunuktotikey kule cepunte ye mite Yesu sukuŋet cenäm cetway.
Nteye kutoköse piko ce kiponto oyik Yesu, koputyi kukutuŋe yepo taynyi oŋnkuriryo kumwoy kule, “Yiku nyi Weritap Yiyintet!’’
Kuyete Yesu kumwoci konkolontyi oyik ce miyotec kule mente kot kumwayta kule neto kuŋo.
Kunomen Yesu kuwo kulaŋnta lakamet parak oŋnkukur kupetakey piko ce kimöce neto.
Yoto kukwey Yesu piko taman ok oyeny oŋnkutoci kaynet kukure kiyokik. Oŋnkumwoci kule, “Kakweyak akwek sukuŋet opur oko ani, kunyo mosoyoktok ape wamwaytate lokoywek,
mosonyoru kamukeywek ce okwete oyik.’’
Kaynokap kiyokik taman ok oyeny ce kikwey Yesu kucu; Simon nye kimulyi kaynet nyepo oyeny kukure Petero,
Yakopo oko mutakwam Yowana werikap Sepetayo (ce kimulyi kukure Poanerke nye poru kule, “Werikap ilat.’’)
Antereya oko Filipo, oko Paturumayo, oko Matayo, oko Tomas, oko Yakopo weritap Alufayo, oko Tatayo, oko Simon nyikanet nye poryecini korenyi,
oko Yuta Isikaryoti nye kiweckey kwek ŋomntoyin.
Yoto kunomen Yesu kuwo okoy ka. Koruruckey yec piko ce cäŋ okoy kupotyi ye mokwomis oko konomikyi.
Ntowo kulim pikap kamwa ŋalecato, kupa kule wocerip, omnye kimwowu piko kule, “Kopun met.’’
Kumwoy konetikap ntarastinek ce kikwone Yerusalem kule, “Ponto neto Pelsepul! Kunyo Pelsepul nye, Oyinot nyewo nyepo oyik nye kocini neto swamet sukuŋet kukwet oyik.’’
Yoto kukur Yesu piko kukwa ye mite neto oŋnkunet kumwoci tyonkocok kule, “Muce kulene Setani kukwetkey nkit?
Ye kapciwunekey oyeny poytoyisyet nyepo koret ake oŋnkuporyekey nkit kupote koronoto.
Nteye kapciwunekey oyeny piko cepo kayta ake oŋnkuporyekey kwicek nkit kupote kayata.
Kunyo ye kaŋet poytoyisyetap Setani kupciykey oŋnkuporyekey nkit, kupuryo kot komuce kot kuyo, ntene pote nyo kupok.
“Om ŋolyontet ake yec, puryo ci nye muce kot kowut kotap cito nye ponto swamet oŋnkunum tukukyi, tos pate ye kanyosyo kurat cito nyo ponto swamet sukuŋet komuc kowut kotap cicoto oŋnkunyapan tukukyi.
“Kumwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, cimuce cikalya piko miyotyonik tokol oko ŋalek alak tokol ce miyotec ce kaŋalal, nka kot kaŋalal aret cetya.
Ntene puryo kot cikolyoy mpo kisic ci ake tokol nye kaŋalale kwapi Muyet Nyetilil, omnye kakwiy cicoto miyotyonik cepo kenyis ce mopoku.’’
(Kimwoy Yesu kuyunyoto omnye kimwoy piko alake kule, “Ponto neto oyik ce miyotec.’’)
Yoto kupun kametitap Yesu oko mpo mutakwam, kwokuyoŋe saŋ oŋnkuyokto kukur kule kuco saŋ.
Kimite yoto piko ce caŋ ce kepur komut Yesu. Kumwoci cek neto kule, “Lim pa, mite komet oko mpo mutokwomet saŋ ce mociŋ.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Ŋo nye yeyomwani? Nto ŋo ce mpo yeyamwani?’’
Kukäsakästa Yesu kukäs piko ce kimite kepur komut neto, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Akäs pa, piko cu ce mpo yeyomwani oko mpo yeyamwani.
Omnye ci nye yiye ŋalek möce Yiyintet kule kwiy neto kunye yeyamwani nyoto oŋnku yeyomwani.’’

Kunetisye Yesu yec pesyet ake tampayayet tapan, yoto kukwa piko ce caŋ korurukyikey ye kimite okoy kulany Yesu rapet nye kimite tampayayet. Kimite yoto piko ce caŋ ce kepur yepo tampayayet tapan om koret okoy kupun tapantap peko, kumite rapet peko orit.
Kunet Yesu piko ŋalek ce caŋ kwiyisye tyonkocok, nteye kinetisyi kumwoci piko kule,
“Akäs pa! Kiwo citake wokukolsyo.
Nteye kimite kukolsyi, kusuci kupuswek alake aret tapan, kuterer toritek kwokwam.
Kusuci kupuswek alake kitawet ye kipuryo kot kumite teŋek ce yeme, yoto kutur kupityo lakwar omnye kipuryo kot kuponto tikityek ce kipa ŋony.
Ntono kumwok asista kupel kuyom kupotyo.
Kusuci kupuswek alake ye kimite kotok orit, kupityo kotok kwam kowurta kupotyo nye puryo kot kwiy kupuswek.
Ntene kusuci kupuswek alak ye kimite teŋek ce toponec, kutur kupityo oŋnkwiy ketit akenke kupuswek sosom; nto ake kwiy kupuswek tomonwokik lö, nto ake kwiy kupuswek pokol akenke.’’
Yoto kumwoy Yesu kule, “Ci nye ponto yitik ce limntoy, roke kulimnte.’’
Nteye kimite Yesu kwine nkit, kukwa ye kimite neto piko alake ce kilimntoy ŋalekyi oko kiyokikyi taman ok oyeny oŋnkutepe kule mwowu ne tyonkocok.
Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Kicekonok akwek oŋnket ŋalek ce wuŋotin cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet. Ntene om wule mite piko alak ce mite saŋ kuce mosukulim cekto ŋalek om tyonkocok,
sukuŋet, Kukästa oŋnkukästa, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kuköse, kulimnta oŋnkulimnta, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kusowu kunket, Nto kukostoy oŋnkunket, kuye kuwekyikey wule mite Yiyintet, sukukalya neto cekto.’’
Yoto kutepe Yesu cekto kule, “Tompo kot oŋnket akwek ŋalek ce mwowu tyonkoconi? Kunyo omuci kot oŋnket kulene ŋalek ce mwowu tyonkocok alake?
Kole kolintet lokoywekap Yiyintet.
Muce pesyet ake kusuci lokoywek aret tapan kulim picoto lokoywek, nteye kalim; yoto kuco lakwar Setani oŋnkunum ŋolyontet nye kacekol mukuleywekwa.
Kerkey piko alake oko kupuswek co kicekol teŋek cepo kitawet, coto kuce ye kotolime lokoywek kucäm lakwar om ŋerekwek
ntene nye puryo kot kowute mukuleywekwa orit, kunyo puryo kot kopure kuloyit, nteye kaco wuyinto nto toŋoŋutek kupo lokoywek kwasta lakwar.
Kerkey piko alake oko kupuswek co kicekol kotok orit, coto kuce piko co lime lokoywek,
ntene om kasoteywekap soponto nyepo pesyosyecu, oko corokyinotet nyepo mokoryontit oko tukuk alak cepo koret, kucut kunum lokoywek nye puryo kot kwiye kupuswek.

Ntene kerkey piko alake oko kupuswek co kicekol teŋek ce toponec, lime piko coto lokoywek, oŋnkucäm oŋnkwiy kupuswontet akenke kupuswek alak sosom, oŋnkwiy kupuswontet ake kupuswek alak tomonwokik lö oŋnkwiy ake kupuswek alak pokol akenke.’’
Kutosyikey Yesu kutepe cekto kule, “Sutu ra cito kenyis tarit oŋnkunäm pesenit kokupuye, nto mpo kotore tarit kwiririt ŋony? Puryo kot kusutu neto oŋnkukoci kuyoŋe meset nye yoŋe tarit parak?
Omnye puryo ŋolyo nye kicewuny nye puryo kot ceŋonye koyin kutok, oŋnkupuryo kiy nye kicetup cewuny nye puryo kot ceŋonye koyin kutok.
Kunyo, ci nye ponto yitik ce limnte, roke kulimnte!’’
