Kumwoci Yesu yec cekto kule, “Olimnte topon ŋalek ce olime! Omnye koyoyeket nye oyoyekyini akwek piko alak kunye koyoyeket nye yunyoto nye mociyoyekwok mpo akwek, oŋnkyetoswok mpo kucaŋit.
Omnye cito nye ponto kunye mosicetosyi nyoto kucaŋit, nto cito nye puryo kot kuponto, nka mpo ce tukusic ce ponto mosicinumune.’’
Kutosyikey yec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Kerkey poytoyisyetap Yiyintet oko ci nye kole kupuswek mparen,
kurucikey ye komoy oŋnkukös ye koyek pet, kumite yoto kupuswek kuturu kupitos, oŋnkurok kupuryo kot kunkete neto kule yiyoktos kulene.
Teŋek nkit kuce kocini kupityo okoy kwek omik. Nyosyi kupityo kunyo sokek ceŋorŋor, ntekere kuyiy taptet, nto om letut kuwoŋnkyi kwiy kupuswek.
Nteye koruryo omik, kunäm cito rotwet oŋnkuwo wokusis omnye kopunto kisisyet.’’
Kutosyikey yec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Mocemwowu kule kerkey poytoyisyetap Yiyintet oko kiy ne? Tyonkocet oŋnkono nye mocemwowu sukuŋet ceroru cikerkeye?
Kerkey oko kupuswontetap ketit ake nye cekure kalitarit nye kisic kupël kupuswek alak tokol ce mite koret
nteye kocewu kupite kuwoyit kwek cemosi kupël ketik alak tokol, oŋnkupityo sarisyek ce woyec oŋnkukwa toritek kwokutec korikwa wuronokap ketoto.’’
Kumwoci Yesu piko lokoywekyi ce caŋ kwiyisye tyonkocok ce kerkey cutecu ce kimuc cekto kot konket ŋalek.
Kipuryo kot kumwoci neto piko ŋalek ye mnokwiyisye tyonkocok, ntene nteye kimite kwine nkit oko konomikyi kuye sukumwoci co ŋalek tokol ce mwowu tyonkocok.
Ntowo kupunto pesyonoto kosoleny, kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule, “Onte cipe kyay tampayayet pitonin.’’
Yoto kunomen kupa oŋnkupakakta piko tokol. Kulany konomik rapet nye kimite Yesu kunyosyo kopure orit, kupetakey cekto yoto raposyek alak.
Ntene kuwus yomet nyewo koromun okoy kuwosyikey peko rapet kot kumac kunyiy peko.
Kimite Yesu yoto kukoru rapet let oŋnkutiye metinyi kito nyo cetiye metit. Kuŋet konomik kumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, puryo kot köse nyi kule karik cepoku?’’
Kuŋet Yesu Kukos, oŋnkupolyi yomet kumwoci kule, “Sis yomet! Oŋnkitempes tampayayet!’’ Yoto kusis yomet oŋnkutempes tampayayet.
Kumwoci Yesu konomik kule, “Omne somuye? Tompo kot onyoru akwek koyenot?’’
Ntene kumuyo konomik koromun oŋnkuŋalal kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Ŋo nyun cici, nyi limncini yomet oko tampayayet?’’
Yoto kupa cek kway tampayayet pitonin okoy koretap Kerasenik.
Yoto pakenke ntowo kurekune Yesu rapet, kutuye cito nye kicone wule cemucini piko.
Kiponto cicoto oyik ce miyotec kunyo kiminye wule cemucini piko. Kipuryo kot kumite ci nye kimuce kot kurat cicoto, nka mpo ye kacerate nyororonik.
Omnye kikicerate nyororonik oko pinkonok aret ce caŋ ntene kuŋetye nyororonik oŋnkupirto kwiri pinkonok. Kunyo kipuryo kot kumite ci yec nye kiponto swamet kupël cicoto.
Kipurune cicoto komoy oko pet wule cemucini piko oko lakomosyek, sukuncoyoti oŋnkupakeke rwontok.
Nteye kimite cicoto kutokulow kisic, kukäs neto Yesu, yoto kulapat oŋnkoputyi yepo kerenkokyi kukutuŋnkyi;
oŋnkupol om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Penteno ani ne nyi Yesu Weritap Yiyintet nyepo torot! Owolikey om kaynetap Yiyintet osomiŋ kule, mente kot ataŋanya!’’
Kimwoy kuyunyoto omnye kikimwoci Yesu neto kule, “Oyinot nye miyat, cone wule mite cici!’’
Yoto kutepe Yesu kule, “Cekure ne kayneŋuŋ.’’ Kuwec cicoto kumwoy kule, “Cekure kaynemwani, ‘Luket’ omnye ciku caŋ!’’
Yoto kusom cicoto kusaysay Yesu kumwoci kule mente kukwet oyik kupete koronoto.
Kimite ye kilekite yoto yeceytap nkururwenik ce kimite kwokete lakamet komos.
Kusom oyik ce miyotec kumwoci Yesu kule, “Kwetec cipe wociwut nkururwenik orit.’’

Kucömnci Yesu oyik kupa. Yoto kuŋete oyik ce miyotec cicoto oŋnkupa wokowut yeceytap nkururwenik ce kirice kupunto tokol elifunek oyeny. Kumwey kurway tokol wokoŋirte lakam wokosuci tampayayet, kupakäc peko kupok tokol.
Yoto kumwey kurway mesewek ce kyokisyi oŋnkupa wokumwaytat ŋalecato kumwoci piko cepo moŋet oko piko cepo soŋwek. Kukwa piko kwokukäs ŋalecato kakwiyokis.
Kukwa picoto okoy ye kimite Yesu, kwokunyor cicoto kiponto oyik ce caŋ kukepur ŋony kulakat nye kanyol kuŋomit topon. Yoto kumuyo piko tokol.
Kumwoci piko co koköse om konyekwa piko co kokwoni ŋalek ce kokwiyokis om wule mite cito nyo kiponto oyik oko ŋalek cepo nkururwenik.
Yoto kucec piko kusom kumwoci Yesu kuŋet kuwete koremwa.
Nteye kimite Yesu kulonye rapet kule onomen owecikey, kusom cicoto kiponto oyik kumwoci Yesu kule, “Kany cepetekey tukway!’’
Ntene kuyete kumwoci kule, “Iwo kaŋuŋ wule mite pikwok wemwoci ŋalek ce woyec ce kakwiwuŋ nyi Mokoryontet, oko kuyu wule karireniŋ kukalyiŋ.’’
Yoto kunomen cicoto kuwo wokupunte Tekapoli (moŋosyek taman) oŋnkuwo wokumwaytat ŋalek ce kokwici Yesu neto. Kukite koromun piko tokol ce kilim ŋalecato.
Kulany Yesu rapet kuco kwoy okoy kupun tampayayet pitoni. Yoto kukwa piko ce caŋ kwokorurukyikey ye kimite neto om yepo tampayayet tapan.
Kuco citake nye kipoytoy kotapkok nye kicekure Yairo. Nteye kotoköse cicoto Yesu, kukutuŋe yepo kerenkokyi,
oŋnkusom kusaysay kumwoci kule, “Mite cepnyu nye mnyone kasat karik kume; co cekemer yewuniyekuk sukuŋet kusop mente kume!’’
Yoto kunomen Yesu kupetakey cicoto. Kurup piko ce caŋ Yesu ce kikicoti neto om komoswokik tokol.
Kimite yoto korket ake nye kimnyan kusyen koromun kukwone korotik kuwany kenyisyek taman ok oyeny;
nye kikikuwoŋnkyi tukukyi tokol ce kiponto kukocini cepsakitisyek kule kunyaya; ntene puryo mpo akenke nye kimuc kot kukalya, ntene kutosyinikey pate porto okokoy.
Kikilim korkonoto yoto ŋalek ce nöme Yesu. Yoto kurup letutap Yesu,
oŋnkumwoy om moyenyi nkit kule, “Mpo ye katwaya ani pate sirenyi, mososop.’’
Yoto kunäm kutwa siretap Yesu. Kusop pakenke kusisio nye komokukwoni korotik, okoy kukäs neto nkit kule kosope porto nyo kwomnyoni.
Kunket Yesu pakenke om pornyi nkit kule kaweteno swamet. Kuwekyikey kukäs piko oŋnkumwoy kule, “Ŋo nyi kanäma kutwa siremwani?’’
Kumwoci konomikyi kule, “Puryo kot köse nyi piko cu kekiciŋ, kunyi mite yec tepe kule, ‘Ŋo nyi kanama kutwaya ani?’ ’’
Ntene kutosyikey Yesu kukäsakästa kule akäs ŋo nyi kakwiy ŋolyontoni.
Kunket yoto korkonoto ŋolyontet nye kakwiyakay om wule mite neto, kuco tay kupotanan nye komuy oŋnkoputyi kukutuŋe yepo kerenkokap Yesu oŋnkumwoci ŋalek tokol cepo manta.
Kumwoci Yesu korkonoto kule, “Cepnyu, kokusopiŋ nyi koyeneŋuŋ; kunyo wecikey om kalya oŋnkuwesop okokoy.’’
Nteye kimite Yesu tokuŋolole, kukwa piko alake ce kikwone kotap poytoyintet nyepo kotapkok oŋnkwokumwoci cicoto kule, “Kame cepŋuŋ Kunyo mente tayim yec konetintet.’’
Ntene kukwes Yesu ŋalecato komwowu picoto, oŋnkumwoci Yairo kule, “Mente omuy, yen pate.’’
Yoto kuyete Yesu piko alak tokol mapetakey neto, ntene kupetakey pate Petero oko Yakopo oko mutakwam Yowana.
Kupunto cekto kotap cicoto kinyewo nyepo kotapkok. Yoto kukäs Yesu rirek cepo piko ce kincoytos kwome mnyat koromun.
Kuwo Yesu koto orit oŋnkumwoci piko kule, “Omne soselelen kuyunyi? Omne sorirye! Puryo kot kume lekwet koru, pate!’’
Kurori piko tokol kurorci neto. Kukwet Yesu piko tokol ce kimite koto orit kupa saŋ, oŋnkukwer kwanitap lekwet oko kamet oko konomikyi somok okoy koto nye kimite lekwet.
Kunäm Yesu yewutap lekwet oŋnkumwoci kule, “Talisa kaum.’’ Nye mwowu kule, “Cepi miniŋ, kumwowuŋ ani kule ŋet yony.’’
Yoto pakenke kuŋet cepoto kuyo oŋnkuwesetot. (Kiponto cepoto kenyisyek taman ok oyeny.) Ntowo kwiyakay ŋolyontonoto; kukite piko koromun.
Ntene kunkolontyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule puryo kot kuroke kunket citake tokol ŋalecu, oŋnkumwoci cek kule, “Okoci cepoto kito nye mokwam.’’
Kunomene Yesu wuloto kuwo kuketitakey okoy kupunto moŋetap koremwa Nasaret, kurup konomikyi neto.

Nteye kipesyetap Sapat kucec Yesu kunetis om kotapkok. Kimite yoto piko ce caŋ, ntowo kulim cekto ŋalek ce kimwowu; kukite tokol oŋnkutep kumwoy kule, “Kinyorta ono cici ŋalecu? Kinyor ŋomnononi kulene? Oŋnkwiye kulene ŋalecu po kakitat?

Puryo kot ku koswetintetap pawunek neto nyitenyi nye weritap Mariyam, nto mpo mutakwam ku Yakopo oko Yose oko Yuta oko Simon? Puryo kot ku mpo cekwam cek cu cepontekey acek ceminye tokol?’’ Yoto kutay cek Yesu.
Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Ciyweye workoyo om wulyo ake tokol, ntene puryo kot ciyweye om moŋenyi, oŋnkupuryo kot kuyweye pikap arenyi oko cepo kamwa.’’
Kipuryo yoto kot kwiy Yesu tukuk cepo kakitat om wuloto, ntene kukemer yewuniyekyi piko ce ŋeri ce kimnyontos kusop kusopco.
Kokite Yesu koromun, omnye kipuryo kot kuponto cek koyenotet. Yoto kuwo Yesu kunetat piko kupunte kestonik tokol ce kilekite wuloto.
Kukur Yesu konomik taman ok oyeny kukwa koruruckey wanak, oŋnkuyokto cek kupa saŋ kupetate oyeny oyeny. Kukoci kamukeywek kupayta oyik ce miyotec,
Oŋnkumwoci kunkolontyi kule, “Monte cenäm mukatya, nto mpo lolonik cepo pesanik.
Alac kweyonik ntene monte cilac sirok oyeny.’’
Kumwoci yec kule, “Ye kowut kotake kuyu tö, opurune koyoto pate okoy onomene moŋonoto.
Nteye kopunte wule puryo kot kuŋerekyok nto kutay molimwok pikap wuloto ŋalek, onomen apete moŋonoto oŋnkupukyi tertit nyepo kerenkokwok, sukuŋet kwek kasowunot om wule mite picoto.’’
Yoto kunomen cekto kupa wokwomnci piko lokoywek kule, misyini kurenynkey piko kwasta miyotyonikwa.
Kukwet cek oyik oŋnkuŋape mwayta piko ce caŋ ce kimnyontos kusop kusopco.

Yoto kilim kinko Erote ŋalecato tokol, omnye kitok kaynetap Yesu ceŋalale om koret wulyo tokol. Kumwoy piko alak kule, “Kuŋet kotutune met Yowana potisonintet kunyi mite kwiyiyis swamet nye ponto kwiye ŋalecu.’’
Kumwoy mpo piko alake kule, “Eriya nyitenyi.’’ Kumwoy alake kule, “Workoyo nyi nye kerkey oko workoyikap keny.’’
Nteye kotolime Erote ŋalecato, kumwoy kule, “Yowana Potisonintet nyitenyi nyo kyomwoytoy ani ceyep katit nye kokotutune met yec!’’
Omnye Erote nyitenyi kunyo kimwoytoy cenäm Yowana oŋnkyerat cekerta mopusi. Kikwiy Erote kuyunyoto omnye kisac ŋalekap Erotiya nye kikorketap mutakwam Filipo nye kimut neto kwek korkenyi.
Kunyo kimwocini Yowana Erote kwak okokoy kule, “Puryo kot kumisyini kot müt nyi korketap mutokwomet!’’
Kunyo kisenkere Erotiya Yowana koromun, kusyeme kule apar neto kume, ntene kipuryo kot komuce.
Omnye kiyweye Erote Yowana omnye kinkete kule neto kunye ci nye topon nyepo manta nyetilil, kunyo kiripe topon koromun, kilimntoy Erote ŋalekap Yowana ce kimwowu nka kot kimuye ye kalim ŋalekyi.

Nto mite pesyet ake, kunyor Erotiya poroyinto. Omnye kikwiy Erote sakwet nyepo pesyenyi nye kiceye kwici pikyi poytoyik ce woyec oko sikarek ce woyec cepo poryet oko piko ce woyec kantoyik cepo Kalilaya.
Yoto kuco ceptap Erotiya koto orit oŋnkutum, okoy kuŋerec Erote oko toyekyi ce kimite kukepur tokol. Kumwoci kinko Erote cepoto kule, “Möce kule akoniŋ ani kiy ne?
Mosokoniŋ kiy ake tokol nye kesomo ani.’’ Kuwalkey aret ce caŋ kumwoci cepoto kule, “Kokurtowuŋ kule mosokoniŋ kiy ake tokol nye kesomo nka mpo kwenutap kereryantetap koret nye opoytoy ani.’’
Yoto kumiŋnto cepoto kuwo wokutepe kamet kule, “Mosom kiy ne?’’ Kuwekyi kamet kumwoci kule, “Som cekoniŋ metitap Yowana Potisonintet.’’
Kuwo cepoto kusartakey lakwar okoy wule mite kinko oŋnkusom kumwoci kule, “Omöce kono ani nyi yawut pakenke om yuteyu sanit nye mite orit metit nyepo Yowana potisonintet!’’
Kunyer kinko kumwontyi ŋalecato korumun, ntene kipuryo kot komuce kot kuyete cepoto, omnye kikikowalkey om konyekap toyekyi tokol.
Kuyokto yoto pakenke Erote sikorintet nye ripsi kuwo wokusut metitap Yowana. Kuwo sikorintet okoy mopusi oŋnkuwo kuyep metitap Yowana,
oŋnkusut metit nye mite sanit oŋnkuco kukoci cepoto, kunäm nyo oŋnkukoci kamet.
Ntowo kulim konomikap Yowana ŋalecato, kukwa kwokusut musyontetap Yowana wokumuci mwenet.
Kuweckey kiyokik okoy kwokutuyo oko Yesu, oŋnkwokumwoci tukuk tokol ce kukwiy oko ŋalek ce kukunet cekto.

Kimite yoto piko ce caŋ ce kikwoni cut kupeti cut okoy kupotyi Yesu oko konomikyi poroyinto ye mokwomis. Kumwoci Yesu konomik kule, “Akany cipe acek nkit wule po surukwenet sukuŋet womuny akwek kuminiŋ.’’
Kulany cekto rapet kwicek nkit oŋnkupa okoy surukwenet.
Ntene kukäs piko ce caŋ ye kipeti cek oŋnkunket wule kotokyikey. Yoto kupete piko kerenkok, ce kikwone moŋosyek tokol kusartakey okoy wokunyosyo kupunto kutompo kot kupunto Yesu oko konomik.

Ntowo kurekune Yesu rapet, yoto kukäs neto luket nyepo piko ce caŋ, nteye kotoköse kurire kukalya omnye kikerkey picoto kecir ce puryo kot kuponto mesewo. Yoto kucec Yesu kunet cek kumwoci ŋalek ce caŋ.
Nteyu kowo kwimen koret, kukwa konomik ye mite Yesu oŋnkumwoci kule, “Nteyu kokwimen koret, kunyi surukwen wuli ce mite.
Yomis mwoci piko kupecikey, kupa kestonik oko soŋwek ce lekitec sukuŋet wokuceŋat kwalat nkit omik ce mosukwam.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Okoci akwek nkit kiye mokwam.’’ Kutepe cek Yesu kule, “Moce nyi kule cipe acek wokyal mukatinek ce muce kyale silinkinek pokolwokik amwan oŋnkyepaye picu?’’
Kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Oponte akwek mukatinek ata? Ape ra wakäs.’’ Nteyu kowo kunket wule tento, kumwoy kule, “Ceponte mukatinek mut oko purpurunek oyeny.’’
Kumwoci Yesu konomik kuyiyta koruruckey piko tokol oŋnkopure suswek nye nyolilec.
Yoto kopur piko kutetkey kupetate alake pokol nto alak konom.
Kunäm Yesu mukatinekey mut oko purpurunek oyeny oŋnkunyal torot oŋnkusomnci kukasta Yiyintet, oŋnkupetec mukatinek oŋnkukoci konomikyi kupcici piko. Yoto kupciyta neto purpurunek kuyem piko tokol.
Kwomis piko tokol okoy kupiyoŋis.
Yoto koruruc konomik mukatinek oko purpurunek ce koŋet okoy kunyiy kisok taman ok oyeny.
Nto coŋinto nyepo piko ce kikwam mukatinek oko purpurunek kuce piko moronik ce kipuntoy elifunek mut.
Yoto pakenke kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kulany rapet kway tampayayet pitonin kontowonu kupa okoy moŋetap Pesusayita ye tokumite neto kuyomise piko kupecikey.
Nteyu kowo kuyomis konomik, kunomen kwine nkit kuwo kulaŋnta lakam wokusom.
Ntowo kupunto komoy, kimite yoto rapet kukopunto kwenutap tampayayet, kumite Yesu kwine nkit wule po koret.

Yoto kukäs neto kule mite konomikyi kataŋany kuwulye kukwonye rapet omnye kiwuse yomet kuketu cekto kukwa let. Ntowo kupunto komoy karik kuyec koret, kuco Yesu wule mite cek kutyikonu peko parak, yoto kutil kukeyte cekto.
Ntene kukäs cek kutyikoti peko parak, kusot oŋnkupol kuncoy kule, “Oyinot nyi!’’
Omnye kimuyo cek tokol yu kowo kukäs Yesu. Kuŋololyi Yesu pakenke cek kumwoci kule, “Otitir! Ani nyo, monte cemuye!’’
Kulany Yesu rapet nye kimite cekto; yoto pakenke kusis yomet. Kokite konomik oŋnkumuyo koromun kupotpotenis.
Kipuryo kot kusow cek konket ŋalek ce nöme ŋalekap mukatinek kule poru ne. Kipuryo kot konket mpo kisic kule poru ne.
Kupete cek rapet kway tampayayet okoy kupunto koretap Kenesaret wule kiwo kurotyi rapet.
Nteye kimite kurekune rapet, yoto pakenke kunket piko Yesu.
Kurway piko kupunte koronoto tokol kupa wokukonopune kwiririnek piko ce mnyontos okoy kupun wule mite Yesu om wulyo tokol wule kalim cek kule mite Yesu wuloto.

Nto om wulyo tokol wule kiwo Yesu, soŋwek oko moŋosyek oko kestonik. Yoto kukwer piko pikwa ce mnyontos okoy motaponik oŋnkusom cekto Yesu kule kucömnci piko ce mnyontos kunäm mpo pate kototyetap sirenyi. Kusopco piko tokol ce kinäm kutwa sirenyi.
Korurukyikey ye kimite Yesu Farasayek oko konetikap ntarastinek ce kikwone Yerusalem.
Yoto kukäs cek kule omisye konomikyi yewuniyek ce murwonec, coto kuce yewuniyek ce puryo kot ciwun.
Omnye kirupe Farasayek oko Yutayek tokol ntarastinek ce kinet cek mpo kukomwa nye puryo kot kwomisyi okoy ye kakowun topon yewuniyek om aret nye roke.

Oŋnkupuryo kot kwome kiy nye kocesutune motepo okoy ye keciwon kunyo. Kirupe cek mpo ntarastinek alak ce caŋ ce kicinet. Kuyu, ciwun topon cikomponik oko terenik oko sapuryanikap tayok oko kwiririnek.
Yoto kutepe Farasayek oko konetikap ntarastinek Yesu kule, “Omne yu puryo kot kurupe konomikuk ntarastinekap keny ce kikonec mpo kukonyo, omnye omisye yewuniyek ce murwonec ce puryo kot ciwun?’’

Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Po manta ŋalek ce kiŋor Isaya ce nömok akwek! Oyiku kaperperot, kuyu wulo kisilyo kumwoy kule, ‘Mwowu Yiyintet kule, Yweyo ani picu om kutuwakwa pate, ntene mitowune mukuleywekwa wule low om wule omite ani.
Puryo kot kuponto cek latik kusaya ani, omnye nete cek ntarastinek ce kikwiye piko kuyunye po ntarastinekyoto Yiyintet!’ ’’
Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Otoye akwek mayiy ntarastinekap Yiyintet, oŋnkorup oywey ntarastinek cepo pikap keny.’’
Kutosyikey Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Oponte akwek ŋomnonet nyewo om wule otoytoy ntarastinekap Yiyintet, kule siceŋet cerup ŋalekwok cepo keny!
Omnye kimwoy Moses kule, ‘Ywey kon oko komet. Nto ci nye cupe kwan oko kamet, kumisyini nyoto kume.’
Ntene onetisyi akwek omwowu kule, ye ponto cito kito nye muce kwiyisye kukalya kwan oko kamet, ntene oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Karupon nyi’ (nye poru kule po Yiyintet nyi).
Kunye cikolyoy cicoto mente kukalya kwan oko kamet.
Om ŋalek ceyucoto kuye owurtoy akwek ŋolyontetap Yiyintet om ŋalekwok cepo keny ce oneti piko alak. Oŋnkumite mpo ŋalek alake ce caŋ ceyucutecu ce oyiye akwek.’’
Kukur Yesu yec piko kukwa ye mite neto, oŋnkumwoci kule, “Olimwo ani pa akwek piko tokol oŋnkonäme ŋalecu mukuleywekwok.
Puryo kot ku kito nye cone saŋ nye kam cito nye muce kot kowurta cito kumiyatit. Ntene kito nye cone mukuleyto orit kunye wurtoy cicoto kumiyatit.
[Kunyo roke olimnte ye oponte yitik ce olimnte!]’’
Nteyu kowo kuwete Yesu ye kimite piko oŋnkuwo okoy koto orit, kutepe konomikyi neto ŋalek ce poru tyonkoconoto.
Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Tompo kot osowu mpo akwek okoy kunyi kuyu piko alak? Kule puryo kot ku kito nyo cone saŋ kwam cito nye muce kot kowurta cito kumiyatit.
Omnye puryo kot kowute mukuleynyi orit, ntene wute moyenyi oŋnkupa kumiŋnto saŋ.’’ (Yoto kumwoy Yesu kule toponec omik tokol.)
Kutosyikey Yesu yec kumwoy kule, “Ŋolyo nye cone mukuleytap cito nye wurtoy cito kumiyatit,
omnye kwone kasoteywek ce miyotec mukuleytap cito orit, kuyu corokyinotetap koruk, corsyet, porisyet, sakwayanat,
corokyinot, ŋomset, kaperperisyo, makatet nye miyat, koŋ nye miyat, ŋalek ce miyotec, menon, silotet, perperyet.
Ŋalecutecu tokol miyotec kuce kwone mukuleytap cito orit oŋnkowurtoy cito.’’
Yoto kunomen Yesu om wuloto okoy kupunto koret nye lekite moŋetap Tiro. Kuwo koto ake orit, nye kipuryo kot kumöce kule konket citake tokol kule mite neto wuloto, ntene kipuryo komuc kot kuwunynkey.
Yoto pakenke kulim korket ake nye kiponto cepnyi nye kiponto oyinot nye miyat kule mite neto wuloto. Kuco pakenke oŋnkoputyi kukutuŋe yepo kerenkokap Yesu.
Korkonoto kunye Kirikin nyepo Foyinisiya om koretap Siriya. Kusom korkonoto Yesu kule kukwetyi cepnyi oyinot nye kiponto.
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Kany cenyosye cepay kupiyoŋ lekok kunyo, omnye puryo kot kuroke cinum omikap lekok oŋnkyewirci ŋokik.’’
Kuwec korkonoto kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, yunyoto, ntene nka mpo ŋokik ce mite meset ŋony kwome omikap lekok ce lelektoy!’’
Yoto kumwoci Yesu kule, “Om ŋolyontoni kewec nyi mwowu, nomen iwo koŋuŋ, kaŋet oyinoto kuwete cepŋuŋ’’
Kunomen korkonoto kuwo ka, wokunyor lekwet kumite koru kwiriri kukosop kuwete oyinoto cepoto.
Kunomene Yesu koretap Tiro oŋnkuwo kupunte Siton okoy kupunto tampayayetap Kalilaya oŋnkuwo kupunte aretap kwenutap Tekapoli (moŋosyek taman).
Yoto kusut piko alake wule mite Yesu citake nye kiminy kunämakay kutit nye puryo kot komuce kuŋalal, kusaysay picoto kusom neto kule kukemer yewuniyekyi cicoto.
Kunäm Yesu cicoto oŋnkukwer tapan kwine nkit, oŋnkowute mornenyi yititap cicoto kuŋutyi oŋnkutwa ŋelyepta.
Kunyal Yesu torot oŋnkumuny komuŋnto nyewo, oŋnkumwoci cicoto kule, “Epapata.’’ (Nye mwowu kule, “Kuyotokis yitik.’’)
Yoto pakenke kuyotokis yitikap cicoto, oŋnkutyak ŋelyepnyi kucec kuŋalal topon.
Kumwoci Yesu kunkolontyi cek tokol mente kumwoci citake tokol ŋolyontoni. Nteyu kowo kutosyikey Yesu kumwoci kunkolontyi kuket cekto, mpecek kutosyikey kumwaytat.
Kukite koromun piko tokol ce kilime oŋnkuŋalale kumwoy kule, “Kakwiy tukuk ce toponec, kokusop kot kulimnta piko ce kimiŋitu, oŋnkuŋalal piko ce kinomokis kutuwak.’’
Nto om letutap pesyos ce ŋeri, koruruckey yec piko alake ce caŋ koromun okoy komokuponto omik ce mokwam. Kukur Yesu konomikyi oŋnkumwoci kule,
“Orire ani okolyoy picu, omnye pesyosyek somok yawut opontekey oko cekto kunyo puryo kot kuponto omik ce mokwam.
Kunyi ye komwoci kupecikey nye puryo kot apay, mosukumistot ye peti om aran, omnye kwone alake wule low.’’
Kuwekyi konomikyi kumwoci kule, “Nyortoy ono citake omit ce muce kot kupaye picu tokol om surukwenoni?’’
Kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Oponte akwek mukatinek ata?’’ Kuwec konomik kumwoy kule, “Ceponte mukatinek tisap.’’
Kumwoci Yesu piko tokol kopur ŋony, oŋnkunäm, mukatinekey tisap, oŋnkusomnci kukasta Yiyintet oŋnkupetec oŋnkukoci konomikyi kupcici piko, kunäm co oŋnkupcici piko tokol.
Kiponto cek mpo purpurunek tukusic ce minkec. Yoto kusomnci Yesu mpo purpurunekey kukasta Yiyintet oŋnkumwoci konomik kupcici piko purpurunek.
Yoto kwomis piko tokol okoy kupiyoŋis. Ntowo kupok koruruc cek kisok cewoyec tisap ce nyitotin omik ce koŋet.
Kipuntoy piko tokol ce kyomis ce kirice elifunek amwan. Ntowo kupok, kuyomis Yesu piko kupecikey.
Yoto pakenke kulany Yesu rapet oko konomikyi oŋnkupa okoy koretap Talmanusa.
Yoto kukwa Farasayek alake, oŋnkucec kutintentyin oko Yesu. Kusyem cek kule celotu neto kumwoci kule kwiy pelutyet nyepo kakitat nye cone torot nye poru swametap Yiyintet.

Komuny Yesu komuŋnto nyewo, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Omne sukumoce piko cepo pintap pesyosyecu pelutyet nyepo kakitat? Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, puryo pelut nyepo kakitat nye cimuce kot ciporci piko cepo pintap pesyosyecu.’’
Yoto kulany Yesu yec rapet kuwo kway tampayayet pitonin oŋnkupokokyi cek yoto.
Kuyutye konomik manäm mukatinek, ntene kiponto mukatyantet akenke pate om rapet.
Yoto kucec Yesu kusow cek kumwoci kule, “Oripkey akwek mumarekap Farasayek oko mumarekap Erote.’’
Kucec konomik kurwoc kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Komwoy kuyunyi so omnye moceponte acek mukatya?’’
Kunket Yesu ŋalek ce kiŋolole cekto, yoto kutepe kule, “Omne saŋalal akwek nkit omwowu kule moceponte mukatya? Tompo so kot osowu akwek okoy kunyi? Kerotiŋ kasoteywekwok?
Oponte akwek konyek ntene puryo kot oköste? Oponte yitik ntene puryo kot olimnte? Ntene puryo kot osoti akwek,
yo kyopeteci ani mukatinek mut aŋnkapaye piko elifunek mut? Kyoruruc akwek yoto kisok ata ce nyitotin omik ce koŋet?’’ Kuwec konomik kumwoy kule, “Kiciruruc kisok taman ok oyeny.’’
“Nteyo kyopeteci ani mukatinek tisap aŋnkapaye piko elifunek amwan? Kyoruruc akwek yoto kisok ata cewoyec cepo omik ce koŋet?’’ Kuwec konomik kumwoci kule, “Kiciruruc kisok tisap?’’
Kutepe Yesu cekto kule, “Kunyo tompo kot osowu akwek so okoy kunyi?’’
Yoto kuwo Yesu oko konomik okoy kupunto Pesusayita. Kureton piko alake cito nye korat okoy ye kimite neto; oŋnkusom picoto neto kunäm kutwa cicoto.
Kunäm Yesu cicoto yewut oŋnkukwer kuwo moŋet saŋ. Nteyu kowo kuŋutyi neto konyekap cicoto, kunam konyek oŋnkutepe kule, “Kekäs nyi kitake?’’
Kukästa cicoto kunyal parak oŋnkumwoy kule, “Oköse piko ce pesetoti ce kerkey oko ketik.’’
Yoto kunäme Yesu yec yewuniyekyi konyekap cicoto, kutitir cicoto kuŋany konyekyi, yoto kusopco konyekyi kukästa topon okoy kukäs mpo kiy nye mite wule low.
Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kuwo ka oŋnkunkolontyi kumwoci kule, “Mente kot aketitekey awo moŋet yec.’’
Yoto kunomen Yesu oko konomikyi kupa kupunte soŋwek ce kimut koretap Kayisariya nyepo Filipi. Nteye kimite cekto kupeti om aran, kutepe Yesu konomik kumwoci kule, “Mwowu piko kule oyiku ani ŋo?’’

Kuwekyi konomik kumwoci kule, “Mwowu piko alake kule yiku nyi Yowana potisonintet. Kumwowu piko alake kule, yiku nyi Eriya. Nto alak kumwowu kule yiku nyi akenke om workoyikap keny nye kokotutune met!’’
Kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Nto akwek, omwowu akwek kule oyiku ani ŋo?’’ Kuwec Petero kumwoy kule, “Yiku nyi Kristo nye ŋapanet.’’
Yoto kumwoci Yesu kunkolontyi cek kule, “Monte cemwoci citake tokol kule neto ku ŋo.’’

Kucec Yesu kunet konomik kumwoci kule, “Mosukutaŋany weritap cito toŋoŋutek ce caŋ koromun, oŋnkutay poyik oko tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek. Mosicepakäc kume, nteye pesyet nyepo somok ciŋet kotutune met.’’
Kumwoy Yesu ŋalecato kutor kulim cek tokol. Yoto kunäm Petero Yesu yewut oŋnkukwer tapan oŋnkusow kupolyi kumwoci kule, “Mente taŋalale ŋalecu.’’
Ntene kuwekyikey Yesu kukäs konomikyi; oŋnkupolyi Petero kumwoci kule, “Wete yu omite ani nyi Setani: Puryo kot kupo kasoteywek cekuk Yiyintet, ntene po piko!’’

Yoto kukur Yesu piko tokol wanak oko konomikyi kukwa ye mite neto oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ye möce citake tokol kule anama cepetekey ani, kumisyini kunyilkey nkit oŋnkutor murtowontenyi oŋnkuco cokunama cepetekey ani.
Omnye ci ake tokol nye möce kule osop soponnyi, kupote cito nyoto soponnyi, nto ci ake tokol nye kepot soponnyi omnye kacäm ani oŋnkucäm lokoywek ce toponec, kunye mosukusop cito nyoto soponnyi.
Nyoru ra cito latik ne ye keyum tukuk ce mite koret tokol kumukul oŋnkwarantakey nkit? Puryo kot kuyunyo mpo kisic!
Puryo kot kumite kiy nye muce kukon cito kwale soponnyi.

Kunyo ye kelilan ci ake tokol om wule omite ani oŋnkulilontyi ŋalekwani om pesyosyecu po piko cepo pinta nye puryo kot kuponto koyenot oŋnkupic ce ponto miyotyonik, mosukulilontyi mpo Weritap cito cicoto ye kaco om woyintap Papanyi, ye contoykey malaykanik ce tililec.’’
Yoto kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mite yuteyu piko alake ce keyoŋ ce puryo kot kupoku okoy ye kakäs cekto poytoyisyetap Yiyintet kuconi om kamukeywek.’’
Nto om letutap pesyosyek lö, kukwer Yesu Petero oko Yakopo oko Yowana kupa tulwet parak kwicek nkit. Nteye kimite cekto kuköse om konyekwa, kuwäl Yesu tonnyi om taymwacek.
Yoto kuweckey sirokyi kulekececis kulelakitu koromun, nye puryo ci nye kowunin koret tokol nye muce kowun kulelakitu kuyunyoto.
Yoto kukäs konomik coto somoku Moses oko Eriya kuŋolole oko Yesu.
Kuŋalal Petero komwoci Yesu kule, “Konetintet kiy nye topon omnye cemite acek yuteyu, kunyo kany cetec acek kisarinek somok, mokwek ake nyeŋuŋ, kupoyit ake Moses, kupoyit ake Eriya.’’
Kiŋalal Petero kumwoy ŋalecato omnye kipuryo kot kunkete ŋalek ce kimwowu, omnye kimuyo cek koromun.
Yoto kuco polyet oŋnkulum cekto rurwet, yoto kucone kutit polyet orit kuŋalal kumwoy kule, “Nyi kunye Werimwani camanet, olimnci neto!’’
Kumolmolen pakenke kukäsakästa konomik, ntene kipuryo kot kukäs citake tokol wokwek Yesu nkit nye kipontokey oko cekto.
Nteye kimite cek tokol kurekune tulwet, kunkolontyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Monte cemwoci citake kito nye kokäs akwek okoy ye kaciŋet kotutune met weritap cito.’’
Kucäm cek kurip ŋalek ce kumwoci Yesu. Ntene nteye kimite cek kwicek nkit kuŋalal kumwoy kule, “Mwowu ne ŋolyontoni kumwoy kule, ‘Citutune met’ ’’
Yoto kutepe cek Yesu kule, “Omne sukunete kumwowu konetikap ntarastinek kule, Eriya nye nyosyi kuco?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cekto kule, “Manta, Eriya nye nyosyi kuco cokusat kwitita kunyol tukuk tokol. Ntene omne sukumwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule mosukutaŋany Weritap cito koromun oŋnkyetay?
Kunyo komwowok ani akwek kule kico Eriya keny, kunyo kikwici piko neto tukuk ce möce cek kuyu wulo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet ŋalek ce nöme neto.’’
Ntowo kukwa cekto okoy kupun wule kimite konomik cut, kwokunyor kupontokey co piko ce caŋ oko konetikap ntarastinek ce kimite kutintentyintos oko konomik.
Yoto pakenke ye kotoköse piko Yesu kukite koromun oŋnkurway kupa ye mite neto wokusupay.
Kutepe Yesu konomikyi kule, “Ŋal ne cu kotintentyintosi akwek oko cekto?’’
Kuwec cito akenke nye kimite kwenutap piko kumwoy kule, “Konetintet, kokweru ani werinyu kuco wule mite nyi, omnye ponto oyinot nye miyat nye kinäm nye puryo kot komuce kot kuŋalal.
Ye kanäm kumilyini ŋony oŋnkukapus pukantet, oŋnkunyiy kelak, oŋnkuyam porto tokol. Kunyo kosom ani konomikuk kule kukwetyi oyik, ntene puryo kot komuc kot kukwet.’’
Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Opo! Akwek pikap pinta nyepo pesyosyecu ce puryo kot kuponto koyenot! Mosopur ani oko akwek okoy oyu? Sutu werit kuco yu omite ani!’’
Yoto kusut cek lekwanato kuco ye kimite Yesu. Nteye kotoköse oyinotonoto Yesu, kunäm weroto kumilyi ŋony kumilmil oŋnkukapus pukantet.
Kutepe Yesu kwan kule, “Kikowany pesyos ce tya kunöme kuyunyitenyi?’’ Kuwec kwan kumwoy kule, “Kuceke ku lekwa nye miniŋ.
Kunyo kisyem porto aret ce caŋ kule apakäc, omnye wircini wule mite mata, oko peko orit. Ntene ye muci nyi yici kitake rirenec kalyec acek.’’
Kuwec Yesu kumwoci kule, “Omne semwowu kule, ‘Ye muci nyi?’ Mukoktos kiy ake tokol om wule mite ci nye keyen.’’
Yoto pakenke kuŋalal kupol kwanitap lekwet kumwoy kule, “Oyeni ani! Kalya ye moponte koyenot nye yeme.’’

Yoto kukäs Yesu kule mite kukwoni kotosyinikey piko ce caŋ, kupolyi neto oyinot nye miyat kumwoci kule, “Komwowuŋ ani nyi oyinot nye nöme cito kumiŋit kunämakay kutit kule, ŋete lekwani, ntene mente toketyikey yec!’’
Kunäm oyinoto lekwet kupol oŋnkupirto kumisto oŋnkuŋete kuwo. Yoto kwiyiytakey lekwet musyo nye kame, okoy kumwoy ci ake tokol om yoto kule, “Kame’’.
Kunäm Yesu yewutap lekwet kukalya kuŋet kuyo, yoto kuŋet kuyo.
Nto om letut yu kowo kuwo Yesu koto orit, kutepe konomik neto kule, “Omne yu kopuryo kot cimuc acek kot cekwet oyinot?’’
Kuwekyi neto kumwoci cek kule, “Puryo cimuce kot cekwet oyinot nye yunyi om aret ake tokol, somset pate nye muce.’’
Kunomene cekto wuloto kupa kupunte koretap Kalilaya nye kipuryo kot kumöce Yesu kule konketo piko wule omite.
Omnye kinete neto konomikyi kumwocini kule, “Mosicenäm Weritap cito oŋnkyikoyito cekwer kuwo wule mite piko ce mosukupar kume, ntene mosiciŋet kotutune met om letutap pesyosyek somok.’’
Kipuryo kot kusow yoto konomik konket kule poru ne ŋalecato, ntene kumuyo cek yec yemo kutepe Yesu.
Kukwa cekto okoy kupun Kapernaum. Ntowo kupa koto orit, kutepe Yesu konomikyi kule, “Ŋal ne co korwoke akwek otintentyintosi om aran?’’
Yoto kusisio konomik, omnye kiŋololonu kutintentyintos kwicek nkit om aran kule ŋo nyewo kupëlis om cekto.

Kopur Yesu ŋony oŋnkukur konomik taman ok oyeny kukwa ye mite neto oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ye möce ci ake tokol kule oyiku kantoyintet nyepo piko, kuroke cicoto kwek cito nyepo letut om wule mite piko alak tokol kwek mutworintetap piko.’’
Yoto kunäm Yesu lekwa nye miniŋ kuyoŋe taymwacek oŋnkunäm kumot kopure kupesokyi, oŋnkumwoci cekto kule,

“Ci ake tokol nye katoroc kuŋerekyi lekwa akenke om lekocu minkec nyi yunyi om kaynemwani, kunye katoroca kuŋerekyo ani cicoto; nto ci tokol nye katoroca kuŋerekyo, kunye puryo kot kukatoroca kuŋerekyo ani nkit, ntene kukatoroc kuŋerekyi mpo neto nyo kiyokwo ani.’’
Kumwoci Yowana Yesu kule, “Konetintet, kucekäs acek citake nye kukwete oyik om kayneŋuŋ ceyete acek cekerekte cicoto omnye puryo kot cepesetoti cepontotikey oko neto.’’

Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Monte ceyete cekerekte cico, omnye puryo kot kumite ci nye muce kot kwiy ŋalek cepo kakitat om swametap kaynemwani nye muce yec kot kuweckey om letut oŋnkuŋalalena ani kwapi.
Ci tokol nye puryo kot kutoyec acek kunye nyinyo cicoto.
Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ci tokol nye kokonok akwek peko ce koye omnye oyiku piko cepo Kristo nye Ŋapanet, kunye mosukunyor cicoto kokotutyet nyenyi nye kocikoci.’’
“Nteye kamas kuwec ci ake tokol lekoy ce minkec ce yucu ce cömo ani kot kwiy miyotyet, kuroke cerotyi katitap cicoto rwantetap paka nyewo oŋnkyewirci ruretyet orit.

Kunyo ye yewuŋuŋ nye sokyiŋ nyi ye sewurte, yep kuŋet! Omnye kaykay ye kewo nyi torot wule mite soponto nye topon nye moponte yewut ake kusir ye ponte yewuniyek tukway oŋnkiwo wule mite mata nye momise.
[Wule wokwome om wuloto porwonikwa mokik ce mopoku oko mata nye momise.]

Nteye kerenkeŋuŋ nye sokyiŋ nyi ye sewurte, yepta kuŋet! Omnye kaykay ye kewo nyi torot wule mite soponto nye topon nye meponte kerenket ake, kusir ye ponte kerenkok tukway oŋnkiwo wule mite mata nye momise.
[Wule wokwome om wuloto porwonikwa mokik ce mopoku oko mata nye momise.]

Nteye koŋnta nyeŋuŋ nye sokyiŋ nyi ye sewurte, lotu kulot! Omnye kaykay ye kewo nyi wule mite poytoyisyetap Yiyintet ponte koŋnta akenke kusir ye ponte konyek tukway oŋnkyewirciŋ wule mita mata nye momise.
Wule wokwome paronkikwa mokik ce mopoku oko mata nye momise.
“Omnye mosicitoye ci ake tokol mata kuyu wulo citoye nkuyek misyontet.
Topon misyontet, ntene ye komokunomu, omuci akwek kulene kot awec yec kot kunom? Roke oponte akwek misyontet, oŋnkocämnkey opurte kalyet akwek kwakwek nkit.’’
Yoto kunomene Yesu wuloto kuwo okoy koretap Yuteya oŋnkway oyinetap Yortan. Korurukyikey yec piko ce caŋ wule mite neto. Kunet neto cekto kuyu wule yunto kopurnyi.
Kukwa Farasayek ye mite Yesu oŋnkulot kutepe kule, “Mwowec acek, cömwec ra ntarastinekyo kukwet cito korkenyi?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kutepe cekto kule, “Kikonok akwek Moses ntarastit oŋnkono?’’
Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Kicäm Moses kule muce kusil cito parwet nye kakwete korket.’’
Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Kisilwok Moses akwek ntarastini omnye wuyec mukuleywekwok ye mocinetak.
Ntene kuceke ye kicece citany koret, kicemwoy kule, ‘Kitany Yiyintet moron oko korko.
Kunyo om ŋolyontoni kuye sukuŋet kupakakta cito kwan oko kamet oŋnkuyomokey oko korkenyi,
kwek picoto oyenku akenke nye komo ku pic oyeny yec, ntene kokwek ci akenke.’
Kunyo puryo kot kumisyini kot kupciy cito piko ce kokuyomo Yiyintet.’’
Nteye kimite cekto koto orit, kutepe konomik Yesu ŋalek ce nöme ŋolyontoni.
Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Ci ake tokol nye kakwet korkenyi oŋnkömüt ake, kakwiy cito nyoto sakwayanat om wule mite korkenyi.
Nto korko nye katay santenyi oŋnkuwo wokomüt citake, kakwiy korkonoto sakwayanat.’’
Kukwer piko lekok kukwa wule mite Yesu kule sukuŋet kunäm neto lekocoto ntene kupolyi konomik kukerekta picoto.
Nteye kotoköse Yesu kunyer oŋnkumwoci konomikyi kule, “Ayaste lekok kukwa wule omite ani! Monte ceyete, omnye po poytoyisyetap Yiyintet cekto ceyucutecu.
Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kunome poytoyisyetap Yiyintet kuyu lekwa, kunye puryo kot komuce cito nyoto kot kowut mpo kisic.’’
Yoto kunäm Yesu lekocoto kopure kupesokyi oŋnkukemer yewuniyekyi metewokap lekocoto kusomnci kupeyok.
Nteye kimite Yesu kunomene poninekyi, kulapat citake kuwo tay nyi oŋnkukutuŋnkyi kutepe kule, “Konetintet nye topon, mosayiy ne ani ye sonyoru soponto nye mopoku?’’
Kutepe Yesu cicoto kule, “Omne sekureno ani nyi nye topon? Puryo ci nye topon, ntene Yiyintet pate nkit nye topon.
Nketi nyi ntarastinek, mwowu kule, ‘Mente oporisye, mente operperisye, mente asakwayan, mente acorsye, mente oŋomu ci, ywey kon oko komet!’ ’’
Kuwekyi cicoto kumwoci Yesu kule, “Konetintet, kyorip ani ntarastinecutecu tokol kuceke oyiku lekwa.’’

Yoto kurotot Yesu cicoto topon kuŋerekyi moyenyi, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Mite kito akenke nye tokupotuŋ nyi, iwo weyalye tukuk tokol ce ponte oŋnkikoci pesanik pononik mesenyoru mokoryontit om torot, oŋnkico cepetekey oko ani.’’
Nteye kotolime cicoto ŋalecato; kunyer kusiriny tokoynyi oŋnkunomen kuwecikey kunerekat omnye kimokoryo nye kiponto tukuk ce caŋ.
Yoto kukäsakästa Yesu oŋnkumwoci konomikyi kule, “Mokuwuyit koromun om wule mite piko co mokoren ce ponto tukuk ce caŋ ye mokowut cekto poytoyisyetap Yiyintet!’’
Kukite konomik ŋalecato koromun, ntene kutosyikey Yesu kumwoy kule, “Lekocu, mokuwuy koromun ye mociwut poytoyisyetap Yiyintet!
Lekit kupunte nkamiyet koŋntap sintanit kupël ye mokowut cito nye mokoryo nye ponto tukuk ce caŋ poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’’
Yoto kukite konomik koromun oŋnkutepekey kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Kunyo ŋo nyun cito nye cimuce cisop.’’
Kurotot Yesu cek topon, oŋnkuwekyi kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot komukoktos ŋalecu om wule mite piko, ntene mukoktos kiy ake tokol om wule mite Yiyintet.’’
Kumwoci Petero Yesu kule, “Nto acek? Käs pa, kicepakakte acek tukuk tokol oŋnkyinämiŋ cepetekey oko nyi.’’

Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Kumwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, puryo ci nye ye kapakakta kanyi; oko mpo mutakwam, nto mpo cekwam, nto kamet, nto mpo lekok, nto mosonok oŋnkucäm ani oko lokoywek ce toponec,

nye puryo kot kunyoru om pesyosyecutecu korik pokolwokik ce caŋ, oŋnkunyor mpo cekwam oko mpo kamet, oko mpo kwan oko mpo lekok, oko mpo mosonok, oŋnkunyor mpo toŋoŋutek, oŋnkunyor yec soponto nye mopoku om kenyisyek co kwoni.
Ntene piko ce mite yawut tayta kuce mosukwokupoyit coto letut, nto piko ce caŋ ce mite yawut letut kuce mosukwokupoyit coto tayta.’’

Nteye kimite cekto kupeti om aran kuloŋntoy Yerusalem, yoto kuwo Yesu tay kuntoci konomik ce kanyokoritu kumuyo oko piko ce kirupe cekto ce komuyo mpecek. Yoto kukwer Yesu konomik taman ok oyeny kupa tapan, oŋnkumwoci kito nye mosukwiyakay om wule mite neto.

Kumwoci kule, “Alim pa, ce mite yawut cepeti celoŋntoy Yerusalem, wule mowocenäm Weritap cito, oŋnkyekwer kuwo wule mite tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek, mosicewosontyi oŋnkyemutyi musankut cepakäc oŋnkyikoyito kuwo wule mite lamek.
Mosukurorici kucur co neto, oŋnkuŋutyi, oŋnkupas, oŋnkupakäc kume, ntene mosukotutune met om letutap pesyosyek somok.’’
Yoto kukwa ye kimite Yesu werikap Sepetayo oyenku Yakopo oko Yowana, oŋnkumwoci cekto Yesu kule, “Konetintet, mite ŋolyontet akenke nye ce möce acek kule yiwec nyi.’’
Kutepe Yesu cekto kule, “Ŋolyo ne nye omöce kule oyiwok ani?’’
Kuwekyi kumwoci kule, “Comwec kule, ye kepure nyi ŋeceret nyepo woyinŋuŋ, comwec acek yoto cipur oko nyi, kopurune ake yewuŋuŋ nyepo tay kopurune ake yewuŋuŋ nyepo let.’’
Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Puryo kot oŋnket akwek kito nye osome. Omuci akwek ra kot opunte toŋoŋutek ce mataŋany ani?’’
Kuwekyi kumwoci kule, “Cimuci.’’ Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Po manta kule omuci akwek opunte toŋoŋutek ce mataŋany ani, oŋnkyepatisanak mpo patisanet kuyu wulo mocepatisana.
Ntene puryo kot oponte kamukeywek akwey kule ŋo nye mosukopure yewumwani nyepo tay nto nyepo let. Yiyintet nkit nye mosukukoci oteputek coto piko ce kiyiytoci neto.’’
Ntowo kulim konomik cut tamanu ŋalecato, kunyerci cekto Yakopo oko Yowana.

Yoto kukur Yesu konomik kuyomo wanak, oŋnkumwoci kule, “Oŋnket akwek kule piko ce ciyite kule poytoyik cepo lamek kuce ponto kamukeywek kupayta piko, kunyo yiyisye pikwa cewoyec kamukeywek kupayta cekto.
Puryo kot kuroke kuyuyit nyo om wule omite akwek. Ye möce citake om akwek kule oyiku nyewo, kuroke nyoto kwek mutworintet nyepo piko.
Nteye möce citake om akwek kule oyiku kantoyin, kuroke nyoto kwek mutworintet nyepo piko tokol.
Omnye kipuryo kot kuco Weritap cito kule kwokyiwo yisyet, ntene kico kule coyiyisye oŋnkume kukoyto soponto nyenyi kwolis sukusop piko ce caŋ.’’
Kukwa cekto okoy, Yeriko. Nteye kimite Yesu kunomone oko konomikyi Wanak oko piko ce caŋ, kimite yoto citake nye korat nye kipure aret tapan sukusomsi; nye kicekure Partimayo weritap Tamayo.
Ntowo kulim cicoto korat kule Yesu nyepo Nasaret nyitenyi, kucec kupol kumwoy kule, “Yesu! Weritap Tauti! Rirena kalya ani!’’
Yoto kupolyi piko ce caŋ cicoto kumwoci kusis, ntene kutosyikey kupol koromun kumwoy kule, “Weritap Tauti! Rirena kalya ani!’’
Kuyo Yesu oŋnkumwayta kule, “Okur kuco yu.’’ Yoto kukur piko cicoto korat kumwoci kule, “Titir ŋete ŋony! Kuriŋ Yesu.’’
Yoto kuwirci cicoto sirenyi tapan, oŋnkuŋet kuyo oŋnkuco ye kimite Yesu.
Kutepe Yesu cicoto kule, “Möce nyi kule oyiwuŋ ne?’’ Kumwoci cicoto Yesu kule, “Konetintet, omöce kule akäste yec.’’
Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Wecikey kokusopiŋ nyi koyeneŋuŋ.’’ Yoto kusopco konyekyi kukästa oŋnkuwo kunäm kupetakey Yesu om aran.
Nteyu kowo kurik cek kupun Yerusalem om ye lekite moŋetap Pesapake oko moŋetap Pesaniya om komosta nyepo tulwetap ketik ce cekure Seituninek. Yoto kuyokto Yesu konomikyi oyeny.
Kumwoci kule, “Ape okoy opunte kayta nyin mite taymwoŋ. Nteye kopunte kayata orit, mosonyoru moyitap sikiryet nyeratat nye tompo kot kulany kuwete ci mpo akenke, atyac oŋnkokweru kuco yu.
Nteye katepenak citake kule omne satyac akwek moyitap sikiryet? Omwoci kule möce mokoryontet, kunyo mosukukwer kuket lakwar okoy yu!’’
Kunomen cek kupa okoy wokunyor moyitap sikiryet nye kocerotyi kurkat om yepo aret nyepo kayta.
Nteye kimite cek kutyoce, kutepe piko ce kimite keyoŋ yoto kule, “Omne sayiy kuyunyi atyac moyitap sikiryet?’’
Kuwekyi konomik kumwoci picoto ŋalek co komwowu Yesu. Yoto kwasta picoto konomik kukwer moyitap sikiryet.
Kukwer cek moyitap sikiryet okoy kupun ye kimite Yesu, oŋnkuyitoci sirokwa pataytap moyitap sikiryet oŋnkulany kukonopci Yesu kopure parak.
Kuyito piko ce caŋ sirokwa aret nye wete Yesu, kuput piko alake ketik ce ponto sokek oŋnkoyito aran.
Yoto kucec piko ce kimite let oko ce kimite tay kupol kutum kule: “Akaste Yiyintet! Kukoci Yiyintet kupeyok kinko nyi coni om kaynetap Mokoryontet!
Kukoci Yiyintet kupeyok poytoyisyet nyi coni nyepo kukonyo Tauti! Cikaste Yiyintet!’’

Yoto kupunto Yesu Yerusalem, oŋnkuwo okoy kotap Yiyintet orit, nteyu kowo kukäs tukuk tokol ce kimite orit okoy kuwany, kunomen oko konomikyi taman ok oyeny okoy kupunto Pesaniya, omnye kikwimen koret.
Ntowo kuyekune ye kimite cekto kukwone Pesaniya, kwam Yesu rupet, yoto kukäs neto mokoywet nye ponto sokek nye kimite ye low.
Kuwo kule wakäs nto manyorte mokoyek ketoto. Ntowo kupunto yeto, wokunyor kuponto sokek pate, omnye kipuryo kot ku pesyosyek coto ce rurye mokoyek.
Yoto kumwoci Yesu mokoywet kule, “Mente kot tokwameniŋ nyi ci yec mokoyek kenyis.’’ Kulim konomik ŋalek ce kimwoy neto.
Ntowo kupun cek Yerusalem, kowut kotap Yiyintet orit, oŋnkucec kukwetune orit piko ce kyolisyi oko ce kyolyoyisyi, oŋnkumil mesanikap piko co wöle pesanik oko ŋecerokap piko ce kyolyoy swororok,
oŋnkuyete piko tokol manamat kusut kiy kuweto saŋ.
Kunet Yesu piko yoto kumwoci kule, “Kicesil silutekap Yiyintet kule kimwoy Yiyintet kule ‘Mosukwek komwani koto nye some pikap koret tokol,’ kunyi kwawec akwek kwek kepenet nye wuŋekey corik?’’
Yoto kulim tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek ŋalecato, kucec cek kuceny aret nye mokupakäce Yesu. Ntene kunyokoritu kuywey neto omnye kikite piko ce caŋ konetisyenyi.
Ntowo kwimen koret, kunomen Yesu oko konomikyi kupete moŋet.
Ntowo kuyekune kororn ye kimite cekto kupeti om aran kukäs mokoywetwe nye kuyam kuceke met okoy tikityek.
Yoto kusot Petero kito nye kukwiyakay, kumwoci neto Yesu kule, “Konetintet, käs pa kuyam mokoywetwe kwecupe nyi!’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ye koyen okenekey Yiyintet,

omuci omwoci tulwoni kule, ‘Ŋayekisye oŋnkiwo wewircikey ruretyet orit.’ Oŋnkupuryo kot oponte mukuleywek oyeny, ntene oyeni kule mokwiyokis ŋalek ce kemwowu, kwiyiyoktos kupoyit manta ŋalecato kemwowu nyi.
Kunyo omwowok ani akwek kule, ye kosom kule cekonok kitake kumöce kule oyeni kule kacenyoru, mosicekonok kiy ake tokol.
Nteye koŋetye osom, roke okalye ci ake tokol ŋolyo ye kwopontekey, sukuŋet kukalyak akwek Papamwoŋ nye mite torot miyotyonikwok.
[Ntene ye puryo kot omuci akwek kot akalye piko alak; kupuryo komuce mpo kot kukalyak Papamwoŋ nye mite torot miyotyonikwok.]’’
Yoto kukwa cekto okoy kupun Yerusalem. Nteye kimite Yesu kuwesetoti om kotap Yiyintet orit, yoto kukwa tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek oko poyik ye kimite neto,
oŋnkutepe kumwoci kule, “Poŋo kamukeywek cu yiye nyi tukucu? Ŋo nyi kikoniŋ kamukeywek iyiy tukucu?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Mosatepenak ani akwek teputyet akenke pate, nteye kowekwo, mpo ani mosowekwok wule onyortoy kamukeywek ce oyiye tukucu.
Kicone potisonisyetap Yowana torot, nto kicone wule mite piko? Owekwo ani pa akwek?’’
Yoto kurwoc cekto kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Ye kocemwowu kule, ‘Kicone torot,’ mosukuwekwec neto kule, ‘Omne satay akwek moyen ŋalekyi?’
Nteye kucemwowu kule, ‘Kicone wule mite piko.’ ’’ (Kuywey cek piko, omnye kicöme ci ake tokol kule kiworkoyo Yowana manta.)
Kuwekyi cekto Yesu kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot cinket acek.’’ Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Mpo ani puryo kot omuci kot omwowok akwek wule onyortoy kamukeywek cu oyiye tukucu.’’

Yoto kuŋololyi Yesu cekto om tyonkocok kumwoy kule, “Kimite citake nye kiwu ketik ce cekure Sapipunek oŋnkuker tuyita komut, oŋnkupal kutec mwenet nye cirurunye matuntanikap Sapipunek, oŋnkutec kitarit nye ceripse oŋnkukoci kopotik kukotesan, oŋnkunomen kuwo toyek.
Ntowo kupunto pesyosyek ce rurye omikap sapipunek, kuyok cicoto mutworintenyi kuco wule mite kopotik co kikotesonisyi, kule sukuŋet co kukoci mutworintonoto omik alak cepo sapipunek ce kiciyoyekyin.
Kunäm kopoticoto mutworintonoto oŋnkupir oŋnkukwet kuweto yewuniyek pate.
Kuyok cicoto mutworintet ake yec, kupir kopoticoto yec mutworintet nyoto metit kukoten, oŋnkunyalil kutaŋany.
Kuyokto cicoto mutworintet ake yec, kupakäc kopoticoto mutworintet nyoto kume, oŋnkutaŋany mpo alak ce caŋ, kupir alak, oŋnkupakäc alak kupok.
Cito nye kikiŋet kuyokto cicoto ku weritap cicoto akenke pate cämanet. Nto om letut kuyokto cicoto werinyi nkit kuwo wule mite kopotik, kumwoy kule, ‘Mosukuywey cek werimwani.’
Ntene kurwoc kopotik kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, ‘Nyitenyi kunye kotiyintet, akwa cenäm cepakäc kume, sukuŋet kwek nyinyacek kontisyet!’
Yoto kunäm cekto werit oŋnkupakäc kume, oŋnkocut kucone mparetap sapipunek.’’
Kutep Yesu kumwoy kule, “Mosukwiy kulene citap mparetap sapipunek? Mosukuco neto nkit, oŋnkupakäc kupok kopoticoto oŋnkukoci kopotik alak kukotesan mparetap sapipunek.’’
Porukey kule tompo kot asuman akwek silutyoni po Yiyintet nyi mwowu kule: “Rwantet nyo kitoye tekik kule puryo kot kuponto latik, kunye kiweckey kwek rwantet nye pële tokol nye tiye koto tapan.
Mokoryontet nye kikwiye, kunyo po kakitat koromun wule yunto!’’
Yoto kusyem kantoyikap Farasayek kule cenäm Yesu, omnye kinket kule kaŋalale neto tyonkocet nye nöme cekto, ntene kuywey luket nyepo piko ce caŋ. Yoto kunomen cekto kupecikey kupapakta neto.
Ciyok Farasayek alak oko piko cepo luketap Erote alak kukwa wule mite Yesu kule sukuŋet kwokulot cek neto om ŋalek ce mosukumwoy om tintenotet.

Kukwa picoto oŋnkwokutepe Yesu kule, “Konetintet, cinket kule yiku nyi ci nyepo manta, oŋnkupuryo kot soti ŋalek ce sote piko, omnye puryo kot soti wule yunto piko, ntene neti pate ŋalek cepo manta cepo Yiyintet, kunyo mwowec acek, cömwec ra ntarastinekyo cekweci mosoret Kinko Nyewo nto puryo? Roko cekweci nto puryo kot kuroke cekweci?’’
Ntene kunket Yesu tekutek ce kiponto cek, kuwekyi kumwoci kule, “Omne sasyem akwek kule ceteca ani? Osutwo pa silinkit akäs?’’
Yoto kusutyi cek neto silinkit akenke, kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Po ŋo metit nyi oko kaynet nyi silot?’’ Kuwec kumwoy kule, “Po Kinko. Nyewo.’’
Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Kunyo okocini kinko tukuk cepo kinko, okocini Yiyintet tuku cepo Yiyintet.’’ Kukite cekto yoto koromun ŋalekyi.
Kukwa Satusayek alake wule mite Yesu. (Coto ku piko co mwowu kule puryo kot komuce kot kotutune met piko ce kipok.) Kutepe cekto Yesu kule,
“Konetintet, kisilwec acek Moses ntarastini kule, ‘Ye kame citake oŋnkupakakta korket nye puryo kot kuyici lekok, kuroke konti komüt mutakwam korkonoto musuk, sukuŋet kuyici mutakwam nyo kime lekok.’
Kunyo kimite piko tisapu ce kitupco, kukesyo nyewo komüt korket, ntene kume nye kipuryo kot kuyi lekoy.
Komüt mutakwam nyepo oyeny konti korkonoto musuk, kume mpo nyoto nye kipuryo kot kupakakta lekoy, kuyunyoto mpo nyepo somok.
Komüt picoto ku tisap korkonoto oŋnkupok picoto tokol nye kipuryo kot kuyi lekwa mpo akenke. Nto om letut kume mpene korkonoto.
Kunyo om pesyet nyo ceŋetos citutune met piko tokol, poyitu ŋo korkonoto? Omnye kikomüt cekto picoto tokol ku tisap?’’
Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Yunyoto ye somosokisye akwek, ntene oŋnketi akwek omne? Omnye puryo kot oŋnketi silutekap Yiyintet oŋnkupuryo mpo kot oŋnket swametap Yiyintet.
Omnye piko co mokotutune met, kuce puryo kot komütisyi moronik nto cimüt mpo koruk, omnye mosukukerkeyitu cekto oko Malaykanik ce mite torot.

Kunyo nto ŋalek cepo manta ce nöme kotutunetap met kucu: tompo kot asuman akwek om kitaputap Moses ŋalek cepo rukututwet nyo kiloye? Omnye kicesil ŋalecato kule kimwoci Yiyintet Moses kule, ‘Oyiku ani yiyintetap Apram, Yiyintetap Isaka, yiyintetap Yakopo.’
Poru ŋaleca kule, Yiyintet kunye Yiyintet nyepo piko ce soptos ntene puryo ku yiyintetap piko ce kipok. Oyiku akwek mosotin koromun.’’

Kimite yoto konetintetap ntarastinek akenke nye kilime ŋalecato. Yoto kukäs neto kule kowekyi Yesu Satusayek ŋalek topon, kuco ye mite Yesu oŋnkutepe kule, “Ntarastit oŋnkono nyepo tayta nye pële tokol.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Ntarastit nyepo tayta nye pële tokol kunyi mwowu kule, ‘Alim pa pikap Israel! Mokoryontet yiyintenyo kunye Mokoryontet akenke nkit pate.
Misyini cäm Mokoryontet Yiyinteŋunŋ om mukuleyŋuŋ tokol, oko soponŋuŋ tokol, oko kasoteywekuk tokol, oko swameŋuŋ tokol.’
Nto nyepo oyeny nye pëlisyi kunyi kule, ‘Misyini cäm latyeŋuŋ kuyu wulo cömntoykey nyi nkit.’ Puryo ntarastinek alak cewoyec kupël cutecu oyeny.’’
Kumwoci konetintetap ntarastinek Yesu kule, “Konetintet, kemwowu ŋalek cepo manta kule, ‘Mokoryontet kunye Yiyintet akenke nkit pate, puryo kot kumite yiyik alak ntene neto nkit pate.

Kunyo misyini kucäm cito Yiyintet om mukuleynyi tokol, oko kasoteywekyi tokol, oko swamenyi tokol, oŋnkucäm latyenyi kuyu wulo cömntoykey neto nkit.’ Topon koromun kupëlis ye kocerip ntarastinecutecu oyeny kupël ye kocesut tyoŋik oŋnkyepele meset nyetilil kwek korosek cepo Yiyintet.’’

Yoto kukäs Yesu kule kawec cicoto ŋalek cepo ŋomnon, kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot mitowune nyi wule low om wule mite poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’’ Kipuryo yoto ci nye kitokomuc kot kusyem kule atepe Yesu ŋolyo mpo akenke.
Nteye kimite Yesu kunetisyi om kotap Yiyintet, yoto kutep kumwoy kule, “Muce kulene kumwoy konetikap ntarastinek kule, mosukwek Kristo keseniyantetap Tauti?
Omnye kintoci Muyet Nyetilil Tauti kumwoy kule ‘Kimwoci Mokoryontet Mokoryontenyu kule, Pure yu po yewumwani nyepo tay, okoy okoci ani punikuk kwek ŋacerok cepo kerenkokuk!’
Kunyo nteye kure Tauti nkit kule, ‘Mokoryontet.’ Komuce kulene yec Kristo kwek keseniyantetap Tauti?’’ Kulimnta piko ce caŋ om yoto ŋalekyi om ŋerekwek.

Nteye kimite Yesu kunete cek, yoto kumwoy kule, “Oripkey koromun wule Konetikap ntarastinek, ce möce kule cepesetoti kukelac sirok ce koyec, oŋnkucäm kule ciyweyec cisupayec topon om wulo po moteponik.
Ce kweye ŋacerok co kweyotin om korikapkok oko oteputek cepo tay om sokwonutek,
ce nyopone korikap musukik, oŋnkusilkey kusome kwiyisye ŋalek ce caŋ, cekto ce mosukunyor toŋoŋutek ce caŋ ce pëlisyi.’’
Nteye kimite Yesu kukepur ye kilekite sontukut nye cekonore pesanikap kotap Yiyintet, kukäs neto piko ce kikocini pesanik sontukut orit. Kukoci piko ce mokoren pesanik ce caŋ.
Ntene kuco korko nye panan nye musuk oŋnkukoci kafunek oyeny.
Yoto kukur Yesu konomikyi kukwa yeto oŋnkumwoci kule, “Omwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, kekoci panani musuk kokotutek ce caŋ kusir ce kekoci piko alake tokol.

Omnye kakon piko alake kokotutekwa ce koŋetune ce caŋ cepo mokoryontimwa. Ntene om wule mite korkoni panan kuyu wule yunto, kokukoci neto kiy ake tokol nye koponto, coto kuce tokol ce kuponto ce kwenekey om sopon nyi.’’
Nteye kimite Yesu kunomene kotap Yiyintet, kumwoy akenke om konomikyi kule, “Konetintet, käs pa, rwontok cewoyec oko tekset nyepo korik cewoyec.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Kekäs nyi koricu woyec cu kicetec kuyunyi, puryo rwantet mpo akenke nye ŋetune ye mite yawut, mosiciturpup tokol oŋnkyewirci ŋony.’’
Nteye kimite Yesu kukepur tulwetap mokoyek kutokyikey kotap Yiyintet. Yoto kukwa ye kimite neto mpo Petero oko Yowana oko Antereya oŋnkumwoci möt kule,
“Mwowec acek, mosukwiyokis pesyo ne ŋalecutecu?’’
Kucec Yesu kunet cekto kumwoci kule, “Akäste monte kot kuperperak kumasak citake tokol.
Mosukukwa piko ce caŋ om kaynemwani oŋnkwokumwoy kule, ‘Ani kunye nyoto!’ Oŋnkuperper piko ce caŋ.
Monte cemuye ye kolim polotetap poryet nye lekit, nto poryet nye mite wule low, monte cemuye, mosukwiyokis tukucoto, ntene kupuryo kot kuporu kule kopunto pesyetap letut.

Omnye mosukusetyi koret ake kuporye koret ake, kusetyi poytoyisyet ake kuporye poytoyisyet ake, mosukoriŋriŋ koret wulyo tokol oŋnkunäm rupet koret tokol. Tukucutecu kuce poru kule kacec mwoninto nyepo toŋoŋutek.

“Ntene misyinok oripkey akwek nkit. Omnye mosukunämak piko oŋnkukwerok ape koti, mosicepasenak korikapkok, mosoyoŋe taytap poytoyik cewoyec oko taytap kinkonik omnye kacäm akwek kaynemwani sukuŋet omwoci akwek cekto lokoywek ce toponec.
Ntene misyini ce nyosye ce mwoci lokoywek ce toponec piko cepo koret tokol.

Nteye kacenämak akwek oŋnkyekwerok ape koti, monte ce nyosye cemuye kule mosicemwowu ne, ye kopunto pesyonoto, aŋalal omwowu pate ŋalek ce kacekonok kule omwowu om yoto. Omnye puryo kot kucikwakwek ŋalek ce moŋalal, mosukukwane wule mite Muyet Nyetilil.
Mosukukoyito piko nkit mpo yeyamwa cenäm oŋnkyepakäc, mosukwiy mpo kwan lekokwa kuyunyoto. Mosukuweckey lekok kunäm mpo kwan oŋnkukoyito cepakäc.
Mosukusenkerak akwek piko tokol omnye kocäma ani. Ntene mosicisop cesor ci ake tokol nye kotitir okoy kupunto pesyet nyepo letut.’’

“Ntene ye kokäs akwek, ‘Kiy nye miyat nye cetoye,’ kumite keyoŋe otepto nye puryo kot kuroke kuyoŋe. (Moce kunket cito nyo sumone kule mwowu ne ŋalecu!) Misyini kumwey yoto piko ce mite Yuteya kupa lokomosyek.
Oŋnkupuryo kot kumisyini cito nye mite konyi kisyek kurek kuwo koto orit wokonum kiy ake tokol nye möce kule owete,
Puryo kot kuroke cito nye mite mparen kuwo konyi kule wonumu siret.
Mite kwapi koromun om pesyosyecoto koruk ce koyotin oko koruk ce rerisyi lekok!
Osom Yiyintet sukuŋet mente kwiyokis ŋalecutecu om pesyosyek cepo peŋat ye katit koret.

Omnye mosukupëlis toŋoŋutek cepo pesyosyecoto kupël toŋoŋutek cepo pesyosyek alak tokol ce kikwiyokis om koret kuceke ye kitany Yiyintet koret okoy kupunto pesyosyecoto. Ntene komokwiyoktos yec taŋanyanta ake nye kerkey nyoto.
Ntomo nye kikoŋerin Mokoryontet Yiyintet kuŋerinitu pesyosyecoto, nto puryo ci mpo akenke nye ŋetu nye cimuce cisop. Ntene kikoŋerin Mokoryontet pesyosyecoto om toponiyetap pikyi co kweyanik.
“Kunyo, ye komwowok akwek citake om pesyosyecoto kule, ‘Akäs oŋyi Kristo nye Ŋapanet!’ nto ‘Oŋyin mite yun!’ Monte ciyen ŋalekyi.

Omnye mosukutok piko ce mwiynec ce perperisyi kule ciku Ŋapanet oko piko cemwowu kule ciku workoyik. Mosukwiy picoto pelutok cepo kakitat kule siceŋet cemas ciwurte piko ce kweyanikap Yiyintet ye kemukakay.
Akäste akwek! Omnye komwowok ani akwek ŋalek tokol kutompo kot kupunto pesyonoto.’’
“Om letutap pesyosyekap toŋoŋutek; mosukolumakay kutuyit asista,
oŋnkutay arawet me luwu. Mosukosuwune kokelik torot. Mosukotimtimkey swamet nyepo torot.
“Yoto ye mosokäs Weritap cito kucone polyet kuponto swamet nyewo oko woyinto.
Mosukuyokto neto malaykanik kupa taponutek amwan cepo koret, oŋnkoruruc pikap Yiyintet ce kweyanik kukwane wule kiŋete koret tokol kuceke tapan okoy tapan.’’
“Roke anetekey akäse ketit mokoywet. Ye kokäs akwek kwak kule kokuŋot sokek ce ŋorŋor; oŋnket yoto kule karik pesyosyekap peŋatut.
Kuyunyoto, ye kokäs akwek kwiyoktos tukuk ceyucutecu, kuye mosonket kule karik kucec pesyosyekap Weritap cito.
Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule! Mosukwitita ŋalecutecu tokol kutompo kot kupok piko tokol cepo pini soptos yawut.
Poku wulin po torot, oŋnkupok wuli po ŋony, ntene puryo kot kupoku ŋalekwani mpo kisic.’’
“Puryo ci mpo akenke nye nkete pesyonoto nto sawet, nka mpo Malaykanik om torot, nka mpo Werit. Papa nkit pate nye nkete.
Akäste, oripkey okoŋisye, omnye puryo kot oŋnketi akwek kule pesyo ne ye puntoy pesyonoto.
Mosukukerkeyit oko ci nye konomen kuwo toyek oŋnkupakakta mutworikyi kumite kwiyisyi, oŋnkukoci ci ake tokol yisyenyi nye yiye, oŋnkumwoci cito nye ripe kurket kukös kuripso topon.
Kunyo oripsye, omnye puryo kot oŋnketi akwek pesyet nye cone citap koto. Muce pesyet ake kupun kosoleny, nto ye komoy kwen, nto ye kerir koret, nto ye komwok asista.
Nteye kotepe kot kuco lakwar, kupuryo kot kuroke cokunyorwok akwek omite koruye rwonto!
Kunyo ŋalek ce omwowok ani akwek kuce omwocini mpo piko alak tokol kule, okösu oripkey.’’

Nteyu kowo kuŋet pesyosyek oyeny kupunto pesyet nyepo sakwetap Yutayek nye cekure keytayet oko sakwet nyepo mukatyantet nyemo kutunat. Kimite yoto tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek kucenye aret nye mokunäme Yesu om wule wuŋat oŋnkupakäc kume.
Kumwoy cekto yoto kule, “Puryo kot kurok kwiy ŋolyontoni ye pesyetap sakwet, omnye muce kiy piko pararet.’’

Kimite Yesu pesyet ake kotap Simon citap mutyenkenik om Pesaniya, nteye kimite kwomisyi, kuco korket ake nye kiponto cupet nye nyitat mwaytap ketit nye cekure narat nye poŋu topon nye kyole pesan ce caŋ. Kuyat kuyeyi cupet oŋnkuroŋnkyi mwayta metitap Yesu.
Kunyer yoto piko alake ce kimite yoto kuŋalal kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Omne siciwurta mwayi poŋu topon kuyunyi?
Kopuryo kot kuroke kyalya sicenyor silinkinek ce keyitye pokolwokik lö oŋnkyikoci pesanik pononik?’’ Kunyerci cekto korkonoto koromun.
Ntene kumwoy Yesu kule, “Ayaste! Omne sayim akwek neto? Kokwiwo ani ŋolyo nye topon nye nyolunot koromun.
Omnye opontekey akwek oko pononik okokoy, nteye omöce kule cikalye cek omuci oyici tukuk ce toponec om pesyo ake tokol, ntene puryo kot opuri ani oko akwek okokoy.
Kakwiy korkoni ŋalek ce muce, omnye kaŋape mwayta pormwani kutompo kot kupunto muyisyet.
Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, om koret tokol wule mocemwaytye lokoywek ce toponec, mosicemwowu mpo ŋalek cu kokwiwo ani korkoni cisote neto.’’
Kunomen yoto Yuta Isikaryoti nye ki akenke om konomik taman ok oyeny, kuwo wule mite tisik cewoyec wokuŋomnto Yesu kukoci cekto.
Kuŋerec tisik koromun yu kowo kulim ŋalek ce komwoy Yuta. Kukurtoci cek neto kule mosicekoniŋ pesanik. Yoto pakenke kucec Yuta kuceny poroyinto nye topon nye mokuŋomnte Yesu.

Nteye ki pesyet nyepo tayta nyepo sakwet nyo kyome mukatyantet nye mokutunat, pesyet nye ceyenye kecirekap omikap Keytayet, kutepe konomik Yesu kule, “Ono wule möce nyi kule cipe acek woceyiytowuŋ wule meyomisye omik cepo pesyetap keytayet?’’
Yoto kuyokto Yesu konomik oyeny kumwoci kule “Ape okoy moŋet orit, mosukutuyenok akwek citake nye toronu teretap peko, arup cicoto,
okoy koto nye kewut, oŋnkomwoci citap koto kule, ‘Komwowuŋ nyi konetintet kule, ono kotap toyek nye moyomisye ani oko konomikyu omikap pesyetap Keytayet?’
Mosukuporwok cicoto koto nyewo nye satat topon nye mite koto parak, wayiyte kiy ake tokol om wuloto.’’
Kunomen konomik kupa okoy kupunto moŋet, wokunyor kiy ake tokol kumite kuyu wulo kakamwayta Yesu. Kuyiyta cekto omikap pesyetap Keytayet.
Ntowo kupunto kosoleny, kuco Yesu oko konomikyi taman ok oyeny.
Nteye kimite cek kukepur kwomisyi, kumwoy Yesu kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosukuŋomnto ani akenke om akwek nye mite yuteyu kwomisyi oko ani.’’
Yoto kocoŋoŋonis konomik oŋnkucec ci ake tokol om cekto kutepe Yesu kule, “Ani nyoto?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Akenke om akwek taman ok oyeny nye noknoktoy mukatyantet nyenyi sanit akenke oko ani.
Omnye mosukume Weritap cito kuyu wulo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet kule mosukume, ntene mite kwapi koromun cito nyo mosukuŋomnto neto! Kitopon nto kipuryo kot ceyi cicoto mpo kisic!’’
Nteye kimite kwomisyi, kunäm Yesu mukatyantet, oŋnkusomnci kukasta Yiyintet, oŋnkupetec oŋnkukoci konomikyi, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Onäm oyam, pormwani nyitenyi.’’
Kunäm yec cikompet oŋnkusomnci kukasta Yiyintet, oŋnkukoci kuyesyo cek tokol.
Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Korotikwani cutecu cepo kirotyetap Yiyintet nyelel ce citotocini piko ce caŋ.
Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule komo toye ani yec mpo tukusic pekap omikap sapipunek okoy pesyet nye mosaye ce lelac om poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’’
Ntowo kupok, kutum tumnto oŋnkuŋetyo kupa okoy kupunto tulwetap sapipunek.
Yoto kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Mosomwey arway akwek tokol oŋnkopakakta ani, omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Mosukupar Yiyintet mesewontet kume, yoto kuseret kecirek.’
Ntene om letut ye kaciŋeta otutune met, mosontowok awo anyosye Kalilaya.’’
Kumwoy Petero kule, “Nka kot kamwey kurway cut alake tokol, puryo kot oyostiŋ ani nyi mpo kisic.’’
Kumwoci Yesu Petero kule, “Oŋnkisot ŋolyontoni! Kutompo kot koncur kurkonkit aret oyeny om kwomowutap pesyoni, mesetuckey nyi aret somok mwowu kule puryo oŋnketo ani.’’
Kuwec Petero yec om swamet kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot omuci ani kot atuckey omwowu kule monketiŋ nyi, nka kot koyek met cepoku mpo tukway!’’ Kumwoy mpo konomik cut tokol kuyunyoto.
Kupa cek okoy kupunto mparet nye cekure kesesemane. Yoto kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule, “Opur yuteyu ye omite ani osome.’’
Kukwer neto kupetakey Petero oko Yakopo oko Yowana. Kupotpoten Yesu kumuy oŋnkusot koromun om yoto,
oŋnkumwoci neto cekto kule, “Oponte nerekwek ce caŋ koromun om mukuleymwani kot karik kupakäca, opur yuteyu oŋnkosom.’’
Kuwo neto kunata tay kisic, oŋnkuyim kukutuny oŋnkusom kule nto kemukoktos kukeytena sawet nyepo toŋoŋutek.
Kusom kumwoy kule, “Papa! Papanyu! Mukoktos kiy ake tokol om wule mite nyi. Nemuneno ani toŋoŋutecu, puryo kot kuyu wulo omoktoy ani, ntene kwiyokis kuyu wule moktoy nyi.’’
Yoto kuweckey kuco okoy cokunyor konomik co kosomok kumite koruy. Kumwoci Yesu Petero kule, “Simon, keru nyi? Puryo kot muc kot kösu wany mpo sawet akenke?’’
Kumwoci neto cek kule, “Okösu sukuŋet mente kot osuci syemutok. Cöme mukuleyto, ntene puren porto.’’
Kuwo Yesu yec wokusom kumwoy ŋalek ce kerkey oko co kumwowu yo kusome om panta nyepo tay.
Ntowo kuweckey kuco, cokunyor cekto kumite koruy yec, omnye kikinäm rwonto nyewo konyekwa. Yoto kupotyi cek ŋolyontet nye mokuwec kumwoci Yesu.
Kuco Yesu yec aret nyepo somok oŋnkucokomwoci cek kule, “Tomite akwek oruytosi omunyi? Kayem! Kapunto sawet! Kacenäm yawut Weritap cito oŋnkyikoyito kunäm piko ce ponto miyotyonik.
Oŋetye cipe! Akäs karik cito nye ŋomnto ani!’’

Nteye kimite Yesu tokuŋolole, kupun Yuta akenke om konomik taman ok oyeny kupontonukey oko luket nyepo piko ce caŋ ce kiponto ponkok oko runkunek, kiyoku picoto tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek oko poyik.
Kikimwoci ŋomntoyintet Yuta picoto pelutyet, kumwoci kule, “Cito nyo katoroc aŋatut ani kunye cito nyoto, anäm nyoto okwer oŋnkorip topon koromun.’’
Ntowo kupun Yuta kuwo okoy ye kimite Yesu oŋnkumwoy kusupay kule, “Konetintet.’’ Oŋnkutoroc kuŋatut.
Yoto kunäm cekto Yesu oŋnkurat.
Ntene kocut cito akenke nye kimite keyoŋe yoto rotwetap cok, oŋnkuyep kulot yititap mutworintetap tisintet nyewo.
Kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Kakwa kule kwocenama kuyu nye omöce kule cenäm corin? Omnye kakwante ponkok oko runkunek.

Nteyu kucepontekey oko akwek kuwany pesyosyek ce caŋ om kotap Yiyintet onetisyi ani, ntene puryo kot onäma ani akwek yoto. Ntene misyini kwiyokis ŋalecu sukuŋet kwitita ŋalak co kicemwoy om silutekap Yiyintet.’’
Yoto kumwey konomik tokol kupakakta Yesu.
Yoto kurup oyiperyontet ake Yesu let, nye kikilac suket pate. Kusyem piko alak kule cenäm oyiperyontonoto
ntene kuciwit kumwey kupokokyi cek suket oŋnkulopotyikey puc pate nye puryo sira.
Kukwer cek Yesu okoy kupunto kaytap Tisintet nyewo, wule kimite kukokorurukyikey tisik cewoyec tokol oko poyik oko konetikap ntarastinek.
Yoto kurup Petero cekto letut kuloyityi kisic okoy kupunto saŋntap kaytap Tisintet nyewo. Kopur Petero ŋony kuyu mata wanak oko sikarek ce ripsi.
Kusyem tisik cewoyec oko piko cepo kokwet tokol kule ceceny piko muncururwanik ce komwoy lelisto nye nöme Yesu sukuŋet kupakäc kume, ntene kipuryo kot kunyor ŋolyo nyepo lelis.
Kumwoy piko muncururwanik ce caŋ ŋalek cepo mwiynan pate kule kikwiy Yesu. Ntene kutoytocin ŋalekwa nye puryo kot kunömekey.
Kuyoŋ alake oŋnkuwosontyi Yesu kumwoy ŋalek cepo mwiynan pate, kumwoy picoto kule,
“Kucelim acek nkit kumwowu cici kule, ‘Mosoturpup ani kotap Yiyintet nyi kitece piko yewuniyek, nto om letutap pesyosyek somok, atec ani ake nye puryo kot kutec piko yewuniyek!’ ’’
Kutoytocin mpo ŋalek ce kimwoy picoto nye puryo kot kunömekey.
Yoto kuŋet Tisintet nyewo kuyoŋe taytap kokwet, oŋkutepe Yesu kule, “Puryo kot ŋololi nyi wec ŋalekyu cewosontyiŋ nyi picu?’’
Ntene kusis Yesu nye mnawec ŋolyo. Kutepe yec Tisintet nyewo Yesu kule, “Yiku nyi Ŋapanet nye Weritap Yiyintet Nyetilil nye cikostoy?’’
Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Ani nyoto! Kunyo mosakäs akwek tokol Weritap cito kukokopure komostap yewut nyepo tay nyepo Yiyintet nyepo kamukeywek tokol, oŋnkucontoykey polik cepo torot.’’
Yoto kupac Tisintet nyewo sirokyi, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Tocemocene acek yec piko muncururwanik alak!
Kalim akwek ŋalekyi nkit ce miyotec, omute akwek musankut kulene?’’ Yoto kumüt piko tokol musankut kulot Yesu kule misyini cepakäc kume.
Kucec piko alake kuŋutyi Yesu ŋulek, oŋnkuyen konyekyi, oŋnkutuluc, oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ŋor ŋo nye kopiriŋ nyi!’’ Kunäm sikarek Yesu oŋnkusyec.
Nteye kitokumite Petero kukepur ŋony om saŋntap kayta, kuco cepto mutworintet akenke nyepo Tisintet nyewo.
Nteye kotoköse cepoto Petero kumite kuyuye mata, kurotot komil topon, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Kepontekey mpenyi Yesu nyepo Nasaret?’’
Ntene kutuckey Petero kutoyis kumwoy kule, “Puryo monket, oŋnkupuryo mpo kot oŋnket ani ŋalek ce mwowu nyi.’’ Kumiŋnto Petero kuwo aret nyepo kayta saŋ. Yoto koncur kurkonkit.
Kukosyi yec cepkey Petero kumite wuloto, kumwoci cepoto piko ce kimite keyoŋ yoto kule, “Oŋyi cito akenke nye kopontokey picut.’’
Kutuckey yec Petero kutoyis. Nto om letut kuminiŋ, kumwoci piko ce kimite keyoŋ yoto Petero kule, “Yiku nyi manta akenke om picut, omnye yiku citap Kalilaya.’’
Kutuckey Petero yec kuwälkey kucupkey kumwoy kule, “Kupara asis, monket ani cici oŋolole akwek!’’

Yoto pakenke koncur kurkonkit nyepo oyeny. Yoto kusot Petero ŋalek co komwocini Yesu neto kule, “Kutompo kot koncur kurkonkit aret oyeny mesetuckey toyisye aret somok kule monketo ani.’’ Yoto kucec Petero kurir.

Ntowo kuyec koret pate, koruruckey lakwar pakenke tisik cewoyec oko poyik oko konetikap ntarastinek oko piko tokol cepo kokwet nyewo oŋnkurwoc. Ntokopok kurat cekto Yesu oŋnkukwer okoy wule mite Pilato.
Kutepe Pilato Yesu kule, “Yiku nyi kinko nyepo Yutayek?’’ Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Kemwowu nyi.’’
Yoto kuwosontyi tisik cewoyec Yesu kumwoy ŋalek ce caŋ.
Kutepe yec Pilato Yesu kule, “Puryo kot wece nyi ŋolyo? Kaspa ŋalek ce caŋ ce cewosontyiŋ !’’
Yoto kutay Yesu yec mawec ŋolyo okoy kukite Pilato koromun.
Kityoktoy Pilato mopusyontet akenke nye kosom piko om pesyosyek cepo sakwetap keytayet.
Kimite pesyosyecoto citake nye cekure Parapa nye ki akenke om piko alak ce kirototin om mopusi ce kiporis oko pararet nye kikwiy.
Yoto kukwa piko tokol kwokusom Pilato kwici cek kuyu wulo yiytoy kwak ye pesyetap sakwet.
Kutepe Pilato cekto kule, “Omöce akwek kule otyokwok ani Kinko nyepo Yutayek?’’
Kinket Pilato topon kule kowosontyi tisik cewoyec Yesu om corokyinot pate.
Ntene kowurur tisik cewoyec piko kumwoci kule kusom Pilato kutyokyi cekto Parapa.
Kuŋololyi Pilato piko kutepe yec kule, “Kunyo omöce akwek kule ayiye ne ani cici okure akwek Kinko nyepo Yutayek?’’
Kupol piko kumwoci Pilato kule, “Wuyitoci murtowontet!’’
Kutepe Pilato cek kule, “Omne, kukwiy lelis ne nye miyat?’’ Kutosyikey piko kupol koromun kumwoy kule, “Wuyitoci murtowontet!’’
Omnye kimöce Pilato kule aŋerec piko, yoto kutyokyi cekto Parapa, oŋnkukoyito Yesu wokupas sikarek, oŋnkyekwer wocewuyitoci murtowontet.
Yoto kukwer sikarek Yesu kuwo kaytap Poytoyintet, ye cekure Pretoriyom, oŋnkukur koruruc sikarek tokol kukwa koyoto.
Kulokyi cekto Yesu siret nye mur kwarar, oŋnkuta kutwet nyepo kotok oŋnkukoci metinyi,
oŋnkucec kusupay kumwoci kule, “Cisupoyiŋ kinko nyepo Yutayek! Ilaŋnte!’’
Kupire cekto Yesu korokto metit, oŋnkuŋutyi oŋnkukutuŋnkyi kuyu nye keywey.
Nteyu kowo koncurur cekto Yesu okoy kuwany, konomune siretkey mur kwarar; oŋnkulokyi sirokyi nkit, oŋnkukwer kuwo wocewuyitoci murtowontet.

Nteye kimite kupeti om aran, cetuye citake nye cekure Simon nye kicone koret saŋ kuconi moŋet, kunäm cekto neto kukerci koŋ kukonopat murtowontetap Yesu. Cicitenyi ku Simon nyepo koretap Kurene nye kikwanitap Alekisanta oko Rupo.
Yoto cekwer Yesu okoy kupunto ye cekure Kolokosa nye mwowu kule “Rokyetap Metit.’’
Kusyem cek kule cikoci Yesu kuye nfinonyik ce kacetase sakityek alak ce mwonec ce cekure mira, ntene kutay Yesu kuye.
Yoto kuwuyitoci cek Yesu murtowontet, oŋnkupcicin sirokyi kuporci kirotyet sukuŋet kukäs kule mosukupoyit ŋo siret oŋnkono.
Kimite yoto sawet somok nyepo kororn ye kiwuyitocini cekto Yesu murtowontet.
Cecil ŋalek cepo musankunyi kule, “Kinko nyepo Yutayek.’’
Cewuyitoci murtowonik mpo piko corik alak oyeny oko Yesu, kopurune ake yewunyi nyepo tay, koporune ake yewunyi nyepo let.
[Yoto kwitita kupoyit manta silutekap Yiyintet ce mwowu kule, “Kicituyo neto oko piko ce yirye ntarastinek.’’]
Kulelec metewokwa piko ce kipeti kutile aran, oŋnkucup cekto Yesu kumwoy kule, “Ye! Nyi nyo mwowu kule omuci oturpup kotap Yiyintet aŋnkatec ake om pesyosyek somok.
Kunyo rekune pa nyi yawut murtowontet co ŋony sopkey nkit.’’
Kuŋalal kwicek nkit mpo tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek koncurur kucup Yesu kumwoy kule, “Kwesope neto piko alak, ntene puryo kot komuce kot kusopkey nkit!
Ce möce acek yawut cekäs Ŋapanet Kinko nyepo Israel kurekune Murtowontet kuco ŋony, sukuŋet ciyen acek neto.’’ Mpo piko oyeny ce kicewuyitoy oko Yesu kucupis mpecek kucup Yesu.
Ntowo kupunto asista pet kwen, kunäm menonet koret tokol okoy kupunto asista sokol nyepo kosoleny.
Ntowo kupunto asista sokol kupol Yesu om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Eloy, Eloy, lema sapaksani?’’ Nye mwowu ŋaleca kule, “Yiyintenyu, Yiyintenyu, omne seyasta ani nyi?’’
Nteye kotolime piko alake ce kimite keyoŋ yoto, kumwoy kule, “Alim pa, mite kukure Eriya!’’

Yoto kulapat citake nye kiponto siponcit nye kerkey cankut nye kakolumnta nfinyonik ce mintililec; oŋnkurutyi tekantet oŋnkunömnci kutitap Yesu oŋnkumwoy kule, “Akany pa cekäs oŋnkuconi Eriya cokurek neto kucone murtowontet kuco ŋony!’’
Kunco Yesu om kutit nyewo oŋnkume.
Yoto kukerer kupciwunekey oyeny kuceke met okoy kel siret nyo cepciye otepto nye tilil om kotap Yiyintet.
Ntowo kukäs nyewo nyepo sikarek nye kimite keyoŋe taytap murtowontet wule kencoyto Yesu oŋnkume, kumwoy kule, “Weritap Yiyintet cici manta!’’
Kimite yoto koruk alake ce kimite kuköse ce kimite ye low kuminiŋ. Om cekto korucoto, kimite mpo Solome oko Mariyam nyepo Maktala oko Mariyam kametitap Yakopo nye miniŋ oko Yose.
Korucoto kuce kipontokey Yesu ye kimite Kalilaya ce kikwici neto yisyet. Kimite yoto mpo koruk alake ce caŋ ce kikwontoykey Yesu okoy kupun Yerusalem.
Nteye kimite kwimene koret, yoto kuco Yosep nyepo moŋetap Arimaseya,

Cito nye kisikenet nye kiciyweye nye kipo kokwetap Yutayek. Ki cito neto nye kimite kukene pesyet nye cone poytoyisyetap Yiyintet. Pesyonoto kunye kipesyet nye kiceyiytoykey sukuŋet ye koyekune kwek pesyetap Sapat. Yoto kuwo Yosep nye kipuryo kot kumuy okoy taytap Pilato oŋnkusom portap Yesu.
Kukite Pilato kulim kule kame Yesu. Yoto kukur neto nyewo nyepo sikarek oŋnkutepe kule kame Yesu kuloyit.
Ntowo kulim ŋalekap nyewo nyepo sikarek, kucomnci Pilato Yosep wokusut porto.
Kwal Yosep suket nyelel, oŋnkurek musto, oŋnkurate suket oŋnkumuci mwenet nye mite kepenet nye kicepal rwantet. Ntowo kupok, kutor rwantet nyewo kukere kurket nyepo mwenetap kepenet.
Kimite yoto Mariyam nyepo Maktala oko Mariyam kametitap Yose. Yoto kukäs cekto topon ye kocemuci Yesu.
Ntowo kupok Sapat, yoto kwal Mariyam nyepo Maktala oko Mariyam kametitap Yakopo oko Solome mwaninek ce poŋu topon sukuŋet kusut wokoyile mustap Yesu.
Nteye kipesyetap Santey kukayec koret komwok asista, kupa cek okoy ye kimite mwenet.
Nteye kimite kupeti om aran kuŋalalat kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Ŋo nye sukuwunuktowec rwantet nyo mite kurketap mwenet?’’
Yoto ntopere cekäs kacewunukto rwantet kucone kurket nyepo mwenet.
Ntowo kupa cekto mwenet orit, yoto kukäs oyiperyo nye kelac siret nyelel nye koy nye kepur yepo yewutap tay. Kukite koromun.
Kumwoci cicoto korucoto kule, “Monte cikite, ocenye akwek so Yesu nyepo Nasaret nyo kucewuyitocini murtowontet? Puryo kot kumite yu; Kokotutune met! Akäs pa yeto ye kucemuci.
Kunyo ape yawut womwoci ŋalecu konomik wanak oko Petero, kule mite neto kuntowok akwek kuweti Kalilaya, wuloto wule mowokäse kuyu wulo kikimwowok akwek.’’
Kumiŋ cekto kukwa saŋ oŋnkurway kupete yepo mwenet, omnye kinäm muyotet oŋnkokite koromun. Ntene kipuryo kot kumwoci cekto citake tokol ŋolyo, omnye kinyokoritu.
[Nteyu kowo kotutune met Yesu kororn ye kipesyetap Santey, kunyosyo kuporcikey Mariyam nyepo Maktala nyo kikwetyini Yesu neto oyik tisap.
Kuwo Mariyam wokumwoci piko co kipontotikey oko neto ce kimite kurirtos kumesyi.
Ntowo kulim cut kumwowu Mariyam kule sope Yesu oŋnkumwoy kule käkäs neto nkit, kutay cut macäm kule po manta ŋalekyi.
Yoto om letut kuporcikey Yesu kuponto tonto ake konomik alak oyeny. Kimite konomik coto kupeti panwa nye kipeti koret saŋ.
Yoto kuweckey konomik coto kupa wokumwoci konomik cut ŋalecato, ntene kutoyis cut macäm ŋalekwa.

Nto om panta nyepo letut; kuporcikey Yesu konomik taman ok akenke ye kimite kukepur kwomisyi. Kuŋololyi Yesu cekto kupolyi omnye kitoyis meyen kuwuyekitu mukuleywekwa oko omnye kinyekeritu mecäm ŋalek cepo piko co kikäs Yesu kukotutune met.
Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Ape koret tokol kumukul, womwoci piko tokol lokoywek ce toponec.
Mosukusop ci ake tokol nye keyen kucäm lokoywek ce toponec oŋnkyepatisan, nto ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kucömis, mosicemutyi nyo musankut.
Mosicikoci piko tokol ce kocömis kuyen pelutocu: Mosukukwet oyik cekwol yitik om kaynemwani, mosukuŋalal ŋelyepik alak.
Nka mpo ye kanäm Erenoy, nto ye kaye mwonet, kupuryo kot kupoköce. Mosukukemer cek yewuniyekwa piko ce mnyontos kusopco picoto.’’
Nto om letut yu kowo kuŋalal Mokoryontet Yesu oko cekto, cesut neto kuwo torot wokopure Yewutap tay nyepo Yiyintet.

Yoto Kunomen konomik kupa wokumwaytat lokoywek om koret tokol. Kwiyis Mokoryontet om wule mite cek, kupor kule po manta lokoywek ce mwoytoy. Omnye kikoci neto cekto kamukeywek kwiy pelutok ce poru kamukeywek.]
Mokoryontet nye cekonyite Teyopilo, Kuyu wulo kusyem piko ce caŋ kusil ŋalek ce kikwiyokis om kwenunyacek.
Kisil cekto ŋalek co kimwowec acek piko muncururwanik kosik co kiköse ŋalecutecu kuceke ye kicece, oŋnkumwaytat lokoywecutecu.
Kunyo Mokoryontet nye cekonyite, omnye kwokir ani topon oŋnkasuman topon wule kicekta ŋalecutecu, asot mpo ani kule misyini asat topon oŋnkosiluŋ nyi.
Sukuŋet nket mpenyi kule po manta ŋalek tokol co kicinetiŋ.
Om kenyisyek ce kipoytoy Kinko Erote koretap Yuteya, kimite tisintet nye kicekure Sakariya nye kipo neto luketap Apiya. Kicekure kaynetap korkenyi Elisapet nye kipo aretap mpo Aron.
Ki pic cek tukway ce kikwiye ŋalek ce toponec om taytap Yiyintet oŋnkurupe kuyweye ntarastinek oko ŋalek tokol ce möce Mokoryontet; nye kipuryo kot kowurtoy mpo kisic.
Ntene kipuryo kot kuponto lekoy omnye kison Elisapet oŋnkukikiyosekitu tukway.
Om pesyet ake ye kimite Sakariya kwiyisyi yisyenyi nyepo tisyontit kuyu kwak om taytap Yiyintet, omnye kinyenyi pesyet kwiyis,
kuyu wule yunto yisyonutekap tisik, kikicekwey neto om kirotyet kupel korosek ce poŋu om otepto Nyetilil. Yoto kuwo neto kotap Mokoryontet.
Kimite yoto piko ce caŋ kusome om saŋ om sawet nyo cepele korosek ce poŋu.
Kuporcikey malayketap Mokoryontet Sakariya. Kimite malayket kukeyoŋe yewutap tay om otepto nye nyo cepele korosek ce poŋu.
Nteye kotoköse Sakariya malayket, kulipil oŋnkumuy koromun.
Ntene kumwoci malayket neto kule, “Sakariya! Mente omuy. Omnye kucelim somseŋuŋ, kunyo mosukuyiwuŋ nyi korkeŋuŋ Elisapet werit, oŋnkirut cekure kaynenyi Yowana;
meseŋerec nyi koromun, oŋnkuŋerec mpo piko alake om pesyonoto koceye neto.
Omnye mosukwek ci nyewo koromun om taytap Mokoryontet. Puryo kot kuroke kuye finyonik nto tukun alak tokol ce cepokite. Mosicikoci neto kunyor swametap Muyet Nyetilil kuceke pesyonoto koceye.
Mosukuwec pikap Israel ce caŋ kuwekyikey wule mite Mokoryontet Yiyintemwa.

Mosukuwesetot kwek kiyokintetap Mokoryontet kuponto nyikanatet oko swamet kuyu workoyontet Eriya. Mosukuwec poyik oŋnkotuyo kuyomokey wanak oko lekokwa, oŋnkuwec ŋomnonetap piko co kitoyis kumosokis kurup aret nye sote ŋalek ce toponec, oŋnkusat kopur topon kukenisyi pikap Mokoryontet.’’
Kumwoci Sakariya malayket kule, “Mosonkete ne kule po manta ŋalecutecu? Omnye oyiku ci nye kyayositu; nto mpo korkemwani kiyosit mpene kutil kenyisyek!’’
Kuwekyi malayket kumwoci neto kule, “Oyiku ani Kapuryel nye oyoŋe taytap Yiyintet; kunyo kociyokwani coŋololuŋ osutuŋ nyi ŋalecutecu toponec.
Ntene omnye ketay meyen ŋalekwani ce mosukupoyit manta om pesyet nye kicekwey, kunyo mesesis nye puryo kot ŋololi okoy kupunto pesyet nye yiyoktos ŋalecu komwowuŋ ani nyi.’’
Kimite piko yoto kukonye Sakariya ntene kukite kumwoy kule, “Omne sukulilennkey nye tenyi om koto orit?’’

Nteyu kowo kumiŋ saŋ, kipuryo kot komuc yoto Sakariya kot kuŋololyi piko ŋolyo, ntene kuŋololyi cek kwiyisye yewuniyek pate omnye kanamakay kutit. Yoto kusowu piko kunket kule kakäs neto ŋoŋutyet om kotap Yiyintet.
Ntowo kupok pesyosyekyi cepo yisyet om kotap Yiyintet, kuwecikey Sakariya kanyi.
Yoto om pesyos ce ŋeri, kukoyakay Elisapet oŋnkuwunyenkey koto orit kuwany orok mut kumwoy kule,
“Kunyo om yawut letut kakukalya ani Mokoryontet kuyunyi, omnye kokunumuneno nyilatet nyo kunyilo piko!’’
Om arawetap lö kuceke kakoyakay Elisapet, kuyokto Yiyintet malayket Kapuryel kuwo moŋet nye cekure Nasaret om koretap Kalilaya,
wule kimite cepto ake nye kimukul nye kitompo kot kunket moron nye kimöce komüt citake nye cekure Yosep nye kipo aretap mpo Tauti. Cekure kaynetap cepoto Mariyam.
Yoto kucontyi malayket Mariyam oŋnkumwoci kule, “Takwenyo! Ponte nyi kupeyok koromun; pontekey nyi Mokoryontet.’’
Nteye kotolime mariyam ŋalekap malayket, kulipil oŋnkumuy, oŋnkusot kumwoy kule, “Mwowu ne katakwesani.’’
Kumwoci malayket neto kule, “Mariyam, mente omuy, omnye kwenyoru nyi kupeyok om wule mite Yiyintet.
Mesesic lekwet oŋnkiyi werit oŋnkirut cekure kaynet Yesu.
Mosukwek nyewo koromun, oŋnkyekure Weritap Yiyintet nye mite torot koromun. Mosukukoci Mokoryontet Yiyintet neto kopure ŋeceretap kukonyi Tauti.
Mosukwek Kinko nye mosukupayta aretap Yakopo okokoy, nto poytoyisyenyi kunye puryo kot kuponto ye ŋete!’’
Yoto kumwoci Mariyam malayket kule, “Muce kwiyakay ŋolyontoni kulene? Omnye oyiku mukul nye puryo kot öŋnket moron.’’

Kuwekyi malayket kumwoci neto kule, “Mosukucontyiŋ nyi swametap Muyet Nyetilil, oŋnkuyeneniŋ atotoytap swametap Yiyintet nye mite torot koromun. Kunyo mosiceyi lekwet nye mosicekure Nyetilil Weritap Yiyintet.
Käs pa Elisapet cekwomet nye kicekure kule kisonen oŋnkukiyosit, kunyo ponto yawut orok lö kukoyat lekwa nye wero.
Omnye puryo kiy ake tokol nye purune Yiyintet nye memuce kot kwiy.’’
Kumwoy Mariyam kule, “Oyiku ani mutworintetap Mokoryontet, kunyo kany kwiyokis ŋalek co kemwowu om wule omite kuyu wule kemwayte nyi.’’ Yoto kunomen malayket kuwecikey.
Om pesyosyecoto, kuyiytakey Mariyam oŋnkunomen kusartakey om ŋerekwek kuwo moŋet nye mite lakomosyekap koretap Yuta.
Yoto kuwo okoy wokumiŋnto kotap Sakariya oŋnkutakwes Elisapet.
Nteye kotolime Elisapet katakwesetap Mariyam, kuwecweckey lekwet om moyenyi, yoto kunyor Elisapet swametap Muyet Nyetilil.
Kuŋalal kupol om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Ponte nyi kupeyoy om wule mite koruk! Oŋnkuponto kupeyoy mpo lekwet nye mite moyeŋuŋ nyo meyiy nyi!
Omne sukwiyakay kiy nye yunyi om wule omite ani, akäs kule muce kuco wule omite kametitap Mokoryontenyu?
Omnye yu kowo alim ani katakweseŋuŋ, kuwecweckey lekwet om moyemwani om ŋerekwek.
Ponte nyi kupeyoy yen oŋnkiyen ŋolyontetap Mokoryontet kule mosukupoyit manta om wule mite nyi!’’
Kumwoy Mariyam kule, “Kostoy mukuleymwani Mokoryontet,
oŋnkuŋerekat soponmwani om wule mite Yiyintet kosopintenyu.
omnye kukusot topon wule ayunte ani mutworintenyi nye miniŋ! Kuceke yawut pesyoni. Okokoy mosukukureno ani piko cepo pinutek tokol nye ponto kupeyoy.
Omnye kokwiwo ani Yiyintet nyepo kamukeywek tokol tukuk cewoyec. Kunyo Tilil kaynenyi.
Porcini tolosyet pikyi tokol co yweye neto, kuceke piko cepo pinta ake okokoy cepo pinta ake.
Kokuyito yewunyi nye ponto swamet; Oŋnkuseret piko co silekey om kasoteywekwa.
Kokonumune poytoyik cewoyec ŋecerokwa; oŋnkutoror piko co cenyile kupa torot.
Kapaye piko ce ponto rupet tukuk ce toponec, oŋnkukwet mokorenik kupeta yewuniyek pate.
Kirip kirotyet nyo kikurtoci neto mpo kukonyo, kunyo kaco cokukalya mutworintenyi Israel;
Oŋnkusot kule oporci tolosyet mutworintenyi Apram oko wule mite mucokoronikyi tokol okokoy!’’
Kopur Mariyam oko Elisapet kuwany kurikta orok somok, ntowecekey kuwo konyi.
Yoto kuponto pesyosyekap Elisapet ce cömekey lekwet, kucämnkey werit.
Kulim latosyekyi oko tilyonutekyi kule kakukalya kukoci Mokoryontet Elisapet kupeyok, yoto kuŋerec cekto tokol wanak oko neto.
Ntowo kupunto pesyetap sisit cewon lekwet, kumac piko kule cerut kaynet cekure Sakariya kaynetap kwan.
Ntene kumwoy kamet kule, “Puryo kot kuyunyo! Mocekure kaynenyi Yowana.’’
