Kumwoci piko Elisapet kule, “Puryo ci mpo akenke nyepo aremwoŋ nye cekure kaynanato.’’
Yoto kuŋololyi piko kwanitap lekwet kwiyisye yewuniyek kutepe kaynetap lekwet.
Kusom kwan rwantet nye cesile oŋnkusil kule, “Kaynenyi Yowana.’’
Om yoto pakenke kuyatakay kutitap Sakariya, oŋnkucec kuŋalal topon kukasta Yiyintet,
Kumuyo latosyek koromun, yoto kuseret ceŋalalate lokoywek ce nöme ŋalecutecu tokol okoy kupunte lakomosyekap Yuta tokol.
Nto piko tokol ce kilim ŋalecutecu, kuripe montuwokwa oŋnkutep kumwoy kule, “Mosukwek ne lekwani?’’ Omnye porukey kupoyit manta kule ponto lekwani swametap Mokoryontet.
Yoto kunyor kwan Sakariya swametap Muyet Nyetilil, kuŋalal kuŋorsyo kumwoy kule:
“Akany cikaste Mokoryontet nye Yiyintetap Israel! Omnye kaco korutoci cokukalya kutyac pikyi.
Kakutororwec acek kosopintet nyepo swama, Nyoto ku nyepo aretap mutworintenyi Tauti.
Kuyu wulo kikurtoci keny kupunune wule mite workoyikyi ce tililec,
kikurtoci kule mososorwec acek om wule mite punikyo oko wule swametap yewuniyekap piko tokol co senkerec acek.
Kimwoy kule mosoporci poypoyet mpo kukonyo, aŋnkusot kirotyenyi nye tilil.
Kirotyet nye kiwolcikey kukonyo Apram,
kuwalkey kule mososorwec acek om wule mite swametap yewuniyekap punikyo, oŋnkukonec acek ceyici Neto yisyet nye puryo kot ceponte muyot,
om tililinto oko toponiyet om pesyosyek tokol cepo soponwekyacek.
Ntenyi lekwenyu, mosicekureniŋ workoyontetap Yiyintet nye mite torot koromun; omnye mesentoci nyi Mokoryontet yiyitoci neto arenyi.
Meseporci mwoci pikyi kunket kule mocisop cikalya cekto miyotyonikwa.
Omnye kokolyoyin oŋnkutala Yiyintenyo. Mosukukon kuyec kolucec acek lakweyet nyepo soponto,
nye luwu kucone torot cokoluwuci piko tokol ce mite menonetap met, oŋnkuketwec acek cerup aret nyepo kalyet.’’
Yoto kuner lekwet Yowana kunyor swamet om porto oko ŋomnonet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil, kuminy koretap kitela okoy kupunto pesyet nyo porcinekey neto pikap Israel.
Yoto om pesyosyecoto kucone ntarastit wule mite Kinko Akusto kule, cemöce ciyitis cesil kaynokap piko tokol cepo korenyi.
Koyitisyet nyoto kunye kinyosyo ciyitis cesil kaynokap piko ye kipoytoy Kureniyo koretap Siriya.
Yoto kuwo ci tokol wokusilyokey om moŋenyi.
Kunomene Yosep moŋetap Nasaret om Koretap Kalilaya kuwo kulaŋnta Yuteya okoy wokupunto moŋetap Tauti nye cekure Peselekem, omnye kipo Yosep aretap mpo Tauti.
Kuwo Yosep wokusilyokey oko Mariyam nye kimöce neto kule amüt, kikoyat Mariyam yoto.
Nteye kimite cekto wuloto, kupunto pesyosyek ce cömekey Mariyam.
Yoto kucämnkey Mariyam werit poretyet, kunäm oŋnkulokyi sirok oŋnkömukontyi rapet nye omisye toka, omnye kipuryo kot kumite poroyinto koto nye mokuruy cekto om kotap toyek.
Kimite mesewek alake koronoto ce kikwokisyi komoy kuripe kecirekwa.
Kuco malayketap Mokoryontet ye kimite cekto; oŋnkukoci kukweny cekto komut woyintap lakweyetap Mokoryontet, yoto kumuyo koromun.
Ntene komwoci malayket cek kule, “Monte cemuye! Omnye osutwok ani lokoywek ce toponec cepo ŋerekwek ce mosukupoyit piko tokol.
Omnye kaceyiwok akwek yawut pesyoni Mokoryontet om moŋetap Tauti nye Kosopintet Kristo Yesu!
Kito nyi nye mosokäse akwek, mosonyoru lekwa nye rweru nye kocilokyi sirok; oŋnkyimukontyi rapet nye omisye toka.’’
Om yoto pakenke mosolim akwek luket nyewo nyepo malaykanik om torot kukostoy Yiyintet kumwowu kule,
“Kupoyit woyinto Yiyintet nye mite torot, oŋnkupoyit kalyet koret oko piko ce ŋerekyini cekto Yiyintet!’’
Nteyu kowo kunomen Malaykanik kupakakta cek kupecikey torot, kuŋalal Mesewek kumwocin nkit kule, “Akany cipe okoy cepunte Peselekem, wocekäs kiyitenyi kakwiyakay nyi kokuporwec Mokoryontet.’’
Yoto kunomen mesewek kusartakey lakwar okoy wokunyor Mariyam oko Yosep oko lekwet nye kocimukontyi rapet nye omisye toka.
Nteye kotoköse mesewek lekwet, kumwoci kutorci piko ŋalek tokol co kukumwoy Malayket ce nöme lekwanato.
Kukite piko tokol ŋalek ce kumwoci mesewek.
Ntene kusot Mariyam ŋalecato oŋnkuripe moyenyi.
Yoto kuweckey mesewek kupecikey kutumoti kukostoy Yiyintet om ŋalek tokol ce kilim oŋnkukäs cekto, omnye kiyu tukuk ce kikäs wule kikimwoytoci malayket.
Yoto ntowo kupunto pesyetap sisit, nye cewone lekwet cikoci cekure kaynet Yesu, kaynet nyo kikonu kumwoy malayket kutompo kot cesic neto.
Ntowo kupunto pesyosyekap Yosep oko Mariyam kwiy ntasimnyet nyo kimwowu Moses, oŋnkwiyita sakwet nye kiceŋetune asis korketap tomono, yoto kusut cek lekwet kuwo Yerusalem wocikoci Mokoryontet.
Kuyu wulo kicesilyo om ntarastinekap Mokoryontet kule, “Lekwa tokol nye poret oŋnkuwero nye kanyosyo kuyat moyetap kamet, misyini cikoci neto nyoto Mokoryontet.’’
Yoto kupa Yosep oko Mariyam wokukoyito mpo korosekwa kuyu wule cemoktoy om ntarastinekap Mokoryontet kule, “Cikoytoy swororok oyeny nto lekokap swororok oyeny.’’
Kimite citake nye kiminye Yerusalem nye kicekure kaynenyi Simiyon nye ki cito nye topon koromun nye kiyweye Yiyintet. Kimite neto kukonye pesyet nye cisope pikap Israel, oŋnkiponto Muyet Nyetilil.
Kikikoporci Muyet Nyetilil neto kule puryo kot kume kutompo kot kukäs Ŋapanet Mokoryontet nyo kicekurto.
Yoto kuntoci Muyet Nyetilil Simiyon kuco okoy kupun kotap Yiyintet orit, nteyu kowo kusut kwan oko kamet lekwet Yesu kuco kotap Yiyintet; sukuŋet ceyici ntasimnyet kuyu wulo moktoy ntarastinek.
Kunäm Simiyon lekwet kunäme yewuniyekyi oŋnkukasta Yiyintet kumwoy kule:
“Mokoryontet, yaste yawut mutworinteŋuŋ, kuwecikey om kalya, kuyu wulo kikurte nyi om ŋolyonteŋuŋ.
Omnye kakäs konyekwani nkit kosopoteŋuŋ,
kuyu wulo kiyiytoci taytap piko tokol,
oŋnkwek lakweyet nye kweŋnkyini lamek areŋuŋ, oŋnkwek woyinto nyepo pikuk pikap Israel.’’
Kukite kwan oko kamet ŋalek ce komwoy Simiyon ce nömekey oko lekwanato.

Yoto kusomnci Simiyon cekto kupeyok, oŋnkumwoci Mariyam kamet kule, “Kikwey Yiyintet lekwani kwek nyemo kwaranta, oŋnkusop piko ce caŋ om Israel, oŋnkwek neto pelutyet nye cone wule mite Yiyintet nye toye piko ce caŋ,
sukuŋet kuŋoŋ kuparta kasoteywekwa ce wuŋotin. Nto om wule mite nyi, mosukurut mukuleyŋuŋ rotwet nye ŋatip.’’
Kimite mpo korko nye workoyo nye cekure kaynenyi Anna, ceptap Panuel nyepo aretap mpo Aser nye kicimüt ye kikokoniyo kuwany kenyisyek tisap kume santenyi.

Yoto kopur nkit kumusuk okoy kwek cepyosya nye kiyosit koromun kuwany kenyisyek tomonwokik sisit ok amwan nye kipuryo kot kuŋete kupakakta kotap Yiyintet. Ntene kikwiyisyi yisyetap Yiyintet komoy oko pet; kikostoy oŋnkusome oŋnkukire omik.
Om yoto pakenke kuco tay oŋnkucec kukasta Yiyintet kuŋalal ŋalek ce nömekey oko lekwanato kumwoci piko tokol ce kikonye pesyet nye mokusope Yiyintet Yerusalem.
Nteyu kowo kuwany cekto kwiy tukuk tokol ce mwowu ntarastinekap Mokoryontet, kuweckey cek kupa moŋemwa Nasaret om koretap Kalilaya.
Kuner lekwet Yesu kunyor swamet oko ŋomnonet oŋnkukoci Yiyintet neto kupeyok.
Kipeti kwan oko kamet om kenyit ake tokol Yerusalem ye pesyetap sakwetap Keytayet.
Nteye kiponto Yesu kenyisyek taman ok oyeny, kupa cek tokol oko kamwa sakwet Yerusalem kuyu wule yunto sakwanato.
Nteyu kowo kupok pesyosyekap sakwet, kunomen cekto kupa ka, ntene kuŋetune werit Yesu Yerusalem nye kipuryo kot kunkete kwan oko kamet.
Kisote cekto kule tos mite Yesu luketap piko alak om panta. Kupa cekto pesyonoto kwimen; ntowo kwimen koret kucec cekto kucenye wule mite tilyonutekwa oko wule mite coronutekwa.
Ntene kipuryo kot kunyor. Yoto kuweckey kwan oko kamet kupa Yerusalem wokuceŋat Yesu.
Nteye kipesyetap somok kunyor cek Yesu kumite kotap Yiyintet, kukepur kwenutap konetikap Yutayek kulimntoy ŋalek cemwowu konetik, oŋnkutepe Yesu cekto teputek.
Kukite piko tokol ce kilime ŋomnonenyi oko wule kiwektoy ŋalek.
Nteye kotoköse kwan oko kamet Yesu kukite koromun, kumwoci kamet neto kule, “Yeyonyu! Omne seyiyec acek nyi kuyu nyi? Kucisot cemuye acek oko kon, oŋnkyecenyiŋ koromun.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cekto kule, “Omne sacenya ani akwek? Puryo kot oŋnket akwek kule misyino ani opur kotap Papamwani?’’
Ntene kipuryo, kot kusik kunket kwan oko kamet kule komwoy Yesu ŋolyo ne.
Yoto kunomen neto oko kamwa kuketitakey okoy kupunto Nasaret, oŋnkuwo wokuywey kamwa. Kunäme kamet ŋalecato moyenyi.
Kutosyikey Yesu kuner oŋnkuŋomit, oŋnkunyor cömisyet om wule mite Yiyintet oko wule mite piko.

Nto om kenyitap taman ok mut ye kipoytoyisyi Kinko Nyewo Taperiyo, kupoytoy Pontio Pilato koretap Yuteya, kupoytoy Erote koretap Kalilaya, kupoytoy mutakwam Filipo koretap Itureya oko koretap Tirakoniti, kupoytoy Lusaniya koretap Apilene.
Nto tisik cewoyec ku Anas oko Kayafa. Om pesyosyecoto kucontyi ŋolyontetap Yiyintet Yowana weritap Sakariya kumite kitela.
Yoto kuwesetote Yowana koret tokol nye lekite tapantap oyinetap Yortan, kumwoytoti kule, “Arenynkey ayaste miyotyonikwok, oŋnkyepatisanak, sukuŋet kukalyak Yiyintet miyotyonikwok.’’
Kuyu wulo kisilyo workoyontet Isaya om kitapunyi kule: “Kapole citake kitela, ‘Oyiytoci Mokoryontet arenyi, asat kurotakay arenyi nye mosukupunte!
Misyini alakan wulyo tokol wule mite roroŋisyek; oŋnkyicat lakomosyek oko tulonok tokol. Cecul kuculokis orustunwek tokol co musotin.
Mosukukäs pikap koret tokol kosopotetap Yiyintet.’ ’’
Yoto kukwa piko ce caŋ wule mite Yowana kule kupatisanec, kumwoci neto cek kule, “Akwek erenocu! Ŋo nye kwesowok kule omweye nyerunotetap Yiyintet nye karik kuco?

Kunyo ayiy tukuk ce sukupor kule kwarenynkey akwek ayaste miyotyonikwok, ntene monte cecec ceŋalal omwowu kule, ‘Ceponte Apram nye kukonyo!’ Omnye komwowok ani kule, muce Yiyintet kunäm rwontocu oŋnkuwec kwici Apram lekok.
Kunyo kocenömnci oywet kulekite kirintonokap ketik; nto ket ake tokol nyo puryo kot kwiye omik ce toponec mosiceyep nyo kulul oŋnkyewirci mata orit.’’
Kutepe piko Yowana kule, “Kunyo mokyiy ne acek yawut?’’
Kuwekyi kumwoci kule, “Ci tokol nye ponto sirok oyeny, misyini kukoci cito nyo puryo kot kuponto, mpo cito nyo ponto omik misyini kupciyta kuyunyoto.’’
Yoto kukwa mpo piko alak co ruruce mosoret kwocepatisan, oŋnkutepe cek Yowana kule, “Konetintet mokyiy ne acek?’’
Kumwoci Yowana cekto kule, “Monte ciruruc mosoret kutil co kiciyoyec.’’
Kutepe sikarek alak neto kule, “Nto acek, mokyiy ne?’’ Kumwoci co kule, “Monte cinumune citake tokol pesan om swama, nto om aret nyepo mwiynan; roke kuyemak musyaremwoŋ.’’
Nteyu kimite piko tokol kukonye ŋalek ce mokwiyokis kutintentos om kasoteywekwa om ŋalekap Yowana, kule pesyet ake neto kunye Ŋapanet.

Yoto kumwoci Yowana piko tokol kule, “Opotisonenok ani peko, ntene coni om letumwani citake nyewo nye ponto swamet kupëlo ani, nye puryo kot kumisyino ani atyac porokap kweyonikyi. Neto nyoto nye mosukupatisanenak akwek Muyet Nyetilil oko mata.
Pontonu neto sweswet nye kanäme yewuniyekyi; nye mokusese nkanuk oŋnkururukyi nkanuk cokenikyi nto moriryek kupele co mata nye momise!’’
Wanak oko ŋalecutecu, kumwoy Yowana ŋalek alak ce caŋ kurorci piko lokoywek ce toponec.
Yoto kupolyi Yowana potisonintet poytoyintet Erote om ŋalek ce nömekey oko Erotiya korketap mutakwam nye kimüt Erote, oko om ŋalek alak ce caŋ cepo ŋokis ce kikwiy Erote.
Yoto kutosyi Erote miyotyet ake omnye kinäm Yowana oŋnkukerta mopusi.
Nteyu kowo cepatisan piko tokol, yoto cepatisan mpo Yesu. Nteye kimite Yesu kusome, kuyatakay wulin po torot,
kuco kurekyi neto Muyet Nyetilil nye kerkey porto kuyu swarar. Kucone kurset torot kumwoy kule, “Nyi kunye yiku Werimwani camanet, nye oŋerekyiŋ ani nyi koromun.’’
Kucec Yesu kwiyis yisyenyi kuponto kenyisyek ce puntoy sosom; Cisote kule neto kunye weritap Yosep nye ki weritap Eri,
weritap Matati, weritap Lefi, weritap Merek, weritap Yanai, weritap Yosep,
weritap Matatiya, weritap Amos, weritap Naum, weritap Esil, weritap Nakay,
weritap Masati, weritap Matatiya, weritap Semeyin, weritap Yosek, weritap Yota,
weritap Yowanan, weritap Resa, weritap Serupapel, weritap Salatiyeta, weritap Neri,
weritap Meleci, weritap Atti, weritap Kosma, weritap Elmatam, weritap Eri,
weritap Yoswa, weritap Eriesa, weritap Yorim, weritap Mata, weritap Lefi,
weritap Simiyon, weritap Yuta, weritap Yosep, weritap Yonam, weritap Eliyakim,
weritap Meleya, weritap Menna, weritap Matasa, weritap Nasan, weritap Tauti,
weritap Yese, weritap Opet, weritap Poas, weritap Solomon, weritap Nasyon,
weritap Aminatap, weritap Atamin, weritap Arin, weritap Eseron, weritap Peres, weritap Yuta,
weritap Yakopo, weritap Isaka, weritap Apram, weritap Tera, weritap Nakor,
weritap Seruk, weritap Reyu, weritap Pelek, weritap Eper, weritap Syella,
weritap Kanan, weritap Arapasat, weritap Syem, weritap Nuwa, weritap Lamek,
weritap Misusera, weritap Enok, weritap Yaret, weritap Makalalel, weritap Kanan,
weritap Enos, weritap Sesi, weritap Atam, weritap Yiyintet.
Kuwecekey Yesu oyinetap Yortan kukonyor swametap Muyet Nyetilil, nye kisut neto okoy kupunto kitela.
Kuwany om wuloto pesyosyek artam, nteye kimite wuloto kusyem kulot Setani nyewo nyepo oyik neto. Kipuryo kiy nye kyome kuwany pesyosyecoto tokol, nteyu kowo kuwany kwam neto rupet.
Yoto kumwoci Setaninato neto kule, “Ye yiku nyi Weritap Yiyintet, mwoci panyi rwontocu kuweckey kwek mukatya.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Puryo kot kusope cito mukatya pate nkit!’ ’’
Yoto kusut Setaninato Yesu kuwo parak, oŋnkuporci lakwar poytoyisyonikap koret tokol kumukul,
oŋnkumwoci kule, “Mosokoniŋ ani nyi woyinto nyi oko kamukeywek payte tukucu tokol, omnye kicekono ani tokol kunyo omuci okoci ci nye kacäm ani;
Kunyo ye kekutumwo ani nyi mosukwek cekuk cutecu tokol.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Misyini kutuŋnkyi say Mokoryontet Yiyinteŋuŋ oŋnkiyici neto yisyet nkit pate!’ ’’

Kusut yec oyinoto cekwol yitik Yesu okoy Yerusalem, oŋnkumwoci kuyoŋe kusurutap kotap Yiyintet ye koy koromun, oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ye yiku nyi Weritap Yiyintet, wirtekey panyi kuceke yu okoy wepir ŋony;
omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Mosukumwoci Yiyintet malaykanikyi kukwa kwokutaciŋ nyi.’
Oko yec kule, ‘Mosukutaciŋ om yewuniyekwa mente kot kuryac kerenkokuk rwantet.’ ’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Mente kot asyem alotu Mokoryontet Yiyinteŋuŋ’ ’’
Nteyu kowo kusyem kulot Setani nyewo nyepo oyik Yesu okoy kuwany; kwasta okoy pesyet ake.
Yoto kuweckey Yesu kuco Kalilaya kuponto swametap Muyet Nyetilil. Kupunte lokoywek ce nöme neto koronoto tokol.
Kunetisye Yesu korikapkokwonikwa om wuloto, kucämnta piko tokol ŋalekap Yesu.
Kuwo Yesu okoy kupunto Nasaret wule kinere, nto kuyu wule kiyunto kopur nyi, kuwo ye kipesyetap Sapat okoy kotapkok. Nteye kimite orit, kuŋet kuyo kule asuman silutekap Yiyintet.
Yoto cikoci kitaputap workoyontet Isaya, kuŋany kitaput okoy kunyor ye kicesil kule:

“Oponte ani Muyetap Mokoryontet, omnye kaŋape ani mwayita saŋet omwoci pononik lokoywek ce toponec. Kweyokwo ani saŋet omwoci piko co rototin pesyet nye cityoktoy cekto, oko ye mosukukäste piko co koryotin, oŋnkyityakta piko co kicinyalil kupecikey,
oŋnkomwowu oporu kenyit nye mosukusope Mokoryontet pikyi.’’
Yoto kuker Yesu kitaput oŋnkuketyi cito nye ripe, oŋnkupur ŋony; kuwec konyekwa piko tokol ce kimite kotapkok oŋnkukäs Yesu topon.
Yoto kuwec Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Pesyoni ye kakwitita kupoyit manta ŋalecu silotin cu kalim akwek om yitikwok.’’
Kucämnta oŋnkukite piko tokol ŋalekyi ce toponec ce toloyec ce kiŋalale kutinyi. Kumwoy picoto kule, “Puryo kot ku weritap Yosep nyitenyi?’’

Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Oŋnket kule mosomwowo ani akwek tyonkoconi kule, ‘Cepsakityantet, sopkey nyi nkit!’ Oŋnkomwowu yec kule, ‘Yiy nyi yec om wuli po koreŋuŋ tukuk co kicelim acek kule kiyokis om Kapernaum.’
Kumwoy Yesu kule, komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, ‘Puryo workoyo nye cecöme om korenyi.
Cinket kule po manta ŋalek kule kimite musukik ce caŋ om Israel om pesyosyekap Eriya, yo kipuryo kot kumite ropta koret tokol kuwany kenyisyek somok ok orok lö, yoto kunäm rupet koret tokol.
Ntene kipuryo kot ciyokto Eriya om pesyosyecoto kuwo wule mite akenke om musukik coto, ntene kiciyokto kuwo pate wule mite musuk akenke nyepo Sarepta om koretap Siton.
Kimite mpo yec pikap mutyenkenik ce caŋ Israel om pesyosyek ce kipo workoyontet Elisya, ntene puryo mpo akenke nye kicisop, tos pate Naman nyepo koretap Siriya.’ ’’
Yoto kunyer koromun piko tokol ce kimite kotapkok orit yu kowo kulim ŋalecato komwoy Yesu.
Kuŋetyo cekto oŋnkunäm Yesu kocut kuŋete moŋonoto oŋnkukwer okoy kupunto tulwet parak nye kicetec moŋonoto kule wocitulye kuŋirte lakam.
Ntene kupunte neto yewuniyekwa oŋnkuwecikey arenyi ake.
Kurekto Yesu kuwo okoy kupunto Kapernaum moŋet nyepo Kalilaya, yoto kunet piko ye kipesyetap Sapat.
Ntene kukite piko konetisyenyi, omnye kinet kumwoy ŋalek ce kinyikisec koromun, oŋnku ŋalek ceponto kamukeywek.
Kimite yoto po kotapkok orit citake nye kiponto oyik ce miyotec, yoto kupol cicoto koromun om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule,
“Ye! Mokenec acek ne nyi Yesu nyepo Nasaret? Keco nyi kule cayarantec acek? Oŋnketiŋ ani nyi kule yiku nyi ŋo: Yiku Nyi Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet.’’
Kupolyi Yesu oyinot kumwoci kule, “Sis! Ŋete cito.’’ Yoto kumilyi oyinoto cicoto ŋony om taytap piko tokol, oŋnkuŋet kuwete cicoto nye kipuryo kot kwiye kiy mpo kisic.
Kukite piko tokol koromun, oŋnkutepekey cekto nkit kumwoy kule, “Ŋolyo ne nyi mwowu cici? Omnye polyini oyik ce miyotec om kamukeywek oko swamet okoy kumwey oyik. ’’
Yoto kutisto ŋalekap Yesu kupunte koret tokol nye lekite koronoto.
Kuŋete Yesu kotapkok oŋnkuwo okoy kupunto kotap Simiyon. Wokunyor cepyosyetap pikoy nyepo Simon kumnyone yeset nyewo koromun. Kusom piko Yesu kule kukalya neto.
Kuwo Yesu oŋnkuyoŋe yepo komostap cepyosyanato, oŋnkukwet yeset, yoto kuwo yeset, kuŋet neto lakwar oŋnkucec kwici cekto yisyonutek.
Nteye kimite kurortoy asista, kusut piko pikwa ce kimnyontos porwonik wok tokol kukwa wule mite Yesu, kukemer Yesu yewuniyekyi metitap ci tokol nye kimnyone; kusopco cekto tokol.
Kuŋetye oyik piko alak ce caŋ, kupoloti kumwowu kule, “Yiku nyi Weritap Yiyintet!’’ Kupolyi Yesu oyicoto oŋnkuyete mente kuŋalal, omnye kinkete oyik kule Yesu kunye Ŋapanet.

Nto kayec koret pate, kunomen Yesu kuwo surukwenet wule momite piko, ntene kucec piko ce caŋ kuceŋat neto okoy wokunyor, nteye kotonyoru, kusyem kule ceyete neto mente kot kuwo wulyo ake kupakakta cekto.
Ntene kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Misyino ani awo wamwayte lokoywek ce toponec cepo Yiyintet mpo moŋosyek alak, omnye kiyokwani Yiyintet comwowu ŋalecutecu.’’
Yoto kumwayte Yesu ŋalek korikapkok cepo Yuteya.
Nteyu kimite piko ce caŋ kukicekey kumut Yesu kule celim ŋolyontetap Yiyintet, kimite yoto Yesu kukeyoŋe tapantap tampayayetap Kenesaret.
Kukäs Yesu om yoto rapanik oyeny ce kimite tampayayet tapan ce kapakakta piko co nöme purpurunek oŋnkupa wokusit porokap purpurunek co cenömisye.
Kulany Yesu rapet akenke nyepo Simon, oŋnkusom kumwoci Simon kutorta rapet kunata kusic kuwo tampayayet. Yoto kupure Yesu rapanato oŋnkunet piko.
Nteyu kowo kuŋalal kot kuwany, kumwoci Yesu Simon kule, “Torte rapet kuwo peko kwen, oŋnkikoci nyi oko piko co konömisyi tokol porokwok peko orit onömisye.’’
Kuwekyi Simon kumwoci Yesu kule, “Mokoryontet, kukyiyisye om swama komowut tokol; ntene puryo kot cimuc kot cenäm kiy, ntene om ŋolyonteŋuŋ nye kemwowu, mosokoci porok peko orit.’’
Yoto kwiy cek kuyunyoto kukoci porok peko orit; kunäm yoto purpurunek ce caŋ koromun okoy kumac kuŋetyo porok.

Yoto kukur cekto kuwus nömik alak ce kinömisyi tokol ce kimite rapet ake kule kukwa kwokukalya, kukwa cut, kwokonum cek purpurunek ce caŋ koromun kunyit raposyek tukway kot kumac kotompultokey kowut peko orit.
Nteye kotoköse Simon Petero ŋalek coto keyokis, koputyi kukutuŋe kerenkokap Yesu oŋnkumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet wecikey, omnye oyiku ani ci nye miyat.’’
Omnye kikite Simon oko piko co kipontokey coŋintap purpurunek ce caŋ ce kicenäm.

Kuyuyit nyoto kukite mpecek Yakopo oko Yowana werikap Sepetayo ce kinömikap purpurunek ce kipontokey oko Simon. Kumwoci Yesu Simon kule, “Mente omuy; kuceke yawut pesyoni meseyeku nyi roponintet nye kweru piko.’’
Yoto kusut cekto raposyekwa okoy kupunto tampayayet tapan, oŋnkupakakta tukuk tokol, oŋnkunomen kunam kupetakey Yesu.

Nteye kimite Yesu pesyet ake moŋet ake, kimite moŋonoto citake nye kunäm mutyenkenik koromun, nteye kotoköse cicoto Yesu, kuputyi ŋony kukutuŋnkyi oŋnkusom kumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, ye kecäm nyi nkit, muci sopo ani!’’
Kuyito Yesu yewunyi oŋnkunäm cicoto, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Omöce ani; kunyo sop nyolu.’’ Kusopco om yoto pakenke mutyenkenik ce kiponto cicoto.

Kunkolontyi Yesu kumwoci cicoto kule, “Mente kot omwoci citake tokol ŋalecu, ntene iwo weporcikey tisintet, nto kuyu ŋalek ce nöme kosopeŋuŋ, iwo wekoyite korosyontet kuyu wule kimwayta Moses, sukuŋet porci ci tokol kule kwesop nyi.’’
Ntene kutosyikey kutisto lokoywecoto po Yesu, koruruckey piko ce caŋ oŋnkukwa kwokulimnta ŋalekyi oŋnkyisopci cekto porwonikwa.
Ntene kikweyekey Yesu kwine nkit om pesyosyek alak oŋnkuwo surukwenet wokusom.

Kimite Yesu kunetisyi pesyet ake, nto om yoto kimite kukepur Farasayek oko konetikap ntarastinek ce kikwone moŋosyekap Kalilaya oko Yuteya oko Yerusalem. Kiponto Yesu yoto swametap Mokoryontet nye kisopse.
Yoto kusutune piko alake kwiririt citake nye kipok kerenkok. Kusyem picoto kule cekonop cicoto kuwo okoy kupunto taytap Yesu.
Ntowo kupotyi cek aret nye kepunte omnye kicaŋ piko, kunäm kulaŋnte okoy koto kisyek, oŋnkuput kisyekutap koto onŋkopunte cicoto kumite kwiririt okoy kupunto kwenutap piko om yepo taytap Yesu.
Ntowo kukäs Yesu koyenetap picoto, kumwoy kule, “Corwenyu, kacikalyiŋ nyi miyotyonikuk.’’
Yoto kucec kuŋalal kwicek nkit konetikap ntarastinek oko Farasayek kumwoy kule, “Ŋo cici ŋolole ŋal ce nyile Yiyintet kuyu nyi! Ŋo yec nye muce kukalya miyotyonik nye puryo kot ku Yiyintet nkit!’’
Kunket Yesu kasoteywek ce kimite cekto kusote; kuwekyi kumwoci kule, “Omne sasot akwek ŋalek ceyuco otintentyine om kasoteywekwok?
Oŋnkono nye lekite, cemwoy kule, ‘Kacikalyiŋ miyotyonikuk’. Nto ye kocemwoy kule, ‘Ŋet wesetote?’
Kunyo moporwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule ponto Weritap cito kamukeywek om koret kukalya miyotyonik.’’ Yoto kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Ŋet yony, oŋnkitor kwiririŋuŋ nomen iwo ka!’’
Om yoto pakenke kuŋet cicoto kuyo om konyekap piko tokol, oŋnkutor kinyi nyo korwoye oŋnkuwecikey ka; kukostoti Yiyintet.
Kukite piko tokol ce kimite yoto koromun! Oŋnkumuyo kukasta cek Yiyintet kumwoy kule, “Kacekäs pesyoni ŋalek cepo kakitat!’’
Om letutap coto, kunomen Yesu kuwo okoy wokunyor korurukintetap mosoret nye cekure Lefi kukepur konyi nye cekweye mosoret, kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Nama cepetekey oko ani.’’
Yoto kuŋet Lefi kupakakta tukuk tokol oŋnkunomen kunam kupetakey Yesu.
Yoto kwici Lefi Yesu sakwet nyewo koromun om kanyi, kimite yoto piko ce caŋ co ruruce mosoret oko piko alak kukepur tokol wanak.
Kuŋunyŋuny Farasayek oko konetikwa cepo ntarastinek om wule mite konomikap Yesu kumwoy kule, “Omne soyomisye oŋnkoyesye akwek oko pic ce ruruce musoro, oko pic ce kicetay?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cekto kule, “Puryo kot kumöce piko ce sopcotin cepsakityantet, ntene piko ce mnyontos ce möce.
Kipuryo kot aco ani kule cokur piko ce toponec, ntene kyaco kule sukuŋet kurenynkey piko co ponto miyotyonik.’’
Kumwoci piko alake Yesu kule, “Kire omik om pesyosyek alak oŋnkusome konomikap Yowana, mpo konomik cepo Farasayek kwiye kuyunyoto, ntene omne sukwomisyi oŋnkuyesyo konomikukyi?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cekto kule, “Omuci akwek omwoci pikap sakwet kule kukir omik ye tokupontokey cek cito nyo kemütisyi? Puryo kot kuyunyo!
Mosukupunto pesyet nye mocipesyo cek oko cito nyo kemütisyi, kunyo om pesyosyecoto ye mosukukiris cekto omik.’’

Kumwoci Yesu cekto tyonkoconi kule, “Puryo ci nye poce yokwontet kisic kopukune siret nyelel oŋnkunopci siret nye yoswak, omnye ye kakwiy neto kuyunyoto, mosukupac siret nyelel kunyor koŋnta, nto siret nyelel nyo kocenopci kupuryo kot kunyolcintos oko siret nyo yoswaket.
Puryo mpo ci nye roŋnkyini komek ce mwonec wonkinek ce yoswak, omnye ye kakwiy kuyunyoto, kumuce finyonik ce mwonec kuyeyi wonkinek ce yoswak, kutumntokey finyonik kupa wuy oŋnkuyeyo kworon wonkinek.
Möce finyonik ce mwonec ceroŋnkyi wonkinek ce lelac.
Puryo mpo ci nye ye kiye finyonik ce rucwok nye möce kule nto aye finyonik ce mwonec ce kururyo, omnye mwowu kule toponec finyonik co rucwok.’’
Nteye kipesyetap Sapat kuwo Yesu kupunte mparosyekap nkanuk, yoto kuputot konomikyi nkanuk oŋnkupirir kwam.
Kumwoci Farasayek alake konomik kule, “Omne sayiy akwek om pesyetap Sapat yisyet nye puryo kot kucöme ntarastinekyo?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cekto kule, “Tompo kot asuman akwek ŋalek cek kikwiy Tauti oko pikyi yo kikwome cek rupet?

Kiwut neto kotap Yiyintet oŋnkunum mukatyantet nye kicesoci kupoyit Yiyintet, oŋnkwam oko pikyi co kipontokey, ntene kipuryo kot kucömncini ntarastit ci ake tokol kwam, tisik pate nkit ce kicecömncini.’’
Kutosyi Yesu kumwoy kule, “Weritap cito kunye Mokoryontetap Sapat.’’
Nteye kipesyetap Sapatit ake, kuwo Yesu okoy kotapkok oŋnkunetis, kimite koyoto orit citake nye kime yewutap tay.
Yoto kurip Farasayek oko konetikap ntarastinek kule cekäs oŋnkusopsi Yesu ye pesyetap Sapat, sukuŋet cekto kuwosontyi.
Ntene kunket Yesu kasoteywekwa, kumwoci cicoto kime yewut kule, “Ŋet yony oŋnkico ceyoŋe yu potay’’ Kuŋet cicoto oŋnkuyoŋe yoto.
Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Otepenok akwek kule, cömwec acek ntarastinekyo kyiy ne ye pesyetap Sapat? Cikalya nto ciwurta? Cisop sopontap cito nto cipot?’’
Kukäskästa Yesu kukäs cekto tokol, oŋnkumwoci cicoto kime yewut kule, “Yite yewuŋuŋ.’’ Kwiy cicoto kuyunyoto, kusop yewunyi kuyu wule kiyunto kunyo.
Ntene kunerekis cek koromun, oŋnkucec kuŋalale nkit kito nye mokwiye Yesu.
Om pesyosyecoto kuwo Yesu kulaŋnta lakamet parak wokusom; kuwany kwomowunoto tokol kusome Yiyintet.
Nteyu kowo kuyec koret, kukur konomikyi kukwa ye kimite neto, oŋnkukwey taman ok oyeny om coto oŋnkutoci kaynet kukure kiyokik.
Simon nye kimulyi cekure Petero, oko mutakwam Antereya, oko Yakopo, oko Yowana, oko Filipo, oko Paturumayo,
oko Matayo oko Tomas, oko Yakopo weritap Alufayo, oko Simon nye kicekure nyikanet nye poryecini korenyi,
Yuta weritap Yakopo, oko Yuta Isikaryoti nyo kiweckey kwek ŋomntoyin.

Kurekune Yesu lakam wanak oko konomikyi, kuco okoy cokuyoŋe yepo kewet nye topon. Kimite yoto konomik ce caŋ oko piko ce caŋ koromun ce kikwone koretap Yuteya tokol oko Yerusalem, oko ce kikwone tapantap ruretyet om Tiro oko Siton.
Cekikwa kule kwocelimnte ŋalekyi oŋnkyisopci porwonikwa. Kukwa mpecek piko ce kikikutaŋany oyik ce miyotec, cisop cek tokol.
Kusyem piko tokol kule cetiny Yesu, omnye kicone swamet wule mite neto oŋnkusop cekto tokol.
Kukäs Yesu konomikyi oŋnkumwoci kule: “Oponte akwek pononik kupeyoy, omnye nyimwoŋ poytoyisyetap Yiyintet!
Oponte akwek kupeyoy co omok yawut rupet: omnye koyin cipiyonyok! Oponte akwek kupeyoy co orirtosi yawut: omnye mosorori koyin!
“Oponte akwek kupeyoy ye kasenkerak piko oŋnkukwetak, oŋnkucupok kumwowok kule, oyiku oyi, omnye kocäm Weritap Cito!
Aŋerec om pesyonoto, oŋnkotum om ŋerekwek omnye komwowok ani akwek kule coŋec kupeyokwok om wulin po torot. Omnye kikwicini mpo kukomwa workoyik ŋalek ceyucoto.
“Ntene Oyey! Omite akwek kwapi co oyiku mokoren yawut, omnye kiyemak ŋerekwek!
“Oyey! Omite akwek kwapi co oyiku piyoŋotin yawut, omnye mosukwamak rupet! Oyey! Omite akwek kwapi co ororye yawut, Omnye mosomesye oŋnkorirye.
“Oyey! Omite akwek kwapi co ŋololenok piko topon. Omnye kikwici mpo kukomwa ŋalek ceyucutecu workoyik co kimwiynot.
“Ntene komwowok ani akwek cu olime ŋalekwani yawut kule, ocäm punikwok, oŋnkoyici tukuk ce toponec piko tokol co senkerok.
Osomnci kupeyok piko co cupok kurumncok akwek, oŋnkosomnci piko co toŋonyok akwek.
Ye kasyeciŋ citake kwarmatut ake wekyi kusyec mpo kwarmatut ake. Ye kosut citake kotiŋun koci kusut mpo satit.
Koci ci tokol kiy nye kosomiŋ, ntene mente atepe cicoto kuketuŋ tukuk coto kosut.
Oyici piko tokol kuyu wule omoktoy akwek kule ntoyiwok akwek picoto.
“Nteye kocäm akwek pate piko co cömok akwek, asot akwek kule ceponte kupeyoy ne? Omnye mpo piko co ponto miyotyonik kucöme mpecek piko co cöme cekto!
Nteye koyici akwek tukuk ce toponec piko co yiwok akwek tukuk ce toponec, asot akwek kule ceponte kupeyoy ne? Omnye mpo piko co ponto miyotyonik kwiye mpecek kuyunyoto.

Nteye kopesentyi akwek pate piko co oŋnketi kule mosukuketwec kuyokwec tukukyo, asot akwek kule ceponte kupeyoy ne? Omnye mpo piko co miyotec kupesentyini piko co miyotec kunkete kule ceketwec ceyokwec tukukyo!

Ntene ocäm punikwok, oyici tukuk ce toponec; opesente ntene monte osotyi kule ceyokwec om letut, omnye mosonyoru kupeyok ce cäŋ oŋnkoyiku lekokap Yiyintet nyewo nyepo torot koromun, Omnye tala Yiyintet om wule mite piko tokol co puryo kot kukostoyisyi oko piko co miyotec.
Oyiku pic ce ponto poypoyet kuyu Papamwoŋ nye ponto poypoyet.’’

“Monte cemutyi piko alak musanku, mpo akwek kupuryo kot kumutwok Yiyintet koyin musanku. Monte cemutyi piko alak kulot musanku, mpo akwek kupuryo kot cemutwok koyin kulotak musanku. Okalye sukuŋet koyin kukalyak mpo akwek Yiyintet.

Okoyite sukuŋet koyin cekonok mpo akwek, mosonyoru akwek koyoyeketap sweswet nye topon nye kiciruruŋnkyi okoy kuwastakey; omnye koyoyeket nyo oyoyekyini akwek piko alak, kunyoto koyoyeket nye koyin ciyoyekwok mpo akwek.’’
Kumwoci Yesu cekto yec tyonkoconi kule, “Muce pa cito nye korat kuretot citake nye korat? Puryo kot kosucini tukway mwenet?
Puryo kot kupële cito nyo cinete cito nyo netisyi, ntene ci tokol nyo cinete ye kacinet okoy kunket mosukukerkeyit neto oko konetintenyi.
“Kunyo omne seköse nyi pertet nye kisic nye mite koŋntap yeyaŋuŋ, oŋnkupuryo kot muci kot käs musukyet nye mite koŋnta nyeŋuŋ nkit?

Muci nyi kulene mwoci yeyaŋuŋ kule, ‘Yeya, kany onumuŋ ani pertet nye mite koŋnta nyeŋuŋ oŋnkurok kupuryo muci nyi kot käs musukyet nyo mite koŋnta nyeŋun nkit? Ye, koperperintoni! Nyosye numu kunyo musukyet nyo mite koŋnta nyeŋuŋ nkit, siŋet käste topon semuc numu pertet nyo mite koŋntap yeyaŋuŋ.’ ’’
“Omnye puryo ket nye topon nye muce kot kwiy omik ce miyotec, oŋnkupuryo yec mpo ket nye miyat nye muce kot kwiy omik ce toponec.
Cinkete ket ake tokol omikyi ce yiye; omnye puryo kot komuce piko kupute mokoyek ketik ce ponto kotok, nto muce ra kupute komolik ketik ce ponto kotok?

Numu cito nye topon toponiyet kucone konorutyenyi nye nye topon nye mite mukuleynyi, nto cito nye miyat kunum miyotyet kucone konorutyenyi nye miyat nye mite mukuleynyi, omnye ŋolole kutitap cito ŋalek tokol ce nyitotin mukuleynyi.’’
“Omne sokureno ani akwek, ‘Mokoryontet, Mokoryontet,’ oŋnkurok kupuryo kot oyiye ŋalek ce omwowok ani akwek?
Mosoporwok ani wule yunto cito nye coni wule omite oŋnkulim ŋalekwani oŋnkwiy kurup.
Kerkey nyo oko ci nye tece koto kupal kuwo ŋony koromun oŋnkutuci topon, nteye keyin mokotekap oyinet oŋnkurotyi koyoto om swama kupuryo kot kumuce kutyem omnye kicetec topon.

Nto ci nye kalim ŋalekwani oŋnkupuryo kot kwiy kiy, kukerkey nyo oko ci nye tece koto yepo ntapca oŋnkupuryo kot kutec topon kupal kuwo ŋony, kurotyi oyinet koyoto om swama kulul lakwar, nto luletap koyoto kululot nyewo koromun.’’
Nteyu kowo kuwany Yesu kumwoci piko ŋalecutecu tokol, kunomen kuwo Kapernaum.
Kimite wuloto citake nyewo nyepo sikarek nye kiponto mutworintenyi nye kicöme koromun. Kimnyone nye kikasat koromun nye karik kume mutworintonoto.
Ntowo kulim cicoto kinyewo nyepo sikarek ŋalek ce nöme Yesu, kuyokto poyikap Yutayek alak kupa wokumwoci Yesu kuco cokusop mutworintenyi.
Yoto kukwa poyikap Yutayek okoy kupun wule mite Yesu, oŋnkusaysay koromun kumwoci kule, “Misyini yici neto kuyunyoto, roke neto kunyor,
omnye cöme pikyacek, oŋnku neto nye kitekwec acek kotapkok.’’

Yoto kunomen Yesu kupetakey wanak oko cekto, ntowo kurikta koyoto, kuyok nyewo nyepo sikarek coronutekyi kwokumwoci Yesu kule, “Mokoryontet, mente ayimnkey omnye oyiku ani ci nye puryo kot kumisyiniŋ nyi ico cewut komwani.
Kunyo puryo kot kumisyo ani aco wule mite nyi; mwowu pate ŋolyo mosukusop mutworintemwani.

Omnye oyiku mpo ani ci nye cepoytoy, oŋnkoponte sikarek ce opoytoy ani, omwocini ake kule, ‘Iwo’, kuwo, nto ake omwoci kule, ‘Co’, kuco, nto mutworintemwani omwoci kule, ‘Yiy kiyi’, kwiye kuyunyoto.’’

Nteyu kowo kulim Yesu coto, kukite ŋalekap cicoto koromun, oŋnkumwoci piko ce kirupe neto kule, “Komwowok ani akwek kule, nka mpo om Israel tokol kumukul; tompo kot anyoru ani ci nye ponto koyenot nyewo kuyunyi.’’
Ntowo kuweckey piko co kociyoku kupa okoy koyoto, wokunyor kosop mutworintetkey.
Nto om letut kuminiŋ, kunomen Yesu kuwo okoy kupunto moŋet nye cekure Nain. Kiwetoykey neto yoto konomikyi oko piko ce caŋ.
Nteyu kowo kupunto kurketap moŋet kutuye piko ce sutu cito nye kame, nyoto kunye kiwero akenke pate nyepo korko nye musuk. Kipontokey korkonoto piko ce ce caŋ cepo moŋonoto.
Ntowo kukäs Mokoryontet korkonoto, kurire oŋnkumwoci kule, “Mente tarir.’’
Yoto kunokyi Yesu kulekityi oŋnkunäm kito nye kicesute cito, yoto kuyoŋ piko ce kisute, kumwoy Yesu kule, “Oyiperyontoni! Komwowuŋ kule, Ŋet yony!’’
Kuŋet cicoto kikime kopur ŋony oŋnkucec kuŋalal, kunäm Yesu oŋnkukoci kamet lekwenyi.
Yoto kokite oŋnkumuyo piko tokol, oŋnkukasta cekto Yiyintet kumwoy kule, “Kotokune kwenunyo workoyonto nyewo koromun!’’
Kutisto lokoywecutecu po Yesu om koretap Yuteya tokol oko korosyek ce lekite wuloto.
Kumwoci konomikyi Yowana ŋalecutecu tokol. Yoto kukur Yowana konomikyi oyeny,
oŋnkuyokto kupa wule mite Mokoryontet wokutepe kule, “Nyi neto cito mosukuco nto cekany acek citake?’’
Nteyu kowo kukwa picoto okoy kupun wule mite Yesu; kwokumwoy kule “Keyokwec acek Yowana potisonintet wule mite nyi kutep kule, ‘Nyi neto cito nyo mosukuco nto cekany acek citake.’ ’’
Yoto pakenke kusop Yesu piko ce caŋ ce kiponto porwonik, ce kisyen, oko ce kiponto oyik ce miyotec, oŋnkuŋany konyek kukästa piko ce caŋ ce kikoryo.

Kuwekyikey Yesu pikap Yowana oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ape womwoci Yowana ŋalek tokol ce kokäs oŋnkolim akwek: Akäs pa, köstoy piko ce kikoryo, pesetoti piko ce kimwolyos, kocisop piko ce kuponto mutyenkenik, limntoy piko ce kikimiŋitu, kokotutune met piko ce kikipok, oŋnkyemwocini pononik lokoywek ce toponec.
Ntene ŋerekat kuponto kupeyoy ci tokol nye puryo kot kunyoruneno ani kanokut.’’
Nto om letut yu kowo kupecikey piko co kiyoku Yowana, kumwoci Yesu piko ŋalek ce nömekey oko Yowana kule, “Kyopeti akwek Kitela kule wocekäs ne? Rostit nye kitimtime yomet? Puryo kot kuyunyo!

Ntene kyopeti akwek kule wocekäs ne? Ci nye kelac sirok ce toponec ce kintus? Cinkete kule piko co loce sirok ce toponec ce cikite oŋnkuponto soponto nyepo ŋerekwek kuminye piko coto korikap mokorenik!
Ntene omwowo ani pa, kyopeti akwek kule wocekäs ne? Workoyo? Yunyoto manta, komwowok ani kule kyokäs akwek yoto ci nye pële workoyo.
Omnye neto nyoto nyo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet ŋalek ce nöme neto kule: ‘Akäs pa, oyoku ani kiyokitemwani kuntowuŋ nyi, Nye mosukusat areŋuŋ om tayŋuŋyi.’ ’’
Kutosyi Yesu kumwoy kule, “Komwowok ani kule, om piko tokol ce kiyi koruk, puryo mpo akenke nyewo kupël Yowana. Ntene nye miniŋ om poytoyisyetap Yiyintet kunye nyewo nyoto kupël neto.’’
Nteyu kowo kulim ŋalecato piko tokol oko korurukikap mosoret, kukasta cekto kucämnta toponiyetap Yiyintet, omnye kikicäm oŋnkyepatisan cek om potisonisyetap Yowana.
Ntene kutay Farasayek oko konetikap ntarastinek ŋalek ce möce Yiyintet om wule mite cek, omnye kipuryo kot kucäm kupatisan Yowana cekto.
Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Moyuyite ne ani yawut pikap pesyosyecu? Kerkey oko kiy ne?
Kerkey oko lekoy ce kepure yepo motepet sukupole kukurcinikey kumwowu kule: ‘Kicekutwok akwek kurerunek, ntene atay akwek motum! Kicerirye acek kyam mnyat, ntene atay akwek morirye omesye!’
Omnye kico Yowana potisonintet, oŋnkukir omik nye puryo kot kwomisyi oŋnkupuryo kot kuye finyonik, omwowu akwek kule, ‘Ponto oyinot!’
Kunyo kuco Weritap cito oŋnkwomis, oŋnkuyesyo, omwowu akwek kule, ‘Akäs pa cici! Nye cemoyetyontet oŋnkuyeyin nyepo pokitet, oŋnkucorwetap korurukikap mosoret oko piko co kicetay!’
Ntene kunyo kicinket kule po manta ŋomnonetap Yiyintet om wule mite piko tokol ce lekokyi.’’
Kukur Farasoyintet ake Yesu cokwomis kanyi, kuwo Yesu okoy kupunto kotap Farasoyintonoto oŋnkupur ŋony kwomis.
Kimite korket ake moŋonoto nye kiponto kopurto nyepo soponto nye miyat, nteyu kowo kunket korkonoto kule mite Yesu kwomisyi om kotap Farasoyintet, yoto kusut cupet nye nyitat mwayita nye poŋu topon.
Kuco oŋnkuyoŋe patay om yepo kerenkokap Yesu, kuyile mwayikey poŋu topon.
Nteye kotoköse Farasoyintet nyo kukure Yesu ŋalecato, kumwowune moyenyi kule, “Nto koworkoyo cici, nto kokonket kule, ŋo, oŋnkuyu ne korkoni kanäm neto, oŋnkunket kule, ponto korkoni miyotyo.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule “Simon, oponte ani ŋolyo nye omöce kule omwowuŋ nyi.’’ Kumwoy Simon kule, “Mokoryontet, mwowu.’’ Kuporci Yesu kumwoci neto kule.
“Kiponto piko alak oyeny pesenutekap citake nye pesentoy pesan. Kiceyoce ake silinkinek pokolwokik mut, nto ake kiceyoce silinkinek konom.
Omnye kipuryo kot kuponto picoto oyenku tukuk ce mokuyokune, cikalya tukway pesenutekwa. Kunyo oŋnkono om picoto oyeny nye mosukucäm koromun cito nyo kikolyoyisyi?’’
Kuwec Simon kumwoci Yesu kule, “Asoti ani kule cito nyo kicikalya pesento nyewo.’’ Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Kerwoc topon.’’

Kuwekyikey Yesu korketkey oŋnkumwoci Simon kule, “Kekäs nyi korkoni? Kaco ani koŋuŋyi, ntene puryo kot kono pekap kerenkok, kunyo korkoni kunye kenyinye lokikyi kerenkokwani, oŋnkupuke putekap metinyi.
Kopuryo mpo kot ŋerekyo ŋatuta ani nyi, ntene kuceke ye kaco ani koŋŋyi, puryo kot kwasta korkoni nye moŋotute kerenkokwani.
Kopuryo mpo kot iyile nyi mwayita metimwani, ntene kakuyile korkoni kerenkokwani mwayita nye poŋu.
Kunyo cömisyenyi nyewo nye kokupor kunye poru kule kacikalya neto miyotyonikyi ce caŋ. Ci tokol nye kacikalya ce tukusic kuporu nyoto cömisyet nye miniŋ.’’
Kumwoci Yesu korkonoto kule, “Kacikalyiŋ nyi miyotyonikuk tokol.’’
Yoto kucec kuŋalal piko co kyomisyi wanak om montuwokwa kumwoy kule, “Ŋo yec nyi kolyoy miyotyonik?’’
Kumwoci Yesu korkonoto kule, “Kakusopiŋ nyi koyeneŋuŋ wecikey om kalya.’’
Om letut kunomen Yesu kuwo kupunte soŋwek oko moŋosyek kuceke ake okoy ake kumwoytoti lokoywek ce nöme poytoyisyetap Yiyintet. Kipontotikey neto yoto konomikyi taman ok oyeny,
oko koruk alak ce kikicisopci oyik ce miyotec oko porwonikwa. Coto ku mpo Mariyam nyepo maktala nye kikicekwetyi oyik tisap,
oko Yoana korketap Yusa cito nyewo nye kipoytoy kaytap Erote, oko Susana, oko koruk alak ce caŋ ce kikolyoy korucoto Yesu oko konomikyi tukuk ce kimöce.
Ntowo koruruckey piko ce caŋ, oŋnkumite alake kutosyinikey kukwone moŋosyek alak tokol, kumwoci Yesu cekto tyonkoconi kule,
“Kiwo kolintet ake wokukol kupuswekyi, nteye kimite kukolsyi kupuswekyi, kusuci kupuswek alake aret tapan, cetyikta ŋony, kuterer toritek oŋnkwokwam.
Kusuci alake yepo kitawet parak, kutur oŋnkuyom omnye kipuryo kot kunyor peko.
Kusuci kupuswek alake yepo kotok orit, kupityo wanak oko kotok kwam kotok.

Kusuci alake yepo teŋek ce toponec, kupityo oŋnkwiy kupuswontet akenke kupuswek pokol akenke’’. Nteye kimwowu Yesu ŋalecutecu kukurto kupol om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Ci nye ponto yitik ce limnte, roke kulimnte!’’
Kutepe konomikyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Mwowu ne tyonkoconi?’’

Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Om wule omite akwek, kicekonok oŋnket ŋalek ce wuŋotin cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet, ntene om wule mite piko alak kicikoci co kunket om tyonkocoy pate, sukuŋet cek kukäs ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kunkete, kulim ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kusowu kunket.’’
“Poru tyonkoconi kule, kupuswontet kunye ŋolyontetap Yiyintet.
Kupuswek co kisuci aret tapan; kukerkey oko piko co kalim ŋolyontet, ntene kuco Setani nyewo nyepo oyik oŋnkucokunumune ŋolyontet mukuleywekwa kule mente kuyen ŋolyontet oŋnkyisop.
Nto kupuswek co kisuci kitawet parak, kukerkey oko piko co ye kalim ŋolyontet kuŋerekyi koromun, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kowute mukuleywekwa orit, kuyen pate pesyos tukusic, nteye kacesyem cekto kumwey.

Nto kupuswek co kisuci kotok orit, kukerkey oko piko co ye kalim ŋolyontet nteye tokumite kurupe, kowurta cekto kasoteywek oko mokoryontit oko ŋerekwekap koret. Kunyo puryo kot kwiye cek omik kot kururyo.
Kupuswek co kisuci teŋek ce toponec, kukerkey oko piko co ye kalim ŋolyontet, kunäm oŋnkurip topon om mukuleywekwa ce toponec ce muytocini oŋnkukwilokis okoy kwiy omik.’’
“Puryo ci nye pele tarit oŋnkukupuye pesenit, nto kukoci kwiririt ŋony, ntene tore meset parak sukuŋet kukäs piko co miŋu koto orit lakweyet.
Omnye puryo ŋolyo nye kicewuny nye puryo kot ciporu koyin kutok. Oŋnkupuryo kiy nye kicetup cewuny nye puryo kot ceŋonye koyin kutok.
Oripkey yawut wule olimntoy; omnye ci tokol nye ponto kiy mosicetosyi kucaŋit, nto ci tokol nye puryo kot kuponto nka mpo tukusic co sote kule oponte, mosicinumune.’’
Yoto kukwa mpo mutakwam oko kamet wule mite Yesu, ntene kipuryo kot komuc cek kot kupunto wule mite Yesu omnye kicaŋ piko koromun.
Kumwoci citake Yesu kule, “Mite komet oko mpo mutokwomet keyoŋe saŋ kumöce kule cekäsiŋ nyi.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek tokol kule, “Yeyomwani oko mpo yeyamwani ku piko co lime ŋolyontetap Yiyintet oŋnkurup kwiy.’’
Nteye kipesyet ake, kulany Yesu rapet oko konomikyi oŋnkumwoci cek kule, “Onte cipe kyay tampayayet pitonin.’’ Yoto kunomen cek kway.
Nteye kimite kwoye, kunuc Yesu kunäm rwonto; yoto kuwus yomet nyepo swama om tampayayet okoy kumac kunyiy peko rapet, kukäs konomik kule cemite ye miyat.
Kukwa cek ye kimite Yesu oŋnkuŋet kumwoci kule, “Konetintet, Konetintet! Kocemis!’’ Kuŋet Yesu oŋnkupolyi yomet oko peko ce kiwosekey, yoto kusis yomet oko tampayayet tokol.
Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Mite ono koyenemwoŋ?’’ Kumuyo cekto oŋnkukite, oŋnkuŋalal kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Ŋo yec cici? Nyi polyini mpo yomat oko peko kulimnci neto!’’
Yoto kway cek kupete rapet okoy kupunto pitonin om koretap Kerasenik nye tokyintos oko koretap Kalilaya.

Nteyu kowo kupunto cek tapantap tampayayet, kutuye Yesu citake nye kiponto oyik nye kicone moŋet, kikukuwany cicoto pesyosyek ce caŋ nye puryo kot kuloce siroy, oŋnkupuryo kot kuminye ko, ntene kiminye pate wule cemucini piko.

Nteye kotoköse cicoto Yesu, kurir kupol om kutit nyewo koromun oŋnkuputyi ŋony kukutuŋe taytap Yesu oŋnkumwoy kule, “Ponteno ne ani nyi Yesu Weritap Yiyintet nyepo torot koromun? Osomiŋ kule mente ataŋanya ani!’’

Kimwoy cicoto kuyunyoto omnye kikipolyi Yesu oyinot nye miyat kuwete neto. Kikinäm oyik cicoto aret ce caŋ, kunyo kiceripe cerate nyororonik oko pinkonok, ntene kimuce cicoto kuŋeti oŋnkusut oyik neto okoy kupunto surukwenet.
Kutepe Yesu neto kule, “Cekure ne kayneŋuŋ?’’ Kuwec cicoto kumwoy kule, “Cekure kaynemwani, ‘Luket’, ’’ omnye kikikowut cicoto oyik ce caŋ.
Kusaysay oyik Yesu kumwoci kule, kukwet cek kupa wokowut kapkompic.
Kimite ye kilekite yoto yeceytap nkururwenik ce kimite kwokete tulwet komos. Kumwoci oyik Yesu kule kucömnci cek kupa wokowut nkururwenicoto. Yoto kumwoci Yesu cek kupa kuyunyoto.
Yoto kuŋete oyik cicoto oŋnkupa wokowut nkururwenicoto kumwey kurway yeceyta tokol okoy wokoŋirte lakam wokosuci tampayayet kupakäc peko kupok tokol.
Nteyu kowo kukäs mesewek ce kyokisyi ŋalecato keyokis kumwey kurway kupa wokumwaytat kupunte lokoywek moŋosyek oko koret tokol.
Kukwa piko kwokukäs ŋalecato kokwiyokis, ntowo kupun yoto; kwokunyor Yesu kupontokey cicoto kopete oyik kukepur yepo kerenkokap Yesu kulakat oŋnkuponto ŋomnonet. Yoto kumuyo piko tokol.
Kuporci piko co komite yeto kumwoci piko co kokwoni wule kocisopto cicoto kiponto oyik.

Yoto kusom piko tokol ce kiminye koretap Kerasenik oko ce lekite koronoto kumwoci Yesu kule kuŋet kuwete koremwa, omnye kinäm cek tokol muyotet nyewo koromun. Yoto kulany Yesu rapet oŋnkunomen kuweckey.
Kusom cicoto kipete oyik kumwoci Yesu kule, “Kany cepetekey tukway.’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule,
“Nomen wecikey kaŋuŋ oŋnkuwemwayte ŋalek ce kokwiwuŋ nyi Yiyintet.’’ Kunomen cicoto kuwecikey oŋnkuwokumwaytat kupunte moŋosyek tokol ŋalek ce kokwici Yesu neto.
Ntowo kuweckey Yesu kwoy pitoni, kutoroc kuŋerekyi piko ce caŋ, Omnye kimite picoto kukonye neto.
Yoto kuco citake nye cekure Yairo nye kipoytoyintetap kotapkok, oŋnkuputyi yepo kerenkokap Yesu oŋnkusom kumwoci kule, cipe kanyu,
omnye kiponto Yairo lekwenyi akenke nye tye nye kiponto kenyisyek taman ok oyeny, nye kikirik kume. Nteye kimite Yesu kuweti kukic piko neto om komoswokik tokol.

Kimite yoto korket ake nye kimnyan kutaŋany kukwone korotik kuwany kenyisyek taman ok oyeny. Kikikuwoŋnkyi korkonoto tukukyi tokol ce kiponto cepsakitisyek, ntene puryo mpo akenke nye kimuc kot kusop neto.
Kucone korkonoto letutap Yesu oŋnkutwa kunäm tapantap siretap Yesu, yoto pakenke kusisio korotik ce kikwone neto.
Kutep Yesu kule, “Ŋo nyi kanäma kutwaya ani?’’ Nteyu kowo kutinton piko tokol, kumwoy Petero kule, “Konetintet, piko cu kuwunuktiŋ kukiciŋ nyi!’’
Ntene kumwoy Yesu kule, “Kutwaya kunäma ani citake; omnye kakäs kule kaweteno swamet.’’
Ntowo kukäs korkonoto kule komowuŋoktosi, kupotanan kuco tay, oŋnkuputyi taytap Yesu oŋnkumwoci om taytap piko tokol omne sukutwa kunäm neto Yesu, oŋnkumwoy kutor wule kosopto neto yoto pakenke.
Kumwoci Yesu korkonoto kule, “Cepnyu, kokusopiŋ nyi koyeneŋuŋ, kunyo wecikey om kalya.’’
Nteyu kimite Yesu tokuŋolole, kucone citake kotap poytoyintetap kotapkok, oŋnkucokumwoci poytoyintet kule, “Kame cepŋuŋ kunyo mente tayim yec Konetintet.’’
Ntowo kulim Yesu ŋalecato, kumwoci Yairo kule, “Mente omuy, iyen pate, mosukusop cepŋuŋ.’’
Ntowo kupunto Yesu koyoto, kuyete piko tokol mewut koto orit, oŋnkucömnci pate Petero oko Yowana oko Yakopo, oko kwanitap lekwet oko kamet.
Kimite yoto piko kurire kwome mnyat cepoto. Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Monte cerirye, omnye puryo kot kume, koru pate.’’
Kurorici picoto Yesu omnye kinkete cek kule kame lekwet.
Kunäm Yesu yewutap cepoto oŋnkukur kupol kumwoy kule, “Lekwani ŋet!’’
Kuweckey sopon nyi, oŋnkuŋet lakwar kuyo. Yoto kumwayta Yesu cikoci omik ce kam.
Kukite kwan oko kamet, ntene kunkolontyi Yesu kumwoci cekto kule mente kot kumwoci citake tokol ŋalecu keyokis.
Yoto kukur Yesu koruruc wanak kiyokikyi taman ok oyeny, oŋnkukoci cek swamet oko kamukeywek ce kwete oyik oko swamet nye sope porwonik,
oŋnkuyokto kupa wokumwaytat lokoywek cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet, oŋnkusop piko tokol ce mnyontos.
Kumwoci kule, “Monte cenämate kiy om poninekwok, nka mpo korok nye otepenoti, nka mpo lol nyepo omit, nka mpo omnyo, nka mpo pesan, monte mpo cenämate sirok oyeny.
Nto koto ake tokol nye kowut; opur koyoto okoy onomene moŋonoto.
Nto wulyo ake tokol wule puryo kot kutorocak kuŋerekyok akwek piko, aŋete apete moŋonoto oŋnkopukyi tertitap kerenkokwok sukuŋet kwek kosowunot om wule mite pikap moŋonoto.’’
Yoto kunomen kiyokik kupa kupunte moŋosyek tokol kumwaytat lokoywek ce toponec oŋnkusop piko om wulyo tokol wule kipa cekto.
Yoto kulim Erote poytoyintetap Kalilaya tukuk tokol ce kiyoktos, kusot kupotpoten koromun, omnye kimwowu piko alake kule, “Kokututune met Yowana Potisonintet.’’
Kumwowu alake kule, “Kukuporkey Eriya.’’ Kumwowu alake kule, “Kokotutune met yec akenke om workoyikap keny.’’
Kumwoy Erote kule, “Nteyu kyayep ani metitap Yowana, ŋo yec cici olimncini ani ŋalecu yucu?’’ Kumac Erote kule ntakäs Yesu.
Kuweckey kiyokik oŋnkwokumwoci Yesu tukuk tokol ce kukwiy cekto. Yoto kukwer Yesu cek kwicek nkit kuwuŋat okoy kupunto moŋet nye cekure Pesasayita.
Ntowo kunket piko kupa kurup neto. Nteye kotoköse Yesu piko, kuŋerekyi oŋnkuŋololyi kumwoci ŋalek cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet, oŋnkusop piko ce kimöce kule cisopec.

Ntowo kupunto kosoleny karik kurarakta asista, kukwa kiyokik co tamanu ok oyeny ye kimite Yesu oŋnkumwoci kule, “Yomis mwoci piko kupecikey, kupa moŋosyek oko soŋwek ce lekitec wokuceŋat wule mokuruy oko wule mokunyorta omik, omnye cemite acek wuli po surukwenoni,’’

Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Okoci akwek nkit kiye mokwam.’’ Kuwekyi kiyokik kumwoci neto kule, “Ceponte acek pate mukatinek mut oko purpurunek oyeny, möce nyi kule cipe acek nkit wokyal omik cepo picu tokol?’’
Omnye kimite yoto piko ce kirice elifunek mut. Kumwoci Yesu kiyokikyi kule, “Oyiyte piko tokol kopur ŋony, korurukotekey, piko ce puntoy konom.’’
Kwiy kiyokik kuyunyoto kuyiyta piko tokol kopur ŋony.
Kunäm Yesu mukatinekey mut oko purpurunek oyeny oŋnkunyal torot, oŋnkukasta Yiyintet kusomnci oŋnkupetec oŋnkukoci kiyokikyi kupcici piko.
Yoto kwomis piko tokol okoy kupiyoŋis, yoto koruruc kiyokik omik ce kam piko kot kuŋet kunyiy kisok taman ok oyeny.
Nteye kimite Yesu kusome kwine nkit pesyet ake, yoto kukwa konomik ye kimite neto, Kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Mwowu piko kule oyiku ani ŋo?’’
Kuwekyi konomik kumwoci kule, “Mwowu piko alake kule, yiku nyi Yowana potisonintet, kumwowu alak kule yiku nyi Eriya, nto alak kumwowu kule yiku nyi akenke om workoyikap keny nye kokotutune met.’’
Kutepe Yesu cek kule, “Nto akwek, omwowu akwek kule oyiku ani ŋo?’’ Kuwec Petero kumwoy kule, “Yiku nyi Ŋapanet nyepo Yiyintet!’’
Yoto kunkolontyi Yesu koromun cekto kumwoci kule, “Monte kot omwoci citake tokol ŋolyontoni.’’

Kutosyi Yesu yec kumwoy kule, “Misyini citaŋany Weritap cito om tukuk ce caŋ; mosukutay poyik oko tisik cewoyec, oko konetikap ntarastinek. Mosicepakäc kume, nteye pesyetap somok ciŋet kotutune met.’’
Yoto kumwoci Yesu piko tokol kule, “Ye möce citake tokol kule anama cepetekey ani, kumisyini kunyilkey nkit, oŋnkutor murtowontenyi pesyosyek tokol oŋnkuco cokunama cepetekey ani.
Omnye ci nye möce kule osop sopon nyi kupote neto nyoto sopon nyi, nto ci nye kepot sopon nyi omnye kacäma ani, mosukusop neto nyoto sopon nyi.
Muce ra kunyor cito latik oŋnkocu ye ponto tukuk ce mite koret kumukul oŋnkwarantakey neto nkit?
Omnye ci tokol nye kelilan om wule omite ani oko ŋalekwani, mosukulilontyi Weritap cito neto nyoto om pesyet nye contoy woyin nyi, oko woyintap Papa oko nyepo malaykanik ce tililec.
Ntene komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mite yuteyu piko alake ce keyoŋ ce puryo kot kucemcem met okoy ye kakäs cekto poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’’
Ntowo kupok pesyosyek cerice sisit, kuceke ye kiŋalale Yesu ŋalecato, kukwer Yesu Petero oko Yowana oko Yakopo kupa tulwet parak, kupa cek wokusom.
Nteyu kimite Yesu kusome kuwälkey tokoynyi, oŋnkuweckey sirokyi kulelakitu kulekececis.
Yoto pakenke kuporkey neto kuŋolole oko piko alak oyeny, coto ku Moses oko Eriya,
ce kiporkey om woyinto, oŋnkuŋolole oko Yesu ŋalek ce nöme yisyetap Yiyintet nye mosukuyitita Yesu om Yerusalem.
Kikiruy kunäm rwonto om yoto Petero oko piko co kipontokey neto, nteye kotowokukösu cekto topon; yoto kukäs woyintap Yesu oko picoto oyeny kukeyoŋ oko neto.

Nteye kimite Moses oko Eriya kupciykey oko Yesu, kumwoci Petero Yesu kule, “Konetintet, kiy nye topon omnye cemite acek yuteyu, kunyo kany cetec acek kisarinek somok, mokwek akenke nyeŋuŋ, nto ake kupoyit Moses, nto ake kupoyit Eriya.’’ Kiŋalal Petero kumwoy ŋalecato nye kipuryo kot kunkete ŋalek ce mwowu.
Nteyu kimite Petero tokuŋolole kuco polyet oŋnkulum cek rurwet, kumuyo konomik yukowo kulum polyet.
Yoto kucone kurset polyet orit kuŋalal kumwoy kule, “Nyi kunye Werimwani camanet, nye kweyanemwani olimnci neto.’’
Ntowo kusis kursonoto, kutok Yesu kumite kwine nkit. Yoto kusisio konomik pesyonoto nye kipuryo kot kumwoci citake tokol kito nye kikäs cekto.
Nto om pesyetap koyekune, kurekune cek tulwet, yoto kutuye piko ce caŋ Yesu.
Kukursyo citake nye kimite kwenutap piko kumwoy kule, “Konetintet, osomiŋ ani nyi kule koswo werinyu, omnye lekwemwani nye akenke pate,
nye nöme oyinoto kunco, oŋnkupirtopirto okoy kukapus pukantet, kunyo kikotaŋany koromun oŋnkukorom kot ye mokwasta lakwar.
Kyosom mpo kiyokikuk kule kukwetyi neto oyinot, ntene puryo kot komuc kot kukwet.’’

Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Opo! Akwek pikap pintap pesyosyecu ce puryo kot kuponto koyenot! Mosopur ani oko akwek okoy pesyo ne? Mosomuytyocok ani akwek okoy oyu!’’ Yoto kumwoci Yesu citap lekwet kule, “Sutu weriŋuŋ kuco yu.’’
Nteye kimite lekwanato kuconi kunäm oyinoto oŋnkumilci ŋony, oŋnkupirtopirto. Yoto kupolyi Yesu oyinot nye miyat; kusop lekwanato, oŋnkunäm neto kuketyi kwan.
Kukite Piko tokol woyinto nyepo swametap Yiyintet. Nteye kimite piko tokokite tukuk ce kimite kwiye Yesu, yoto kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule,
“Alimnte topon ŋalecu, cikwakwek ŋalecutecu monte ceyutye! Mosicenäm Weritap cito oŋnkyikoyito kunäm swametap piko.’’
Ntene kipuryo kot kusow yoto konomik kunket ŋalecato, omnye kicewuŋe mente kot konket kule mwowu ne ŋalecato, yoto kunyokoritu cekto ye mokutepe Yesu kule poru ne ŋalecato.
Yoto kucec konomik kutintentyin kutepekey kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Ŋo nyewo kupëlis om cekto.’’
Kunket Yesu ŋalek ce kitintentyini cek om kasoteywekwa. Kunäm lekwa nye miniŋ oŋnkukoci kopure komosnyi.

Oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ci tokol nye katoroc kuŋerekyi lekwani om kaynemwani ku katoroca kuŋerekyo ani neto cicoto; nto ci tokol nye koŋerekyo ani ku koŋerekyi neto nyoto neto nyo kiyokwani, omnye ci nye miniŋ kupëlis om kwenumwakwek ku cito nyoto nyewo.’’
Kuwekyi Yowana kumwoci Yesu kule, “Konetintet, kucekäs acek citake nye kukwete oyik om kayneŋuŋyi, ceyete acek cekerekte cicoto, omnye puryo kot cepontotikey acek oko neto.’’
Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Monte ceyete cekerekte cicoto, omnye ci nye puryo kot kutoyok akwek kunye nyimwoŋ cicoto.’’
Nteyu kowo kurikta kupunto pesyosyek ce cesute Yesu kuwo torot. Kusot kuwoŋnkyi oŋnkunomen kutokyikey Yerusalem.
Yoto kuyokto piko alak kupa kuntoye. Kupa picoto okoy wokupunto saŋntap Samariyek kule woceyiytoci Yesu otepto.
Ntene kutay pikap saŋata moŋerekyi Yesu omnye kiweti kutokyinikey Yerusalem.
Nteye kotoköse kiyokikyi Yowana oko Yakopo kuyunyoto kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, mokyec acek nyi kule cekur mata kucone torot cokupel cekto?’’
Kuwekyikey Yesu cek oŋnkupolyi.
Yoto kunomen cek kupa okoy saŋnta ake.
Nteye kimite cek kupeti om aran, kumwoci citake Yesu kule, “Mosanamiŋ ani cepetekey oko nyi om wulyo tokol wule mewo nyi!’’
Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Ponto mokoyitinek mwenonik, kuponto toritek co terertoy korikwa wule minye, ntene puryo kot kupunto Weritap cito wule mokowute metinyi.’’
Kumwoci Yesu citake kule, “Nama nyi cepetekey oko ani.’’ Ntene kumwoy cicoto kule, “Mokoryontet, kany awo kunyo wamuy papanyu.’’
Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Yaste muswek cokipok kumuy muswekwa, ntene nomen nyi iwo wemwaytate lokoywek cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’’
Kumwoy yec citake kule, “Mokoryontet, mosanamiŋ ani cepetekey oko nyi, ntene kany awo kunyo womwoci cemutakwey piko co mite ka.’’
Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Puryo ci nye ye kanäme yewunyi mukonketap yeyik kupotis, oŋnkukäs yec let nye yeme poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’’

Yoto om letutap ŋaleca, kukwey Mokoryontet Yesu piko alak tomonwokik tisap ok oyeny oŋnkuyokto kuntoye kupetate oyeny oyeny kupa moŋosyek tokol oko komoswokik tokol om wule kimöce Yesu kule sawo om letut.
Kumwoci Yesu picoto kule, “Wo koromun yisyetap kisisyet, ntene ŋeri pate piko co kisisyi, kunyo osom Mokoryontetap kisisyet sukuŋet kuyokto kisik alak kupa kisisyenyi.
Ape, koyoktok ani kuyu lekokap kecirek ce kapa kwenutap suyik.
Monte cenamate munyenku nyepo pesan, nto lol nyepo omit, nto kweyonik, ntene monte cisupay citake tokol om aran.
Nto koto ake tokol nye konyosye owut orit, omwowu kule, ‘Kopur kalyet koyi!’
Nteye mite yoto citake nye ponto kalyet, mosukunyor cicoto kalyemwoŋ, nteye puryo kot kumite yoto, mosukukketkey kalyet wule omit akwek.
Opurene koyoto, oŋnkoyomisye oŋnkoye kiy ake tokol nye kacekonok, omnye misyini ci nye yiyisyi kunyor musyarenyi. Monte ceŋete koyoto oŋnkape yec wowut koto ake.
Nteye kopunte moŋet ake tokol oŋnkuŋerekyok piko, oyam kiy ake tokol nye kacekonok.
Osop piko tokol ce cemnyontos om wuloto; oŋnkumwoci piko kule, ‘Korikyok akwek poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’
Nteye kupunte moŋet ake tokol, oŋnkutay moŋerekyok piko, ape opunte orustunwek ce punte moŋonoto, oŋnkumwowu kule, ‘Puryo kiy nye mokyiwok acek akwek.
Kunyo mocipukwok tertit nyi kanäm kerenkokyacek om moŋemwoŋ, ntene möce oŋnket ŋolyontoni kule, korikyok akwek poytoyisyetap Yiyintet!’
Komwowok ani akwek kule, om pesyet nye cemute musankut, mosukukaykay Yiyintet musankut nyepo Sotom kupël moŋonoto!’’

“Oyey! Mesepur kwapi nyi Korasin! Oyey! Mesepur kwapi mpenyi Pesasayita! Omnye nto kitukuk cepo kakitat co kiciwuŋ nyi kuce kicici coto Tiro oko Siton nto kikopur keny pikap wuloto ŋony, oŋnkulac sirok sarkatinek oŋnkuwastekey arek kupor kule karenynkey cek om miyotyonikwa.
Mosukukaykay Yiyintet musankut nyepo Tiro oko Siton om pesyetap Musankut kupëlok akwek.
Nto mpenyi Kapernaum! Kimöce nyi kule osutkey awo torot? Mosicewirciŋ wule mite mata nye momise!’’

Kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule, “Ci tokol nye kolimwok akwek konomikwani; kulimwo ani cicoto, nto ci tokol nye katayak akwek, kutoyo mpo ani cicoto, nto ci nye toyo, kukatay cicoto neto nyo kiyokwo ani.’’
Yoto kuweckey piko co kitomonwokik tisap ok oyeny kuponto ŋerekwek ce caŋ, oŋnkwokumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, kulimwec mpo acek oyik ye kucepolyi om Kayneŋuŋ!’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Kyakäs ani Setani kosuwune torot kuyu ilet.
Olim pa! Kwokonok ani ani kamukeywek ce omuci atyic erenoy, oko keneyisyek; oŋnkotirtir swamet tokol nyepo puniyontet, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot komuce kot kunyerenak akwek.
Ntene monte ceŋerec omnye kolimwok akwek oyik, ntene aŋerec pate omnye silotin kaynokwok om wulin po torot.’’

Om yoto pakenke kunyor Yesu ŋerekwekap swametap Muyet Nyetilil kumwoy kule, “Ayi Papa, okostiŋ ani nyi Mokoryontetap torot oko koret, omnye kiwuŋe nyi tukucu piko ce ŋomec oko ce sumonotin, oŋnkiporci piko ce minkec. Yunyoto Papa, kiyiy kuyunyoto omnye kikwey ŋerekyi nyi nkit.

Kikono Papa tukuk tokol, kunyo puryo ci nye nkete kule Werit ku ŋo, toskoy pate Papa nye nkete, oŋnkupuryo mpo ci nye nkete kule Papa ku ŋo, toskoy pate Werit nye nkete oko ci nyo kakwey Werit kule aparte.’’
Yoto kuwekyikey Yesu konomik; oŋnkuŋololyi möt kumwoci kule, “Ponto kupeyoy konyek ceköse tukuk ceyucu oköse akwek.

Komwowok ani akwek kule, caŋ workoyik oko kinkonik ce kimöce kule nto cekäs tukuk ceyucutecu oköse akwek, ntene kipuryo kot komuc cek kot kukäs, nto kule celim ceyucutecu olim akwek, ntene kipuryo kot kulim.’’
Yoto kuŋet kuyo konetintet ake nyepo ntarastinek, oŋnkulot kutepe Yesu kumwoy kule, “Konetintet, mosayiy ne ani ye saŋet anyoru soponto nyemo poku?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Kicesil kulene om ntarastinek? Sumoni nyi mwowu kulene?’’
Kuwec cicoto kumwoy kule, “Misyini cäm Mokoryontet Yiyinteŋuŋ om mukuleyŋuŋ tokol, oko soponŋuŋ tokol oko swameŋuŋ tokol, oko kasoteywekuk tokol, oŋnkicäm latyeŋuŋ kuyu wulo cömntoykey nyi nkit.’’
Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Kewec topon, iwo weyiy kuyunyoto mesenyoru soponto.’’
Omnye kimöce cicoto kule ayetkey onyolu kutepe neto Yesu kule, “Latyemwani ku ŋo?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule. “Kinomene citake Yerusalem kurekto kuwo Yeriko, kunyor corik om aran ce kiporye kunumene sirok, onŋkupir neto koromun, oŋnkupakakta kumilekey karik kume.
Kuwete kurekte aranato mpo yec tisintet ake, nteye kotoköse cicoto kumur aret tapan.
Kuco yec Lefintet om aranato okoy kupun yoto kimite cicoto, nteye kotoköse kumur mpene aret tapan.
Ntene kuco Samariyantet ake nye kiweti pan nyi om aranato okoy kupun yoto kimite cicoto, nteye kotoköse kurire kukalya koromun.
Kuwo okoy ye kimite cicoto, oŋnkunäm oŋnkuyile mwayita oko finyonik oŋnkurotyi mwoyokyi, oŋnkunäm kulany sikiryenyi oŋnkukwer okoy kupunto kotap toyek wokunyaye wuloto.
Ntowo kuyec koret om pesyetap oyeny, kunum silinkinek oyeny oŋnkukoci cito nye ripe kotap toyek oŋnkumwoci kule, ‘Nyay cici, nteye kenyaye kot kutil tukuk cu kokoniŋ ani, mosucoyokuŋ ye kaweckey.’ ’’
Kutepe Yesu neto kule, “Ŋo om picoto somok nye soti kule kilatyetap cicoto kipire corik?’’
Kuwec cicoto kumwoy kule, “Neto cito nyo kikwici cicoto tukuk ce toponec.’’ Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Mpenyi iwo weyiy kuyunyoto.’’
Nteye kimite Yesu oko konomikyi kupeti panmwa, yoto kukwa okoy kupun kayta ake, kuŋerekyi korket ake nye cekure Marisa neto oŋnkupay.
Kiponto korkonoto cekwam nye cekure Mariyam nye kipure yepo kerenkokap Mokoryontet Yesu kulimntoy ŋalek ce kimwowu.
Yoto kutaŋany Marisa yisyonutek ce kimite kwiye, kuco ye mite Yesu oŋnkumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, puryo kot köse nyi kule kokwoso ani yeyamwani ayiy yisyonutek nkit? Mwoci kuco cokukalya ani!’’
Kuwekyi Mokoryontet kumwoci kule, “Marisa, Marisa! Soti nyi koromun, oŋnkitaŋänkey om tukuk ce caŋ,
ntene ce möce kiy akenke pate. Kunyo kakwey Mariyam kiyoto topon nye komocimuce kot cinumune neto.’’
Kimite Yesu pesyet ake kusome om yeto ake, nteyu kowo kusom kot kuwany; kumwoci konomintenyi ake neto kule, “Mokoryontet, netec acek wule cesomntoy kuyu wulo kinetitoy Yowana konomikyi.’’
Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Ye some, omwowu kule: ‘Papa, kante-ciywey kutililit kayneŋuŋ, kante kuco poytoyisyeŋuŋ.
konec acek omikyo ce cemöce pesyosyek tokol.
kalyec acek miyotyonikyo, kuyu wulo cikolyoy acek co lele om wule ce mite acek, ntene mesutec royenec wule mite syemutok.’ ’’
Kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule, “Ŋo om akwek nye ye ponto corwenyi, oŋnkuweci ye kopunto komoy kwen wokumwoci kule, ‘Corwenyu, peseno mukatinek somok.
Omnye kacontyo tontet nye corwenyu ntene moponte kiy nye mokoci kwam.’
Kuwec nyin om koto orit kumwoy kule, ‘Mente ataŋany ani! Omnye kaceker kurket, kunyi kaceruye acek tokol oko lekok om kwiririt, puryo kot tomuci aŋet cokoniŋ kiy.’

Komwowok ani kule, nka kot kupuryo kot kuŋet cicoto cokukoci nyin tukuk ce komöce omnye corwenyi, ntene ye kosomso cicoto nye puryo kot kulilone kupunto muyot, mosukuŋet nyin kuco cokukoci kiy ake tokol nye kosome.
Kunyo komwowok ani kule: Osom mosicekonok, aceny, mosonyoru, okonykony, mosiceyotwok kurket.
Omnye ci tokol nye some, mosicikoci, nto ci nye cenye, mosukunyor; mpene neto cito nyo konykonye mosiceyotyi,
Ci ŋo om akwek nye ye papa nyepo lekoy nye ye kosom lekwenyi purpuryo kukoci erenet ye ketekocini purpuryontet?
Nto kukoci lekwenyi keneyontet ye kosom mekeyontet?
Kunyo nteye oŋnket akwek piko cu oyiku miyotec okoci lekokwok tukuk ce toponec, ku aret cetya nyun ce muce kukoci Papa nyepo torot Muyet Nyetilil piko ce kosom!’’
Kukwet Yesu om yoto oyinot nye kiponto cito nye kinämakay kutit, nteye kowo kuwecikey oyinoto, kucec kuŋalal cicoto, yoto kukite piko koromun.
Ntene kumwoy piko alake kule, “Yiyisye neto Pelsepul nyewo nyepo oyik sukuŋet kukwet oyik.’’
Yoto kusyem piko alake kumac kule kokonec Yesu pelutyet nye cone torot.
Ntene kunket Yesu kasoteywekwa, kumwoci cek kule: “Poytoyisyo ake tokol nye pciykey oŋnkuporyekey nkit komuce nyo kupot, nto koto ake tokol nye pciyekey oŋnkuporyekey nkit kulule koyoto.
Kunyo nteye pciyat Setani onkuporyekey nkit, kuyonye kulene poytoyisyenyi? Omnye omwowu akwek kule oyiyisye ani Pelsepul saŋet amuc akwet oyik.
Nteye oyiyisye ani Pelsepul saŋet amuc akwet oyik, kunyo yiyisye ŋo pikwakwek sukuŋet kukwet oyik? Kunyo cekto ce mosukomutwok akwek musankut.
Nteye oyiyisye ani swametap Yiyintet saŋet akwek oyik, kuporkey manta kule kucontyok akwek poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.
Ye Ponto cito swama oko karik ce ripe kanyi, kuripotin oŋnkukonorotin tukukyi topon.
Ntene ye kaco citake nye ponto swamet kupël nyenyi oŋnkuporye kot kupël cicoto, mosukunumune karik co kekenekey oŋnkusut kupör tukukap cicoto.
Ci tokol nye puryo kot cepontekey oko ani, ku cito nyoto nye toyo ani, nto mpo cito nye puryo kot cirurukisyi tukway oko ani, ku cito nyoto nye serete.’’
“Ye kowete oyinoto nye miyat cito, mosukuwesetot kupunte koret wule puryo peko kuceŋoti wule möce kule komuŋe, nteye puryo kot kunyor, mosukumwoy nkit kule, ‘Mosaketitekey ani awo konyu nyo kyocone.’
Mosukuketkey kuco, nteye kocokunyor kicipuc oŋnkyesat topon.
Yoto mosukuwo wokukwer oyik alak tisap ce miyotec kupël neto, kukwa oŋnkwokowut orit oŋnkumiŋis wuloto; mosukuwur yoto kopurtap cicoto nyepo letut kupël wule kiyunto kopurnyi nyo kipo kunyo.’’
Nteye kimite Yesu kumwowu ŋalecato, kukurune korket ake kwenutap piko kumwoci Yesu kule, “Ŋerekat nye ponto kupeyoy moyet nye kiyiŋ nyi, oko kitik ce kireri nyi!’’
Ntene kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Topon ye kocemwoy kule, Ŋerekotin kuponto kupeyok piko co lime ŋolyontetap Yiyintet oŋnkurip!’’
Nteye kimite piko korurucekey wanak, kutosyikey Yesu kumwoy kule, “Pikap pini kuce piko cepo pinta nye miyat! Omnye tepe cek pelutyet, ntene puryo pelutyet nye mocikoci, tos pate palutyetap Yona.
Kuyu Yona nye kikwek pelutyetap pikap Nenefi, Kuyunyoto musokwek Weritap cito pelutyetap pikap pini.

Om pesyetap musankut, mosukuyo korko nye Kinko nye cone koretap tö oŋnkuwosontyi pikap pini, oŋnkomutyi musankut kulot cekto, omnye kicone korkono tapantap koret kule cakäs ŋomnonetap Solomon; kunyo möce akäs akwek kule mite yu nyewo nye pële Solomon.

Om pesyetap musankut, mosukuyoŋ pikap Nenefi, oŋnkumutyi musankut pikap pini, omnye kirenynkey cek pikap Nenefi kwasta miyotyonikwa om ŋalek ce kimwoci Yona. Kunyo möce akäs akwek kule, mite yu nyewo nye pële Yona!’’
“Puryo ci nye pele tarit oŋnkutore wule wuŋat, nto kukupuye pesenit, ntene tore kito nye yoŋe tarit, sukuŋet piko co kwoni ko kukäs lakweyet.
Koŋnta nyeŋuŋ kunye taritap porto nyeŋuŋ. Ye topon koŋnta nyeŋuŋ, mpo porto nyeŋuŋ tokol kuponto lakweyet, ntene ye miyat koŋnta nyeŋuŋ, mpo porto nyeŋuŋ tokol kuponto menonet.
Möce ripkey oŋnkikäs kule lakweyinto nyo ponte nyi kunye puryo kot ku menonet.

Kunyo ye ponto porto nyeŋuŋ tokol lakweyet nye puryo kot kuponto kereryantet ake menonet, mosukwek porto nyeŋuŋ tokol nye ponto lakweyet kuyu wule loytoy tarit nye loye topon kukwenyiŋ nyi lakweyet.’’
Nteyu kowo kuŋalal Yesu okoy kuwany. Kukur Farasoyintet ake Yesu wokwomis tukway om kanyi. Kuwo Yesu oŋnkuwokopur ŋony kwomis.
Kukite Farasoyintonoto yu kowo kukäs kule komis Yesu nye puryo kot kowun yewuniyekyi.
Yoto kumwoci Mokoryontet Yesu neto kule, “Po manta kule akwek Farasayek! Osite topon cikomponik oko saninek saŋ, ntene om montuwokwok orit kunyitotin nyapanatet oko miyotyet.
Akwek solonocu! Yiyintet nyo kikwiye saŋ kupuryo kot ku neto nye kikwiye mpo orit?
Ntene okoyite akwek kokotutek cepo tukuk ce kwone montuwokwok orit, sukuŋet kutililitu mpo tukuk tokol om wule omite akwek.

“Ntene omite kwapi akwek Farasayek! Omnye okocini Yiyintet akenke nyepo taman cepo nkuyek alak tokol, kuyu munyanyinek oko mutunkurunek, ntene oŋnkoyaste morwoc topon, oŋnkotay mocäm Yiyintet. Roke oyiye coto, ntene monte kot ayaste tukuk alak.
“Omite kwapi akwek Farasayek! Omnye ocöme ŋecerok ce kweyotin ce mite kotapkok, oŋnkyiyweyak cisupayak topon om moteponik.
Omite akwek kwapi, omnye okerkeyekey mwenonik ce kicetupci piko ce puryo kot kutoku ce tyikoti piko nye menkete.’’
Kuwekyi konetintet ake nyepo ntarastinek kumwoci Yesu kule, “Konetintet, ye kemwowu nyi ŋaleca kukecupec mpo acek.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Omite kwapi mpo akwek konetikap ntarastinek! Omnye otorcini piko terekok ce nyikisec ce puryo kot komuce kot kutor, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot onöme akwek morin terkocoto!
Omite akwek kwapi! Omnye kipakäc mpo kukomwoŋ workoyik; atec akwek kunyol mwenonik co kicetupci cekto.
Oyiku akwek muncururwanikap ŋalecutecu, omnye ocöme akwek nkit ŋalecato kikwiye mpo kukomwoŋ, kipakäc cek workoyik, atec akwek mwenonik co kicetupci.
Kunyo om ŋelecutecu, kumwoy ŋomnonetap Yiyintet kule, ‘Mosoyokte ani workoyik oko kiyokik alak kupa wule mite cekto, mosukupar cek alak om picoto, oŋnkutaŋany alak.’
Kunyo mosicitaŋany pikap pintap pesyosyecu kuyok korotikap workoyik co kicepakäc kupok kuceke ye kicitany koret.

Kuceke korotikap Apel okoy korotikap Sakariya nyo kiceporci kwenutap otepto nye cepele korosek oko otepto nyetilil. Komwowok ani ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosicitaŋany pikap pintap pesyosyecu om ŋalecato tokol!
“Omite akwek kwapi konetikap ntarastinek! Omnye kyokonor akwek funkuwet nyo yote kotap ŋomnonet; oŋnkupuryo kot awut akwek orit, ntene oŋnkokerekte piko alak ce syeme kule ciwut orit!’’
Nteye kinomene Yesu om wuloto, kunyer koromun Farasayek oko konetikap ntarastinek, kutepe cek Yesu om swama ŋalek ce caŋ;
kusyem kule cetec neto sukuŋet cenäm om ŋolyo ake tokol nye cone kutinyi nye miyat nye mosukumwoy.
Koruruckey om yoto piko elifunek ce caŋ koromun, okoy kutyickey cek nkit. Kunyosyo Yesu kuŋololyi kumwoci kule, “Oripkey mumarekap Farasayek ce kaperperot cekto.
Omnye puryo kiy nye yelat yawut nye puryo kot ceŋonye koyin kutok, oŋnkupuryo kiy nye wuŋat yawut nyemo ciporu koyin kutok.
Kunyo nka mpo ŋalek ce kyoŋolole wule wuŋat, mosicelim coto ye pet kwen; mpo ŋalek co kyocome korik orit, mosicemwayta cekurte korik kisyek.’’
“Komwowok ani akwek coronutekwani kule, monte ciywey piko co poköce porto nkit, nto om letut kupuryo kot komuce kwiy kito ake tokol nye miyat.
Kunyo mosoporwok ani cito nye roke aywey akwek. Aywey Yiyintet nyo ye kapakäc kuponto kamukeywek kuwirciŋ wule mite mata nye momise. Kunyoto nye omwowok ani akwek kule aywey neto.
Puryo kot kyole cek titiyinek mut tampuranik oyeny? Nto om konyekap Yiyintet kupuryo kot ceyutye cek mpo akenke?
Nka mpo putekap metewokwok kiciyit tokol. Kunyo monte cemuye, omnye oponte akwek latik ce caŋ koromun kupël titiyinek ce caŋ.’’
“Komwowok ani akwek kule, ci tokol nye kaŋalal kutor om wule mite piko kule oyiku nyimwani, mosukuparta kutor Weritap cito neto nyoto koyin om taytap malaykanikap Yiyintet.
Ntene ci tokol nye katay maŋalal kuparta ani Weritap cito om wule mite piko, mosicetay mociparta neto nyoto koyin om konyekap malaykanikap Yiyintet.
“Mosicikalya ci ake tokol nye kaŋalale kwapi Weritap cito ntene puryo kot cimuce kot cikalya mpo kisic ci ake tokol nye kaŋalale kwapi Muyet Nyetilil.
Nteye kocekwerok akwek wocewosontyok om korikapkok nto om taytap piko co ponto kamukeywek, nto om taytap poyik, monte cisot kule mosiceŋalal kulene, nto kule mosicemwowu ne ye ceyetekey.
Omnye mosukunetak akwek Muyet Nyetilil om yoto ŋalek ce mosomwowu.’’
Kuŋalal citake om kwenutap piko kumwoci Yesu kule, “Konetintet, mwoci yeyamwani cepcicine oko ani tukuk ce kipokokwec acek Papanyo.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Corwenyu, ŋo nye kikono ani oyiku ketintemwoŋ nto pciyintemwoŋ?’’
Yoto kumwoci Yesu piko tokol kule, “Akäste, oripkey akwek wule mite corokyinot ake tokol, omnye nka kot kuponto cito mokoryonti nye tya, kupuryo kot kumuce kokoci cicoto tukucoto ponto soponto.’’
Kumwoci Yesu cekto tyonkoconi kule, “Kiponto mokoryontet ake mparenyi nye kiyiwu kurur topon koromun,
kusot om moyenyi nkit kumwoy kule, ‘Mosayiy ne ani? Omnye puryo kot oponte wule mokisyi omikyu cu tokol.’
Kumwoy nkit kule mosayiy kule, ‘Mosoput cokenikwani aŋnkatec alak cewoyec, saŋet akonore wuloto omikwani tokol oko tukukwani alak;
nto kapok omwowu nkit om moyenyu kule, ponte nyi tukuk ce caŋ ce konorotin ce mosukuwany kenyisyek ce caŋ, kunyo muny, yesye, yomisye, oŋnkiŋerec.’
Ntene kumwoci Yiyintet cicoto kule, ‘Nyi perperyani! Om kwomwowuni po yawut, mosicinumuneniŋ soponŋuŋ, kunyo mosukupoyit ŋo tukuk coto kikonor nyi?’
Kuyunyoto wule yunto om wule mite cito nye konorkyinikey mokoryonti, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot ku mokoryo om wule mite Yiyintet.’’
Kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule, “Yunyoto omne saŋet ani omwowok akwek kule, monte cisot soponwekwok kule mosikyam ne, nto kule mosicilac ne.
Omnye pële soponto omik, oŋnkupële porto sirok.
Akäs pa pkukinek ce puryo kot kukolsyi nto kukisis, ce puryo kot kuponto wule konore omik nto mpo cokenik, ntene oŋnkupoye Yiyintet cekto! Oponte akwek latik ce caŋ kupël toritek!
Ŋo om akwek nye ye komuy oŋnkusot koromun ce nöme sopon nyi; nye muce kot kutosyi kucaŋit kenyisyek alak cepo sopon nyi?
Kunyo nteye puryo kot omuci akwek kot ayiy kiy nye kisic nye yunyo; omne sasoti akwek ce nöme tukuk alak?

Akäs pa kuyu wule pititoy taptok om koret, puryo kot kwiyisyi oŋnkupuryo kot kunope sirok ce loce. Ntene komwowok ani akwek kule, nka mpo Solomon om woyintap mokoryontit nye kiponto, kipuryo kot kulocekey neto topon kuyu akenke om toptocu.
Kunyo, nteye muce Yiyintet kot kulac suswek ce mite koret pesyoni nto mite tun cewirci mata kuloy, ku aret ce tya nyun ce muce kulacak akwek Yiyintet? Oyiku akwek pic ce ponto koyenet nye kisic pate!
Kunyo monte ceceny kiye mosoyam nto ce mosoye, monte cisot.
Omnye cenye mpo pikap koret tokol tukucutecu: ntene om wule omite akwek, nkete Papamwoŋ kule omöce akwek tukucutecu.
Kunyo onyosye aceny oŋnkokoci kunyor soponwekwok poytoyisyetap Yiyintet, sukuŋet cetoswok akwek tukucutecu.’’
“Monte cemuye akwek luket nyi miniŋ! Omnye ŋerekat Papamwoŋ kokonok akwek poytoyisyet.

Oyalye tukukwok oŋnkokoci pononik pesanik, oŋnkokonorkyikey akwek munyenkutap pesanik nye puryo kot kuyositu kupunto, okonore mokoryontinekwok torot wule puryo kot kurice corik oŋnkupuryo kot kwome solopik.
Omnye wule mitowune mokoryontinekwok ku wuloto wule mitowune mukuleywekwok.’’
“Omotyi sirokwok suwe, oŋnkoyaste tarinekwok kuloytos;
akerkeyitu pic ce mite kukonye mokoryontemwa nye mosukuwecekey kucone sakwetap komütisyet, nteye kaweckey neto oŋnkukonykony kurket kuyotyini lakwar.

Ponto kupeyoy mutworik co ye kaco mokoryontemwa cokunyor cekto kumite kukösu kukenisyi! Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosukuco cicoto wo; oŋnkucokulackey oŋnkusat cek kopur ŋony topon oŋnkupoyis.
Ponto kupeyoy mutworik ce ye kaco nyewo panta nyepo oyeny ye komoy kwen oko panta nyepo somok ye kerir koret cokunyor cekto kumite kuyunyoto.
Möce oŋnket akwek topon kule, ntenkete citap koto sawet nye cone corintet nto puryo kot komuce cicoto kupapakta konyi kuput oŋnkowut orit corintet.
Kunyo mpo akwek misyini oyiytekey, omnye mosukuco Weritap cito om sawet nyo puryo kot osotyini akwek kule muce kucone.’’
Kumwoy Petero kule, “Mokoryontet, mwowec acek nkit tyonkoconi nto mwocini mpo piko tokol?’’

Kuwekyi Mokoryontet Yesu kumwoci kule, “Mwowo ani pa, ŋo mutworin nye cikenekey oŋnkuŋom? Nyoto kunye ye kokukoci mokoryontenyi kurip yisyonutekap kanyi tokol, kupcicini pikap yisyet omikwa om pesyet nyo cemokyini.
Ponto kupeyoy mutworintonoto nye ye kaco mokoryontenyi cokunyor neto kwiye yisyenyi kuyunyoto.
Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosukuco mokoryontet oŋnkukoci mutworintonoto kupayta tukukyi tokol.
Ntene ye kumwoy mutworintet om moyenyi kule, tokulow ye mosukuco mokoryontenyu, oŋnkucec kupir piko moronik oko koruk co yiyisyi, oŋnkwomis oŋnkuyesyo kupokit,

mosukupun mokoryontenyi om pesyet nyo puryo kot kusotyini, oŋnku om sawet nye puryo kot kunket neto, oŋnkunäm mutworintonoto kuyepune oyeny, oŋnkuwunukyi kunyor taŋanynta wanak oko piko co puryo kot kucömisyi.
“Nto mutworin nye nkete ce möce mokoryontenyi kule kwiy neto; oŋnkupuryo kot kusat nto kwiy kuyu wule moktoy mokoryontet, mosicepas neto nyoto korokonik ce caŋ.

Ntene mutworin nyo puryo kot kunket ce moce mokoryontenyi oŋnkwiy ce roke ce pase, mosicepas neto nyoto korokonik ce ŋeri. Nto ci tokol nyo kicikoci ce caŋ, mosicemake neto nyoto koyin ce caŋ, nto cito nyo kicikoci kurip tukuk ce caŋ, mosicemake neto nyoto koyin ce caŋ kutil coto.’’
“Kyaco ani cowirci mata koret, kunyo nto nkonkuyunyi kumite kuloye!
Oponte patisanet nye mosicepatisana, kunyo mataŋany okoy koyin awany!
Komwowok ani akwek kule, osoti kule kyaco asutu kalyet? Puryo kot kuyunyo, ntene kyosutu pate pciyatet!
Kuceke yawut mosukupciykey piko mutu cepo koto akenke, kutay piko co somok piko co oyeny, kutay piko co oyeny piko co somok.

Mosukupciykey kwan oko werit, kupciykey werit oko kwan. Kupciykey kamet oko cepto, kupciykey cepto oko kamet, kupciykey kametitap werit oko korketap werinyi, kupciykey korketap werit oko kametitap santenyi.’’
Kuwekyikey Yesu piko oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ye kokäs akwek polik kumite raraktay, yoto omwowu akwek lakwar kule mosukuropen koret, kuyuyit nyoto kuropen koret.
Nteye kokäs kuwuse yomet nye cone tö, omwowu kule, mosukulay asista, kuyuyit nyoto kulay asista.
Akwek koperperoticu! Yu oŋnket akwek okäs wule yunto tukuk ce mokwiyokis om koret parak, omne yu puryo kot omuci kot oŋnket ŋalek ce yiyoktos om pesyosyecu?’’
“Kunyo omne yu puryo kot omuci akwek kot orwoc nkit okoy oŋnket ŋalek cepo manta ce roke oyiy?

Ye kowosontyiŋ citake kukweriŋ koti, syem koromun aŋalal olimncine oko cicoto ye tomite opeti om aran, oŋnkowany ŋalekwok, mente kot kukweriŋ okoy wule mite ketintet, kuŋet nyo kuratiŋ kukoytiŋ iwo wule mite sikarek, kuŋet co kukertiŋ mopusi.
Komwowuŋ kule puryo kot muci nyi cone mopusi mpo kisic okoy konu pesanik tokol.’’
Kimite pesyosyecoto piko alak ce kimwoci cek Yesu ŋalek ce nöme pikap Kalilaya, ce kipar Pilato kupok oŋnkulinyo korotikwa oko korosekwa ye kimite cek kukoyitoy korosekwa.
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Osoti akwek kule kiponto picoto miyotyonik kusir piko alak tokol ce kimite Kalilaya omnye kicitaŋany kuyunyoto?
Puryo kot kuyunyo! Komwowok ani akwek kule, ye puryo kot arenynkey ayaste miyotyonikwok, mosoyaran opoku mpo akwek tokol kuyu wule kyaranta kupok picoto.
Nto osoti akwek kule piko co ki taman ok sisit co kilulyi koto om Siloam kupakäc kupok kuce piko ce kilelotin kusir piko alak tokol ce kiminye Yerusalem?
Puryo kot kuyunyo! Komwowok ani akwek kule ye puryo kot arenynkey ayaste miyotyonikwok, mosoyaran opoku mpo akwek kuyu wule kyaranta kupok picoto.’’
Kumwoci Yesu cek tyonkoconi kule, “Kiponto citake mokoywenyi nye kiwu rotinyi, kuco pesyet ake kule cakäs nto kukwiy omik, yoto puryo kot cokunyorta kiy.
Kumwoci cicoto kopotintet kule, ‘Kenyitap somok nyi aconi ani kule cekäs omikap mokoywoni, ntene puryo kot onyortoy kiy; kunyo yep kulul! Omne sokowurta kwam teŋek pate?’
Kuwekyi kopotintet kumwoci cicoto kule, ‘Mokoryontet, yaste kopur kenyini pate okoy opotyi ani omutu oŋnkokoci puresik.
Nteye kayiy omik om pesyosyek co kwoni; kunyol kutoponit nteye puryo, yep yoto kulul.’ ’’
Kimite Yesu kunetisyi ye kipesyetap Sapat om kotapkokwet ake.
Kimite yoto korket ake nye kinäm oyinoto kumnyan kusyen kuwany kenyisyek taman ok sisit nye kiyim pate nye puryo kot komuce kot kuculkey mpo kisic.
Ntowo kukäs Yesu korkonoto, kukur kuco ye mite neto oŋnkumwoci kule, “Cepyosyani, kacityaceniŋ nyi rewonoteŋuŋ!’’
Kukemer Yesu yewuniyekyi korkonoto, yoto pakenke kuŋet kuyo oŋnkuculkey oŋnkucec kukasta Yiyintet.

Yoto kunerec nyewo nye poytoy kotapkok, omnye kisopis Yesu om pesyetap Sapat. Kumwoci cicoto piko kule, “Mite pesyosyek co lö co misyini ciyisye yisyonutek, kunyo okwoni kwocisopok om pesyosyecoto. Ntene monte cekwoni ye pesyetap Sapat.’’
Kuwekyi Mokoryontet kumwoci cicoto kule, “Akwek koperperoticu! Puryo kot kutyoce citake tokol om akwek yeyinyi nto sikiryenyi kutyace pewut ye pesyetap Sapat oŋnkukwer kuwo wokuye peko?
Kunyo akäs pa korkoni nye mucokoretap Apram, nye kirat Setani neto kuwany kenyisyek taman ok sisit, kupuryo kot kumisyini cityokyi neto porokyi ye pesyetap Sapat?’’
Nteyu kowo kumwoy Yesu ŋalecato, kulilonis punikyi, ntene kuŋerec piko alake tokol om tukuk cepo kakitat ce kikwiye neto.
Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Kerkey poytoyisyetap Yiyintet oko kiy ne? Mosoyuyite ani kiy ne?
Kerkey oko kupuswontetap ketit nye cekure kalitarit nye kinäm citake oŋnkukol mparenyi, kupit okoy kuwoyit kwek ket nyewo, kukwa toritek kwokutec korikwa sarisyekap ketoto.’’
Kumwoy Yesu yec kule, “Mosoyuyite ani ne poytoyisyetap Yiyintet?
Kerkey oko mumarek ce kinäm korket ake oŋnkutankwar oko pusyekap nkanuk cepo tepenik somok kukut kunyiy tokol.’’
Kunomen Yesu kuwo kupunte moŋosyek oko soŋwek kunetisyoti om pan nyi ye kiweti Yerusalem.
Kutepe citake neto kule, “Mokoryontet, ŋeri so pate piko ce mocisop?’’ Kumwoci Yesu cek kule,
“Otitir osyem koromun opunte kurket nye maric; omnye komwowok ani kule, caŋ piko ce mosukusyem kule ciwut orit, ntene puryo kot komuce cekto kot kowut.

Ye kotepe kot kuŋet citap koto oŋnkuker kurkenyi, oŋnkoyoŋe akwek saŋ oŋnkokonykony kurket omwowu kule, ‘Mokoryontet, yotwec acek kurket!’ Mosukuwekwok kumwoy kule, ‘Puryo kot oŋnketok ani akwek, okwone ono?’
Yoto mosowec akwek omwowu kule, ‘Kikyomisyi acek wanak oko nyi, oŋnkinetisye nyi soŋwekyacek.’
Mosukuwekwok yec cicoto kumwowok kule, ‘Puryo kot oŋnketok ani akwek, okwone ono? Aŋete taymwani akwek cu oyiye ŋalek ce miyotec!’
Tya yoto nyun rirek oko nyiyetap kelak ye kokäs akwek Apram oko Isaka oko Yakopo oko workoyik kumite cek wule mite poytoyisyetap Yiyintet, oŋnkurok yec omite akwek kacekwetyok saŋ!
Mosukukwane piko koŋasis oko raraktay oko makentany oko tö oŋnkwokopure yepo meset om poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.
Kunyo möce okäs kule piko co mite yawut letut kuce mosukwokupoyit tayta, nto piko co mite yawut tayta kuce mosukwokupoyit letut.’’
Yoto pakenke kukwa Farasayek alake wule kimite Yesu oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ŋet wete wuli, nomen wecikey poninekuk, omnye möce Erote kule apakäciŋ nyi.’’
