Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Ape womwoci mokoytina kule, ‘Mosakwet ani oyik oŋnkosop porwonik pesyoni oko pesyetap tun, nteye pesyetap somok awany yisyemwani.’
Ntene misyino awo poninekwani pesyoni oko pesyetap tun oko pesyetap koyin, omnye puryo kot komukoktos cepar kumeci workoyonto saŋ, nye puryo kot ku Yerusalem orit.

Opo! Yerusalem! Yerusalem! Nyi nyi poköci workoyik, oŋnkiwire rwontok piko co kiciyok kukwa wule mite nyi, om aret ce tya ye kyamac ani kule oruruc lekokuk kukwa wule omite ani, kuyu wulo ruruktoy nkokyet lekokyi korurukyi kepepokyi orit, ntene toyisye nyi.
Käs pa kacepokokwok komwoŋ kwek kiratya. Kunyo komwowok ani akwek kule, puryo kot toköso ani akwek okoy pesyet nye mosomwowu kule, ‘Ponto kupeyoy neto nye coni om kaynetap Mokoryontet.’ ’’
Nteye kipesyetap Sapat, kuwo Yesu wokwomis omik om kotap Farasoyintet ake nye kipoytoyin. Yoto kurip piko kukäs Yesu topon koromun.
Kimite yoto po taytap Yesu citake nye kikokwa porto tokol.
Yoto kuwekyikey Yesu Farasayek oko konetikap ntarastinek oŋnkutepe cek kule, “Cöme ra ntarastinek cisop cito ye pesyetap Sapat nto puryo?’’
Kusisio cek. Kunäm Yesu cicoto oŋnkusop oŋnkumwoci kuwecikey.
Oŋnkumwoci cek kule, “Ye ponto citake om akwek werinyi nto yeyinyi oŋnkusuci kurumnco ye pesyetap Sapat, kupuryo kot kuweti lakwar wokocut ye pesyetap Sapat?’’
Yoto kupurune cekto kuwec ŋalecato.
Nteyu kowo kukäs Yesu toyek ce kikweye oteputek ce tokunotin cepo tay, kumwoci neto piko tokol tyonkoconi kule,
“Ye kokuriŋ citake sakwetap komütisyet, mente wopure otepto nye tokunot nyepo tay, omnye pesyet ake kokokukur cicoto kokuriŋ nyi citake nyewo kupëliŋ nyi kuco sakwanato.
Mosukuco cicoto kokurok akwek tukway oŋnkucokumwowuŋ nyi kule, ‘Ŋetyi otepto cito nyi!’ Mosecurokisye nyi oŋnkiwo yec wepure otepto nyepo let!

Ntene ye kocekuriŋ sakwet, iwo wepure otepto nye mite let, nteye kaco cito nyo kokuriŋ nyi, cokuŋetiŋ kumwowuŋ kule, ‘Corwenyu, co nyi yu po tay.’ Yoto nyoru nyi om yoto kayweyatet om wule mite piko co kopur tokol.
Omnye ci tokol nye silekey kusutkey parak nkit, mosicirekune nyoto, nto ci tokol nyo yweyisyi kurektokey nkit, mosicilaŋnta nyoto.’’

Yoto kumwoci Yesu cicoto kokure neto cokwomis kanyi kule, “Ye kekur piko kukwa kwokwomis kaŋuŋ omikap pet, nto sakwa, mente okur pate mpo yeyaŋuŋ nto tilyonutekuk, nto latosyekuk ce mokoren, omnye mosukukuriŋ nyi cek sakwet ake kuyokuŋ.
Mente ayiy kuyunyo, ye keyiy sakwet, kur pononik oko piko co kipok kerenkok, oko co mwolyos oko piko co koryotin;
mesenyoru nyi kupeyok, omnye puryo kot kuponto cek picoto tukuk ce mokuyokuneniŋ nyi, ntene kuyokuŋ Yiyintet nyi om pesyet nyo ciŋete kotutune met piko ce toponec.’’
Nteyu kowo kulim ŋalecato citake nye kipontokey Yesu kwomisyi tokol om meset, kumwoci cicoto neto kule, “Ponto kupeyoy neto cito nyo mosukopur ŋony kwomis om poytoyisyetap Yiyintet!’’
Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Kimite citake nye kikwiyta sakwet, oŋnkukur toyek ce caŋ.
Ntowo kupunto pesyetap sakwet, kuyokto cicoto mutworintenyi kuwo wokumwoci piko co kucekur kule, ‘Akwa, omnye kaceyiyta kiy ake tokol!’
Yoto kucec ci tokol om picoto kicekure kuŋalal kumwoy kito nye kakerekta neto maco. Kumwoy nyepo tayta kule, ‘Kwayal mparet kunyo misyini awo wakäs, kunyo osomiŋ kule kalya puryo kot aconi ani.’
Kumwoy ake kule, ‘Kwayal yeyik taman ce potisyi, kunyo omite oweti kule wasyemnte yeyicato, kunyo somiŋ kule kalya puryo kot aconi ani.’
Kumwoy ake kule, ‘Kutomütisyi korket, kunyo om ŋolyontonoto puryo kot aconi ani.’

Yoto kuwo mutworintet wokumwoci mokoryontenyi ŋalecato tokol, kunyer citap kayta, oŋnkumwoci mutworintenyi kule, ‘Iwo sartekey lakwar wulo po orustunwek kacatanik oko arosyek ce minkec cepo moŋet, oŋnkikweru kukwa yu piko co pononik oko co kipok kerenkok, oko co kikoryo, oko co mwolyos!’
Yoto lakwar kumwoy mutworintet kule, ‘Mokoryontet, kaceyiyta tokol co kemwowu nyi, ntene oŋnkutokupara koto.’
Yoto kumwoci mokoryontet mutworintet kule, ‘Iwo arosyek co mite koret saŋ oko kacatanik wekur piko kukwa, sukuŋet kunyiy piko komwani.’
Kunyo komwowok ani akwek kule, puryo mpo akenke om picoto kicekure nye muce kot kucemcem sakwemwani!’’
Nteye kimite piko ce caŋ kupeti kurupe Yesu, yoto kuwekyikey neto piko oŋnkumwoci kule,

“Ye kaco citake tokol wule omite ani oŋnkupuryo kot kupciykey oko kwan oko kamet, oko korkenyi, oko lekokyi, oko mpo mutakwam, oko mpo cekwam, oŋnkutaykey kunyilkey neto nkit kupuryo kot komuce nyoto kwek konomintemwani.
Nto citake tokol nye puryo kot komuce kukesen murtowontenyi oŋnkunama cepetekey oko ani kupuryo kot komuce nyoto kwek konomintemwani.
Omnye ŋo om akwek nye ye möce kule atec koto nyewo koromun, nye puryo kot kunyosyi kopur ŋony oŋnkuyitis kule oponte pesanik ce ceyeme otekse kuwany koto.
Nteye puryo kot kwiy kuyunyoto, muce kucec kutekso; nteye puryo kot kuwany koyoto, mosukurorici neto piko alak co kiköse cicoto ye kicec kuteksi.
Muce kuŋalal piko cut kunyil cicoto kumwoy kule, ‘Kicec cici kutekso ntene puryo kot komuc kuwany konyi’

Nto Kinko ŋo nye ye möce kule woporye Kinket ake, nye puryo kot kunyosyi kupur ŋony oŋnkusot kule omuci ra woporye Kinket nyin om sikarekap poryet elifunek taman ce oponte oŋnkuponto nyin sikarekap poryet elifunek tiptem?
Ye kakäs kule puryo kot omuci poryet, mosukuyokto piko kutorokta nyin tokumite wule low, oŋnkusom kumwoci kule, cesat kalyet pate.
Kuyunyoto om wule omite akwek, puryo kot kumuce akenke om akwek akwek konomintemwani ye puryo kot kupakakta kwasta tukuk ce ponto.’’
“Topon misyontet, ntene ye komo kunomu, kupuryo kot kumite aret ake yec nye cimuce cewec kot kunom.
Ye puryo kot konomu misyontet kupuryo kot kuroke cinure teŋek nto cekonor kwek nye cinure teŋek, ciswortoy pate. Kunyo ci nye ponto yitik ce limnte, roke kulimnta!’’
Nto mite pesyet ake, kukwa korurukikap mosoret ce caŋ oko piko co kicetay kwokorurukyikey ye kimite Yesu kulimnta ŋalekyi.
Yoto kucec koŋunyŋuny Farasayek oko konetikap ntarastinek kumwoy kule, “Ŋerekyini cici piko ce kicetay oŋnkwomis wanak oko cekto!’’
Ntene kumwoci Yesu cek tyonkoconi kule,
“Nteye ponto citake om akwek kecirekyi pokol akenke, oŋnkupot akenke om coto, puryo kot kupokokyini neto surukwenet cut tomonwokik sokol ok sokol oŋnkuwo kuceŋat nyo potot okoy kunyor?
Nteye kanyor kuŋerec oŋnkunäm kukemer kat;
ntowo kupun kanyi kukur coronutekyi oko latosyekyi, oŋnkumwoci kule, ‘Onte ceŋerec tokol wanak oko ani, omnye kwonyoru keciryenyu nye kukupot!’
Komwowok ani akwek kule, kuyunyoto mosiceŋerec om torot ye karenynkey cito akenke nye ponto miyotyo kupël piko ce toponec tomonwokik sokol ok sokol ce puryo kot kuroke kurenynkey.’’
Nto yec kule, “Ye ponto korket ake silinkinek taman, oŋnkupot akenke, kupuryo kot kupele tarit, oŋnkopuc koto, oŋnkuceny topon kot tokol okoy kunyor.
Nteye kanyor, kukur kukwa wanak coronutekyi oko latosyekyi, oŋnkumwoci cek kule, ‘Onte ceŋerec tokol wanak oko ani, omnye kwonyoru silinkit nye kukupot!’
Komwowok ani akwek kule, kuyu nyoto mosukuŋerec malaykanikap Yiyintet ye karenynkey cito akenke nye ponto miyotyo.’’
Kutosyi Yesu kumwoy kule, “Kimite citake nye kiponto werikyi oyeny.
Kumwoci werit nye miniŋ kwan kule, ‘Papa, ropkwo ani tukuk cecu.’ Yoto kupcici kwan werikyi tukway tukukwa.
Nto om letutap pesyos ce ŋeri, koruruc werit nye miniŋ tukukyi oŋnkunomen kuwu koret ake nye low.
Nteye kimite wuloto kuseret kowurta om aret nye miyat tukuk tokol. Nteyu kowo kwam kuwany tukuk tokol kunäm rupet nyewo koronoto, yoto kunäm pananiyantit lekwanato.
Kuwo wokwiyis yisyet kaytap citap koronoto, kukoci nyo kuwo wokwokis nkururwenik om kanyi.
Yoto kumac lekwanato kule ntayam sopiyoŋe perikap poroyonik ce kyome nkururwenik, ntene kupuryo ci nye kikoci neto kiy.
Om letut kusot nkit om kasoteywekyi okoy kumwoy kule, ‘Ponto Papamwani pakasinek ce omisyi okoy kupiyoŋ oŋnkuŋet omik, kunyi karik kupokokyo ani rupet wuli!
Kunyo mosaŋet oŋnkunomen awo wule mite Papamwani, oŋnkuwomwoci kule, Papa, kyawurte om wule mite Yiyintet oko om wule mite nyi.
Kunyo puryo kot tokumisyino cekureno ani weriŋuŋ; yiya ani pate oyiku akenke om pakasinekuk!’
Yoto kuŋet kunomen kuwo kaytap Papanyi. Nteyu kito kumite wule low karik kupunto kaytap kwan, yoto kukäs kwan neto, nteye kotoköse kwan kurire oŋnkulapat kutoroc oŋnkuŋatut.
Kumwoci weroto kwan kule, ‘Papa, kyawurte ani om wule mite Yiyintet oko om wule mite nyi, kunyo puryo kot tokumisyino ani cekureno weriŋuŋ.’
Kumwoci kwan mutworintenyi kule, ‘Osutu lakwar siret nye topon koromun oŋnkolokyi, oŋnkokoci komolilyet mornenyi, oŋnkolokyi, kweyonik kerenkokyi,
oŋnkokweru yeyito nye yakway kwayeny kyam ceŋerec acek.
Omnye kaco kusopot werimwani nye kikime, kikipot kunyi kotok.’ Yoto kucec kuŋerec cek tokol kwam sakwet.
“Ntene kimite yoto werit nyewo mparen, nteye kimite kuconi karik kupun ka, kulim polotet oko tumnto.
Yoto kukur mutworintet akenke oŋnkutepe kule, ‘Ŋal ne cu?’
Kumwoci mutworintet kule, ‘Kaco yeyaŋuŋ, kunyo kayeny Papaŋuŋ yeyito nye yakway omnye kaco yeyaŋuŋ kusopot.’
Ntene kunyer werit nyewo okoy kutay nye mowo koto orit. Kumiŋ kwan kuco saŋ oŋnkusaysay kumwoci kule, ‘Co ko orit!’

Kuwekyi werit nyewo kumwoci kwan kule, ‘Om kenyisyek tokol kyoyiwuŋ ani mutworyontit nye puryo kot otowuŋ ŋolyo mpo akenke, ntene puryo kot kono ani nyi mpo kucontet nye kayam aŋerec wanak oko coronutekwani.
Kunyi kaco yawut weriŋuŋyi nye kikuseret tukukukyi kowurte koruk cemoronisyek kunyi keyeŋnkyi nyi neto yeyito nye yakway!’
Kuwekyi kwan kumwoci neto kule, ‘Wenyo, cepontekey acek oko nyi okokoy, kunyo cekukyi tukuk tokol ce oponte ani.
Kunyo nyolyini ceŋerec acek wanak tokol, omnye kaco yeyaŋuŋ nyitenyi kikime kusopot, kikipot ntene kacenyoru neto yawut’.’’
Kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule, “Kimite citake nye mokoryo nye kiponto ripintet nye kipoytoy tukukap cicoto mokoryo, yoto cemwoci piko alake cicoto mokoryo kule, ‘Wurtoy ripinteŋuŋ tukukuk.’
Kukur cicoto ripintenyi oŋnkumwoci kule, ‘Ŋal ne cu olimnciŋ ani nyi? Yitwo ani tukuk tokol co kweripe nyi! Omnye kemeyiku nyi yec ripin.’
Kumwoy ripintonoto nkit om moyenyi kule, ‘Mosayiy ne ani? Omnye kokunumuneno mokoryontenyu yisyetap ripset, kunyo puryo kot oponte swamet nye opotisye, oŋnkoliloni ye mosomote.
Kumwoy kule, oŋnket kito nye mosayiy, sukuŋet ye kacinumuneno yisyetap ripset kuŋerekyo ani piko ye kowo korikwa.’
Yoto kukur ripintonoto ci ake tokol nye kiponto pesentap mokoryontenyi, oŋnkumwoci nyepo tayta kule, ‘Yociŋ nyi mokoryontemwani ata?’
Kumwoy nyo kule, ‘Ntepenik pokolwokik oyeny cepo mwayitap uto.’ Kumwoci nyo kule, ‘Oŋyi kartasiŋuŋ, pur ŋony lakwar oŋnkisil pokol pate.’
Nto ake kutepe kule, ‘Ntenyi ceyociŋ ata?’ Kumwoy nyo kule, ‘Kuniyanik cepo nkanuk sosom.’ Kumwoci nyo kule, ‘Oŋyi kartasiŋuŋ, sil tiptem oko mut pate.’
Kukasta mokoryontenyi ripintonoto puryo kot kupo manta omnye kikwiy kiy nyepo ŋomnon; omnye ŋomec pikap koroni om wule yiytoy tukuk ce nöme cekto kupël piko cepo lakweyet.’’
Kutosyi Yesu kumwoy kule, “Kunyo omwowok ani akwek kule, anäm coronutek om mokoryontitap tukuk ce miyotec cepo koret, nteye kapok coto, ceŋerekyok akwek akwa kayita nye ominye okokoy.

Ci tokol nye cikenekey om tukuk ce tukusic, kunye cikenekey mpene nyoto om tukuk ce caŋ; nto ci nye puryo kot kwiye cepo manta om tukuk ce tukusic, kupuryo kot kwiye neto nyoto cepo manta om tukuk ce caŋ.
Kunyo nteye puryo kot cimuce cikenenokey akwek ye morip mokoryontitap tukukap koret, ku ŋo nye muce kukenenokey akwek kukonok orip mokoryontit nyepo manta?
Nteye puryo kot cikenenokey akwek om tukuk cepo citake, ku ŋo nye muce kukonok akwek tukuk ce cikwakwek nkit?

“Puryo mutworin nye muce kwek mutworintetap mokorenik oyeny, omnye muce kusenker ake oŋnkucäm ake; nto muce kuywey ake oŋkunyil ake. Puryo koto muci akwek oyici yisyet Yiyintet oko mokoryontitap koret.’’
Yoto kulim Farasayek ŋalecato tokol, kucasekey cek Yesu omnye kicöme cek mokoryontit koromun.

Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Akwek kuce oportoykey om konyekap piko kule oyiye ce toponec, ntene nkete Yiyintet mukuleywekwok orit, omnye tukuk co kostoy piko kule ponto latik, kuce tukuk ce puryo kot kuponto latik coto mpo kisic om konyekap Yiyintet.

“Okoy kupun pesyosyekap Yowana, kimite yoto kwiyisyi ntarastinekap Moses oko ŋalekap workoyik, ntene kuceke yoto okoy pesyosyecu; cemite yawut cemwoytoy lokoywek ce toponec cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet. Kunyo mite ci tokol kutitire kule owut orit.
Muce kupok wulin po torot oko ŋony, ntene puryo kot komukoktos mpo kisic kot cinum nyukutet akenke nyepo ntarastinek.
“Ci nye kakwet korkenyi, oŋnkomüt ake kakwiy cito nyoto sakwayanat, nto ci nye kemüt korko nye kikwet santenyi, kakwiy mpo cito nyoto sakwayanat.’’
Kutosyikey Yesu kumwoy kule, “Kimite citake nye kimokoryo; nye kiloce sirok ce toponec corornec oko celelac, nye kiŋerekyinikey pesyosyek tokol om mokoryontinyi.
Kimite mpo yec pananet ake nye cekure Lasaro, nye kiponto serkecok ce kinäm porto tokol, nye kicesutu kuco cokopure yepo kurketap mokoryontet.
Kimöce Lasaro kule ntoyome sipiyoŋe omik ce kileleku kosuwune mesetap mokoryontonoto. Kikwoni mpo ŋokik yoto kwokumele serkecokyi.
Yoto kume pananetkey, kusut malaykanik neto okoy kupunto komostap Apram om torot wule kimite sakwet. Yoto kume mpene mokoryontet, cemuy.
Nteye kimite mokoryontet kapkompic kunyor taŋanyntap mwoninto, yoto kunyal torot okoy kukäs Apram kumite wule low, oko Lasaro nye kimite kepure yepo komosnyi.
Yoto kukursyo kumwoy kule, ‘Papa, Apram kalya rirena ani, yoku Lasaro kuco cokowute walyitap mornenyi peko oŋnkutise ŋelyepmwani, omnye omite taŋanynta om wuli mite mayi loye!’

Ntene kumwoy Apram kule, ‘Wenyo, möce sot oŋnkinket kule, kinyoru nyi tukuk cepo soponto nye topon om soponŋuŋ tokol, kuyu wulo kinyor Lasaro tukuk cepo soponto nye miyat, ntene kunyo mite Lasaro yawut om wuli soponto nye topon, kunyo mite nyi taŋanynta.

Kunyo kumite ŋalekyo yo, kunyi mite mwenet nye kiwo ŋony koromun nye mite kwenunyacek oko akwek, nye puryo kot kumuce kwoy kukwa wulo piko cekwone wuli ce mite acek, oŋnkupuryo kot kumuce kwoy kukwa wuli piko cekwone wulo omite akwek.’
Kumwoy cicoto kimokoryo kule, ‘Kunyo osomiŋ ani nyi Papa Apram kule, yokte Lasaro kuwo kaytap papamwani,
omnye oponte ani mpo yeyamwani mut, kunyo kuwo neto oŋnkuwokusowu cek koromun mente kot kukwa mpecek wuli mite taŋanyntap mata!’
Kumwoy Apram kule, ‘Puryo kot kuyunyo, omnye ponto mpo yeyaŋuŋ Moses oko workoyik ce muce kumwoci ŋalek, kunyo misyini kulimnci cekto coto ŋalek.’
Ntene kumwoy cicoto kule, ‘Puryo kot kuyunyo, Papa Apram; omnye ye ketutune met citake oŋnkuwo wule mite cekto; mosukurenynkey.’
Ntene kumwoci Apram neto kule ‘Ye puryo kot komuce cek kot kulimnci Moses oko workoyik, kupuryo kot komuce mpo kucäm nka kot ketutune met citake.’ ’’
Kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule, “Mosukutok tukuk ce noce kuwec piko kwiy miyotyet, ntene mite kwapi cito nyo sutu kwiyokis tukucoto!
Roke cerotyi katitap cicoto rwantetap paka oŋnkyewirci ruretyet orit, kusir ye kotokyostoy cicoto kuwurta piko ce tinimnkec ceyucu kwiy miyotyo.
Oripkey! Ye koyiwuŋ yeyaŋuŋ miyotyonik, polyi neto, nteye karenynkey kalye.
Nteye koyiwuŋ nyi neto miyotyet aret tisap om pesyet akenke, oŋnkuco wule mite nyi aret tisap cokumwowu kule karenynkey, misyini kalye.’’
Kumwoci kiyokik Mokoryontet Yesu kule, “Toswec acek koyenet.’’

Kuwec Mokoryontet kumwoy kule, “Nto yunye oponte akwek koyenet nyewo kuyu kupuswontetap ketit nye cekure kalitarit, nto muci kot omwoci ketit mokoywet kule, ŋeyakisye kirinta nkit, oŋnkiwo wepite ruretyet, kulimwok akwek.’’
“Nteye ponto citake om akwek mutworintet nye potisyi nto nye okisyi kecirek, ye kacone mparen nto yecey, muci nyi pa mwoci kule, ‘Sorukey lakwar cepur ŋony oŋnkiyomisye?’
Puryo kot kuyunyo! Ntene mwocini nyi kule, ‘Yosye omikwani kiny kunyo, oŋnkipaya kot oyomisye oŋnkoyesye ani, nteye kawany, yomisye oŋnkiyesye nyi om letut!’
Kunyo puryo kot kumisyini cikasta mutworintonoto omnye kakwiy yisyet nye cemokyini kwiy? Puryo kot kuyunyoto?
Kuyunyoto mpo akwek; ye kawany oyiy yisyet nye kucemokwok kule oyiy, omwowu kule, ‘Ciku acek mutwor ce puryo kot kuponto latik, omnye kukyiy yisyet nye kucemwowec kule ayiy.’ ’’
Nteye kiweti Yesu Yerusalem, kuwo kupunte kwenutap koretap Samariya oko Kalilaya.
Ntowo kupun moŋet ake, kutuye neto piko taman ce kiponto mutyenkenik. Kuyoŋe picoto wule low,
oŋnkukursyo kupol kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet Yesu, rirenec acek!’’
Nteye kotoköse Yesu picoto kumwoci cek kule, “Ape woporcikey tisik.’’ Nteye kimite picoto kupeti om aran kusopco tokol.
Ntowo kukäs akenke om picoto kule kosop, kuweckey kuco kutumon om kutit nyewo kukostoy Yiyintet.
Kuco okoy cokoputyi yepo kerenkokap Yesu oŋnkukasta kumwoci kule, keyiy topon. Cicoto kunye ki Samariyantet.
Yoto kuŋalal Yesu kumwoy kule, “Kopuryo kot cisop piko tokol ku taman, onto cut sokol?
Puryo mpo akenke nye kaweckey kuco cokukasta Yiyintet, tos pate tontoni?’’
Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Ŋete yony, oŋnkiwecikey kokusopiŋ nyi koyeneŋuŋ.’’
Kutepe Farasayek alake Yesu kule, “Coni pesyo ne poytoyisyetap Yiyintet?’’ Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot kuconi poytoyisyetap Yiyintet cekosonu ye coni.
Puryo kot cimuce cemwoy kule, ‘Akäs oŋyi mite yu! Nto oŋyin mite yun!’ Omnye ŋalek cepo manta kucu kule, mitowune poytoyisyetap Yiyintet wule omite akwek.’’
Yoto kumwoci Yesu konomik kule, “Mosukuponto pesyet nye mosomac akwek kule nto cekäs akenke om pesyosyekap Weritap cito, ntene puryo kot omuci yoto kot okäs.
Mosukumwowok akwek piko alake kule, ‘Akäs oŋyi mite yu! Nto akäs oŋyin mite yun!’ Monte cirway arup picoto.
Kuyu wulo kweŋntoy kaweketap ilet koret parak kuceke tapan okoy tapan; kuyunyoto wule mosukwiytakey pesyetap Weritap cito.
Ntene mosukunyosyo kutaŋany koromun, oŋnkutay neto pikap pintap pesyosyecu.
Kuyu wule kiyunto om pesyosyekap Nuwa, kuyunyoto wule mosukwiytakey om pesyosyekap Weritap cito.
Omnye kimite piko om pesyosyecoto kipo Nuwa, kwomisyi oŋnkuyesyi, kukesyi komüte moronik koruk oŋnkyimüte koruk okoy pesyet nyo kiwute Nuwa rapet, yoto kutumnkey peko oŋnkupakäc piko tokol.
Mosukwiytakey mpo wule kiyunto koret om pesyosyekap Lot, ye kimite piko tokol kwomisyi, oŋnkukesyi komüte moronik koruk oŋnkuteksi korik.
Nto om pesyet nye kiŋete Lot kuwete Sotom; kuropen mata oko rwontok ce loyotin om torot oŋnkupel kupakäc kwaranta piko tokol.
Kunyo mosukwiytakey nyoto om pesyet nye ciŋoŋu cipor Weritap cito.

“Om pesyosyecoto, ye mite citake konyi kisyek oŋnkumite tukukyi koto orit, kupuryo kot kuroke kurek oŋnkuwokunum tukucoto, kuyunyoto mpo om wule mite cito nye mite mparen, puryo kot kuroke kuweckey neto kuwo kanyi.
Asot pa korketap Lot!
Ci tokol nye möce kule osoru osop sopon nyi, kupote nyoto sopon nyi, nto ci tokol nyo kepot sopon nyi, mosukusor kusop nyoto sopon nyi.
Om kwomowutap pesyonoto, mosicenyor piko oyeny ce koruy kwiririt akenke, cesut ake cepakakta ake,
cenyor koruk oyeny ce ŋosye rwantet akenke, cesut ake cepakakta ake.
[Cenyor piko alak oyeny kumite mparen, cesut akenke oŋnkyepakakta ake.]’’
Kutepe konomik Yesu kumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, om ono?’’ Kuwec Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Wule mite musto ku wuloto wule rurukyinikey motomwek.’’
Yoto kumwoci Yesu cek tyonkocet sukuŋet kunet kule misyini kusome cek okokoy nye puryo kot kucostos.
Kumwoy kule, “Kimite Ketintet ake nye kimite moŋet ake, nye kipuryo kot kuyweye Yiyintet oŋnkupuryo kot kuyweye ci tokol.
Kumite mpo korket ake nye musuk moŋonoto nye kiconi wule mite ketintonoto pesyosyek tokol cokumwocini kule, ‘Müt musankut nyepo manta kulot cito nyo owosontyini ani.’
Kutoyis ketintet kunyo, ntene om letut kusot nkit kumwoy kule, ‘Nka kot puryo kot oyweyi ani Yiyintet, oŋnkupuryo kot oyweyi ci tokol,
ntene om kayimatetap musukuni yimani okokoy, mosamüt musankut, sukuŋet komokuconi cokutaŋanya kwimen.’ ’’
Kumwoy Mokoryontet Yesu kule, “Olim pa wule mwoytoy ketintet nye puryo kot kwiye ŋalek cepo manta,
kunyo puryo kot komuce ra Yiyintet komüt musankut kukalya pikyi co rircini neto kusome kakalyantet komoy oko pet? Muce pa neto kulileyankey nye puryo kot kukolyoy cekto?
Komwowok ani akwek kule, mosukumüt Yiyintet musankut lakwar kuyunyoto kukalya cekto. Ntene yec, ye kaweckey pa Weritap cito, muce cokunyor koyenotet om koret?’’
Kumwoci Yesu tyonkoconi piko ce kisilekey cek nkit kule ciku toponec oŋnkunyil piko alak tokol.
Kumwoci kule, “Kinomen piko oyeny kupa wokusom om kotap Yiyintet, akenke om picoto kunye Farasoyintet nto ake kunye korurukintetap mosoret.

Kuyo Farasoyintet oŋnkusom nkit kumwoy kule, ‘Okostiŋ ani nyi, Ayi Yiyintet omnye puryo kot akerkeyekey ani oko piko alak tokol, ce cor, oŋnkuporisyi, oko co sakwayot, kuyu mpo korurukintoni po mosoret nyi mite yu.
Opuri ani okire omik aret oyeny om sopitit akenke, oŋnkokoniŋ ani nyi akenke om taman cepo tukuk tokol ce onyoru!’
Ntene kuyoŋe korurukintetap mosoret ye low, nye kipuryo mpo kot kunyal torot, ntene kusyeckey teket oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Ayi Yiyintet, kalya ani ci nye oponte miyotyo!’ ’’

Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Komwowok ani akwek kule, kiweckey kuwo kanyi cicitenyi korurukintetap mosoret kukakikalya neto miyotyonikyi ntene puryo kot kunyin ake Farasoyintet; omnye ci tokol nye sutekey kulaŋntankey nkit parak, mosicirekune neto nyoto, ntene ci tokol nye sutekey kurektokey nkit ŋony, mosicilaŋnta neto nyoto kuwoyit.’’
Kukwer piko alake lekokwa kukwa wule mite Yesu, kule sukuŋet kukemer neto yewuniyekyi metewokap lekocoto, nteye kotoköse konomik picoto kikweru lekokwa, kuyete kukerekta cek.
Ntene kukur Yesu lekok kukwa wule mite neto, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Ayaste lekok kukwa wule omite ani! Monte ceyete, omnye po poytoyisyetap Yiyintet cekto ceyucutecu.
Komwowok ani akwek kule, ci tokol nye puryo kot kunöme poytoyisyetap Yiyintet kuyu lekwa, kupuryo kot kumuce neto nyoto kot kowut orit.’’
Kutepe poytoyintet ake Yesu kule, “Konetintet nye topon, mosayiy ne ani ye sonyoru soponto nye mopoku?’’ Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule,
“Omne sekureno ani nyi nye topon? Puryo ci nye topon, ntene Yiyintet pate nkit nye topon.
Nketi nyi ntarastinek mwowu kule, ‘Mente kot ayiy sakwayanat, mente kot apakäc ci. Mente kot acorsye, mente kot aŋalal mwiynan perperisye, ywey kon oko komet!’ ’’
Kuwec cicoto kumwoy kule, “Kyorip ani ntarastinecutecu tokol kuceke oyiku lekwa.’’

Ntowo kulim Yesu ŋalecato, kumwoci cicoto kule, “Mite kito akenke nye tokupotuŋ nyi, iwo weyalye tukuk tokol ce ponte oŋnkikoci pesanik pononik, mesenyoru mokoryontit om torot; oŋnkico ce nama cepetekey oko ani.’’
Nteye kotolime cicoto ŋalecato kunerec koromun, omnye kimokoryo nye kiponto tukuk ce caŋ.
Yoto kukäs Yesu wule kanerekta cicoto, kumwoy kule, “Mokuwuy koromun om wule mite piko co mokoren ce ponto tukuk ce caŋ ye mokowut cekto poytoyisyetap Yiyintet!
Lekit mpo kupunte Nkamiyet koŋntap sintanit kupël ye mokowut ci nye mokoryo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’’
Kutepe piko ce kilime ŋalecato Yesu kule, “Ŋo nyun cito nye muce cisop?’’
Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Tukuk ce puryo kot komukoktos om wule mite piko, komukoktos coto om wule mite Yiyintet.’’
Kumwoy Petero kule, “Käs pa! Kicepakakte acek korikyo oŋnkyekwa kwocinamiŋ cepetekey nyi.’’
Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, puryo ci nye ye kupakakta kanyi oko korket oko lekok, oko mpo yeyanyi, oko kamwa tokol, omnye karup neto poytoyisyetap Yiyintet,
nye puryo kot kunyor ce caŋ kupëlis om pesyosyecu, oŋnkunyor soponto nye mopoku om pesyosyek co kwoni.’’
Kukwer Yesu tapan kiyokik taman ok oyeny, oŋnkumwoci kule, “Olim pa, cemite yawut cepeti celoŋntoy Yerusalem, wule mosukwitita ŋalek tokol cepo manta co kisile workoyik ce nöme Weritap cito.
Mosicenäm neto oŋnkyikoci kunäm lamek ce mosukutaŋany, oŋnkucup, oŋnkuŋutyi;
mosukupas oŋnkupar kume, ntene om letutap pesyosyek somok mosukotutune met.’’
Ntene kipuryo kot kusow konomik kunket om yoto ŋalecata, kiwuŋotin ŋaleca om wule mite cekto, kipuryo kot kusow kunket kule komwoy Yesu ŋal ne.
Nteyu kowo kurikta Yesu Yeriko, kimite citake nye korat nye kipure aret tapan sukusomsi.
Nteye kotolime cicoto korat piko ce kimite kupeti kutile om aran, kutep kule, “Key kulene?’’
Kumwoci piko neto kule, “Yesu nyo nyepo Nasaret nye mite kukeytoy.’’
Yoto kupol kukurto cicoto kumwoy kule, “Yesu Weritap Tauti! Rirena ani!’’
Kupolyi piko ce kimite kupeti om tay kumwoci cicoto kule kusis. Ntene kutosyikey kupol koromun kumwoy kule, “Weritap Tauti! Rirena ani!’’
Yoto kuyo Yesu oŋnkumwyta cekwer cicoto korat kuco ye mite neto. Nteyu kowo kuco kurik, kutepe Yesu neto kule,
“Möce nyi kule oyiwuŋ ani ne?’’ Kumwoy cicoto kule, “Konetintet, omöce kule akäste yec.’’
Kumwoci Yesu cicoto kule, “Käste! Kakusopiŋ nyi koyeneŋuŋ.’’
Om yoto pakenke kusopco kukästa konyekyi. Kunamat cicoto kupetekey Yesu kukostoti Yiyintet. Nteye kotoköse piko tokol tukuk ce keyokis, kokasta tokol Yiyintet.
Kuwo Yesu okoy kupunto Yeriko, nteye kimite kupunte kwenutap moŋet,
kimite yoto citake nye cekure Sakayo nye kikorurukintetap mosoret nyewo, nye kimokoryo nye ponto tukuk ce caŋ.
Yoto kusyem Sakayo kule akäs oŋnkono nye Yesu, ntene kipuryo komuc kot kukäs omnye kicaŋ piko oko yec nye kinwac neto.
Yoto kulapat Sakayo kuwo taytap piko oŋnkuwokulany ketit mokoywet kule saŋet akäs, omnye kiweti Yesu wokupunte aranato.
Ntowo kuco Yesu okoy ketit ŋony, kunyal parak oŋnkumwoci Sakayo kule, “Sakayo, reku co ŋony lakwar; omnye omöce ani woru kaŋuŋ pesyoni.’’
Kurek Sakayo kuco ŋony lakwar, oŋnkuŋerekyi Yesu koromun.
Ntowo kukäs piko tokol kuyunyoto kucec koŋunyŋunyis kumwoy kule, “Kowo cici wokwek tontetap ci nye ponto miyotyo!’’
Kuyo Sakayo oŋnkuŋalal kumwoci Mokoryontet Yesu kule, “Om yuteyu yawut pakenke, mosopcici ani tukukwani pononik, nteye kyaperper olotu citake tokol oŋnkonumune kinyi, mosoyokyi aret amwan kucaŋit.’’
Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Kaco yawut pesyoni kosopet kayi. Omnye mpeneto cicitenyi kunye mucokoretap Apram.
Omnye kico Weritap cito cokuceny oŋnkusop ce kipotyo.’’
Nteye kimite kulimntoy piko ŋalecato, kutosyikey Yesu kumwoci cek tyonkocet, omnye kikirikta neto yoto kupunto Yerusalem, oko omnye kisote piko kule mosukuco lakwar poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.
Yoto kumwoy kule, “Kinomen mokoryontet ake kuwo koret ake nye low, sukuŋet wocikocine neto wuloto kamukeywek kwek Kinko oŋnkuweckey kuco ka.
Nteyu mokunomen, kukur mutworikyi taman oŋnkukoci ci ake tokol om cekto silinkinek pokol, oŋnkumwoci kule, ‘Oyiyisye kamonkesyantit okoy aweckey ani.’
Ntene kitoye pikap korenyi cicoto, yoto kuyokto piko alak kupa kunam let wokumwayta kule, ‘Puryo kot ce cöme acek cico kwek Kinko nyinyacek!’

“Ntowo kuweckey cicoto kukocikoci neto kamukeywek kwek Kinko, kumwayta cekwer kukwa ye mite neto mutworik co kikocini neto pesanik, kule sukuŋet oŋnket latikap pesanik ce kinyor cekto om kamonkesyantit.
Kuco nyepo tayta oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Mokoryontet, kiyi silinkinekyekuk pokolu silinkinek alak elifut akenke.’
Kumwoci cicoto nyoto kule, ‘Kiyiy topon, yiku nyi mutworin nye topon! Kunyo omnye cikeneninkey om pesan ce tukusic, kunyo nyoru yawut kamukeywek ce mepayte moŋosyek taman.’
Kuco nyepo oyeny oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Mokoryontet, kiyi silinkinekyekuk pokolu silinkinek alak pokolwokik mut.’
Kumwoci cicoto nyoto kule, ‘Mpenyi mepayte moŋosyek mut.’
Kuco ake oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Mokoryontet, okyu silinkinekuk pokol ce kyakonor ani oyukyi siret.
Omnye kyanyokoritu om wule mite nyi, omnye yiku nyi ci nye wuy, sute kiy nye puryo kot ku nyeŋuŋ, oŋnkikise mpo ce puryo kot kol nyi.’

Kumwoci cicoto nyoto kule, ‘Yiku nyi mutworin nye miyat! Mosoyiyisye ani ŋalekuk ce kwone kutiŋuŋ nkit oŋnkomütuŋ musankut! Ye kinket nyi kule, oyiku ani ci nye wuy, omnye osute kiy nye puryo kot ku nyenyu, oŋnkokise mpo ce kipuryo kot akol ani.
Kunyo ye yunyo, omne simekonore nyi pesanikwani Penki? Omnye nto kwowecekey ani kwoceketwo kuponto latik.’
Kumwoci cicoto mokoryo piko ce kimite keyoŋ yoto kule, ‘Onumune cici silinkinek co pokol oŋnkokoci mutworintet nyo ponto silinkinek elifut akenke.’
Kumwoci picoto mokoryontemwa kule, ‘Mokoryontet, ponto cicitenyi silinkinek elifut akenke!’
Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, ‘Komwowok ani akwek kule, ci tokol nye ponto, mosicikoci neto nyoto kucaŋit, nto ci tokol nyo puryo kot kuponto, nka mpo co ponto, mocinumune neto coto.
Nto wule mite punikwani cutecu kipuryo kot kucäm kule oyiku ani Kinko nyimwa, okweru kukwa yu oŋnkotil kupok om yu po taymwani!’ ’’
Nteyu kowo kumwoy Yesu ŋalecato okoy kuwany, kunomen kuntoci cekto kuwo Yerusalem.
Ntowo kurikta Pesapake oko Pesaniya om tulwetap ketik ce cekure seituninek, kuyokto konomik oyeny,
kumwoci kule, “Ape okoy opunte kayta nye mite taymwoŋ, nteye kowut kayata mosonyoru moyitap sikiryet nye ratat nye tompo kot kulany kuwete ci mpo akenke, atyac oŋnkokweru kuco yu.
Nteye katepenak citake kule, ‘Omne satyac akwek sikiryoni?’ Omwoci kule, ‘Möce Mokoryontet.’ ’’
Kunomen picoto kociyoktoy kupa okoy wokunyor kiy ake tokol kumite kuyu wulo kokomwoci Yesu cekto.
Nteye kimite kutyoce moyitap sikiryet, kutepe pikap sikiryet kule, “Omne satyac akwek moyitap sikiryet?’’
Kuwekyi kumwoci kule, “Möce Mokoryontet.’’
Yoto kukwer cek moytap sikiryet okoy wule mite Yesu oŋnkuyitoci sirokwa patayitap moyitap sikiryet, oŋnkulany kukonopci Yesu kopure parak.
Nteye kimite neto kuweti koyito cek sirokwa aret.

Ntowo kurikta Yesu Yerusalem, om aret nye rekune tulwetap ketik ce cekure seituninek, yoto kucec luketap konomik kukasta Yiyintet om ŋerekwek om polotetap tumnto nyewo om tukuk tokol cewoyec ce kikäs cek, kumwoy kule:
“Kukoci Yiyintet kupeyok neto Kinko nye coni om kaynetap Mokoryontet! Kopur kalyet torot, oŋnkupur woyinto wule mite Yiyintet!’’
Yoto kumwoci Farasayek alake ce kipontokey piko Yesu kule, “Konetintet, mwoci konomikuk kusisio!’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Komwowok ani akwek kule, ye kisisio cekto; mosukupol mpo rwontok.’’
Nteyu kowo kuco Yesu okoy kurik moŋet nyewo Yerusalem, nteye kutoköse kutopen, kurir kukalya kumwoy kule,
“Nto kesowu nyi nket pesyoni pate kito nye sutu kalyet! Ntene puryo kot muci yawut kot käs omnye wuŋat om konyekuk!
Omnye mosukupunto pesyosyek ce mosukutec punikuk totet komutuŋ nyi om komoswokik tokol.

Mosukopuryetiŋ poku kule toŋ oko piko ce minyiŋ nyi orit, nye puryo kot kupokoktoy cek om wule mite nyi rwantet ake kumite rwantet ake parak. Omnye kipuryo kot sowu nyi oŋnkinket pesyet nye cone Yiyintet cokusopiŋ kosoruŋ nyi!’’
Yoto kowut Yesu kotap Yiyintet orit, oŋnkucec kukwet piko ce kimite kwolyoyisyi om orit,
kumwoci cek kule, “Kicesil om silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Mosukwek komwani koto nye cesome.’ Kunyi kwawec akwek kwek kepenet nye wuŋekey corik!’’
Yoto kunetisye Yesu kotap Yiyintet pesyosyek tokol. Ntene kumac tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek oko poyikap piko kule cepakäc neto.
Ntene kipuryo kot kunyor cek wule mokwiyta, omnye kimite piko tokol kulimntoy ŋalekyi topon nye kipuryo kot kumöce kule nto cemuyte ŋolyo mpo akenke.
Nteye kipesyet ake, ye kimite Yesu kunete piko komwocini lokoywek ce toponec om kotap Yiyintet, yoto kukwa tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek oko poyik,
oŋnkwokutepe cek Yesu kule, “Mwowec acek, po ŋo kamukeywek cu yiye nyi tukucu? Ŋo nyi kikoniŋ nyi kamukeywecu?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Mpo ani mosatepenak akwek teputyoni kule, omwowo ani pa akwek,
kicone potisonisyetap Yowana wulin po torot nto kicone wule mite piko?’’
Yoto kurwoc cek kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Ye kocemwowu kule, ‘Kicone torot,’ mosukumwowec acek neto kule, ‘Omne satay akwek moyen ŋalekyi?’
Nteye kocemwowu kule, ‘Kicone wule mite piko,’ mosukuwirenec piko rwontok; omnye cöme piko kule workoyo Yowana manta.’’
Yoto kuwekyi cek Yesu kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot cinket wule kicone.’’
Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Mpo ani puryo kot omuci kot omwowok akwek wule anyortoy ani kamukeywek cu oyiye tukucu.’’
Kumwoci Yesu piko tyonkoconi kule, “Kiwu citake mparenyi nyepo ketik ce cekure sapipunek, oŋnkukoci kopotik ce kekotesan oŋnkunomen kuwo koret ake nye low wokuwany wuloto pesyosyek ce caŋ.

Nteyu kowo kupunto pesyosyek ce rurye omikap ketik ce cekure sapipunek, kuyok mutworintenyi kuco wule mite kopotik co kikotesonisyi, kule sukuŋet co kukoci mutworintonoto omik alak cepo mparetap ketik ce cekure sapipunek ce kikiciyoyekyin; ntene kunäm kopoticoto mutworintonoto oŋnkupir oŋnkukwet kuweto yewuniyek pate.
Kuyokto yec cicoto mutworintet ake, ntene kupir kopotik oŋnkunyalil mutworintonoto oŋnkukwet kuweto yewuniyek pate.
Kuyokto yec cicoto mutworintet nyepo somok, kupir kopotik mpo nyoto kukoten oŋnkukwetyi saŋ.
Yoto kumwoy citap mparetap ketik ce cekure sapipunek kule, ‘Mosayiy ne ani? Mosoyokte werimwani nyi akenke pate, pesyet ake muce cek kuywey neto!’
Nteye kotoköse kopotik weroto, kurwoc nkit kumwoy kule, ‘Nyitenyi kunye kontiyintet; akany cepakäc kume, sukuŋet kwek nyinyacek kontiyisyet!’
Kunäm kopotik weroto oŋnkucutune mparen oŋnkupakäc kume.’’ Kutep Yesu kumwoy kule, “Mosukwiye kiy ne citap mparanato kopoticoto?

Mosukuco nkit citap mparet oŋnkupar kupok kopoticoto oŋnkukoci kopotik alak ce kekotesan mparetap ketik ce cekure sapipunek.’’ Nteye kotolime piko ŋalecato, kumwoy cek kule, “Puryo kot kurok kwiyokis kuyunyo!’’

Kukäs Yesu kurotot cek topon, oŋnkutep kumwoy kule, “Mwowu ne nyun ŋalecu kicesil om silutekap Yiyintet kule: ‘Rwantet nyo kitoye tekik kule, puryo kot kuponto latik, Kunye kiweckey kwek rwantet nye pële tokol nye tiye koto tapan.’
Ci tokol nye kowircikey rwantanato kutirtiroktos neto nyoto, nteye kowircikey rwantanato citake kunyirnyire cicoto.’’
Kusyem om yoto konetikap ntarastinek oko tisik cewoyec kule cenäm Yesu, omnye kinket kule komwoy Yesu tyonkocet nyepo ŋalek ce nöme cekto. Ntene kuywey piko.

Yoto kuceny cek pesyet nye topon. Kwal piko alak ce kosutkey picoto kuyu pic ce toponec, oŋnkuyokto cek picoto kupa wokulot kutepe Yesu ŋalek ce mosukumwoy, sukuŋet kunäm oŋnkukwer wokuwosontyine taytap poytoyintet nyewo nye ponto kamukeywek.

Kupa picoto oŋnkuwokutepe cek Yesu kule, “Konetintet, cinket kule, ŋalek ce mwowu nyi oko ce netinyi kuce ŋalek cepo manta, oŋnkyinket kule, puryo kot cöme nyi ŋalek cepo citake oŋnkitay cepo ake, ntene netinyi ŋalekap Yiyintet cepo manta.
Kunyo, mwowec acek, cömwec pa ntarastinekyo cekweci mosoret Kinko Nyewo nto puryo?’’
Ntene kunket Yesu tekutekwa. Kumwoci kule,
“Oporwo ani pa akwek silinkit? Po ŋo metit oko kaynet nyi silot silinkini?’’ Kuwekyi cek kumwoci kule, “Po Kinko Nyewo.’’
Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Kunyo okocini Kinko Nyewo tukuk cepo Kinko Nyewo, okocini Yiyintet tukuk cepo Yiyintet.’’
Yoto kipuryo komuc cek kot kunyor lelis om ŋalekyi ce kimwoy om taytap piko, ntene kusisio, omnye kikite koromun wule kawekta ŋalekyi.
Kukwa Satusayek alake wule mite Yesu. Coto ku piko co mwowu kule puryo kot komuce kot kotutune met piko co kipok. Kutepe cek neto kule,
“Konetintet, kisilwec acek Moses ntarastini kule, ‘Ye kame citake, oŋnkupakakta korket nye puryo kot kuyici lekok, roke komüt mutakwam korkonoto musuk, sukuŋet kuyici mutakwam nye kime lekok.’
Kunyo kimite piko alake tisapu ce kitupco. Kukesyo nyewo komüt korket, ntene kume nye kipuryo kot kuyi lekoy.
Kunti komüt mutakwam nyepo oyeny korkonoto musuk,
oko nyepo somok, kuyunyoto kupok tokol picoto ku tisap nye kipuryo kot kuyi mpo akenke lekwa,
nto om letut kume mpene korket.
Kunyo om pesyet nyo citutune met, poyitu ŋo korket? Omnye kikikomüt picoto tokol ku tisap!’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Mütisyi moronik, oŋnkyimüte koruk cepo pesyosyecu,
ntene om wule mite piko co kipok co kicecäm om konyekap Yiyintet kule yeme kotutune met oŋnkumiŋis koret nyin ake, kupuryo kot komütisyi nto cimüte cekto coto.
Omnye puryo kot tokomuce cek yec kupok, kerkey picoto oko malaykanik, oŋnkukikwek lekokap Yiyintet omnye kikotutune met.

Kunyo kipor Moses ŋalek cepo manta kule, tutune met piko co kipok kunyor yec soponto. Kimwoy coto om ŋalekyi ce kisil co nömekey oko rukututwet nyo kiloye, kumwoy kule, ‘Mokoryontet kunye Yiyintetap Apram, Yiyintetap Isaka, Yiyintetap Yakopo.’
Kunyo poru ŋaleca kule, puryo kot ku Yiyintetap piko ce kipok; ntene Yiyintetap piko ce soptos; omnye sopcotin piko tokol om wule mite Yiyintet.’’
Yoto kuwekyi konetikap ntarastinek alake kumwoci Yesu kule, “Konetintet, kewec topon!’’
Omnye kipuryo kot tokukany cek yec kot kutepe Yesu ŋalek alak.
Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Omne sukuŋalole piko kumwowu kule, mosukwek Ŋapanet keseniyantetap Tauti?
Omnye mwowu Tauti nkit om kitaputap tumwonikap kakastayet kule: ‘Kimwoci Mokoryontet Mokoryontenyu kule, Pure yu po yewumwani nyepo tay,
okoy okoci ani punikuk kwek ŋecerokap kerenkokuk.’
Kunyo nteye kure Tauti nkit neto kule, ‘Mokoryontet.’ Komuce kulene yec Ŋapanet kwek keseniyantetap Tauti?’’
Yoto kumite kulime piko tokol, kumwoci Yesu konomikyi kule,

“Oripkey koromun wule mite konetikap ntarastinek, ce möce kule cepesetoti kukelac sirok ce koyec, oŋnkucöme kule ciyweyec cisupayec topon om wulo po moteponik, ce kweye ŋecerok co kweyotin om korikapkok,
oko oteputek cepo tay om sokwonutek; ce nyopone korikap musukik; oŋnkusilkey kusome somutek ce caŋ, cek ce mosukunyor toŋoŋutek ce pëlisyi.’’
Yoto kukäs Yesu piko ce mokoren ce kikocini kokotutekwa sontukut nye cekonore pesanikap kotap Yiyintet.
Yoto kukäs om yoto korko panan nye musuk kukocini mpene orit kafunek oyeny;
kumwoy Yesu kule, “Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, kekoci panani musuk ce caŋ kusir ce kekoci piko alake tokol,
omnye kokon piko alake tokol kokotutekwa om ce koŋetune ce caŋ cepo mokoryontimwa. Ntene om wule mite korkoni panan kuyu wule yunto neto kokukoci tokol ce kuponto ce kwekolyekey om sopon nyi.’’
Kimite kuŋolole piko alake om yoto ŋalek ce nöme toponiyetap kotap Yiyintet, oko rwontok ce toponec ce kicetece oko kokotutek ce kicikase. Kumwoy Yesu kule,
“Tukucu tokol cu oköse akwek yawut, mosukupunto pesyet nye puryo kot kuŋetune rwontocu yu mite yawut, mosicipuryet tokol oŋnkyewirci ŋony.’’
Kutepe piko Yesu kule, “Konetintet, mosukupunto ŋalecutecu pesyo ne? Oŋnkukiy ne nye pelutyet nye poru kule kopunto pesyet kwiyokis ŋaleca?’’

Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Akäste koromun, mente kot ciperperak cëmasak akwek, omnye mosukukwa piko ce caŋ om kaynemwani, oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Ani kunye neto!’ Oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Karik pesyet nyo kicekwey!’ Monte kot arup akwek picoto.
Monte cemuye ye kolim poryosyek oko kwankwaŋatet ye puryo kot kumite kalyet koret. Omnye mosukunyosyo kutok kunyo tukuk ceyucoto, ntene kutompo yoto kot kurik pesyetap letut.’’
Kutosyikey Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Mosukusetyi koret ake kuporye koret ake, kusetyi poytoyisyet ake kuporye poytoyisyet ake;
mosukuriŋiŋ koret koromun oŋnkunäm rupet oko porwonik korosyek ce caŋ, mosukutok tukuk ce muye piko oko pelutok cekwone parak.

“Kutompo kot kwiyokis tukucutecu tokol, mosukunämak akwek piko oŋnkutaŋanyak oŋnkyewosontyinenok korikapkok oŋnkyekertak mopusi, mosicekwerok ape taytap kinkonik oko taytap poytoyik cewoyec, omnye kacäm akwek kaynemwani.
Yoto ye mosonyoru akwek poroyinto nye kamwayte ŋalek ce toponec.
Kunyo asot aŋnkawany om mukuleywekwok kutompo kot kupunto pesyet, monte cisot kule, mosiceyetkey acek kulene;
omnye mosokonok ani akwek ŋalek oko ŋomnonet nye puryo kot komuce punikwok kutay nto kutintentyi kot komuc.
Mosukuŋomntok akwek mpo Papamwoŋ oko mpo komet, oko mpo yeyamwoŋ, oko mpo tilyonutekwok, oko mpo coronutekwok, mosicepakäc kupok alake om akwek.
Mosukusenkerak akwek piko tokol omnye kocäm kaynemwani.
Ntene puryo kot kupote putyontet mpo akenke nyepo metewokwok.
Otitir okwilokisye koromun, omnye yunyoto wule mososorukey osopkey akwek nkit.’’
“Ye kokäs kule kakomut pikap luketap poryet Yerusalem, yoto ye mosonket kule karik citurpup lakwar.
Roke yoto kumwey kupa lakomosyek piko ce mite Yuteya; nto piko co mite Yerusalem orit; roke kumwey co kupa saŋ, oŋnkupuryo kot kumisyini piko co mite koret saŋ kukwa oŋnkwokowut moŋet orit.
Omnye pesyosyekap toŋoŋutek coto; kunyo kopunto pesyosyecoto sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek cepo silutekap Yiyintet ce mwowu kule:
Mite kwapi kulene om pesyosyecoto koruk ce koyotin nto ce rerisyi! Mosukucontyi koroni taŋanynta; oŋnkunyor cek picu nerekwekap Yiyintet.
Mosicepare piko ŋotit, oŋnkyenäm cekwer ku mopusin kupa korosyek tokol; oŋnkukwa lamek kwokutyikta Yerusalem, okoy kupunto pesyosyekwa ce kiceyiytoci.’’
“Mosukuporkey pelutok cepo kakitat om wule mite asista oko arawet oko kokelik, nto om koret kumuyo piko tokol kucoŋoŋenis cek om karumntap ruretyet oko peko ce tultoykey.
Mosukumisto piko om muyotet ye mite cek kukene tukuk ce mo kukwontyi koret tokol; omnye mosukutimtimnkey swametap torot.
Yoto ye mosukukäs cek Weritap cito kucone polyet kuponto kamukeywek oko woyinto nyewo koromun.
Ye kacec kutok tukuk ceyucoto, oyoŋnkye onyal parak omnye karik yoto pesyet nye ce sorunenok akwek.’’
Yoto kumwoci Yesu piko tyonkoconi kule, “Akäs ketit mokoywet oko ketik alak tokol.
Ye kokäs akwek nye puryo kot ce mwowok kule kokuŋot sokek, yoto oŋnket kule karik pesyosyekap peŋatut.
Kunyo ye kokäs akwek tukuk ceyucoto kwiyoktos möce onŋket kule karik poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.
Komwowok ani akwek ŋalek cepo manta kule, mosukwiyokis tukucu tokol kutompo kot kupok piko cepo pini ce soptos yawut.
Poku wulin po torot oko wuli po ŋony, ntene puryo kot kupoku ŋalekwani mpo kisic.’’
“Oripkey akwek nkit! Monte kot kowurtak sokwonutek oko pokitetap komek, oko kasoteywekap sopontap pesyosyecu, omnye muce kucontyok akwek pesyonoto lakwar nye puryo kot oŋnket kuyu musat;
omnye mosukucontyi piko tokol ce mite koret tokol kumukul.
Kunyo oripkey pesyosyek tokol, oŋnkosome sukuŋet onyoru swamet nye omuci omweye acilile tukucutecu tokol ce mokwiyokis, saŋet oyoŋe akwek taytap Weritap cito.’’
Kunetisye Yesu pesyosyecoto kotap Yiyintet, nteye kemen koret kuweti wokurwe tulwet nye cekure tulwetap ketik ce cekure Seituninek.
Yoto kupeti piko tokol kororn okoy kotap Yiyintet wule kinetisye Yesu wokulimntoy ŋalekyi.
Nteyu kowo kurikta kupunto pesyetap sakwetap mukatyantet nye mokutunat, nyoto kunye sakwetap Yutayek nye cekure Keytayet.
Kimite yoto tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek kucenye aret nye muce kupakäce Yesu kume, omnye kiywey cekto piko.
Yoto kowut Setanit Yuta nye cekure Isikaryoti nye ki akenke om kiyokikap Yesu taman ok oyeny.
Kunomen Yuta kuwo wule mite tisik cewoyec oko piko cewoyec ce ripe kotap Yiyintet, oŋnkuwokuŋololyin oko cek wule muktoy neto kuŋomnto Yesu oŋnkukoci cek kunäm.
Kuŋerec cek koromun oŋnkumwoci cek Yuta kule mocekoniŋ pesanik.
Kucäm Yuta kuyunyoto oŋnkucec kuceny poroyinto nye topon nye muce neto kuŋomnte Yesu kunäm cek nye puryo kot kunkete piko.
Yoto kupunto pesyetap sakwetap mukatyantet nye mokutunat, ye ceyenye keciryetap Keytayet kwek korosyo oŋnkyam.
Yoto kuyokto Yesu Petero oko Yowana oŋnkunkolontyi kumwoci kule, “Ape woyiytowec kyam omikap pesyetap Keytayet.’’ Kutepe cek Yesu kule,
“Ono wule möce nyi kule woceyiyte acek?’’
Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Alim pa, ape nteye kopunte moŋet mosukutuyenok akwek citake nye toronu teretap peko, arup cicoto okoy koto nye kewut.
Omwoci citap koto kule, ‘Komwowuŋ konetintet kule, ono kotap toyek nye moyomisye ani oko konomikwani omikap Keytayet?’
Mosukuporwok cicoto koto nyewo nye satat topon nye mite koto parak; wayiyte akwek kiy ake tokol om wuloto.’’
Kupa cek okoy wokunyor kiy ake tokol kumite kuyu wulo kakamwayta Yesu. Kuyiyta cek omikap Keytayet.
Ntowo kupunto ye kyomisyi, kopur Yesu ŋony wanak oko Kiyokik.
Yoto kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Kwomöce ani koromun kule kyomisye wanak oko akwek omicu po pesyetap Keytayet kutompo kot ataŋany ani!
Omnye komwowok ani akwek kule, puryo kot toyome ani yec mpo kisic okokoy cikoci wule cemoktoy om poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’’
Yoto kunäm Yesu cikompet oŋnkusomnci kukasta Yiyintet, kumwoy kule, “Onäm oŋnkoye opcicine akwek nkit,
omnye komwowok ani akwek kule, kuceke pesyoni, komo toye ani pekap omikap ketik ce cekure sapipunek okoy ye kaco poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.’’
Kuyunyoto kunäm mukatyantet oŋnkusomnci kukasta Yiyintet, oŋnkupetec oŋnkukoci cek, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Nyi kunye pormwani, [nye kacekon kupo akwek, oyiye kuyunyitenyi ye asoteno ani akwek.’’
Kuyunyoto yec yu kowo kupok omikap kosoleny, kunam Yesu cikompet, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Cikomponi kunye Kirotyet nyelel nyepo korotikwani ce kicitotowok akwek.’’]
“Ntene akäs pa, yewutap neto cito nye ŋomnto ani, nye mite cepontekey kyomisye meset akenke oko ani!
Omnye ŋalek cepo manta kucu kule, weti Weritap cito kuyu wule kiceyiytoci, ntene mite kwapi neto cito nyo ŋomntoy!’’
Yoto kucec konomik kutepekey cek kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Ŋo om cekto nye wokwiye ŋolyontoni?’’
Yoto kuco tintenotet om kwenutap kiyokik kule ŋo om cekto nye cinket kule nyewo kupëlis.
Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Ponto Kinkonikap lamek kamukeywek kupayta piko, oŋnkyekure poytoyik kule, ‘Coronutekap piko.’
Ntene puryo kot kuyunyo om wule omite akwek, misyini nyewo om wule omite akwek kusutkey kwek nye miniŋ, nto nye kantoyin kunye yiyisyi kukolyoyisyi.
Omnye ŋo nyewo kupëlis, cito nyo pure meset kwomis nto cito nyo yosyi oŋnkusut? Cepo manta ku kule neto nyoto ku cito nyo pure meset. Ntene amite ani kwenumwakwek kuyu ci nye oyiwok akwek yisyet.
“Kwopur ani oko akwek, kunyo kwopunte syemutok kwani tokol.
Kunyo kuyu wulo kikono ani Papamwani Poytoyisyet, kunyo kakonok mpo ani akwek kamukeywek.
Sukuŋet oyomisye oŋnkoyesye mesemwani om poytoyisyemwani, oŋnkopure ŋecerok cewoyec omutyi musankut aretap pikap Israel co taman ok oyeny.’’
Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Simon! Simon! Käs pa, kamac Setanit kule asesak akwek tokol kuyu wulo sestoy cito nkanuk oŋnkupciy nkanuk oko moriryek.
Ntene kosomuŋ ani nyi Simon, kule sukuŋet mente kot kupok koyeneŋuŋ, ntene om wule mite nyi nkit, ye keweckey nyi kwilakisye om wule omite ani, kumisyini kwil mpo yeyaŋuŋ.’’
Kumwoy Petero kule, “Mokoryontet, oyiku ani yiytat cerotyo mopusi oko nyi oŋnkyepoku mpo tukway!’’
Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Komwowok ani nyi Petero kule, puryo kot koncure kurkonkit om kwomowutap pesyoni okoy tuckey nyi aret somok mwowu kule puryo kot oŋnketo ani?’’

Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Yo kyoyoktok ani akwek pesyet itye nye kipuryo kot anämate munyenkutap pesanik oko lolonik oko kweyonik, mite ra kiy nye kipotwok akwek yoto?’’ Kuwec cek kumwoy kule, “Puryo kiy nye kipotwec.’’

Yoto kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Kunyo kunäm yawut ci tokol nye puryo kot kuponto munyenkutap pesanik oko lolet, nto ci tokol nye puryo kot kuponto rotwetap cok, misyini nyoto kwalya sirenyi oŋnkwale rotwet.

Omnye komwowok ani kule, misyini kwitita kupoyit manta silutekap Yiyintet om wule omite ani co mwowu kule, ‘Kiciyitito neto piko ce miyotec co yirye ntarastinek.’ Omnye mite kwititoy ŋalek co kicesil ce nömo ani.’’
Kumwoy cekto kule, “Mokoryontet, käs pa, okyu rotok.’’ Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Kayem.’’
Kunomen Yesu kuyu wulo yunto kopur nyi nyepo kwak, kuwo okoy kupunto tulwetap ketik ce cekure Seituninek, yoto kupetakey neto kiyokikyi.
Nteyu kowo kupunto yoto, kumwoci cek kule, “Osom sukuŋet mente kot osuci onyoru akwek syemutok.’’
Yoto kunata Yesu kuwete ye kimite cek kuwo ye low kisic ye muce kutic rwantet ye kacewirta, oŋnkukutuny kusom kumwoy kule,
“Papa, ye cöme nyi numuneno ani cikomponi, ntene puryo kot kuyu wulo omoktoy ani, ntene kwiyokis kuyu wulo moktoy nyi.’’
[Yoto kuporkey malayket nye cone torot oŋnkutitir neto kukoci swamet.
Kusot oŋnkutaŋany koromun, ntene kutosyikey kusom koromun, okoy kurotune kiyotik ce kerkey korotik ce kitecini ŋony.]
Kuŋete Yesu ŋony om ye kimite kusome, oŋnkuwo kuketitakey ye kimite konomik, wokunyor kumite koruy om nyalilya.
Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Omne soruye akwek? Oŋetye oŋnkosom sukuŋet monte osuci onyoru syemutok.’’
Nteye kimite Yesu tokuŋolole, kupun luketap piko ce kintocini Yuta nye ki akenke om konomik taman ok oyeny. Kuco Yuta okoy ye mite Yesu oŋnkutoroc kuŋatut.
Ntene kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Ŋatutani kunye ŋomnte nyi Weritap cito?’’
Nteye kotoköse konomikyi kito nye mosukwiyakay kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, ceyepe acek rotok?’’
Yoto kuyepis akenke om cek kuyep mutworintetap tisintet nyewo kulot yititap tay.
Kumwoy Yesu om yoto kule, “Ayaste kayem nyoto!’’ Kunäm Yesu yititap cicoto oŋnkusop kusop.

Yoto kumwoci Yesu tisik cewoyec oko kantoyik cewoyec ce ripe kotap Yiyintet, oko poyik ce kikwa kwokunäm neto, kumwoci kule, “Kakwa akwek kuyu nye omöce kule cenam corin? Omnye kakwante rotokap cok oko runkunek?
Nteyu kwopontokey ani oko akwek pesyosyek tokol om kotap Yiyintet, ntene puryo kot asyem akwek kule cenäma ani yoto. Ntene nyimwoŋ sawet nyi, nye poytoyisyi menonet.’’
Yoto kunäm cek Yesu oŋnkukwer okoy kupunto kaytap Tisintet Nyewo. Kunam kurup Petero letut kuloyityi kuminiŋ.
Nteyu kowo cila mata yepo kwenutap saŋntap kayta, kopur piko kuyuye mata, yoto kuco mpene Petero oŋnkupur otepto nyenyi om ye kimite cekto.
Nteye kotoköse korko nye mutworin kukekweny mata Petero, kukäs topon; oŋnkumwoy kule, “Kopontokey cici Yesu!’’
Ntene kutuckey kutoyis Petero kumwoci korkonoto kule, “Cepyosyani, puryo kot oŋnket ani cico!’’
Om letut yec kuminiŋ, kukäs citake Petero, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Mpenyi yiku akenke nye kepontekey oko Yesu!’’ Ntene kumwoy Petero kule, “Puryo kot ku ani!’’
Om letut yec kukopok sawet akenke, kumwoy citake yec om swamet kule, “Manta nye puryo kot kumite tintenot, kopontokey cici oko Yesu, omnye po mpene cici koretap Kalilaya.’’
Ntene kuwec Petero kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot oŋnket ani kito nye mwowu nyi.’’ Yoto pakenke kumite Petero kutokuŋolole, koncur kurkonkit.

Kuweckey Mokoryontet Yesu kukäs Petero. Yoto kusot Petero ŋolyontetap Mokoryontet nyo kumwocini neto kule, “Kutompo kot koncur kurkonkit om kwomowutap pesyoni, mesetoyisye nyi tuckey aret somok mwowu kule puryo kot oŋnketo ani.’’
Kumiŋnto Petero kuwo saŋ, oŋnkurir lokik koromun.
Kurorici kucup piko ce kiripe Yesu, oŋnkupir neto.
Kurat konyekyi oŋnkutepe kule, “Ŋor, ŋo nyi kasyeciŋ nyi!’’
Oŋnkuŋalal cek kucup kumwoci Yesu ŋalek ce caŋ ce miyotec ce kincurure.
Nteyu kowo kuyec koret, kutuyo wanak poyikap Yutayek oko tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek, yoto kukwer cek Yesu kuco kokwemwa.
Kutepe cek Yesu kule, “Mwowec acek, yiku nyi Ŋapanet?’’ Kuwec Yesu kumwoy kule, “Nka kot komwowok ani akwek kupuryo kot oyeni;
kunyo nka kot katepenak ani akwek teput kupuryo kot owekwo.
Ntene kuceke yawut oŋnkutosyikey kuwo tay mosukopurune Weritap cito yewutap tay nyepo Yiyintet nyepo kamukeywek tokol.’’
Kumwoy cek kule, “Kunyo yiku nyi so Weritap Yiyintet?’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Akwek ce omwowu kule oyiku ani.’’
Yoto kumwoy cek kule, “Komo cemöce acek muncururwanik alak omnye kacelim acek nkit ŋalek ce kwone kutinyi nkit!’’
Yoto kuŋetyo luketap piko tokol oŋnkukwer Yesu okoy kupunto taytap Pilato.
Oŋnkucec cek kuwosontyi neto kumwoy kule, “Kucenyoru acek cici kumite kumose pikap korenyacek, oŋnkuyete kukerekta piko mente kukweci mosoret Kinko Nyewo, oŋnkukurkey kule oyiku Ŋapanet!’’
Kutepe Pilato kumwoci Yesu kule, “Yiku nyi Kinko nyepo Yutayek?’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Nyi nye mwowu.’’
Yoto kumwoci Pilato tisik cewoyec oko luketap piko tokol kule, “Mnanyorte ani cici lelis nye miyat.’’
Ntene kutosyikey cek kumwoy om swamet kule, “Kwonykwonye kumose neto piko, kunet om koretap Yuteya tokol; kiceke Kalilaya okoy kunyi mite yawut wuli.’’
Ntowo kulim Pilato kuyunyoto, kutep kule, “Po cicitenyi Kalilaya?’’
Nteyu kowo kunket kule cepoytowune Yesu koretap Erote, kukoyito Yesu cekwer kuwo wule mite Erote, omnye kimite nyo pesyosyecoto Yerusalem.
Nteye kotoköse Erote Yesu, kuŋerec koromun, omnye kikilim neto ŋalek ce nöme Yesu, kunyo kisotyini kule mosukukäs kwiye pelutok cepo kakitat.
Kutepe Erote Yesu teputek ce caŋ, ntene kusis Yesu nye kipuryo kot kuwekyi neto ŋolyo mpo akenke.
Yoto kuyoŋ tisik cewoyec oko konetikap ntarastinek oŋnkuwosontyi Yesu kumwoy ŋalek cepo swama.
Kunyil oŋnkurorci Erote oko sikarekyi Yesu, oŋnkulokyi siret nye topon; oŋnkuketita cekwer kuwo wule mite Pilato.
Kuceke pesyonoto kucomnyo kwek coronut yec Erote oko Pilato, omnye kisenkerekey cek kunyo.
Kukur Pilato kukwa kopur wanak tisik cewoyec oko poytoyik oko piko,

oŋnkumwoci cek kule, “Kokweru akwek cici kuco wule omite ani oŋnkwowosontyi omwowu kule, mose piko kutay kurup ntarastinek. Kunyo kokir ŋalekyi om yu po taymwakwek, ntene puryo kot onyoru ani lelis nye miyat nye ponto kuyu wulo omwoytoy akwek.
Kunyo mpo Erote puryo kot kunyorta neto lelis, omnye koketwec acek. Kunyo puryo kot kwiy neto ŋolyo nye miyat nye misyini cepakäce.
Mosokoyite ani wocepas korokonik, nteye kapok atyakte.’’
[Om pesyetap sakwetap Yutayek nye cekure Keytayet kimuce Pilato kutyokyi piko mopusyontet akenke.]
Yoto kupol piko tokol koromun kumwoy kule, “Pakäc cici! Oŋnkityokwec acek Parapa!’’
(Kicerat cekerta Parapa mopusi om ŋalek ce kikwonykwonyokis om moŋet oko omnye kiporis neto.)
Kuŋololyi Pilato yec piko, omnye kimöce kule atyakte Yesu.
Ntene kutosyikey piko tokol kupol kumwoy kule, “Wuyite! Wuyite! Wuyitoci neto murtowontet!’’
Kumwoci Pilato yec piko aret nyepo somok kule, “Omne! Lelis ne nye kukwiy? Puryo kot anyoru ani lelis nye miyat nye misyini cepakäce! Kunyo mokoyite ani wocepas aŋnkatyakte.’’
Ntene kutosyikey piko tokol kupol koromun kumwoy om swamet kule, “Misyini cewuyitoci murtowontet.’’ Nto om letut kupëlis polotetap piko.
Yoto kumutyi Pilato musankut Yesu kuyu wulo komoktoy cekto.
Kutyakta Pilato cito nyo komöce cekto, nyoto kunye kiratat om mopusi om ŋalekap kwankwaŋatet oko porisyet, oŋnkukoyito Yesu kuyiyta kuyu wulo komoktoy cek.
Nteye kimite cikwer Yesu, cetuye om aran Simon nyepo koretap Kurene nye kicone koret saŋ kuconi moŋet, kunäm cek neto oŋnkyikoci kukonopat murtowontet oŋnkunam letutap Yesu.
Kupa piko ce caŋ kurup Yesu let oko koruk ce kiriroti kusyekotikey montuwu kurire Yesu.
Kuwekyikey Yesu korucoto oŋnkumwoci kule, “Tipikap Yerusalem, monte cerirena ani, arirekey akwek nkit pate oko lekokwok.
Omnye mosukupunto pesyosyek ce kwoni ce mosicemwoy piko kule, ‘Ŋerekotin koruk co kisonon, oko montuwok ce puryo kot kuyiy oko kitinak ce puryo kot kureris.’
Om pesyosyecoto ye mosukumwoci piko tulonok kule, ‘Olulyec acek!’ Oŋnkumwoci lakemosyek kule, ‘Awunyec acek!’
Omnye ye yicini piko ŋalek ceyucu ketit nye ata, mosukwiy kulene nye yamat?’’
Yoto cekwer piko alak oyeny ce kikowurta wocepakäc oko Yesu.
Nteyu kowo ciyitita cek ye cekure kule, “Rokyetap Metit.’’ Cekwertoci Yesu murtowontet om yoto, neto oko pikey oyeny, kopurune ake yewutap tay, kopurune ake yewutap let.
Kuŋalal Yesu kumwoy kule, “Papa, kalye nyi cek! Omnye puryo kot kunkete kito nye yiye.’’ Kupcicin sikarek sirokyi kuporci kirotyet.
Kuyoŋ yoto piko ce kimite kuköse ye kimite kuroricini koncurure poytoyik Yesu kumwowu kule, “Kisope neto piko alak; kunyo kusopkey pa neto nkit ye cici kunye Ŋapanet nye kikwey Yiyintet!’’
Kurorici mpo sikarek Yesu, oŋnkukwa ye kimite neto oŋnkukoci finyonik ce mintililec koromun.
Oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ye yiku nyi Kinko nyepo Yutayek, sopkey pa nyi nkit.’’
Cesil murtowontet parak ŋalecu kule, “NYI KU KINKO NYEPO YUTAYEK.’’
Yoto kuŋalal cito akenke om pikey oyeny nye kiwuyitot kucup Yesu kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot yiku nyi ne Ŋapanet? Kunyo sopkey pa nyi nkit oŋnkisopec mpo acek.’’
Ntene kuwekyi kupolyi cito nyin ake kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot yweyi nyi Yiyintet? Omnye ceponte musankut nye kerkey oko nyenyi.
Ntene po musankut nyinyo manta, omnye kocenyoru acek ce rokenec om tukuk ce kiciy. Ntene puryo kot kwiy cici lelis nye miyat.’’
Kumwoci cicoto Yesu kule, “Yesu oŋnkisota ani om pesyet nye coni om poytoyisyeŋuŋ.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cicoto kule, “Komwowuŋ ani ŋalek cepo manta kule, om pesyoni mosicipur wanak oko ani om koretap Yiyintet wule topon.’’
Ntowo kupunto sawet lö nyepo pet, kunäm menonet koret tokol okoy kupunto sawet sokol nyepo kosoleny.
Yoto kutay asista nye meluwu, kukerer kupciwunekey oyeny siret nye cepciye otepto nye Nyetilil om kotap Yiyintet.
Kokurto Yesu om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Papa, okocini ani soponmwani yewuniyekuk.’’ Nteyu kowo kuwany kumwoy kuyunyoto, kume.
Nteye kotoköse nyewo nyepo sikarek tukuk ce keyokis, kukasta Yiyintet kumwoy kule, “Kopuryo kot kupunto cici lelis manta.’’
Nteyu kowo kukäs piko ce kikerurukyikey yoto kwokukasta, tukuk ce keyokis, kunomen cek kuweckey kupa kestonikwa kusyekotikey montuwu.
Ntene kuyoŋ ye low kuminiŋ piko co kinkete Yesu, oko koruk co kikwontoykey neto kuceke Kalilaya. Kukäs cek tokol ŋalecutecu.

Kimite citake nye cekure Yosep, nye kirwokin, nyepo kokwetap Yutayek oŋnku ci nye ki siken koromun. Kipuryo kot kucäm neto kirwoketap cut oko tukuk ce kikwiy. Kipo neto moŋetap Yutayek nye cekure Arimaseya. Kimite neto kukene poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.
Kuwo cicoto wule kimite Pilato oŋnkusom cikoci neto portap Yesu.
Kunum kurekune musto kucone murtowontet, oŋnkurate suket nyelel, oŋnkukoci mwenet nye kicepäl rwantet kwek kepen, nye kipuryo kot cetupci citake tokol.
Kipesyet nyoto nye kiceyiytoykey omnye kikirik kwek pesyetap Sapat.
Kuwetokey Yosep koruk co kinomu Yesu kuceke Kalilaya okoy wokukäs cek topon mwenet oko wule kacemuyta portap Yesu.
Oŋnkunomen cek kuweckey kupa ka wokuyiyta mwaninek co poŋu sukuŋet kusut kwokuyile musto. Yoto komuny cekto om pesyetap Sapat kuyu wule yunto ntarastinek.
Nto kerir koret pate ye kipesyetap Santey, kupa koruk okoy kupunto ye kimite mwenet, kusute cek mwaninek co poŋu ce kikikwiyta.
Ntene wokunyor kucewunukto rwantet nye kicekere mwenet.
Ntowo kowut orit, yoto kipuryo kot kunyor portap Mokoryontet Yesu.
Nteye kimite korucoto kokite, yoto pakenke kukwa piko oyeny ce kelac sirok ce lelac ce lekecectos onŋkuyoŋe komos om ye kimite cekto.
Kumuyo korucoto koromun, oŋnkuwec metewokwa kukäs ŋony, kumwoci picoto cek kule, “Omne socenye akwek, wule mite muswek ce kipok neto cito nye sopot?
Puryo kot kumite yu; kokotutune met. Asot pa ŋalek co kimwowok akwek neto ye kimite Kalilaya kule,
‘Mosicenäm weritap cito oŋnkyikoyito kunäm yewuniyekap piko ce miyotec; oŋnkuwo cewuyitoci murtowontet, nteye pesyetap somok ciŋet kotutune met.’ ’’
Yoto kusot korucoto ŋalekap Yesu.
Kunomene cek wuloto kimite mwenet; oŋnkupa wokumwoci ŋalek tokol kiyokik taman ok akenke oko piko alak tokol.
Korucoto ku mpo, Mariyam nyepo moŋetap Maktala, oko Yoan, oko Mariyam kametitap Yakopo; cekto coto wanak oko koruk alak. Kumwoci cek Kiyokik ŋalek tokol.
Ntene kusot Kiyokik yoto kule, perperyo pate ŋalek ce komwoy koruk, yoto kutay macäm ŋalekwa.

Ntene kuŋet Petero oŋnkulapat okoy ye kimite mwenet, ntowo kupunto; kuyim kukoyito; yoto kukäs pate sirok co cemuytoy musto, ntene kipuryo kiy ake tokol. Kunomen kuweckey kuwo ka kokitote tukuk ce kukwiyokis.
Om pesyonoto akenke, ye kimite kupeti konomik oyeny kaytake nye cekure Emawus nye kimite kilomitanik taman kuceke Yerusalem.
Nteye kimite cek kupeti om aran kuŋololoti kurwoke tukuk ce kukwiyokis,
yoto kuco Yesu ye kimite cek oŋnkupetakey wanak tokol.
Kukäs cek neto, ntene kipuryo kot konket kule neto ku ŋo.
Kumwoci neto cek kule, “Ŋal ne cu oŋololoti akwek yu omite opeti?’’ Kuyoŋ cek om yoto konyer kusiriny tokoywekwa.
Kuwekyi akenke om cekto nye cekure Kliopa kumwoci kule, “Nyi nkit pate tontet nye mite Yerusalem nye puryo kot konkete tukuk ce kukwiyokis om wuloto?’’
Kutepe neto cek kule, “Kiy nye kukwiyakay?’’ Kuwec cek kumwoci kule, “Ŋalekap Yesu nyepo Nasaret, cito nye ku workoyo nyepo swamet om ŋalek ce kukwiye om wule mite Yiyintet oko wule mite piko tokol.
Ntene kunyo kunäm tisik kyacek cewoyec oko poytoyik oŋnkuwosontyi kumutyi musankut cepakäc kume cewuyitoci murtowontet.
Kunyo kucisot acek kule neto nye mokusop kusor pikap Israel! Kunyo kutokumite ŋalekyo tokol yo, pesyetap somok yawut nyi kuceke kweyokis ŋalecato.
Kunyi kucikite acek koromun koruk alak ce kucepontekey tokol ce kamusta pesyoni kerir koret pate kupa wule mite mwenet,
ntene puryo kot wokunyor pornyi, kuweckey cek oŋnkukwa kwokumwoy kule keporcikey kuŋoŋnkyi malaykanik ce komwoci cek kule, sopot neto.
Kapa mpo pesyoni piko alake ce kucepontekey acek tokol okoy wule mite mwenet, wokunyor mpecek manta kuyu wulo komwoytoy koruk, ntene puryo kot kukäs cekto neto.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Oyiku akwek pic ce perper, ce oponte mukuleywek ce wuyec ye mocäm ŋalek tokol ce kimwoy workoyik!
Kipuryo kot kumisyini kutaŋany Ŋapanet om tukucutecu sukowut woyin nyi?’’
Yoto kuporci kumwoci neto cek ŋalek tokol ce kicemwoy ce nöme neto om silutekap Yiyintet, kuceke kitaputap Moses oko silutek tokol cepo workoyik.
Nteyu kowo kukwa cek okoy kurikta kayta nye kipeti, yoto kuyiytakey neto nye möce kule atil akeyte cek kuwo tay;
ntene kurany cekto neto kumwoci kule, “Cipur oko acek, omnye kokwimen, kunyo mite kurotorote koret.’’ Kuwo neto koto orit wokopur oko cekto.
Nteyu kowo kopur neto oko cek kwomis, kunäm neto mukatyantet oŋnkusomnci oŋnkupetec oŋnkukoci cek.
Yoto kuŋoŋokis konyekwa kusow konket neto, oŋnkupote konyekwa.
Kuŋalal konomikey oyeny kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Kopuryo kot kwamec acek montuwok yo koŋololwec neto om aran kuŋoŋwec ŋalek ce mite silutekap Yiyintet.’’
Yoto pakenke kuŋetyo cek lakwar, oŋnkunomen kupa Yerusalem; wokunyor kiyokik cut taman ok akenke ok piko alak kumite keruruckey wanak. Kimite yoto cut kuŋolole kumwowu kule,
“Kokotutune met mokoryontet manta! Omnye kokuporcikey Simon!’’
Yoto kuporci kumwoci konomik co koyeny cut ŋalek tokol ce keyokis om aran oko ye kosowu kunket cek Mokoryontet ye kopetece mukatyantet.
Nteye kitokumite cek kuporcini kumwocini cut ŋalecato, kuco pakenke lakwar Mokoryontet nkit oŋnkuyoŋe kwenumwa, oŋnkumwoci cek kule, “Opurte kalyet.’’
Kumuyo cek koromun; kusote kule toskoy ceköse atotoy.
Ntene kumwoci neto cek kule, “Omne somuye kuyunyi aŋnkasot om kasoteywekwok ŋal ceyucu?
Akäs pa akwek yewuniyekwani oko kerenkokwani. Ani nyitenyi. Anäma ani pa akwek oŋnkokäs; omnye puryo kot kuponto atotoy panyek oko koyek kuyu cu oponte ani.’’
Kumwoy ŋalecato kuyunyoto oŋnkuporci cek yewuniyekyi oko kerenkokyi.
Nteye kimite cek kutompo kot kuyen kucäm kule manta ŋalecata om ŋerekwek ce kiponto oko kakitatet; yoto kutepe neto cek kule, “Oponte akwek om yu kiy nye moyam?’’
Kukoci cek neto purpuryontet nye kaciyo kurur.
Kunäm neto oŋnkwam kuköse cek om konyekwa.

Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Ŋalecutecu kuco kyomwowo akwek ye kitocepontekey, yo kyomwowok kule, mosukwitita kupoyit manta ŋalek tokol ce kicesil ce nömo ani om ntarastinekap Moses oko silutekap workoyik oko cepo tumwonikap kakastayet.’’
Yoto kuŋany neto kasoteywekwa kunket silutekap Yiyintet,
oŋnkumwoci cek kule, “Ŋalecutecu kuco kicesil kule, ‘Misyini kutaŋany Ŋapanet; oŋnkyiŋet kotutune met ye pesyetap somok.
Oko kule; om kaynenyi mosicemwoci pikap koret tokol lokoywek cepo reŋetapkey oko kakalyayetap miyotyonik; kuceke ŋalecato Yerusalem.’
Kunyo oyiku akwek muncururwanikwani cepo ŋalecutecu.
Kunyo mosoyoku ani nkit kuco wule omite akwek neto nyo kikurto Papamwani. Ntene opur moŋonitenyi okoy ye kocilokwok akwek swamet nye cone torot.’’
Yoto kuntoci Yesu cek kukwer kuŋete moŋet kupa okoy kupunto Pesaniya, ntowo kupunto yoto kunömnci Yesu yewuniyekyi torot kusomnci cekto.
Nteye kimite kusomncini cekto kupeyok kupciykey om wule mite cek, cesut neto kuwo torot.
Yoto kukutuny cek kusay Yesu, oŋnkuweckey tokol kupa Yerusalem kuponto ŋerekwek ce caŋ.
Yoto kopurune cek pesyosyek tokol kotap Yiyintet orit kukostoy Yiyintet.
Kimite ŋolyontet kuceke towunot. Kipontokey ŋolyontet Yiyintet, ŋolyontet kunye Yiyintet.
Kipontokey ŋolyontet Yiyintet kuceke towunot.
Kicitany tukuk tokol kupunte wule mite neto, puryo kiy mpo akenke nye mite koret nye kipuryo kot citany kupunune wule mite neto.
Kinyorta tukuk tokol soponto wule mite neto, kwek soponto lakweyetap piko, soponto nyenyi kunye kisut lakweyet kuco wule mite piko.
Lucini lakweyet menonet, oŋnku puryo komuce menonet kenyis kot komis lakweyet.
Kiyok Yiyintet kiyokintenyi, citake nye cekure Yowana,
nye kico cokwek muncururwet nye kiporci piko lakweyet, sukuŋet kulim piko tokol lokoywek oŋnkuyen kupunte wule mite neto.
Kipuryo ku neto nye lakweyet, ntene kico cokupor ŋalek ce nöme lakweyet.
Lakweyet nyitenyi nyepo manta nye coni koret oŋnkukweny piko tokol.
Kunyo kimite neto koret, kitany Yiyintet koret kupunte wule mite neto, oŋnkurok kipuryo kot kunket koret kule neto ku ŋo.
Kico neto korenyi ntene kutay pikyi matoroc kuŋerekyi.
Ntene kuŋerekyi kutoroc piko alake oŋnkuyen ŋalekyi. Yoto kukoci neto picoto kamukeywek kwek lekokap Yiyintet.
Ntene kipuryo kot kwek cek lekokap Yiyintet om aret kuyu wulo ceyitoyi piko, nto om corokyinot nyepo piko, ntene Yiyintet nkit kunye Papamwa.
Kuweckey ŋolyontet kwek ci oŋnkopurune wule ce mite. Kicekäs acek woyinto nyenyi nye ponto poypoyet nyewo oko ŋalek cepo manta. Woyinto nyitenyi kunye kinyor neto kuyu weritap Papa nye akenke pate.

Kiŋalale Yowana ŋalek ce nöme neto kumwoy kule, “Oŋyi cito nyo kyoŋolole ani omwowu ŋalek ce nöme neto kule, cito nye coni om letumwani kunye nyewo kupëlo, omnye kimite neto om towunot kutompo kot otuku ani.’’
Om poypoyenyi nyewo koromun kunye kucenyoru acek tokol kupeyok ce caŋ cerupkey kuceke ake okoy ake.
Kikon Yiyintet ntarastinek kupunune wule mite Moses, ntene kico poypoyenyi oko ŋalek ce po manta kopunune wule mite Yesu Kristo.
Puryo ci mpo akenke nye kikäs Yiyintet, Ntene Werit akenke pate, nye kerkey oko Yiyintet oŋnkopurune komostap Papa kunye kiporwec acek Yiyintet.
Ŋalek cu ce kimwoy Yowana ye kiyoku Yutayek om Yerusalem tisik oko lefik kwokutepe neto kule, “Nyi kuŋo?’’
Kipuryo kot kutay Yowana mowekyi cekto. Ntene kitorci kumwoci kule, “Puryo kot oyiku ani Ŋapanet.’’

Kutepe cek Yowana kule, “Kunyo yiku nyi ŋo? Yiku nyi Eriya?’’ Kumwoci Yowana cekto kule, “Puryo kot kwani nyo!’’ Kutepe cek neto kule, “Yiku nyi workoyontet?’’ Kuwec Yowana kule, “Puryo kot kwani nyo.’’
Kumwoy cek kule “Mwowec acek ŋolyontet nye wocemwocini piko co kweyokwec. Kurekey nyi kule oyiku ŋo?’’
Kuwekyi Yowana kumwoci cek kule, “Oyiku ani polotetap cito nye pole kitela kule, ‘Asat kurotakey aret nye wete Mokoryontet!’ ’’ Kimwowu workoyontet Isaya ŋalecutecu.
Yoto piko co kiyoku Farasayek.
Kutepe cek Yowana kule, “Ye puryo kot yiku nyi ŋapanet, oŋnkupuryo kot yiku Eriya nto workoyontet, kunyo omne sepotisonisyi nyi?’’
Kuwekyi Yowana kumwoci kule, “Opotisonisye ani peko, ntene mite citake nye keyoŋe kwenumwakwek nye puryo kot oŋnketi.
Cito nyoto coni om letumwani kunye puryo kot oyeme ani kot atyac porokap kweyonikyi.’’
Kikwiyokisye ŋalecutecu tokol Pesaniya om oyinetap Yortan pitonin wule kipotisonisye Yowana.
Ntowo kuyekune, kukäs Yowana Yesu kuconi wule mite neto, yoto kumwoy kule, “Akäs pa, keciryetap Yiyintet nye numu miyotyetap Koret!
Cito nyitenyi nyo kwoŋolole yo kwomwowu kule, ‘Coni om letumwani cito nyewo kupëlo, omnye kimite neto om towunot kutompo kot otoku ani.’
Kipuryo kot oŋnket kule neto ku ŋo. Ntene kyaco ani copotisonisye peko sukuŋet aparte cinket neto om Israel.’’
Ŋalek cu kuce kitor Yowana kumwoy kule, “Kyakäs ani Muyet Nyetilil kurekune torot kuconi ŋony kuyu swarar oŋnkopure metinyi.

Oŋnkurok yoto kipuryo kot oŋnket ani neto. Ntene Yiyintet nyo kiyokwo copotisonisye peko nye kimwowo kule, ‘Cito nyo kekäs kurekyi Muyet Nyetilil oŋkopure metinyi kunye cito nyoto nye potisonisye Muyet Nyetilil.’ ’’
Kumwoy Yowana kule, “Kwakäs ani neto kunyo omwowok kule neto kunye Weritap Yiyintet.’’
Ntowo kuyekune kimite Yowana wuloto yec kupontokey konomikyi oyeny.
Yoto kukäs Yowana kuweti Yesu kupunte ye kilekite cekto, kumwoy kule, “Akäs pa oŋyi keciryetap Yiyintet.’’
Yoto kulim konomikyi cokey oyenku kumwowu neto ŋalecato, kupa kupetakey Yesu.
Kuweckey Yesu kukäs let, nteye katoköse kurupe cek neto kutepe kule, “Ocenye ne akwek?’’ Kuwec kumwoy kule, “Rapi! Poru kaynana kule ‘Konetintet’ Minye nyi ono?’’
Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Akwakäs.’’ Yoto kupa cekto oko neto okoy wokukäs wule minye; oŋnkupur cek tokol pesyonoto kwimen, kikipunto sawet yoto taman nyepo kosoleny.
Cito akenke om picoto oyeny nye kilim ŋalekap Yowana oŋnkuwo kunäm Yesu ku Antereya mutakwametitap Simon Petero.
Yoto pakenke kunyor Antereya mutakwam Simon oŋnkumwoci kule, “Kacenyoru Kristo.’’ (Poru kaynana kule Ŋapanet.)
Kukwer Antereya Simon okoy wule mite Yesu. Kukäs Yesu Petero oŋnkumwoy kule, “Yiku nyi so Simon weritap Yowana, kunyo mosicekureniŋ kayneŋuŋ Kefa (nye poru kaynana kule Petero, nto Kitawet.) ’’
Ntowo kuyekune kumäc Yesu kule awo Kalilaya, yoto kunyor Filipo kumwoci nyo kule, “Nama cepetekey ani.’’
Filipo ku cito nye kipo Pesasayita moŋet nye kiminye Antereya oko Petero.
Yoto kunyor Filipo Nasanael oŋnkumwoci kule, “Kacenyoru acek neto cito nyo kisil Moses ŋalek ce nöme neto. Yesu nyitenyi weritap Yosep nye cone Nasaret.’’
Kutep Nasanael kumwoy kule, “Muce ra kotokune kitake nye topon Nasaret?’’ Kuwekyi Filipo kumwoci neto kule, “Co cekäs pa.’’
Nteye kotoköse Yesu Nasanael kuconi wule mite neto, kuŋalal ŋalek ce nöme neto kumwoy kule, “Käs pa oŋyi Isroloyintet sikwo nye moponto lelis!’’
Kutepe Nasanael Yesu kule, “Kenketeno ani ne nyi,’’ kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Kwakäsiŋ yo kwemite mokoyontet ŋony kutompo kot kukuriŋ nyi Filipo.’’
Kuwekyi Nasanael kumwoci Yesu kule, “Konetintet; yiku nyi Weritap Yiyintet. Yiku kinko nyepo Israel!’’
Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Keyen nyi so omnye komwowuŋ kule, kwakäsiŋ ye kwemite mokoyontet ŋony? Mesekäs cewoyec ce pële coto.’’
Oŋnkumwoci kule, “Komwowok ŋalek cepo manta kule mosakäs kuyatakay wulin po torot oŋnkokäs malaykanikap Yiyintet ce loŋntoy oŋnkureku kurekyini Weritap cito!’’
Nto om letutap pesyosyek oyeny, kimite sakwetap komütisyet nye kimite Kana om koretap Kalilaya. Kimite kametitap Yesu wuloto.
Kikicekur Yesu oko konomikyi kupa sakwet.
Nteyu kowo ceye Finyonik tokol kupok, kumwoci kamet Yesu kule, “Kororci piko Finyonik.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Cepyos! Mokeno ne kutompo kot kupunto pesyosyekwani!’’
Kumwoci Kametitap Yesu mutworik kule, “Aŋnkayiy kiy ake tokol nye komwowok.’’
Kimite yoto terenik cepo peko cepo rwontok ce kiyite lö, kuyu wule yunto ntarastinekap tinitap Yutayek om kowunet. Kimuce kunyiy teret akenke om coto peko cepo litanik pokol akenke.
Kumwoci Yesu mutworik kule, “Anyit peko terenicu.’’ Yoto kunyit cek kunyiy peko kule pak.
Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Oromu yawut peko oŋnkusutyi cito nyo poytoy sakwet.’’ Yoto kusutyi cek neto.
Kucemcem cito nye poytoy sakwet peko ce kaweckey kwek Finyonik, nye kipuryo kot kunkete wule kukwone ntene kunkete mutworik ce koromu wule kokwone. Yoto kukur cicoto cito nye kemütisyi,
oŋnkumwoci kule, “Nyosyi piko tokol kukoci piko Finyonik ce toponec nteye koyesyo piko kot kuyem kukon om letut Finyonik ce toytoy, ntene kunyo kekonor nyi Finyonik ce toponec okoy kunyi!’’
Kinyosyo Yesu kwiye ŋolyontoni po kakitat Kana om koretap Kalilaya. Kupor neto woyinnyi om wuloto, yoto kuyen konomikyi ŋalekyi.
Nto om letutap ŋalecato, kunomen Yesu oko kamet oko mpo mutakwam oko konomikyi kuwo okoy Kapernaum, wokopur wuloto pesyos ce ŋeri.
Kikirik yoto kupunto sakwetap Yutayek nyepo Keytayet. Kuwo Yesu yoto kulaŋnta Yerusalem.
Wokunyorta Kotap Yiyintet orit piko ce kimite kepur ce kyolyoy tuka oko swororok oko piko co wöle pesanik ce kepur cekto yepo mesanikwa.
Yoto kwiy Yesu porok kwek kipoket oŋnkukwet tokol kupete kotap Yiyintet, kecirek oko tuka, oŋnkumil mesanikap piko co wölisyi oŋnkuseret pesanikwa.
Kumwoci neto piko co kolyoy swororok kule, “Osut tukucu kupete yu. Monte ceyiy Kotap Papamwani kwek matepo!’’
Yoto kusot konomik kule mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Ayi Yiyintet ŋerekwekwani ce cöme koŋuŋ kuce loytos kuyo mata.’’
Kuwekyikey Yutayek neto oŋnkutepe kule, “Kiy ne nyepo kakitat nye muci nye yiy sukuŋet porwec acek kule ponte kamukeywek ce yiye tukucu?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cekto kule, “Oturpup pa akwek koyi po Yiyintet, mosatec ani kuyo om pesyosyek somok pate.’’
Kutepe cek neto kule, “Metece nyi pesyos somok pate kuyo koyi kicetece kenyisyek artam oko lö?’’
Ntene kotap Yiyintet nye kiŋolole Yesu ku porto nyenyi nkit.
Nteyu kowo ciŋet neto kotutune met, kusot kusow konomikyi kule kimwoy neto ŋalecutecu, kuyen cekto ŋalek cepo silutekap Yiyintet oko ŋolyontet nye kimwoy Yesu.
Nteye kimite Yesu Yerusalem ye ki pesyetap sakwetap Keytayet kuyen piko ce caŋ ŋalekyi yu kowo kukäs tukuk cepo kakitat ce kikwiye neto.
Ntene kipuryo kot kukenekey Yesu cekto, omnye kinkete neto topon wule yunto piko tokol.
Kipuryo kot komöce neto citake nye komwoci wule yunto piko omnye kinkete tokol ce mite mukuleywekwa.
Kimite citake nye cekure Nikontemo nye ki poytoyintet nyepo Yutayek, nye kipo neto luket nyepo Farasayek.

Kuco pesyet ake komoy wule mite Yesu oŋnkucokumwoci kule, “Konetintet, cinket acek kule yiku nyi konetintet nye cone wule mite Yiyintet, omnye puryo ci nye muce kot kwiy tukuk cepo kakitat cu yiye nyi, tos pate ye pontokey cicoto Yiyintet.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Komwowuŋ ani nyi ŋalek cepo manta kule, ye tompo kot ceyi cito aret oyeny kupuryo kot kuköse cito nyoto poytoyisyetap Yiyintet!’’
Kutepe Nikontemo neto kule, “Muce kulene cito nye kiwoyit ceyi aret yec oyeny? Muce pa kowut yec moyetap kamet oŋnkyeyi aret oyeny?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Komwowuŋ ani nyi ŋalek cepo manta kule, puryo ci nye muce kowut poytoyisyetap Yiyintet ye tompo kot ceyi cito nyoto om peko oko Muyet Nyetilil.
Yiye porto porto, kuyi Muyet Nyetilil Muyet Nyetilil.
Mente kot akite omnye komwowuŋ kule misyini ceyiyok aret oyeny.
Wuse yomet kutokyinikey wule möce, lime nyi karumnta ntene puryo kot nketi wule cone nto wule weti. Kuyunyoto wule yunto om wule mite cito nye koceyi om Muyet Nyetilil.’’
Kutepe Nikontemo neto kule, “Muce ŋalecu kwiyokis kulene?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Yiku nyi konetintet nyewo nyepo Israel oŋnkurok kupuryo kot nketi ŋalecu?
Komwowuŋ ani ŋalek cepo manta kule, ceŋololi acek ŋalek ce cinketi oŋnkyemwowu ŋalek ce kicekäs oŋnkurok yec kupuryo ci mpo akenke om akwek nye möce kule oyen ŋalekyacek.
Puryo kot oyeni akwek ŋalekwani ye komwowok ŋalek nöme ŋalek cepo koroni, kunyo omuci akwek kulene kot oyen kenyis ŋalekwani ye komwowok ŋalek ce nöme wulin po torot?
Kunyo puryo ci mpo akenke nye kilaŋnta kuwo torot tos pate Weritap cito nyo kireku kucone torot!’’
Kuyu wulo kinomncini Moses erenet parak om kitela, kunyo mosicenomnci parak weritap cito kuyunyoto,
sukuŋet kunyor soponto nye mopoku ci tokol nye kacäm koyen neto.
Omnye kicäm Yiyintet koret koromun okoy kukon Werinyi akenke pate sukuŋet mente kot kupot ci tokol nye kacäm koyen neto, ntene kule sukunyor soponto nye mopuku.
Omnye kipuryo kot kuyok Yiyintet Werinyi cokwek kontiyintetap koret, ntene kiyok cokwek kosopintetap koret kupunte wule mite neto.
Ci ake tokol nye keyen Werit, kunye puryo kot cemutyini cicoto musankut, nto ci ake tokol nye katay meyen kukocemutyi keny cicoto musankut omnye katay meyen Weritap Yiyintet nye akenke pate.
Musankut kunyi kule, kico lakweyet koret ntene kucäm piko menonet kupël lakweyet, omnye yiye cek tukuk ce miyotec.
Senkere ci tokol nye yiye ŋalek miyotec lakweyet omnye puryo kot kucöme kule aparte kutok ŋalek ce miyotec ce yiye neto.
Ntene ci tokol nye yiye ŋalek cepo manta ce toponec kuconi cicoto wule mite lakweyet sukuŋet kupor lakweyet kule kikwiy neto yisyenyi om koyweyisyet nye yweye Yiyintet.
Nto om letutap ŋalecutecu, kuwo Yesu oko konomikyi okoy koretap Yuteya, wokopur wuloto oko cekto kuwany pesyos oŋnkupotisonis.
Kimite yoto Yowana kupotisonisyi om Ayinon ye kilekite Salem, omnye kimite peko ce caŋ wuloto. Kipeti piko wule mite neto, kunyo kipotisone neto cekto,
omnye kitompo yoto kot cekerta Yowana mopusi.
Kucec konomik alake cepo Yowana kutintentyin oko Yutoyintet ake om ŋalek ce nöme kowunetapkey nyepo tinit.

Yoto kupa cek wule mite Yowana oŋnkumwoci kule, “Konetintet tesoti nyi cito nyo kwopontekey akwek tukway om oyinetap Yortan pitonin, cito nyo kiŋolole nyi? Mite yawut neto kupotisonisyi, kunyo peti piko tokol wule mite neto!’’
Kuwekyi Yowana kumwoci cek kule, “Puryo ci nye muce kiy kenyis, tos pate okoy ye kokukoci Yiyintet cicoto.
Kunyo oyiku akwek muncururwanikwani ce oŋnketi kule kyomwowu kule, ‘Puryo kot oyiku ani Ŋapanet, ntene kiciyokwani cantoci neto.’
Cito nye kemütis kunye citap korket, kuyoŋntos tapan coronutekap cito nyo kemütisyi sukulimntoy kuŋerekyini koromun kutitap cito nyo kemütisyi ye kaŋalal.
Kunyo kapok yawut ŋerekwekwani; misyini kuner neto aŋnkacucukte ani.’’
Cito nyo cone wulin po torot kunye nyewo kupël piko tokol, nto cito nyo cone koret kunye po cito nyoto koret oŋnkuŋolole ŋalek ce nöme koret. Cito nyo cone torot kunye nyewo nyepo tukuk tokol.
Mwowu neto kupor ŋalek ce kikäs oŋnkulim, ntene puryo ci nye cöme lokoywekyi.
Ci tokol nye kacäm kuyen lokoywekyi kunye kakuwalkey kule Yiyintet kunye po manta.
Neto cito nyo kiyok Yiyintet kunye ŋolole ŋalek cepo Yiyintet, omnye kikoci Yiyintet neto Muyenyi Nyetilil nye yeme.
Cöme Papa werinyi, kunyo kikoci tukuk tokol kopurune yewuniyekap Werinyi.
Ci ake tokol nye katay macäm kuyen werit kupuryo kot kunyoru cicoto soponto ntene kopurtoy pate nerekwekap Yiyintet cepo kenyis.
Yoto kulim Farasayek kule kokocut Yesu piko oŋnkumite kupotisone konomik ce caŋ kupël Yowana.
(Ntene ŋalek cepo manta kucu kule kipuryo kot kupotisone neto pic, ntene konomikyi pate ce kipotisonisyi.)
Ntowo kulim Yesu ŋalek ce kicemwowu, kunomene Yuteya kuketitakey kuwo Samariya.
Nteye kimite kuweti poninekyi om wuloto, kuwo kupunte koretap Samariyek.
Kuco Yesu okoy kupun moŋetap Samariya nye cekure Sikari nye kilekite mparet nyo kikocini Yakopo werinyi Yosep.
Kimite wuloto mwenetap peko nye cekure pekap Yakopo. Omnye kikicas Yesu om poninekyi, yoto kopur yepo mwenetap peko tapan. Kimite yoto sawet karik kupunto pet kwen.
Yoto kuco korket ake nyepo samariyek cokuram peko. Kumwoci Yesu kule, “Kono peko aye.’’
(Kikipa konomikyi yoto wule po moŋet wokwolis omik.)

Kuwekyi korketap Samariyek kumwoci Yesu kule, “Yiku nyi Yutoyintet, oyiku ani cepsamariyantet, kunyo muci nyi kulene somo kule kono peko aye, omnye puryo kot kuyemntoy tukuk ce kyomisye Yutayek oko Samariyek.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Nto yunye kukwenket nyi kokotutyetap Yiyintet, oŋnkinket kule ŋo cici somiŋ nyi kule, ‘Kono peko aye,’ nto kenyi nye kesome neto kukoniŋ peko ce ponto soponto.’’
Kumwoy korkonoto kule, “Nyewo, nteyu meponte nyi teret, kunyi kiwo oyinet ŋony koromun, menyorte nyi ono peko ce ponto soponto,
Yiku nyi nyewo kupël kukonyacek Yakopo nye kikonec acek pecu ce kiye neto oko lekokyi oko tuka ceci pekap oyinoni?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Mosukwam melelya ci ake tokol nye kaye pecu.
Ntene komo kwome melelya mpo kisic ci ake tokol nye kaye peko ce mokoci ani. Omnye mosokoci ani neto peko cepo soponto ce kosune wule mite neto nyepo soponto nye mopoku.’’
Kumwoy korkonoto kule, “Mokoryontet kono mpo ani pecoto! Sukuŋet komo kwomo melelya mpo kisic, nto komoconi yec mpo wuli caram peko.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci kule, “Nomen iwo wekur santeŋuŋ oŋnkiketukey okoy yuteyu.’’
Kuwekyi korkonoto kumwoci kule, “Moponte ani saniya.’’ Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Poye manta mwowu kule, ‘Moponte saniya!’
Omnye kikomütiŋ nyi sanik mutu, nto cito nye pontekey nyi yawut kunye puryo kot ku santeŋuŋ nyepo manta. Kunyo kemwowu ŋalek cepo manta.’’
Kumwoy korkonoto kule, “Mokoryontet, kakäs kule yiku nyi workoyo.
Kisoye mpo kukonyacek Yiyintet om tulwoni, ntene omwowu akwek Yutayek kule, ‘Yerusalem pate ku wule misyini cesoye Yiyintet!’ ’’
Kumwoci Yesu kule, “Cepyosyani, yen ŋalekwani, mosukupunto pesyosyek ce puryo kot kusoye piko Yiyintet Papa om tulwoni nto mpo om Yerusalem.
Puryo oŋnketi akwek Samariyak cito nye osoye, cinket acek Yutayek cito nye cesoye, omnye cone kosopotet wule mite Yutatek.
Ntene mosukupunto pesyet, kunyo mite yawut yuteyu nye toku piko cepo manta ce soye Yiyintet om Muyet oko om ŋalek cepo manta. Piko cesoye kuyunyoto kuce möce Papa cekto.
Yiyintet kunye Muyet nye moponto porto, nto piko ce soye neto kuce möce kusoye om Muyet oko ŋalek cepo manta.’’
Kumwoci korkonoto Yesu kule, “Oŋnket ani kule mosukuco Kristo nye poru kaynana kule Ŋapanet. Ye kaco neto mosukuco oŋnkumwowec acek ŋalek tokol.’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Ani nyoto nyi oŋololuŋ nyi.’’

Yoto pakenke kupun konomikyi. Kukite cek koromun kwokunyor kuŋolole neto oko korkonoto. Ntene kipuryo mpo akenke om cek nye kitep kule, “Möce ne nyi?’’ Nto mpo kutep yec kule, “Omne seŋololyi korkoni.’’
Yoto kupakakta korkonoto terenyi nyepo peko oŋnkuwo okoy moŋet wokumwoci piko kule.
“Akwa kwakäs citake nye komwowo ani ŋalek tokol ce kyayiy ikye keny! Puryo kot ku Ŋapanet ne nyitenyi?’’
Yoto kunomen piko om moŋet kupa wule mite Yesu.
Kimite yoto konomik kusoysoye Yesu kumwoci kule, “Konetintet, yomisye!’’
Ntene kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Oponte omik ce oyome ce monket akwek!’’
Yoto kucec konomik kutepekey kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Kokosutyi so citake omik?’’
