Kumwoci Pilato neto kule, “Meŋololwo ani nyi so? Nketi nyi kule oponte kamukeywek ce omuci atyaktiŋ nyi, oŋnkoponte kamukeywek ce omuci owuyitociŋ murtowntet?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Ponte nyi pate kamukeywek om wule omite ani omnye kikoniŋ Yiyintet. Kunyo cito nyo kukwerwo ani aco wule mite nyi kunye ponto nyoto miyotyet nyewo kupëlis.’’

Ntowo kulim Pilato ŋalecato, kutosyikey kusyem kule atyakte Yesu, ntene kupol, Yutayek kumwoy kule, “Ye ketyakte nyi neto, kuporkey kule puryo kot yiku nyi corwetap Kinko Nyewo! Kunyo ci ake tokol nye sutekey kule oyiku Kinko Nyewo kunye tintentyini Kinko Nyewo!’’
Nteye kotolime Pilato ŋalecato, kukwer Yesu kuwo saŋ, oŋnkopure ŋeceretap kokwet nye cemüte musankunek om otepto nye cekure, “Rwantet nye laŋntat.’’ (Nye cekure om ŋelyeptap Puraniyek “Kapasa.’’)
Kimite yoto sawet kakeyte pet kwen nye ntoyekune kwek pesyetap Keytayet. Kumwoci Pilato Yutayek kule, “Akäs pa Kinko nyimwoŋ’’

Kupol Yutayek kumwoy kule, Apakäc nyo! “Apakäc nyo! Wuyitoci Murtowontet!’’ Kutepe Pilato cekto kule, “Omöce akwek so kule owuytoci ani murtowontet Kinko nyimwoŋ?’’ Kuwec tisik cewoyec kumwoy kule, “Kinko nye ceponte acek ku Kinko nyewo pate.’’
Yoto kukoci Pilato cek Yesu wocewuyitoci murtowontet. Yoto kukwer sikarek Yesu,
kuwo neto kukonopoti murtowontenyi nkit okoy ye cekure, “Rokyetap Metit.’’ Ye cekure om ŋelyeptap, Puraniyek “Kolokosa.’’
Cewuyitoci neto murtowontet om wuloto oko piko alak oyeny, kopurune ake tapan oko tapan kumite Yesu kwenut.
Kusil Pilato ŋalek oŋnkukoci cikemer murtowontet parak nye kisil kule, “Yesu nyepo Nasaret Kinko nyepo Yutayek.’’
Kusuman Yutayek ce caŋ ŋalecato omnye kilekite yepo moŋet yoto kicewuyite Yesu, kunyo kicesil ŋalecato om ŋelyeptap Puraniyek, oko nyepo Romek, oko nyepo Kirikik.
Kumwoci tisik cewoyec cepo Yutayek Pilato kule, “Mente osil kule, ‘Kinko nyepo Yutayek.’ Ntene sil kule ‘Kimwoy cici kule oyiku Kinko nyepo Yutayek!’ ’’
Kuwekyi Pilato kumwoci cek kule, “Ce kosil ani, kuce kosil.’’

Nto om letut yu kowo kuwuyitoci sikarek Yesu murtowontet, kunäm cek sirokyi oŋnkupeciwune wok amwan, kusut sikorintet akenke akenke, kunäm cekto mpo kansunyi nye kisiret akenke nye puryo wule kicenap cituye ntene nye kicenap kucone met okoy kel.

Kurwoc sikarek kwicek nkit kumwocin kule, “Monte cepac, ntene cepirci kirot sicekäs ŋo nye mokusut.’’ Kikwiyokis ŋaleca kuyunyoto sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta silutekap Yiyintet ce mwowu kule, “Kipcicin cek sirokwani kwicek nkit, oŋnkuporci kirot siremwani.’’ Yoto kwiy sikarek kuyunyoto.
Kimite kukeyoŋe yoto ye kilekit murtowontet mpo kametitap Yesu oko cekwametitap kamet nye cekure Mariyam korketap Kiloypa oko Mariyam nyepo koretap Maktala.
Yoto kukäs Yesu kamet oko konomintet nyo kicöme neto kumite kukeyoŋ ye lekite kamet. Kumwoci Yesu kamet kule, “Cepyos, oŋyo weriŋuŋ!’’
Oŋkumwoci konomintonoto kule, “Oŋyo komet.’’ Kuceke yoto pakenke kukwer konomintonoto kametitap Yesu kuwo kanyi.
Kunket Yesu yoto kule kaciwany kiy ake tokol, sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta silutekap Yiyintet. Kumwoy Yesu kule, “Kakwama ani melelya!’’
Kimite kokitore yoto pokulit nye nyitat finyonik ce mintililec. Kowute cek cankut orit oŋnkurutyi ketit nye mwa koromun nye cekure isop oŋnkukoci yepo kutinyi.
Kuye Yesu finyonik oŋnkumwoy kule, “Kapok!’’ Yoto kolulyo metinyi oŋnkume.

Yoto kusom Yutayek Pilato kule kucömnci cekto kwiri kerenkokap piko co kocewuyitoy oŋnkurek muswek kukwane murtowonik. Kikwiy cek kuyunyoto omnye kipesyetap müt kunyo kipuryo kot kumöce cek kule kopur muswek murtowonik okoy pesyetap Sapat. Omnye kipesyo nyewo nyetilil koromun pesyetap Sapat nyoto kiconi.
Yoto kupa sikarek wokwiri kerenkokap piko ce kicepoköce oko Yesu. Kunyosye nyepo tay ntekere nyepo let.
Ntene yu kowo kupun ye mite Yesu kwokunyor kame keny kipuryo kot kwiri cek yoto kerenkokyi.
Ntene kupar sikorintet ake Yesu kupare ŋotit karasta, yoto kukwa korotik oko peko.
Cito nye kiköse kwiyoktos ŋalecu kunyi ŋolole. Cinket acek kule mwowu neto ŋalek cepo manta oŋnkunket mpene nkit kule oŋololi ŋalek cepo manta sukuŋet oyen mpo akwek.
Kikwiyokis ŋalecu sukuŋet kwitita kipoyit manta silutekap Yiyintet ce mwowu kule, “Puryo kot cirye kowenyi mpo akenke.’’
Kumite yec silutekap Yiyintet nye mwowu kule, “Mosakukäs piko cito nyo kipore neto’’.

Nto om letutap ŋalecato. Yoto Yosep nyepo moŋetap Arimaseya, nye kikonomintetap Yesu nye kiwunyekey omnye kiyweye Yutayek. Kusom neto Pilato kukoci portap Yesu. Kucömnci Pilato neto. Yoto kuwo wokusut portap Yesu.
Kuco mpene Nikontemo nyo kiweti pesyet ake komoy wule mite Yesu. Kusut neto mwayta nye poŋu topon nye kipo kilonok konom nye kicilinyo oko mwaninek alak ce cekure mira oko alosik.
Kunäm picoto kwoyeny portap Yesu kurek oŋnkurate sirok ce cemuytoy oŋnkuyile mwayta, omnye kikwiye Yutayek kuyunyoto ye mocemuy musyontet.
Kimite ye kilekite yoto kicepokokyini Yesu mparet nye kimite yoto mwenet nye kitompo kot cemuci ci mpo akenke.
Kunyo kipesyet nyoto nye ntoyekune kwek pesyetap Sapat nyepo Yutayek oko omnye kilekite yoto mwenet, kumuci cekto Yesu yoto.
Nteye ki pesyetap Santey, nye kerir koret pate nye tokutuy, kuwo Mariyam nyepo Maktala wule mite mwenet. Yoto wokukäs kule kocinum rwantet kucone kurket nyepo mwenet.
Kunomen yoto kukony mweyek okoy wule mite Simon Petero oko konomintet nyin ake, nyoto kunyo kucöme Yesu neto oŋnkumwoci kule. “Kocinum Mokoryontet kucone mwenet. Kunyo mocinket wule kocitore neto.’’
Kunomen yoto Petero oko konomintet nyin ake kupa okoy wule mite mwenet.
Kukony cekto tukway, ntene kukony konomintet nyin ake kusirte Petero okoy wokunyosyo yepo mwenet.
Nteyu kowo kuyim kukoyto mwenet, kukäs yoto suket nyo kucerate, ntene kipuryo kot kowut orit.
Yoto kupun mpene Petero nye kirupu let, oŋnkoco kowut mwenet orit. Kukäs suket nye mite ŋony,
oko tamparit nyo kucerate metitap Yesu nye kipuryo kot kupontokey tukway, ntene kiciriny nye mite yeto nyenyi nkit.
Kowut mpene konomintet nyo konyosyi kupunto mwenet, kukäs oŋnkuyen kucämnta.
(Kipuryo kot kusow cekto yoto kunket silutekap Yiyintet ce mwowu kule misyini kotutune met neto.)
Yoto kunomen konomik kuketitakey kupa ka.
Kimite Mariyam kukeyoŋe yepo mwenet saŋ oŋnukurire. Nteye kimite kurire kuyim kukoyito mwenet.
Yoto kukäs neto malaykanik oyeny ce kelac sirok ce lelac ce kepur yo kucemucini portap Yesu. Kiyoŋe ake ye kipo metit kuyoŋe ake ye kipo kerenkok.
Kutepe malaykanicoto neto kule, “Cepyos! Keririci ne?’’ Kuwec kumwoy kule, “Kocinum Mokoryontenyu kunyo monketi wule kucitore!’’
Kuweckey Mariyam yoto kukäs let okoy kukäs Yesu nye keyo, ntene kipuryo kot konket kule Yesu.
Kutepe Yesu neto kule, “Cepyos! Keririci ne?’’ Kisote Mariyam kule cito nye ripe mparet, kumwoci kule, “Nyewo! Ye nyito nye kwenumu osomiŋ porwo ye kwetore saŋet ani wonumu.’’
Kuŋololyi Yesu neto kukur kaynet kule, “Mariyam.’’ Yoto kuwekyikey Mariyam kukäs Yesu oŋnkumwoci om ŋelyeptap Puraniyek kule, “Rapponi!’’ Nye poru kaynana kule, “Konetintet.’’
Kumwoci Yesu kule, “Mente anäma ani kutompo awo torot wule mite Papa, ntene iwo wule mite mpo yeya mwani wemwoci kule amite ani owete oloŋntoy wule mite Papa mwani oŋnku Papa mwakwek.’’
Yoto kunomen Mariyam nyepo Maktala wokumwoci konomik kule kokäs neto Mokoryontet oŋnkurorci ŋalek ce kokomwoci Yesu neto.

Nto om pesyonoto santey komoy, kimite yoto konomik kukokorurukyikey koto orit, oŋnkukerotin kurkotik omnye kimuye poytoyikap Yutayek. Yoto kuco Yesu oŋnkuyoŋe kwenumwacek oŋnkumwoci kule, “Opurte akwek kalyet.’’
Nteyu kowo kumwoci coto, kuporci yewuniyekyi oko karasta nyenyi. Kuŋerec yoto konomik koromun yu kowokukäs cekto Mokoryontet.
Kumwoci Yesu yec cekto kule, “Opurte akwek kalyet! Kuyu wolo kiyokwo ani Papa, kunyo oyoktok mpo ani akwek.’’
Nteyu kowo kumwoy ŋalecato, komuŋnkyi neto cekto Muyet Nyetilil, kumwoci kule, “Onyoru Muyet Nyetilil,
Ye kokalye akwek piko miyotyonik, mosicikalya. Nteye puryo kot okalye akwek piko miyotyonik kupuryo kot cikolyoy.’’
Kipuryo kot kumite akenke om konomik nye cekure Tomas-Soromin, yo kiconi Yesu.

Yoto kumwoci konomik cut alake neto kule, “Kucekäs acek Mokoryontet!’’ Kumwoci Tomas cekto kule, “Puryo kot oyeni ani mpo kisic okoy ye kakäs momitek cepo musumarisyek om yewuniyekyi oŋnkanäme yewuniyekwani momitecoto oko koroswekyi.’’
Nto letutap pesyosyek sisit. Ye kimite konomik koto orit, kupontokey cekto yoto Tomas. Kukerotin kurkotik. Ntene kuco Yesu oŋnkuyoŋe kwenumwacek, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Opurte akwek kalyet.’’
Kumwoci Yesu yoto Tomas kule, “Sutu pa morneŋuŋ kuco yu, käs yewuniyekwani, mente aŋuny pate, ntene yen cämnte pate.’’
Kuwec Tomas kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontenyu, oŋnku Yiyintenyu!’’
Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Keyen nyi so omnye kekäs ani? Ponto kupeyoy ce keyen kucömis kutompo kot kukäs!’’
Kwiy Yesu tukuk cepo kakitat alak om taytap konomikyi, coto kuce puryo kot cesil kitapuni.
Ntene kicesil cutecu sukuŋet cämnte nyi kule Yesu kunye Ŋapanet, Weritap Yiyintet nto om koyenet om wule mite neto, kuye nyoru soponto om kaynenyi.
Nto om letutap ŋalecutecu, kuporcikey Yesu nkit yec konomikyi om tampayayetap Tiperia. Kiporcikey neto cekto kuyunyi kule.
Kimite yoto kupontokey wanak konomikyi Simon Petero, oko Tomas soromin, oko Nasanael ŋyepo Kana om koretap Kalilaya, oko werikap Sepetayo oko konomikyi alak oyeny.

Kumwoci Simon Petero konomik tokol cut alak kule, “Mawo ani wanäm purpurunek.’’ Kumwoci cut neto kule, “Mocepetekey tokol oko nyi.’’ Yoto kupa cek oŋnkuwokulany rapet, ntene kipuryo kot kunäm cek kiy mpo akenke om komowunoto tokol.
Nto kerir koret pate, kuyoŋe Yesu tampayayet tapan, nye kipuryo kot konket konomik kule Yesu nyoto.
Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Lekocu monanäm akwek kiy.’’ Kuwekyi cek kumwoci kule, “Monacenäm kiy.’’
Kumwoci Yesu cekto kule, “Owirci porokwok yewutap tay nyepo rapet mosonäm alak.’’ Yoto kuwirci cek porok peko, ntopere cicutu kocut kot kutiŋ omnye kikinäm purpurunek ce caŋ koromun.

Kumwoci konomintet nyo kicöme Yesu Petero kule, “Mokoryontet nyitenyi!’’ Nteye kotolime Petero kule, koko Mokoryontet nyitenyi kwisunekey sirenyi nyepo saŋ (omnye kikikorek sirokyi oŋnkurontyi peko orit.)
Kukwane konomik cut alake rapet okoy kupun tampayayet tapan kocutonu porok ce kanyiy Purpurunek. Kipuryo kot kuloyec cekto kuceke yoto okoy cepunte koret, ntene kupuntoy kakwoyutek pokol akenke.
Ntowo kupun cek tampayayet tapan kukäs mata nyepo nesek oko purpurunek ce kacewatan oko mukatinek.
Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Osutu pa purpurunek alak co kotonöme akwek pantenyi.’’

Kuwo Simon okoy yepo rapet oŋnkucut porok ce kanyiy purpurunek cewoyec okoy kupun tampayayet tapan, kipuntoy Purpurunek tokol pokol akenke oko konom ok somok. Nka kot kicaŋ rupurunek ntene kipuryo kot kuŋetyo porok.
Kumwoci Yesu cek kule, “Akwa kwoyomisye.’’ Kipuryo mpo akenke om konomik nye kisyem kutepe neto kule, “Nyi ŋo?’’ Omnye kinket cek kule Mokoryontet nyitenyi.
Kuwo Yesu oŋnkonum mukatyantet oŋnkukoci cek oŋnkukoci mpo Purpurunek kuyunyoto.
Kunyo aret nyepo somok nyitenyi kuporcikey Yesu konomik om letut yu kowo ciŋet kotutune met.

Nto letut yu kowo kwomis cekto, kumwoci Yesu Petero kule, “Simon weritap Yowana, cömo ani nyi kusir alak cu?’’ Kuwekyi Petero kumwoci neto kule, “Mokoryontet, yunyoto nyi nye nketi kule ocömiŋ ani.’’ Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Rip kecirekwani.’’
Kumwoci Yesu yec Petero kule, “Simon weritap Yowana, cömo ani nyi?’’ Kuwekyi Petero kumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet yunyoto nyi nye nketi kule ocömiŋ ani nyi.’’ Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Rip kecirekwani.’’

Kumwoci Yesu Petero yec nyepo somok kule, “Simon weritap Yowana, cömo ani nyi?’’ Yoto kunyer Petero omnye katepe Yesu neto nyepo somok kule, “Cömo ani nyi?’’ Oŋnkumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet nyi nye nketi ŋalek tokol kule ocömiŋ ani nyi.’’ Kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Rip kecirekwani.

Komwowuŋ ani nyi ŋalek cepo manta kule, ye kiyiku nyi lekwa, kirotekey nkit oŋnkunomen iwo wolyo ake tokol wule möce, ntene ye keyositu, meseyite yewuniyekuk oŋnkurateniŋ citake misipit oŋnkukweriŋ wule memöce.’’
(Kimwoy Yesu ŋalecutecu kupor met wule mosukumeta Petero sukuŋet kusut woyinto om wule mite Yiyintet.) Yoto kumwoci Yesu neto kule, “Rupa ani.’’

Kuweckey Petero kukäs let, yoto kukäs konomintet nyin ake nyo kicöme Yesu kumite letunyi. Konomintet nyoto kunyo kutiŋntoykey oko Yesu ye kyomisyi cek komoy oŋnkunyoto kunyo kitepe neto Yesu kule, “Mokoryontet, ŋo nye mosukuŋomntiŋ, nyi?’’
Nteye kotoköse Petero konomintet nyoto. Kumwoci neto Yesu kule, “Mokoryontet, nto nyi,’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci neto kule, “Ye omöce ani kule kusop neto, okokoy, kunömiŋ nyi coto? Rupa ani nyi pate.’’

Yoto kutisto ŋolyontono om wule mite konomik kule puryo kot kume konomintonoto. Ntene kipuryo kot kumwoy Yesu kule puryo kot kume neto, kimwoy pate kule, “Ye omöce ani kule kusop, okokoy aweckey ani, kunömiŋ nyi coto?’’
Konomintonoto kunye neto nyi poru ŋalecu, oŋnku neto nye kisile ŋalecu, kunyo cinket acek neto, kimwoy ŋalek cepo manta.
Kunyo mite ŋalek alak ce caŋ ce kikwiy Yesu. Ce nto kocesil ŋolyo ake tokol nye kikwiy, asoti ani kule nto puryo kot komuce koret kukonor kitapunek ce kocesil.
Mokoryontet nye cekonyite Teyopilo, Om kitapumwani nyo kipo tay, kyosil oŋnkatet yisyonutek tokol ce kikwiy oŋnkunet Yesu kuceke ye kicece yisyenyi,
okoy pesyet nyo kicesute neto kuwo torot. Ye kitompo kot cesut kuwo torot, kimwoci kunkolontyi om swametap Muyet Nyetilil piko co kikweny neto kwek kiyokikyi.

Kopur Yesu kuwany pesyosyek artam kiceke ye kitutune met, oŋnkuporcikey neto nkit cekto aret ce caŋ om aret nye poru manta nye puryo tintenot kule kikotutune met kusop. Kikäs cekto nkit neto om konyekwa. Yoto kumwoci Yesu cekto ŋalek ce nöme poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.
Nteye kipontokey Yesu oko cekto kunkolontyi kumwoci kule, “Monte kot aŋete Yerusalem, ntene oken okoy kuco neto nyo kikurto Papamwani, nyo kyolim omwowok ani.
Omnye kipatisane Yowana piko peko, ntene om pesyos ce ŋeri mosicepatisanenak akwek Muyet Nyetilil.’’
Ntowo kuyomokey kiyokik oko Yesu, kutepe cek neto kule, “Mokoryontet, pesyosyecu so ye meseketyi nyi Israel poytoyisyet?’’
Kuwekyi Yesu kumwoci cek kule, “Puryo kot kunömok akwek oŋnket pesyosyek nto kenyisyek co kikwiyta Papa om kamukeywekyi nkit.
Ntene mosonyoru akwek swametap Muyet Nyetilil ye kucontyok, yoto ye mosoyiku muncururwanik ce kamwayte ŋalekwani om Yerusalem, oko om Yuteya, oko om Samariya tokol okoy wule kiŋete koret.’’
Nteyu kowo kuwany kumwoy ŋalecutecu, cesut neto kuwo torot kumite cek kuköse, yoto kulum polyet kupote konyekwa.
Nteye kimite cekto kunyole torot kuköse ye weti, kuyoŋe lakwar komosmwacek piko alak oyeny ce kilac sirok ce lelac.
Kumwoy picoto kule, “Pikap Kalilaya, omne soyoŋe akwek yu oŋnkonyoli wulin po torot? Yesu nyitenyi kocesutenok akwek kuwo torot, kunye mosukuweckey kuyu nyitenyi oköse akwek cesute kuweti torot.’’
Yoto kuwecekey konomik tulwet nye cekure tulwetap Seituninek nye kimite ye puntoy kilomitet akenke keceke Yerusalem.

Nteyu kowo kupun cek Yerusalem, kupa koto orit oŋnkulaŋnta kupa koto nye kimite koto parak nye kipurune cekto. Coto ku Petero oko Yowana, oko Yakopo oko Antereya, oko Filipo oko Tomas, oko Paturumayo, oko Matayo, oko Yakopo weritap Alufayo, oko Simon nyikanet nye poryecini korenyi, oko Yuta, weritap Yakopo.
Kipure picutecu tokol wanak om moyet akenke sukusome om pesyosyek tokol. Kipontokey cekto wanak oko koruk, kumite mpo Mariyam kametitap Yesu oko mpo yeyanyitap Yesu.
Om letutap pesyos ce ŋeri, kopur kokwet nyepo piko tokol co kikoyen, kipuntoy piko tokol pokol ok timtem. Yoto kuŋet Petero kuyo oŋnkuŋalal kumwoy kule,
“Mpo yeya, roke ciyitita kupoyit manta ŋalekap silutekap Yiyintet ce nöme Yuta nyo kintocini piko ce kinöme Yesu.
Yuta kunye ki cito akenke nyepo lukenyacek nye kikicekwey kwiyis yisyoni nyacek.’’
(Om pesanik co kinyor om yisyet nyepo miyotyet kuco kikwale neto mparet wule kinyorta menyi, wule kiputyi kuŋas kuyatakay moyet kukwa okutanik saŋ.
Kulim oŋnkunket topon piko ce minye Yerusalem, kunyo kikur cekto mparanato kutoci kaynemwa kule, Akeltama, nye poru kule, “Mparetap koroti.’’)
“Omnye kicesil om kitaputap tumwonikap kakastayet kule, ‘Roke kopur konyi kwek kiratya, Puryo kot kumisyini kuminy ci orit.’ Kicesil yec kule, ‘Roke kusut citake oteptap yisyenyi.’
“Kunyo misyini kuco citake oŋnkuyomokey oko acek sukuŋet kwek neto nyoto muncururwet nye nket kotutunetap metap Mokoryontet Yesu.

Roke ku cito nye kicepesetoti tokol om lukenyacek yo kicepesetoti wanak oko Mokoryontet Yesu, kuceke pesyosyek co kimwoytoti Yowana ŋalekap potisonisyenyi okoy pesyet nyo kicesutenec acek Yesu kuwo torot.’’
Yoto kukwey cekto kaynokap piko oyeny, Yosep nye kicekure Parsapa (nye kicekure yec Yusto) oko Matiya.
Kusom cekto kumwoy kule, “Ayi Mokoryontet, nyi nye nketi mukuleywekap piko tokol, kunyo Mokoryontet, porwec acek ŋo om picu oyeny nye kekwey nyi,
sukuŋet kusut kuker yisyet kwek kiyokintet otepto nyo kipokoktoy Yuta nyo kiwecikey otepnyi wule kicone.’’
Nto om letut kukweyis cekto kuporci kirotyet picoto oyeny. Nto kaynet nye kicekwey kunye kipo Matiya, cituyo neto kuyomokey wanak oko luketap kiyokik co ki taman ok akenke.
Ntowo kupunto pesyetap Pentekoste, kimite pesyonoto kukerurukyikey yeto akenke piko tokol ce kikoyen.
Yoto pakenke kuco karumnta nye kicone torot nye kerkey oko yomat nye kiwuse om swamet nyewo koromun oŋnkunyiy koto tokol nye kimite kukepur cekto orit.
Yoto kukäs cekto ce kerkey oko ŋelyepikap motik ce kaseret oŋnkopure moticoto metitap ci tokol om cekto.
Yoto kunyor ci tokol Muyet Nyetilil oŋnkucec kuŋalal ŋelyepik alak kuyu wule kimukta kukoci Muyet Nyetilil ci ake tokol om cekto.
Kimite yoto Yutayek ce kiminye Yerusalem, piko ce kiyweye Yiyintet ce kikikwane koret tokol kumukul.
Nteye kotolime picoto karumnta nyoto, koruruckey wanak piko ce caŋ oŋnkukite tokol omnye kilim ci tokol kuŋolole piko co kikoyen om ŋelyepikwa.
Kukite piko oŋnkumuyo oŋnkuŋalal kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot ku pikap Kalilaya cekto cutecu ŋolole!
Omne yec sicelim acek tokol ŋalek ce ŋolole cekto om ŋelyepta nyo kiceyitec acek?
Ciku acek Parasik oko Metisyek oko Elamayek oko pikap Mesopotamia oko cepo Yuteya oko cepo Kapontokiya, oko cepo Pontia, oko cepo Asia,
oko cepo Prukiya, oko cepo Pampiliya, oko cepo Misiri, oko cepo koretap Lipiya ce lekite moŋetap Kurene, oko toyek ce kwone Rom, wanak oko Yutayek oko lamek co kicäm tinitap Yutayek,
Kirikik oko Arapuk. Kunyi celime acek cekto kuŋolole ŋelyepik kyacek yisyonutek cewoyec cepo Yiyintet.’’
Yoto kukite cek tokol oŋnkunŋalal kwicek nkit kutepekey kule, “Ŋolyo ne ŋolyontoni?’’
Ntene kucur piko alake piko co kikoyen kumwoy kule, “Kopokit picu komek ce mwonec!’’

Yoto kuyo Petero nye kipontokey kiyokik taman ok akenke, oŋnkunŋalal kukurto om kutit nyewo kumwoci luketap piko kule: “Merekyo akwek Yutayek, wanak oko akwek piko tokol ce minye Yerusalem, olimwo pa ani akwek topon koromun ŋalecu amöce kule omwowu.
Puryo kot kupokit picu kuyu wulo osotitoy akwek; omnye mite yawut sawet somok nyepo kororn.
Ntene ŋalecutecu kuce kiŋalale workoyontet Yower kumwoy kule,

‘Mwowu Yiyintet kule, om pesyosyek cepo letut cokwoni mosayiy ani ŋalecu: Mosokoci Muyemwani piko tokol; mosikuŋorsyo werikwok oko tipikwok, mosukukäs oyiperikwok ŋoŋutok, mosukurwotyeci poyikwok kirwotik.
Yunyoto, om pesyosyecoto mosokoci Muyemwani mpo mutworikwani moronik oko koruk, mosukuŋorsyo cekto.
Mosoporu tukuk cepo kakitat om wulin po torot, oko pelutok ce cekite om wuli koret ŋony mosukutok korotik oko mata oko yetit nyewo;
mosukuwälkey asista kutuyit kwek menon, oŋnkusalakay arawet kwek koroti, kutompo kot kapunto pesyet nyewo nye cikite nyepo Mokoryontet.
Yoto ye mosicisop ci tokol nye kure kaynetap Mokoryontet.’

“Pikap Israel, alimnte pa ŋalecu! Yesu nyepo Nasaret kunye cito nye kiporwok akwek Yiyintet om yisyonutek ce kikwiy cepo kakitat oŋnkupo swamet oko pelutok ce kikwiy Yiyintet om wule mite neto, oŋnket akwek nkit ŋalecutecu, omnye kikwiyokis om wule omite akwek.

Yiyintet nkit om cömisyenyi oko wule nketitoy neto nkit, kunye kicämnta keny kule roke anäm akwek Yesu; kunyo kyopar apakäc neto, omnye kyocämnte oŋnkokoyte kuwuyitoci piko co miyotec neto murtowontet.
Ntene koŋet Yiyintet kututune met kunumune neto mwonintap met, omnye kipuryo kot komukoktos kunäm oŋnkurip met neto kwek mopusyo.
Omnye kimwoy Tauti ŋalek ce nöme neto kule, ‘Oköse ani Mokoryontet kumite taymwani pesyosyek tokol, omnye mitowune neto yewumwani nyepo tay, sukuŋet mente kot atomtomen ani.
Kunyo sukuŋet kupaypayit mukuleymwani, oŋnkuŋerec ŋelyepmwani, kunyo ponto pormwani kokenotet nyepo ŋerekwek;
omnye puryo kot muci nyi yosyi soponmwani kopur kapkompic, oŋnkupuryo kot muci nyi yaste mutworinteŋuŋ nye tilil kunun.
Kweporwo ani arosyek ce peti wule mite soponto, kunyo om tayŋuŋyi mesekono ani nyi ŋerekwek.’
“Mpo yeya! Omwowok ani akwek topon ŋalek ce nöme kukonyo nyewo Tauti, kule kime cemuy, kunyo mite mwenenyi nyo kicetupci ceköse acek okoy pesyoni.
Kunyo ki workoyo, oŋnkinkete Tauti kirotyet nye kikurtoci Yiyintet neto. Kiwalkey Yiyintet kumwoy kule mosokoci cito akenke om kesenisyekap Tauti kopure ŋeceret kwek Kinko; kuyu wule kiyunto Tauti.

Kikäs Tauti kito nye kimöce Yiyintet wokwiy om pesyosyek cepo tay. Yoto Kuŋalale ŋalek ce nöme kotutunetap metap Ŋapanet yo kimwowu kule, ‘Puryo kot cepokokyini neto kapkompic, Nto puryo kot kunun pornyi.’
“Kiŋet Yiyintet Yesu nyitenyi kotutune met, kunyo ceyiku acek tokol muncururwanik cepo manta ce nöme ŋalecutecu.

Kicilaŋnta kuwo torot wokopurune yewutap tay nyepo Yiyintet, oŋnkunyor om wule mite Yiyintet Muyet Nyetilil kuyu wulo kikikurtoci Papanyi. Kunyo ŋalek cu oköse oŋnkolime akwek kuce kokoteywekyi ce kokonec kuroŋwec acek.
Omnye kipuryo kot kulaŋnta Tauti kuwo torot; ntene mwowu neto nkit kule, ‘Kimwoci Mokoryontet Mokoryotenyu kule, Purune yu po yewumwani nyepo tay,
okoy awec ani punikuk kopurune ŋonyutap kerenkokuk.’
“Kunyo möce kunket pikap kotap Israel tokol ŋalek cepo manta kule. Yesu nyitenyi nyo kyowuyitocini akwek murtowontet kunye kikoci Yiyintet kwek Mokoryontet oŋnku Ŋapanet!’’
Nteyu kowo kulim piko ŋalecata, kwam cekto mukuleywekwa. Yoto kumwoci cek Petero oko kiyokik alak kule, “Mpo yeya, mokyiy ne?’’

Kumwoci Petero cekto kule, “Arenynkey ayaste miyotyonikwok citake tokol om akwek, oŋnkokany cepatisanak om kaynetap Yesu Kristo, sukuŋet cinumunenok miyotyonikwok; mosonyoru akwek kokotutyet, nyoto ku Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet.
Omnye kikurtowok Yiyintet akwek oko lekokwok oko piko tokol ce mite wule low oko tokol ce kure Yiyintet kukwa wule mite neto.’’
Kurwokyi Petero kunkolontyi kumwoci kule, “Osorukey akwek nkit osopkey om toŋoŋutek ce kwotyini pikap pinitenyi masat!’’
Cepatisan om yoto piko ce kiyen ce kirice kupunto elifunek somok oŋnkuyomokey oko luketap piko ce kikoyen.
Yoto kopurcin picoto pesyosyek tokol sukunete kiyokik cekto, oŋnkuyomokey wanak tokol sukupcicintos omikap Mokoryontet oŋnkusome okokoy.
Kunäm muyotet ci tokol om tukuk cepo kakitat oko pelutok ce kikwiye kiyokik.
Kuyomokey wanak piko tokol co kikoyen om cömisyet oŋnkusankan tukuk tokol ce kiponto ci tokol.
Kwalya tukukwa oko tukuk alak tokol ce kiponto oŋnkuyomo wanak sukupcicintos kuyem kuyu wule kimoktoy ci tokol.
Kutosyikey cek kuyu yete pesyo kutuytos wanak tokol kuyu luket akenke om kotap Yiyintet oŋnkwomncitos omik wanak om korikwa. Kwomisyi omik om ŋerekwek oko om mukuleywek ce poypoy.
Kukostoy cekto Yiyintet oŋnkuponto cömisyet nyewo nye kicöme piko tokol. Kutosyini Mokoryontet pesyosyek tokol kuyomo wanak oko cekto piko ce kimite cisope.
Nto om pesyet ake ye kimite Petero oko Yowana kupeti kuloŋntoy kotap Yiyintet wokusome om sawetap somset ye kimite sawet sokol nyepo kosoleny.
Kimite citake nye kikomwal kuceke ye kiceyi, nye kicesutu pesyosyek tokol cokopure kurketap kotap Yiyintet nye kicekure, “Kurket nye karam.’’ Sukuŋet kusome pesanik piko ce peti kowute orit.
Nteye kotoköse cicoto Petero oko Yowana kupeti kotap Yiyintet, kusom neto cekto kakalyayet.
Kurotot cekto tukway cicoto topon, oŋnkumwoci Petero cicoto kule, “Käsec acek pa nyi!’’
Yoto kukäs cicoto cekto kusotyini kule tos musukukono kitake.
Ntene kumwoci Petero neto kule, “Moponte ani pesya tokol, ntene mosokoniŋ kito nye oponte, om kaynetap Yesu Kristo nyepo Nasaret, komwowuŋ kule, ŋet wesetote!’’
Yoto kunäm Petero yewutap tay nyepo cicoto oŋnkukalya kuyo. Yoto pakenke lakwar kuculokis kusopco kerenkok oko kutuŋokap cicoto,
Kuŋet lakwar kuyo oŋnkucec kuwesetot kowut kotap Yiyintet wanak oko cekto kuŋerekoti kuronoti kukostoy Yiyintet ye kimite kuweti.
Kukäs piko tokol cicoto kuwesetoti oŋnkukostoy Yiyintet.
Ntowo kukäs piko oŋnkunket kule cicoto ku somintet nyo kwepure kurketap kotap Yiyintet nye cekure, “Kurket nye karam.’’ Yoto kumuyo tokol oŋnkukite kito nye keyakay om wule mite cicoto.
Nteye kitokunomoti cicoto Petero oko Yowana, kukite piko tokol oŋnkurway kupa wule mite cekto om tekewut nye cekure, “Tekewutap Solomon.’’

Ntowo kukäs Petero piko, kuŋololyi kumwoci kule, “Pikap Israel, omne sokite akwek koromun ŋalecu, nto omne sorototec acek kuyunyi. Osoti akwek kule om swamet nto om toponiyenyacek nkit kunye kekoci cici kuwesetot?

Yiyintetap mpo kukonyo nye kwelaŋnta kukoci woyinto mutworintenyi Yesu, neto nyo kyoŋomntoy kunäm piko ce ponto kamukeywek, yo kyotoye taytap Pilato, nka mpo om letut yo kimöce Pilato kule atyakte kuwecikey.
Ki cito neto nye tilil nyepo manta, ntene otay akwek neto. Yoto osom Pilato kwiwok ce toponec kutyokwok rumintet,
Akany akwek cepar kume neto nyo konu soponto, nyo kiciŋet kotutune met. Ciku acek muncururwanik ce kicekäs ŋalecu.

Om swametap kaynenyi kunye kekoci swamet oŋnkusop cici kimwole nye oŋnketi akwek topon. Ŋalecu oköse kuce kakyiy om koyenet oko cömisyetap kaynenyi. Om koyenet nyewo nye ceponte acek om Yesu kunye kesop cici kuyu wule oköstoy akwek kumite yu po taymwoŋ kuyunyi.
“Kunyo yawut, mpo yeya oŋnketi ani kule kyayiy akwek coto oko pikwok cewoyec nye kipuryo oŋnketi.
Kikurto kumwoy Yiyintet keny kupunune kutuwakap workoyik tokol kumwoy kule mosukutaŋany Ŋapanenyi; kunyo kakwiy kuyitita coto kuyu nyitenyi.
Kunyo arenynkey, oŋnkowekyikey wule mite Yiyintet, sukuŋet kopukto miyotyonikwok,
sukuŋet Mokoryontet komuc kukonok pesyosyek ce omuŋe kupoypoyitu mukuleywekwok, oŋnkuyokwok kukonok Ŋapanet, Nyoto ku Yesu nyo kicekwewok akwek kuceke keny.
Kunyo misyini kopur neto torot okoy pesyet nye cewece tukuk tokol kulelakitu, kuyu wulo kikurto Yiyintet om kenyisyek cepo keny kupunune wule mite Workoyikyi ce tililec.
Omnye kimwoy Moses kule, ‘Mosukukonok kuyokwok akwek Mokoryontet Yiyintemwoŋ workoyontet nye mosukucone kwenumwakwek nkit, kuyu wulo kikweyo ani. Misyini olimnci kiy ake tokol nye komwowok.
Ci tokol nye puryo kot kulime ŋalek ce mwowu workoyontonoto, mosicekwey cito nyoto kucone wule mite pikap Yiyintet oŋnkyaranta.’
Mpo workoyik, kuyu Samuel oko cerupe neto kikurto tokol ŋalecu po pesyosyecutecu.

Kunyo oyiku akwek kontiyikap workoyik, oŋnkopoye kirotyet nyo kikwiy Yiyintet oko po Papamwoŋ kuyu wulo kimwoci Apram kule, ‘Kupunune wule mite kesenisyekuk, mosokoci ani kupeyok pikap koret tokol kumukul.’
Kunyo kunyosyo Yiyintet kukwey oŋnkuyokwok kuco wule omite akwek mutworintenyi cokukonok kupeyok oŋnkuwecak akwek tokol apakakte kopurwek ce miyotec.’’
Nteye kitokumite kuŋololyini Petero oko Yowana piko, kukwa tisik oko cito nyewo nye poytoy kotap Yiyintet oko Satusayek.
Kinyer cekto kunerekis omnye kinete kiyokik coto oyenku kumwoci kule kitutune met Yesu, nye poru kule mosukotutune met piko ce kipok.
Yoto kunäm cek oŋnkukerta mopusi okoy tun kororn, omnye kikikwimen koret.
Ntene kuyen piko ce caŋ ce kilim lokoywek okoy kapunto coŋintap moronik ce kirice elifunek mut.
Ntowo kuyec koret, korurukyikey Yerusalem poytoyikap Yutayek oko poyik oko konetikap ntarastinek;
oko Anas tisintet nyewo oko Kayafa oko Yowana oko Alekisanta, oko piko alak cepo aretap tisintet nyewo.
Kukwer cekto Kiyokik kukwa kuyoŋe taymwa om kokwet oŋnkutepe kule, “Swametap ŋo, nto kamukeywekap kaynetap ŋo nye oyiye akwek ŋalecu?’’
Yoto kunyor Petero swametap Muyet Nyetilil, kuŋalal kumwoci cekto kule, “Akwek kantoyikap piko oko poyik:
Ye otepenec acek pesyoni ŋalek ce nöme ŋalek ce toponec ce kukyici cito nyo kwemwole oko wule kusopto,

kuroke oŋnket akwek oko pikap Israel tokol; kule cici keyoŋe yu po taymwakwek kunye kucisop neto kunyol topon om swametap kaynetap Yesu Kristo nyepo Nasaret nyo kyowuyitoy akwek, ntene kuŋet Yiyintet neto kututune met.
Yesu nyitenyi nyo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Rwantet nyo kyonyile akwek tekik, kunye kiweckey kwek rwantet nye pële tokol nye tiye koto tapan.’
Cenyortoy kosopotet kupunune wule mite neto nkit pate omnye puryo kot kumite yec cito ake koret tokol kumukul nye kikoci Yiyintet kaynenyi piko, nye muce kot kusopec acek.’’
Kukite pikap kirwoket yu kowo kukäs cekto nyikanatetap Petero oko Yowana, oŋnkunket kule kipontotikey picutecu Yesu.
Yoto kupotyi cekto ŋolyontet nye mokumwoy omnye kiköse cito nyo kucisope kumite keyoŋe ye kimite Petero oko Yowana.
Kumwoci cekto Petero oko Yowana kuŋete kokwet kupa saŋ, oŋnkucec kurwoc kwicek nkit.
Kutepekey kumwoy kule, “Mokyiye ne acek picu? Omnye kukunket ci tokol nye minye Yerusalem kule, cekto ce kokwiye manta ŋolyontoni po kakitat nye puryo kot cimuce cetinten.
Ntene ye sicekerekte ŋolyontoni mente kot tokutosyikey kupunto wule mite piko tokol, roke cemwoci cisowu picu kule monte kot toŋalale yec mpo kisic kaynetap Yesu.’’
Yoto kukur cekto kiyokik kukwa kokwet oŋnkurwokyi kumwoci kule, “Monte kot toŋalale nto anet yec mpo kisic piko om kaynetap Yesu.’’
Ntene kuwekyi Petero oko Yowana kumwoci kule, “Orwoc akwek nkit nye roke ciywey om taytap Yiyintet, ciywey Yiyintet nto ciyweyak akwek?
Omnye puryo kot cimuci acek cesisie moceŋalale ŋalek ce kicekäs oŋnkyelim acek nkit.’’
Kunkolontyi kokwet kukerci cekto koŋ oŋnkutyakta kupecikey omnye kipuryo kot kunyorta lelis nye muce cerate, oko omnye kimite piko tokol om yoto kukostoy Yiyintet om tukuk ce kukwiyokis.
Kiponto cicoto kicisope om kosopet nyepo kakitat kenyisyek ce kikeytye artam.
Nteyu kowo cityakta Petero oko Yowana, kunomen kupa lakwar wule kimite lukemwa, oŋnkuwokumwoci ŋalek tokol ce komwoy tisik cewoyec oko poyik.
Nteye kotolime cut ŋalecato, kusom cekto tokol wanak Yiyintet kumwoy kule, “Ayi Mokoryontetap torot oko ŋony, oko ruretok oko tukuk tokol ce mite koret!
Kiŋalal nyi om swametap Muyet Nyetilil kupunune kutitap kukonyo Tauti mutworinteŋuŋ yo kimwowu kule. ‘Omne sukunerekis lamek, omne sukuyiytakey piko nyepo püc pate?
Kuyiytakey kutetkey kinkonikap koret, oŋnkuyomokey poytoyik wanak, kutoye cekto Mokoryontet oko Ŋapanenyi.’
Omnye ŋalek cepo manta kucu kule, kiyomokey wanak Erote oko Pontyo Pilato oko lamek oko pikap Israel om moŋoni oŋnkutay cekto Yesu mutworinteŋuŋ nye tilil nye kiŋap nyi kwek Kinko.
Kururuckey cekto wanak kwiy kiy ake tokol nye kicäm nyi kunyo om swameŋuŋ oko cömisyeŋuŋ kule mosukwiyakay.
Kunyo yawut Mokoryontet, käs pa komuyotet wule kokomuytec acek, konec acek mutworikuk ceŋalale lokoywekuk om nyikanatet tokol.
Yite yewuŋuŋ oŋnkikonu kwiyokis ŋalek cepo kakitat om kaynetap mutworinteŋuŋ nye tilil Yesu.’’
Nteyu kowo kusom kot kuwany, yoto koriŋriŋ koret om yoto kimite cekto, konyor tokol Muyet Nyetilil oŋnkucec kuŋalal kumwoy lokoywekap Yiyintet om nyikanatet tokol.
Yoto kuyomokey wanak piko tokol co kikoyen om moyet akenke oko mukuleyto akenke, nye kipuryo ci nye mwowu kule cecu tukuk ce kiponto, ntene kisonkone tukuk tokol ce kiponto cek tokol.
Kumwaytat kiyokik om swamet ŋalek cepo manta kutor kotutunetap metap Mokoryontet Yesu. Kukoci Yiyintet cekto tokol kupeyok ce caŋ.
Kipuryo yoto ci mpo akenke nye kimite lukonoto nye kipotyini kiy nye möce. Kwalya piko co kiponto mparosyekwa nto korik oŋnkusut pesanik ce konyor,
oŋnkwokukoci kiyokik, cepcicin pesanicato kuyem ci tokol kuyu wule kimoktoy.
Yoto mpo Yosep nye ki Lefintet nye kiceyici Kupro nye kikimulyi kiyokik kukure, “Parnapa’’ nye poru kaynanato kule, “Cito nye kimisyi.’’
Kwalya neto mparenyi nye kiponto oŋnkusut pesanik cokukoci kupoy kiyokik.
Ntene kimite citake nye kicekure kaynenyi Ananiya oko korkenyi Safira, yoto kwalya Ananiya mparenyi nye kiponto,
oŋnkuwuny kukonor pesanik alak kunkete korkenyi, oŋnkusut ce koŋet wule mite kiyokik.
Kumwoci Petero neto kule, “Ananiya, omne sekoci Setanit kupayta mukuleyŋun kuweciŋ perper Muyet Nyetilil, omnye kwewuny pesanik kererya ce kwenyorte mparet nyo kweyalye?
Ki cekuk tukuk tokol kutompo yalye, mpo yu koweyalye kutokucekuk pesanik. Kunyo omne secäm nyi om mukuleyŋuŋ kot yiy kiy nye yunyi? Puryo kot perper nyi piko ntene keperper Yiyintet.’’
Nteye kotolime Ananiya ŋalecato kuputyi ŋony kume. Yoto kumuyo piko tokol ce kilim ŋalecato.
Yoto kukwa oyiperik oŋnkurate musto sirok oŋnkusut kuwo saŋ wokumuy.
Nto om letut kukatil sawanik somoku, kuco korkenyi nye kipuryo kot kunkete kiy ake tokol nye kakwiyakay.
Kutepe Petero neto kule, “Mwowo ani pa, pesanik tokol so cutecu ce kyonyoru akwek oko santeŋuŋ om mparet nyo kyoyalye?’’ Kuwec kumwoy kule, “Manta tokol cutecu.’’
Yoto kumwoci Petero neto kule, “Omne sacäm akwek oko santeŋuŋ kule cesyem celotu Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Mokoryontet? Käs pa piko ce kowokomuye santenüŋ, mosukusutiŋ mpenyi iwo aranato!’’
Om yoto pakenke koputyi yepo kerenkokyi kume. Kukwa oyiperik koto orit kwokunyor kame, kanäm oŋnkusut neto kuwo saŋ wokumuy kurupkey oko santenyi.
Yoto kunäm muyotet nyewo koromun pikap Yiyintet oko piko alak tokol ce kilim ŋalecutecu.
Kwiy Kiyokik tukuk cepo kakitat oko pelutok om wule mite piko, kuyomokey wanak piko tokol co kikoyen kwek luket akenke sukutuytos tekewutap Solomon.
Kipuryo ci mpo akenke nye kipuryo kot kupo lukonoto nye kisyem kule nto owut wule kimite piko co kikoyen, ntene kuŋolole piko alake cut ŋalek ce toponec kucömntoy cekto koromun.
Yoto kutosyikey piko ce caŋ moronik oko koruk kucäm Mokoryontet oŋnkuyomokey oko luketap piko co kikoyen Yiyintet,
okoy cesutu mpo piko ce mnyontos cesutune kwiririnek oko tempok oŋnkwocimukontyi arastunwekap moŋet kule sukuŋet nteye kopunte Petero ye lekite cekto kuyen atotoynyi picoto alak ce kimnyontos.
Kukwa mpo piko ce caŋ ce kiminye moŋosyek ce lekitec ce kimut Yerusalem, kusut cekto piko ce kimnyontos oko ce kiponto oyik ce miyotec, cisop tokol kusopco.
Yoto kuŋet Tisintet nyewo oko pikyi ce kikolyoy neto, coto ku luketap kereryantetap Satusayek. Kunerekis cekto koromun kukocorok om wule mite kiyokik, oŋnkucömncin kule mocenäm citaŋany kiyokik.
Yoto kunäm cek kiyokik oŋnkukerta mopusitap piko tokol.
Ntene om kwomowunoto kwen, kuyat Malayketap Mokoryontet kurketap mopusit, oŋnkukwer kiyokik kukwa saŋ oŋnkumwoci kule,
“Ape woyoŋe kotap Yiyintet orit, oŋnkomwoci piko ŋalek tokol cepo soponitenyi lel.’’

Yoto kucäm kiyokik. Ntowo kuyec kororn kupa kotap Yiyintet oŋnkucec kunetis. Yoto kukur tisintet nyewo pikyi co kolyoy neto oko kokwet nyepo poyikap Yutayek tokol cepo Israel, oŋnkuyokto cepa wocekwerune kiyokik mopusi kukwa kokwet wule kimite cekto.
Nteyu kowo kupunto piko cewoyec co kiciyoktoy, munowokunyor yoto kiyokik kumite mopusi, kuweckey cek oŋnkwokumwoci kokwet kule,
“Kowocepunte acek mopusit kumite kukerat topon oŋnkumite sikarek kuripsi topon om kurket, ntene yu kowo ceyat kurkotik puryo kot cenyorte ci orit.’’
Nteye kotolime cito nyewo nye poytoy kotap Yiyintet oko tisik ŋalecato kukite kumwoy kule, kukwam ne kiyokik.
Yoto kuco citake oŋnkucokumwoci kule, “Mite piko co kwokertoy akwek mopusi keyoŋe kotap Yiyintet orit kunete piko!’’
Yoto kunomen cito nyewo nye poytoy kotap Yiyintet oko sikarek wokukwer cekto, ntene ye kipuryo kot kukwerune swama omnye kiywey kule mente kuwirenec piko rwontok.
Kukwer cek kiyokik kukwa oŋnkukoci kuyoŋe taytap kokwet. Kucec tisintet nyewo kutepe kule,

“Kucisowok cinkolonwok akwek kule, monte tocinetisye mpo kisic om kaynetap cici, kunyo akäs pa ŋalek ce kwayiy! Kwonetisye kunäm Yerusalem tokol, omöce akwek kule cesutwec acek miyotyetap korotikap cici!’’
Kuwekyi Petero oko kiyokik kumwoy kule, “Misyini celimnci acek Yiyintet kusir ye mocelimnci piko.
Yiyintetap mpo kukonyacek nye kiŋet Yesu kotutune met om letut yu kowo okwertoci akwek murtowontet apakäc.
Kunyo kikolaŋnta Yiyintet neto kuwo wokopure yewutap tay kwek kantoyintet nyewo oŋnkukosopintet, sukuŋet kukoci pikap Israel poroyinto kurenynkey om miyotyonikwa.
Ciku acek muncururwanik ce cinketi ŋalecutecu, acek oko Muyet Nyetilil nye kokotutyetap Yiyintet nye kocini piko co limncini neto ŋalek.’’
Nteye kotolime pikap kirwoket ŋalecato kunyer koromun okoy kurwoc kutilta kule cepakäc kiyokik.
Ntene kuyo cito akenke om kirwoket, nyoto ku Farasoyintet nye kicekure kaynenyi Kamaliel, nye kikonetintetap ntarastinek, nye kiyweye piko tokol. Yoto kumwayta cekwer kiyokik kupa saŋ kuminiŋ,
oŋnkuŋalal kumwoy kule, “Merekyo pikap Israel, oripkey om kito nye omöce akwek kule ceyiye picu,

Omnye om kenyisyek ce ŋeri co kutil, kitok cito nye kicekure Seuta oŋnkusutkey kule oyiku ci nyewo koromun, yoto kulukyi luketap piko ce rice pokolwokik amwan, ntene cepakäc neto kume, kuseret piko tokol ce kirupoti, yoto kupok lukenyi.
Om letut yec, kutok Yuta nyepo koretap Kalilaya om pesyosyek co kiciyite piko tokol, yoto kururuc mpene piko ce caŋ kulukyi neto, ntene cepakäc kume oŋnkyiseret piko tokol co kirupoti.
Kunyo om ŋolyontoni mite yawut yu, komwowok ani kule monte ceyiye picu kitake, oyaste kwiyat cek nkit, omnye ye ŋalecu oko yisyoni mwacek kunye kiy nye kweye piko, mosukupot om letut;
ntene ye cone wule mite Yiyintet kupuryo kot omuci akwek kot opël cekto mpo kisic, omnye monte oporukey akwek kule omite oporye Yiyintet.’’
Cekur Kiyokik kukwa kokwet orit, oŋnkyepas oŋnkyemwoci cinkolontyi kule monte toceŋalale onet piko om kaynetap Yesu, oŋnkyasta kupecikey.
Kuŋete konomik kokwet kupunto ŋerekwek ce caŋ omnye kakonket kule misyini kutaŋany toŋoŋutek om kaynetap Yesu.
Kunetisye cekto pesyosyek tokol kotap Yiyintet oko korikap piko kumwoytoy lokoywek ce toponec cepo Yesu nye Ŋapanet.

Om letut kuminiŋ ye kimite kutosyinikey kucoŋitu konomik, yoto kucec kaŋunyŋunyet om kwenutap Yutayek co ŋolole ŋelyeptap Kirikik oko Yutayek pikap koret. Kumwoy Yutayek co ŋolole ŋelyeptap Kirikik kule kyostoy musukik cikwa monyor omik co cepciwu pesyosyek tokol.
Yoto kukur kiyokik co kitaman ok oyeny luketap konomik tokol kukwa kuyomokey wanak oŋnkumwoci kule, “Puryo kot kumisyini kyaste acek mocemwayte ŋolyontetap Yiyintet oŋnkyerip cepciyte pesanik pate.
Kunyo mpo yeya, akwey akwek om kwenumwoŋ piko tisap ce oŋnket akwek kule ponto swametap Muyet Nyetilil oko ŋomnonet, siceŋet acek cikoci kwiy yisyoni.
Sukuŋet cenyoru acek poroyinto nye cesome oŋnkyiy yiyset nye cemwoytoy lokoywek.’’

Yoto kuŋerekyi luket tokol kasoteywek ce kimwoy kiyokik; cekwey Stefano cito nye kiponto koyenet nyewo oko Muyet Nyetilil, oko Filipo oko Nikolas, oko Nikanor, oko Timon, oko Pamena, oko Nikolas nyepo koretap Antiyok cito nye kikiweckey kwek Yutoyintet.
Kukwer luket picoto kukwa taytap kiyokik. Yoto kusomnci kiyokik cek oŋnkukemer yewuniyekwa metewokap picoto.
Yoto kutosyikey ŋolyontetap Yiyintet kutisto om koret oŋnkutosyikey koromun coŋintap konomik om Yerusalem oŋnkucäm tisik ce caŋ koyenet.
Yoto Stefano cito nye kiponto poypoyet oko swamet oko kamukeywek, kwiy tukuk cepo kakitat oko pelutok ce caŋ om wule mite piko.

Ntene yoto kutintentyi piko alake ŋalekap Stefano, coto ku piko cepo luketap kokwet nye cekure kotapkokwetap piko ce kikyasta (wule kicekurtoy cekto) ce kipontokey Yutayek cekwone Kurene oko Alekisantaria. Cek coto oko Yutayek alak ce kikwone Silisiya oko Asia, kucec picoto kutintentyin oko Stefano.
Ntene kukoci Muyet Nyetilil Stefano ŋomnonet nye kiŋalal nye kipuryo kot komuc cek neto.
Yoto kwal picoto piko alak ce kiŋalal kumwoy kule, “Kucelim acek neto kuŋolole kumwowu ŋalek ce miyotec om wule mite Moses oko Yiyintet.’’
Kuŋetŋet cekto kowurur piko oko poyik oko konetikap ntarastinek, kukwa oŋnkunäm Stefano oŋnkukwer taytap kokwet,
oŋnkukwer piko alak kukwa kwokumwoy ŋalek cepo mwiynanet pate kule, “Ŋolole cici pesyosyek tokol nye memunye ŋalek ce miyotec konyacek nye tilil nyepo Yiyintet oko ntarastinekap Moses.
Omnye kucelim kumwowu kule, mosukoturpup cicitenyi cekure Yesu nyepo Nasaret kululyi ŋony kotap Yiyintet, oŋnkuwec kopurto nyo kikonec acek Moses.’’
Yoto kurotot piko tokol ce kimite kokwet kukäs Stefano, nto pere cekäs kawälkey tokoynyi kukerkeyit tokoytap malayket.
Kutepe Tisintet nyewo Stefano kule, “Po so ŋalecutecu manta?’’

Kuwec Stefano kumwoy kule, “Mpo yeya, oko mpo Papa, olimwo ani pa akwek! Kiporcikey Yiyintet nye ponto woyinto kukonyo Apram ye kimite kuminye koretap Mesopotamia, kutompo kot kuwu wokuminy koretap Aran,
kimwoci kule, ‘Ŋet pakakte komwoŋ oko koreŋuŋ oŋnkiwuyi iwo koret nye mosoporuŋ ani nyi.’
Yoto kuwuye Apram koretap Kalitayek oŋnkuwo wokuminy Aran. Nto om letut yu kowo kume kwan, kuntoci Yiyintet Apram kukwer kucone wuloto okoy kupun koronitenyi omite akwek yawut.

Ntene kipuryo kot kukoci Yiyintet Apram kereryantetap maswetap koroni nka mpo kisic pate kwek nyenyi, ntene kukurtoci pate kumwoci kule mosokoniŋ kwek nyeŋuŋ oko kesenisyekuk, nka kot kipuryo kot kuponto Apram lekwa om pesyosyecoto.
Kimwoci Yiyintet neto kule, ‘Mosukupa kesenisyekuk wokumiŋis koretap piko alak wule mosokwek cekto mutwor oŋnkyitaŋany koromun om wuloto kuwany kenyisyek pokolwokik amwan.’
Kumwoy Yiyintet kule, ‘Mosomutyi musankut ataŋany picoto mosukutaŋany cekto, nto om letut okweru kukwane koronoto kukwa kwokusaya ani om koronitenyi.’

Yoto kukoci Yiyintet Apram sakwetap wonset kwek pelutyetap kirotyet. Kuwon Apram werinyi Isaka kuponto pesyosyek sisit kuceke koceyi. Kuwon Isaka werinyi Yakopo nto om letut kurupkey kuyunyoto kuwon Yakopo mpo kukonyo co kitaman ok oyeny.
“Kucorokyi mpo kukonyo Yosep oŋnkwalya neto kuwo Misiri wokwek mutworin, ntene kurip Yiyintet neto om wuloto,

oŋnkukalya kupunte toŋoŋutek tokol ce kinyor. Nteye kimite Yosep kaytap Farawo Kinko nyepo Misiri, kukoci Yiyintet neto kopurto nye topon oko ŋomnonet okoy kukwey Farawo neto kwek poytoyintet nye poytoy pikap koronoto wanak oko pikap kaytap Kinko nyepo Misiri.
Yoto kuco rupet nye kisut toŋoŋutek ce caŋ om koretap Misiri tokol oko koretap Kanan tokol, okoy kupotyi mpo kukonyo omik ce mokwam.
Ntene kulim Yakopo kule mite omik Misiri, sukuŋet yoto mpo kukonyo kupa wuloto om panta nye kipo tay.
Nto om Panta nyepo oyeny kuporcikey Yosep mpo yeyanyi okoy letut kunket Farawo pikap Yosep.
Yoto kuyokto Yosep ŋalek kupa wule mite kwan Yakopo kumwoci kule kuwu neto wanak oko pikap kanyi tokol kupa Misiri. Kipuntoy coŋintap picoto tokol tomonwokik tisap ok mut.
Yoto kuwu Yakopo kuwo Misiri wule kiwo kumeci neto oko mpo kukonyo tokol.
Cesut muswek cikwa okoy kupun Sekem wule kikwocemuci mwenet nyo kyole Apram pesanik kwale werikap Amor.
“Ntowo kupunto pesyet kuyitita Yiyintet kirotyet nyo kikurtoci Apram, yoto kutosyikey kupit kucaŋit pikyo om Misiri.
Om letut kupoytoyis Kinko ake nye kipuryo kot konket nyoto Yosep.
Kuŋet Kinko nyoto kumutyi ŋomnon kuŋom pikyacek kutaŋany mpo kukonyo kukerci koŋ kunumune lekokwa ce timinkec kumwoci kule kiwirci saŋ sukuŋet kupok.
Om pesyosyecoto kuye kiceyiye Moses, kwek lekwa nye topon koromun nye kiŋerece Yiyintet. Ntene cepaye kaytap kwan kuwany orok somok,
nto cinumu cewirta. Yoto kunyor ceptap Farawo, kunäm nyo kwek werinyi.
Cinet neto ŋomnonet tokol nyepo pikap Misiri, yoto kutok neto kwek ci nyewo koromun om ŋalek ce kiŋolole oko yisyonutek ce kikwiye.
“Nteye kiponto Moses kenyisyek artam, kusot kule mawo orutoci mpo yeyanyi pikap Israel.
Wokunyor cito akenke nyepo Misiri nye kimite kupire kutoŋonye cito nyepo Israel, kuwo yoto wokuyetyeci citap Israel nyo kicitoŋonye. Kupir Moses citap Misiri kupakäc kume.
Kisote Moses kule toskoy mokusow pikyi pikap Israel kule mite Yiyintet kuweti kule wosoru cekto kupunte wule mite Moses. Ntene kipuryo kot kusow cut.
Ntowo kuyekune om pesyet nyepo oyeny, kunyor yec Moses pikap Israel oyeny ce kiportos kwicek nkit. Yoto kusyem kule aket kumwoci kule, ‘Merekyo, alim pa, nteyu otupce akwek! Omne soporye akwek nkit?’
Ntene kuwunukto cito nyo kitoŋonye nyin Moses kuwo tapan oŋnkutepe kule, ‘Ŋo nye kokoniŋ nyi kule paytec nto ketec acek?
Möce kule apakäc ani kuyu wulo kwepoköci citap Misiri?’
Ntowo kulim Moses ŋalecato, kumwey kuwete Misiri wokuminy koretap Mitian wule kiwo kuyici werikyi oyeny.
“Yoto ntowo kupok kenyisyek artamu, kucontyi malayket neto oŋnkuporcikey om rukututwet nye kiloye om koretap kitela ye lekite tulwetap Sinai.
Kukite Moses kito nye kikäs oŋnkuwo kunokyi wule wakäs topon rukututwet nyi loye, yoto kulim kursetap Mokoryontet,
nye kimwoy kule, ‘Ani nyo Yiyintetap mpo kukoŋuŋ, Yiyintetap Apram, Yiyintetap Isaka, Yiyintetap Yakopo.’ Yoto kumuy Moses kupotan nye kipuryo kot tokomuc kukäs.
Kumwoci Mokoryontet neto kule, ‘Numune kweyonik kerenkokuk omnye tilil koret yo koyeŋe nyi!
Kwakäs manta toŋoŋutek ce ponto pikwani om Misiri, kwalim rirekwa, kunyo kaco oreku cesoru osop cekto, amöce kule oyoktiŋ nyi iwo Misiri.’

“Moses nyitenyi neto nyoto kitoye pikap Israel yo kimwowu kule, ‘Ŋo nye kokoniŋ nyi kule paytec nto ketec acek?’ Moses kunyo kiyoku Yiyintet cokwek poytoyintet nyewo oŋnkwek kosopintet om kakalyayetap malayket nyo kiporcinikey neto om rukututwet nye loye.
Kukwerune Moses pikap Israel kukwane Misiri oŋnkwiy pelutok cepo kakitat om Misiri oko ruretyet nye arra oko om koretap kitela kuwany kenyisyek artam.
Moses kunyo kimwoci pikap Israel kule, ‘Mosukuyokwok akwek Yiyintet workoyontet ake kuyu wulo kiyokwo ani, mosukucone neto nyoto wule omite akwek pikap Israel nkit.’
Moses kunyo kipontokey mpo kukonyo luketap pikap Israel yo kirurucekey om kitela, yo kiŋololyini Malayket neto om tulwetap Sinai ye kicikocini lokoywek cepo soponto nyepo okokoy sukuŋet kukonec acek.
“Ntene kutay mpo kukonyo kulimnci Moses, kuwunukto kuwo tapan oŋnkusot kule keroke ceketitekey cipe let koretap Misiri.
Yoto kuyoŋ oŋnkumwoci Aron kule, ‘Toŋwec acek oyinotik alak ce sekuŋet kuntowec, omnye puryo kot cinket kito nye kukwam Moses nyo kikwerunenec acek koretap Misiri.’
Yoto kuye kitonye cekto kerkeyinto nye kerkey moyita, oŋnkupel kwici korosek kiyoto, oŋnkwiy sakwet nyewo kwici kiyoto kitonye cek om yewuniyekwa nkit.

Yoto kutay Yiyintet cek oŋnkwasta kusay kokelikap parak, kuyu wulo kicesilyo om kitaput workoyik kule: ‘Pikap Israel! Puryo kot ku ani nyo kyotilyini tyoŋik oko korosek kuwany kenyisyek artam om kitela.

Ki wemetap Yiyintet Moloc nyoto nyo kyotoroti akwek, oko kerkeyintap kokelyantetap Yiyintemwoŋ Repan; coto ku kerkeyik ce kyotany akwek om yewuniyekwok oŋnkosay, kunyo mosakwetak ani ape okoy akeyitye Papulon.’
“Kiponto mpo kukonyo wemet om kitela nye poru kule mite Yiyintet, wemanato kunye kicitany kopur kuyu wule kimwoci Yiyintet Moses kuyiyta, oŋnkukiciyoyec kuyu wule kikiciporci neto wule tento.

Nto om letut kukoci mpo kwan mpo kukonyacek kutorat wemanato yo kipontotikey cekto Yoswa, oŋnkusut okoy kupun koretap pikap lamek alak co kikwete Yiyintet. Kopur wemanato wuloto okoy pesyosyekap Tauti.
Yoto kucäm Yiyintet Tauti koromun okoy kucömnci kutec koto nye minye Yiyintetap Yakopo.
Ntene Solomon nye kitekyi Yiyintet koto.
Kunyo puryo kot kuminye Yiyintet nyewo nye mite torot koromun korik ce tece piko; kuyu wulo mwoytoy workoyontet kule.
‘Mwowu Mokoryontet kule, torot kunye ŋecerenyu nyepo mokoryontit, nto koret ŋony ku wule yoŋe kerenkokyu. Kunyo koto nye yu ne nye otekwo ani akwek? Ono otepto nye momuŋe ani?
Puryo kot ku yewumwani ne nye kitonye tukucu tokol?’

“Oyiku akwek pic ce kyorat kotwo! Oyiku pic ce puryo kot kuwonotin mukuleywekwok, oŋnkumiŋotin yitikwok nye molime ŋalek cepo manta! Okerkeyekey mpo kukomwoŋ! Okerektoy mpo akwek okokoy Muyet Nyetilil!

Mite pa nyun workoyonto mpo akenke nye kipuryo kot kutaŋany mpo kukomwoŋ? Kipar cek kupakäc piko ce kisutu lokoywekap Yiyintet ce kicemwoy keny kule coni mutworintet nyepo manta. Kunyo yawut kyoŋomnte akwek neto nyoto apakäc kume.
Oyik akwek piko ce kikonok malayket ntarastinekap Yiyintet, oŋnkurok otay akwek mocäm orip ntarastinecoto.’’
Ntowo kulim piko tokol om kokwet ŋalek ce komwoy Stefano, kunyiy cek kelak kunyerci neto koromun.
Ntene kunyor Stefano Muyet Nyetilil, yoto kunyal torot okoy kukäs woyintap Yiyintet oko Yesu kumite kukeyoŋe yewutap tay nyepo Yiyintet.
Komwoy kule, “Akäs pa! Kakäs ani kayatakay wulin po torot, kunyo oköse Weritap cito nye kuyoŋe yewutap tay nyepo Yiyintet.’’
Yoto kupol piko tokol om kutit akenke nyewo oŋnkuker yitikwa, oŋnkurotyi Stefano,
kocutune moŋet kuwo saŋ oŋnkuwire rwontok. Kupokokyi piko muncururwanik ce kimite yeto sirokwa oyiperyontet ake nye cekure Saulo.
Nteye kimite cekto kuwire neto rwontok, kusom Stefano kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet Yesu Näm mukuleymwani.’’
Yoto kukutuny oŋnkukurto om kutit nyewo kule, “Mokoryontet mente oyityi cekto miyotyoni!’’ Kumwoy kuyunyoto oŋnkuru ŋony kume.

Kucämnta mpeneto Saulo wule kameta Stefano. Kuceke pesyonoto kucec kutaŋany toŋoŋutek ce caŋ koromun luket nyepo pikap Yiyintet om Yerusalem. Kumwey piko tokol co kikoyen kuseretyi koret tokol nyepo Yuteya oko Samariya okoy kuŋet pate kiyokik.
Kumuyis piko ce kikoyen kumuy Stefano ce kirire neto lokik ce caŋ koromun.
Ntene yoto kusyem Saulo koromun kule awurte kupotyo pikap Yiyintet, kuwo kowut korik tokol oŋnkocutune orit piko co kikoyen moronik oko koruk oŋnkukerta tokol mopusi.
Yoto kupa piko tokol co kikoyen kuseretyi koret tokol kumwoytoti lokoywek ce toponec.
Kunomen Filipo kurekto okoy kupunto moŋetap Samariya oŋnkuwokumwoci pikap wuloto lokoywek ce toponec cepo Ŋapanet.
Kulim topon piko ce caŋ ŋalek ce kimwowu Filipo, kilum cekto ŋalekyi oŋnkukäs tukuk cepo kakitat ce kikwiye neto wuloto.
Kuŋetyo kupete oyik ce miyotec piko ce caŋ oŋnkupa kupolot polotet nyewo. Cisop mpo piko ce caŋ, piko ce kipok kuwusyo kerenkok oko ce kikikomwolis.
Yoto kuŋerec koromun piko tokol cepo moŋetap Samariya.
Kimite moŋonoto citake nye cekure Simon, nye kikwiye sokeyek ce cikite om pesyosyek alak okoy kukite pikap Samariya tokol koromun. Kisutekey kule oyiku ci nyewo nye tokunot koromun.
Kiyweye piko tokol neto kuceke lekwa okoy piko cewoyec, kumwowu cekto kule, “Cici kunye swametap Yiyintet nye cekure. ‘Swamet nyewo.’ ’’
Kiyweye piko neto omnye kikikwiy sokeyek ce cikite kuwany pesyosyek ce caŋ.
Ntene yu kuwo kuyen piko lokoywek ce toponec cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet oko kaynetap Yesu Kristo ce kimwowu Filipo, yoto cepatisan piko moronik oko koruk.
Kuyen mpene Simon, nto om letut yu kowo cepatisan Simon kopurcin neto oko Filipo. Kokite koromun yu kowo kukäs pelutok cewoyec oko tukuk cepo kakitat ce kiciye.
Yoto kulim kiyokik ce kimite Yerusalem kule kulim oŋnkucäm pikap Samariya ŋolyontetap Yiyintet. Kuyokto cekto Petero oko Yowana kupa wule mite picoto.
Ntowo kupunto Petero oko Yowana wuloto, kusomnci cek piko co kikoyen kule sukuŋet kunyor Muyet Nyetilil.
Omnye kitompo kot kucontyi Muyet Nyetilil mpo akenke om picoto. Ntene kikicepatisan cekto tokol pate om kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu.
Yoto kukemer Petero oko Yowana yewuniyekwa metewokap picoto, kunyor tokol Muyet Nyetilil.
Ntowo kukäs Simon kule kanyor picoto Muyet Nyetilil omnye kekemer kiyokik yewuniyekwa metewokap picoto, yoto kunam pesanik oŋnkukoci Petero oko Yowana,
kumwoci kule, “Okono mpo ani swamani sukuŋet kunyor Muyet Nyetilil piko tokol ce kakemer ani yewuniyekyu.’’
Ntene kuwekyi Petero kumwoci kule, “Wot pot oko pesanikuk, omnye soti nyi kule omuci ayale pesanik kokotutyetap Yiyintet!
Puryo kot kunyeŋuŋ yisyoni, omnye puryo kot kurotat mukuleyŋuŋ om konyekap Yiyintet.
Kunyo renynkey oŋnkicone areŋuŋ nyi miyat, oŋnkisom Mokoryontet sukuŋet kukalyiŋ nyi kasoteywekuk cu yucu.
Omnye kakäs ani kule ponte nyi corokyinotet nyewo koromun, oŋnkiyiku mopusyontetap miyotyet.’’
Kimwoci Simon nyonkey Petero oko Yowana kule, “Osomok ani akwek kule osomwo Mokoryontet sukuŋet mente kot kukwontyo tukucu komwowu akwek kule muce kukwontyo ani.’’

Nto om letut yu kowo kumwayta cekto lokoywekap Mokoryontet, kunomen Petero oko Yowana kuweckey kupa Yerusalem. Nteye kimite kupeti om aran kumwaytat lokoywek ce toponec om soŋwek ce caŋ cepo Samariyek.
Kuŋololyi malayketap Mokoryontet kumwoci Filipo kule, “Ŋet yiytekey, oŋnkinomen tokyikey tö okoy punte aret kacatanet nyo rekte Yerusalem okoy kupunto Kasa.’’ (Aretap surukwenet nyoto.)

Yoto kunomen Filipo kuwo, okoy wokunyor citake nyepo Esiopiya. Cicoto kunye cito nyewo nye kikonorintetap Kantake nto korko nye Kinko nyepo Esiopiya. Kimite cicoto yoto kucone Yerusalem wule kikiwo toyek wokusay Yiyintet.
Kunyo kimite poninekyi kuketitoykey Esiopiya kuwete karinyi oŋnkusumonoti kitaput nye kisile workoyontet Isaya.
Kumwoci Muyet Nyetilil Filipo kule, “Lapat ric apetekey karina.’’
Yoto kulapat Filipo okoy ye kimite karinata, kulim neto cicoto kusumone om kutit nyewo ŋalekap workoyontet Isaya. Yoto kutepe Filipo cicoto kule, “Nketi nyi ŋalecutecu sumoni?’’
Kuwekyi cicoto kumwoci kule, “Omuci ani oŋnket kulene ye puryo ci nye keporwo?’’ Kumwoci cicoto Filipo kulany karit parak oŋnkupetakey tukway.

Ŋalekap silutekap Yiyintet ce kisumone cicoto kucu kule: “Kicekwer neto wocetil kuyu keciryet, Kikerkey neto lekwap kecir nye mute cito kororik ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kutwowu, Kunyo puryo kot kuŋany kutinyi.
Kicewec neto kuminiŋit oŋnkyeyete ŋalek cepo musankut nyepo manta. Puryo ci nye muce kuror kumwoy pikap arenyi, Omnye kicesut soponnyi kuwete koret.’’
Kumwoci cicoto Filipo kule, “Mwowo ani nyi pa, ŋolole workoyontet ci ŋo om ŋalecu? Kiŋololekey neto nkit; nto kiŋolole citake?’’
Yoto kucec Filipo kumwoci cicoto lokoywek ce toponec cepo Yesu kuceke ŋalecutecu kicesil om kitaputap silutekap Yiyintet.
Nteye kimite cekto tukway kupeti om aran kukwa okoy kupun ye kimite peko. Kumwoy cicoto kule, “Käs okyu peko, kiy ne nye kerektoy mocepatisana ani?’’
Kumwoci Filipo cicoto kule. “Cimuce cepatisaniŋ nyi ye keyen om mukuleyŋuŋ tokol.’’ Kuwec cicoto kumwoy kule, “Koyen acäm ani kule Yesu Kristo kunye Weritap Yiyintet.’’
Kuyoŋnto cicoto karit, oŋnkupa tukway oko Filipo kolumntakey peko orit, yoto kupatisan Filipo cicoto.
Nteyu kowo koluŋune peko, kukwer Muyetap Mokoryontet Filipo kuwecikey arenyi. Kipuryo kot tokukäs cicoto Filipo yec om yoto. Ntene kutosyikey cicoto kuwo poninekyi kuŋerekoti ŋerekwek ce caŋ.
Wokukose Filipo pate mite wule cekure Asyotot. Yoto kuwo Filipo kupunte moŋosyek tokol kumwoytoti lokoywek ce toponec okoy kapunto Kaysariya.
Ntene om pesyosyecoto, kutosyikey Saulo kutaŋany konomikap Mokoryontet. Yoto kuwo wule mite Tisintet nyewo,

oŋnkusom parwet nye muce wokuporci kantoyikap korikapkok cepo Tamasko, sukuŋet ye kopunto wuloto oŋnkunyor ci tokol nye rupe ŋalekap Mokoryontet komuc neto kunäm oŋnkurat tokol moronik oko koruk oŋnkukwer cek kupa Yerusalem.
Nteye kimite Saulo panta kuweti Tamasko kukarikta moŋet, kucone lakweyet parak lakwar nye kikweny komut neto.
Yoto kuputyi ŋony, oŋnkulim kutit nye kikure neto kule, “Saulo, Saulo! Omne setaŋany ani nyi?’’
Kumwoy Saulo kule, “Mokoryontet, nyi ŋo?’’ Kumwoy kutit nye kokursyi kule, “Ani nyo Yesu nyo mite nyi toŋonyi.
Ntene ŋete ŋony oŋnkinomen iwo okoy moŋet wule mosicemwowuneniŋ nyi kito nye roke yiy.’’
Ntene kikikuyoŋ yoto piko ce kipetoykey neto nye puryo kot kuŋolole, omnye kilim cekto kutit nye kikursyi ntene amakäs ci.
Kuŋete Saulo ŋony oŋnkuŋany konyekyi, ntopere akaste komokuköstoy. Yoto cenäm neto yewut oŋnkyiretot okoy kupunto Tamasko.
Kuwany Saulo pesyosyek somok nye puryo kot kuköstoy oŋnkupuryo kot kwomisyi omit nto mpo kuyesyo.
Kimite Tamasko konomintet ake nye cekure Ananiya, yoto kuŋonkyi kuporci Mokoryontet neto kumwoci kule, “Ananiya!’’ Kuwec Ananiya kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, amite ani yu.’’
Kumwoci Mokoryontet neto kule, “Ŋet oŋnkinomen iwo okoy aretap moŋet nyo rotat okoy punte kotap Yuta oŋnkitepu citake nyepo Taruso nye cekure Saulo nye mite kusome.
Kunyo koceŋoŋnkyi neto kukäs cito nye cekure Ananiya kuconi kumiŋu ko oŋnkukemer yewuniyekyi sukuŋet kukästa yec konyekyi.’’
Ntene kuwec Ananiya kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet, kumwowo ani piko ce caŋ ŋalek ce miyotec ce nöme cicitenyi ce kikwici pikuk om Yerusalem.
Kunyo kuco Tamasko kuponto kamukeywek cepo Tisintet nyewo sukuŋet kunäm piko tokol ce rupe kusoye kayneŋuŋ.’’
Kumwoci Mokoryontet Ananiya kule, “Iwo nyi, omnye kwakwey ani neto sukuŋet kwiwo, yisyet kuparta ani om wule mite Lamek oko kinkonikwa oko pikap Israel.
Omnye ani nkit nye mosoporci neto ŋalek tokol ce mosukutaŋany om kaynemwani.’’

Yoto kuwo Ananiya okoy koyoto oŋnkukemer yewuniyekyi metitap Saulo oŋnkumwoy kule, “Yeya Saulo, keyokwani Mokoryontet Yesu nkit, nyo kweporunkey nyi nkit om aran yo kwemite coni wuli, kule sukuŋet käste nyi yec oŋnkinyoru Muyet Nyetilil.’’
Om yoto pakenke kusuwune konyekap Saulo tukun ce yu taper, oŋnkuŋoŋokis konyekyi kukästa yec. Kuŋet kuyo oŋnkyepatisan,
oŋnkwomis omik oŋnkunyor swamet. Kopur Saulo kuwany pesyos tukusic kupontokey wanak oko konomik om Tamasko.
Yoto pakenke kuwo Saulo kowut korikapkok oŋnkumwayta ŋalekap Yesu kutor kumwoy kule, “Yesu kunye Weritap Yiyintet.’’

Kokite piko tokol ce kilim ŋalekyi, oŋnkutep kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot ku cicitenyi nyo syeme kule apakäc omis piko co cöme kaynani om Yerusalem? Kunyo kuco wuli kule canäm, picoto oŋnkokwer kupa wule mite tisintet nyewo?’’
Ntene kutosyikey Saulo kukimit oŋnkutintentyin oko Yutayek ce kiminye Tamasko okoy kupël, kumwoci neto cekto om swamet kule, Yesu kunye Ŋapanet nyepo manta.
Nteyu kowo kutil pesyosyek ce caŋ, koruruckey Yutayek kwiy rurumut kule cepakäc Saulo.
Ntene kusow Saulo konket kito nye kimöce cek kule ceyiy. Kuripso cekto kurkotikap moŋet komoy oko pet kule cepakäc neto.
Ntene kunäm konomikyi Saulo om kwomowut ake oŋnkukerta cikaput nyewo oŋnkukoyito kupunte pastit nyepo totetap moŋet kuwo saŋ.
Ntowo kuwo Saulo okoy Yerusalem, yoto kusyem kule oyomekey wanak oko luketap konomik om woloto, ntene kuywey cut tokol neto, omnye kipuryo kot kuyen kule kikwek Saulo konomintet.

Yoto kukalya Parnapa kukwer neto wule mite kiyokik, oŋnkurorci kuporci cekto wule kikästa Saulo Mokoryontet om aran, oko kule kikiŋololyi Mokoryontet neto. Kumwoci Parnapa cek yec ŋalek ce kimwayta Saulo om nyikanatet om kaynetap Yesu ye kimite Tamasko.
Kopur Saulo wanak oko cekto oŋnkuwesetote Yerusalem tokol kumwoytoti om swamet kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu,
oŋnkutintentyin oko Yutayek co ŋolole ŋelyeptap Kirikik. Kusyem co kule cepakäc neto.
Ntowo kulim mpo yeya piko co kikoyen ŋalecato, kukwer cek Saulo kurekto okoy kupunto Kaysariya oŋnkuyomis kuwecikey Taruso.
Yoto kunyor kalyet pikap Yiyintet ce kimite koretap Yuteya tokol oko Samariya. Kutekakay kuner oŋnkutosyikey kucaŋit piko om kakalyayetap Muyet Nyetilil, oŋnkunäm cekto kopurto nye yweye Mokoryontet.
Kuwesetote Petero koret wulyo tokol om wuloto. Nto mite pesyet ake kuwo kurutoci pikap Yiyintet ce kiminye Lita.
Wokunyor om wuloto citake nye cekure Ayineya, nye kikiru kwiriri kuwany kenyisyek sisit, omnye kipok kerenkok.
Yoto kumwoci Petero neto kule, “Ayineya, sopiŋ nyi Yesu Kristo ŋet yony oŋnkisat kwiririŋuŋ.’’ Yoto kuŋete Ayineya ŋony lakwar.
Kukäs piko tokol ce kiminye Lita oko Syaron cicoto kicisop, yoto kuwekyikey cekto kucäm Mokoryontet.
Kimite Yopa korket ake nye konomintet nye kicekure Tapisa (kaynenyi om ŋelyeptap Kirikik ku Torkas, nye poru kule, Cepkecey). Kikwiyisyi korokonoto yisyonutek ce toponec kukolyoy pononik okokoy.
Kumnyan pesyosyecoto okoy kume. Ciwun pornyi oŋnkyikoci kopur koto nye mite koto parak.

Kipuryo kot ku low kuceke Yopa okoy kupunto Lita. Nteye kotolime konomik ce kimite Yopa kule mite Petero Lita, kuyokto cekto piko oyeny kupa wokumwoci Petero kule, “Co sorukey lakwar okoy punu wuli cemite acek.’’

Yoto kuŋet Petero oŋnkunomen wanak oko picoto kiciyoku. Ntowo kupunto, cekwer neto kuwo koto nye kimite koto parak. Korurukyikey wuloto musukik tokol komut Petero kukirtos sukuporcini cekto neto sirok ce kinope Torkas ye kisope.
Yoto kukwet Petero piko tokol kukwane koyoto, oŋnkukutuny kusom, oŋnkuwekyikey musto kumwoci kule, “Tapisa, ŋet yony.’’ Kuŋany Tapisa konyekyi, nteye kotoköse neto Petero kuŋet kopur ŋony.
Yoto kukalya Petero neto kunäm kuŋet kuyo, oŋnkukur piko co kikoyen oko musukik oŋnkuporci neto cek Torkas nye kosop.
Celime ŋalecato koretap Yopa tokol kumukul, yoto kuyen piko ce caŋ Mokoryontet.
Kopur Petero Yopa kuwany pesyosyek ce caŋ kopurune kaytap Simon nye kikute syerok.
Kimite citake Kaysariya nye cekure Korneliyo nye kinyewo nyepo sikarekap luket nye cekure, “Luketap Romek.’’
Ki cito neto nyepo tini koromun nye kisoye Yiyintet wanak oko pikap kanyi. Kikwiye neto tukuk ce caŋ ce toponec kukolyoy Yutayek ce pononik, oŋnkisome Yiyintet okokoy.
Nto mite pesyet ake ye kimite sawet sokol nyepo kosoleny, kukäs Korneliyo ŋoŋutyet nye kimuc kot kukäs topon malayketap Mokoryontet nye kico oŋnkumwoci neto kule, “Korneliyo!’’

Yoto kurotot neto malayket topon om muyotet oŋnkumwoci kule, “Mokoryontet, kiy ne nyito?’’ Kuwekyi malayket kumwoci neto kule, “Kucäm Yiyintet somseŋuŋ oko yisyonutekuk co kolyoy pononik, kunyo kakusotiŋ nyi.
Yokte yawut piko alak kupa okoy Yopa wokukur citake nye cekure kaynenyi Simon Petero.
Mite neto tontonet om kotap cito nyo kute syerok nye cekure Simon nye minye ruretyet tapan.’’
Nteyu kowo kuwecikey malayket nye kiŋololyini neto, yoto kukur Korneliyo mutworikyi oyeny oko sikorintet akenke nye yweye Yiyintet nye ki akenke nye yicini neto yisyet.
Kumwoci neto cekto ŋalek tokol ce keyokis, oŋnkuyokto kupa Yopa.
Nteye kipesyetap oyeny ye kimite cekto tokupeti poninekwa nye kikirikta Yopa. Kuwo Petero kolaŋnta koto nye kimite koto parak wokusom ye kimite sawet pen kwen.
Yoto kwam Petero rupet okoy kumac kule ntoyomisye; nteye kimite tokyiye omik, kukäs neto ŋoŋutyet.
Kukäs kuyatakay wulin po torot, kureku kitake nye coni koret nye kerkey oko sira nyewo koromun nye cenömonu kototok tokol amwan.
Kimite kiyoto orit tyoŋik wok tokol, co pete kerenkok oko co cutekey ŋony, oko toritek.
Kumwoci Yiyintet Petero kule, “Petero, ŋet näm pakäc tyoŋicu oŋnkiyeny yam!’’
Ntene kumwoy Petero kule, “Mokoryontet, puryo kot kuyunyo! Omnye tompo kot ayam ani kenyis kiy nye puryo kot kutilil nto nye miyat.’’
Kukursyo Yiyintet yec nyepo oyeny kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot kuroke kure nyi tukuk ce kikotilil Yiyintet kule puryo kot kutilec nto miyotec.’’
Kwiyakay kuyunyoto aret somok, oŋnkyesut kiyoto lakwar kuwo torot.
Nteye kimite Petero kusote nkit om moyenyi kule poru ne ŋoŋutyoni kakäs neto. Kimite yoto piko co keyoku Korneliyo kukeyoŋ om kurketap kayta om letut yu kowo kutep kot kunket kaytap Simon.
Kukursyo cekto yoto kutep kule, “Mite tontet ake nye cekure Simon Petero kayi?’’
Nteye kimite Petero tokusote kusyeme kule oŋnket poru ne ŋoŋutyet, kumwoci Muyet Nyetilil neto kule, “Lim pa! Mite piko alake somoku ce ceŋotiŋ nyi.
Kunyo ŋet yiytekey rekte ŋony, ntene mente kot atay mewetekey picoto omnye koyoku ani cekto.’’
Kurekto neto kuwo ŋony oŋnkumwoci picoto kule, “Ani cito nyo acenye akwek, kunyo kwokwotyini ne akwek?’’

Kuwec picoto kumwoci neto kule, “Keyokwec acek Korneliyo nyewo nyepo sikarek, nye ci nye topon nye soye Yiyintet oŋnkuyweye Yutayek tokol. Kumwoci malayketap Yiyintet neto kule kukuriŋ nyi iwo kanyi sukuŋet kulim ŋalek ce memwowu nyi.’’
Kukur Petero picoto kupa ko orit kwek toyekyi oŋnkuruy tokol. Ntowo kuyekune, kuŋet Petero oŋnkunomen oko picoto oko mpo yeya alak cepo Yopa kupatakey tokol.
Nto om pesyet nye kirupe kupunto Kaysariya wule kimite Korneliyo kukonye neto. Kimite Korneliyo yoto kokoruruc tilyonutekyi oko latosyekyi ce kikikur kukwa.
Ntowo kurikta Petero kupunto kayta, kuco Korneliyo kutorok oŋnkoputyi kerenkokyi oŋnkukutuny.
Ntene kunäm Petero neto oŋnkuŋet kuyo kumwoci kule, “Ŋet yony; omnye oyiku mpo ani ci pate.’’
Kuŋololyinot Petero Korneliyo ye kimite kuweti koto orit wule kimite kukorurukyikey piko ce caŋ.

Yoto Kumwoci Petero picoto kule, “Oŋnket, akwek nkit topon kule puryo kot kucömncini Yutoyintet ntarastinyi kurutoci nto mpo kuyomokey oko lomin. Ntene kukuporwo ani Yiyintet kule puryo kot kumisyo ani asut ci ake tokol kule puryo kot kutilil nto kule miyat.
Kunyi yu kweyoku nyi piko kule misyini aco ani, mpo ani aco nye puryo kot atay. Kunyo otepeniŋ kule, kiy ne nye kwekurco ani nyi?’’

Yoto kumwoy Korneliyo kule, “Kimite sawet kutenyitenyi om pesyosyek somok co kutil, ye kyomite ani osome om konyu ye kimite sawet sokol nyepo kosoleny. Om yoto lakwar kuco citake nye kelac sirok ce lekecectos, oŋnkuyoŋe yepo taymwani,
oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Korneliyo! Kolim Yiyintet somseŋuŋ, oŋnkukusot mpo kokotutekap yisyonutekuk cepo kokolyoyisyet.
Kunyo yokte citake kuwo Yopa wokukur citake nye cekure Simon Petero. Mite neto tontonet om kotap citake nye kute syerok nye minye ruretyet tapan.’
Sukuŋet yoto oyoku ani kule ico nyi lakwar, kunyo keyiy topon keco. Kunyi ce mite acek tokol yu om taytap Yiyintet cekonye kule celim ŋolyo ake tokol nye komwowuŋ nyi Mokoryontet kule mwowu.’’
Kucec Petero kuŋalal kumwoy kule, “Konket ani kupoyit manta kule, puryo kot kukweye Yiyintet piko,
ntene cöme ci tokol nye yweye neto oŋnkwiye ŋalek cepo manta ce cöme, nka kot kupo cito yemet oŋnkono.
Oŋnket akwek ŋolyontet nye kiyokoci Yiyintet pikap Israel kumwoy lokoywek ce toponec cepo kalyet om Yesu Kristo nye Mokoryontetap koret tokol.
Oŋnket akwek ŋolyontet nyewo nye kikwiyakay om koretap Yuteya tokol, kule kiceke koretap Kalilaya om letutap potisonisyet nyo kimwoytoy Yowana.

Oŋnket akwek ŋalek cepo Yesu nyepo Nasaret, nye kiŋape Yiyintet Muyet Nyetilil oko swamet kwek Kinko. Nye kiwesetote koret tokol kwicini piko tukuk ce toponec, oŋnkusop piko tokol ce kitaŋany kupayta setani nyewo nyepo oyik, omnye kipontokey neto Yiyintet.
Ceyiku acek muncururwanik ce cinket tukuk tokol ce kikwiye neto om koretap Yutayek oko Yerusalem. Ntene kupakäc Yutayek neto kukwertoci murtowontet.
Ntene kuŋet Yiyintet kotutune met om pesyetap somok oŋnkukoci kuporkey,
nye kipuryo kot kuporkey kukäs piko tokol, ntene acek pate muncururwanik ce kikwey Yiyintet ce kicekäs. Kikyomisye oŋnkyeyesye acek wanak oko neto om letut yu kowo koŋet Yiyintet kotutune met.
Kunyo kinkolonwec acek kule womwoci piko lokoywek ce toponec oŋnkoporci ŋalek cepo manta kule neto kunye kikwey Yiyintet kwek ketintet nye mutyini musankut piko ce soptos oko ce kipok.
Neto nyo kiŋalale workoyik tokol ŋalek ce nöme neto kumwoy kule, ci tokol nye keyen neto kunye mocikalya nyoto miyotyonikyi om swametap kaynenyi.’’
Nteye kimite Petero tokuŋolole, kuco Muyet Nyetilil kurekyi piko tokol co kimite kulimntoy lokoywek.
Kukite Yutayek co kikoyen ce kukwontoykey Petero om Yopa kukäs kule kekoci Yiyintet kuco kurekyi kokotutyetap Muyet Nyetilil mpo lamek.
Omnye kilim cekto piko cut kuŋolole ŋelyepik cepciyotin, kukostoy woyintap Yiyintet. Yoto kuŋalal Petero kumwoy kule,
“Ŋo nye muce kuyet mocepatisane picu peko, omnye kanyor Muyet Nyetilil kuyu wulo kicenyoru acek?’’
Kumwayta Petero cepatisan cekto om kaynetap Yesu Kristo. Kusom cekto Petero kopur wanak oko cekto kuwany pesyos ce ŋeri
Yoto kulim kiyokik oko piko co kikoyen ce kimite Yuteya tokol kule kucäm lamek ŋolyontetap Yiyintet.
Ntowo kulaŋnta Petero kowo okoy Yerusalem, kuwokutye luketap piko co wonotin neto.
Kumwoci cek neto kule, “Omne siwo nyi oŋnkiweyomekey oko piko ce puryo kot ce won oŋnkiyomisye wanak oko cekto?’’
Yoto kumwoci Petero kirorci cek ŋalek tokol ce kukwiyokis kuceke wule kicekta okoy kupok. Kumwoy kule,
“Kyomite ani osome om moŋetap Yopa, yoto akäs ŋoŋutyet akäs kitake nye kireku kuconi ŋony nye kerkey sira nyewo nye kicereku kucone torot om kototokyi. Kurek kiyoto okoy kupun ye kyomite.
Arotote ani topon orit oŋnkasot, okoy akäs tyoŋik cepo kerenkok amwan, oko tyoŋikap samiyita oko tyoŋik co cutekey ŋony, oko toritek.
Yoto alim ani Yiyintet kukuro kumwowo kule, ‘Petero, ŋet näm pakäc tyoŋicu oŋnkiyeny yam!’
Ntene omwowu ani kule, ‘Mokoryontet, puryo kot kuyunyo! Omnye tompo kot kowut kutimwani mpo kisic kiy nye puryo kot kutilil nto nye miyat.’
Yoto kuŋololwo Yiyintet aret nyepo oyeny kumwoy kule, ‘Mente kot akur kiy nye kikotilil Yiyintet kule puryo kot kutilil.’
Kwiyokis ŋalecato kuyunyoto aret somok. Nto om letut cesut kiyoto kuketitakey kuwo torot.
Yoto pakenke kupun piko alake somoku ce kiciyoku kukwane Kaysariya okoy koto nye kyomite ani.
Kumwowo Muyet Nyetilil kule wetekey picoto mente kot atay. Owetekey ani tokol oko mpo yeya cutecu lö okoy cepunte kotap Korneliyo om Kaysariya.
Yoto kumwowec acek Korneliyo kule kiporcikey malayket neto nye kico oŋnkuyoŋe konyi oŋnkumwoci kule, ‘Yokte piko kupa Yopa wokukur citake nye cekure kaynenyi Simon Petero.
Nye mosukucokumwowuŋ nyi ŋalek ce mosukusoruŋ kusopiŋ oko pikap kaŋuŋ!’
Ntowo acec ani omwoci cekto ŋalek, yoto kukoci Yiyintet cek Muyet Nyetilil kuyu wulo kikonec acek om kunyo.
Yoto asot ŋalek co kimwowu Mokoryontet kule, ‘Kipatisane Yowana peko, ntene mosicepatisanenak akwek Muyet Nyetilil.’
Porukey kupoyit manta kule kikoci Yiyintet cek lamek coto kokotutyet nye kerkey nyo kikonec acek yo kiciyeni Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo. Kunyo ani ku ŋo nye kyomuci kot akerkte Yiyintet!’’
Ntowo kulim cekto ŋalecato kusisio nye komokuwokutye Petero, oŋnkukasta Yiyintet kumwoy kule, “Kunyo kukukoci nyun Yiyintet mpecek Lamek poroyinto kurenynkey oŋnkusopco!’’

Kuseret piko co kikoyen om toŋoŋutek ce kikwiyokis yo kicepoköce Stefano kume. Yoto kupa alake om cekto okoy kupunto Foyinisiya oko Kupro oko Antiyok kumwocinoti Yutayek nkit pate lokoywek cepo Mokoryontet Yesu.
Nto om picoto ku piko alake co kikoyen ce kipo koretap Kupro oko Kurene. Kunomen picoto okoy kupunto Antiyok, oŋnkumwoci lamek lokoywek ce toponec cepo Mokoryontet Yesu.
Kiponto picoto swametap Mokoryontet, yoto kuyen piko ce caŋ kuwekyikey wule mite Mokoryontet.
Kupunto lokoywek cutecu wule mite pikap Yiyintet ce kimite Yerusalem, yoto kuyokto cek Parnapa kuwo Antiyok.

Ntowo kupunto, kukäs neto wule kikocinto Yiyintet kupeyok piko. Kuŋerec koromun oŋnkutosyi kumwoci cek ŋalek tokol kule kuyen oŋnkurup ŋalek kupoyit manta om mukuleywekwa tokol om wule mite Mokoryontet.
Ki cito nye topon koromun Parnapa nye kiponto swametap Muyet Nyetilil oko koyenet. Yoto cewec piko ce caŋ kuyen Mokoryontet.
Yoto kunomen Parnapa kuwo Taruso kuceŋat Saulo.

Ntowo kunyor kukwer okoy kupun Antiyok, Kuwany kenyit akenke kupontokey cek tukway wanak oko pikap Yiyintet. Kunet cekto luketap piko ce caŋ. Om Antiyok ku wule kikenyosye kunyo cecec cekure konomik kule, “Kristayek.’’
Kurekto om pesyosyecoto workoyik alake om Yerusalem kupa Antiyok.

Kuŋet akenke om cekto nye cekure Akapo, oŋnkuŋalal kuŋorsyo om swametap Muyet Nyetilil kumwoy kule mosukuco rupet nyewo nye mosukunäm koret tokol. Kuyuyit nyoto kuco rupet nyoto ye Kinko Nyewo Klautiyo.
Yoto kucäm konomik kule mokukoyto ci tokol om cekto kuyu wule muktoy kukalya mpo yeyamwa ce minye Yuteya.
Kwiy cekto kuyunyoto, yoto kukoyito pesanik cesutyi poyik cepo pikap Yiyintet ce kimite Yerusalem. Cikoci Parnapa oko Saulo kusut pesanik.
Kucec om pesyosyecoto Kinko Erote kutaŋany pikap Yiyintet alak.
Yoto kunäm Yakopo mutakwametitap Yowana oŋnkumwayta cepare rotwetap cok kume.
Ntowo kukäs kule koŋerekyi Yutayek ŋalecato, kitosyikey kunäm mpo Petero. Kikwiyokis ŋalecato om pesyosyekap sakwetap mukatyantet nye mokutunat.
Ntowo cenäm Petero cerotyi mopusi, oŋnkyikoci kurip sikarek co ripsi ce kipetote amwan. Kimöce yoto Erote kule sokweru Petero kuco kokwetap Yutayek ye kapok sakwetap keytayet.
Yoto ceripune Petero mopusi. Ntene kusomncini pikap Yiyintet neto koromun.

Nto om kwomowut nye kimöce Erote kule sokweru Petero ye koyekune kuco wule mite piko. Kimite yoto Petero kukoru kwenutap sikarek oyeny ce ripsi mopusi, Kicerate neto nyororonik oyeny, oŋnkumite sikarek ce ripsi kurketap mopusit.

Yoto kuco lakwar malayketap Mokoryontet, kukweny lakweyet mopusit orit. Kulucluc malayket Petero leyet kuŋet kukos, oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ŋet lakwar.’’ Yoto pakenke kutyokokis nyororonik kusuyito om yewuniyekyi.
Kumwoci malayket neto kule, “Ratkey, oŋnkilac kweyonikuk.’’ Kwiy neto kuyunyoto, oŋnkumwoci kule, “Yisinekey sireŋuŋ oŋnkirupani.’’
Kurup Petero neto okoy kupunto saŋ nye kipuryo kot kunkete om yoto kule po manta ŋalek ce kikwiye malayket, kisote kule toskoy oköse ŋoŋutyet.
Kupunte cekto kurkotik ce ripe sikarek, nyepo tay, oko nyepo oyeny, sicepa moŋet orit, yoto kuyatakay kurket nkit, kupa cek saŋ, kupa tukway kurup aret, nto om yoto pakenke kupakakta malayket Petero.

Yoto kusow Petero kunket kito nye kakwiyakay om wule mite neto, kumwoy kule, “Konket ani yawut kupoyit manta! Kule kokuyok Mokoryontet malaykenyi, kunyo kosoruneno ani kamukeywekap Erote oko tukuk tokol ce kumöce Yutayek kule ce yiy.’’
Nteyu kowo kusow Petero topon, kunomen kuwo okoy kotap Mariyam kametitap Yowana Marko wule kimite piko ce caŋ ce kokorurukyikey wuloto ce kimite kusome Yiyintet kusomncini Petero.
Kukonynkony Petero kurket nyepo saŋ yoto kuco cepto nye mutworin nye cekure Rota co kukäs.
Kunket cepoto kutitap Petero, kuŋerec koromun kulapat kuketitakey kuwo nye puryo kot kuyat kurket, wokumwayta kule, mite Petero kuyoŋe kurkat saŋ. Kumwoci piko neto kule,
“Kopunuŋ met!’’ Ntene kutinten koromun kumwoy kule, “Mite manta!’’ Kuwec cut kumwoy kule, “Malaykenyi nyo.’’
Kutosyikey Petero kukonykony kurket. Nto om letut kuyat cekto kurket. Nteye kotoköse cekto Petero kukite koromun.

Kuŋololyi Petero cek kuwuse yewuniyekyi kusisio, oŋnkumwoci kurorci wule ketyakta Mokoryontet neto kukwerune mopusi. Oŋnkumwoci Petero cek kule, “Womwoci ŋatecutecu Yakopo oko mpo yeya alak.’’ Oŋnkunomen kuwecikey wulyo ake.
Ntowo kuyec koret, yoto kupotpotenis koromun sikarek ce kiripsi kumwoy kule kukwam ne Petero?

Yoto kumwayta Erote kule ceceny Petero, ntene kipuryo kot komuc cekto kot kunyor. Yoto kukir Erote sikarek ce kiripsi koromun, oŋnkumwayta cepar kupok. Nto om letutap ŋalecato, kunomen Erote kuwete Yuteya kuwo Kaysariya wokopurune wuloto.

Kikiwokut koromun Erote oko pikap Tiro oko cepo Siton. Yoto koruruckey picoto kwek luket akenke oŋnkupa wule mite neto. Kunyosyo cekto kiny kunyo kunäm kwek corwemwa Plasto cito nyewo nye kiripe kaytap Kinko, oŋnkupa wule mite Erote wokusom kalyet, omnye kipoyekey koremwa omik ce kikwone koretap Kinko.
Nteye kipesyet nye kweyat, kulac Erote sirokyi cepo poytoyisyet oŋnkopure ŋeceretap kokwet oŋnkuŋololyi piko.
Yoto kupol piko kumwoy kule, “Kutitap Yiyintet nyito, ntene puryo kot kupo ci!’’
Om yoto pakenke kupir malayketap Mokoryontet Erote kumnyan, omnye mneywey Yiyintet. Kwam neto mokik okoy kume.
Kutosyikey ŋolyontetap Yiyintet kuseret kupunte koret tokol.
Ntowo kuwany Parnapa oko Saulo yisyonutekwa cepo ŋalek ce kikwontyi om Yerusalem, kuweckey cekto oŋnkupetakey Yowana Marko.
Om pikap Yiyintet ce kimite Antiyok, kuce kimite workoyik oko konetik coto ku mpo Parnapa oko Simiyon (nye cekure matuy) Lukio nyepo Kurene, oko Manaen nye kicepoye oko kinko Erote oko Saulo.
Nteye kimite cekto kwicini Mokoryontet yisyet oŋnkukire omik, kumwoci Muyet Nyetili cekto kule, “Okwewo Parnapa oko Saulo sukuŋet kwiy yisyet nye kyokweci ani.’’
Kukir cekto omik oŋnkusomnci kukemer yewuniyekwa metewokap Parnapa oko Saulo oŋnkuyokto kupa.
Nteyu kowo kuyokto muyet Nyetilil Saulo oko Parnapa, kunomen cekto okoy kapunto Seleukiya, kulany om yoto rapet oŋnkupa okoy kapunto Kupro.
Ntowo kupunto cek Salami, kumwayta ŋolyontetap Yiyintet om korikapkok cepo Yutayek. Kipontotikey yoto Yowana Marko nye kikolyoy cekto yisyet.
Kupa kupunte koret nyoto kikwen peko okoy kupunto Papo wule kipa kunyorta cepsokeyontet nye weritap Yoswa, yutoyintet nye kisutekey kule iyiku workoyo.

Kipontokey cicoto oko Serkio Paulo nye ki cito nye ŋom nye ki poytoyintetap koronoto kikwen peko. Kukur poytoyintonoto Parnapa oko Saulo kukwa wule mite neto, omnye kimöce kule alim ŋolyontetap Yiyintet.
Yoto kuŋet Elima cepsokeyontet, (nye kaynenyi nyitenyi wule cekurtoy om ŋelyeptap Kirikik.) Kusyeme kule amas poytoyintet mente kot kuyen.
Yoto kunyor Saulo nye cekure Paulo swametap Muyet Nyetilil, kurotot koromun cepsokeyontonoto,

oŋnkumwoci kule, “Nyi, weritap Setani nyewo nyepo oyik! Yiku nyi puniyontetap ŋalek tokol ce toponec, ponto nyi koperperisyet oko ŋolset tokol, kunyo syeme pesyosyek tokol kule amas kwek mwiynan ŋalek cepo Mokoryontet!

Kunyo mosukupiriŋ yewutap Mokoryontet, mesokor nye meköse asis kuwany pesyos.’’ Yoto pakenke kukerokis kunäm cemereresyet nye tuy konyekap Elima, kutaptapat yoto wulo tokol kule nto sonyoru ci nye kanäm yewut oŋnkuretoto.
Kuyen kucömis poytoyintet yu kowo kukäs ŋalek ce kokwiyokis. Kukite neto koromun konetisyet nyepo ŋalekap Mokoryontet.
Kunomen Paulo oko piko ce kipontokey kulany rapet om Papo oŋnkupa okoy kupunto Peruka om koretap Pampiliya. Yoto kupokokyi Yowana Marko cekto wuloto oŋnkuweckey kuwo Yerusalem.
Kunomene cekto Peruka kupa okoy kupunto Antiyok nyepo Pisitiya. Nteye kipesyetap Sapat kupa cekto wokowut kotapkok oŋnkopur ŋony.

Nto om letut yu kowo ciwany cesuman ntarastinekap Moses oko silutekap workoyik, kumwoci kantoyik cepo kotapkok cek kule, “Mpo yeya, ye oponte akwek lokoywek ce muce kukalya kotitir piko, cesomok acek akwek kule aŋalal.’’
Kuŋet Paulo kuyo oŋnkuwuse cekto yewuniyekyi, oŋnkucec kuŋalal kumwoy kule: “Merekyo pikap Israel, oko akwek lamek co soye Yiyintet olimwo ani pa.
Yiyintetap picutecu po Israel kunye kikwey mpo kukonyacek oŋnkukoci kwek pic cewoyec om kenyisyek ce ye kimite kuminye koretap Misiri ku toyek. Kukwerune Yiyintet cekto swamenyi nyewo kukwane Misiri.
Kumuytoci Yiyintet kopurto nye kiponto cekto kuwany kenyisyek artam ye kiminye koretap kitela.
Yoto kukoci Yiyintet cek kwaranta lamek cepo yemosyek tisap ce kiminye koretap Kanan, oŋnkukoci pikyi kumiŋis kwek pikap koronoto.
Kumiŋis kuwany kenyisyek ce rice pokolwokik amwan ok konom. Nto om letut kukoci Yiyintet cek ketik okoy kenyisyek ce kipo workoyontet Samuel.
Ntowo kusom kule ce möce Kinko, kukoci Yiyintet cekto Saulo weritap Kisyi nye kipo aretap Penyamin kwek Kinko nyimwa. Kupoytoyis nyo kuwany kenyisyek artam.

Nto om letut yu kowo kunate Yiyintet Saulo, kukoci Tauti kwek Kinko nyimwa. Ŋalek ce kimwoy Yiyintet kutor ce nöme ŋalecutecu kucu kule, ‘Kwakäs ani kule, Tauti weritap Yese kunye cito nye ocöme, nye mosukwiy ŋalek tokol ce ocöme ani kule kwiy.’
Yesu nye akenke om mucokoronikap Tauti kunye kikoci Yiyintet kwek kosopintetap pikap Israel kuyu wulo kikikurtoci keny.
Kutompo kot kuco Yesu, kimwoci Yowana pikap Israel tokol kule misyini kwasta cekto miyotyonikwa oŋnkyepatisan.

Nteyu kowo kurik kuwany Yowana yisyenyi; kumwoci piko kule, ‘Asoti akwek kule oyiku ani ŋo? Puryo kot oyiku cito nyo okeni akwek. Ntene akäs! Mite cicoto kuconi om letumwani, nye puryo koto yiku ani topon nye ayeme kot atyac porokap kweyonikyi.’
“Mpo yeya, kesenisyekap Apram oko akwek lamek cu mite yu ce soye Yiyintet, acek pikap Israel ce kiciyokoci lokoywek cutecu po kosopotet!

Omnye kipuryo kot kunket piko ce kiminye Yerusalem oko poytoyikwa kule Yesu kunye kosopintet; nto kipuryo kot kusot cek kusow oŋnkunket ŋalekap workoyik co cesumone pesyosyek tokol ye pesyetap Sapat. Ntene kuyitita kupoyit manta ŋalekap workoyik omnye kiwosontyi cek Yesu.
Nka kot kipuryo kot kunyor lelis nye kiwosontyine neto kume, ntene kusom cek Pilato kule kupakäc Yesu.
Nteyu kowo kuwany kwici Yesu ŋalek tokol ce mwowu silutekap Yiyintet ce nöme neto, kunumune murtowontet oŋnkutupci mwenet.
Ntene kuŋet Yiyintet kotutune met.
Yoto kuwany pesyosyek ce caŋ kuköse piko co kipontotikey neto kuceke Kalilaya okoy Yerusalem.
Cekto picoto yawut ce muncururwanikyi om wule mite pikap Israel,

Kunyo cemite acek yu cemwowok akwek lokoywek ce toponec kule, kokoyitita Yiyintet om wule mite lekokyi kirotyet nyo kikikurtoci mpo kukonyo, omnye kiŋet Yesu kotutune met kuyu wulo kicesilyo om kitaputap tumwonikap kakastayet nyepo oyeny kule. ‘Yiku nyi werimwani koyiku ani pesyoni Papaŋuŋ.’
Nto ŋalek cepo manta kule kiŋet Yiyintet neto kotutune met nye puryo kot komuce yec kot kunun, kucu kumwoy kule: ‘Mosokoniŋ ani nyi tililinto oko kupeyok cepo manta ce kerkey oko co kyokocini Tauti.’
Kunyo mwowu yec kupoyit manta om silutek alak kule, ‘Puryo kot muci nyi kot cömnci mutworinteŋuŋ nye tilil kunum.’
Omnye kikwiy Tauti ye kisope yisyonutek ce kimöce Yiyintet okoy kume cetupci tapanta yo kicetupci mpo kukonyo, kunyo kinun neto.
Ntene puryo kot kunun neto nyo kiŋet Yiyintet kotutune met.
Kunyo möce oŋnket akwek mpo yeya tokol ŋalek cepo manta kule, kupunune wule mite Yesu, kunyi cemwowok akwek yawut lokoywek ce cerenyekey miyotyonik.
