Möce oŋnket kule ci tokol nye yentyini neto kunyoto nye cinumune miyotyonik tokol co puryo kot komuce kunum ntarastinekap Moses.
Kunyo oripkey, mente kot kukwontyok akwek co kimwowu workoyik kule:
‘Akäs akwek nyilotik! Mosokite oŋnkopoku: Omnye yisyet nye oyiye ani om pesyemwoŋ nkit kunye kiy nye puryo kot omuci akwek kot oyen, nka kot kororwok kumwowok akwek cito ake.’ ’’
Nteye kimite Paulo oko Parnapa kumiŋntoy om kotapkok, kumwoci piko acek kule, oŋnkokwa om Sapatit nyo coni kwororwec yec topon ŋalecutecu.

Nto om letut yu kowo kupete piko tuyet nyepo kotapkok, yoto kurup Yutayek ce caŋ oko lamek ce caŋ co kicäm tinitap Yutayek Paulo oko Parnapa. Koŋololyi kiyokik picoto kotitir kumwoci kule kutosyikey kopurto swamet nyepo poypoyetap Yiyintet.
Nto om pesyetap Sapatit nye kirupe, kukwa koruruckey piko ce kirikta coŋinto cepo moŋet tokol kwokulimnta ŋolyontetap Yiyintet.
Nteye kotoköse Yutayek luketap piko, kucorok oŋnkuŋalale ŋalek ce miyotec om ŋalek ce kimwowu Paulo oŋnkucup cek neto.

Ntene kutosyikey Paulo oko Parnapa om nyikanatet kumwoy kule, “Akwek kuce piko ce kumisyini cenyosye cemwoci ŋolyontetap Yiyintet. Ntene omnye katay akwek oŋnkasot kule puryo kot kuponto latik cenyoru soponto nyemo poku, kunyo mocepakaktak acek oŋnkyipe wule mite lamek.
Omnye kikonec acek Mokoryontet ntarastini kunkolonwec kule: ‘Kwakweyiŋ ani nyi yiku lakweyetap lamek, sukuŋet sut kosopet kupunto wule kiŋete koret kumukul.’ ’’
Nteye kotolime lamek ŋalecato, kuŋerec cek koromun oŋnkukasta lokoywekap Mokoryontet. Kuyen mpecek piko co kikwey Yiyintet kule mosukunyor soponto nyemo poku.
Kutosyikey ŋolyontetap Mokoryontet om wulyo tokol om koronoto.
Ntene kowurur Yutayek kowurta piko ce kantoyik cepo moŋet oko korukap lamek ce tokunotin ce soye Yiyintet, oŋnkucec kutaŋany Paulo oko Parnapa oŋnkukwet kupete koremwa.
Yoto kulelekyi kiyokik tertitap kerenkokwa picoto oŋnkunomen kupa okoy Ikoniyom.
Kunyor konomik om Antiyok ŋerekwek ce caŋ oŋnkunyor Muyet Nyetilil.
Nteye kimite cek Ikoniyom, kupa Paulo oko Parnapa kotapkokwetap Yutayek kuyu wulo kiyunto om Antiyok nyepo Pisitiya oŋnkuŋalal ŋalek okoy kuweckey Yutayek oko Kirikik ce caŋ.
Ntene kowurur Yutayek ce puryo kot kuyen kuŋem lamek kuwec kasoteywekwa kutay mpo yeya.

Yoto kopur kiyokik wuloto kuwany pesyos ce caŋ. Kuŋalal om nyikanat ŋalek cepo Mokoryontet, nye kipor Mokoryontet nkit kule po manta lokoywekwa ce nöme poypoyenyi, omnye kikoci kiyokik swamet kwiy tukuk cepo kakitat oko pelutok.
Yoto kupciwunekey oyeny luketap piko om moŋet, kucäm alake ŋalekap Yutayek, nto alak kucäm ŋalek cepo kiyokik.
Yoto koyomokey lamek oko Yutayek oko poytoyikwa oŋnkucomncin kule citaŋany kiyokik oŋnkuwire rwontok.
Ntowo kunket kiyokik ŋalecato, kumwey kupa okoy Listira oko Terpe ce moŋösyek cewoyec cepo Likoniya oko korosyek ce lekite wuloto.
Wokumwayta cek om wuloto lokoywek ce toponec.
Kimite citake Listira nye kipok kerenkok nye kikomwal kuceke kiceyi nye mowesetoti mpo kisic.
Yoto kulimnta cicoto ŋalekap Paulo, okoy kukäs Paulo kule ponto cicoto koyenet oŋnkyimuce cisop.
Kurotot topon oŋnkupol om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Ŋet yoŋe kerenkokuk topon!’’ Kuŋet cicoto kuran kuyo oŋnkucec kuwesetot.
Nteye kotoköse luketap piko kito nye kwakiy Paulo, kupol cek om ŋelyeptap Likoniyek kumwoy kule, “Korek kukwontyec acek yiyik ce kerkey pic!’’
Yoto kutoci cek Parnapa kaynet kukure Seu, nto Paulo kutoci kaynet kukure Erme, omnye neto kunye kiŋololintet nyewo.
Yoto kuŋet tisintet nyepo Seu nye kimite kotap Yiyintenyi moŋet saŋ, kuwo wokukwer yeyik oŋnkusut sinentet okoy yepo kurketap moŋet. Kimöce neto oko luketap piko kule ceyici kiyokik korosek.
Ntowo kulim kiyokik Paulo oko Parnapa tukuk ce kimöce cekto kule kwiy, kupac co sirokwa oŋnkurway okoy kwenutap piko oŋnkupol kumwoy kule,

“Merekyo, omne sayiy akwek tukucu? Ciku acek pic ce cekerekeye akwek! Cemite acek yu cerorwok lokoywek ce toponec, ayaste akwane wule mite tukucu moponto latik oŋnkowekyikey wule mite Yiyintet nye sopot nye kitany koret torot oko ŋony, oko ruretyet, oko tukuk tokol ce mite koret.
Kikwasta Yiyintet om pesyosyek co kitil pikap koret tokol kupesetat oŋnkurup kusay kuyu wule moktoy.
Ntene kikopor okokoy tukuk ce toponec ceyiye. Omnye konok ropta nye ropene om pesyosyek ce cemokyini, oŋnkukonok omik soŋet opiyoŋe oŋnkoŋerec om mukuleywekwok.’’
Nka kot kiŋalal kiyokik ŋalecato, kipuryo kot komuc kot kukerekta piko moyici cekto korosek.
Yoto kukwane Yutayek alake Antiyok nyepo Pisitiya oko Ikoniyom; oŋnkwokuŋem piko okoy kuwekyikey wule mite cekto. Kuwire cekto Paulo rwontok oŋnkocutune moŋet kusote kule kame.
Ntowo korurukyikey konomik komut Paulo, kuŋet oŋnkuwo okoy moŋet. Ntowo kuyekune kunomen neto oko Parnapa kupa okoy kapunto Terpe.
Kumwayta Paulo oko Parnapa lokoywek ce toponec om moŋetap Terpe kuwec kuyen piko ce caŋ. Oŋnkuweckey cek kupa okoy kupunto Listira oko Ikoniyom oŋnkutosyikey kupa okoy kupunto Antiyok nyepo Pisitiya.
Kunet cekto piko co kikoyen kukwilokis mukuleywekwa oŋnkuyomis kumwoci kopurto koyenotet nyepo manta. Kumwoci kule, “Misyinec cepunte toŋoŋutek ce caŋ sukuŋet ciwut poytosisyetap Yiyintet.’’
Nto om letut kukwey poyik om oteputek tokol wule kimite pikap Yiyintet oŋnkusomnci kukir omik, oŋnkukoci kopurtokey Mokoryontet nyo kikokenekey cekto.
Nteyu kowo kupunto cek koretap Pisitiya yoto kukwa okoy kupun Pampiliya.
Kumwayte lokoywek Peruka, oŋnkupa kurekto okoy Atalia.
Kulany cekto rapet om wuloto oŋnkupa kuketitakey okoy Antiyok wulo kicesomncine kupeta poypoyetap Yiyintet om yisyet nyi kukwiy cekto koyitita.
Ntowo kupun Antiyok koruruc wanak pikap Yiyintet oŋnkumwoci wule kuyatita Yiyintet aret kuyotyi lamek kayen
Kopur cek wuloto kuwany pesyos ce caŋ kupontokey piko co kikoyen.

Yoto kukwane piko alake Yuteya okoy kupun Antiyok oŋnkwokucec kunet mpo yeya piko co kikoyen kumwoci kule, “Ye puryo kot cewonak akwek kuyu wule mwoytoy ntarastinekap Moses kupuryo kot omuci kot osopce.’’

Kutintentyin Paulo oko Parnapa tintenot nyewo koromun oko picoto okoy kupcikey ŋalekwa om ŋalek ce nöme ŋalecato. Yoto kurwoc cek okoy kucömncin kule misyini Paulo oko Parnapa oko piko alak cepo Antiyok kupa Yerusalem wokukäs kiyokik oko poyik om ŋalek ce nöme ŋalecu.

Yoto kuyokto pikap Yiyintet cek kupa, kunomen kupunte Foyinisiya oko Samariya oŋnkumwaytat om wuloto wule kuwektakey lamek kuwekyikey wule mite Yiyintet. Kukoci lokoywecoto ŋerekwek ce caŋ mpo yeya piko co kikoyen.
Ntowo kupunto cekto Yerusalem kuŋerekyi pikap Yiyintet oko kiyokik oko poyik. Yoto kumwoci cek cut ŋalek tokol ce kukukalya Yiyintet cekto kwiy.
Ntene kuyoŋ piko alake co kikoyen cepo luketap Farasayek oŋnkumwoy kule, “Roke cewon cekto oŋnkyemwoci kurip ntarastinekap Moses.’’
Yoto koruruckey wanak kiyokik oko poyik kurwoke ŋolyontonoto.

Nto om letut yu kowo kurwoc cek kuloyit, kuŋet Petero kuyo oŋnkumwoy kule, “Mpo yeyamwani, oŋnket akwek kule om pesyosyek co kutil kikweya ani Yiyintet om wule omite akwek kule saŋet omwoci lokoywek ce toponec lamek, sukuŋet cek kulim oŋnkuyen.
Yiyintet kunye nkete mukuleywekap piko kunye kwepor cömisyet om wule mite lamek kukoci Muyet Nyetilil kuyu wulo kikonec acek.
Kunyo puryo kot kupciyec Yiyintet Yutayek oko lamek. Ntene kukukalya miyotyonik ce mite mukuleywekwa omnye kweyen.
Kunyo yawut omne sasyem akwek Yiyintet kule cetorci terekok piko co kukuyen, torokocato kuco kipuryo kot komuc mpo kukonyo kot kutor oŋnkupuryo kot cimuc mpo acek nkit kot cetor?
Puryo kot kuyunyo! Ciyeni acek kule mocisopec om poypoyetap Mokoryontet Yesu kuyu wulo mocisopto cekto.’’
Kusisio piko tokol ye kimite Parnapa oko Paulo kuroru ŋalek cepo kakitat oko pelutok ce kikwiy Yiyintet kupunte wule mite cekto om wule mite lamek.
Nteyu kowo kuŋalal okoy kuwany. Kuŋalal Yakopo kumwoy kule, “Mpo yeya, olimwo ani pa!
Kotokuŋolole kuroru pantanyi Simon wule kiporunto kunyo Yiyintet cömisyenyi om wule mite Lamek, omnye kikwey om wule mite cek piko ce kokwek pikyi.
Nömntos topon ŋalecu oko ŋalekap workoyik, kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule,
‘Om letutap ŋalecu mosoketukey ani, mwowu Mokoryontet yunyoto, mosatec kotap Tauti nyo kilul; mosatec yec wule kiturpup, oŋnkoyoŋnte yec kuyo.
Sukuŋet piko alake tokol kuceny Mokoryontet, mpo Lamek tokol ce kyokur ani nkit kwek pikwani,
Yunyoto wule mwoytoy Mokoryontet, nye kipor ŋalecutecu ikye po keny.’ ’’
Kutosyikey Yakopo kumwoy kule, “Om kasoteywekwani, asoti kule puryo kot kurokenec acek citaŋany Lamek co wekyinikey wule mite Yiyintet.

Ye koto yunyo, roke cesilyi acek parwet, cemwoci kule puryo kot kuroke tokwam cekto omit alak tokol ce puryo kot kutililec ce kocesoci kupoyit kerkeyik, oŋnkuripkey kusanekey sakwayanat, oŋnkutay mokwam tyoŋik co cikete nto korotik.
Omnye kicesumane ntarastinekap Moses korikapkok okokoy ye pesyosyekap Sapat, oŋnkyemwayte ŋalekyi moŋosyek tokol.’’

Yoto kucäm kiyokik oko poyik wanak oko pikap Yiyintet tokol, kukwey piko alak om kwenumwa oŋnkuyokto kupa Antiyok kupetakey Paulo oko Parnapa. Kukwey cekto Yuta nye cekure kaynet ake Parnapa oko Sila, picoto oyeny kuce kiyweye mpo yeya cekto.
Oŋnkukoci wokukoyto parwani sumone kule. “Acek mpo yeyamwoŋ kiyokik oko poyik. Kacisupayak akwek mpo yeya cepo lamek ce minye Antiyok, oko Siriya, oko Silisiya.

Kucelim acek kule kikwa piko alake wule omite akwek cekwone wuli cemite acek, oŋnkwokuntankwarak kowurta kasoteywekwok om ŋalek ce kikwokumwowok. Kipuryo kot cikoci acek picoto kamukeywek mpo kisic ce kimuce kwiy ŋalek co kikwiy.
Kunyo kucetuye acek wanak om kirwoket oŋnkyirwoc okoy ce comncine kule ciyoku piko kukwa wulo omite akwek, kwontokey picoto oko mpo yeya cämanik Parnapa oko Paulo,
ce kikokoyito soponnwekwa om yisyetap Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo.
Kunyo kociyoku Yuta oko Sila, ce mosukwokumwowok cek nkit om kutuwakwa ŋalek cekerkey oko cu kocesil acek parwani.
Omnye kweporkey topon om swametap Muyet Nyetilil oko om wule cemite acek kule, puryo kot kurok cekonok acek akwek nyikisin ake tokol, ntene tos pate ntarastinecu ce roke orip akwek.
Monte tokyam omit ce kocesoci kerkeyik, monte tokyam korotik, monte tökyam tyony nye kaciket, oripkey asanekey sakwayanat. Mosopur akwek topon ye koripkey om wule mite ŋalecutecu tokol. Cämetapkey.’’
Yoto kuyomis cekto piko co kiciyoktoy kunomen kupa Antiyok. Ntowo kupunto Antiyok, koruruc piko tokol co kikoyen oŋnkukoci parwet.
Nteyu kowo kusuman piko parwet okoy kuwany, kunyor ŋerekwek ce caŋ om lokoywek ce kimite parwet.
Kuŋololyi Yuta oko Sila ce ki workoy, kumwoci ŋalek ce caŋ mpo yeya piko co kikoyen kule rokekey kopurto cek swamet oŋnkukwilokis.
Nteyu kowo kupeni cekto wuloto kuwany pesyos ce ŋeri, kuyomis mpo yeyamwa cek kusomnci kupeyok. Yoto kuketitakey cek kupa wule mite piko co kiyoku.
[Ntene kucäm Sila kule opur wuloto.]
Kopur Paulo oko Parnapa Antiyok kupontokey oko piko alak ce caŋ. Kunetis oŋnkumwayta ŋolyontetap Mokoryontet.

Nto om letutap orok ce ŋeri, kumwoci Paulo Parnapa kule, “Kany cipe yec cerutoci mpo yeya cemite moŋosyek tokol co kikicemwaytate ŋolyontetap Mokoryontet sukuŋet cekäs kule mite cekto kutosyinikey kulene om koyenet.’’
Kimöce yoto Parnapa kule cepetekey tokol oko Marko.
Ntene kusot Paulo kule puryo kurok kupatakey. Omnye kitoyis Marko mapetakey cekto okoy kuwany yisyet. Ntene kiweckey kuketitakey kupokokyi cek Pampiliya.
Yoto kutintentyin tukway okoy kupcikey. Kuwetokey Parnapa Marko kulany rapet nye kiweti Kupro.
Kukwey Paulo Sila oŋnkunomen kupa, kuyomis mpo yeya cek oŋnkusomnci kupeta poypoyetap Yiyintet.
Kuwo Paulo kupunte Siriya oko Silisiya kuŋololyinoti kukwil pikap Yiyintet ce kimite wuloto.
Kuwo Paulo okoy kupunto Terpe oko Listira. Kimite wuloto citake nye kikoyen nye cekure Timosewo weritap korko nye Cepyutaya nye kikoyen mpene, ntene ki Kirikin kwan.
Yoto kuŋalale mpo yeya piko co kikoyen tokol ce kimite Listira oko Ikoniyom Timosewo.
Kumac Paulo kule cepetekey Timosewo, Yoto kuwon Paulo Timosewo, omnye kinkete Yutayek tokol ce kimite wuloto kule Kirikin kwan.
Nteye kimite cek kupeti kupunte moŋosyek, kumwoci piko co kikoyen kuporci ntarastinek co kicömncin kutilta kiyokik oko poyik om Yerusalem, oŋnkumwoci kuywey oŋnkurip ntarastinek coto.
Yoto kutosyikey pikap Yiyintet kukwilokis om koyenet oŋnkutosyinikey kucoŋitu piko ce keyen pesyosyek tokol.
Kupa cek kupunte koretap Prukiya oko Kalatiya. Kipuryo kot kucömnci Muyet Nyetilil cekto kumwayte lokoywek koretap Asia.
Ntowo kupunto cek kurikta kiyotyetap Musia kusyem kule cipe okoy cepunte koretap Pisiniya, ntene kipuryo kot kucömncini Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yesu.
Yoto kunomen kupa kupunte Musia oŋnkurekto okoy Troa.
Kukäs Paulo kwomowunoto ŋoŋutyet nye kikäs citap Maketoniya kukeyo kusome neto kumwoci kule, “Co, yowu okoy Maketoniya ce kalyec acek!’’
Yoto pakenke yu kowo kukäs Paulo ŋoŋutyonoto, ceyiytekey acek kule cenomen cipe Maketoniya omnye kacinket kule kokurec Yiyintet wocemwoci pikap wuloto lokoywek ce toponec.
Cenomene acek Troa celany rapet kyay ceculakisye okoy cepunte Samosrake, ntowo kuyekune cepunte Neapoli.
Ceŋete wuloto cipe okoy cepunte Filipi nye moŋet nyewo nyepo tayta om koretap Maketoniya nye kiminye Romek. Cepeni ciwany pesyos cemite moŋonoto.
Nteye kipesyetap Sapat, cipe moŋet saŋ okoy yepo oyinet tapan wule kicisotyini kule toskoy mite otepto nye cesome. Cipur ŋony yoto oŋnkyeŋololyi koruk ce kikikorurukyikey yoto.

Akenke om korucoto nye kilime ŋalekyacek ku korko nye cekure Litiya nyepo moŋetap Siatira nye kyolyoy sirok ce mur kworornec, nye kisoye neto Yiyintet okokoy. Kuŋany Mokoryontet mukuleynyi kulimnta topon ŋalek ce kimwowu Paulo.
Yoto cepatisan neto oko pikap konyi tokol. Ntowo kupok kumwowec acek kule, “Akwa cipe wocipurune komwani ye kacämnte akwek kule koyentyi ani Mokoryontet kupoyit manta.’’ Kusaysayec acek okoy cipe.
Nto mite pesyet ake ye kicemite acek cepeti otepto cesome, yoto kutuyenec mutworinto nye tye nye kiponto oyinot, nye kiŋorsyoti nye kisutyini mokorenikyi pesanik ce caŋ om ŋorsyet.
Kunamec acek oko Paulo cepoto oŋnkupolon kumwowu kule, “Picu kuce mutworikap Yiyintet nye mite torot koromun ce mwowok akwek aret wule mocisoptok.’’

Kikwiye cepoto kuyunyitenyi kuwany pesyos ce caŋ, okoy kunyer Paulo koromun, kuwekyikey oŋnkumwoci oyinot kule, “Komwowuŋ om swametap kaynetap Yesu Kristo kule, ŋet wete neto!’’ Yoto pakenke kuŋet oyinotonoto kuwete cepoto.
Ntowo kukäs mokorenikyi kule kopot aret wule kunyortoy cekto pesanikwa ce kwenekey, kunäm Paulo oko Sila oŋnkukwer kupa matepo wule mite poytoyik.
Nteyu kowo kukwer cek okoy taytap ketik; kuŋalal kumwoy kule, “Yutayek picu, ce kosut tankwarat moŋenyacek.
Nete cek piko kapurto nye yirye ntarastinekyacek. Ciku acek Romek, kunyo puryo kot cimuci kot cenäm nto cerup kopurto nyeyunyo!’’
Yoto kuŋetyi pikap kokwet tokol kuporye cekto; kupac ketik sirokap Paulo oko cepo Sila, oŋnkumwayta cepas korokonik.
Nto om letut yu kowo cepas korokonik ce caŋ, cekerta mopusi oŋnkyemwoci sikorintet nye ripe, kurip topon mente kucilil kumwey.
Nteyu kowo cemwoci sikorintet ŋalecato, kukerta nye cekto mopusit nyepo orit oŋnkurate kerenkokwa nyororonik kuratita kereywek ce nyikisec.
Ntowo kupunto komoy kwen ye kimite Paulo oko Sila kusome oŋnkutume kukostoy Yiyintet, kumite yoto mopusinek alake cut kulimntoy.
Yoto pakenke kuriŋriŋ koret koromun kutimtim koto tokol, kuyotokis pakenke kurkotik tokol cepo mopusit, oŋnkutyokokis nyororonik ce kacerate mopusinek tokol.
Nteye kotoköse sikorintet nye ripe mopusit, ntopere akäs kayotokis kurkotikap mopusit tokol, yoto kusot kule toskoy komwey mopusinek tokol, kucut rotwenyi, nteye kimite kumöce kule aparkey nkit.
Yoto kupol Paulo om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule“Mente awurtekey! Cemite acek tokol yu!’’
Kukurto sikorintet cesut tarit oŋnkulapat kuwo orit wokoputyi yepo kerenkokap Paulo oko Sila kupotone om Muyotet.
Yoto kukwer neto cekto kukwa saŋ oŋnkutepe kule, “Merekyo, mosayiy ne ani ye sosop?’’
Kumwoci kule, “Yen cömisye oŋnkikasekey Mokoryontet Yesu mosicisopiŋ nyi wanak oko pikap kaŋuŋ.’’
Kumwoci cek neto ŋolyontetap Mokoryontet oko piko alak cepo kanyi.
Kukwer sikorintonoto cekto pesyonoto komoy oŋnkuwokusityi mwoyokwa. Yoto pakenke cepatisan sikorintonoto wanak oko pikap kanyi tokol.
Kukwer neto Paulo oko Sila kupa konyi torot oŋnkukoci omik kwam. Kuŋerec neto oko pikap kanyi koromun omnye kokuyen yoto cekto Yiyintet.
Ntowo kuyec koret, kuyokto ketik sikarekwa cewoyec kupa wule mite sikorintet nyo ripsi wokumwoci kule, “Tyakte pico kupecikey.’’
Yoto kumwoci sikorintet nye kiripsi Paulo kule, “Kokuyok ketik ŋolyontet kumwoy kule cityaktak akwek. Kunyo roke apecikey poninekwok möt topon om kalya.’’

Ntene kumwoci Paulo sikarek kule, “Kumwayta cek cepasec acek om konyekap piko tokol nye puryo kot kuwosontyec kot kunyortec lelis oŋnkurok ciku acek Romek, oŋnkukertec mopusi! Kunyi möce cekto yawut kule cityaktec acek om sisyot nye moköse ci? Puryo kot kuyunyo! Misyini kukwa cek nkit oŋnkwokutyaktec acek.’’
Yoto kupa sikarek cewoyec wokumwoci ketik ŋalecato, nteye kotolime ketik kule koko Romek Paulo oko Sila, yoto kumuyo.
Kupa ketik okoy wule mite mpo Paulo oŋnkwokurenykey, oŋnkukwererune mopusi oŋnkusom kumwoci kule apecikey aŋete moŋet.
Kunomen Paulo oko Sila kupete mopusi oŋnkupa okoy kotap Litiya, ntowo kupunto wuloto wokunyor mpo yeya co kikoyen, kumwoci ŋalek ce kwile oŋnkunomen kupecikey.
Kunomen cekto poninekwa kupunte koretap Ampipoli oko Apoloniya okoy kupunto Sesolonika wule kimite kotapkok nyepo Yutayek.
Kuyu wule kiyunto kopurtap Paulo, yoto kowut kotapkok kuwany Sapatinek somok kutintentyintos oko Yutayek kuporcini ŋalek ce kinumune wule mite silutekap Yiyintet,
ce mwowu kupor manta kule mosukutaŋany Ŋapanet, oŋnkyiŋet kotutune met. Kumwoy kupor kule, “Yesu nyitenyi omwowok ani akwek kunye Ŋapanet.’’
Yoto kayen Yutayek alake oŋnkuyomokey oko Paulo oko Sila, oko mpo luketap Kirikik ce caŋ co soye Yiyintet oko koruk ce tokunotin ce caŋ.

Ntene kucorok Yutayek oŋnkoruruc piko sokoranik ce kiwur om moŋet oŋnkupol om moŋet tokol kumukul. Yoto kupa wokuput kurketap kotap Yason kusyeme kule cenyoru Paulo oko Sila sukuŋet cekweru kukwa wule mite piko.
Ntene kipuryo kot wokunyor. Kunam Yason oko mpo yeya alak oŋnkucut kukwer wule mite poytoyikap moŋet, oŋnkupol kumwoy kule, “Kokowurta picu koret wulyo tokol! Kunyi kakwa okoy moŋenyacek?
Kunyi Yason nye kurip picu kwek toyekyi om konyi. Yiye picu tokol ŋalek ce yirye ntarastinekap Kinko Nyewo kumwowu kule mite yec kinko ake nye cekure Yesu.’’
Ntowo kulim piko oko poytoyikap moŋet ŋalecato; kunyer kupol kukwanykwanynkey.
Nto om letut yu kowo konomune cek Yason oko piko alak pesanik ce keyoŋe, kwasta kupecikey.
Ntowo kwimen kutuyit koret, kuyomis mpo yeya co kikoyen Paulo oko Sila kupa Pereya. Ntowo kupunto woloto kowut kotapkok nyepo Yutayek.
Kisiken pikap wuloto kupël piko cepo Sesolonika, omnye kilimnta cek lokoywek om ŋerekwek, oŋnkusuman kukir silutekap Yiyintet pesyosyek tokol sukuŋet kukäs kule po manta ŋalek ce kimwowu Paulo.
Yoto kuyen piko ce caŋ, oŋnkuyen mpecek Kirikik koruk ce tokunotin oko moronik ce caŋ.
Ntowo kulim Yutayek cepo Sesolonika kule kumwayte Paulo ŋolyontetap Yiyintet Pereya, yoto kukwa cek okoy wuloto oŋnkwokucec kowurur luketap piko.
Yoto pakenke lakwar, kunäm mpo yeya co kikoyen Paulo oŋnkuyomis kuwo koret nye mite ruretyet tapan. Ntene kuŋetune Sila oko Timosewo Pereya.

Kupetakey Paulo piko co kiyomise neto okoy kupunto tokol Asene. Oŋnkuketitakey cut kupa okoy Pereya. Kumwoci Paulo cek kunkolontyi kule womwoci Sila oko Timosewo kukwa kusorkey lakwar okoy kupun wule mite neto ye kemukakay.
Nteye kimite Paulo kukonye Sila oko Timosewo om Asene, yoto kunyer mukuleynyi koromun yu kowo kukäs kerkeyik ce caŋ ce kimite moŋet kumukul.
Yoto kutintentyin neto oko Yutayek oko lamek co soye Yiyintet om kotapkok, oŋnkutintentyin pesyosyek tokol oko piko ce kituytos oko neto wulo po matepo.

Kutintentyin oko mpo piko muswokik alak cepo Epikuronik oko Stoyik. Kumwoy alake kule, “Syeme mwaskeyantani menket kiy tokol kule omwowu ne?’’ Kumwoy alake kule, “Yunye syeme kule aŋalale anet ŋalekap Yiyikap korosyek alak.’’ Kimwoy cek kuyunyoto, omnye kimwoytoy Paulo ŋalek ce nöme Yesu oko kotutunetap met.
Yoto kukwer cek Paulo okoy kokwet nye kipure ye cekure Areopako, oŋnkumwoy kule, “Cemöce acek kule cinket konetisyoni lel nyi ŋolole nyi.
Omnye tokulelac nye tompo kot celim acek ŋalecu ŋolole nyi, kunyo cemöce cinket poru ne?’’
Omnye kipuryo kiy ake nye kikwiye pikap Asene oko toyek ce kiwuci kumiŋis wuloto, ntene kiŋolole oŋnkulimntoy ŋalek ce kutokutoku.
Yoto kuyoŋe Paulo taytap kokwet om Areopako oŋnkuŋalal kumwoy kule, “Pikap Asene! Kwakäsak ani akwek om tukuk tokol kule oyiku pic ce osoye Yiyik koromun.

Omnye ye kwomite owesetoti opuntote moŋemwoŋ akäs oteputek wule cepele korosek okoy onyoru otepto ake nye mite silutek ce kicesil kule, ‘Po nyi Yiyintet nye mocinket.’ Kunyo nyoto mocinket nyo osoye akwek nka kot monketi kunye Yiyintet nyoto nye omwowok ani akwek.
Yiyintet nyoto kunye kitany koret kumukul oko tukuk tokol ce mite koret, nyoto kunye Mokoryontet nye poytoy torot oko ŋony. Ntene puryo kot kuminye korik ce kitece piko yewuniyekwa,
oŋnkupuryo kot kumöce kiy ake nye koyici piko neto om yewuniyekwa kuyu nye panan. Omnye neto nkit nye kocini piko tokol soponto oko komuŋnto oko tukuk alak tokol.
Kinyosyo kunyo kutany cito akenke nye kiyi piko tokol om koret tokol kumukul. Neto nkit nye kiyoyec kenyisyek oŋnkusat kiyotonik tokol om koret wule ŋete wule minye piko.
Kikwiy kuyunyoto kule sukuŋet piko kuceny kutaptapat nto sukunyor cek neto. Ntene ŋalek cepo manta kucu kule, puryo kot kumite Yiyintet wule low om wule mite ci tokol om acek.
Omnye, ‘Cesoptosi acek, oŋnkyepesetoti, oŋnkyemite koret om kamukeywekyi.’ Kuyu wulo kimwoy mpo piko alake ŋololikap ceptyonkocok cikwakwek kule, ‘Ciku mpo acek lekokyi.’
Kunyo ye ciku lekokyi, kupuryo kot kuroke cisot kule Yiyintet ku kiy nye kerkey oko kerkeyin nye karin nye lekecece nto rwa nye kikwiy piko kupul om ŋomnon.
Kunyo kikwasta Yiyintet nye kipuryo kot kumany om pesyosyek co kitil ye kipuryo kot kunket piko. Ntene mwowu yawut kumwocini piko cepo koret tokol kuweckey oŋnkurenynkey kwasta miyotyonik.

Omnye kikwey neto pesyet nye mosukuwosontyine ci ake tokol nye mite koret tokol kumukul oŋnkumutyi musankut nyepo manta om kamukeywekap cito nyo kikwey neto nkit. Kikopor ŋalecu kupoyit manta om wule mite ci ake tokol, omnye kiŋet cicoto kotutune met.’’
Nteye kotolime piko alake kuŋolole Paulo ŋalek ce nöme kotutunetap met, kurorici cek neto. Ntene kumwoy piko alake kule, “Cemöce acek kule celim ŋolole nyi ŋalecu yec pesyet ake.’’
Yoto kunomen Paulo kuŋete kokwet
Ntene kuyen alake oŋnkuyomokey oko neto, cekto coto ku mpo Tionisio nye kikirwokintet om kokwetap Areopako, oko korko nye cekure Tamari oko piko alak.
Om letutap ŋalecato, kunomen Paulo om Asene kuwo okoy Korinso.

Wokunyor om wuloto Yutoyintet nye cekure Akwila nye kiceyici Ponto nye kitokucone Italia oko korkenyi Priskila. Omnye kikwetune Kinko Nyewo Klautiyo Yutayek tokol kuŋete Rom. Kuwo Paulo wokukäs cekto.
Oŋnkopurcin kwiyis tokol omnye kikwiyisyi Paulo yisyet nye kerkey oko nye kikwiye cekto kunope wemanik sukuŋet kunyor pesanik ce kolyekey.
Kuŋalale Paulo kotapkok pesyosyek tokol ye pesyetap Sapat kutintentyin oko cek kusyem kule acutu kuyen Yutayek oko Kirikik.
Ntowo kupun Sila oko Timosewo kukwane Maketoniya. Kwiyis Paulo pesyosyek tokol nye puryo kot kwiye yisyet ake kumwoytoy lokoywek kuporcini Yutayek kule Yesu kunye Ŋapanet.

Nteyu kowo kutay cek ŋalekap Paulo oŋnkumwoci ŋalek ce miyotec, kunäm Paulo sirokyi oŋnkulelekyi tertitap sirok oŋnkumwoci kule, “Ye kopotye akwek, kwakwek nkit ce nömok lelisto! Puryo kot ku ani. Kuceke yawut pesyoni kuwo tay, mosowo ani womwoci lokoywek lamek.’’
Yoto kunomen kupakakta cekto oŋnkuwo wokopurune kotap lomintet ake nye kisoye Yiyintet nye kicekure Tito Yusto nye kilekite kanyi kotapkok.
Kuyen Krispo nye kinyewo nyepo kotapkok kuyen Mokoryontet wanak oko pikap kanyi tokol. Kulim pikap Korinso alake ce caŋ lokoywek okoy cepatisan cekto.
Nto mite kwomowut ake, kukäs Paulo ŋoŋutyet nye kimwoci Mokoryontet neto kule, “Mente amuy, tosyikey ŋalal mente asis,
omnye opontekey ani oko nyi, puryo ci nye muce kuporyeniŋ kowurtiŋ, omnye oponte ani pikwani ce caŋ ce mite moŋoni.’’
Yoto kopur Paulo wuloto kuwany kenyit akenke oko orok lö kunete piko ŋolyontetap Yiyintet.
Ntowo cekwey Kalio kwek poytoyintetap Akaya, yoto koruruckey Yutayek oŋnkunäm Paulo kukwer kuwo kok wokuwosontyi.
Kumwoy cek kule, “Cici kunye syeme kule aŋem amas piko sukuŋet kusay Yiyintet om aret nye puryo kot kucöme ntarastinek!’’
Nteyu kikirik kucec kuŋalal Paulo. Yoto kumwoci Kalio Yutayek kule, “Nto komite lelis nye miyat nto ŋolyo nye miyat nye kociwurta nto kamuyte ani olimwok topon akwek Yutayek.
Ntene omnye mite pate tintenotet nyepo ŋalekap koyenotet oko ntarastinekwakwek, möce akäs oŋnkamut akwek nkit, omnye puryo kot oyiku ani ketintetap ŋalek ceyuco!’’
Yoto kukwet Kalio cek kupete kokwet.
Kurotyi piko tokol kunäm Sosene nyewo nyepo kotapkok oŋnkupir om taytap kokwet. Ntene om coto tokol, kusisyecikey Kalio kuyu nye mokiy nyepo lat.

Yoto kopur Paulo Korinso kuwany pesyos ce caŋ kupontokey oko mpo yeya piko co kikoyen nto pestos. Oŋnkunomen kulany rapet oko Akwila oko Priskila kupa okoy Siriya. Nteye kitompo kunomen Paulo kuwalkey om Kenseria oŋnkurwac metinyi.
Yoto kupunto Efeso wule kipokokyi neto Akwila oko Priskila, oŋnkuwo nkit okoy kotapkok oŋnkutintentyin oko Yutayek.
Kusom cek Paulo kule cipur tokol oko neto kuloyit. Ntene kutay.
Nteye kimite kunomene kumwoci kule, “Ye kacäm Yiyintet mosoweckey ani aco wule omite akwek.’’ Kunomene Efeso kulany rapet.
Ntowo kurekune Kaysariya kuwo kulaŋnta Yerusalem wokusupay pikap Yiyintet; oŋnkunomen kuwo Antiyok.
Kopur Paulo wuloto pesyos ce ŋeri nto nomene kuwo kupunte korosyekap Kalatiya oko Prukiya kuŋololyinoti kukwil piko tokol co kikoyen.
Yoto kuco okoy kupun Efeso yutoyintet ake nye cekure Apolo nye kiceyici Alekisantaria, nye kiŋolole kutok topon oŋnkusumanat nye ŋom nye kinket koromun silutekap Yiyintet.

Kikikonetkey neto konket ŋalekap aretap Mokoryontet. Yoto om ŋerekwek ce caŋ oko mukuleyto nye topon kuŋalal Apolo kunetis topon ŋalek ce nöme Mokoryontet Yesu. Ntene kinket neto pate potisonisyet nyo kinete Yowana.
Kucec kuŋalal om nyikanatet om kotapkok. Nteye kotolime Priskila oko Akwila ŋalekyi, kukwer kuwo komwa oŋnkuwo kunet kuporci topon ŋalek cepo aretap Yiyintet.

Nteyu kowo kunket mpo yeya piko co kikoyen cepo Efeso kule möce Apolo kule ayay ruretyet okoy opunte Akaya, yoto kukalya kusilyi parwet nye kosutyi mpo yeya piko co kikoyen ce kimite wuloto kumwoci kule kuŋerekyi neto. Ntowo kupunto Apolo wuloto, kwiyis topon kwek kokolyoyintet nyewo om wule mite piko co kikoyen kupunto poypoyetap Yiyintet
Omnye kitinten om swamet nyewo koromun okoy kupël Yutayek om taytap piko tokol, kuŋalal kupor kukwane silutekap Yiyintet kule, Yesu kunye Ŋapanet kupoyit manta.
Nteye kimite Apolo Korinso, yoto kuwo Paulo kupunte kwenutap koret okoy kupunto Efeso. Kunyorta wuloto konomik alak.
Yoto kutepe Paulo cekto kule, “Kyonyoru akwek Muyet Nyetilil yo kyoyeni?’’ Kuwec cut kumwoy kule, “Puryo! Tompo mpo kot celim acek kule mite Muyet Nyetilil.’’
Kutepe Paulo cek kule, “Kunyo kicepatisanak akwek patisanet oŋnkono?’’ Kuwec kumwoy kule, “Potisonisyetap Yowana.’’
Kumwoy Paulo kule, “Potisonisyetap Yowana kunye kipo piko ce renyekey kwasta miyotyonikwa; kunyo kimwoci pikap Israel kule misyini kuyen cekto neto cito nyo coni om letunyi, nyoto ku Yesu.’’
Ntowo kulim cekto ŋalecato cepatisan om kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu.
Yoto kukemer Paulo yewuniyekyi metewokwa, kunyor cekto Muyet Nyetilil; kicec kuŋalal ŋelyepik alak oŋnkumwayta lokoywekap Yiyintet.
Kipuntoy picoto ce kirice tokol taman ok oyeny.
Kuwany Paulo wuloto orok somok kuweti kotapkok oŋnkuŋololyini piko om nyikanatet. Kutintentyin oko cekto oŋnkusyem kumwoci ŋalek cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.

Ntene kutoyis piko alake kuwuryo oŋnkutay meyen oŋnkumwoy ŋalek ce miyotec kumwoci piko ce rupe aretap Yiyintet om taytap piko tokol. Yoto kuŋet Paulo kupakakta cek, kukwey oŋnkuweto piko co kikoyen oŋnkuŋololyi kunet cek pesyosyek tokol om sukulutap Turano.
Kutosyikey Paulo kwiyis kuyunyoto kuwany kenyisyek oyeny okoy kulim piko tokol ce kimite Asia ŋolyontetap Mokoryontet Yesu, Yutayek wanak oko Kirikik.
Yoto kwiy Yiyintet tukuk cepo kakitat kupël cepo kwak kupunte yewuniyekap Paulo.
Okoy cesute mpo tamparinekyi oko sirok ce kitiny porto, cesutyini piko ce mnyontos, kusopco porwonikwa oŋnkuŋetyo kupete oyik ce miyotec.

Yoto kucec Yutayek alake cepsokeyisyek ce kipesetoti sukukwetoti oyik, kusyem mpecek kukwet oyik ce miyotec om wule piko ce kiponto oyik kwiyisye kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu. Kumwoci cekto oyik kule, “Okwetok ani akwek om kaynetap Yesu nyo mwoytoy Paulo.’’
Piko ce kikwiye kuyunyoto ku werik tisap cepo Yutoyintet tisintet nyewo nye kicekure Sekewa.
Ntene kuwekyi oyik ce miyotec kumwoci kule, “Onŋket ani Yesu, oŋnkonket mpo Paulo, nto akwek ku ŋo?’’
Yoto kuran cito nyo kiponto oyik oŋnkuporye cek tokol om swama okoy kupël kukwet kumwey kupa saŋ püc nye puryo kot kupunto sirok oko mwoyok ce kanyor.
Kulim oŋnkunket ŋalecato piko tokol ce kiminye Efeso, Yutayek oko Kirikik. Kumuyo tokol koromun oŋnkukasta kuywey kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu.
Kukwa piko ce caŋ co kikoyen oŋnkwokumwoy kutor om tayta piko tokol tukuk ce miyotec ce kikwiy cekto.
Kusut mpo piko tokol ce kitepe sokeyek kitapunekwa oŋnkoruruc wanak oŋnkupele taytap piko tokol. Ntowo ciyit pesanik ce kiyeme kyale kitapunecato tokol kupunto silinkinek Elifunek konom.
Om aret nye yunyoto nyepo swama, yoto kutosyikey kuner kucäm piko ce caŋ ŋolyontetap Mokoryontet oŋnkukwilakay kupoyit swama koromun.
Nto om letut yu kowo kwiyokis ŋalecato, kusot Paulo om moyenyi kule mawo opunte Maketoniya oko Akaya, oŋnkowo okoy Yerusalem, kumwoy yoto kule, “Ye kopunte wuloto, mosowo yec mpo okoy wakäs Rom.’’
Kuyokto kokolyoykyi oyeny Timosewo oko Erasto kunyosyo kupa Maketoniya, oŋnkupeni neto kupur koretap Asia kuwany pesyos ce ŋeri.
Om pesyosyecoto ye kitoku cukurotet nyewo om Efeso om wule mite piko co rupe aretap Mokoryontet.
Kimite wuloto citake nye cekure Temetrio nye kitonye karik ce kiyuytye kotap Yiyintet korko nye cekure Artemi; nye kinyoru piko ce kikwicini neto yisyonoto pesanik ce caŋ.
Yoto kukur koruruc pikyi ce kyiyisyi oko piko alak ce kikwiye yisyet nye kerkey oko nyenyi oŋnkumwoci kule, “Merekyo, oŋnket akwek kule cenyortoy acek mokoryontinyo yisyoni,

kunyo kwakäs oŋnkolim akwek nkit ŋalek ce yiye cici cekure Paulo, nyi mwocini piko kule, Yiyik ce kerkeyik co kikwiye piko kuce puryo kot kupo manta mpo kisic. Kunyo kokomukta kot kuwec piko ce caŋ, puryo kot ku wuli po Efeso nkit pate, ntene karik kunäm koretap Asia tokol.

Kunyo mite kaŋoyenotet kule mosukuwur kamonkesyentini nyacek oŋnkunyor kaynet nye miyat. Puryo kot kuyo mpo nkit pate, ntene oko yec kule mosiciwurta kupot woyinnyi nye soye ci tokol om Asia oko koret tokol kumukul!’’
Nteye kotolime piko tokol ŋalecato, kunyer oŋnkucec kupol kumwoy kule, “Nyewo Artemi nyepo Efesoyek!’’
Kutisto polotet nyewo kunäm moŋet tokol; kurway cek oŋnkunäm Kayo oko Aristariko pikap Meketoniya ce kipontotikey oko Paulo, oŋnkukwer lakwar okoy kupunto kotap arerosyek.
Yoto kumäc Paulo nkit kule awo wule mite piko, ntene kuyete piko co kikoyen.
Kuyok ŋalek piko alake cewoyec cepo koret ce kicoronutekap Paulo kumwoci kule mente kot kuco cokuporkey om kotap arerosyek.
Yoto kupol piko om kirwoket koromun; kumwowu alake ŋalek alak, kumwowu alake ŋalek alak, omnye kikiwur kirwoket nye kipuryo kot kunkete piko ce caŋ kule ŋolyo ne nye kerurukyikey cekto.
Yoto kucämnta piko alake kule Alekisanta nyepo ŋalecu, omnye kikwer Yutayek neto kuco cokuyoŋe tay. Yoto kuwuse Alekisanta piko yewuniyekyi kule kusisio saŋalal asyem ayetkey.
Ntowo kunket piko kule Yutoyintet neto, kupol tokol om kutit akenke kuwany sawanik oyeny kupole kumwowu kule, “Nyewo Artemi nyepo Efesoyek!’’

Nto om letut komuc Koronintet nyepo moŋet kuŋololyi piko okoy kusisio. Nteyu kowo kusisio piko, kumwoy neto kule, “Pikap Efeso, ŋo cito nye puryo kot konket kule, moŋetap Efeso, kunye ripe kotap Yiyintet nyewo Artemi oko rwantet nyetilil nyo kusuwune torot.
Puryo ci nye muce kot kutintentyi tukucutecu. Kunyo misyini osisie, monte cimomnci kot oyiy kiy nye miyat.
Omnye kokweru akwek picu kukwa yu, ce puryo kot kunyapan tukun cepo kotap Yiyintenyo nto mpo kucup Yiyintenyo nye korko.
Kunyo ye ponto Temetrio oko pikyi co toŋsi ŋolyo nye ŋunye om wule mite citake tokol, mite pesyosyek co cemute musankunek oko poytoyik co mute musankunek roke wokuwosontyinekey cek wuloto.
Nteye mite ŋalek alake ce omöce akwek ce pële co, mosicirwoke ŋalek coto kokwetap pikap koret nyepo kwak.
Omnye ciŋoyeni kule muce cewosontyec acek om pararetap ŋalek ce kokwiyokis pesyoni. Puryo kot cimuce kot cikalyec acek om polotoni, kunyo moceponte ŋolyo nye cimuci cemwowu ceyetekey.’’
Nteyu kowo kuŋalal kuyunyoto okoy kuwany, kuyomis kumwoci piko kuseret kupecikey.
Nto om letut yu kowo kusisio ŋalek, kukur Paulo kutuyo wanak piko co kikoyen oŋnkuŋololyi cek ŋalek ce kwile oŋnkuyomis oŋnkunomen kuwo okoy Maketoniya.
Kuwesetote kupunte korosyecoto oŋnkumwoci cekto lokoywek ce caŋ ce kwile. Yoto kuco okoy kupun koretap Akaya,

wule kipur kuwany orok somok. Nteye kimite kuyiytoykey kule onomen ayay okoy opunte Siriya, yoto kusow konket kule kakwiyta Yutayek rurumut kule cepakäca. Kusot oŋnkuwoŋnkyi kule maweckey opunte aretap Meketoniya.
Kiwetoykey Paulo yoto picu; Sapatro weritap Piriko citap Pereya, oko Aristariko oko Sekunto pikap Sesolonika, oko Kayo citap Terpe, oko Timosewo oko Tukiko oko Trofimo pikap koretap Asia.
Kupa cek kunto tay wokukanyec acek Troa.
Nto om letutap sakwetap mukatyantet nye mokutunat, cenomene acek Filipi celany rapet, yoto cipe ciwany pesyosyek mut okoy wocenyorte cekto Troa wule kiwo cepeni ciwany wuloto pesyosyek tisap.

Nteye kipesyetap Santey kosoleny ciruruckey acek wanak oko piko co kikoyen kyomisye cepetec mukatyantet. Yoto kuŋololyi Paulo piko, ntene kutosyikey kuŋalal okoy kupunto komoy kwen, omnye kinomen kuwecinikey tun ye koyekune.
Kimite yoto tarinek ce caŋ ce kiloytos ce kimite koto nyepo parak wule kicirurukyikey acek.

Kimite oyiperyontet ake nye cekure Eutiko nye kikipure ye kipo pastit; ntowo kutosyikey Paulo kuŋalal kuloyit, kunuc neto okoy kunamnta rwonto, yoto kusuwune koto nyepo somok nye mite koto parak okoy wokupir ŋony. Wocenäme ŋony nye kame.
Kuwo Paulo kurekto lakwar oŋnkuputyi kokupuyekey kunäm oŋnkumwoy kule, “Osisie morirye, tokusopot cito!’’
Oŋnkulaŋnta Paulo kuwo koto parak oŋnkuwokupetec mukatyantet oŋnkwam. Yoto kutosyikey kuŋalal okoy kuyec koret ntonomene kuwecikey.
Kukwer cekto oyiperyontonoto kuwo ka kukosop, kuŋerec cek ŋerekwek ce caŋ koromun.
Cipe acek tay wule mite rapet, oŋnkyelany cipe okoy cepunte Aso. Omnye kicemöce kule wocilany Paulo rapet om wuloto. Kimwowec acek neto cipe kuyunyoto, omnye kiwo neto kupunte oret nyepo koret.
Ntowo kunyorcec acek neto Aso, cilany kulany rapet oŋnkyenomen cipe okoy Mitulene.
Cenomene wuloto om rapet, ntowo kuyekune cepunte koret nye tokyintos oko Kiyo. Nto pesyet nye kirupe cepunte Samo, nto pesyet nyepo somok cepunte Melito.
Omnye kicäm Paulo kule akeyitye Efeso om rapet mente kot olilennkey om Asia. Omnye kisortokey lakwar kule ye kemukakay opunte Yerusalem ye pesyetap Pentekoste.
Nteye kimite Paulo Melito kuyokto cito kuwo Efeso wokukur poyik cepo pikap Yiyintet kule kukwa kwokutuyo oko neto.
Nteyu kowo kupun picoto, kumwoci Paulo cekto ŋalek kule, “Oŋnket akwek wule yunto kapurto nyimwani om pesyosyek tokol ce kicipurcine oko akwek kuceke pesyet nyepo tayta ye kyopunu ani Asia.
Kyoyisye yisyenyu kuyu mutworintetap Mokoryontet om poypoyet oko lokik oŋnkopunte syemutok ce kikwontyo om rurumunekap Yutayek.
Oŋnket akwek kule puryo kot awuŋenak ani akwek ŋolyo ake tokol nyepo latik nye muce kukalyak, kuyu wulo kyomwowok oŋnkanatek om taytap piko tokol oko om korikwok.
Kyomwowu asowu koromun Yutayek oko lamek omwoci kule misyini kuweckey kwasta miyotyonik oŋnkuwekyikey wule mite Yiyintet oŋnkuyen Mokoryontet Yesu.
Kunyo amite yawut oweti Yerusalem omnye aywey kupoyto Muyet Nyetilil nye puryo kot oŋnketi kito nye mosukwiyakay om wule amite ani om wuloto.
Oŋnketi kule kukosowo Muyet Nyetilil om moŋosyek tokol ce kwopunte kule keno ani pate mopusi oko toŋoŋutek.

Ntene asute soponmwani kuyu kiy nye puryo kot kuponto latik om wule amite ani, saŋet ayitite yisyetap poninekwani aŋnkawany yisyet nye kikono Mokoryontet Yesu; nye omwoytoy lokoywek ce toponec cepo poypoyetap Yiyintet.
“Kyowesetote ani opunte wule amite akwek tokol, amwoytoy opuru poytoyisyetap Yiyintet. Kunyo oŋnket ani yawut kule puryo ci mpo akenke om akwek nye muce kot tokukäs ani yec.
Kunyo omwowok owolikey pesyoni kule ye kopot citake tokol om akwek kupuryo kot kunyimwani lelisto mpo kisic.
Omnye kyomwowok akwek nye puryo kot awuŋenak tukuk tokol ce kikwiyta Yiyintet.
Akäste oripkey akwek nkit oŋnkorip piko tokol co kikonok akwek Muyet Nyetilil. Oyiku mesewekap pikap Yiyintet ce kiwec neto nkit kwek ceci om korotikap Werinyi nkit.
Omnye aŋnketi kule ye konomen ani, mosukukwa wule omite akwek suyik ce koromec ce puryo kot kotuce kecirek.
Mosukupunto pesyet nye mosukuŋet piko alake om kwenumwakwek kuŋalal ŋalek cepo mwiynan kuperper kumas piko co kikoyen kurup aretap picoto.
Kunyo oripkey akäste, oŋnkasot oŋnket kule om lokik ce caŋ cepo komoy oko pet, kyanet ani asowu ci tokol om akwek kuwany kenyisyek somok.
“Kunyo mopokokyok ani kuripok Yiyintet oko poypoyetap ŋolyontenyi. Neto nye mokutecak topon kukonok kupeyok ce kerkey oko cepo pikyi tokol.
Kipuryo kot acorokyi pesya nyepo ci nto mpo sira.
Oŋnket akwek tokol kule om yewuniyekwani cutecu kuce kyoyisye tukuk ce kipoyo oko piko co kicepontekey.

Kyoporwok ani om tukuk tokol kule yisyet nyepo swama kunye aret nye roke cikalye acek piko co puryo kot kuponto swamet, cisoti ŋalekap Mokoryontet Yesu co kimwoy kule, ‘Mite ŋerekwek ce caŋ ye cepciytoy kupël ye cekoniŋ.’ ’’
Nteyu kowo kuŋalal Paulo okoy kuwany, kukutuny wanak oko cekto tokol oŋnkusom.
Ntowo kuwany; kiriryo piko tokol oŋnkunäm kumot kuŋatut Paulo kupirci cämetapkey.
Kinerekis piko yoto koromun om ŋalek ce kimwoy Paulo kule komo komuce cekto yec kukäse neto konyekwa. Yoto kupa cekto kuyomis Paulo okoy kupunto ye kimite rapet.
Nteyu kowo cisupaykey acek oko cekto, cepciykey celany acek rapet cipe ceculakisye kyay okoy cepunte Kosi, nto pesyetap oyeny cepunte Roto, nto kuceke yoto cetosyikey cipe okoy cepunte Patara.
Cenyorte wuloto rapet nye nomene kuweti Foyinisiya, celany cepete nyoto .
Cipe okoy cepunte wule cekäs Kupro om komosta tö, yoto cipe okoy cepunte Siriya, wokuyo rapet Tiro wule kiwocirekyi terekok ce kisute.
Cenyorte wuloto piko alak ce kikoyen cipur oko cekto ciwany pesyosyek tisap. Kumwoci picoto Paulo om swametap Muyet Nyetilil kule mente kuwo Yerusalem.
Nteyu kowo ciwany wuloto pesyosyek ce kicipur, cenomen poninekyo, kuyomisec piko tokol koruk oko lekok okoy cepunte moŋet saŋ, yoto cekutuny om yepo ruretyet tapan oŋnkyesom.
Ntowo ciwany, cisupaykey acek oko cekto, oŋnkyipe acek wocelany rapet, kunomen cek, kuweckey kupa ka.
Cetosyikey acek cipe poninekyo om rapet kuceke Tiro okoy cepunte Ptolemayi, wule kiwo cisupay mpo yeya; oŋnkyipur wanak oko cekto ciwany pesyet akenke.
Ntowo kuyekune, cenomen cipe okoy cepunte Kaysariya. Nteye kicemite wuloto cipe kotap Filipo mwoytoyintetap lokoywek wocipur oko neto. Neto kunye akenke om piko tisap co kicekweye Yerusalem,
Kiponto tipikyi amwan ce puryo kot cimüt ce kimwoytoy ŋolyontetap Yiyintet.
Nteyu kowo cipur wuloto ciwany pesyos ce ŋeri, yoto kucone workoyontet Yuteya nye cekure kaynenyi Akapo.

Yoto kuco okoy wule cemite acek, oŋnkunäm porowetap suwe nyepo Paulo; oŋnkurate kerenkokyi oko yewuniyekyi oŋnkumwoy kule, “Komwoy Muyet Nyetilil kule, yunyi wule mokuratita Yutayek citap porowoni po suwe om Yerusalem, oŋnkukoyito kunäm lamek.’’
Ntowo celim acek ŋalecato, cesom acek oko pikap wuloto cesaysay Paulo kule mente kuwo Yerusalem.

Ntene kuwec kumwoy kule, “Kiy ne nyi oyiye akwek, yu korirye kuyu nyi, omöce kule ceyiri mukuleymwani? Oyiku yiytat nye puryo kot ku kule cerata pate, ntene mpo womeci Yerusalem om kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu.’’
Ntowo kucis ye mocewec acek neto, kyaste pate, oŋnkyemwowu kule, “Cesome kwiyokis cepo Mokoryontet kuyu wule moktoy.’’
Nto om letut yu kowo cipur wuloto ciwany pesyos ce ŋeri, ceyiytekey acek cerat tukukyo oŋnkyenomen cipe celaŋnte Yerusalem.
Yoto cepetekey acek wanak oko konomik alak cepo Kaysariya, kukwerec acek okoy kotap Manason citap Kupro nye kikikoyen om pesyosyek ce kipo tay, nye kicepeti acek yoto kule wocipurune kanyi.
Ntowo cepunte Yerusalem, kuŋerekyec acek mpo yeya koromun.
Ntowo kuyekune cepetekey tokol oko Paulo wocekäs Yakopo. Kimite yoto poyik tokol cepo pikap Yiyintet.
Kosupay Paulo cekto oŋnkuŋalal kuporci topon ŋalek tokol ce kikwiy Yiyintet om wule mite lamek om yisyet nye kikwiy neto.

Ntowo kulim cekto ŋalekyi, kuŋerec tokol kukasta Yiyintet. Oŋnkumwoci cek Paulo kule, “Yeya muci nyi nkit käs wule yunto, kule mite mpo Yutayek pokolwokik ce caŋ ce kiweckey kuyen oŋnkukwilotin tokol om ntarastinekyo.

Kunyo kucemwoci cekto ŋalek alak ce nömiŋ nyi kule; neti nyi Yutayek tokol ce minye korosyekap lamek mwocini kule kwasta cekto ntarastinekap Moses, oŋnkimwoci kutay mawon lekokwa, oko kule kutay marup kopurtap Yutayek.
Kunyo mokyiy kulene? Omnye porukey kupoyit manta kule; mosukulim cek kule kweco nyi.
Kunyo roke yiy ŋalek ce mocemwowuŋ nyi. Mite yu piko amwanu ce kakuwalkey kawalat,

wetekey nyi picutecu oŋnkuwayiy tokol oko cekto ntasimnyet nye cipukte simnyontet oŋnkikoyite nyi pesanikwa sukurwac cekto metewokwa, sukuŋet konket piko tokol kule puryo kot kupo manta ŋalek co kuceŋololeniŋ nyi. Ntene kupor kule yiku Yutoyintet nye rupe ntarastinekap Moses.

Nto ŋalek ce nöme piko co lamek co kikoyen, kicirwoc oŋnkyesilyi cek parwet cemwoci kule, puryo kot kuroke kwam omit ce kocesoci kerkeyik oko korotik, nto tyony nye kaciket kume, oŋnkusanekay sakwayanat.’’

Yoto kukwer Paulo picoto, ntowo kuyekune kwiy neto oko picoto ntasimnyet nye cipukte simnyontet, oŋnkuwo Paulo kotap Yiyintet wokumwayta ye pekune pesyet nye cipukte simnyontet, oko pesyet nye mosukukonune neto kokotutekap ci tokol om cekto.
Nto tompo kot kupunto pesyosyek tisapu kukösyi Yutayek cepo koretap Asia kumite Paulo kotap Yiyintet orit. Yoto kowurur cekto luketap piko ce caŋ oŋnkunäm Paulo.

Kupol cek kumwoy kule, “Pikap Israel! Pikap Israel! Akalyec! Akalyec! Cito nyitenyi nyo wesotote koret tokol kumukul kunete piko tokol konetisyenyi kumwoci kule kusenkerec acek pikap Israel, oŋnkumwoci kutay ntarastinekap Moses oko koyi po Yiyintet. Kunyi kokwer mpo lamek kwokowut kotap Yiyintet kunyere koyi tilil!’’
Kimwoy cek kuyunyoto omnye kukukösyi cekto yikwe Paulo moŋet kupontotikey Trofimo citap Efeso, kusot cek kule toskoy kokwer Paulo neto kuco kotap Yiyintet orit.
Yoto kutonkworokis ŋalek om moŋet tokol kumukul, kukwa kurwoy piko tokol koruruckey oŋnkunäm Paulo kucutune kotap Yiyintet; yoto pakenke ceker kurkotikap kotap Yiyintet.
Nteye kimite luketap piko ce caŋ kusyeme kule cepakäc Paulo kume, yoto kupunto ŋalek wule mite nyewo nyepo sikarekap Romek cemwoci kule kutankwarakay Yerusalem tokol kumukul.
Kunäm nyo pakenke sikarekap Romek alak cewoyec oko sikarek oŋnkukwer kupa lakwar wule mite luketap piko. Nteye kotoköse piko neto oko sikarek kwasta nye komokupire Paulo.
Kuwo nyewo nyepo sikarek okoy ye kimite Paulo oŋnkunäm oŋnkumwayta cerate nyororonik oyeny, oŋnkutep kule, “Ŋo cici, kakwiy ne?’’
Yoto kupol piko alake om kwenutap piko kumwoy ŋalek alak, kumwowu yec alake ŋalek alak, okoy kupotyi nyewo nyepo sikarek ŋolyontet nyepo manta om polotet. Kumwayta cekwer Paulo kuwo kaytap sikarek.
Yoto cekwer Paulo okoy kupunto yepo loŋntowutokap kaytap sikarek kukonopoti sikarek neto omnye kikiwuryo piko tokol koromun.
Kimite yoto piko ce caŋ korwowu kunomu ce kipolonu kumwowu kule, “Apakäc cico kume!’’

Nteyu kirikik cekwer Paulo kowut kaytap sikarek orit kukopunto yepo kurket, yoto kuŋololyi Paulo nyewo nyepo sikarek kumwoci kule, “Omuci ani pa omwowuŋ nyi ŋolyo?’’ Kutepe nyewo sikarek neto kule, “Ŋololi nyi so ŋelyeptap Kirikik?
Puryo kot kwinyi ne cico po Misiri nyo kicece weywekatet om pesyosyek co kutil kuntoci piko Romek Elifunek amwan ce ponto karikap poryet kupa kitela.’’
Kuwekyi Paulo kumwoci neto kule, “Oyiku ani Yutoyintet sikwo nye kiceyico moŋetap Taruso om Silisiya, citap moŋet nye tokunot, osomiŋ kule cömwo oŋololyi piko.’’
Kucömnci nyewo Paulo kuŋalal. Yoto kuyo Paulo oŋnkuwuse yewuniyekyi piko, nteyu kowo kusisio kuŋololyi om ŋelyeptap Puraniyek.
Kuŋalal Paulo kumwoy kule, “Merekyo mpo yeya, oko mpo Papa, olimwo ani pa aŋalal ayetkey om taymwakwek!’’
Ntowo kulim kule koŋololyine neto cekto ŋelyeptap Puraniyek, yoto kusisio. Kutosyikey Paulo kumwoy kule,

“Oyiku Yutoyintet sikwo nye kiceyico Taruso om Silisiya, ntene kyanere moŋonitenyi, Kamaliel kunye kineto. Kunyo kicineta topon koromun wule yunto ntarastinekap mpo kukonyo. Kyoyiku ani nyikan pesyosyek tokol om yisyonutekap Yiyintet kuyu wule ayunte akwek piko tokol cu omite yo pesyoni.
Kyotoŋonyi ani oŋnkyopoköci piko ce kirupe aret nyitenyi; kyonöme koruk oko moronik oŋnkakerte tokol mopusi.

Muce tisintet nyewo oko kokwet tokol kunket kule po manta ŋalecutecu omwowu ani. Kikono cekto poronok ce kicesilyi Yutayek mpo yeya ce kiminye Tamasko. Yoto onomen awo wuloto kule wanäm picutecu oŋnkarate nyororonik oŋnkokweru kukwa Yerusalem sukwocitaŋany.’’
“Nteye kyomite oweti om aran karikte apunte Tamasko ye kipet kwen, yoto kucone lakweyet parak lakwar kuyu kaweket oŋnkomutwo ani.
Oputyi ŋony; oŋnkalim kutit nye mwowo kule, ‘Saulo! Saulo! Omne seteŋonyo ani nyi?’
Owekyi atepe kule, ‘Mokoryontet, nyi ku ŋo?’ Kumwowo kule, ‘Ani nyo Yesu nyepo Nasaret nyo toŋonyi nyi.’
Yoto kukäs piko ce kicepontekey lakweyet ntene kipuryo kot kulim kutit nye kiŋololwo ani.
Atepe ani kule, ‘Mokoryontet mosayiy ne ani?’ Kumwowo Mokoryontet kule, ‘Ŋete ŋoŋy; oŋnkiwo okoy Tamasko, mosuwocemwowuŋ om wuloto yisyonutek tokol ce kikwiytowuŋ Yiyintet kule yiy.’
Yoto omnye kikikokora lakweyet, kunäma piko ce kicepontekey yewut oŋnkuretoto okoy Tamasko.
“Kimite Tamasko citake nye cekure Ananiya, cito nye kipo tini nye kirupe ntarastinekyo nye kiyweye kucömntoy Yutayek tokol ce kiminye wuloto.
Kuco yoto okoy wule amite oŋnkucokuyoŋe yepo komosmwani, oŋnkumwoy kule, ‘Yeya Saulo, käste yec.’ Yoto pakenke akäste ani akäs neto.
Kumwoy kule, ‘Yiyintetap mpo kukonyo nye kukweyiŋ seŋet nket cömisyenyi oŋnkikäs Mutworintenyi nyepo manta; oŋnkilim neto kuŋololuŋ om kutinyi.
Omnye meseyeku muncururwenyi nye mesemwoci pikap koret tokol ŋalek ce kekäs oŋnkilim nyi.
Kunyo konye ne yawut? Ŋet yony lakwar kur kaynetap Mokoryontet oŋnkikany cepatisaniŋ cipukto miyotyonikuk.’
“Aweckey ani aco Yerusalem, nteye kyomite osome om kotap Yiyintet, yoto akäs ŋoŋutyet,
nye kyakäs Mokoryontet nye kimwowo kule, ‘Sorci lakwar, nomen wete Yerusalem, omnye puryo kot komuce piko kot kuyen ŋalekwani ce mwowu nyi.’
Owekyi omwoci kule, ‘Mokoryontet nkete cek tokol topon kule kyoweti ani korikapkok oŋnkanäm oŋnkopir piko tokol ce yeniŋ nyi.
Nto mpo pesyet nyo kicepoköce Stefano muncururweŋuŋ, kyomite ani yoto aŋnkacäm wule kicepakakta kume, oŋnkorip sirokap piko co kiporisyi.’
Yoto kumwowo Mokoryontet kule, ‘Iwo, omnye mosoyoktiŋ ani iwo wule mite lamek.’ ’’
Kusisio piko kulimnta ŋalekap Paulo okoy kumwoy ŋalecato, yoto kucec kupol koromun kumwoy kule, “Anate cico kuwete koret! Apakäc kume! Omnye puryo kot kurok kusop!’’
Kupol cek koromun kuwuse sirokwa oŋnkuswortoy teŋek kupa parak.
Kumwoci nyewo nyepo sikarek pikyi kukwer Paulo kuwo kaytap sikarek orit, oŋnkumwoci sikarek kupas neto sukuŋet kutok omne sukupol Yutayek kutay neto kuyunyi.

Ntene yu kowo cerat kule cepas, kumwoci Paulo nyewo ake nyepo sikarek nye kimite keyoŋe yoto kule, “Cömwok akwek ntarastinek kule apas cito nye kikwek Romin ye tompo kot cewosontyi om lelis nye kukwiy?’’
Nteye kotolime nyewo nyoto ŋalecato, kuwo wule mite nyewo oŋnkutepe kumwoci kule, “Möce nyi kule ayiy ne? Omnye Romin cici!’’
Yoto kuwo nyewo wule mite Paulo oŋnkutepe kule, “Mwowo ani, yiku nyi Romin!’’ Kuwec Paulo kumwoy kule, “Oyiku.’’
Kumwoy nyewo kule, “Kyanyoru ani soyiku Romin omnye kyayale pesan ce caŋ.’’ Ntene kuwekyi Paulo kumwoci neto kule, “Ntene kiceyito ani.’’
Yoto pakenke kunata piko ce komöce kule cepas Paulo. Ntene kumuy nyewo nyepo sikarek yu kowo kulim kule Romin Paulo, kunyi kakacerate neto nyororonik.

Ntowo kuyec koret, kumac nyewo nyepo sikarek kule oŋnket ŋalek cepo manta, ŋolyo ne nye wosontyini Yutayek Paulo. Yoto kukur kumwoci tisik cewoyec oko kokwet tokol kutuyo, oŋnkukwer Paulo cokuyoŋe taymwacek.
Kurotot Paulo topon piko ce kimite kokwet, oŋnkuŋalal kule, “Merekyo mpo yeya, kyopur ani nye topon koromun om mukuleymwani oko soponmwani om taytap Yiyintet kuceke keny okoy yawut pesyoni.’’
Yoto pakenke kumwoci tisintet nyewo Ananiya piko ce kimite ye kilekite Paulo kusyec neto kwarmatut.
Kumwoci Paulo neto kule, “Mosukusyeciŋ Yiyintet nyi totet nyi kiciyil kulelit! Mite nyi kepur yo wosontyo kuyu wule yunto ntarastinek, kunyi mite yec yirye ntarastinek mwocini piko kusyeca ani!’’
Kumwoci piko ce kimite keyoŋe ye kilekite Paulo kule. “Kecup tisintet nyewo nyepo Yiyintet!’’
Kuwec Paulo kumwoy kule, “Mpo yeya, kopuryo kot oŋnket kule neto ku tisintet nyewo, omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, ‘Mente kot omwoci ŋalek ce miyotet poytoyintetap pikuk.’ ’’

Ntowo konket Paulo kule piko ce kimite kokwet alak ku Satusayek nto alak ku Farasayek, yoto kuŋalal kukurto om kutit nyewo kumwoy kule, “Merekyo mpo yeya! Oyiku ani Farasoyintet nye weritap Farasoyintet, kunyo amite ani cewosontyo om yu omnye acöme kokenotet kule mosukotutune met piko co kipok.’’
Yoto pakenke yu kowo kumwoy Paulo ŋalecato, kucec kowokut kutintentyin Farasayek oko Satusayek okoy kupciykey piko ce kimite kokwet.
Omnye kimwowu Satusayek kule puryo kot komuce kot kotutune met piko co kipok, oŋnkumwoy yec kule puryo kot kimite malaykanik nto oyik. Ntene kucöme Farasayek kule mite tukucutecu tokol ku somok.

Yoto kuŋetŋet kuwoyit polotet okoy kuyoŋ konetikap ntarastinek cepo luketap Farasayek oŋnkutinton kumwoy kutor kule, “Puryo kot cekösyi acek cici lelis nye miyat, pesyet ake nto kuŋololyi muyet ake nto malayket neto.’’

Yoto kutosyikey tintenotet oko wokutyet okoy kumuy nyewo nyepo sikarek kule muce cekto kusor Paulo kusacasac. Kumwoci sikarek kupa kwenutap piko oŋnkocut Paulo om swama kucone wule mite cek oŋnkukwer kuwo kaytap sikarek orit.
Nto om kwomowunoto, kuyoŋe malayketap Mokoryontet komostap Paulo, oŋnkumwoci kule. “Titir! Kuyu wulo keporu nyi mwowu ŋalekwani om yuteyu po Yerusalem kunyo meseyiy mpo kuyunyoto om Rom.’’
Ntowo kuyec koret, koruruckey kutuyo wanak Yutayek oŋnkurwoc kuyiyta rurumut. Kuwalkey cek kumwoy kule, puryo kot kwomisyi nto kuyesyo kiy ake tokol okoy ye kacepakäc Paulo.
Kipuntoy ce keyitye artam piko tokol ce kikiyiytakey kule ceporisye.
Kupa cek wule mite tisik cewoyec oko poyik oŋnkumwoci kule, “Kaciwalkey acek tokol koromun kule, puryo kot cecemcemi kiy tokol okoy ye kacepakäc Paulo.

Kunyo oyokte akwek oko kokwet yawut ŋolyontet kuwo wule mite nyewo nyepo sikarekap Romek, sukuŋet kukwer Paulo kuco wule omite akwek, ayiytekey kuyu nye omöce kule cinket ŋalek cepo manta cepo musankunyi. Mosiceyiytekey acek om aran oŋnkyepakäc neto kutompo kot kupun wuloto.’’
Yoto kulim weritap cekwametitap Paulo ŋalek cepo rurumunoto. Kunomen nyo kuwo okoy kupunto kaytap sikarek orit oŋnkuwokumwoci Paulo.
Kukur Paulo sikorintet akenke nyewo oŋnkumwoci kule, “Kwer pa nyi oyiperyontoni kuwo okoy wule mite nyewo nyepo sikarek, omnye ponto ŋolyontet nye möce kule amwoci neto.’’

Kukwer sikorintonoto oyiperyontonoto okoy kupunto wule mite nyewo nyepo sikarek oŋnkumwoci kule, “Kokuro mopusyontet Paulo oŋnkusomo kule akweru oyiperyontoni kuco wule mite nyi, omnye ponto ŋolyontet nye möce kumwowuŋ.’’
Yoto kunäm nyewo nyepo sikarek oyiperyontonoto yewut oŋnkukwer kuwo tapan, oŋnkutepe möt kule, “Ponte nyi ŋolyo ne nye möce kule amwowo ani.’’
Kumwoci kule “Kukurwoc oŋnkucömncin Yutayek kule cesomiŋ nyi pesyetap tun, seŋet kweru Paulo kuco kokwet kuyu nye möce kokwet kule cinket ŋalek cepo manta cepo musankunyi.

Ntene mente kot ocömnci, omnye mite piko ce keytye artam ce mosukuyiytakey kurip kule cenäm neto. Omnye kukuwalkey picoto tokol kumwoy kule puryo kot kwome cek omit nto kuyesyo okoy ye kapakäc neto. Mite yawut kuyiytoykey kunyo konye pate ŋalek ce memwowu nyi.’’
Kumwoci nyewo nyepo sikarek oyiperyontonoto kule, “Mente kot omwoci citake kule kemwowo ani ŋalecu.’’ Oŋnkumwoci oyiperyontonoto kuwecikey.

Yoto kukur nyewo nyepo sikarek alak cewoyec oyeny, oŋnkumwoci kule, “Akwey sikarek pokolwokik oyeny kupa Kaysariya, wanak oko sikarek cepo Farasinek tomonwokik tisap, oko cepo ŋotwek pokolwokik oyeny; aŋnkayiytekey kunomen pesyoni ye mite sawet somok nyepo komoy.
Okoci Paulo Farasinek ce kowete, oŋnkokwer topon okoy kupunto wule mite poytoyintet Filekis.’’
Yoto kusil nyewo nyepo sikarek parwet nye kisil kule.
“Ani nyo Klautiyo Lusia. Osupoyiŋ nyi poytoyintet nye Cekonyite Filekis.
Kunam Yutayek cici okoy kurik kupakäc cekto neto. Yoto awo ani oko sikarek okoy wosoru onumune cek, omnye kyonyoru oŋnket kule kikwek neto Romin.
Nteye kyomöce ani kule oŋnket lelisto nye wosontyini cekto neto, yoto okwer kuwo kokwemwacek.
Ntene anyoru kule puryo lelis nye miyat nye kikwiy nye roke cepakäce nto mpo cerotyi mopusi. Ŋalek ce wosontyini cek neto kuce nömekey oko tintenotetap ntarastinekwa pate.

Nto om letut cemwowo kule kakwiyta Yutayek rurumut kule cepakäc neto. Acäm ani kule okweru kuco wule mite nyi, oŋnkomwoci piko co wosontyini neto kukwa kwokumwoy om tayŋuŋyi ŋalek ce wosontyini cek neto.’’
Yoto kunäm sikarek Paulo oŋnkukwer kuyu wulo kacemwoci, kukwer cek neto kwomowunoto okoy kupunto Antipatri.
Ntowo kuyec koret, kuweckey sikarek cepo kerenkok kuketkey kukwa kaytap sikarek, oŋnkupakakta sikarek cepo Farasinek kukwer Paulo.
Yoto kukwer cek neto okoy kupunto Kaysariya, oŋnkukoci parwet poytoyintet oŋnkuporci Paulo.
Kusuman poytoyintet parwet oŋnkutepe Paulo kule cepoytowuneniŋ kureryantet oŋnkono. Nteyu kowo kunket kule cone Silisiya,
kumwoy kule, “Mosolimuŋ ani ŋalekuk ye kakwa piko co wosontyini nyi okoy kupun yu.’’ Yoto kumwayta ceripune Paulo kaytap Erote.

Nto om letutap pesyosyek mut, kurekto Ananiya Tisintet nyewo kuwo Kaysariya wanak oko poyik alak oko Puritet nyepo ntarastinek nye cekure kaynenyi Tertulo. Koyoŋe cek taytap poytoyintet Filekis oŋnkumwoci ŋalek ce wosontyini Paulo.

Yoto cekur Tertulo kuco. Kuyat nyo musankut kuŋalal kuwosontyi Paulo kumwoy kule, “Mokoryontet Filekis nye cekonyite! Om ŋomnonetap Poytoyisyeŋuŋ kunye kukonec acek kalyet kuwany kenyisyek ce caŋ, kunyo mite ce weywece tukuk ce roko kyiy om toponiyetap korenyacek.
Ceŋerekyini acek ŋalecutecu tokol okokoy om wulyo tokol oko om pesyosyek tokol, oŋnkyikostiŋ acek nyi koromun.
Puryo kot amöce kule awaŋeniŋ poroyinŋuŋ, kunyi osomiŋ om toponiyeŋuŋ kule limwec acek ŋalekyacek cu ŋeri.
Kucinket acek oŋnkyenyoru kule miyat cici koromun, neto nye wurure kutoytoy Yutayek om koret tokol, neto yec kunye kantoyintetap luketap citap Nasaret.
Cenäm acek neto, ceyiytekey kule cewosontyi kuyu wule yunto ntarastinekyo,
ntene kuconto pararet Lusia nyewo nyepo sikarek oŋnkuco kunumenenec acek oko om swama.
Yoto kumwoy Lusia kule roko kukwa piko co wosontyini neto wule mite nyi. Ye kekir nyi tepe cicitenyi, mesenket nkit kukwane wule mite neto ŋalek tokol cu cewosontyini acek.’’
Kuwasan Yutayek tokol kumwoy kule po manta ŋalekyoto tokol.

Yoto kuwus Poytoyintet kumwoci Paulo kuŋalal. Kucec Paulo kuŋalal kumwoy kule. “Oŋnket ani kule kweyiku nyi ketintetap pikap koroni kuwany kenyisyek ce caŋ, kunyo oŋololi ani ŋalekwani oyetekey nye puryo kot oponte muyot.
Omnye muci nyi nkit nket ŋalek cepo manta kule tompo kot kukeytya pesyosyek tamanu ok oyeny kuceke ye kyalaŋnte ani awo Yerusalem wasay.
Kipuryo kot kunyorwo Yutayek otitentyintosi oko citake tokol om kotap Yiyintet, nto kunyorwo mpo owururi piko om korikapkok, nto mpo om wulyo ake tokol om moŋet.
Kunyo puryo kot komuce cekto kot kumwowuŋ nyi mpo yawut pesyoni ŋalek cepo manta ce wosontyo ani cekto.

Ntene ocöme ani om konyekukyi kule osoye ani Yiyintetap mpo kukonyo omnye arupe aret nyelel nyo mwowu cek kule puryo kot kupo manta. Ntene oŋnkoyen ŋalek tokol ce silotin om ntarastinekap Moses oko ŋalek cepo kitapunekap workoyik.
Oponte mpo ani kokenotet om wule mite Yiyintet nye kerkey oko nyo cöme cek picutecu wosontyo ani, kule mosukotutune met piko tokol co kipok ce toponec oko ce miyotec.
Kunyo osyeme ani oyiyisye pesyosyek tokol kuyu wule yunto cekto; kule opurte moyet nye topon om wule mite Yiyintet oko wule mite piko tokol.
“Ntene om letut yu kowo awany kenyisyek ce caŋ nye kimomite Yerusalem, yoto awo ani osutyi pikap korenyu pesanik ce kikolye oŋnkokoyte korosek co cikoytoy.

Nteye kyomite oyiye ŋalecutecu kuye kinyorwo ani cekto amite kotap Yiyintet orit om letut yu kowowawany ayiy ntasimnyet nyo cipukte simnyontet. Kipuryo kot opontekey yoto piko ce caŋ, kipuryo mpo kot kumite yoto cukurotet.
Ntene kimite yoto Yutayek ce kikwone koretap poytoyisyetap Asia. Cekto picoto kuce keroke kumite yawut yuteyu po tayŋuŋyi kuwosontyo ani ye ponteno ŋolyo ake tokol.
Kunyo yaste kuŋalal kumwoy piko cu mite yu yawut lelis ne nye kinyorta cekto yo kyoyoŋe kokwet,
tos pate ŋolyontoni akenke nye kyokurte omwowu yo kyoyoŋe taymwacek kule, ‘Amite ani yu pesyoni, cewosontyo omnye ayeni kule mosukotutune met piko co kipok.’ ’’
Yoto kuker Filekis kokwet omnye kinkete ŋalekap piko co kikoyen, aŋnkumwoci cek kule, “Mosamüt musankumwoŋ ye kaco Lusia nyewo nyepo sikarek.’’
Kumwoci Filekis sikorintet nyewo kule ceripune Paulo mopusi, ntene kumwayta cikoci poroyinto nye yeme nye puryo kot cekerektoy coronutekyi makwa kwokwici neto tukuk ce möce.
Om letutap pesyos ce ŋeri, kuco Filekis oko korkenyi Trusila nye ki ceptap Yutayek. Yoto kumwayta cekwer Paulo kuco cokumwoci cek ŋalek ce nöme koyenet om Kristo Yesu.

Ntene yu kowo kutosyikey Paulo kuŋalale ŋalek cepo manta ce nöme toponiyet oko ripetapkey oko ŋalek cepo pesyetap musankut nye mosukuco, yoto kumuy Filekis oŋnkumwoy kule, “Kayem co pesyoni, wekany mosokuriŋ ani pesyet ake ye oponte poroyinto.’’
Kisote Filekis om aret ake kule muce kukono Paulo pesanik ce kalena. Kuyuyit nyoto kukure neto Paulo om pesyosyek alak oŋnkwokuŋalal tukway.
Ntowo kutil kenyisyek oyeny, kunam Porika Festo poytoyisyet kuker Filekis. Yoto kumac Filekis kule kucäma Yutayek, kupakakta Paulo kuratat om mopusi.
Nteyu kowo kuwany Festo pesyosyek somok kuceke kopun koret nye kipoytoy, yoto kunomene Kaysariya kulaŋnta kuwo Yerusalem.
Nteye kimite wuloto, kuwasan tisik cewoyec oko kantoyikap Yutayek kuwosontyi Paulo. Kusom cek Festo kule kucäm kukwer Paulo kuco Yerusalem.
Omnye kikwiy rurumut kule cenäm neto kuconi om aran oŋnkyepakäc.
Kuwekyi Festo kumwoci cekto kule, “Ceripune Paulo mopusi om Kaysariya, kunyo mosonomen aweckey ani lakwar awo kaysariya;
roke akwey akwek kantoyikwok cepetekey sukuŋet wokuwosontyi ye kukwiy lelis nye miyat.’’

Kopur Festo wanak oko cekto kuwany pesyosyek sisit nto taman, oŋnkunomen kurekto kuwo Kaysariya. Ntowo kuyec koret, kopure neto ŋeceretap kokwet nye cemute musankunek oŋnkumwayta cekwer Paulo kuco kokwet.
Nteyu kowo kuco Paulo; kuyoŋ Yutayek ce kikwone Yerusalem komut neto, oŋnkucec kuwosontyi kumwoy ŋalek ce caŋ ce nyikisec ce kipuryo kot komuce mpecek nkit kot kupor kule po manta ŋalecato.
Ntene kuŋalal Paulo kuyetkey kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot ayiy ani lelis nye miyat nye yirye ntarastinekap Yutayek nto mpo nye nöme kotap Yiyintet, nto mpo kule kyawurte om wule mite Kinko Nyewo.’’
Ntene omnye kimöce Festo kule kucäm Yutayek, yoto kutepe neto Paulo kumwoci kule. “Möce kule awo Yerusalem wocewosontyineniŋ wuloto om taymwani?’’

Kumwoy Paulo kule, “Amite ani yu kukoyoŋe taytap ŋeceretap kokwetap Kinko Nyewo nye cemute musankunek, wule roke cewosontyineno, kunyo puryo kot ayiy lelis nye miyat om wule mite Yutayek kuyu wulo kenket nyi nkit topon.

Ye kyoyiri ntarastinek, nto ye kyayiy lelis nye roke cepakäca, kupuryo kot osome kule osop. Ntene ye puryo kot kumite lelis nyepo manta nye wosontyo cekto, kupuryo ci nye muce kot kukoyito awo wule mite cekto. Kunyo ocururoni kule kuwo musankut wule mite Kinko Nyewo.’’
Yoto kulolyin Festo oko kirwokikyi cepo kokwet, ntowo kuwany; kuwekyi kumwoci Paulo kule, “Kesom nyi kule awo wule mite Kinko Nyewo, kunyo mosukutastakey musankuŋuŋ kuwo wule mite Kinko Nyewo.’’
Nto om letutap pesyos ce ŋeri; kukwa okoy kupun kaysariya Kinko Akripa oko Pernike kurutoci kwokusupay Festo.
Nteyu kowo kopur cek pesyos ce ŋeri, kumwoci Festo Kinko Akripa musankutap Paulo kule, “Mite citake yuteyu nye kipokokyi Filekis mopusi;
nteye kyomite ani Yerusalem kuŋalal kuwosontyi tisik cewoyec oko poyikap Yutayek kusomo kule omutyi neto musankut kulot.
Ntene omwoci ani cek kule, puryo kot kukopurtap Romek kukoyito ci tokol nye cewosontyini kutompo kot kuwosontyin oko piko co wosontyini neto; oŋnkukoci poroyinto kuŋalal kuyetkey om konyekwa.
Ntowo kukwa cek okoy kupun yuteyu, yoto monolilennkey ani awany mpo pesyo, nteye kipesyet nye koyekune opure ŋeceretap kokwet nye cemute musankunek aŋnkamwayte cekwer neto kuco kokwet.
Yoto kuyoŋ piko co kiwosontyini, ntene kipuryo kot kumwoy kupor lelis nye miyat nye kikwiy cici kuyu wule kyosotitoy ani kule mosukumwoy.
Ŋalek tokol ce kimwoy cek pate kuce po tintenotet nye ponto cek oko neto ce nöme ŋalekap tinimwa oko cepo citake nye kime nye cekure Yesu nye mwowu Paulo kule sope.
Yoto kupotwo ani wule manyorte ŋalek cepo manta om ŋalecu. Atepe Paulo ye möce kule awo Yerusalem wocewosontyine wuloto musankunyi.
Ntene kutasta kucururan Paulo musankut, oŋnkusom cerip okoy kumüt Kinko Nyewo musankunyi. Yoto amwayte cerip neto okoy okoyite kuwo wule mite Kinko Nyewo.’’
Kumwoci Akripa Festo kule, “Amöce mpo ani kule alim ŋalekap cicitenyi.’’ Kumwoy Festo kule, “Meselim ŋalekyi tun.’’

Ntowo kuyec koret kukwa kotap kokwet Akripa oko Pernike om woyinto oko koyweyisyet, kupontonukey cewoyec cepo sikarekap poryet oko kantoyik cewoyec cepo moŋet. Yoto kumwayta Festo cekwer Paulo kuco kokwet.

Kuŋalal Festo kumwoy kule, “Kinko Akripa, oko akwek piko tokol cu cepontekey: Akäs pa akwek cici, nye kiwosontyi Yutayek tokol om wule amite ani om Yerusalem oko yuteyu ce mite. Kipol kumwoy kule puryo kot kuroke tokusop mpo kisic.

Ntene puryo kot anyoru ani aŋnket kule kikwiy lelis nye miyat nye roke cepakäce. Ntene omnye kitasta kucururan musankut nkit kuwo wule mite Kinko Nyewo, acäm ani kule okoyite kuwo wule mite Kinko Nyewo.

Ntene puryo kot oponte ani ŋolyontet nyepo manta nye mosilyi Kinko Nyewo. Kunyo kokweru kuco yu po taymwakwek, ntene kupëlis om tayŋuŋyi Kinko Akripa! Sukuŋet ye kacenay acek okoy cenyoru ŋalek cepo manta cepo musankunyi, anyoru mpo ani ŋolyontet nye mosil.
Omnye porukey om wule amite ani kule puryo kot ku ŋolyo nyepo ŋomnon akoyite ani mopusyo kupuryo kot kopunto ŋalek cepo manta cepo musankut nye cewosontyini.’’
Kumwoci Akripa Paulo kule, “Kacecömuŋ ŋalal ŋalekuk yetkey.’’ Yoto koyito Paulo yewunyi oŋnkuŋalal kuyetkey kumwoy kule:
“Kinko Akripa! Kakäs kule oponte ani kupeyoy pesyoni aŋalal ŋalek ce oyetekey om tayŋuŋyi om ŋalek tokol ce wosontyo ani Yutayek.
Omnye nketi nyi nkit topon koromun kopurwek tokol oko ŋalekap tintenotetap Yutayek. Kunyo osomiŋ kule muytoci oŋnkilimwo ŋalek topon.
“Nkete cek Yutayek tokol wule kyopurtoy ani kuceke oyiku lekwa. Nkete kule kyopurune ani om soponmwani tokol wuli po korenyacek oko Yerusalem.
Kikonket kuloyit ye möce kule citoru, kule oyiku ani Farasoyintet nyepo luketap piko cepo tininyo nye ceripekey koromun.
Kunyo amite ani koyoŋe yu pesyoni cewosontyo omnye okonye kokenotet nye kikurtoci Yiyintet mpo kukonyo.

Kurtoyet nyoto kunye mite kukonye kule mosicenyoru orustunwek co taman ok oyeny cepo pikyacek ye mite cekto kusoye Yiyintet komoy oko pet, ntene omwowuŋ ani nyi kinko nye cekonyite kule om kokenisyoni kunye cewosontyineno ani Yutayek.
Kinko! Omne sukuwuyityok akwek Yutayek ye moyen kule muce Yiyintet koŋet kotutune met piko ce kipok?
“Ani nkit nye kyosyeme koromun ikye kule yisyemwani ayiy kiy ake tokol nye amuci okoy opot kaynetap Yesu nyepo Nasaret.

Kyayiy kuyunyoto om Yerusalem. Ani mpo nye kyorotyini mopusi pikap Yiyintet ce tililec ce caŋ om kamukeywek ce kikonu tisik cewoyec. Nteye kicemutyini cekto musankut kule cepakäc, kyocöme ani oporci kirot kule cepakäc.
Kyotoŋonyi okokoy om korikapkok tokol, osyeme kule sukuŋet kutay cek koyenemwa. Onyerci cek koromun okoy onomen awo mpo okoy apunte moŋosyekap lamek wanäm aŋnkataŋany cekto.
“Yoto om ŋolyontonitenyi, onomen ani awo Tamasko oponte kamukeywek oko woyinto nye kikono tisik cewoyec.

Komwowuŋ ani Kinko nye cekonyite kule, nteye kyomite yoto oweti om aran ye kimite asista pet kwen, yoto akäs ani lakweyet nye kicone parak nye kiluw kupël lakweyetap asista oŋnkukweny komutwo ani oko piko ce kicepontekey.
Ciputyi acek tokol ŋony, yoto alim ani kutit nye kiŋalal kumwowo om ŋelyeptap Puraniyek kule, ‘Saulo! Saulo! Omne setaŋanya ani nyi? Korom koromun ye meyamnkey kosur.’
Yoto atepe ani kule, ‘Mokoryontet, nyi ŋo?’ Kumwowo Mokoryontet kule, ‘Ani nyo Yesu nyo toŋonyi nyi.

Ntene ŋete ŋony, omnye koporunkey ani saŋet akweyiŋ yiku kiyokintet oko muncururwemwani nye meseporci piko alak ŋalek ce kekäs nyi pesyoni om wule amite ani, oko ŋalek ce mosoporuŋ ani nyi om pesyosyek ce mite tay.
Mososoruŋ ani nyi om wule mite pikap Israel oko wule mite lamek; wuloto ku wule mosoyoktiŋ ani,

siweŋany konyekwa oŋnkiwec kukwane menonet sukunyor lakweyet; oŋnkukwane wule mite swametap poytoyisyetap oyinot, oŋnkuwekyikey wule mite Yiyintet, sukuŋet kunyor koyenet kupunte wule amite ani oŋnkyikalya cekto miyotyonikwa, oŋnkunyor otepto om wule mite pikap Yiyintet ce kweyotin.’ ’’
“Kunyo Kinko Akripa, kipuryo kot amuci ani atay molimnci ŋoŋutyet nye kyonyoru kucone torot.

Ntene kyanyosye oporci ŋalek pikap Tamasko oko cepo Yerusalem, nto okeri pikap koretap Yuteya tokol wanak oko lamek, omwoci kule misyini kurenynkey cekto oŋnkuwekyikey wule mite Yiyintet oŋnkwiy tukuk ce poru kule karenynkey cekto.
Om ŋalecutecu ye sukuŋet Yutayek kunäma ye kyomite kotap Yiyintet oŋnkusyem kule cepakäca.

Ntene okoy pesyoni; kyonyoru kakalyayet nye cone wule mite Yiyintet. Kunyo amite ani koyoŋe yu omwocini ŋalek ce kyakäs piko tokol cewoyec oko ce minkec, nye puryo kot omwowu alak; ntene omwowu pate ŋalek ce kimwoy workoyik oko Moses kule mosukwiyokis.
Coto kuce mwowu kule mosukutaŋany Ŋapanet oŋnkwek cito akenke nye kunyosyo kotutune met, oŋnkwek nye mosukoporci lakweyet Yutayek oko lamek.’’
Nteye kimite Paulo kuŋolole kuyetekey kuyunyoto, yoto kupol Festo kukurto om kuti nyewo kumwoy kule, “Paulo! Kopunuŋ met! Kukowurtiŋ nyi sumanet nyewo met!’’
Kumwoy Paulo kule, “Mokoryontet nye cekonyite, puryo kot kupunwo met, oŋololi ŋalek ce toponec ce toloyec cepo manta.

Kinko Akripa oŋololuŋ ŋalecutecu oponte nyikanatet tokol, omnye nketi nyi ŋalecutecu tokol. Kunyo oŋnket kupoyit manta kule kenket mpenyi ŋolyo ake tokol om ŋalecutecu omnye kipuryo kot kyiye ŋalecutecu wule wuŋat mpo kisic.
Kinko Akripa, yeni nyi ŋalekap workoyik? Oŋnketi ani kule yeni nyi.’’
Kumwoci Akripa Paulo kule, “Soti nyi kule muci kot aweca ani oyiku Kristoyin om ŋalek ce keŋalale poroyini nwac pate?’’ Kuwec Paulo kumwoy kule,

“Nka kot nto om poroyinto nye nwac nto nye koy, ntene osome wule mite Yiyintet kule, puryo kot kwinyi nkit pate, ntene wanak oko akwek piko tokol cu lime ŋalekwani pesyoni ce roke cekto kukerkeyitu oko ani, tos pate nyororonicu aponte!’’
Yoto kuŋet kinko oko poytoyintet Festo oko Pernike oko piko ce kimite kokwet.
Nteyu kowo kupa tapan, kuŋalal kwicek nkit kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot kwiy cici lelis nye roke cepakäc nto mpo cerotyi mopusi.’’
Kumwoci Akripa Festo kule. “Kocimuce cityakta cici kuwecikey ntomo nye kucururan kutasta musankut kuwo wule mite Kinko Nyewo.’’
Nteyu kowo kecäm kule roke celany acek rapet cepete okoy Italia. Yoto cikoyto Paulo oko mopusinek alak cikoci Yuliyo nyewo nyepo sikarekap luketap Romek ce cekure sikarekap Kinko Nyewo.

Yoto celany acek rapet nye kicone Atramito nye kirikik kunomen kuwo kupunte moŋosyek ce mite tapantap ruretyet om koretap poytoyisyetap Asia. Cenomen cepete rapet. Kicepontotikey acek yoto Aristariko citap Maketoniya nye cone Sesolonika.
Nto ye pesyetap oyeny cepunte Siton. Kicöme Yuliyo Paulo, yoto kucömncini kuwo wokukäs coronutekyi oŋnkyikoci kiy ake tokol nye kimöce.
Cenomene wuloto celany rapet cipe cerup ruretyet tapan cekerektekey Kupro nye koret nye kikwen peko omnye kiwuse yomet ye kicone tay.
Yoto cipe kyay ruretyet ye lekite Silisiya oko Pampiliya okoy cepunte Mura moŋetap Lukiya.
Kunyor nyewo nyepo sikarek om yoto rapet nye kicone Alekisantaria nye kikirik kunomen kuwo Italia, kulanyec acek rapanato.

Cenomene wuloto cipe möt ciwany pesyos ce caŋ om wuyinto nyewo okoy cepunte Kunito moŋet nye mite ruretyet tapan. Yoto kucis yomet yemo cipe tay. Cerekte cerup tapantap koretap Kurete nye kikwen peko nye tokyintos oko Salmone.
Cipe möt om wuyinto cerup ruretyet tapan tapan okoy cepunte ye cekure loyta nye topon. Kilekite yoto moŋetap Laseya.
Cipur wuloto ciwany pesyos ce caŋ okoy kukoromit kucis ye mocetosyikey cipe poninekap ruretyet, omnye kikikeyta pesyet nyo cekure, “Cekire Omik.’’ Yoto kumwoci Paulo cekto ŋomnononi kule,
“Merekyo, kakäs ani kule miyat pantap ruretyet, kuceke yuteyu, omnye mosukuwuryo tukuk ce mite rapet oko mpo rapet oŋnkupotyo soponwekap piko.’’
Ntene kucäm nyewo nyepo sikarek ŋalekap cito nye poytoy rapet oko citap rapet kupël ŋalek ce kimwoy Paulo.

Kipuryo kot kutopon ruretyet yoto nye kimuce kot cipur okoy ciwany pesyosyekap koyitityet tokol. Yoto kucäm piko ce caŋ kule roke cenomen cesyem kyay ruretyet okoy cepunte Foyinike ye kemukakay, sukuŋet cekto wokukerektekey loytap ruretyet om koretap Kurete, nyoto ku Loyta nye mite ruretyet tapan nye tokyinikey kwenutap tö oko raraktay, oko kwenutap makentany oko raraktay wule kimuce cek wokopur kuwany pesyosyekap koyitityet om wuloto.
Yoto kucec kuwus yomet nye kisic nye cone tö, kusot piko kule konyol kacenyoru kito nye kocemöce. Kunum cek kito nyo ciyoŋnte rapet oŋnkupa kurup kulekityi koretap Kurete tapan tapan.
Ntene yoto pakenke nye mnoloyit, kuwus yomet nyewo nye cekure, “Yometap kwenutap makentany oko koŋasis’’ nye kicone koret.
Kuket kuyoŋnto rapet okoy kucis ye mocipe cetokyikey yomet, yoto kyaste kusutec.
Cipe okoy wocekerektekey tapantap koret om komostap tö nyepo koret kisic nye kikwen peko nye cekure Kawuta. Cesyem om wuyinto nyewo koromun okoy ciyoŋnte rapet nye miniŋ.

Nteyu kowo kuloŋune cek rapet nye miniŋ, kunäm porok co cikolye oŋnkurate komut rapet nyewo; omnye kikimuyo kule muce cek kupa kot wokuryac ŋaynet om tapantap koretap Lipiya. Yoto kurek cek siret nyo sute rapet oŋnkwasta kusut yomet rapet.
Kutosyikey kuwus yomet nyewo koromun, nto om pesyetap oyeny, kucec cek kunum terekok ce kimite rapet oŋnkuwirci peko.
Nto om pesyet nye kirupe, kunum cek tukuk ce kiciyisye om rapet om yewuniyekwa oŋnkuwirci peko.
Ciwany pesyosyek ce caŋ nye kipuryo kot ceköse asista nto mpo kokelik. Kutosyikey kuwus yomet nyewo koromun okoy cisot kule komocesoptosi.

Nteyu kowo kopur piko kuwany pesyosyek ce caŋ nye puryo kot kwome omit, yoto kuyoŋe Paulo yepo taymwa oŋnkuŋalal kumwoy kule, “Merekyo, kiroke olimwo ani akwek nto kipuryo kot cenomen cekwane koretap Kurete, nto puryo kot cenyoru miyotyo oko potyet nyeyunyi.
Kunyo osomok akwek kule, otitir! Akwil mukuleywekwok omnye komo kume ci mpo akenke om akwek, rapet pate nye mosukwaran.
Omnye kucontyo ani laŋat komoy Malayketap Yiyintemwani nyo osoye oŋnkuco kuyoŋe ye amite,
oŋnkumwowo kule, ‘Paulo, mente omuy! Mesewo okoy weyoŋe taytap Kinko Nyewo. Kunyo käs pa kakoniŋ nyi Yiyintet om toponiyenyi soponwekap piko tokol cu opontekey om rapet.’
Kunyo, merekyo otitir! Omnye Oyeni okenekey ani Yiyintet, kunyo mosukwiy ŋalek cepo manta kuyu wule kucemwoytowo.
Ntene mosukusutec yomet okoy cepunte koret ake nye kikwen peko.’’

Nteye kipesyetap kwomowutap taman oko amwan kumite kusutec yomet kutokyec wulin oko wuli om ruretyetap Metiterenian. Ntowo kupunto komoy kwen om pesyonoto kusow kunket piko co sute rapet kule yunye kacerikte cepunte koret.

Yoto kurate rwantet porowet oŋnkukoyito kuwo peko orit kuyoyec, ntowo ciyoyec cekäs kule mite peko koyinto nyepo kokwoyutek artam kuwo ŋony. Cipe kuminiŋ, ciyoyec, nteye pere cekäs cekäs kule mite peko koyinto nyepo kokwoyutek sosom kuwo ŋony.
Yoto kumuyo piko ce sute rapet kule muce kuwo rapenyacek kot wokuryac rwontokap ruretyet tapan. Kukoyito cek karik amwan co ciyoŋnte rapet let, oŋnkusom kule kuyec koret pate.
Kusyem piko co sute rapet kule cemwey cewuŋatekey, kunäm cek rapet nye miniŋ aŋnkukoyito kuwo peko orit kwiyiytakey nye yunye möce kule wocetosyi cikoci rapet tay karik co ciyoŋnte.
Kumwoci Paulo nyewo nyepo sikarek kule, “Ye puryo kot kopur orit piko co sute rapet, kupuryo kot omuci akwek kot osopce mpo akanke.’’
Yoto kumüt sikarek porok ce nöme rapet ye miniŋ oŋnkwasta kuwo peko orit.
Ntowo kurik kuyec koret, kusom Paulo piko tokol kwomis omik kumwoci kule, “Pesyoni kuye pesyetap taman ok amwan omite akwek okoŋisyi osoti pate nye moyome kiy mpo kisic.
Kunyo osomok akwek kule oyomisye, omnye möce soponwekwok omik ye sosopce. Omnye komokupote putyontetap metitap ci ake tokol om akwek.’’
Nteyu kowo kuwany neto kumwoy ŋalecato kunam mukatyantet oŋnkusomnci kukasta Yiyintet om taytap piko tokol, oŋnkupetec kwam.
Yoto kutitir ci tokol, oŋnkwomis omik.
Kicemite acek piko tokol rapet orit ce kicepuntoy pokolwokik oyeny ok tomonwokik tisap ok lö.
Nteyu kowo kwomis piko tokol okoy kupiyoŋ kunäm cekto nkanuk ce kimite rapet orit oŋnkuwirci ruretyet sukuŋet kukuskusit rapet.

Ntowo kuyec koret, kipuryo kot konket piko co sute rapet kule koret oŋnkono tapantap koronoto. Ntene kukäs cekto loytap ruretyet ye kimite ŋaynet, kusot kule ye kemukakay komuce kusut rapet okoy kupunto yoto.

Yoto kumüt porok co kacerate karik co yoŋntoy rapet oŋnkupokokyi karik peko orit, oŋnkutyac porok co rote nkwatyet nyo cesute rapet oŋnkuyoŋnto siret nyepo rapet tay kutokyikey yomet sukuŋet kusut yomet rapet kuwo ruretyet tapan.
Ntene kuwo rapet okoy kuryac tulwetap ŋaynet nye mite peko orit, kunam rapet wule po tay ŋaynet nye puryo kot kutwoyekey oŋnkumite kolucluce kupetece yomet rapet wulo po let om swama.
Yoto kurwoc sikarek kule roke cepakäc mopusinek tokol sukuŋet mente kot kupir peko mpo akenke kway okoy kupunto koret oŋnkumwey kupecikey.

Ntene kimöce nyewo nyepo sikarek kule osoru kusop Paulo, yoto kuyete neto sikarek mokwiy kito nye kimöce kule ceyiy. Kumwoci nyewo nyepo sikarek piko tokol ce kimuce kupir peko; kunyosyo kurane rapet oŋnkupir peko kupa okoy ruretyet tapan.
Nto piko co koŋet, kupa co kupir peko kunämat pawunekap rapet co kokwilyo. Kuyuyit nyoto wule kicepete acek okoy cepunte koret tapan oŋnkyesopce piko tokol.
Nteyu kowo cesopce cepunte piko tokol koret tapan, yoto cinket kule cekure koronoto kikwen peko Malta.
Kuŋerekyec acek pikap koronoto kwek coronut. Kulowec mata oŋnkukonec ceyuy omnye kikicec kuropen ropta oŋnkukayitit.
Koruruc Paulo siririk oŋnkukoci mata, yoto kucone erenet nye kowon mata oŋnkumwolmwolcikey yewunyi.
Nteye kotoköse pikap koronoto erenet nye kesikinine yewutap Paulo, kuŋalal nkit kumwoy kule, “Porukey kule porin cici, ntene komo kusope nyun yawut, nka kot kokosope neto ruretyet.’’
Ntene kulelec Paulo erenet kulelekyi mata nye puryo kot kwiye neto kiy mpo kisic.

Kukany picoto kule kukwa yewutap Paulo nto kule kumilcikey ŋony kume. Nteyu kowo kukany cek kuloyit nye puryo kot kukäs kiy nye keyakay om wule mite Paulo; kuwec kasoteywekwa kumwoy kule, “Yiyintet cici!’’

Kimite ye kulekite yoto mparenikap cito nyewo nyepo koronoto kikwen peko, nye kicekure kaynenyi Pupliyo. Kuŋerekyec acek cicoto kukwerec cipe kanyi wociku toyekyi oŋnkupayec topon kuwany pesyosyek somok.
Kimite yoto kwanitap Pupliyo kukoru kwiriri nye kimnyone yeset oŋnkuyitoy korotik. Yoto kuwo Paulo koto nye kirwe oŋnkusomnci kukemer yewuniyekyi kusop yoto.
Nteyu kowo kwiyakay ŋolyontonoto, yoto kukwa pikap koronoto tokol ce kimnyontos kwocisop tokol kusopco.
Kukonec acek pikap koronoto kokotutek ce caŋ, nteye kicenomeni kukoci cek rapet tukuk tokol ce kicemöce acek om poninekyo.
Nto om letut yu kowo cipur acek ciwany orok somok, celany rapet nye kicone Alekisantaria nye cekure, “Yiyik ce sorom.’’ Nye kikiyoŋe koronoto kikwen peko kuwany pesyosyekap koyitityet.
Cipe okoy cepunte moŋetap Sirakusa wule kicipur ciwany pesyosyek somok.

Cenomene wuloto om rapet cipe cimutu okoy cepunte moŋetap Rekio. Ntowo kutil pesyet akenke, yoto kuwus yomet nyewo nye cone tö, cipe ciwany pesyosyek oyeny cepunte moŋetap Poteyoli nye mite ruretyet tapan.
Cenyorte wuloto mpo yeya alak ce kikoyen ce kisomec acek kule cipur oko cekto kuwany pesyosyek tisap. Yoto cipe okoy cepunte Rom.

Kulim mpo yeya piko co kikoyen ce kimite Rom kule kacekwa acek, yoto kukwa kutorokwec okoy kwokunyorcec moŋetap Apiyo oko Korikap toyek somok. Nteye kotoköse Paulo cekto, kukasta Yiyintet oŋnkutosyikey kutitir kunyor swamet.
Nteyu kowo cepunte Rom, cecömnci Paulo kopur nkit oko sikorintet akenke nye kiripe neto.

Ntowo ciwany pesyosyek somok, kukur Paulo kukwa kuyomokey kantoyikap Yutayek cepo wuloto, nteyu kowo koruruckey cekto, kuŋalal Paulo kumwoci kule, “Merekyo mpo yeya! Nka kot kipuryo kot ayiy ani lelis nye miyat om wule mite pikyacek, nto awurte kapurto nyo kikonec acek mpo kukonyo. Kicenäma ani cerata oyiku mopusyo om Yerusalem oŋnkyikoyito awo wule mite Romek.
Kukiro co okoy kumac kule cityakta omnye kipuryo kot kunyor cek kule kyayiy ani lelis nye miyat nye roke cepakäcena.
Yoto ntowo kutoyis Yutayek, kusutyo ani acururan ataste musankut kuco wule mite Kinko Nyewo nye puryo kot ku kule oponte ani musanku nye amöce kule owosontyi pikwani.
Kunyo saŋet osomok kule akäsak oŋnkyeŋalal oko akwek, omnye oyiku ani ratat porowoni oponte omnye ocome kokenotetap pikap Israel.’’

Kumwoci cekto Paulo kule, “Tompo kot cenyoru acek parwet nye cone Yuteya nyepo ŋalek ce nömiŋ nyi, tompo mpo kot kuco okoy kupun wuli cemite acek yeya mpo akenke nye kucokumwoy nto kuŋalale ŋalek ce miyotec ce nömiŋ nyi.
Ntene cemöce acek kule celim kasoteywekukyi om ŋalek ce nöme Lukonitenyi. Omnye kucinket acek kule ŋolole piko kwapi Lukonitenyi mite nyi om wulyo tokol.’’

Yoto kukwey cek oko Paulo pesyet nye mokutuyo yec. Ntowo kupunto pesyonoto, kukwa Yutayek ce caŋ koyoto kipurune Paulo. Kucec Paulo kuŋololyi cek kuceke korron okoy kutuyit koret. Kuŋalal kutetyi cek lokoywek cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet kusyem kule anet cek kuyen Yesu, oŋnkuporci wule yunto ŋalek om ntarastinekap Moses oko silutekap workoyik.
Kuyen alake ŋalekap Paulo ntene kutoyis alake.
Yoto kunomen kupa kukotoytocin kwicek nkit, om letut yu kowo kumwoci Paulo cekto ŋolyontoni akenke kule, “Kiŋalal Muyet Nyetilil topon kumwoci mpo kukonyo kupunune wule mite workoyontet Isaya!
Omnye kimwoy kule, ‘Iwo wule mite picu wemwoci kule: mosolimnte oŋnkolimnte, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot olime, mosakäste, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot oŋnketi;

omnye koliliyotin kasoteywekap picu; kiker yitikwa, kunyo kikomis konyekwa. Nto kukostoy konyekwa, nto kulimntoy yitikwa, nto kwemuce kunket kasoteywekwa, nto kwemuce kuweckey kukwa wule amite ani, kimwoy Yiyintet kuyunyoto, Saŋet ani asop cekto kusopco.’ ’’
Kutosyikey Paulo kumwoy kule, “Kunyo möce oŋnket akwek kule kucesutyi lamek lokoywek cepo kosopetap Yiyintet. Mosukulim cekto!’’
[Nto om letut yu kowo kuwany Paulo kumwoy ŋalecato, kunomen Yutayek kupa kutintenoti koromun cekto kwicek nkit.]
Kopur Paulo kumiŋis wuloto kuwany kenyisyek oyeny, kuminye koto nye kikwole kukoyitoy pesanik, oŋnkutoroce piko tokol ce kikwoni kwokuköse neto.
Yoto kumwoytoy ŋalek cepo poytoyisyetap Yiyintet, oŋnkunetis kumwoy ŋalek cepo manta ce nöme Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo. Kiŋolole om nyikanat kutok nye puryo ci nye kikerektoy neto.
