Cone parwani wule amite ani Paulo mutworintetap Yesu Kristo, nye Kiyokontet nye kikwey oŋnkukur Yiyintet sukuŋet kumwaytat lokoywekyi ce toponec.
Lokoywek ce toponec coto kuce kikurto Yiyintet keny kupunune wule mite workoyikyi oŋnkyesil om silutekap Yiyintet ce tililec.
Ŋalecato kuce nöme Werinyi Yesu Kristo nye kiceyi kuyu cito kucone keseniyantetap Tauti.
Ntene kicipor om swamet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil kule neto kunye Weritap Yiyintet; omnye kitutune met. Nyoto ku Yesu Kristo Mokoryontenyo.
Kikono ani Yiyintet kupunte wule mite Yesu om kupeyok ce kicekono oyiku kiyokintet kupo Kristo saŋet antoci piko cepo yemosyek tokol kuyen oŋnkuyweyis.
Picoto ku mpo akwek piko co mite Rom co kicekurok opoyitu Kristo.
Kunyo akwek piko tokol ce mite Rom, ce cöme Yiyintet oŋnkukur cekto kwek pikyi ce tililec, akante kukonok Yiyintet Papanyo oko Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo poypoyet oko kalyet.
Anyosyi ani akaste Yiyintenyu kupunte wule mite Yesu Kristo om wule omite akwek tokol, omnye mite kulime piko cepo koret tokol koyenet nye oponte akwek om wule mite neto.
Nkete Yiyintet kule osomwok ani okokoy ye omwoytoti lokoywekyi ce toponec cepo Werinyi.
Osome Yiyintet om cömisyenyi kule roke komukakay yawut saŋet orutocok ani.
Omnye amöce koromun kule akäsak akwek sukuŋet akwilak onyoru swamet.
Ntene kupëlis mosicikalyekey acek tokol yoto, kukalyak akwek koyenet nyimwani aŋnkukalya ani koyenet nyimwakwek.

Mpo yeya, amöce ani kule oŋnket kule kwasyem aret ce caŋ kule aco wule omite, ntene kukerekta kito ake ye mayiy kuyunyoto. Amöce kule cakäs yisyonutek ce tililec om wule omite akwek kuyu wulo yunto om wule mite lamek.
Omnye oponte ani oyici yisyet Kirikik oko mpo piko ce lamek, piko ce ŋomec oko ce perper.
Kunyo amöce koromun kule omwowok akwek piko co mite Rom lokoywek ce toponec.
Omnye akenekey ani owoŋnkyi lokoywek ce toponec, swametap Yiyintet kunye sope piko tokol ce kikoyen, nyosye kunyo Yutayek oko lamek.

Omnye poru lokoywek ce toponec wule muce kusatitakey kunyol piko om wule mite Yiyintet. Punte coto koyenet pate kuceke tayta okoy letut. Kuyu wule mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Mosukusop cito nyetilil om koyenet nye ponto.’’
Ciporu nyerunotet nyepo Yiyintet kucone torot kucontyini piko ce miyotec oko ce ponto mwiynanet, picoto kuce kerektoy ŋalek cepo manta.
Toku topon wule yunto Yiyintet, omnye Yiyintet nkit nye poru tukucoto.
Kuceke ye kitany Yiyintet koret, kicipor kutok topon tukukyi ce motoku, coto ku swamet nyenyi oko kamukeywekyi, kunyo porukey neto om tukuk ce kicitany, puryo kot komuce cekto kot kutuckey mpo kisic.
Kikonket cekto Yiyintet, ntene kipuryo kot kuyweye cekto neto kuyu wule cemokyini nto mpo kokasta. Ntene kimo kuponto kasoteywek cikwa ŋomnon mpo kisic, pesetote menonet pate.
Sutekey cekto kule ciku ŋomec ntene solontoy pate.
Ye kotosoye Yiyintet nye mopoku, kuweckey yec kusay tukuk ce poku kuyu ci nye poku, nto kukerkeyitu toritek nto tyoŋik nto erenoy.
Kunyo kikwasta Yiyintet kwiy cekto tukuk ce somis ce corokyini mukuleywek cikwa, yiye cek kwicek nkit ŋalek cepo kalilan.
Wece ŋalekap Yiyintet cepo manta kwek mwiynanet oŋnkusay tyoŋin ce kicitonye ye kotosoye Yiyintet nye cikostoy okokoy okoy okokoy. Yunyoto.
Omnye yiye piko tukuk ce yucu! Kwasta Yiyintet cekto wokwiy ŋalek cepo kalilan. Kutay koruk moyiyisye topon porwonik cikwa om aret nye topon, ntene kwicininkey cek kwicek nkit sakwayanat.
Kunyo mpo moronik kwasta co ye mokopurcin oko korukwa oŋnkwicin cek kwicek nkit sakwayanatet, mokunyor cekto toŋoŋutek ce yeme om ŋalek ce miyotec ceyucoto.
Omnye toye piko morip ŋomnonet nyepo manta nye nöme Yiyintet. Kunyo kucämnta kule kurup konetik ce kipok kasoteywek Kunyo yiye ŋalek ce meroke kot kwiy.
Ponto miyotyet wok tokol, kuyu ŋokis, moroŋyantit. Ponto cekto corokyinotet, porisyet, koperperisyet, oko kowotyontit, oŋnkuŋorsyi cekto,

oŋnkuŋololekey kwapi, senkere cekto Yiyintet. Sokoran ce silekey, tosyinikey pate kusote wule mokwiyta ŋalek ce miyotec. Puryo kot kulimncini cekto piko cepo kamwa, puryo kot kuponto ŋomnon. Puryo kot kuripe kirotyet nyimwa, oŋnkupuryo kot kuporcini piko alak tolosyet nto mpo kurire kukalya.

Nkete cekto kule mwowu ntarastit nyepo Yiyintet kule, roke kupok piko ce pure kopurto nye yunyoto. Puryo kot kutosyinikey cekto kwiye ŋalecutecu pate, ntene cömntoy cekto kukasta piko alak ce yiye ŋalecato.

Kunyo Corwenyu, mutyini nyi piko alak musankut? Puryo kot oponte ŋolyo nye wosoni nka kot nyi ku ŋo? Omnye ye kewosontyi nyi piko alak kulot musankut, ntene oŋnkiyiye nyi ŋalecato, kuporkey kule wosontyinikey nyi nkit.
Cinket acek kule Yiyintet kunye po manta ye komutyi musankut piko ce yiye ŋalak ceyucoto.
Ntene nyi corwemwani nyo mutyini musankut piko alak ce yiye ŋalecutecu oŋnkurok yec yiye nyi nkit. Soti kule mesecilile musankut nyepo Yiyintet?
Nto tos nyile nyi tolosyenyi nyewo oko kwilatenyi oko muytocinotet nyenyi. Puryo nket nyi kule toponiyetap Yiyintet kunye ntowuŋ nyi serenynkey?
Kunyo om mukuleyto nyeŋuŋ nye wuy nye miyat, kuye mite tosyini toŋoŋutek cekuk om pesyet nye moceŋany cipor nyerunotetap Yiyintet ye mute musankut nyepo ŋalek cepo manta.
Omnye mosukupucici Yiyintet ci tokol kuyu wule yunto yisyenyi, nye kikwiy.
Tosyinikey piko alake kwiye yisyet nye topon, oŋnkuceny woyinto oko koyweyisyet oko soponto nye mopoku, mosukukoci Yiyintet picoto soponto nye mopoku.
Nto piko alak co soy oŋnkutay ŋalek cepo manta, oŋnkurup ŋalek ce miyotec, mosukuporci Yiyintet picoto nerekwekyi.
Mosukutaŋany oŋnkunyor mwoninto piko tokol ce yiye ŋalek ce miyotec, nyosye Yutayek oko mpo Kirikik.
Ntene mosukukoci Yiyintet woyinto oko koyweyisyet oko kalyet piko tokol co yiye ŋalek ce toponec, kunyosye Yutayek oko mpo Kirikik.
Omnye sute Yiyintet kuyoyec piko tokol.

Omnye piko tokol co puryo kot kupunto ntarastinek oŋnkwiy miyotyet, kuce potos kuyu piko ce puryo kot kupunto ntarastinek. Nto piko tokol, ce yiye miyotyet oŋnkurok kupunto ntarastienk kuce mosicemutyi musankut kuyu wule yunto ntarastinek.
Puryo kot ku piko ce lime ntarastinek kuce toponec om taytap Yiyintet, ntene piko co yiye kuyu wule mwoytoy ntarastinek kuce mocecämnta kule tililec om wule mite Yiyintet.
Ye karup Lamek kuywey ntarastinek, kuporkey kule ponto cekto ntarastinek nka kot kupuryo kot kuponto ntarastinek.

Poru cekto om kopurto nyimwa kule silotin mukuleywekwa orit ŋalek ce nöme ntarastinek. Poru yec mpo kasoteywekwa kule po manta ŋalecutecu omnye wosontyini kasoteywekwa ce sote oŋnkuyet kukalya cekto, om
pesyet nyo mute Yiyintet musankut nyepo yisyonutek cepo ŋalek ce wuŋotin cepo piko tokol. Kuyu wule yunto lokoywek ce toponec ce omwoytoy ani kupunte Yesu Kristo.
Ntene nyi nyo kurekey kule Yutoyin, oŋnkikenekey ntarastinek, oŋnkisilekey Yiyintet.
Nketi tukuk tokol ce möce Yiyintet kule yiy nyi, kunyo kinetkey om wule mite ntarastinek kule kwey kiy nye topon.
Nketi nyi kupoyit manta kule yiku nyi kantoyintet nyepo piko co korotin, oŋnkiyiku lakweyet nyepo piko ce mite menonet.
Yiku nyi konetintet nyepo piko ce perper oko lekoy ce minkec. Nketi nyi kupoyit manta kule om ntarastinek ku wule mite ŋomnonet.
Nyi nyo neti piko alak, omne menetkey nyito nkit? Mwoytoy nyi kule, “Monte cecorsye!’’ Oŋnkurok yec corsyi nyi!
Mwowu mpo kule, “Monte cesakwayan.’’ Oŋnkurok yec yiye nyi sakwayanatet? Senkeri nyi koromun kerkeyik ce kerkey Yiyintet, oŋnkurok yec core nyi tukuk ce mite korik orit.
Silekey kule ponte ntarastinek, oŋnkurok yec yirye ntarastinek sutu kalilan om wule mite Yiyintet.
Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Yutayek kuce kwesokyi sukuŋet kuŋalale Lamek kwapi kaynetap Yiyintet.’’
Ponto wonset nyimwakwek latik ye korip ntarastinek. Ntene ye koyiri ntarastinek kuporkey wonset nyimwoŋ kuyunye puryo kot cewonak.
Kunyo nteye korip lomin nyo mowonat ŋalek ce mwowu ntarastinek, kupuryo kot kusute Yiyintet cicoto kuyunye kicewon?
Kunyo Lamek co mowonotin kuce mosukumutwok musankut akwek Yutayek ce oponte ntarastinek oŋnkoyiku wonotin oŋnkurok yec oyirye ntarastinek.
Ntene ŋo nye Yutoyin nyepo manta nye kicewon kupoyit manta? Puryo kot ku Yutoyin kunye po wonset nyenyi porto nyepo saŋ pate

Ntene Yutoyintet nyepo manta kunye Yutoyin nyepo porto orit, nye kicewon mukuleyto nyenyi orit, nye yiye yisyet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil, ntene puryo kot ku nyepo ŋalek pate. Nyoru cicoto kakastayet kucone wule mite Yiyintet, puryo ku kule kucone wule mite piko.
Kunyo toponiyo ne nye pëlisyi nye ponto Yutoyin? Nto latik ne ce ponto wonset?
Caŋ koromun om aret ake tokol! Nyepo tayta kunyi kule, kicikoci Yutayek kurip lokoywek ce toponec cepo Yiyintet.
Kunyo mokwiy kulene ye puryo kot kuponto Yutayek alake koyenet? Kuporkey so om ŋolyontoni kule puryo kot cikenekey Yiyintet?

Puryo kot kuyunyo mpo kisic! Yiyintet kunye po manta nka kot komuce kwek ci ake tokol mwiyn, kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Misyini cinket kule poye manta ye keŋalal, misyini lotisyi musankuŋuŋ ye kocewosontyiŋ.’’
Ntene nteye kaciy acek miyotyet, yoto kuye kupor kule po manta Yiyintet? Mocemwowu kulene? Mocemwowu so kule, puryo kot kupo manta Yiyintet ye kucetaŋany acek? Kaŋalal kuyu ci.
Puryo kot kuyunyo! Ye puryo kot kupo Yiyintet manta, komuce neto kulene kot kwek ketintet nye mutyini koret musankut?
Ntene nteye mwiynanemwani kunye poru topon woyintap Yiyintet, omne sicewosontyo ani om miyotyet?
Cimuci pa cemwowu kule, kyiy miyotyet sukuŋet kuco toponiyet? Mwowu piko co ŋomsi kule ce mwowu acek kuyunyoto. Kicemutyi cekto musankut nyepo manta.
Kunyo Ceponte acek pa Yutayek soponto nye topon kupël Lamek? Puryo kot kuyunyo mpo kisic! Kwoporu ani keny kutok topon kule mite Yutayek oko Lamek tokol ŋonyutap miyotyet.
Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Puryo ci mpo akenke nye tilil,
Puryo mpo akenke nye ŋom, puryo mpo nye cenye wule mite Yiyintet,
Kiweckey piko tokol kwasta Yiyintet kimosokis piko tokol puryo mpo akenke nye yiye ŋolyo nye topon, puryo mpo akenke.
Kerkey kutuwak cikwa mwenon ce kicetupci pic ce yototin, oŋnkukwone kutuwak cikwa ŋalek ce miyotec ce kerkey oko mwonet nyepo erenoy.
Kunyiy kutuwak cikwa cupisyonok ce mwonec
Sorcini lakwar ye mokutumto korotik.
Turpupoti kwaranta aret wule punte oŋnkupakakta toŋoŋutek.
Puryo kot konkete aret nyepo kalyet,
Oŋnkupuryo kot kuponto koyweyisyet nye yweye Yiyintet.’’
Kunyo cinket kule ŋalek tokol ce mite orit kuce nöme piko tokol ce poytoy ntarastinek, sukuŋet mpo yec kuker kutuwak cepo piko alak, sukumutyi Yiyintet musankut koret tokol.
Omnye puryo ci mpo akenke nye muce cesat kunyol om taytap Yiyintet ye korip ntarastinek. Kito nye yiye ntarastinek kunye porcini cito kule kwiy miyotyet.
Ntene kuciŋoŋ yawut aret nye sate piko kunyolom wule mite Yiyintet, nyoto kunye puryo kot konömekey oko ntarastinek.
Sate Yiyintet piko kunyol kupunto koyenemwa om Yesu Kristo. Yiye Yiyintet kuyunyoto om wule mite piko tokol ce cöme Kristo omnye puryo pciyatet mpo kisic.
Kikowurta piko tokol, kunyo mitowune cekto wule low om wule mite kosopotet nyepo Yiyintet.
Nto ye cesöte cekto kunyol om kokotutyetap Yiyintet nye pöc om poypoyet kupunte wule mite Yesu Kristo nye kikokalyec acek.

Kikon Yiyintet Yesu Kristo sukuŋet kwek met nyenyi aret nye cikolye piko miyotyonik. Kupunte koyenet nye ponto cekto om wule neto. Kikwiy Yiyintet kuyunyoto sukuŋet kupor yisyenyi nyepo manta. Kimuytoci neto nye kipuryo kot kumany miyotyonikap piko om pesyosyek co kitil.
Kunyo poru yawut om pesyosyecu kule po manta neto oŋnkusöte kunyol cito om wule mite Yesu Kristo.
Kunyo muce cesilekey ne? Puryo kiy! Omne? Omnye möce pa kule ciywey ntarastinek? Puryo! Ntene omnye ciyeni ce cömisye pate.
Omnye cinket ciwoŋnkyi kule satoktos kunyol cito om wule mite Yiyintet om koyenet pate, ntene puryo kot omnye kikwiy ŋalek ce mwowu ntarastinek.
Nto osoti akwek kule Yiyintet kunye Yiyintet nyepo Yutayek nkit pate? Puryo kot ku Yiyintet neto ne nyepo mpo Lamek? Neto kunye Yiyintet nyepo mpo Lamek.
Omnye akenke Yiyintet Mosukusat neto Yutayek kunyol om wule mite neto kupunte koyenet nyimwa oŋnkusat kunyol mpo Lamek kupunto koyenet nyimwa.
Poru pa ŋolyontoni kule ye kiciyen kuroke cetay ntarastinek? Puryo kot kuyunyo mpo kisic! Ntene misyini cerip ntarastinek.
Kunyo mocemwowu ŋolyo ne nye nöme kukonyo Apram. Kinyor kiy ne?
Nto yunye kicesat Apram kunyol om wule mite Yiyintet om tukuk ce kikwiy, nto ponto neto kito nye silekey, ntene puryo komuce kusilekey taytap Yiyintet.
Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Kucäm Apram Yiyintet, nto omnye kiyen, yoto kuye kusut Yiyintet neto yu ci nyetilil.’’
Cikocini cito nye yiyisyi musyaret, ntene puryo kot ciyite musyaret nyoto kwek kokotutek, ciyite kuyu kiy nye konyor kupo yisyet nye kokwiy.
Nto cito nyo puryo kot kwiy yisyet, ntene kukenekey Yiyintet nyo kolyoy piko co menket neto, ciyite kule tilil neto nyoto.
Ŋalecutecu kuco kiporu Tauti ye kiŋolole ŋerekwek cepo cito nye cöme Yiyintet. Ye puryo kupunto yisyonutek ceci latik, kimwoy kule:
Ponto kupeyoy piko co kicikalya miyotyonik cikwa, piko co kicinum miyotyonik cikwa
Ku ŋerekat cito nyo puryo kot koyityini Mokoryontet kule ponto miyotyet.

Po ra pa ŋerekwecutecu kiŋolole Tauti pate piko co kicewon? Puryo kot kuyunyo! Po ŋerekwek coto mpo piko co mowonotin. Omnye kocinum ŋalek kukwane silutekap Yiyintet kule. “Kicäm Apram Yiyintet; kunyo omnye kiyen, yoto kucäm Yiyintet neto kwek ci nyetilil.’’
Kunyo kikwiyokis ŋalecu oyu? Kutompo kot cewon Apram nto om letut yu kacewon? Kikwiyokis kunyo kutompo kot cewon, ntene puryo kot ku om letut yu kacewon.

Kicewon Apram om letut, kunyo wonsenyi kunye pelutyet nye poru kule kicäm Yiyintet Apram kwek ci nyetilil omnye kiyen kutompo kot cewon; sukuŋet kwek neto kukonyitap piko tokol ce yene Yiyintet oŋnkucäm neto cekto kule po manta nka kot kupuryo kot kuwonotin.
Apram kunye kukonyitap piko co wonotin, ntene nye puryo kot ku kule omnye wonotin, ntene omnye purtoy cekto soponto nyepo koyenet nye kerkey nyo kiponto Apram kutompo kot cewon.
Kikurtoci Yiyintet Apram oko kesenisyekyi kule mosukwek nyimwa koret. Kipuryo kot cekurtoci omnye kirip Apram ntarastinek, ntene omnye kiyen sukuŋet kucäm Yiyintet kule ci nyetilil neto.
Omnye ye piko co ripe ntarastinek kuce mosikonti tukuk ce kikurto Yiyintet, kuporkey kule puryo kot kupunto latik ye kiciyen, oŋnkupuryo kot koponto latik kurtoyetap Yiyintet.
Omnye ntarastinek kuce sutu kunyer Yiyintet, ntene ye puryo kot kimite; kupuryo mpo kot kimite kawurtayet nyepo ntarastinek.

Kunyo co kikurto Yiyintet kuce yoŋe koyenet, sukuŋet kuporkey kutok kupoyit manta kule kikwone poypoyetap Yiyintet, nyepo pöc om wule mite kesenisyekap Apram, nye puryo kot kupo pate piko co ripe ntarastinek, ntene mpo piko co kikoyen kuyu wule kikwiyta Apram. Omnye Apram kunye kukonyacek tokol.

Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Kayiyiŋ ani nyi yiku kukonyitap yemosyek ce caŋ.’’ Kunyo topon kirotyet om taytap Yiyintet, omnye kiyen Apram. Yiyintet kunye ŋete kotutune met piko, oŋnku nye muce kwiy kutok kiy nye kipuryo kutoku.
Kiyen Apram oŋnkukenis yoto kuye kipuryo kot kurok kukenis, kunyo kikwek neto kukonyitap yemosyek ce caŋ. Kuyu wulo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Mokucaŋit kesenisyekuk.’’
Nka kot kiponto neto yoto kenyisyek ce kirice pokol, kipuryo kot kucas om koyenenyi ye kesot porto nyenyi nye kikerkeyit nye kime. Nto mpo ye kesot sononetap Sara.
Kipuryo kot kwasta neto koyenenyi. Kikenekey neto koromun kurtoyetap Yiyintet. Kikoci koyenet nyenyi swamet, yoto kukasta neto Yiyintet.
Omnye kinkete neto kupoyit manta kule mosukoyitita Yiyintet tukuk ce kikurto.
Kuyunyoto om koyenenyi kuyit Yiyintet neto kwek ci nye kinyol.
Ŋalecu “Kwek ci nye kinyol.’’ Kuce kipuryo kot cesilyi neto nkit,
kicesilwec mpo acek co cecöme kule ciku pic ce kinyol, acek coto kuce ciyeni neto nyo kiŋet Yesu Mokoryontenyo kotutune met.
Kicikoyto Yesu kumeci miyotyonik cicacek oŋnkyiŋet kotutune met sukuŋet kusatec acek cenyolu om wule mite Yiyintet.
Kunyo ye kicesatec acek cenyolu om wule mite Yiyintet kupunte koyenet, kunyo ceponte kalyet oko neto kupunte Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
Kisutwec acek neto koyenet cenyoru kupeyokap Yiyintet ce cemite ciportoy yawut. Kunyo ceŋereci om kokenotet nye ceponte om woyintap Yiyintet!
Ceŋereci mpo om toŋoŋutekyo omnye cinket kule sutu toŋoŋutek muytocinotet,
oŋnkusutu muytocinotet cämntayet nyepo Yiyintet, oŋnkutec cämntayet nyitenyi kokenotet.
Puryo kot kulotwec acek kokenotet omnye kikoci Yiyintet koyenet kowut mukuleywekyacek orit kwiyisye Muyet Nyetilil, nyoto kunye kokotutyetap Yiyintet nye kikonec.
Omnye ye kimo ceponte acek swamet, yoto kumeci Kristo piko ce miyotec om pesyosyek ce kikwey Yiyintet.
Kiy nye wuy ye mokumeci citake cito nyetilil. Mukoktos om aret ake kusyem cito ake kot kumeci cito nyetilil!
Ntene kiporwec Yiyintet wule cömntec acek; omnye ye kito ceponte acek miyotyonik, yoto kuye kumecec Kristo!
Kunyo ye kicesatec acek cenyolu om wule mite Yiyintet om metap Kristo, porukey kupoyit manta kule mosicesorwec acek om wule mite nerekwekap Yiyintet kupunte neto.

Kiciku acek ikye punik cepo Yiyintet, ntene kiwecec yawut ciku coronutekyi kupunte metap Werinyi. Kunyo omnye ciku yawut coronutekap Yiyintet, aret cetya nyun ce cimuci cisopec om soponto nyepo Kristo!
Ntene nka kot ku coto tokol, ceŋereci acek om wule mite Yiyintet kupunte Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo nye kiwecec ciku coronutekap Yiyintet.
Kunyo, kuyu wulo kico miyotyet koret kupunune cito akenke, oŋnkusut kunäm met piko tokol, omnye kikowurta piko tokol.
Kupoyit manta kimite miyotyet koret kutompo kot cekon ntarastinek, ye puryo ntarastinek kupuryo kot ciyite miyotyet.
Kunyo kipayta miyotyet piko kuceke Atam okoy kupun Moses, kipayta oko mpo piko co kipuryo kot kowurta kuyu Atam, nye kikwiri ntarastinekap Yiyintet. Atam kunye kikerkey oko neto nyo kicikene kuco.

Ntene puryo kot kukerkey cutecu tukway, omnye puryo kot kukerkey kokotutyetap Yiyintet nyepo pöc pate oko miyotyetap Atam. Manta kule kipok piko ce caŋ kupo miyotyet nyoto po cito akenke. Ntene cemosi nyewo koromun poypoyetap Yiyintet. Kunyo mpo kokotutyenyi nye kocini piko ce caŋ kupunte poypoyetap cito nyoto akenke Yesu Kristo.

Kunyo pciyat kokotutyetap Yiyintet oko miyotyet nyepo cito akenke, nyoto kunye kisutyi kulot piko musankut nyepo lelisto. Ntene kikwiy piko miyotyonik ce caŋ, yoto kuco kokotutyet nye numune piko lelisto.

Po manta kule om miyotyet nyepo cito akenke yoto kupoytoyis miyotyet kupo cito nyoto akenke. Ntene nyewo koromun yisyet nye kikwiy cito akenke Yesu Kristo! Co mosukunyor poypoyetap Yiyintet nyewo koromun oko kokotutyet nyepo tililinto kuce mokupoytoyis kupëlis om soponto kupunte Kristo.
Kunyo kuyu wulo kisut miyotyet nyepo cito okenke musankut om wule piko tokol, kuyunyoto kusut yisyet nye topon nyepo cito akenke kalyet oko soponto om wule mite piko tokol.
Kuyunyoto kikwiri cito akenke ntarastinek kwiy miyotyet sukuŋet kowurta piko ce caŋ, kuyunyoto wule mosicesatita kunyol piko ce caŋ om wule Yiyintet kupunte cito akenke nye kimecec.
Ye kicece ntarastinek yoto kutosyikey kawurtayet, ntene ye kotosyikey miyotyet, kutosyikey mpo koromun poypoyetap Yiyintet.
Kunyo kuyu wulo poytoyisyi miyotyet kwiyisye met. Kunyo poytoyisyi mpo poypoyetap Yiyintet kwiyisye toponiyet nye ntowec acek om wule mite soponto nye mopoku kupunte Yesu Kristo Mokoryontenyo.
Kunyo mocemwowu kulene? Mocetosyikey pa cipurte miyotyet sukuŋet kutosyikey poypoyetap Yiyintet?
Puryo kot kunyunyo mpo kisic! Kicepoku acek nye kimokyiye miyotyet, kunyo cimuci kulene yec cipurte miyotyet?
Puryo kot oŋnket akwek kule acek tokol co kicepatisanec ciyomec oko Kristo, kuce kicepatisanec ciyomec oko met nyenyi.

Kunyo om patisanet nyinyacek kuye yoto ye kicemuyec acek oko Kristo oŋnkyepoku kuyu neto, sukuŋet ciŋetec kuyu wulo kiciŋetitoy Yesu kotutune met om swametap woyinto nyepo Papa, kunyo mpo acek mosicesopce om soponto nyelel.
Omnye ye kicemuyec acek om met nyenyi, kuyunyoto mosiciyomec oko neto om kotutunet nyenyi.
Cinket kule kicepakäc soponto nyinyacek nyepo keny oko Yesu om murtowontet sukuŋet kyaranta swamet nyepo miyotyet, sukuŋet komo ciku acek yec mutworikap miyotyet.
Omnye ye kame cito kukacityac neto om wule mite swamet nyepo miyotyet.
Ntene ye kicepoku acek oko Kristo, ciyeni kule mosicesopce oko neto.
Omnye cinket kule kikotutune met Kristo, kunyo kimo kume yec mpo kisic, kimokupoytoy met neto.
Met nye kime kunye met nye kimeci miyotyet aret akenke nkit, nto soponto nye ponto yawut kunye soponto nyepo Yiyintet.
Kunyo möce asot akwek nkit om aret nye yunyoto kule kicepoku nye mokyiye miyotyet, ntene oŋnkyesoptosi om Yiyintet om koyomotet nye opontekey oko Kristo.
Puryo kot kuroke yec kot tokupayta miyotyet porwonikwok ce poku. Saŋet acäm corokyinotet nyepo porto.

Monte kot acämnte akwek kereryantet ake tokol nyepo porto kwiy miyotyet Ntene okoytekey opoyitu Yiyintet kuyu pic ce kiciŋet kotutune met oŋnkocämnte soponto nyimwoŋ tokol kopurune wule mite neto, sukuŋet kyiyisye kupo ŋalek cepo manta.
Puryo kot kumisyini kupaytak akwek miyotyet, omnye puryo kot kupoytok ntarastinek, ntene poytok poypoyetap Yiyintet.
Kunyo mokyiy kulene? Mokyiy so miyotyet omnye puryo kot kupoytec ntarastinek? Puryo kot kuyunyo!

Oŋnket akwek ŋolyontoni kupoyit manta kule ye kecämntekey yiku mutworin, nye yweyi citake kuye yiku yoto mutworin nyepo mokoryontonoto yweyi nyito, nka mpo ye yweyi miyotyet nyo sutu met, nto ye koyweyisyet nyo sutu soponto cenyol om wule mite Yiyintet.
Ntene cikasta Yiyintet nye kikwiy topon, omnye kyoyiku akwek mutworik cepo miyotyet, ntene kunyo kyacäm yawut om mukuleywekwok ŋalek cepo manta ce kyonyorte konetisyet nyo kicinetak.
Kicityakenak akwek miyotyet okoy oyiku mutworik cepo ŋalek cepo manta.

Oŋololi ani oyiyisye ŋalek cepo kwak omnye miniŋ ŋomnonet nyimwoŋ kuyu wolo kikyokoytekey akwek om pesyosyek alak oyiku mutworik cepo simnyontet oko leliswek, om yisyet nyepo miyotyet. Kunyo yawut möce ocämntekey kuyunyoto oyiku mutworikap toponiyet om yisyetap tililinto.
Ye kitoyiku akwek mutworikap miyotyet kuye kipuryo kot kupoytok yoto toponiyet.
Ntene kyonyoru akwek yoto ne om tukuk ce oliloni ye mayiy yawut, omnye sutu coto met.
Kicityaktak yawut akwane miyotyet; kunyo oyiku mutworikap Yiyintet. Kito nye monyoru ku citililok oŋnkonyoru soponto nye mopoku om pesyet nyepo letut.
Omnye musyaret nyepo miyotyet ku met. Ntene kokotutyetap Yiyintet nyepo pöc ku soponto nye mopoku om koyomotet oko Yesu Kristo Mokoryontenyo.
Mpo yeya, oŋnket akwek kupoyit manta ŋalek ce amöce ani kule omwowu, omnye oŋnketi tokol ntarastinek. Poytoy ntarastinek pate cito ye tokusope.
Kuyu korko nye mütat. Ripe nyo ntarastinek om wule mite santenyi ye tokusope, ntene ye kame santenyi, yoto kuye kutyak om wule ntarastinek cepo santenyi.
Nteye kepurcini neto oko citake ye tokusope santenyi mosicekur kule kasakwayen korkonoto. Ntene ye kame santet, komo kuripe neto ntarastinek, kunyo komokwiye sakwayanat ye kemüt citake.

Mpo yeya, yunyoto om wule omite akwek kyopoku om wule mite ntarastinek, omnye oyiku kereryantetap porto nyepo Kristo, kunyo opoye yawut neto nyo kiciŋet kotutune met sukuŋet cepoyitu acek latik om yisyet nyepo Yiyintet.
Omnye ye kitoceponte acek soponto nyepo cito; kuye kikwiyisyi yoto corokyinotet nye miyat kupunte ntarastinek ce kimite porwonikyacek oŋnkusut met.

Ntene yawut acek co kicityacec cekwane wule mite ntarastinek, kuce kicepoku cekwane wuloto, kinömec ciku mopusin. Kunyo kimokyiyisyi om aret nyepo keny nyepo ntarastinek ce silotin, ntene kyiyisyi om aret nyelel nyepo Muyet Nyetilil.

Kunyo moceŋalal ce mwowu kulene? Mocemwowu pa kule ponto ntarastinek miyotyet? Puryo kot kuyunyo? Ntene ntarastinek kuce porwo ani sukuŋet oŋnket miyotyet. Kipuryo kot omuci kot oŋnket corokyinotet nto kipuryo kot kumwoy ntarastinek kule. “Mente ocorokyi kiy.’’
Kinyor miyotyet poroyinto sukuŋet kowurur corokyinotet ake tokol nye mitowune wule omite ani, omnye kikwiyis kupunte ntarastinek. Omnye miyotyet kunye kiy nye kime ye puryo kot kumite ntarastinek.
Kimite pesyosyek alak om soponmwani ye kipuryo kot oŋnket ntarastinek, ntene ntowo kuco ntarastit, yoto kotut miyotyet, yoto amey ani:
Nto ntarastit nye kicemöce kule sukuŋet kusutwo soponto, kunye nyoto nye kisutwo ani met.
Omnye yu kowo kunyor miyotyet poroyinto kupunte ntarastinek, yoto kuperpera ani okoy kupakäca.
Tilil ntarastinek kwine nkit, tililec koyomiset, oŋnkupo manta, oŋnkutopon.

Poru pa ŋalecu kule kito nye topon kunye kisutwo ani met? Puryo kot kuyunyo! Miyotyet kunye kisut, omnye kikwiyisye miyotyet kito nye topon sukuŋet kusutwo ani met oŋnkupor kutok wule yunto miyotyet. Kunyo porwec ntarastinek kule miyotyet ku miyotyo kupoyit manta.
Cinket kule mite ntarastit kupo muyet, ntene poyto ani porto, kicalya ani sayiy miyotyet.
Puryo oŋnketi kito nye oyiye, omnye puryo kot oyiye kito nye amöce kule ayiy ntene aŋnkayiy kito nye puryo kot amöce kule ayiy.
Ye oyiye ani ce puryo kot omöce kule ayiy, kuporkey kule ocöme kule toponec ntarastinek.
Omnye puryo kot ku ani nye oyiye kiyitenyi, ntene miyotyet nye mitowune wule amite ani orit nye yiye.
Oŋnketi kule puryo kiy nye topon nye mite pormwani, omnye nka kot amöce kule nto ayiy kiy nye topon, kupuryo kot omuci kot ayiy.
Puryo kot oyiye kito nye topon nye amöce kule ayiy, ntene owece oŋnkayiy kito nye miyat nyo puryo kot amoce kule nto ayiy.
Kunyo ye oyiye kito nye puryo kot omöce kule nto ayiy, kuporkey kule puryo kot ku ani nye oyiye kiyoto ntene miyotyet nye mitowune wule omite kunye yiye.
Kunyo oköse ani kule yiyisyi ntarastit kuyunyoto. Omnye ye amöce kule ayiy kito nye topon, ku miyotyet pate nye okweye ani.
Oŋerekyini om soponmwani nyepo Muyet ntarastinekap Yiyintet.
Ntene oköse ntarastit nye cone kasoteywekwani, kunyo sutwo oyiku mopusyontet nyepo ntarastitap miyotyet nye mite kwiyisyi om pormwani orit.
Opo! Oyiku ani ci nye kitaŋany koromun! Ŋo nye mosukusorwo om wule mite porto nyi mokusuto wule mite met?

Makaste Yiyintet nye kisorwo kupunte Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo. Kunyo soponto nyimwani nye oponte kunyi. Ani nkit kunye oripe ntarastinekap Yiyintet om kasoteywekwani, oŋnkurok kwiyisyi porto nyimwani kwicini yisyet miyotyet.
Kunyo puryo kot kuponto yawut musanku piko co ponto koyomotet oko Kristo Yesu.
Omnye ntarastit nyepo Muyet Nyetilil nyo sutwec soponto oŋnkoyomec oko Yesu Kristo, kunye kikotyaca ani acone wule mite ntarastitap miyotyet oko met.

Omnye kito nye puryo kot komuce ntarastinek omnye puren porto kunye kikwiy Yiyintet nyoto. Kimutyi Yiyintet miyotyet musankut, omnye kiyok Werinyi nkit nye kiconto porto nye kerkey nyepo cito nye ponto miyotyet sukuŋet kunum miyotyet.
Kikwiy Yiyintet kuyunyoto sukuŋet ciyitita kupoyit manta ntarastinek om wule ce mite acek co cipuri kopurto kuyu wule moktoy Muyet Nyetilil, ntene puryo kot kuyu wule moktoy soponto nyepo porto.

Omnye piko co purtoy soponto kuyu wule moktoy porto kuce poytoy kasoteywekwa tukuk ce möce porto. Nto piko co purtoy soponto kuyu wule moktoy Muyet Nyetilil, kupoytoy kasoteywekwa tukuk ce möce Muyet Nyetilil.
Ye kapayta kasoteywekuk tukuk ce möce porto, kusutu met, ntene ye kapayta kasoteywekuk tukuk ce möce Muyet Nyetilil kuye mesenyoru soponto oko kalyet.
Kunyo yiku cito puniyontetap Yiyintet ye kapayta kasoteywekyi tukuk ce möce porto, omnye puryo kot kurupe neto ntarastinekap Yiyintet, puryo kot kurupe mpo kisic.
Puryo kot komuce koŋerec Yiyintet piko co rupe tukuk ce möce porwonikwa.
Ntene puryo kupoytok akwek porto, poytok Muyet Nyetilil, ye puren om wule omite akwek ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kuponto Muyet Nyetilil, kunye moponto nyoto Kristo.
Ntene ye mitowune Kristo wule omite akwek, nka kot kipok porwonikwok om miyotyet, kusopcotin soponwek nye kicesatak onyolu om wule mite Yiyintet.

Ye mitowune wule omite akwek Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet nyo kiŋet Yesu kotutune met, kuporkey kule nyoto kiŋet Kristo kotutune met kunye mosukukoci soponto porwonikwok cepoku kupunte Muyet Nyetilil nyoto mitowune wule omite akwek.
Kunyo mpo yeya, ceponte pesen puryo kot ku pesento nye yocec porto kule cipur kuyu wule moktoy porto.
Omnye mosopoku ye kurup kapurto nyepo porto. Ntene mososopce ye kapakäc yisyonutek ce möce porto om swametap Muyet Nyetilil.
Lekokap Yiyintet piko tokol co ntocini Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet.

Omnye Muyet Nyetilil nyo kikonok akwek Yiyintet kunye puryo kot kuwecok oyiku mutwor oŋnkomuye, ntene wecok oyiku lekokap Yiyintet. Kunyo citeyi acek om swametap Muyet Nyetilil kule, “Apa’’ Nye mwowu kule, “Papa.’’
Muyet Nyetilil nkit nye mitowune soponwekyacek orit kunye poru kule ciku lekokap Yiyintet.

Kunyo nteye ciku lekokyi; kuporkey kule mosicenyoru kupeyok ce kikonorci neto pikyi, oŋnkunti oko Kristo tukuk ce kikonorci Yiyintet neto. Omnye ye kakeyemnte toŋoŋutek oko Kristo kuye mosiceyemnte mpo woyinto oko neto.
Asoti ani kule toŋoŋutek ce cetoŋonyi acek om pesyosyecu kuce puryo kot cimuce mpo kisic kot ciyoyeke woyinto nye mosiceŋoŋwec acek.
Omnye mite kukoŋisyi koromun tukuk tokol ce kicitany okoy ye mociŋoŋ kutok lekokap Yiyintet.
Omnye kicewosontyi tukuk ce mite koret kwek ce moponto latik, puryo kot omnye kicäm nkit, ntene omnye kicäm Yiyintet nkit, oŋnkurok yec kumite kokenotenyi.
Kule mosicityac pesyet ake koret kucone mutworyontit nye nunat oŋnkunyor woyinto nyewo nyepo lekokap Yiyintet.
Cinket kule mite kosiltos kutoŋonye om mwoninto okoy pesyoni tukuk tokol co kicitany kuyu korko nye möce kucämnkey.

Ntene puryo kot ku tukuk ce kicitany nkit pate, mpo acek co ceponte Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet nye kokotutyet nyepo tayta, kuce cemite mpo acek cerire cekonye ye mokuwecec Yiyintet ciku lekokyi oŋnkusor porwokyacek.
Omnye kisopec om kokenotet nyitenyi pate. Ntene kokenotet nye ceköse kunye puryo kot ku kokenotet nyoto. Omnye ŋo nye muce kuken kiy nye mite kuköse?
Kunyo nteye cikeni acek kito nye puryo ceköse, kuroke cemuytoci ciken kiyoto.

Kuyunyoto Muyet Nyetilil kolyec acek; omnye moceponte swama, puryo kot cinket wule cesomntoy kuyu wule misyinec cesom. Muyet Nyetilil nkit kunye kolyec oŋnkusorwec om wule mite Yiyintet, om ŋalek ce nyikisec koromun ce memuci ci kuŋalal.
Yiyintet nye köse mukuleywek orit kunye nkete wule yunto kasoteywek cepo Muyet Nyetilil. Omnye Muyet Nyetilil kunye kolyoy kuporcini pikap Yiyintet kuyu wule yunto cömisyetap Yiyintet.
Cinket kule yiyisyi Yiyintet topon om kiy ake tokol om wule mite piko co yene neto. Picoto kuco kikur Yiyintet kuyu wule moktoy.
Yiyintet kunye kikwey keny oŋnkutapan pikyi sukuŋet kukerkeyitu oko Werinyi, sukwek Werit poretyet om wule mite mpo mutakwam ce caŋ.
Kunyo kikur Yiyintet piko co kikwey kutapan, nto picoto kikur neto kuce kicesat kunyol om wule mite neto, nto coto kicesat kunyol om wule mite neto kuce kunyor mpo woyinto.
Kunyo moceŋalal cemwowu kulene? Ye mitowune Yiyintet wule ce mite acek, kuŋo nye muce kuporyenec?
Neto nyo kipuryo kot kukalya Werinyi nkit, ntene kukoyto kupo acekto kunye memuce kulene kot kukonec acek tokol oko Werinyi?
Ŋo nye muce kuwosontyi pikap Yiyintet ce kikwey?
Ŋo nye muce kumutyi kulot musankut cekto? Puryo kot ku Kristo Yesu, nyo kime oŋnkotutune met kupoyit manta, kunyo mite yawut kukepure yewutap tay nyepo Yiyintet kuyetyecec acek!
Kunyi ŋo yec nye muce kot kupesyec acek om wule mite cömisyetap Kristo. Muce pa wuyinto? Nto mwoninto? Nto toŋoŋutek? Nto rupet? Nto sirok? Nto kyoran? Nto met?
Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Ce mite miyotyet nyepo kule cepakäcec om pesyo tokol kupo nyito. Ciyitec kuyu kecir ce cemöce wocetil’’
Ntene om coto tokol, cipëlisyi kupoyit manta kupunte neto nyo kicämec.
Omnye oŋnketi ani kupoyit manta kule, nka malaykanik, nto poytoyik alak cepo torot, nto kamukeywek, cepo pesyosyecu, nto cepo pesyosyek cokwoni.
Nka mpo koret torot, nto koret ŋony, puryo kiy nye mite koret nyitenyi kicitany nye muce kenyis kot kupesyec acek om wule mite cömisyet nye kicenyoru acek kipunte Kristo Yesu Mokoryontenyo.
Oŋololi ani ŋalek cepo manta, opoye Kristo nye moperperisyi: Kasoteywekwani ce poytoy Muyet Nyetilil kuce poru kule puryo kot operperisyi.
Oponte nerekwek ce caŋ oko mwoninto nyewo om mukuleymwani.
Omnye aomöce kule cecupo oŋnkocone wule mite Kristo om kaynetap mpo yeyamwani cepo yememwani ce cetupce.
Cekto kuce pikap Israel ce kikwey Yiyintet. Kikwey kwek lekokyi oŋnkunyor woyintap Yiyintet. Kikoci kirotyet oko ntarastinek, ponto mpo sayet nyepo manta, oŋnkikurtoci Yiyintet cekto.
Cekto kuce mucokoronikap mpo kukonyo taman ok oyeny. Kicone Kristo kuyu ci arenyacek. Kante cikasta Yiyintet okokoy okoy okokoy, Yunyoto.
Puryo kot omwowu kule kimokwiyisyi kurtoyetap Yiyintet. Omnye puryo kot kupo piko tokol cepo Israel Yiyintet.
Oŋnkupuryo kot ku lekokap Yiyintet piko tokol ce kesenisyekap Apram. Omnye kimwoci Yiyintet Apram kule, “Kupunte Isaka kuye mesonyoru nyi mucokoronik.’’
Poru ŋalecu lekok co kiceyi kuyu kwak, kuce puryo kot kweku co lekokap Yiyintet, ntene lekok cepo kirotyet kuce ciyite kule mucokoronik cepo manta.
Omnye kikurto Yiyintet om ŋalecu kule, “Mosoketukey ani om pesyet nye kweyat, kunyo mosukuyi Sara werit.’’
Ntene puryo kot ku ŋalecu nkit pate, omnye lekokap Rapeka oyeny kuce kiponto kwan akenke nyoto ku kukonyo Isaka.

Ntene ye kitompo ceyi cekto oŋnkutompo kot kwiy kiy nye topon nto nye miyat, kimwoci Yiyintet Rapeka kule; “Mosukwici Werit nyewo yisyet Werit nye miniŋ’’ Kwiyakay kuyunyoto sukuŋet kutok kupoyit manta kule kweye Yiyintet cito nye kokur nye puryo kot kuyoŋe tukuk ce yiye piko.
Kuyu wulo kicesil kule, “Kyacäm ani Yakopo, ntene asenker Esawu.’’
Kunyo mecemwowu kulene? Mocemwowu kule puryo kot kwiye Yiyintet cepo manta? Puryo kot kuyunyo mpo kisic!
Omnye kimwoci Yiyintet Moses kule, “Mosakalye ani ci tokol nye kakwey, mosarire ci tokol nye kacäm.’’
Kunyo puryo kot ku kito nye möce cito nto nye yiye cito nye ponto latik, ntene kwone pate kokolyoyisyet nyepo Yiyintet nkit.
Omnye mwocini silutekap Yiyintet Farawo kule, “Kyakweyiŋ ani nyi yiku kinko kule sukuŋet oporu kamukeywekwani, oŋnkoporu cinket kaynemwani om koret tokol kumukul.’’
Kunyo rire kukalya Yiyintet ci tokol nye keyen neto.
Kunyo mesemwowo ani akenke om akwek kule “Ye yunyoto, omne yu tokumite kulele Yiyintet cito? Ŋo nye muce kukerekta Yiyintet om kito nye möce?’’
Ntene corwenyu, nyi ku ŋo ci nye muci ŋalal wekyi Yiyintet. Puryo kot kutepe teret cito nyo kikwiy teronoto kule, “Omne seyiya ani nyi kuyunyi?’’
Ntene ponto cito nyo yiye terenik kwiyisye menet kuyu wule moktoy, muce kwiyisye menonoto akenke kwiy terenik oyeny, akenke kunye kyiyisye om sokwonutek, nto ake kunye kyiyisye kwak okokoy.

Kunyo yunyoto kupoyit manta wule kikwiyta Yiyintet. Kimöce kule oporu nyerunotet nyenyi oko kamukeywekyi. Yoto kumuytoci oŋnkukoŋis koromun om wule mite piko ce kinyerci neto, co kiceyiyta kule kyaranta.
Kimöce mpo kule oporu woyinto nyenyi nyo kicekonec acek ciku piko cepo kokolyoyisyenyi, acek coto kuce kikiwiyta neto sukuŋet kunyor woyinto nye nyi.
Omnye acek kuco kicekurec, nye puryo kot ku Yutayek pate nkit, ntene mpo Lamek.
Kuyu wulo mwowu kitaputap Yosiya kule, “Piko ce kipuryo kot ku cikwani, mosokure ani cekto, ‘Pikwani’ Yemet nye kipuryo kot ocöme, Mosokure ani. ‘Cämanenyu’
Nto om wulyo ake tokol wule kicemwocine cekto kule, ‘Puryo kot oyiku pikwani’ ku wuloto wule mosicekure cekto lekokap Yiyintet nye sope.’’
Kunyo kurtoy kumwowu mpo Isaya ŋalek ce nöme Israel kule, “Nka kot ku caŋ pikap Israel cete coŋinto ŋaynet nye mite tapantap ruretyet, ntene tukusic pate ce mokusopco.’’
Omnye mosukuwosontyi Mokoryontet musankut koret om lakwar.
Kerkey oko wulo kiŋor Isaya keny kumwoy kule, “Nto kipuryo kot kupokokwec acek Mokoryontet nyepo kamukeywek tokol kesenisyek, nto kicekerkeyitu Sotom, nto kicekerkeyitu mpo oko Komora.’’
Kunyo mocemwowu ne? Mocemwowu kule Lamek co kipuryo kot kusyeme kule cesatkey cenyolu om wule mite Yiyintet kuce kicesat kunyol om wule neto omnye kiyen.
Nto pikap Israel ce kiceny ntarastit nye sukuŋet kusat cekto kunyol om wule mite Yiyintet kuce mnonyor?
Omne? Omnye kito nye kikwiy kunye puryo kot kunöme koyenet, ntene nöme pate yisyonutek. Yoto kunoc cekto rwantet nyo nokisyi.
Kuyu wulo kicesil om silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Akäs pa, kokoci Siyon rwantet nye noce piko. Rwa nye noce piko koputis; Ntene puryo kot kolilone ci tokol nyo yene neto.’’
Mpo yeya, amöce ani om mukuleymwani kule nto cisop pikwani, osomncini cekto Yiyintet.
Oŋnkonketi kule yweye cekto Yiyintet koromun, ntene puryo kot kucone koyweyisyet nyimwa ŋomnonet nyepo manta.
Omnye tompo kot konket aret wule wektoy Yiyintet kunyol piko om wule mite neto, ntene kusyem cekto aret nyimwa nkit, kunyo puryo kurup cekto aret nyepo Yiyintet nyo säte piko kunyol.
Omnye Kristo kunye woŋntoy ntarastinek sukuŋet kusatakay kunyol om wule mite Yiyintet ci tokol nye kikoyen.
Ŋalek ce kisil Moses ce nöme wule cesotitokey cenyol piko om wule mite Yiyintet ye kacerup ntarastinek kucu kule, “Mosukusop cito nye yiye ŋalek ce mwowu ntarastinek.’’
Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet ce nöme wule cesotitoykey cenyol om wule mite Yiyintet kupunte koyenet kule, “Mente atep kwinyi nkit mwowu kule, ŋo nye mosukuwo torot.’’ Yoto kuye kacesut Kristo kuco ŋony.
Mente mpo atep mwowu kule, “Ŋo nye mosukuwo koret ŋony?’’ (Yoto kuye kocesut Kristo kotutune met.)
Ŋalek ce mwowu kucu kule, “Korikyok akwek lokoywekap Yiyintet om kutuwakwok oko mukuleywekwok orit.’’ Lokoywek coto kuce cemwoytoy acek cepo koyenet.
Omnye ye keŋalal nyi nkit om kutiŋun mwowu kule, Yesu kunye Mokoryontet oŋnkiyen om mukuleyŋuŋ orit kule kiŋet Yiyintet Yesu kotutune met kuye mocisopiŋ.
Omnye om koyenet nyinyacek kuye cesotokisye cenyolu om wule mite Yiyintet. Ye kaceŋalale acek kutuwakyo yoto kuye cisopec.
Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Puryo kot kolilone ci tokol nye kokuyen neto.’’
Omnye puryo kot kumite pciyatet om kwenutap Yutoyin oko Lomin. Mokoryontet akenke kunye Mokoryontet nyepo piko tokol oŋnkukocini kupeyok cepo Mokoryontit piko tokol.
Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Mosicisop ci tokol nye kure kaynetap Mokoryontet.’’
Ntene muce kulene kukur kaynet nyenyi, ye puryo kot kucömis? Komuce cekto kulene kot kuyen ye tompo kot kulim lokoywek? Komuce cekto kulene kulim lokoywek ye puryo cito nye komwoci.
Muce piko kulene kumwaytat lokoywek ye puryo kiyokik ce kiciyokto? Kuyu wolo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet kule; “Toponec koromun kerenkokap cito nyo sutu Lokoywek ce toponec!’’
Ntene puryo kot kuyen piko tokol lokoywek ce toponec. Kimwoy Isaya nkit kule, “Mokoryontet, ŋo nye kicäm Lokoywekyacek?’’
Kunyo coni koyenet ye kacelimnte lokoywek, oŋnkukwoni lokoywek ye kacemwayta lokoywek cepo Kristo.

Nteye katep kule, manta kule puryo kot kulim piko lokoywek? Ntene kilim cekto kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Kiwo polotet nyepo ŋalek cikwa kupunte koret tokol, kipunto ŋalek cikwa wule kiŋet koret.’’

Atep yec kule, kipuryo kot konket pikap Israel? Moses kunye po tayta nye kimwoy kule: “Mosokonok ani acorokyi piko ce puryo kot ku yemet nyepo manta, mosokonok onyerci yemet nye perper nye puryo kot kuponto ŋomnon.’’
Kunyo kinyikan Isaya yo kimwowu kule, “Kinyorwo ani piko ce kipuryo kot kuceŋoto, Kyoporkyikey piko ce kipuryo kot kutepo ani.’’
Ntene kuŋalal ce nöme Israel kumwoy kule: “Kyoyite ani yewuniyek kwani kuwany pesyet tokol, atoroc pic ce kitoyis, ce molimwo.’’
Kunyo katep ani kule, kitay so Yiyintet pikyi? Puryo kot kuyunyo! Oyiku mpo ani Israel, oyiku keseniyantetap Apram, opoye aretap Penyamin.
Puryo kot kutay Yiyintet pikyi ce kikwey ikye keny. Oŋnket akwek ŋalek ce mwowu silutekap Yiyintet ye kiwosontyini Eriya pikap Israel om wule mite Yiyintet kule.
“Mokoryontet, kipakäc cekto workoyik, oŋnkoturpup oteputek ce pele korosek, ani nkit pate akenke nye kwoŋetu, kunyi syeme kule cepakäca.’’
Ntene kuwekyi Yiyintet kumwoci neto ŋolyo ne? Kumwoci kule. “Kwakwey ani pikyu elifunek tisap ce puryo kot kusoye yiyintet nyepo mwiynan Paal.’’
Kunyo yunyoto mpo yawut pesyosyecu, mite piko ce ŋeri ce kikwey Yiyintet om poypoyenyi.
Cone kweyisyet nyenyi poypoyet pate, ntene puryo kot ku tukuk ce kikwiy cekto. Omnye nto kikwiy Yiyintet kupo tukuk ce kikwiy piko; nto puryo kot kupo poypoyet nyenyi manta.
Kunyo ce mwowu ne? Puryo kot kunyor piko cepo Israel kito nye kicenye. Luket nyepo piko ce ŋeri ce kikwey Yiyintet ce kinyor. Kimiŋitu cut alake nye molime kursyetap Yiyintet.
Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Kikoci Yiyintet kuperperitu mukuleywek cikwa, puryo kukäste konyek cikwa, nto mpo kulimnta yitik cikwa okoy pesyoni.’’
Kimwoy Tauti kule: “Roke kwek sokwonutek musatit nye tekat mwenet nye kitany cekto nyo sucini!
Roke kukoryo konyek cikwa sukuŋet mente kot kukästa: mente kot kumuny cekto co kesene terekok ce nyikisec.’’
Kunyo katep kule, kicinoc Yutayek sukuŋet kosuto cekto? Puryo kot kuyunyo! Kiwurta kwiy miyotyet, kunyo kacontyi kosopet Lamek sukuŋent kucorok Yutayek.

Kunyo ye miyotyonik cepo Yutayek kuce kisut mokoryontit om koret tokol, oŋnku miyotyet nyimwa nye kisuto kunye kisutyi kupeyok wule mite lamek. Kunyo kupeyok ce tya nyun ce cetosyini kucaŋit ye keyen Yutayek tokol.
Oŋololwok ani yawut akwek Lamek, oyiku kiyokintet nyepo Lamek, mososilkey om yisyenyu,
sukuŋet asutyi kucorok mpo yeyamwani Yutayek, oŋnkamuc kot osop alak om cekto.
Omnye ye kicetoye cekto, yoto kuye kikwiye koret corwantit oko Yiyintet, kunyo mosukwiy kulene ye kacecäm cekto? Yiku yoto kotutunet nye numu met.

Ye tilil mukatya kereryantet nye kisic nye kocikoci Yiyintet kwek korosek cepo tayta, kutilil mpo mukatyantet tokol kumukul. Nteye tilil tikityantet nyepo ketit nye kocikoci Yiyintet, kutililec mpo sarisyek tokol.

Kiceyepta sarisyek alak cepo ketitap seitunit nyo cipote oŋnkyiyomo kupite sarisyek cepo ketit seitunit nyepo samiyita, Akerkeyekey akwek oko ketit seitunit nyepo samiyita, kunyo omite yawut oyemntoy swamet nyepo soponto nye topon nyepo Yutayek.
Kunyo puryo kot kumisyini onyil piko co kuceyepta kuyu sarisyek. Omuci akwek osilkey kulene? Oyiku sarisyek pate, puryo kot otinye tikityek, tikityek kuce tiyok akwek.
Ntene mesemwowu kule, “Kiceyep sarisyek sukuŋet kutok poroyinto nyimwani.’’
Manta, kiceyepta cekto omnye kipuryo kot kuyen, yoto pure nyi otepto omnye kiyen, ntene mente apurte kasoteywek cepo silotet kupo ŋaleca, ripkey.
Omnye kipuryo kot kwasta Yiyintet Yutayek ce kerkey sarisyek cepo ketit. Soti nyi kule muce kwastiŋ.
Ceköse om ŋaleca kule ponto Yiyintet poypoyet nyewo oŋnkunyeker koromun om wule mite piko co kikosuyto, ntene tala om wule mite nyi ye ketosyikey om poypoyenyi, nteye puryo, mosiceyeptiŋ mpe nyito.
Nteye katay Yutayek kwasta toyisyet nyimwa, mosiceketyi cekto ye kimite. Omnye muce Yiyintet kuketyi cekto ye kimite.

Okerkeye akwek Lamek oko saryantet yepo ketit seitunit nyepo samiyita nye kaceyep oŋnkyiyomo kupite ketit seitunit nye cipote oŋnkurok kupuryo kot kucomntös. Kerkey Yutayek oko ketit seitunit nye cipote, kunyo mosukulekitit koromun ye mokuketyi Yiyintet sarisyek kupite ketimwa nyepo keny.

Mpo yeya, mite ŋalek cewuŋotin cepo manta ce amöce ani kule oŋnket akwek. Omnye mosukuripok nye mosutekey kule ciku ŋomec. Coto kucu kule, puryo kot kopure toyisyet nyepo Israel okokoy, ntene pure pate okoy ye kakwa lamek tokol wule mite Yiyintet.
“Kuyunyoto wule mecisopto pikap Israel tokol, kuyu wulo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet kule: Mosukucone kosopintet Siyon, Mosukunum miyotyonik tokol cepo kesenisyekap Yakopo.
Mosayiy ani kirotyani oko cekto, ye onumu miyotyonikwa.’’
Omnye kitay cekto lokoywek ce toponec, kunyo kikwek Yutayek pikap Yiyintet kupo toponiyemwakwek Lamek. Ntene omnye kikwey Yiyintet cekto, kunyo coronutekyi kupo toponiyetap mpo kukomwa.
Omnye puryo kot kuwec Yiyintet kasoteywekyi om kule ŋo nye kweye neto oŋnkukoci kupeyok.
Ntene akwek Lamek, kyotoye Yiyintet om yun kipo tay, ntene kukalyak yawut Yiyintet omnye kitoyis Yutayek.
Om aret nyeyu nyitenyi nye kicerirenak akwek, kunyo toye Yutayek, yawut Yiyintet sukuŋet kukalya neto mpecekto.
Omnye kiwec Yiyintet piko tokol kwek mopusinek cepo toyisyet kule sukuŋet kuporci kukalya cekto tokol.
Wo koromun mokoryontit nyepo Yiyintet! Wo mpo ŋomnonet nyenyi oko muswokyontit, ŋo nye muce kumwoci neto kito nye mokwiy? Ŋo nye muce kunket arosyekyi?
Kuyu wule mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Ŋo nye nkete kasoteywekap Mokoryontet, Ŋo nye muce kukoci neto ŋomnonet?
Ŋo nye kukoci neto kenyis kiy? Sukuŋet kuket kiyoto.’’
Omnye kitany neto tukuk tokol, kunyo mitowune tukuk tokol kamukeywekyi. Kopurune woyinto wule mite Yiyintet okokoy. Yunyoto.

Kunyo osomok ani akwek mpo yeya, om poypoyetap Yiyintet nyewo nye kikonec kule okoyte porwonikwok kwek korosek ce tililec om wule mite Yiyintet. Oyiyisye yisyonutekyi ce ŋerece neto. Nyoto kunye sayet nyepo manta nye roke osoye akwek.
Monte cecäm soponto nyepo koret; nyepo pintap pesyosyecu. Ntene ayaste kuwec Yiyintet kasoteywekwok cepo orit sukuŋet oŋnket cömisyetap Yiyintet nye topon oŋnkoŋerec neto kupoyit manta.

Oŋololwok ani akwek tokol om kupeyok ce kikono Yiyintet. Ntene asoti kule puryo kot kuroke kusutkey ci ake tokol om akwek kusirte ye misyini. Möce kusot ci tokol kwine nkit wule tento koyenet nye kikoci Yiyintet.
Ceponte kereryanik wok ce caŋ om porto akenke, ntene oŋnkuponto kereryantet ake tokol yisyet nye yiye.
Kuyunyoto om wule ce mite acek nka kot ciku caŋ, ntene ciku akenke om koyomotet oko Kristo, Omnye kiciyomec tokol ciku akenke kuyu wulo yunto porto.
Kunyo roke ciyisye kokotutekyacek ce pciyotin kuyu wule yunto kupeyok ce kikonec Yiyintet. Ye kicekonec acek kokotutyet nye cemwoytoy lokoywek, kumisyini ciyisye kuyu wolo yunto koyenet nye ceponte.
Nteye kule kyiy yisyonutek, kumisyini kyiyisye. Nteye kule cinetisyi, kumisyini cinetisye.

Nteye kule cititiri piko alak, kumisyini kyiy kuyunyoto. Nto ci ake tokol nye pcicini piko alak tukuk, kumöce kule kupciyta nyoto ce yeme. Nto cito nye ponto kamukeywek; kumöce nyoto kwiyisye swama; nto cito nyo kolyoyisyi kumisyini kwiyis nyoto om ŋerekwek.
Misyini kupoyit cömisyet manta. Asenker miyotyet, oŋnkorip pate kiy tokol nye topon.
Ocämnkey akwek kwakwek nkit kuyu mpo yeya ce tupco, oŋnkuywey ci ake tokol citake.
Oyiyisye swama, monte cepuren. Oyici Mokoryontet yisyet om mukuleyto akenke.
Kukonok koyenet nyimwoŋ ŋerekwek, omuytoci om ŋerekwek, oŋnkosome okokoy.
Opcici tukuk piko cepo Yiyintet co moponto kiy, oŋerekyi atoroc om korikwok toyek ce mukulec konyek.
Osomnci kupeyok piko co toŋonyok, osomnci kupesyok ntene monte cecup.
Oŋerece oko piko co mite kuŋerec, omesye oko co mite kumesyi.
Opurte kasoteywek cepo moyet akenke akwek kwakwek nkit, monte cesilekey, ntene ocäm yisyonutek co cenyile, monte cesutkey kule ciku ŋomec.
Ye kokwiwuŋ citake miyotyo monte ceyokune miyotyet ake. Oyiye tukuk ce toponec ce cöme piko tokol.
Oyiy akwek nkit kiy ake tokol nye mukoktos sukuŋet opurte kalyet oko piko tokol.
Coronutekwani, monte ceyokukey, ntene ayaste kwiy co pate nyerunotet nyepo Yiyintet, omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Mosoyoku ani, ani nye Mosoketu.’’
Ntene ayiy kuyu wolo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Ye ponto puniyontet nyeŋuŋ rupet, ipay, ye ponto melelya, ikoci peko. Omnye ye keyiy kuyunyoto, kukerurukyi metit nyenyi oŋonyntit nyepo nesek’’
Monte kupëlok miyotyet, ntene oyiyisye toponiyet sukuŋet opël miyotyet.
Misyini kuywey ci tokol poytoyik cepo koret. Omnye kwone kamukeywek tokol wule mite Yiyintet. Kunyo konu Yiyintet poytoyik co yiyisyi yawut.
Ci tokol nye katay poytoyik ce yiyisyi yawut, kukatay cito nyoto piko co kikwey Yiyintet, nto cito nye kayiy kuyunto kukomutyikey neto nyoto musankut nkit.
Omnye puryo kot kumuye piko ce toponec poytoyik cepo koret, ntene muytos piko co miyotec. Ye memöce nyi kule amuye poytoyik kumöce kule yiy ce toponec, mosukukastiŋ nyi cekto.

Omnye mutworintetap Yiyintet neto nye yiyisyi kupo toponiyet nyeŋuŋ. Ye keyiy ŋalek ce miyotec, kuroke muyi om wule mite neto, omnye po manta kamukeywek kupiriŋ nyi. Neto kunye mutworintetap Yiyintet, kunyo yiyisye nerekwekap Yiyintet om wule mite piko co miyotec.
Möce aywey poytoyik co ponto kamukeywek, nye puryo ku kule omnye nerec Yiyintet, ntene omnye nketi nyi nkit om ŋomnoneŋuŋ.
Kuyunyoto omne sokweye akwek mosoret, omnye yiye poytoyik yisyetap Yiyintet ye yiye yisyemwa.
Kunyo okwecini tukuk ce yoce cekto. Okwey mosoret, okweye mosoret nyepo mosonok oŋnkaywey piko tokol cewoyec.
Monte cipurte pesen nyepo citake ntene acämnkey akwek nkit, ci ake tokol nye kacäm latyenyi kunye iyititoy cicoto ntarastinek.
Omnye ntarastinecu kule, “Mesekwayan, meporisye, mecorsye, mecoroku.’’ Kuce yomntos kwek ntarastit akenke nye mwowu kule, “Misyini kucäm cito latyenyi kuyu wulo cömntoykey nyi nkit.’’
Ye kucäm cito latyenyi kupuryo kot komuce yici miyotyo. Kunyo ye kokecömis kuye kaciyitita ntarastinek tokol.
Misyini ayiy kuyunyoto omnye oŋnket akwek sawet kule kopunto pesyosyek, oŋetye rwonto omnye kolekitit yawut ye mocisopec kusir wule kicisotitoy acek kunyo.
Kapok menonet, kayec koret kwek pet, okany kyaste mokyiyisyi yisyet nyepo menonet, okany cenäm Karik cepo poryet nye ceporye wule mite lakweyet.
Okany cepesetate kuyu piko cepo lakweyet nyepo pet kwen, nye puryo kot ceŋerece tumwonik ce miyotec oko pokitet, nto sakwayanatet, oko syepisyet, oko wokutyet oko corokyinotet.
Ntene alac Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo, kwek loŋet, ayaste monte cisot tukuk ce corokyini porwonikwok.
Atoroc opurcine oko cito nye moponto swamet om koyenet. Ntene mente cetintentyine oko neto om ŋalek cepo kasoteywekyi nkit.
Ponto citake koyenet nye muce kwam kiy ake tokol, ntene kuponto citake yec koyenet nye puryo kot kupo swama, kwome nyoto nkuyek pate.
Puryo kot kuroke kunyil nyo ome kiy ake tokol nyo puryo kot kwome, oŋnkupuryo kot kuroke kumut musankut cito nyo ome nkuyek pate kumutyi nyo ome kiy ake tokol. Omnye kicäm Yiyintet mpene cito nyoto.
Nyi ku ŋo nye muci kot mutyi musankut mutworintetap cito ake. Ntene Mokoryontenyi nye mosukupor kule yonye nto mosukosuto cito, kunyo muce kuyo omnye mokoryontet kunye keyoŋnto neto.
Sote cito ake kule pesyo nyewo koromun pesyet akenke kupël pesyosyek alak, kusote citake yec kule kerkey pesyosyek tokol. Roke kukwilakay ci tokol om kasoteywekyi.

Ci tokol nye ripe topon pesyet akenke, kwiye nyo kuyunyoto om koyweyisyet nye yweye Mokoryontet. Ci tokol nye ome kiy ake tokol, kwiye nyoto kuyunyoto om koyweyisyet nye yweye Mokoryontet, omnye kostoy neto Yiyintet, ci tokol nye katay nye puryo kot kwome tukuk alak, kwiye nyoto kuyunyoto om koyweyisyet nye yweye Mokoryontet, omnye kostoy Yiyintet om omik.
Omnye puryo ci mpo akenke om acek nye sope kwine nkit, oŋnkupuryo nye me kwine nkit.
Ye ce soptosi acek, kupo Yiyintet nkit, nteye kocepoku kukocepeku kupo Mokoryontet. Kunyo ye cesoptosi nto ye kacepoku cepoye Mokoryontet.
Omnye kime Kristo oŋnkotutune met sukuŋet kwek Mokoryontet nyepo piko ce soptos oko ce kipok.
Kunyo omne semutyi nyi yeyaŋuŋ musanku, nyi nyo iyome nkuyek pate? Omne senyil nyi yeyaŋuŋ nyi nyo iyome kiy ake tokol? Mosiciyoŋe acek tokol taytap Yiyintet sukuŋet kumutwec musankut.
Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Mwowu Mokoryontet kule, Ayiku Yiyintet nye Sopot, Mosukukutuŋe ci tokol taymwani, Mosukuŋalal ci tokol kumwoy kule, Oyiku ani Yiyintet.’’
Kunyo mosukoyit ci ake tokol om acek tukuk ceci koyityi Yiyintet.
Kunyo akente kyaste mocemutyinikey musankunek. Ntene möce asot kule mente teyiy kiy nye muce kot kunoc yeyaŋuŋ nto kuwec kusuci miyotyet.

Koyomotet nye oponte ani oko Mokoryontet Kristo kunye kikono oŋnket kupoyit manta kule toponec omik tokol. Ntene ye cöme cito ake kule puryo kot kutoponec omik tokol, kuporkey kule puryo kot kutoponec omik coto om wule mite cicoto.
Ye komwontyi yeyaŋuŋ om kito nye iyome nyi kuporkey kule puryo kot yiyisye nyi cömisyet. Kunyo mente ayaste kot kowurta omik ce iyome nyi cito nye kimeci Kristo!
Mente ayaste kot kunyor kaynet nye miyat tukuk ce kure nyi kule toponec
Omnye poytoyisyetap Yiyintet kunye puryo kot kunömekey oko tukuk ce kyome nto ce ceye, ntene nömekey pate oko tililinto oko kalyet oko ŋerekwek ce konu Muyet Nyetilil.
Kunyo ci tokol nye yicini Kristo yisyet om aret nyeyu nyitenyi kunye nyoru cömisyetap Yiyintet oŋnkucämnta ci tokol neto.
Kunyo möce cetyikyini acek okokoy tukuk ce sutu kalyet, oŋnkyikalyekey acek kwacek nkit.
Monte ciwurte kwaran yisyet nyepo Yiyintet kukesac omit pate. Möce kyam omik wok tokol, ntene miyat ye kakyam kiy nye muce kowurta citake kot kosuci miyotyo.
Kunyo pëlisyi ye kacetay mokyam peny, nto ceye komek nto kyiy mpo kiy ake tokol nye sutyini kosuto yeyaŋuŋ.
Rip koyenet nye ponte kwek nye nketi nyi nkit oko Yiyintet. Ponto kupeyoy cito nye puryo kot kumutyinikey musanku ye mite kwiye ŋalek ce nkete nkit kule po manta!
Nteye mune neto omik ce ome, kumutyini Yiyintet neto musankut ye kam omnye puryo kot kunömekey oko koyenet nyenyi. Nto kiy ake tokol nye puryo kot kunömekey oko koyenet kunye miyotyo nyoto.
Roke ceponte acek swamet om koyenet sukuŋet cikalye piko co moponto swamet cetorci terekokwa. Puryo kot kuroke ciŋereckey acek kwacek nkit.
Ntene misyini ci ake tokol om acek kuŋerec mpo yeyanyi sukuŋet kukalya om koyenet nyimwa.
Omnye kipuryo kot kuŋereckey Kristo nkit, ntene kikwiy kuyu wulo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Kitica ani cupisyet nyo ŋolole piko co cupiŋ nyi.’’
Omnye ŋolyo ake tokol nye kicesil keny om silutekap Yiyintet kunye kicesil sukuŋet kunetec acek, sukuŋet cikenisye, oŋnkyemuytoci oŋnkyetitir ye cesumoni silutekap Yiyintet.
Kunyo kante kukonok akwek Yiyintet nyepo muytocinotet oko kotitirotet, sukuŋet onyoru akwek kwakwek nkit kasoteywek ce kerkey, ye korup wule yunto Yesu Kristo.
Saŋet oyiku kutit akenke, akaste Yiyintet oŋnku kwanitap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
Kunyo oŋerekyinikey akwek kwakwek nkit kupo woyinto nyepo Yiyintet, kuyu wulo kicämak Kristo.
Omnye komwowok ani kule kikwek Yesu Mutworintetap Yutayek sukuŋet kupor kule kiyitita Yiyintet kupoyit manta kurtoyutek ce kimwoci neto mpo kukonyo.
Sukuŋet komuc Lamek kukasta Yiyintet om poypoyenyi kuyu wolo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Kunyo mosakastiŋ ani nyi om wule mite Lamek. Mosotum akaste kayneŋuŋ’’
Kumwoy yec kule: “Aŋerec Lamek oko pikap Yiyintet ce kweyotin!’’
Kumwoy yec kule: “Akaste Mokoryontet akwek Lamek tokol. Akaste koromun akwek piko tokol!’’
Mwowu mpo Isaya yec kule: “Mosukuco keseniyantetap Yese; nye mosukuŋet kupayta Lamek; mosukukenekey cekto neto.’’
Kunyo akente kukonok akwek Yiyintet nyepo kokenotet ŋerekwek tokol, oko kalyet kupunte koyenemwoŋ nye oponte om wule mite neto, sukuŋet kutosyikey kuner koyenet nyimwoŋ om swametap Muyet Nyetilil.
Mpo yeya, oŋnket ani kule oponte akwek toponiyet nyewo koromun, oŋnketi kule oponte ŋomnonet tokol; kunyo omuci anetkey akwek kwakwek nkit.
Ntene om parwani kosilwok om nyikanatet ŋalek ce kasotwok. Kwoyiyisye kuyunyoto om kamukeywek ce kikono Yiyintet.

Oyiku mutworintetap Yesu Kristo nye oyiyisyi om wule mite Lamek. Oyiyisyi kuyu tisintet ye omwoytoy lokoywek ce toponec ce kwone wule mite Yiyintet; sukuŋet kwek Lamek kokotutyet nye cömntoy Yiyintet, oŋnkusat Muyet Nyetilil.
Kunyo om koyomotet nye oponte om Yesu Kristo, omuci osilkey om yisyet nyepo Yiyintet.
Mosaŋalale om nyikanatet ŋalek pate ce kikwiy Kristo kupunte wule amite ani antoci Lamek kuywey Yiyintet om ŋalek oko yisyonutek.
Om swamet nye kicipor om pelutok cepo kakitat oko om swametap Muyet Nyetilil. Kunyo om poninek kuceke Yerusalem okoy Iluriko. kyamwaytate okoy awany lokoywek ce toponec ce nöme Kristo.
Ŋolyontet nye amöce ani kwak okokoy kunye amöce kule amwaytate lokoywek ce toponec om wule tompo kot kulim piko ŋalek cepo Kristo, nye puryo kot amöce kule otosyi yisyet nye kicece cito ake.
Kuyu wulo Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Mosukukäs piko ce kitompo kot cemwoci Lokoywekyi, Mosukonket piko ce tompo kot kulim mpo kisic.’’
Om ŋolyontoni, kucekerekta ani aret ce caŋ ye maco orutocok akwek.
Ntene omnye kwawany yawut yisyonutekwani om komosta nyitenyi, oŋnkurok kyamac kuloyit kule aco wule omite akwek.
Mosayiy kuyunyoto yawut amöce kule cekäsak akwek om poninekwani ye otile oweti Supaniya. Amöce kule akalya ani akwek opunte wuloto, om letut ye kocipur oko akwek om ŋerekwek pesyos ce ŋeri.
Ntene yawut pakenke amite ani oweti Yerusalem om yisyetap Yiyintet nyepo piko cepo wuloto .
Omnye kucäm nkit pikap Yiyintet cepo Meketoniya oko Akaya kule cikalye cikoci kokotutek pikap Yiyintet pononik ce mite Yerusalem.

Kucäm cekto nkit, ntene ŋalek cepo manta kucu kule, ponto cek pesento kule misyini kukalye cekto pononik omnye pcicintos Yutayek oko Lamek kupeyok cepo soponto nyetilil, kunyo misyini kukalya cekto Yutayek om tukuk cepo porto.
Ntene ye kawany ani yisyet nyitenyi ye kokoci cekto pesanik tokol ce kicirurukyi, mosonomen poninek coto.
Oŋnketi kule ye kaco wule omite akwek mosoconte kupeyok tokol cepo Kristo.
Osomok ani akwek mpo yeya om Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo oko om cömisyet nye konu muyet kule ciyomekey oko ani. Oŋnkosomwo Yiyintet koromun.
Osomwo oripokisye topon om wule piko ce puryo kuyen cepo Yuteya, oŋnkucäm piko ce mite Yerusalem yisyet nyimwani.
Kunyo mosaco wule mite akwek oponte ŋerekwek ce caŋ ye kacäm Yiyintet, oŋnkuŋerekyi tontonet nye topon om wule omite akwek.
Kante Kopur Yiyintet nyepo kalyet oko akwek tokol. Yunyoto.
Kaporwok ani akwek yeyanyo Foipe nye kokolyoyintet nyepo pikap Yiyintet ce mite Kenkeriya.
Atoroc neto om kaynetap Mokoryontet kuyu wulo roke kwiyta pikap Yiyintet. Akalye om kakalyayet ake tokol nye möce. Omnye kukakalya neto piko ce caŋ oŋnkukalya mpo ani nkit.
Osupoywo ani Prisika oko Akwila, ce kikyiyisyi tokol yisyetap Yesu Kristo.
Cekto kuce kikoyto soponwek cikwa kusorwo ani. Okostoy cekto koromun nye puryo ku ani nkit, ntene kostoy mpo pikap Yiyintet tokol cepo Lamek.
Osupoywo mpo pikap Yiyintet ce rurukyinikey kot nyimwa. Osupoywo corwemwani nye ocöme koromun Epaineto. Neto kunye cito nye kinyosyo kuyen Kristo om koretap Asia.
Osupoywo Mariyam nye kikwiyis yisyet nyewo koromun om wule omite akwek.
Osupoywo Antroniko oko Yunia pikwani ce Yutayek ce kicepontekey tokol om mopusi. Kicinket cekto koromun om wule mite Kiyokik. Cekto kuce kunyosyo kwek Kristayek kutompo kot oyiku ani.
Osupoywo Ampliato nye corwemwani koromun om Mokoryontet.
Osupoywo Urpano nye kyiyisyi tokol yisyet nyepo Kristo oko Staku nye corwemwani koromun.
Osupoywo Apele nye kicinket kule po manta koyenet yenyi om wule mite Kristo. Osupoywo pikap Yiyintet cepo kotap Aristopulo.
Osupoywo Erotiyana nye Yutoyin oko mpo yeya Kristayek cepo kaytap Narkisi.
Osupoywo Trufena oko Trufosa ce yiyisyi yisyetap Mokoryontet, oko corwemwani Perusi, nye kikwiy yisyet nyewo nyepo Mokoryontet.
Osupoywo Rupo cito nye tokunot om Mokoryonetet, oko kamet nye kisuto ani kuyu Werinyi.
Osupoywo Asunkrito oko Plekon oko Erme oko Patropa, oko Erima oko mpo Yeya Kristayek alak tokol ce pontokey oko cekto.
Osupoywo Filoloko oko Yulia oko Nereya oko cekwam, oko Olumpa oko piko tokol cepo Yiyintet cepontokey oko cekto.
Asupaykey akwek nkit oŋaŋutkey kuyu mpo yeya. Kesupayak akwek pikap Yiyintet tokol cepo Kristo.
Mpo yeya, konkolonwok ani kule, oripkey koyenet nyepo piko, co toye konetisyet nyo kicinet cekto, oripkey pico.

Omnye puryo kot kwicini yisyet Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo piko ce yiye ŋaleca, ntene poye pate mucesta nyimwa nkit. Omnye perpere cekto kumas kasoteywekap piko ce moponto ŋolyo; kwiyisye ŋalekwa ce ŋerekyini piko.

Kilim ci ake tokol koyenet nyimwoŋ nyepo lokoywek ce toponec, kunyo oyiku ani ŋerekat om wule omite akwek. Amoce kule oŋomekitu om kiy ake tokol nye topon, oŋnkumöce kule opur nye moponte lelis nyepo miyotyet.
Nto Yiyintet nye lukune kalyet nyinyacek kunye mosukoturpup Setanit kopurune kerenkokwok ŋony. Opurte akwek poypoyet nyepo Mokoryontet Yesu.
Kesupayak akwek Timosewo nye kyiyisyi acek tukway yisyet, kunyo kesupayak mpo Lukio oko Yason, oko Sosipatro ce Yutayek cekto.
Ani Tertiyo nye kusile parwani, kasupayak om Mokoryontenyo.
Kesupayak akwek Kayo nye apurune ani kanyi oŋnku konyi kunye rurukyinikey pikap Yiyintet. Kesupayak Erasto konorintet nyepo pesanikap moŋet oko yeyanyo Kwarto.
[Kunyo opurte akwek tokol poypoyetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo. Yunyoto]
Akante cikaste cikoci Yiyintet woyinto. Muce neto kukonok akwek okwilokisye om koyenet, kuyu wule yunto lokoywek ce toponec om kenyisyek co kitil.
Kunyo yawut, kucipor kutok ŋalecutecu kupunte silutekap workoyik oko wule mwoytoy Yiyintet nye mopoku, kuciporci yawut yemosyek tokol, sukuŋet kuyen oŋnkuyweyis.
Kupoyit woyinto Yiyintet nye neto nkit kunye ŋom kupunte wule mite Yesu Kristo okokoy oko okokoy. Yunyoto.
Cone parwani wule amite ani Paulo nye kicekur kwek Kiyokintetap Yesu Kristo om cömisyetap Yiyintet, oŋnkucone wule mite yeyanyo Sosene.

Casilyini pikap Yiyintet cepo Korinso, piko tokol ce kicekur kwek pikap Yiyintet cetililec om koyomotet oko Yesu Kristo, wanak oko piko tokol ce mite wulyo ake tokol ce kure kaynetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo, nye Mokoryontemwa oŋnku Mokoryontenyacek.
Kante kukonok Yiyintet Papanyo oko Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo poypoyet oko kalyet.
Okostoy ani okokoy Yiyintenyu om wule amite akwek, omnye kikonok neto poypoyet kupunte Yesu Kristo.
Omnye koyomet nye oponte akwek oko Kristo kunye kukonok mokoryontit nyepo tukuk tokol, kupontokey wanak oko ŋalalet tokol oko ŋomnonet tokol.
Kikwilokis koromun om wule omite akwek lokoywek ce nöme Kristo,
nye puryo kot omuytoy monyoru kupeyok tokol ye tomite okonye ciŋoŋ Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
Mosukuripok kukwilak kuyunyoto okoy pesyet nyepo letut, sukuŋet otoku nye puryo kot oponte lelis om pesyetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
Yiyintet kunye cikosekey, nyoto kunye kikurok akwek oyomekey oko Werinyi Yesu Kristo Mokoryontenyo.

Osomok ani akwek mpo yeya om kamukeywekap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo kule, ocömncine tokol om ŋalek ce oŋolole sukuŋet komo kumite pciyatet om wule omite akwek nkit. Ntene oyomekey tokol wanak om kasoteywontet akenke oŋnkotyikyi ŋolyo akenke.
Mpo yeya, kumwowo ani kupoyit manta piko alake cepo kaytap Klowe kule oponte akwek wokutyet om kwenumwoŋ.

Ŋolyontet nye omwowu kunyi kule, mwowu citake tokol om akwek ŋolyontet nye pciyat. Mwowu ake kule, “Opoye ani Paulo.’’ Kumwoy ake kule, “Opoye ani Apolo.’’ Kumwoy ake kule, “Apoye ani Kefa.’’ Kumwoy ake kule, “Opoye ani Kristo.’’
Pciyat pa Kristo? “Paulo kunye kimecok akwek om Murtowontet? Kicepatisanak akwek oyiku konomikap Paulo?’’
Okostoy ani yiyintet omnye kipuryo kot apatisan ci ake tokol om akwek, tos pate Krispo oko Kayo.
Kunyo puryo ci nye muce kumwoy kule kicepatisana om kaynetap Paulo.
(Ntene kasotyi yec kule kyapatisan ani Stefana oko pikap kanyi, ntene puryo kot omuci kot asot kule kyapatisan yec citake.)

Kipuryo kot kuyokto ani Kristo wepotisonisye, ntene kiyokto wamwayte lokoywek ce toponec, oŋnkamwayte nye puryo kot oyiyisye ŋomnonet nyepo piko sukuŋet mente kot kupokune swamet metap Kristo om murtowontet.
Omnye lokoywek ce nöme metap Kristo om murtowontet kuce sute piko co mite kupotos kule perperyo pate. Ntene cesute acek cu cemite cisopec kule swametap Yiyintet.
Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule; “Mosayarante ani ŋomnonetap piko co ŋomec, mosonumu kasoteywekap piko co muswokik.’’
Kunyo poru ŋaleca kule, mite ono piko ce ŋomec nto muswokik? Nto kirwokik ce ŋomec cepo koroni? Kukupor Yiyintet kule perperyo pate ŋomnonet nyepo koroni.

Omnye kikwiy Yiyintet kuwuyit nye puryo kot komuce konket piko neto om ŋomnonet nye nyimwa nkit. Ntene kicäm Yiyintet kule osop piko ce yene kwiyisye, ŋolyontoni. “Perperyet’’, coto ku lokoywek cu cemwoytoy acek.
Möce Yutayek cepo kakitat kule sicinket cepo manta, kucenye lamek ŋomnonet.
Cemwoytoy acek Kristo nye kimeci murtowontet, lokoywek coto kuce konokut om wule mite Yutayek oŋnkwek perperyo om wule mite lamek.
Ntene om wule mite piko co kikur Yiyintet nka Yutayek nto lamek, lokoywekyu ku Kristo nye neto kunye swamet nyepo Yiyintet oŋnku ŋomnonet nyepo Yiyintet.
Omnye kito nye porukey kuyu perperyetap Yiyintet, kunye ŋomnon nyoto kupël ŋomnonetap piko. Nto kito nye porukey kuyunye purenotatap Yiyintet kunye ponto swamet kupël swamet nyepo piko.

Mpo yeya, möce asot yawut wule kyoyunte akwek yo kikurok Yiyintet. Kuyu wule yunto sopontap koret, kipuryo kot oyiku ŋomec alake om akwek. Kipuryo kot oponte kamukeywek alake om akwek, kipuryo kot ciyweyok oyiku tokunotin alake om akwek.

Ntene kikwey Yiyintet tukuk cesute koret kupoyit perperyo sukuŋet kusornen piko co ponto ŋomnonet. Kikwey Yiyintet tukuk co sute piko kule puryo kot kuponto swamet sukuŋet kosornen piko co ponto swama.
Kikwey Yiyintet tukuk co cetoye oŋnkyenyile om koret, mpo ce puryo kot kutoku, sukuŋet kwaranta tukuk co sute koret kule ponto latik.
Poru ŋalecu kule puryo ci mpo akenke nye muce kot kusilkey om taytap Yiyintet.
Ntene kikoyomok akwek Yiyintet oko Kristo Yesu, kunyo kikwey Yiyintet Kristo kwek ŋomnonet nyinyacek, omnye kisatec acek cenyolu om wule mite Yiyintet. Kiciku pikap Yiyintet, kunyo kicityacec.
Kunyo kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Ye möce ci ake tokol kule osilkey kumisyini kusilekey kito nye kikwiy Mokoryontet.’’
Mpo yeya, yo kyoconi ani wule omite akwek comwowok ŋalekap Yiyintet cepo manta ce woŋotin, kipuryo kot oyiyisye yoto ŋalek ce koyec oko ŋomnonet nyewo.
Omnye yo kicepontekey kyasot kule ayutye kiy ake tokol oŋnkasot Yesu Kristo nkit oko menyi nye kimeci mortowontet.
Kipuryo kot oponte swama ye kicepontekey ntene kyapotoni pate om muyotet.
Kunyo ŋalalemwani oko lokoywek ce kyomwowu kuce kipuryo kot kupo polot nyepo ŋomnon nyepo cito. Ntene kiporu kupoyit manta swametap Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet.
Kunyo puryo kuroke kopurune koyenet nyimwoŋ ŋomnonet nyepo cito, ntene kopurune swametap Yiyintet.
Ntene oŋololi ani ŋalek cepo ŋomnon ye oŋololyini piko co kikilyo om koyenet, ntene puryo kot ku ŋomnon nyepo koroni nto swamet nyepo poytoyik cepo koroni ce mite yawut kucucucktoy kupoku.
Ŋomnonet nye oŋololi kunye ŋomnonet nyepo Yiyintet nye wuŋat om wule mite piko, nye kikwey Yiyintet keny kupoyit woyinto nyinyacek. Kikwiy kunyo mpo kutompo citany koret.
Puryo mpo akenke om poytoyik cepo koroni nye nkete ŋomnonet nyitenyi. Nto yunye kikikonket nto kipuryo kot kuwuyitoci cekto neto murtowontet.
Ntene kuyu wulo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Tukuk ce tompo kot kukäs koŋnta kenyis, nto kulim yitik, tompo kusot mukuleytap cito, tukuk coto kuce kikwiytoci Yiyintet piko co cöme cekto neto.’’
Ntene kikoporwec acek Yiyintet ŋalekyi ce wuŋotin kwiyisye Muyenyi Nyetilil. Cenye Muyet Nyetilil kiy ake tokol nka mpo nye wuŋat om wule mite Yiyintet.
Omnye ŋo nye nkete kasoteywekap cito, tos pate Muyet nye mite soponto nyenyi orit. Kuyunyoto Muyet Nyetilil kunye nket ŋalek tokol ce nöme Yiyintet.
Kunyo puryo kot cenyoru acek muyetap soponto nyepo koret, ntene kicekonec Muyet Nyetilil nye cone wule mite Yiyintet, sukuŋet cinket kokotutek tokol ce kikonec Yiyintet.
Kunyo puryo kot ceŋololi acek ciyiyisye ŋalek ce kinet ŋomnonet nyepo cito, ntene om ŋalek cepo manta ce kinet Muyet Nyetilil, ye ce mite ceŋolyini piko co ponto Muyet Nyetilil.
Puryo kot kunyoru cito nye moponto Muyet Nyetilil kokotutek ce kwone wule mite Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet. Puryo kot kunkete, sute kuyu perperyo pate, omnye nkete pate latik cikwa nkit.
Muce cito nye ponto Muyet Nyetilil kunket latik cepo kiy ake tokol, ntene puryo ci mpo akenke nye muce konket wule yunto neto.
Kuyu wule mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet kule; “Ŋo nye nkete kasoteywekap Mokoryontet? Ŋo nye muce kukoci neto ŋomnonet?’’ Kunyo ceponte acek kasoteywekap Kristo.
Kunyo mpo yeya, kipuryo kot oŋololwok ani kuyu piko ce ponto Muyet Nyetilil nyoto, ntene kyoŋololwok kuyu piko cepo koroni, ce lekoy ce minkec om koyenet om wule mite Kristo.
Kyapayenak ani ceko ntene nye puryo kot ku omik ce wuyec, omnye kitompo kot ayem akwek, kunyo nka mpo yawut tompo kot ayem.
Omnye topuri kuyu piko cepo koroni. Ye tokumite corokyinotet om kwenumwakwek, oŋnkowokutosi akwek kwakwek nkit kupuryo kot kuporu coto kule oyiku piko cepo koroni cepurtoy kopurto nyepo koret?
Ye mwowu akenke om akwek kule, “Apoye ani Paulo’’ Kumwoy ake kule: “Apoye ani Apolo’’ Kupuryo ne kot oyiyisyi akwek kuyu piko cepo koret?
Ntene Apolo ku ŋo? Nto Paulo ku ŋo? Ciku acek pate mutworikap Yiyintet ce kintowok sukuŋet oyen. Yiye ci ake tokol om acek yisyet nye kikoci Yiyintet.
Ani kunye kyakole kupuswontet. Apolo kunye kipise peko kupuswontet.
Ntene Yiyintet nye kikoci kupit. Kunyo puryo kot ku nyewo koromun cito nyo kole, nto mpo nyo pise peko. Yiyintet nyewo omnye neto kunye kocini kupit.
Kerkey kwoyecin cito nyo kole oko nyo pisisyi, ntene mosukukoci Yiyintet ci ake tokol om acek kuyu wule yunto yisyet nyo kikwiy.
Omnye ciku acek piko ce kyicintosi om yisyet nyepo Yiyintet oyiku akwek mparenikap Yiyintet oŋnkoyiku koto nyenyi.
Kuyu wule yunto kokotutyet nye kikono ani, kunyo kyacec yisyet nyepo tekset kuyu cito nye ŋom, kunyo mite citake kutece kutosyi, ntene misyini kurip ci ake tokol wule tektoy.
Omnye puryo komuce citake kucec yisyet ake kusir yisyet akenke nyepo manta nyo kicece, nyoto ku Yesu Kristo.
Mosukutec piko alake koto kwiyisye Saput nto karin nyelel, nto rwontok ce piciyec, kwiyisye alak ketik nto suswek nto solik.
Kunyo mosicekäs toponiyet nyepo yisyet nyepo ci tokol om pesyet nye cone Kristo. Omnye pesyet nyoto kunye mosukuŋoŋ yisyo nyepo ci tokol, mosukusyem mata kupor wule yunto toponiyet nye ponto.
Ye kemukta mata yisyet nye kikwiy cito, mosukukoci cicoto kokotutyet.
Ntene ye kalay kupok yisyet nye kikwiy cito mosukupot yisyonoto, ntene oŋnkyisop neto kuyu nye kacilil kupunte mata.
Oŋnket akwek kupoyit manta kule, oyiku akwek kotap Yiyintet, kunyo minye Muyet Nyetilil mukuleywekwok orit!
Ye karanta kowurta citake kotap Yiyintet, mosukwaranta Yiyintet cicoto, omnye tilil kotap Yiyintet. Kunyo oyiku akwek kotap Yiyintet.
Puryo kot kuroke kuperperkey citake nkit, ye sote citake om akwek kule oyiku ŋom, kuyu wule yunto kopurto nyepo koret, kuroke kuweckey kuperperit sukuŋet kuŋomit kupoyit manta.
Omnye kiy ake tokol nye sute koret kule po ŋomnon, kunye perperyo pate nyoto om taytap Yiyintet. Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Tëce Yiyintet piko ce ŋomec om ŋomnonemwa.’’
Kumwowu yec silutekap Yiyintet alak kule: “Nkete Yiyintet kule puryo kot kuponto latik kasoteywek cepo piko ce ŋomec.’’
Kunyo puryo ci nye misyini kusilkey om tukuk ce muce kwiy piko. Ntene cikwakwek tukuk tokol kupoyit manta.
Nto mpo Paulo nto Apolo nto Kefa, nto koret, nto soponto, nto met, nto pesyosyecu, nto pesyosyek co kwoni, kuce cikwakwek tokol.
Opoye akwek Kristo, nto Kristo kunye po neto Yiyintet.
Roke oŋnketec kule ciku acek mutworikap Kristo ce kicikoci kurip ŋalekap Yiyintet cepo manta ce wuŋotin.
Kito akenke nye cemokyini mutworintet nyoto ku kule kikokenekey Mokoryontet.
Kunyo asute kwek ŋolyo nye miniŋ ye komutwo ani akwek musankut, nto mpo ye komutwo piko musankut. Puryo mpo kot omutyinikey ani nkit musanku.
Puryo kot oŋnketi kule oyiku lelat, ntene puryo kuporu kule moponte lelis, Mokoryontet kunye mutwo ani musankut.

Kunyo puryo kuroke omut musanku kutompo kot kupunto pesyet nye kweyat. Möce kukany musankut okoy kuco Mokoryontet. Mosukuco oŋnkuluci lakweyet tukuk cepo menonet oŋnkupor ŋalek ce wuŋotin ce mite mukuleywekap piko orit. Yoto kuye kunyor ci tokol kakastayet ye yeme nye cone wule mite Yiyintet.

Mpo yeya, sukuŋet akalyak; koyoyeke ŋalecu tokol Apolo oko anito. Koyiyisye kwek koporunot sukuŋet oŋnket akwek kule mwowu ne ŋolyontoni, “Orip monte cekeyte silutek.’’ Puryo kuroke ci ake tokol om akwek kusil citake oŋnkunyil ake.
Ŋo nye kikoniŋ nyi yiku nyewo kupël piko alak? Kipuryo kot kukoniŋ Yiyintet tukuk tokol ce ponte? Nteye kinyoru, omne sesilkey kuyunye kipuryo kot ku kokotut?
Oponte akwek yawut tukuk tokol ce omöce! Kwomokoren keny! Kwoyeku kinkonik nka kot puryo kot ciku acek! Kunyo amöce ani kule ntoyiku akwek kinkonik sukuŋet ciku mpo acek kinkonik oko akwek.
Omnye osoti ani kule, kukupartec Yiyintet acek kiyokik ciku cepo letutap piko tokol, kuyu pic ce kocimutyi musankut cepakäc, om taytap koret oko malaykanik oko piko.
Ciku acek perper kupo kaynetap Kristo, ntene oyiku akwek ŋomec om Kristo! Puryo kot ceponte acek swamet, ntene oponte akwek swamet! Cenyilec acek, ntene ciyweyok akwek!
Ce ponte acek rupet oko melelya okoy mpo yawut. Kicilac sorokotok, cepirec, cimpokoti om koret tokol.
Kyiyisyi om swamet sukuŋet cikalyekey. Ye kocecupec, cesomnci acek cekto kupeyok. Ye kacitaŋanyec, yoto cemuytoci.
Ye kacecupec cewekyi om ŋalek cepo tolosyet. Kicekerkeyitu acek oko tutwek cepo koret. Kiciku kwontun nyepo koret okoy kupunto pantanyi.
Kosilwok ani kuyunyitenyi, ntene nye puryo kot omöce kule sukuŋet asornenok. Kayiy kuyinyi saŋet anetak kuyu lekokwani ce ocöme koromun.

Omnye nka mpo ye oponte akwek konetik kantoyik pokolwokik ce caŋ om soponwekwok om wule mite Kristo, ntene oponte Papa akenke pate. Omnye kyoyiku ani papamwoŋ om soponto nye oponte akwek om Kristo, omnye kyosutwok lokoywek ce toponec.
Kunyo kosomok kule orup wule ayunte ani.
Kunyo koyoku Timosewo kuco wule omite akwek. Neto kunye werimwani cämanet nye cikenekey om Mokoryontet. Mosukusutwok neto akwek arosyek cikwani om Kristo ce oneti pikap Yiyintet om wulyo tokol.
Kusilkey alake om akwek, kusote kule puryo kot aconi ani orutocok akwek.
Kunyo ye kacäm Mokoryontet mosaco lakwar saŋet akäs ani nkit nye puryo kot ku ŋalek ce ŋolole pate, ntene akäs mpo kito nye mokwiy piko co silekay.
Omnye Puryo kot ku ŋalek pate poytoyisyetap Yiyintet, ntene swamet.
Oŋnkono nye okweye akwek? Maconte Korokto nto maconte mukuleyto nyepo cömisyet oko tolosyet?
Kunyo kucemwoy kupoyit manta kule, oponte akwek sakwayanatet nye miyat koromun nye puryo mpo kot cenyortoy wule mite lamek co menket Yiyintet. Kucemwowo kule purtoykey cito korketap kwan!
Kunyo omuci akwek osilkey kulene? Roke onerekisye koromun, oŋnkokwet cito nye kweye ŋaleca kuŋete wule amite akwek!
Ntene nka kot amite wule low om porto om wule omite akwek, ntene opontekey oko akwek om kasoteywekwani om kaynetap Mokoryontet. kwomutyi ani keny musankut cito nye kikwiy ŋolyontoni miyat.
Kunyo ye koyomekey akwek wanak, oŋnkyepontekey oko akwek om kasoteywekwani om swametap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo nye mitowune wule cemite acek.
Yoto kuye roke okoyte portap cicoto kuwo wule mite Setanit kyaranta, sukuŋet cesor soponto nyenyi om pesyetap Mokoryontet.
Puryo kot kuroke osilkey akwek! Oŋnketi ŋolyontoni mwowu kule, “Kocini mumarek ce tukusic kukut pusyek tokol.’’

Misyini onumu mumaryantani nye ponto miyotyet nyepo keny sukuŋet otililitu onyolu akwek topon, sukuŋet akerkeyitu oko pusyek ce puryo kot cetase mumarek, kuyu wulo oŋnketi ani kule oyiye akwek kuyunyoto. Kunyo kukwitita keny sakwenyo nyepo Keytayet, omnye kicekon Kristo nye Keciryetap korosyontet nyepo sakwetap Keytayet!
Möce kyam kunyo sakwenyo nye puryo kot ku mukatyantet nyepo keny nyepo miyotyet oko sakwayanatet, ntene om mukatyantet nye moponto mumaryantet, nyoto ku mukatyantet nyepo tililinto oko manta.
Om parwet nyo kyosilwok ani, kyomwowok kule monte ciyomekey oko piko to sakwoyonot.

Ntene kipuryo omwowu kule piko ce menket Yiyintet, co sakwoyonot nto co moroŋis nto ce yirye ntarastinek nto co soye kerkeyik! Omnye ye kotay akwek cekto kuporkey kule kaŋete koret sukuŋet komonyortosi oko cekto.

Ŋolyontet nye kyomwowu kunyi kule, puryo kot kurok kot oyomekey akwek oko cito nye kurekey kule oyiku yeya oŋnkurok yec kwiye sakwayanat nto moroŋya nto nye soye kerkeyik nto nye perpersyi nto nye pokite nto nye corsyi. Monte mpo cipur oŋnkoyomisyi oko cito nye yunyo!

Ntene puryo kot ku yisyemwani omutyi musanku piko cepo saŋ. Yiyintet kunye mosukumutyi cekto musankut. Ntene puryo ra kot kurok omutyi akwek musankut piko cepo lukemwoŋ? Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Onumune kucone lukemwoŋ cito nye miyat.’’
Ye ponto citake om akwek wokutyet oko yeya ake, kuroke kulene kusut neto musankut kuwo wule mite piko ce menket Yiyintet, ye kotomwocini kusat ŋaleca pikap Yiyintet.
Puryo kot oŋnket akwek kule pikap Yiyintet kuce mutyini musankut koret? Kunyo ye akwek kuce mosomutyi musankut koret, kupuryo kot omuci mpo kot amut musankut cepo ŋalek ce tukusic?
Puryo kot oŋnket kule acek kuce mosicemutyi malaykanik musankut? Mosukupurunenec kulene mocemut musankut nyepo soponto nyitenyi?
Kunyo nteye kakwa ŋalek ce yucoto mososut ra ŋaleca kupa wule mite piko co menkete wule yunto koyenet nyepo pikap Yiyintet?
Ŋolyo nyo nyepo kalilan koromun om wule omite! Puryo kot kumite cito akenke wule omite akwek nye ŋom nye muce kumut musankunek cepo mpo yeya?
Ntene kwere yeya ake yeya ake wokuwosontyi om taytap piko co menket Yiyintet.
Kunyo poru kule kwosute koromun omnye owosontyinikey nkit. Omne macäm akwek ye kalel citake kwiwok miyotyet? Omne mocäm akwek ye kanyapanak piko alake?
Kunyo yec oyicinikey akwek nkit miyotyonik, onyapankey akwek nkit oŋnkocorokyikey nkit mpo yeya!

Oŋnket akwek kupoyit manta kule puryo komuce kot kunyor ci nye miyat poytoyisyetap Yiyintet. Monte ciperperkey omnye puryo kot kunyoru poytoyisyetap Yiyintet piko ce, syepisyi koruk, nto ce soye kerkeyik, nto ce sakwoyot, nto co cesyepekey moronik nkit,
nto ce corsyi, nto pokitisyek, nto ceŋomsi, nto ce ponisyi, nto ce moroŋis, nto ce corik.
Kyokerkeykey akwek picoto, ntene kiciwunok om miyotyonik oŋnkyikoytok opoyitu Yiyintet. Kicesatak onyolu om wule mite Yiyintet kupunte Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo om Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintenyo.

Mosukumwoy citake kule, “Ce cömwo ani ayiy kiy ake tokol.’’ Yunyoto, ntene puryo kot kutoponec tukuk tokol. Omuci omwowu kule, “Ce cömwo ani ayiy kiy ake tokol, ntene puryo kot ocöme kot kusuto kito ake oyiku mutworintenyi.’’

Mosukumwoy citake kule, “Po omik moyet, oŋnkupo moyet omik.’’ Yunyoto manta, ntene mosukunum Yiyintet coto tukway. Porto nyepo cito kunye puryo kot kupo sakwayanat, ntene po Mokoryontet nto Mokoryontet kunye poye porto.
Kiŋet Yiyintet Mokoryontet Yesu kotutune met oŋnku neto kunye mosukuŋetec citutune met om swamenyi.
Oŋnket akwek kule porwonik cikwok kuce kereryanik cepo portap Kristo. Omuci ra anäm kereryantet nyepo portap Kristo oŋnkayiy kwek portap korko ce moroniyo? Memukoktos!
Puryo kot oŋnket akwek kule ye kokuyomo cito porto nyenyi oko korko nye cemoroniyo kukokwek akenke oko neto? Poru silutekap Yiyintet kutok topon kule, “Mosukwek picoto oyenku porto akenke.’’
Ntene ye keyomokey cito oko Mokoryontet kokwek Muyet nyenyi akenke oko neto.
Asanekey sakwayanat. Puryo kot kowurtoy cito porto ye kayiy miyotyonik alak tokol, ntene wurtoy cito porto nyenyi nkit ye kayiy sakwayanatet.
Puryo kot oŋnket akwek kule porto nyemwoŋ kunye kotap Yiyintet nye minye Muyet Nyetilil? Puryo kot opoyekey akwek nkit, ntene opoye Yiyintet.
Kikwalenak akwek neto peyit nyewo, kunyo oyiyisye porwonikwok kukasta woyintap Yiyintet.
Kunyo teputyet nye nöme ŋalek co kyosile akwek. Topon ye kepur cito nye motinye korko.
Ntene omnye mite syemutok cepo sakwayanatet, kuroke kuponto ci tokol korkenyi; oŋnkuroke kuponto korko tokol santenyi.
Roke kwiy morono koyitita yisyenyi kuyu moron, oŋnkuroke kwiy korko koyitita yisyenyi tokol kuyu korko; oŋnkoyitita ci ake tokol om cekto kito nye möce ake.
Puryo kot kupoytoy korko porto nyenyi, ntene santenyi nye poytoy, kunyo puryo mpo kot kupoytoy santet porto nyenyi, ntene korket nye poytoy.
Monte cetoyekay tos pate ye kocömncine tukway, sukuŋet onyoru poroyinto nye osome, oŋnkoyomkey yec sukuŋet mente kot kunyor Setanit poroyinto nye kasyemenak omnye korom ye moripkey.
Komwowok ŋalecu, nye puryo kot kokonok kwek ntarastit, ntene ŋolyo nyepo ŋomnon.
Amöce kule ntepur piko tokol kuyu wule oyunte ani, ntene ponto ci tokol kokotutyet nye kikokoci Yiyintet. Kicikoci citake kokotutyet nyi, cikoci citake kokotutyet ake.
Kunyo, omwocini ani piko co puryo kot komütis oko koruk musukik, kule topon koromun ye kopur akwek nkit kuyu wule ayunte ani.
Ntene nye puryo omuci kot akarekte makatet nyepo porwonikwok, omütisye moronik oŋnkyimütak koruk. Omnye topon ye kocimütis kusir ye kotoloytos porwonik cikwok.
Oponte ntarastit nyepo piko co kikomütis, nye puryo kot ku nyimwani nkit ntene po Mokoryontet: puryo kot kumisyini kupakakta korko santenyi.
Ye kotepe kot kwiy kuyunyo, kumisyini wokopur kwine nkit, nto kuŋalal oko santenyi okoy kucämnkey yec. Puryo kot kumisyini kukwet morono korkenyi.

Omwocini piko alak tokol, (ani nye omwowu puryo kot ku Mokoryontet) kule, ye ponto cito nye Kristoyin korket nye puryo kot kucömis oŋnkucäm korkonoto kule opurtkey oko neto, kupuryo kot kumisyini kukwet korkonoto.
Nteye kemüt korko nye Kristoyin cito nye puryo kot kucömis oŋnkucäm cicoto kule opurtkey korkonoto kupuryo kot kumisyini kukwetkey korkonoto.
