Omnye cewece kuyen Yiyintet cito nye puryo kot kucömis ye keyomokey oko korkenyi, oŋnkuwec kuyen Yiyintet korket nye puryo kot kucömis ye keyomokey oko santenyi nye Kristoyin. Nto yunye kipuryo kot kuyunyoto nto kuyeku lekokwa lekoy ce menket Yiyintet, ntene kuyu wule yunto; cöme Yiyintet cekto.

Ntene ye möce citake tokol nye puryo kot kucömis kule ayaste cito nye Kristoyin kuroke kwiy nyoto kuyunyoto. Om ŋalek cayucoto, kuponto kukwey nkit cito nye Kristoyin nye morn nto korko. Omnye kikurok akwek Yiyintet opurte kalyet.
Nyi korko nye Kristoyin nketyine nto muci pesyet ake kot sop santeŋuŋ nye puryo kot ku Kristoyin. Ntenyi santet nketyine nyi nto muci pesyet ake sop korkeŋuŋ.
Kutosyikey kopur ci tokol kopurto kuyu wulo yunto kokotutyet nye kikoci Yiyintet, oŋnkuyu wule kiyunto ye kikure Yiyintet neto, ntarastit nyitenyi nye oneti ani pikap Yiyintet tokol.
Ye kecäm cito nye wonat kursetap Yiyintet, kupuryo kuroke kunum pelutyet nyepo wonset. Ye kacam cito nye mawonat kursetap Yiyintet, kupuryo kot kuroke cewon.
Omnye ye kicewoniŋ nto ye puryo kot cewoniŋ, ŋolyontet nyewo kuye kaciywey ntarastinekap Yiyintet.
Misyini kopur ci tokol kuyu wule yunto yo kicöme kursetap Yiyintet.
Kiyiku ra mtuworin yo kikuriŋ nyi Yiyintet? Kunyo mente asot, ntene ye ponto poroyinto kot cityanciŋ kuroke yiyisye.
Omnye neto nyo kikur Mokoryontet ku mutworin kunye kikwek citap Mokoryontet nye kicityac, kuyunyoto mpo cito nye tyakat nye kikur Kristo, kunye kikwek nyoto mtuworintenyi.
Kikwalak akwek Yiyintet, kunyo monte ciku mutwor cepo piko.
Mpo yeya, roke ci tokol kopurto koyomotet oko Yiyintet kuyu wule yunto kopurto yo kicekure neto.

Kunyo, ŋolyontet nye nöme piko co tompo komütis: puryo kot oponte ntarastit nye cöne wule mite Mokoryontet, ntene kakonok kasoteywekwani kuyu ci nye ponto latik nye roke cikenekey om poypoyetap Mokoryontet.
Kuyu wule yunto toŋoŋutek cepo pesyosyecu, kasot ani kule roke kopur cito kuyu wule yunto.
Ye kimütisye nyi mente asyem kule akwet korket. Ye tompo kot mütisye nyi. Mente asot kule amütisye.

Ntene ye kemütisye kupuryo kot yiy miyotyo. Nteye kacimüt korko nye tompo kot cimüt; kupuryo kot kwiy neto miyotyo. Ntene mosukutaŋany toŋoŋutek cepo koret piko co kemütis kunyo amoce ani kule osopok akwek coto.
Mpo yeya, ŋolyontet nye omwowok kunyi kule, komo kumite poroyinto nye yeme! Kunyo kuceke yawut kuwo tay, misyini kopur piko co kikomütis kuyunye tompo komütis.
Kopur piko co rirtos kuyunye monerekyotin, kopur piko co rorye kuyunye puryo kot kunerekyotin. Kopur co olyoyisyi kuyunye puryo kot kuponto tukuk ce kikwal.
Kopur piko co yiyisye tukukap koret kuyunye puryo kot kusute tukucoto kasoteywekwa. Omnye kuyu wule yunto koret yawut, kunye komo kopure kuloyit.
Amöce ani kule oyiku akwek piko ce puryo kot kusote koromun. Sote cito nye puryo kot komütis yisyetap Mokoryontet, möce kule aŋerec Mokoryontet.
Ntene sote cito nye kikomütis ŋalek ce nöme koret, omnye möce kule aŋerec korkenyi.

Kunyo cicute neto om komoswokik oyeny. Sote yisyetap Mokoryontet korko nye puryo kot cimüt, nto cepto nye mukul nye menket morn, omnye möce kule kutililit porto oko soponto, ntene sote korko nye kicimüt ŋalekyi cepo koret omnye möce kule aŋerec santenyi.

Komwowok ani akwek ŋalecu omnye amöce kule akalyak. Puryo kot asyeme kule akonok nyikisinto, ntene amöce kule ayiy akwek ŋolyontet nyepo manta nye rotat oŋnkokoytekey ayiy yisyetap Mokoryontet nye puryo kot omune.
Nto om wule mite cito nye köse kule puryo kot opuri topon om wule mite cepto nye möce neto kule amüt, oŋnkuponto makatet nyewo, kuroke kwiy kuyu wule moktoy komütkey, omnye puryo kot kumite miyotyo.
Ntene ye kokuwoŋnkyi cito om mukuleynyi nkit nye puryo kot cisimnci, oŋnkukwilat om kasoteywekyi kule marup kuyu yeya, oŋnkuwoŋnkyi kito nye möce kule ayiy, kakwiy topon ye kayiy kuyunyoto.
Kunyo sukuŋet kwiy topon cito nye kemüt cepto, oŋnkwiye mpo topon kusirto cito nye puryo kot komüt cepto.
Puryo kot kutyakat korko nye kicimüt ye tokusope santenyi, ntene ye kame santenyi yoto kunyor poroyinto kuwo wokomüt santet ake nye kacäm neto. Ntene oŋnkumisyini kwek kamütisyet nyepo Kristayek.
Ntene möce kopurto ŋerekwek ye kepur nye puryo kot cimüt. Kasoteywekwani cutecu oŋnkosoti kule oponte Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet.

Kunyo, yawut ŋolyontet nye nöme omik ce kocesoci Kerkeyik. Cinket kuyu wulo cemwoytoy kule, “Ceponte acek tokol ŋomnonet.’’ Ntene ŋomnonet nyoto kunye sute cito kusutkey parak om silotet, ntene teksi cömisyet.
Ye sote cito kule oŋnketi kito ake, kunye menkete kiyoto kupoyit manta kuyu wule misyini.
Ntene cito nye cöme Yiyintet kunye nkete Yiyintet mpene cicoto.
Kunyo ŋolyontet nye nöme ye kakyam omik ce kocesoci karkeyik, cinket acek kule kerkeyinto kunye kiy pate nye puryo kot kumite koret mpo kisic. Cinket kule mite Yiyintet akenke pate nkit.
Omnye nka kot kumite co cekure kule yiyik ce caŋ oko mokorenik ce caŋ.

Nto om acek kumite Yiyintet nye Papa akenke nkit pate, nye kitoŋintet nyepo tukuk tokol, oŋnku nye cesope acek om neto, oŋnkumite Mokoryontet akenke Yesu Kristo nye kicitany tukuk tokol kupunte neto, oŋnku nye cesoptosi acek om wule mitowune neto.

Ntene puryo kuponto ci tokol ŋomnoni. Kikonketune piko alake kerkeyik kuloyit. Kunyo okoy yawut ye kam omik ce kocesoci kerkeyik kusot kule kakyam ce punyo kot kupo Yiyintet, ntene omnye moponto kasoteywek cikwa swamet kusot kule kakwiy miyotyet.
Omik kuce puryo kot komuce kusat kunyol soponwekyo om wule mite Yiyintet, puryo kot kupotwec acek kiy ye mnakyam, oŋnkupuryo kot cenyoru kutos kiy ye kakyam.
Kunyo oripkey, monte kyiy kuyunyoto omnye muce piko alak ce puryo kot kuponto swamet kosuci miyotyet.
Omnye ye kakäsiŋ cito nye puryo kot kuponto swamet mite nyi nyo yiku ŋom yomisyi om kotap kerkeyik kupuryo kotitire cicoto ŋalecato kwam omik ce kocesoci kerkeyik.
Kunyo mokwaran cicitenyi moponto swamet, omnye kesac ŋomnonet nyeŋunyi. Yeya nyitenyi kunyo kimecini Yesu Kristo neto.
Kunyo om aret nyeyunyitenyi, keyiy nyi miyotyet om wule mite Kristo oŋnkiyiy miyotyet om wule mite yeyaŋuŋ oŋnkipar kasoteywek cikwa co moponto swamet.
Kunyo, ye muce kusutyi omik kosuto yeyamwani komo oyome ani yec penynto mpo kisic, sukuŋet mente kot osutyi kosuto yeyamwani.
Puryo kot oyiku ani ne cito nye tyakat? Puryo kot oyiku kiyokintet? Tompo kot akäs ani ne Mokoryontenyo Yesu? Puryo kot oyiku akwek ne pikap Mokoryontet om yisyet nye kyayiy ani?
Nka kot puryo kot kucöme piko alake kule ayiku ani kiyokintet, ntene ocöme akwek, omnye akwek pelutyet nye poru kule ayiku ani kiyokintet nyepo Mokoryontet.
Ye karenya piko, ŋalek ce omwowu ye oyetekey kucu kule.
Puryo kot ceponte acek ne kamukeywek kyam omik oŋnkyeyesye kupo yisyet nye kiciy?
Puryo kot ceponte kamukeywek cepetekey korko kuyu piko ce tupco om Mokoryontet. Kuyu wulo kyiytoy kiyokik alake oko mpo Kefa oko mpo yeyanyitap Mokoryontet.
Nto acek nkit so oko Parnapa ce yiyisyi sukuŋet cenyoru omik ce kyome?
Kikäs ŋo kenyis sikorin nye pcicinikey musyaret nkit? Nto kikäs ŋo kopotin nye puryo kot kwome omik cepo mparenyi? Nto mesewontet oŋnkono nye puryo kot kulwe ceko cepo kecirekyi?
Omwowu ani so ŋalecu om kamukeywek cepo cito? Puryo kot kumwowu ntarastinek kuyunyoto?
Omnye kicesil om ntarastinekap Moses kule, “Mente arat yeyto kutit ye mite kuwore nkanuk.’’ Kunyo sote pa Yiyintet yeyto?
Kimwoy Yiyintet ŋalecato kunämec acek. Kicesil ŋalecutecu kunämec kupoyit manta! Cito nye potisyi mparet oko cito nye wore omik, kuce yiyisyi kukene kule cepcicine omik.
Kicekol acek om wule omite akwek kupuswek cepo Yiyintet. Kunyo ŋolyo pa nyepo kakitat ye kokenyoru acek latik cepo kisisyet om wule omite akwek.

Nteye ponto piko alake kamukeywek kunyor latik om wule omite akwek, kupuryo kot ceponte acek ne kamukeywek ce pëlisyi? Ntene tompo kot kyiyisye acek kamukeyweca, kunyo kucemuytoci wuyinwek tokol sukuŋet mente kot cesutyi konokut aret nyepo lokoywek ce toponec cepo Kristo.
Oŋnket akwek kupoyit manta kule, nyortoy piko co yiyisyi kotap Yiyintet omik kukwane kotap Yiyintet, oŋnkupicicintos omikap korosek piko co koytoy korosek om otepto nye pele korosek.
Kunyo kimwoy Mokoryontet kuyunyoto kule roke kunyoru musyaret piko co mwoytoy lokoywek ce toponec om yisyet nye yiye.

Ntene tompo kot oyiyisye ani kamukeyweco mpo akenke. Kunyo puryo mpo kot osile yawut parwani kule sukuŋet kyiwo yunyoto. Omnye puryo ci nye muce kuwec silotet nyimwani kwek ŋalek cepo püc pate, roke amey ani kusir ye kotoyostoy kukerekta citake ye mosilkey.
Puryo kot oponte ani kamukeywek osilkey pate omnye omwoytoy lokoywek ce toponec, ntene kicemwowo kule yiy kuyunyoto. Kunyo ŋolyo nye miyat koromun ye puryo kot amwayte lokoywek ce toponec!
Nto kyayiy yisyet omnye ocöme nkit nto kwomoce kule cekono musyaret, ntene oyiye kuyu yisyo nye kikono Yiyintet.

Kunyo onyoru musyara ne? Onyoru pate musyaret nye omwoytoy lokoywek ce toponec nye puryo kot amöce kule cekono kiy, nye puryo mpo kot oyiyisye kwapi kamukeywek om yisyemwani nyepo lokoywek ce toponec.
Oyiku ani tyakat nye puryo kot oyiku mutworin nyepo citake tokol, ntene aweckey oyiku mutworin nyepo ci tokol sukuŋet awec ce caŋ kuyu wule mukoktos.

Ye amite oyiyisyi om wule mite Yutayek, apuri kuyu Yutoyin sukuŋet awec cekto, nka kot kupuryo kot omite ŋonyutap ntarastinekap Moses, ntene opuri kuyu nye poyto ye amite oyiyisyi oko piko cepoytoy ntarastinek sukuŋet awec cekto.
Kuyunyoto ye opontekey lamek, opuri kuyu lamek, ce moponto ntarastinek sukuŋet awec lamek. Puryo kot kuporu coto kule moyweyi ani ntarastinek omnye poyto ntarastinekap Kristo.
Apuri ani kuyunye moponte koyenet nyepo swamet ye pontekey oko piko ce moponto koyenet nyepo swamet sukuŋet awec cekto. Kyoyiku kiy tokol om wulo mite tokol, sukuŋet onyoru piko ce mosoru.
Oyiye ŋalecu tokol kupo toponiyetap lokoywek ce toponec sukuŋet onyoru kupeyokyi.
Oŋnket akwek kupoyit manta kule konye mweyek piko tokol ce mwenekey ntene pëlisyi akenke nye nyoru kokututyet. Kunyo okonyi akwek mweyek sukuŋet opëlisye onyoru kokotutyet.

Ripekey koromun ci ake tokol nye mite wule cinete piko co konye mweyek. Yiye kuyunyoto kule cenyoru kokotutyet nyepo nkwatyet nyepo taptet nye poku lakwar. Ntene kyiye acek kule cenyoru kokotutyet nye mopoku.
Kunyo akonyi ani otyikini kule awaŋnte topon. Puryo kot otuluci ani kuyu ci nye tuluce tapan.
Otoŋonyi porto nyimwani oŋnkorip sukuŋet mente kot cetaya om letut ye komwoci piko alak lokoywek.
Mpo yeya, amöce ani kule oŋnket akwek kito nye kikwiyakay om wule mite mpo kukonyo co kirupe Moses. Kilum kukerekta polyet cekto tokol okoy kway topon tokol ruretyet nye arrar.
Kicepatisan cekto tokol om polyet oko ruretyet kwek konomikap Moses.
Kikwam tokol mukatyantet nyepo Yiyintet,
oŋnkuye tokol peko cekosune wule mite Yiyintet ce kikwone rwantetap Yiyintet. Rwantet nyoto kunye kipesetoti oko cekto nyoto kunye Kristo.
Ntene kipuryo kot kuŋerec Yiyintet om wule mite cekto ce caŋ, kunyo kiseretyi muswek cikwa koret nyepo kitela.
Kunyo porwec tukucutecu kusowec acek tokol kule puryo kot kuroke cecäm tukuk cepo miyotyo kuyu wule kiyunto cekto.
Nto mpo kule cesay kerekeyik kuyu wulo kikwiyta alake om cekto, kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Kipur piko ŋony kwomis oŋnkuyesyo oŋnkuŋetyo kutum.’’
Puryo kot kumisyini ceyiy acek sakwayanat kuyu wulo kikwiyta alake om cekto okoy kupok pesyet akenke alake om cekto ce kiyite elifunek tiptem ok somok.
Puryo kot kumisyini cesyem acek Mokoryontet kuyu wule kikwiyta alake om cekto okoy kupakäc erenok cekto.
Puryo kumisyini kot aŋunyŋuny akwek kuyu wule kikwiyta alake om cekto okoy kupakäc malayket nyepo met cekto.
Kikwiyokis ŋaleca om wule mite cek sukuŋet kwek koporunot om wule mite piko alake, kunyo kicesil ŋalecato sukuŋet kusowec acek. Omnye ce mite acek pesyosyek ce karik kuponto pesyet nyepo letut.
Cito nye sote kule omite koyony topon kuroke kuripkey sukuŋet mente kosuto.

Syemutok tokol ce kokwontyok kuce kerkey oko syemutok cepo kwak ce kwontyini piko tokol. Ntene ripe Yiyintet kurtoyenyi, kunyo puryo kot kucöme kule cesyemak akwek kusir wule tento swamet nyimoŋ. Ntene ye kasyemak mosukukonok neto swamet nye omukte oŋnkuporwok aret nye mopunte.
Kunyo coronutekwani, oripkey monte cesay kerekiyik.
Oŋololwok kuyu piko ce oyiku ŋomec, kunyo akäs akwek nkit ŋalek ce mwowu ani.

Cikompet nyepo kupeyok nye cikoste acek Yiyintet kunye puryo kot ceyemntoy acek om korotikap Kristo ye koceyesye cikompet nyenyi? Nto Mukatyantet nyo cepeteci kunye puryo kot ceyemntoy cepcicine om portap Kristo ye kyome?
Mite mukatyantet akenke pate, kunyo nka kot ciku acek caŋ, ntene ciku porto akenke. Omnye ceyemntoy cepcicine mukatyantet nyoto akenke.
Asot pa Yutayek piko co ome korosek ce cikoytoy kuce yemntoy kupcicin yisyetap Yiyintet om otepto nye pele korosek.
Ŋolyo ne nye amoce ani kule omwowu? Amoce pa kule omwowu kule, kerekeyin nto kito nye kicikoci kerekeyinto kunye kiy nyepo latik?

Puryo kot kuyunyo! Komwowu kule kiy nye kocesoci oyik om mesetap piko co menket Yiyintet kuce kocikoci coto kupoyit oyik, ntene puryo kot kocikoci Yiyintet. Kunyo puryo amoce ani kule ayomekey akwek oko oyik.
Puryo kot omuci akwek ayemnte oyesye cikompet nyepo Mokoryontet oŋnkoyesye yec cikompet nyepo oyik. Kunyo puryo kot omuci oyomisye mesetap Mokoryontet oŋnkoyomisye yec mesetap oyik.
Nto ce möce acek kule kunyer Mokoryontet? Cisoti acek kule ceponte swamet kupël neto?
Cemwowu kule, “Ce comwec kyiy kiy ake tokol.’’ Yunyoto, ntene puryo kot kuponto latik tukuk tokol. “Ce comwec kyiy kiy ake tokol’’, ntene puryo kot kuponto kakalyayet tukuk tokol.
Puryo ci nye roke kumwoy kule acenye tukuk ce nöme neto nkit, ntene möce kuköse tukuk ce nöme piko alak.
Omuci akwek ayal kiy ake tokol nye kyoloy om motepetap panyek nye puryo kot atepe kupo ŋalek ce nöme kasoteywekwok.
Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Po Mokoryontet koret oko tukuk tokol ce mite orit.’’
Ye kokurok akwek cito nye tompo kocömis kule kwa yomisye omik oŋnkocäm roke oyam kiy ake tokol nye kacekonok nye puryo kot otepe ŋolyo nye nöme kasoteywekwok.
Ntene ye komwowok citake kule, “Kocesoci omicu kerekeyik.’’ Mente kyam yoto omicoto kupo toponiyet nyepo cito nyo komwowok oŋnkupo toponiyet nyepo kasoteywekyi.
Puryo kot ku cekuk kasoteywek coto, ntene po cito nyin ake. Kunyo mokutep citake kule, “Omne sukurip kasoteywek cepo cito ake kito nye mayiy ani?
Ye kakaste ani Yiyintet om omikyu, omne sukurenya ani citake om omik ce oyome okostoy Yiyintet?’’
Kunyo, kiy ake tokol nye oyiye akwek ye koyomisyi, nto ye koyesyi, kumöce oyiye coto tokol kupo woyintap Yiyintet.
Opuri kapurto nye puryo kot komuce kusutyi Yutayek wuyinto nto mpo lamek nto mpo pikap Yiyintet.

Opuri kuyu wulo opurtoy ani. Omnye asyeme kule aŋerec ci tokol om tukuk tokol ce ayiye nye puryo kot asotyini toponiyet nyimwani nkit, ntene om toponiyetap piko tokol kule, sukuŋet cesoru cekto kusopco.
Kunyo orup wule ayunte ani, kuyu wulo arupe ani wule yunto Kristo.
Okostok ani akwek, omnye osoti okokoy oŋnkorup kanetisyet nye kyanetak.
Ntene möce kule oŋnket akwek kule Kristo kunye nyewo om wule mite ci ake tokol. Nyewo santet om wule mite korkenyi, kunyo nyewo Yiyintet om wule mite Kristo.
Kunyo ci tokol nye mwoytoy ŋolyontetap Yiyintet om sayet nyepo piko tokol kuyenot metit nyenyi kesornen cicoto Kristo.
Nto korko nye soye nto mwoytoy ŋolyontetap Yiyintet om sayet nyepo piko tokol kupuryo kot koyen metinyi kunye kesornen korkonoto santenyi. Omnye kerkey nye rwakat metinyi.
Ye puryo kot kuyen korko metinyi, kuroke kurwac putek, ntene omnye kiy nyepo kalilan ye karwac korko metit, kunyo roke kuyen metinyi.
Puryo kot kuroke kuyen morono metinyi omnye poru tonto oko woyintap Yiyintet. Ntene poru korko woyinto nyepo cito.
Omnye kipuryo kot citany moron kucone wule mite korko, ntene kicone korko wule mite morono.
Kipuryo mpo kot citany moron kupo korko, ntene kicitany korko kupo moron.
Kunyo misyini kuponto korko kito nye yene metinyi kupo malaykanik nye poru kule poytoy santenyi neto.
Ntene om soponto nyepo Mokoryontenyo, puryo kot kumite korko ye puryo moron, oŋnkupuryo kot kumite morono ye puryo korko.
Kuyu wulo kicitany Korko kucone wule mite morono, kuyunyoto kunyo iye yawut korko moron, ntene kwone tukuk tokol wule mite Yiyintet.
Amut akwek nkit musankut, misyini pa kusome korko om tuyet nyepo pikap Yiyintet ye puryo kuyen metit?
Puryo kot kunetak akwek ne koret kule sornon ye kepit morono putek?
Ntene toponec kuromun putek om wule mite korko, kicikoci neto putek ce koyec sukuŋet kuyene metit.
Ye möce citake kule otinten, ŋalek tokol ce omwowu ani kucu, puryo kot ceponte acek nto mpo pikap Yiyintet kopurto ake nyepo sayet.
Puryo kot okostok ani akwek om ŋalek cu amöce omwowok, ye koyomekey akwek om sayet nyimwoŋ oyiye ce miyotec ye kotoyiye ce toponec.
Nyepo tayta kunyi kule, kicemwowo kule mite piko ce tintentyinos kupciykey ye koyomekey akwek pikap Yiyintet. Acöme ani kule pesyet ake po manta ŋaleca.
Omnye roke kumite pciyatet om wule omite akwek sukuŋet cinket kutok piko cepo manta.
Ye koyomekey akwek wanak kupuryo kot okwoni kule kwokyam omikap Mokoryontet.
Omnye ye oyomisyi kutosyinikey citake kwan omikyi nkit okoy kwam alak rupet, kupokit piko alake.
Omne? Puryo kot oponte akwek korikwok wule oyomisye oŋnkoyesye? Oŋnkokoci kolilonis piko ce moponto kiy? Nto onyile akwek pikap Yiyintet? Momwowok ani ne? Makastak om ŋalecato? Puryo kot okostok.
Omnye ŋalek ce kikono ani Mokoryontet kuce kyanetak kule; om kwomowut nyo kiceŋomntoy neto, kunäm yoto Mokoryontet Yesu Mukatyantet,
oŋnkusomci kukasta Yiyintet, oŋnkupetec oŋnkumwoy kule, “Nyi kunye pormwani nye kacekonok akwek, oyiye kuyunyi ye asoteno ani.’’
Kuyunyoto om letutap omik, kunäm cikompet oŋnkumwoy kule, “Cikomponi kunye kirotyet nyelel nyepo Yiyintet nye kociporune pelutyet nyepo korotik. Ye koye akwek, oyiye kuyunyoto ye asoteno ani.’’
Omnye om pesyo tokol ye kayam Mukatyantet oŋnkoye cikomponi kuye omwoytoy yoto metap Mokoryontet okoy kuco neto.
Kunyo, ye kam citake mukatyantet oŋnkuye cikomponi om aret nye puryo kot kuyeme mosukulel cicoto kowurta porto oko koritikap Mokoryontet.
Kunyo misyini kukaskey citake nkit topon kunyo kutompo kwam mukatyantet oŋnkuye cikompet.
Omnye ye puryo kot konkete neto kito nye poru portap Mokoryontet ye ome mukatyantet oŋnkuyesye cikompet ku kosutyikey cicoto nkit musankut ye mite kwomisyi oŋnkuyesyi.
Yunyoto sukuŋet kumnyonis moponto swamet alake ce caŋ om akwek, oŋnkupotyo mpo alak.
Ye kocemutyikey acek nkit musankut nyepo manta, kupuryo kot cemutwec musankut.
Ntene omnye Mokoryontet kunye mutwec musankut oŋnkupirec, sukuŋet mente cemutwec musankut wanak oko koret.
Kunyo mpo yeya, ye koyomekey akwek wanak kule kyam omikap Mokoryontet, roke akanynkey tokol.
Nteye ponto cito ake rupet, ku misyini kwomis kunyo kanyi, sukuŋet mente kumutwok akwek Yiyintet musankut ye koyomekey wanak. Nto ŋalek ce nöme tukuk alak mosicasat ani ye kaco.
Mpo yeya, amöce ani kule oŋnket akwek ŋalek cepo manta, ce nöme kokotutek ce kwone wule mite Muyet Nyetilil.
Oŋnket kule yo kito oyiku akwek pic ce monket Yiyintet, ku kipoytok yoto kerkeyik ce moponto sopon ce kimosok omosokisye.

Kunyo misyini oŋnket kule puryo ci nye ntocini Muyet Nyetilil nye muce kot kucupis kumwoy kule, “Kupot Yesu.’’ Oŋnkupuryo ci nye muce kuŋalal kumwoy kule, “Yesu kunye Mokoryontet,’’ okoy ye ntocini Muyet Nyetilil nyoto.
Mite kokotutek ce pciyotin wok ce caŋ, ntene konu tokol Muyet Nyetilil akenke.
Mite mpo arosyek wok ce caŋ ye cikolyoyisyi, ntene keyicini Mokoryontet akenke.
Mite arosyek wok ce caŋ wule muce cito kwiyiyta yisyonutek, ntene Yiyintet akenke nye kocini ci ake tokol kwiy yisyonutek tokol.
Kocini Muyet Nyetilil ci ake tokol kopur wule yunto, sukuŋet kukalya piko tokol.
Kocini Muyet Nyetilil cito ake ŋomnonet oŋnkukoci Muyet nyitenyi akenke cito ake lokoywek cepo konketotet.
Kocini Muyet nyitenyi akenke cito ake koyenet, oŋnkukoci cito ake swamet nye sopse.

Kocini Muyet Nyetilil cito ake swamet nye yiye tukuk cepo kakitat, oŋnkukoci cito ake kokotutyet nye muce kuŋalal kupor lokoywekap Yiyintet, oŋnkukoci yec mpo cito ake komuc kot kumwoy pciyatet nyepo kokoteywek cepo Muyet Nyetilil oko ce puryo kot kupo Muyet Nyetilil. Kukoci yec cito ake komuc kot kuŋalal ŋelyepik alak, kukoci cito ake kupor kule mwowu ne ŋelyepicoto.
Ntene Muyet Nyetilil akenke nyitenyi kunye yiye tukucutecu tokol. Kocini neto ci ake tokol kokotutek ce pciyotin kuyu wule moktoy.
Omnye kerkey Kristo oko porto nye akenke nye ponto kereryanik wok ce caŋ oŋnkurok ku akenke porto nka kot kiciy cituyo kereryanik wok ce caŋ ce pciyotin.
Kuyunyoto mpo acek tokol Yutayek oko Lamek, oko mutworik, oko piko co kicityac, kicepatisanec ciku porto akenke om Muyet Nyetilil akenke, kunyo kicekonec ceye Muyet Nyetilil akenke.
Omnye porto kunye puryo kot ku kiy akenke, ntene ponto kereryanik wok ce caŋ.
Nto kwemuce kerenket kumwoy kule, “Puryo kot opoye ani porto omnye puryo kot oyiku yewut.’’ Kupuryo ra kot komuce kerenket mopoyit porto?
Nto kumwoy mpo yitit kule, “Puryo kot opoye ani porto omnye moyiku koŋnta.’’ Komuce ra kot kukerekta mopoyit porto.
Nto kikwek porto tokol koŋnta, nto kilime ŋalek kulene? Nto kikwek porto tokol yitit, nto kiŋutoy cito kulene?
Kunyo kuyu wule yunto, kikoci Yiyintet porto tukuk wok ce pciyotin kuyu wule moktoy.
Nto yunye kikwek porto kiy akenke nto mite porto kulene?
Kunyo ponto porto kereryanik ce caŋ ntene akenke porto.
Kunyo puryo kot komuce koŋnta kumwoci yewut kule, “Puryo kot omociŋ ani nyi.’’ Nto mpo yec kumwoci metit kerenkok kule, “Puryo kot omöcok ani akwek’’
Ntene ŋalek cepo manta kucu kule, kereryanik cepo porto ce cisote kule puryo kuponto swamet kuce ce möce coto koromun.
Nto kereryanik cepo porto co ce nyile kule puryo kuponto latik koromun, kuce cikostoy acek kule ponto woyinto, nto kereryanikap porwonik cicacek co puryo kot kutoku topon, kuce ceripe coto topon.
Kereryanik co toku topon kuce puryo kot kumoce kule cerip topon. Yiyintet nkit kunye kituyo porwonikyacek, sukuŋet kukoci woyinto kereryanik co puryo kot kuponto latik.
Kunyo puryo kot kupciyat porto, ntene yicintos kereryanik tokol cepo porto.
Ye kataŋany kereryantet akenke nyepo porto, yoto kutaŋany mpo cut tokol oko kereryantet nyoto. Nteye kacikasta kereryantet akenke nyepo porto, kuŋerec kereryanik cut tokol.
Kunyo oyiku akwek tokol porto nyepo Kristo oŋnkupo yec ci ake tokol om akwek porto nyenyi.

Om piko cepo Yiyintet, kikokoci neto ci tokol yisyenyi. Cepo tayta ku kiyokik, cepo oyeny ku workoyik, cepo somok ku konetik oko co yiye tukuk cepo kakitat, oko co sopsi, oko co kolyoyisyi, oko co poytoyisyi, oko co ŋolole ŋelyepik alak.
Puryo kot kweku piko tokol kiyokik. Puryo kot kweku piko tokol workoyik. Puryo kot kweku piko tokol konetik. Puryo kot kwiye piko tokol tukuk cepo kakitat.
Puryo kot ku ponto piko tokol kokotutek ce sopsi, moŋolole piko tokol ŋalyepik alak, nto mpo kuŋor kumwoy kule mwowu ne ŋalecato.
Ntene okoci mukuleywekwok kucorokyi kokotutek ce woyec koromun. Kunyo moporwok ani aret nye topon nye pelisyi.
Nka mpo ye amuci ani aŋalal ŋelyepik cepo piko, nto ŋelyepik cepo Malaykanik, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot oponte cömisyet, ku kerkey ŋalalemwani oko kiy nye kyiye nto kerkey twolik ce kwerekey.

Nto mpo ye aponte swamet nyepo workoyontit nye omuci aŋnket tukuk tokol ce wuŋotin oŋnkoponte ŋomnonet tokol, oŋnkoponte mpo koyenet nye omuci aŋet tulonok, ntene oŋnkurok yec moponte cömisyet, ayiku ani püc pate.
Ye omuci mpo okoyte tukuk tokol ce oponte, okoci pononik; oŋnkokoyte cepel porto nyenyu, ntene ye moponte cömisyet, kupuryo kot onyoru kiy.
Cömisyet ku muytocinotet oko poypoyet, cömisyet kunye puryo kot ku corokyinot nto koperperisyo nto silotet.
Puryo kot kwiye cömisyet sornon, nto puryo kot kunyeru lakwar, cömisyet kunye puryo kot kuyukyini mukuley ŋolyo.
Puryo kot kuŋerekyini cömisyet miyotyet, ntene ŋerekyini pate ŋalek cepo manta.
Ripe cömisyet kiy ake tokol, oŋnkuyene kiy ake tokol, ponto kokenotet om kiy ake tokol, oŋnkumuytocini kiy ake tokol.
Cömisyet kunye puryo kot kupoku kenyis, mosukupok ŋorsyet, mosukupok ŋalalet nyepo ŋelyepik, mosukupok ŋomnonet.
Omnye puryo kot cinket tukuk ciwoŋnkyi oŋnkupuryo kot ceŋorsyi ciwoŋnkyi.
Ntene ye kakwa tukuk cepo manta, yoto kuye mosukupotyo co mocinket ciwoŋnkyi.
Ye kyoyiku ani lekwa, kyosoti kuyu lekwa, kyonketi ŋalek kuyu lekwa, nteyu kowo ayiku ci nyewo ayaste cepo lekwantit.

Kito nye ceköse acek yawut kunye kerkey oko kerkeyin nye motoku topon nye ceköse ciyoyit. Ntene om letut mokwocekäs acek Yiyintet om konyekyacek. Aŋnketi ani yawut kereryantet ake pate, ntene mosonket topon koromun om pesyosyek co kwoni kuyu wulo kicinketo.
Kunyo om tukucutecu somok, koyenet kokenotet, oko cömisyet nye nyewo nye pëlisyi cömisyet.
Kunyo möce otyiki koromun onyoru cömisyet. Okoci kurup mukuleywek cikwok kokotutek cepo Yiyintet ntene kupëlis oŋnket amwayte lokoywekap Yiyintet.
Cito nyo ŋolole ŋelyepik alak kunye puryo kuŋololyini nyo piko, ntene ŋololyini Yiyintet. Omnye puryo ci nye lime ŋalekyi. Ŋolole neto ŋalek cepo manta ce wuŋotin om swametap Muyet Nyetilil.
Ntene cito nyo mwoytoy lokoywekap Yiyintet kunye ŋololyini nyo piko, kukalya kutitir oŋnkuŋerec cekto.
Cito nyo ŋolole ŋelyepik alak, kolyoykey neto nkit. Ntene cito nyo mwoytoy lokoywekap Yiyintet kunye kolyoy pikap Yiyintet tokol.

Amöce ani kule nto aŋalal akwek tokol ŋelyepik alak, ntene amöce kupëlis kule oponte kokotutek ce mwoytoy lokoywekap Yiyintet. Omnye cito nye ŋolole kumwowu lokoywekap Yiyintet kunye ponto nyoto latik kupël cito nyo ŋolole nelyepik alak, tos pate ye mite yoto cito ake nye koror topon ŋalek ce mwowu cicoto, sukuŋet kukalya pikap Yiyintet tokol.

Kunyo mpo yeya, mosonyoru akwek latik pa, ye kaco ani wule omite onŋkyaŋalale ŋelyepik alak? Puryo mpo kisic, tos pate ye kosutwok ani ŋoŋutyet ake nye cone wule mite Yiyintet, nto ŋomnonet ake, nto lokoywek alak cekwone torot nto konetisyet ake.
Nka mpo tukuk co moponto soponto kuyu kurerut nto pukantit, muce citake kunket kule tum ne nye pute ye puryo kot ceput kutok topon.
Ye puryo kot kukut cito kontit kutok topon, komuce kulene piko kuyiytakey kupa poryet?
Kuyunyoto mpo muce kunket cito ake kulene ŋalek ce ŋololi nyi ye ŋolole ŋelyepik alak ce puryo kot celime topon? Mosukusut yomet pate ŋalekuk!
Mite ŋelyepik wok ce caŋ, ce mite koret tokol, oŋnkurok kuponto ŋelyepta ake tokol kito nye poru.
Ntene ye puryo kot aŋnket ani ŋelyepta nye ceŋolole, mosukwek cito nyo ŋolole tontet om wule amite ani, oŋnkoyeku ani tontet om wule mite neto.
Kunyo ye omöce akwek koromun kule cenyoru kokotutek cepo Muyet Nyetilil, kumöce asyem oyiyisye aŋalal kupëlis ŋalek co kolyoy pikap Yiyintet.
Kunyo misyini cito nyo ŋolole ŋelyepik alak kusome kokotutek sukuŋet konket kule mwowu ne ŋalek co ŋolole neto.
Omnye ye kosom ani om ŋelyepta nye menket ake, kusome mukuleyto nyimwani manta, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kumite kasoteywek wule mite ŋolyontonoto.
Kunyo masayiy kulene? Mososom om mukuleymwani ntene oŋnkosom mpo om kasoteywekwani, mosotum om mukuleymwani, ntene oŋnkotum mpo om kasoteywekwani.

Ye kesom kaste Yiyintet om mukuleyto pate, kumuce kulene cito ake nye püc pate nye mite kusome kumwoy kule, “Yunyoto.’’ Om somseŋuŋyi nyepo kakastayet? Puryo komuce neto kot konket ŋalek ce mwowu nyi.
Nka kot kutopon somset nyeŋuŋ nyepo kakastayet om wule mite Yiyintet, kupuryo kot kukolyoy mpo kisic cito nyin ake.
Okostoy Yiyintet omnye oŋololi ani ŋelyepik alak kupëlok akwek tokol.
Ntene pëlisyi ye kaŋalal ŋalek mut ce toku om sayet nyepo pikap Yiyintet saŋet anet piko alak, kusir ye kaŋalal ŋalek elifunek ce caŋ om ŋelyepik ce puryo kot kulime piko.
Mpo yeya, monte cipurte kasoteywek cepo lekwantit, opur kuyu lekoy om wule miyotyet. Ntene oŋnkopurte kasoteywek cepo piko ce woyec.
Kicesil om silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Komwoy Mokoryontet kule, Mosoŋolyolyi ani picu, oyiyisye piko cepo ŋelyepik alak, oko kutuwak cepo piko alak, ntene nka mpo yoto kupuryo kot kulimwo pikwani.’’
Kunyo ŋalalet nyepo ŋelyepik alak kunye porcini ŋalek piko co puryo kot kuyen, nto ŋalalet nye cemwoytoy lokoywekap Yiyintet kunye porcini ŋalek piko co kikoyen.
Kunyo ye keyomokey pikap Yiyintet oŋnkucec kuŋalal om ŋelyepik alak, oŋnkukwa orit piko cepo saŋ nto piko co puryo kot kuyen, kupuryo kot kumwowu cek kule kopunwok akwek metewok?
Ntene ye kaŋalal piko tokol lokoywek cepo Yiyintet, oŋnkukwa orit piko alak cepo saŋ nto piko co puryo kot kucömis, mosukonket cito miyotyenyi om ŋalek ce kalim ce cemwowu mosukumutyikey musankut.
Mosukonket om moyenyi, mosukukutuny oŋnkusay Yiyintet kuror kumwoy kule, “Oponte akwek Yiyintet kupoyit manta.’’

Mpo yeya, ŋalek ce omwowu cu. Ye koyomekey akwek om sayet, kuponto cito ake tumnto, kuponto ake konetisyet, kuponto ake ŋoŋutyet nye cone wule mite Yiyintet, kuponto ake ŋalalet nyepo ŋelyepik alak, oŋnkumuce cito ake mpo kupor kule mwowu ne ŋalek ce komwoy.Kumöce kule kukalya ŋalecato tokol pikap Yiyintet.
Ye möce cito ake kule waŋalal ŋelyepik alak, kumöce kuŋalal piko oyenku nto somok kurupekey picoto oŋnkuroke cito ake kupor topon kito nye mwowu ŋalecato.
Nteye puryo kot kumite yoto cito ake nye muce kot kupor kule mwowu ne ŋalecato, kuroke kusis nye maŋalal cito nyo ŋolole ŋelyepik alak om tuyet, ntene kuŋalal neto kwine nkit oko Yiyintet.
Misyini kuŋalal pate piko oyeny nto somok ce kocikoci lokoywekap Yiyintet, oŋnkulimnta piko alak kukäs koyoyec topon ŋalek ce mwowu.
Nteye kanyor cito ake nye kepur tuyet lokoywek ce kwone wule mite Yiyintet, kumisyini kusis cito nyo koŋolole.
Omuci akwek piko tokol ce mite tuyet oŋalale akenke akenke sukuŋet anetkey cititirok.
Möce cito nyo mwoytoy lokoywek cepo Yiyintet kurip topon ŋalek ce ŋolole.
Omnye Yiyintet kunye puryo kot kupo tankwarat, ntene Yiyintet nyepo kalyet. Kuyu wule yunto om wulyo tokol wule mite pikap Yiyintet,
Möce kusisio koruk ye mite cek tuyet nyepo pikap Yiyintet. Puryo kot ce cömncini cekto kuŋalal kuyu wulo mwowu ntarastinek.
Ye möce kule cinket ŋolyo ake tokol, kuroke kutepe sanikwa ye mite korikwa. Ŋolyo nyepo kalilan ye kaŋalale korko tuyet nyepo pikap Yiyintet.
Kicone so ŋolyontetap Yiyintet wule omite akwek? Nto kico wule omite akwek nkit?
Ye sote cito ake kule oyiku kiyokintetap Yiyintet, nto sote kule oponte kokotutyet nyepo soponto nyetilil, kumisyini konket cicoto kule ŋalecu osilwok ani kuce kwone ntarastinekap Yiyintet.
Ye katay malim ŋalecu, kumerok mpo olimnci akwek neto.
Kunyo mpo yeya, asat mukuleywekwok om mwaytayet nyepo lokoywekap Yiyintet, ntene monte omwaytatet akerekte ŋalalet nyepo ŋelyepik alak.
Misyini kyiy kiy ake tokol topon om aret nye rotat.
Mpo yeya, amöce ani yawut kule asotwok akwek lokoywek ce toponec co kyomwowok, coto kuco kyonyoru ce kikwil koyenet nyimwoŋ.
Lokoywek coto, kuce lokoywek ce toponec co kyomwowok. Mososopce ye kanäm topon lokoywek ce toponec, tos ye kyoyen parak pate.
Kyomwowok ŋalek ce woyec koromun ce kyonyoru mpo ani, kule, kimeci Kristo miyotyonik kyacek, kuyu wulo kicesilyo om silutekap Yiyintet,
kule kicemuy neto, oŋnkyiŋet kotutune met om pesyet nyepo somok kuyu wule kicesilyo om silutekap Yiyintet.
Oŋnkuporkyikey neto Kefa, oko yec kiyokik taman ok oyeny.
Oŋnkuporkyikey neto yec aret akenke konomikyi ce kikeyte pokolwokik mut ce tokusoptos coto okoy kunyi nka kot kipok alake.
Yoto kuporkyikey Yakopo oko yec kiyokik tokol.
Nto om letutap coto tokol, kuporwokey mpo ani kuyu lekwa nye kiciwos.
Omnye oyiku ani nye miniŋ koromun om kiyokik, nye puryo kot kuyeme cekureno kiyokin, omnye kyotoŋonyi koromun pikap Yiyintet.

Ntene oyuye wule ayunte om poypoyetap Yiyintet, kunyo puryo kot kupoyit püc poypoyenyi nye kikono ani, ntene kyayiy yisyonutek ce caŋ kupël kiyokik alak tokol, nka kot kipuryo kot ku ani nkit nye kyoyiye, ntene om paypoyetap Yiyintet nye yiyisyi om kule amite.
Kunyo ye kwone wule amite ani nto kwone wule mite cek kuce, ŋelecato ce cemwoytoy acek tokol oŋnku ŋalecato ce kyoyen akwek.
Kunyo yawut, ye lokoywek ce cemwoytoy kucu kule, kiciŋet Yesu kotutune met, komuce kulene piko alake om akwek kumwoy kule puryo kot komuce kotutune met piko ce kipok?
Nteye manta ŋalek coto kuporkey kule kipuryo kot ciŋet Yesu kotutune met.
Nteye kipuryo kot ciŋet Yesu kotutune met, kuporkey kule po püc pate ŋalek ce kicemwowok acek, oŋnkupoyit koyenet nyimwoŋ püc pate.
Oŋnkuporkey kule ciperperisyi acek om wule mite Yiyintet omnye kicemwowu kule kiŋet Yiyintet Yesu kotutune met. Ye po manta kule puryo kotutune met piko ce kipok.
Kunyo ye puryo kot kotutune met piko ce kipok, kuporkey kule kipuryo kot kotutune met Yesu.
Nteye kipuryo kot kotutune met Yesu kuporkey kule koperperisyo pate koyenet nyimwoŋ oŋnkutoyiku potyotin om miyotyonikwok.
Kuporkey mpo yec kule kipotyo mpo piko co kipok kucöme cekto Kristo.
Nteye kokenotet nyinyacek om wule mite Kristo kunye topon om soponto nyepo pesyosyecu pate, nye puryo kito ake yec, kuporkey kule roke cerirenec cikalyec acek kupël ci tokol om koret tokol.
Ntene ŋolyontet nyepo manta kunyi kule, kiciŋet kotutune met Kristo nye kikwil kule mosiciŋet kotutune met mpo piko co kipok.
Kuyu wulo kico met kupunune wule mite cito, kuyunyoto mosicitutune met kupunte wule mite cito.
Kuyu wulo kipok piko tokol omnye kipunune cekto koyomotet nye ponto oko Atam, kuyunyoto mosiciŋet kotutune met piko tokol kupunune koyomotet nye ponto oko Kristo.
Ntene oŋnku ci tokol om otepto nyenyi kwine nkit om pesyet nyo cone neto. Kristo kunye po tayta, kuker piko cepo Kristo.
Nteye kapok coto kuco pesyet nyepo letut, ye mosukokoyto neto poytoyisyet kukoci Yiyintet om letut ye kakwaranta poytoyisyonik tokol oko swamanik oko kamukeywek.
Omnye misyini kupoytoyis Kristo okoy kupël Yiyintet punikyi tokol oŋnkukoci kopurune ŋonyutap kerenkokyi.
Puniyontet nyepo letut nye mosicipël ku met.

Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Kikokoci Yiyintet kopurune tukuk tokol ŋonyutap kerenkokyi.’’ Poru ŋalecu kule, “Tukuk tokol.’’ Kunye puryo kot kumite orit mpene Yiyintet nyo kikoci kopurune tukuk tokol ŋonyutap Kristo.

Ntene ye kocikoci kopurune tukuk tokol poytoyisyet nyepo Kristo, kunyo Werit nkit nye mosukuweckey kupurune ŋonyutap Yiyintet nyo kikokoci kopurune tukuk tokol wule mite Kristo, sukuŋet kupayta Yiyintet tukuk tokol.

Kunyo yawut yec, nto piko ce kicepatisan om kaynetap piko co kipok? Mosukunyor coto kiy ne? Nteye po manta kule puryo kot kotutune met piko co kipok, kunyo omne sicepotisone cekto om kaynetap co kipok?
Nto acek omne sicetaŋany kila sawa.
Mpo yeya, orice ani met okokoy, kupo silotet nye oponte om wule omite akwek om soponto nyepo Kristo kunye sutwo omwowu ŋalecutecu.
Kiy ne nye omuci onyoru ani kuyu cito nye kyoporye oko tyoŋik om wuli po Efeso. Kunyo ye puryo kot komuce kotutune met piko co kipok, Kyaste nas, kyomisye oŋnkyeyesye omnye mocepoku tun.
Monte ciperperak: “Coronutek ce miyotec kuce wurtoy kopurto nye topon.’’
Oketyikey akwek kasoteywek cikwok cepo manta, ayaste arustunwekwok cepo miyotyet. Komwowu ani ŋalecu kusornenok akwek, omnye menkete piko alake om akwek Yiyintet.
Mosukutep citake kule, “Muce kotutune met piko ce kipok kulene? Mosukunyor cekto porto nye yu ne?’’
Yiku nyi perper! Ye kekol nyi kupuswontet, ku puryo kot kume kunyo nto turu kupit.
Kole nyi koci ŋony kupuswontet nkit, oŋnkopo nkanu nto kupuswo ake tokol, ntene puryo kot ku ketit tokol nye pite kuwoyit.
Kocini Yiyintet kupuswontonoto porto kuyu wule moktoy. Kocini kupuswo ake tokol porto nye nyenyi nkit.
Puryo kot kukerkey panyek cepo tukuk tokol ce soptos. Ponto piko panyek cikwa, kuponto tyoŋik panyek cikwa, kuponto toritek panyek cikwa, kuponto purpurunek panyek cikwa.
Kunyo mite mpo tukuk cepo koret torot oko tukuk cepo koret ŋony, kumite toponiyet nyepo tukuk cepo torot, oŋnkumite toponiyet nyepo tukuk cepo ŋony.
Ponto asista toponiyet nye nyenyi nkit, kuponto arawet toponiyet nye nyenyi nkit, oŋnkuponto kokelik toponiyet wok ce cepciyotin, omnye puryo kot kukerkey kokelik om toponiyet nye ponto.
Mosukwiytakey nyoto om pesyet nyo tutune met piko. Nune porto ye kacemuy, puryo kot kunune porto ye kakotutune met.
Cemuye porto nye puryo kot kuponto woyinto, ntene tutune met porto nye ponto woyinto. Cemuye porto nye puryo kot kuponto swamet, ntene tutune met porto nye ponto swamet.
Cemuye kuyu porto nyepo kwak, ntene tutune met kwek porto nye ponto soponto nyepo okokoy. Ye mite porto nyepo kwak, kumite yec mpo porto nye ponto soponto nyepo okokoy.
Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Kicitany Atam cito nyepo tayta kusop kuponto soponto nyepo kwak,’’ ntene Atam nyepo letut kunye konu Soponto nyepo Muyet Nyetilil.
Puryo kot kunyosyi kuco soponto nyepo okokoy, ntene soponto nyepo kwak nye nyosyi ntekere soponto nyepo okokoy.
Kicitany Atam nyepo tayta kucone teŋek, ntene cone Atam nyepo oyeny torot.
Kerkey piko cepo koret oko cito nyo kicitanye teŋek cepo koret, kukerkey piko cepo torot oko cito nyo cone torot.
Kuyu wulo kicilac acek tonto nyepo cito nyo kicitanye teŋek, kuyunyoto musicilac tonto nyepo cito nyo cone torot.
Mpo yeya, ŋalek ce koporu ani kucu kule, puryo kot kunyoru porto oko korotik poytoyisyet nyepo Yiyintet, oŋnkupuryo kot kunyoru kito nye nune kito nye puryo kot kunune.

Olim omwowok ŋalecu wuŋotin kule, puryo kot cepoku acek tokol, ntene ye kaciy kontit nyepo letut mosicewecec acek lakwar kuyu wulo lekecectoy koŋnta. Omnye ye kaciy kontit mosokuŋetyo piko nye komo kopoku mosicewecewecec acek tokol.
Omnye misyini kulac kito nye nune kito nye puryo kot kunune, oŋnkulac kito nye me kito nye puryo kot kume.

Yoto ye kacilac kito nye nune kilokyi kito nyo puryo kunune, oŋnkyilac kito nye me cilokyi kito nye puryo kot kume. Yoto kuye kwitita kupoyit manta silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Kakyaranta met, kupok poryet!’’
“Nyi met, pëlisyi nyi oyu? Nyi met, ono swamet nyeŋuŋ.’’
Nyortoy met swamet nye wutisye wule mite miyotyet, kunyortoy miyotyet swamet nye wutisye wule mite ntarastinek.
Ntene cikaste Yiyintet nye konec acek cipëlisye kupunte Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
Kunyo mpo yeya cämanik, oyoŋnkye okwilokisye topon, oyiyisye okokoy om yisyemwoŋ nyepo Mokoryontet, omnye oŋnketi akwek kule puryo yisyo nye oyiye om yisyetap Mokoryontet nye moponto latik.
Kunyo yawut ŋalek ce nöme pesanik co ciruruce sukuŋet cikalye pikap Yiyintet ce mite Yuteya. Misyini ayiy akwek kuyu wulo kyomwocini ani pikap Yiyintet cepo Kalatiya.
Roke kukonune ci ake tokol om akwek pesanik tukusic ce kanyor kuyu wule muktoy ye pesyetap santey, sukuŋet mente yec kot ciruruc pesan ye kaco ani wule omite akwek.
Nteye kaco ani, mosoyokte piko ce kakwey akwek nkit kupa Yerusalem kusut kokotutekwok.
Nteye keporkey kule mite latik owetekey ani picoto, kuye cepetekey tokol.
Masoco wule omite akwek om letut ye kawo opunte Meketoniya, omnye amoce kule apunte wuloto.
Mosopur oko akwek pesyos ce ŋeri, nto pesyet ake opur awany pesyosyek cepo koyitityet tokol. Yoto kuye okalya om poninekyu om wulyo ake tokol wule mosowo.
Omnye puryo kot amoce ani kule copur oko akwek awany pesyos tukusic pate ye okeytoy. Asoti kule mosopur oko akwek awany pesyos ce caŋ ye kacäm Mokoryontet.
Ntene mosopur wuli po Efeso okoy pesyetap Pentekoste.
Yatat kurket om wuli, mite yisyet nyewo nka kot kumite piko ce caŋ ce kerektoy yisyet.
Ye kuco Timosewo okoy wule omite akwek kumöce kule atoroc oŋerekyi, sukuŋet kuŋerec om wule omite akwek; omnye yiyisyi yisyetap Mokoryontet kuyu wulo oyiyisyi ani.
Puryo kuroke kot kunyil citake neto, ntene möce akalye kutosyikey poninekyi om kalyet sukuŋet kuketkey kuco amite ani, omnye amite okonye neto oko mpo yeya alak.
Kunyo ŋalek ce nöme yeya Apolo, kwasaysay ani neto oko mpo yeya alak kule kuco kurutocok akwek, ntene tompo kuwoŋnkyi kule aco yawut pakenke, mosukuco ye kanyor poroyinto.
Oŋomekitu, oŋnkoyoŋnkye okwilokisye om koyenet, oyiku nyikon oŋnkopoyitu swama.
Oyiye yisyonutek tokol om cömisyet.
Oŋnket akwek Stefana oko pikap kanyi, cekto kuce piko ce kinyosyo cewec kwek Kristayek om Akaya kunyo kicikenekey cekto om yisyet nyepo pikap Yiyintet. Mpo yeya, osomok ani kule
arup kantoyintet nyepo piko ceyucoto oko ci ake tokol nye kolyoyisyi oŋnkwiyisyi wanak oko cekto.
Oyiku ani ŋerekat omnye kukwa mpo Stefana oko Fortunato oko Akayiko, omnye kukwiy cekto tukuk ce kumo oponte akwek poroyinto nye oyiye.
Kukuŋereca ani cekto, oŋnkuŋerecak mpo akwek, möce oŋnketi akwek piko ce yuco.
Kesupayak akwek pikap Yiyintet cepo koretap Asia. Kesupayak akwek Akwila oko Prisika pikap Yiyintet ce tuytos om koto nyimwa om kosupoyisyet nyepo poypoyet om Kristo.
Kesupayak akwek mpo yeya tokol ce mite wuli asupayikey akwek aŋatutkey kuyu mpo yeya.
Ani nkit nye kosile ŋalecu om yewumwani. Kasupayak ani Paulo.
Ye puryo kot kucöme ci ake tokol Mokoryontet, kucupot nyoto! Ico Mokoryontet!
Opurte akwek tokol poypoyetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu.
Kopur cömisyet nyimwani wule omite akwek tokol om koyomotet oko Yesu Kristo. Yunyoto.
Cone parwani wule omite ani Paulo nye kiyokintetap Yesu Kristo om cömisyetap Yiyintet oŋnkucone wule mite yeyanyo Timosewo. Cesilyini pikap Yiyintet cepo Korinso oko pikap Yiyintet tokol cepo Akaya.
Kante kukonok Yiyintet Papanyo oko Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo poypoyet oko kalyet.
Cikasta Yiyintet kwanitap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo. Papa nyoto nyepo poypoyet oŋnku nye konu kokolyoyisyet tokol!
Kolyec acek neto wuyinwek tokol, sukuŋet cimuc cikalye piko co ponto wuyinwek wok tokol, ciyisye kokolyoyisyet nye kerkey nyo kicenyoru kucone wule mite Yiyintet.
Omnye kuyu wulo ceponte toŋoŋutek cecaŋ ce kerkey oko cepo Kristo, kuyunyoto cenyoru mpo kokolyoyisyet nyewo kupunte wule mite Kristo.
Ye kacetaŋany acek, kukacetaŋany kupo kokolyoyisyemwoŋ oko kosopet, nteye kacikalyak mpo akwek mosicikalyak oŋnkyekonok swamet omuytoci toŋoŋutek ce kerkey ce cemuytocini acek.
Kunyo mocewewecikey kenyis kokenotet nye ceponte acek om wule omite akwek. Cinket kule kuyu wulo onyoru mpo akwek toŋoŋutek ce kerkey cicacek, kunyo mosonyoru mpo akwek kakalyayet nye cenyoru acek.
Mpo yeya, ce möce kule oŋnket akwek wuyinto nye kicenyoru acek om Asia. Kicenyoru wuyinto nyewo nye nyikisit koromun okoy cemwowu kule komo cesoptosi.
Kicisot yoto kule kacemutwec musankut nyepo met. Ntene kikwiyakay kuyunyoto sukuŋet komo cikenekey swamet nyinyacek nkit, ntene cikenekey Yiyintet nyo ŋete piko kotutune met.
Kisorwec Yiyintet om met nye miyat nye yunyoto, kunyo kicikenekey kule mosukusorwec yec.
Kunyo ye kokalyec acek akwek osomwec, yoto kuye mosukupunto somset nyepo piko ce caŋ wule mite Yiyintet om poypoyenyi nkit.

Ŋolyontet nye cesilekey acek kunyi, porwec kasoteywekyacek kopurto wule kicipurte acek om koroni, nto kupëlis om wule omite akwek. Kicipurte kopurto nye toku nyepo manta nyetilil, nyoto kunye kopurto nye konu Yiyintet om poypoyenyi nye puryo kot ku ŋomnon nyepo cito.
Omnye cesilwok acek pate ŋalek ce omuci asuman oŋnkonket. Asoti ani kule mosonket akwek topon.

Ŋalek ce oŋnketi akwek yawut kererya kuce mosonket coto om pesyetap Mokoryontet Yesu, oŋnkyinket kule oponte akwek ŋolyontet nye osilekey om wule ce mite acek kuyu wule cesilekey mpo acek om wule omite akwek.
Kyonket ani topon ŋalecutecu saŋet ayiytekey orutocok akwek nyepo tayta sukuŋet onyoru kupeyok aret oyeny.
Omnye kyayiytekey yoto kule orutocok akwek om poninekyu cepo Meketoniya oko yec ye owecekey saŋet anyoru kakalyayet nyimwakwek om poninekwani ye oweti Yuteya.
Kyoteltelen ani so yoto ye kyoyiytoy coto? Ye oyiytoykey ani so oyiytoykey kuyu cito nyepo koret? Nye muce omwowu kule “Yunyoto, Nto moyunyoto, om yoto pakenke?’’
Yiyintet kunye po manta! Kurtoyemwani om wule omite akwek kipuryo kot kule. “Yunyoto,’’ nto “Moyunyoto.’’
Omnye Yesu Kristo Weritap Yiyintet, nyo kimwowok Silwano oko Timosewo oŋnkomwowok ani kunye kipuryo kot ku kule, “Yunyoto,’’ nto “Puryo’’ Ntene om wule mite neto ku kule, “Yunyoto.’’
Omnye kupunte wule mite neto kuye koyitita Yiyintet kurtoyet nyenyi tokol. Kunyo sukuŋet cemwowu acek kule “Yunyoto’’ Kupunte wule mite neto cikaste Yiyintet.
Omnye Yiyintet kunye kwile soponto nyinyacek oko nyimwakwek om wule mite Kristo. Yiyintet nkit kunye kiŋapec kukweyec acek.
Neto kunye kiŋapenec pelutyet nyenyi oŋnkukoci Muyet Nyetilil mukuleywekyacek kwek kwilatet nyepo tukuk ceponto neto ce cicacek.
Yiyintet nye muncururwet nyimwani. Nkete mukuleyto nyimwani! Kipuryo kot aco ani Korinso omnye kyakalyak akwek.
Puryo kot cesyeme acek kule cekerak koŋ om ŋalek ce mocäm, omnye oponte koyenet nye kwilat, ntene ciku piko ce kiciyisyi tokol kupo ŋerekwek cikwakwek.
Kunyo kyowoŋnkyi ŋolyontoni om mukuleymwani kule puryo amoce aco wule omite akwek osutwok nerekwek.
Omnye ye kanerecak ani akwek, ku ŋo yec cito nye ŋetu nye muce kuŋereca ani? Nyoto kunye cito nyo kyanerec ani!
Kuyunyoto sukuŋet osilwok ani parwani, kupuryo kot amoce yec kule aco cokunerekis piko ce keteŋereco ani, omnye oŋnketi topon kule ye ayiku ani ŋerekat, kuye mosoŋerec mpo akwek.
Kyosilwok yoto oponte wuyinto oko nerekwek ce mite mukuleyto oko lokik, nye kimomöce kule onerekisye, ntene kyomöce kule sonket kule ocömok ani akwek koromun.
Ye mite citake nye kinerec cito ake, kipuryo kot kunereca ani, ntene kinerecak akwek tokol, nka kot momoce ani kule omwontyok akwek.
Yeme cico lelisto ye komutyi akwek piko ce caŋ musankut.
Kunyo misyini akalye akwek oŋnkotitir neto, sukuŋet mente kot kunyikisyi nerekwek okoy kutoyis kuwoŋnkyi.
Osomok ani möce oporci kule ocöme akwek neto.
Kyosilwok ani parwana. Kule asyemak akäs oŋnkomuci otitir; oŋnkomuci kot arup konetisyet nyepo tukuk tokol.
Ci ake tokol nye kokalye akwek lelis nye kakwiy mosakalye mpo ani neto ŋolyo ake tokol, nteye kakalye; kukakalye om Kristo om kaynemwakwek.
Cinket ŋomnonet nyepo Setanit kunyo puryo kot kuroke cikoci acek poroyinto kot kuperperec.
Nteyu kowo apunte ani Troa amwayte lokoywek ce toponec cepo Kristo, onyoru yoto kule kiyat Mokoryontet aret nyepo yisyet om wuloto.
Ntene kyasot koromun omnye kipuryo kot onyoru yeyanyo Tito. Yoto oyomis pikap woloto oŋnkonomen awo Meketoniya.

Ntene cikaste Yiyintet! Omnye om koyomotet nye ceponte oko Kristo kunye ntowec Yiyintet okokoy cipëlisye. Yiyisyenec acek neto sukuŋet cemwayte lokoywek ce toponec kupunte wulyo tokol kuyu kiy nye poŋu topon.
Omnye cekerkeyekey acek oko korosek ce poŋu topon ce pele Kristo sukunet kupunto wule mite Yiyintet. Peti korosecoto wulyo tokol wule mite piko co mite cisope oko co peti wokusoptos.
Korosyontoni poŋu topon kunye poru soponto om wule mite piko co cisope, oŋnkupor met om wule mite piko co peti wokupotos. Kunyo ŋo nye muce yisyoni?

Puryo kot cerkeyekey acek oko piko alak ce caŋ ce yiyisye lokoywekap Yiyintet kupoyit kamonkesyantit. Ntene omnye kikoyoktec acek neto, kunyo ceŋololi om tay nyi cepo manta om poypoyet, kuyu mutworikap Kristo.
Poru pa ŋalecu kuyunye cemite acek yec cesilekey? Ce moce ra poronok ce portec acek om wule amite akwek, nto akwek om wule cemite acek, kuyu wulo yiytoy piko alake?
Oyiku akwek nkit parwet nyinyacek nye kicesil mukuleywekyacek orit, nye cinkete oŋnkusumone piko tokol.

Porukey kutok topon kule oyiku akwek parwet nye cone wule mite Kristo, nye kicesutu acek, nye puryo cesile winet, ntene kicesile Muyet nyepo Yiyintet nye sopot, nye puryo kot cesil rwantet, ntene kicesil mukuleywekap piko.
Cemwowu acek ŋalecu omnye cikenekey Yiyintet kupunte Kristo.
Puryo kot ku kule ceponte swamet nyinyacek nkit, cesutekey kule cimuci kyiy yisyoni. Ntene cone swamet wule mite Yiyintet.

Neto kunye kikonec acek cimuc kot kyiy yisyet nyepo kirotyet nyelel, omnye puryo kot ku ntarastinek co silotin, ntene Muyet Nyetilil. Sutu ntarastinek ce silotin met. Ntene konu Muyet Nyetilil soponto.
Ntene ye ntarastinek ce sutu met kuce kicesil kutok om rwontok kuce kicekon om woyinto nyewo okoy kutiŋ ye mokukäs pikap Israel tokoytap Moses omnye kilekecec.
Kupuryo kot cekonu ne Muyet Nyetilil om woyinto nyewo kupëlis?
Kunyo ye ponto woyinto ye cemutyini piko kulot musankut, kupuryo kot kuponto woyinto kupëlis ye cikocini piko tililinto!
Omnye om ŋolyontoni, kuporkey kule kito nye kiponto woyinto ikye kunye kimo kuponto nyoto yawut woyinto, omnye kutok woyinto ake nye pële nyoto.
Omnye ye kimite ikye woyinto nye kipure pesyos ce ŋeri, kunyo tya nyun woyinto nyo poyitu okokoy!
Ciku acek nyikon omnye ceponte kokenotet nyitenyi.
Puryo kot cekerkeyekey oko Moses nye kiyene tokoynyi siret kule sukuŋet mente kukäs pikap Israel wule yunto lakweyet nye kimite kipoku.
Kikerokis kasoteywekwa kupoyit manta, kunyo tokoyene siret nyoto kasoteywekwa okoy kunyi ye mite cek kusumane kitapunek cepo kirotyet yoswaket. Cinumu pate siret nyoto ye keyomokey cito oko Kristo.
Nka mpo okoy pesyosyecu, ye cesumone ntarastinekap Moses, kumite kuyene siret nyoto kasoteywekwa.
Ntene cinumu siret nyoto, ye kowekyikey cito wule mite Mokoryontet.
Kunyo, “Mokoryontet’’ nyo mwowu ŋalecu kunye Muyet Nyetilil nyoto. Nto om wulyo tokol wule mitowune Muyet Nyetilil, kutyokotin piko cepo wuloto.

Kunyo acek tokol kuce ciportoy woyinto nyepo Mokoryontet, om tokocik ce puryo kot kuyenotin. Woyinto nyoto cone wule mite Mokoryontet, nye Muyet Nyetilil nye wecec acek cekerkeyitu oko tonto nyenyi om woyinto nyewo kupëlis.
Kikonec acek Yiyintet kyiy yisyoni om poypoyenyi, kunyo cetosyinikey ceponte titirotet.

Kicetay tukuk tokol ce wuŋotin cepo menonet cepo sornon, puryo kot kyiyisye yec koperperisyo, nto mpo cemas ŋolyontetap Yiyintet, cineti kutok nye mocewunye ŋalek cepo manta. Cemöce kule cekonu konetisyet kucäm ci tokol topon om taytap Yiyintet.
Omnye ye wuŋotin lokoywek ce toponec cu cemwowu acek, kuwuŋotin pate om wule mite piko co peti wokupotos.

Puryo kot kucömisyi cekto omnye kiker oyinoto nyepo koroni kuyene menonet kasoteywekwa cikwa. Sukuŋet mente kukäs cekto topon lakweyet nye mite lokoywek ce toponec cepo tililinto nyepo Yesu Kristo; nye tonto nyepo manta nyepo Yiyintet.
Omnye puryo kot cemwoytoy acek ŋalek ce cicacek nkit. Cemwoytoy Yesu Kristo nye Mokoryontet, oŋnku ciku acek mutworik cikwok om kaynetap Yesu.

Yiyintet nyo kimwoy kule “Mosukoluci lakweyet menonet.’’ Kunye Yiyintet nyoto nye kikoci koluci lakweyet nyenyi mukuleywek cicacek, sukuŋet kusutwec lakweyet nyepo ŋomnonetap woyinto nyepo Yiyintet nye luwu om tokoytap Kristo.
Oŋnkurok yec acek cu ceponte soponto nyitenyi konorat kuce cekerkey oko terenik cepo menon, sukupor kule Yiyintet kunye ponto swamet tokol, ntene puryo kot ku nyinyacek.
Cetoŋonyi om aret tokol, ntene puryo kot kupotwec titiret, cecoŋoŋeni, ntene puryo kot kupokunenec kokenotet.
Cinyolilec, ntene puryo kot kupotwec kiy, ceŋwolec, ntene puryo kot kuwoŋntec.
Cesutoti acek pesyosyek tokol metap Yesu om porwonikyacek, sukuŋet kuporkey cekäs soponto nyenyi Kristo om porwonik cicacek.
Cemite acek okokoy om soponwek cicacek ŋoyeniyontit nyepo met om kaynetap Yesu, sukuŋet kutok cekäs soponto nyenyi Kristo om porwonik cicacek cu poku.
Poru ŋolyontono kule yiyisyi met om wule cemite acek, ntene kwiyisyi soponto om wule omite akwek.
Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Kyaŋalal ani, omnye kyoyen.’’ Ceŋololi mpo acek om koyenet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil nye kerkey nyoto.
Cinketi kule Yiyintet nyo kiŋete kotutune met Yesu, kunye musukuŋetec acek citutune met oko Yesu oŋnkusutwec wanak oko akwek cekwa taynyi.
Omnye cikwakwek cutecu tokol, kunyo mite kupuntoy poypoyetap Yiyintet wule mite piko ce caŋ, mosukokasta cekto om sayet kupo woyintap Yiyintet.
Puryo cecose acek mocetitir om ŋolyontoni, nka kot mite kucostos porwonik cicacek wule po panyek, ntene kumite kutosyinikey pesyosyek tokol soponwek cicacek cepo orit.
Ntene toŋoŋutecutecu tukusic oŋnkuminkec kuce mosukukonec acek woyinto nyewo nye mopoku nye pële toŋoŋutek.
Omnye puryo kot ceköse acek tukuk ce toku, ntene ceköse pate tukuk ce motoku. Pure pesyos ce ŋeri tukuk ce toku, ntene pure okokoy tukuk ce motoku.
Cinket acek kule, ye kacipuryet kuyu menet porto nyi ceponte acek om koret, mosukukonec Yiyintet koto ake nye moceminy om torot. Koto nyoto kunye kitece neto nkit nye pure okokoy.
Kunyo om yawut cerirtosi nye ce möce kule cekonec koto nyenyo nye kicetekwec nye mite torot.
Omnye ye kacilacec komo cipuri püc nye moceponte sira.

Omnye ye tocemite acek ceminye wemet nyi po koret, mosicekäs kule citoŋonyec. Puryo ku kule omnye cemöce kule cewirte porto nyi ceponte om koret, ntene ce möce pate kule cilokwec porto nyepo torot, sukuŋet cilum porto nyi po koret.
Yiyintet nkit kunye kikwiytowec acek wekwekatenyi; kunyo kikonec Muyet Nyetilil nyenyi kwek kurtoyet nyepo tukuk tokol ce pontewec acek neto.
Kunyo ce ponte acek titirotet okokoy, omnye cinketi kule ye tocemite ceponte porto om wuli po koret, kuporkey kule cemite wule low om wule mite kotap Mokoryontet.
Omnye soponto nyinyacek kunye po koyenet, nye puryo ku ceköste.
Ceponte titiret nyewo, kunyo ce möce kule cepakakte porto nyi ceponte oŋnkyipe wocipur oko Mokoryontet.
Ntene om kiy ake tokol, ce möce kule ciŋerec neto; ye ce mite wuli po koret nto ye kacipe wulin po torot.
Omnye mosiciyoŋe acek tokol taytap Kristo sukuŋet kuwosontyec. Mosukunyor ci tokol kito yeme kuyu wule yunto ŋalek ce kikwiy om soponto nyepo porto, ye kikwiy ce toponec nto ce miyotec.
Cinket acek kito nye poru ye kiciywey Yiyintet, kunyo cesyeme kule cesaysay kucömis piko. Kikonec Yiyintet kuwoŋnkyi kupoyit manta, kunyo asoti kyonketo mpo ani akwek om mukuleywekwok.

Puryo kot cesyeme yec kule ciporukey acek om wule omite akwek, ntene cemite cesyeme kule ciporwok ŋalek ce toponec; sukuŋet osilkey akwek om wule ce mite acek, oŋnkomuc owekyi piko ŋalek co silekey kuyu wule yunto cekto wulopo saŋ nye puryo kot kuyu wule yunto kopurto nyenyi nkit.
Ye kipunwec acek metewok, kukipunwec kupo Yiyintet, nteye ceponte ŋomnonet, ku ceponte kupo toponiyenyi.
Omnye ripec acek cömisyet nyepo Kristo. Kicinket ciwoŋnkyi kule kime cito akenke kumeci piko tokol, nye poru kule mosukupok piko tokol kuyu neto.
Kimeci neto piko tokol sukuŋet piko co sopcotin komokusoptos kwicek nkit ntene kukosopco om wule mite neto, nyo kime oŋnkyiŋet kupo cekto.
Kunyo kuceke yawut kuwo tay, kimo ciyoyeci acek ci ake tokol kuyu wule yunto soponto nyepo cito nyepo koret, nka kot kimite pesyosyek ce kiciyoyeci Kristo kuyu cito, kimo kuyu nyo yawut.
Ye kociyomo citake oko Kristo, kokwek nyoto kataŋanet nye lel, omnye kuwo yoswaket oŋnkuco cito nyelel.
Yiye Yiyintet ŋalecutecu tokol, kunyo kiwecec acek Kristo cekwane puniyontit okoy ciku coronutekyi, oŋnkukonec yisyet nye cewece mpo piko alak kwek coronutekyi.

Lokoywek cicacek kucu kule, mite Yiyintet kuwece kwek piko tokol coronutekyi kupunte Kristo. Kipuryo kurip koyit Yiyintet miyotyonikwa om tukuk ce kikwiy cekto. Kikonec lokoywek cepo wule cewektoy piko kwek coronutekyi.
Kunyo cemite acek yawut ceŋolole kuyu kiyokikap Kristo, Yiyintet nkit nye ŋololwok kupunte wule cemite acek, kunyo cesomok om kaynetap Kristo kule ocomisye om wule mite Yiyintet.
Kipuryo kot kuponto Kristo miyotyo, ntene kikoci Yiyintet kusut miyotyonik cicacek sukuŋet cenyoru acek ŋalek cepo manta ce konu Yiyintet.
Kunyo kuyu wulo kyiyisyi acek oko Yiyintet cesomok monte ce cäm kupot püc pate poypoyet nyo kyonyoru kucone wule mite Yiyintet.

Kuyu wulo mwowu Yiyintet kule, “Kyolimuŋ ani om pesyet nye kicecäm, Kyakalyiŋ om pesyet nyepo kosopet.’’ Limnte! Kunyo pesyet nyitenyi nye cenyorune cömisyetap Yiyintet, pesyoni kunye pesyet nyepo kosopotet.
Puryo kot cemöce acek kule kunyor citake tokol konokut, sukuŋet kuwur wurat yisyet nyinyacek. Kunyo cesyeme kule mente cekerekte aret nyepo citake.
Ntene ciporu kule ciku mutworikap Yiyintet om kiy ake tokol nye kyiye, omnye cemuytocini koromun wuyinwek tokol oko toŋoŋutek tokol.
Kicepirec, kicekerktec mopusi, kicewunuktec, kiciyisye kot cecosye nye puryo rwonto oŋnkwamec rupet.
Kunyo kiciporu acek kule ciku mutworikap Yiyintet om tililinto, oko ŋomnonet, oko muytocinotet oko tolosyet om swametap Muyet Nyetilil oko cömisyet nyinyacek nyepo manta,
oko lokoywek cicacek cepo manta om swametap Yiyintet. Ŋalek ce tililec cepo manta kuce karik ce kyiyisye ce porye oŋnkyeyetekey.
Ciyweyec acek, oŋnkyenyilec, cecupec, oŋnkyikastec, cesutec kuyu mwiynot, oŋnkurok ceŋololi ŋalek cepo manta.
Cesutec kuyu pic ce mocinket, oŋnkurok konketec piko tokol. Cesutec kuyu pic ce kipok, oŋnkurok ciku sopcotin kuyu wulo oköse akwek. Nka kot kicitaŋanyec, ntene puryo kot cepakäcec.
Nka kot kicinerecec, ntene ceŋereci okokoy. Cekerkeyekey nye ciku ponon, ntene cewece kwek piko ce caŋ mokoren. Cekerkeyekey nye ciku ponon, oŋnkurok ceponte tukuk tokol.
Mpo yeya, Korinsoyek! Koceŋololwok acek akwek ciporwok kutok, kuceŋany mukuleywek cicacek.
Puryo kot ceker cewuny mukuleywek cico om wule omite. Ntene akwek kuce kwaker awuny mukuleywek cikwok om wule cemite acek.
Oŋololi yawut kuyunye oyiku akwek lekokwani, möce oŋany mukuleywek cikwok oporwec kopurto nye kerkey nye ceponte acek om wule omite akwek.
Monte ceyiyisye oyoyeckey oko piko co puryo kot kuyen, omnye puryo kot komukoktos kuyunyo. Muce kucomnyo ŋalek cepo manta oko miyotyet? Muce kopurcini kulene lakweyet oko menonet?
Muce kucömncin kulene Kristo oko setanit? Kiy ne nye muce kwicin cito nyo kikoyen oko nye tompo koyen?

Kumuce kulene kwicin kotap Yiyintet oko ototoywek cepo piko co menket Yiyintet? Omnye ciku acek kotap Yiyintet nye sopot! Kuyu wulo kimwoy Yiyintet nkit kule, “Mosatec ani konyu wuli mite pikwani, Oŋnkominy wule mite cekto, Mosoyeku Yiyintet nyimwa, kwek cekto pikwani.’’
Mwowu mpo Mokoryontet kule, “Misyini apakakte cek, oŋnkakwane wule mite cekto. A sanekey kiy nye puryo kot kutilil. saŋet atorocak ani.
Mosoyeku ani Papamwoŋ, oŋnkoyiku akwek werikwani oko tipikwani. Mwowu Mokoryontet nyepo kamukeywek tokol kuyunyoto.’’

Corunutekwani cämanik! Kicekurtowec ŋalecutecu tokol. Kunyo möce kule cesitkey acek om wule mite kiy ake tokol, nye wurtoy kumiyatit porto nto mukuleyto. Möce cetililitu ciwoŋnkyi topon, oŋnkyipurte koyweyisyet om wule mite Yiyintet.
Oŋoŋwec mukuleywek cikwok, tompo kot celel acek om wule mite citake tokol, nto tompo mpo kot kyarante nto ciperper acek ci ake tokol.
Puryo kot omwowu ani ŋalecu nye orenyok akwek, kuyu wulo kyomwowok kunyo kule oyiku akwek cämanik ce cepontekey okokoy ye cesoptosi nto ye cepoku.
Okenenokey ani akwek koromun ye oŋololwok, kunyo osilenokey akwek koromun. Oponte titirotet nyewo om wuyinwekyo tokol. Oponte ani ŋerekwek ce caŋ kusirto.
Kipuryo kot cimuny acek mpo yu kowo cepunu Meketoniya. Kimite wuyinwek wulyo tokol, kumite wokutyet wule mite alake oko muyotet nye kimite mukuleywek cicacek.
Ntene Yiyintet nyo titire piko ce kokwilyo mukuleywek kunye kititirec omnye kico Tito.

Kipuryo kot ku kule omnye kico neto, ntene om ŋalekyi ce kimwoy, kuyu wule kyotitirte akwek neto. Kimwowec kule ömoce akwek koromun kule cekasa, oyiku nerekotin omnye oyiku yiytotin oyetyeco ani, kunyo oyiku yawut ŋerekat.
Omnye nka kot kinerecak akwek parwemwani, momwowu kule akalya omnye kyosil parwanato. Kyasowu oŋnket kule kinerecak om pesyos ce ŋeri pate, ntene nka kot kikyamwowu kule akalya,
oyiku yawut ŋerekat, nye puryo ku kule omnye kyanerecak, ntene omnye kiwecak nerekwek okoy arenynkey awec kopurto nyimwoŋ. Kikwiyisye Yiyintet nerekwek coto, kunyo puryo kot ciwurtak.
Omnye nerekwek ce yiyisye Yiyintet kuce wece mukuleyto kunyor soponto. Kunyo mocetoye ŋolyo nyeyunyo! Ntene sutu met nerekwek cepo koret.

Akäs pa wule kikwiyta Yiyintet om nerekwek kwakwek coto; kikonok asot koromun, nye kipor kule moyiku akwek lelotin! Om nerekwek oko ŋoyenotet, oko kasoteywek, oko cömisyet oko yiytayatet, yoto omutyi musankut piko ce lelotin! Kwoporu kule moponte akwek lelis om ŋolyontono tokol.

Kunyo nka kot kyosilwok ani parwanato, kipuryo kot asile kupo cito akenke nye kilel, nto kupo mpo cito akenke nye kicelel om wule mite neto. Ntene kyosilwok oporu kutok om taytap Yiyintet cömisyet nyewo nye oponte akwek om wule cemite acek.
Kuyunyoto sukuŋet cetitir acek. Kipuryo kot kotitirec acek pate, ntene kiŋerecec koromun Tito kuporwec aret nye kyakalye akwek neto.
Kyosilenokey ani akwek om wule mite neto, kunyo puryo kot awurte akwek om wule ämite ani. Kiceŋololwok okokoy ŋalek cepo manta, kunyo kukuporkey kule po manta silotet nyo kucemwocini acek Tito.
Tosyinikey kunere cömisyet nyenyi om wule omite akwek, ye kesotak kule kyoyiku yiytotin olimnci, oko kuyu wule comuye opotontye atoroc oŋerekyi neto.
Ayiku ani ŋerekat koromun omnye omuci okenenokey akwek koromun om kiy ake tokol.
Mpo yeya, cemöce acek kule oŋnket akwek ŋalek ce kikwiy poypoyetap Yiyintet om pikap Yiyintet cepo Meketoniya.
Kicesyem syemutok ce wuyec cepo toŋoŋutek ce kipunte cekto, ntene kuŋerec cek koromun kutil, omnye kiŋerec oŋnkupciw tukuk ce kiponto nka kot ki ponon.
Komwowok cepo manta kule kipciw cekto kuyu wule ki muktoy, oŋnkutil coto kikonec acek kwicek nkit.
Oŋnkusaysayec acek kule roke cecomnci cekto kukalya pikap Yiyintet om Yuteya.
Kikon cek ce caŋ kusir ce kicisotyini! Nyepo tayta kunye kikoytokey cekto om wule mite Mokoryontet oŋnkukonnkey mpo yec om wule ce mite acek om cömisyetap Yiyintet.
Kuyuyit nyoto sukuŋet cesom acek Tito nyo kicece yisyoni kuwaŋnta kukalyak awany yisyoni pciyat nyepo cömisyet.

Oyiku akwek mokoren koromun om tukuk tokol ce oponte om koyenet, oko ŋalalet, oko ŋomnonet, oko swamet nye amöce kule kyiye ce toponec, oko cömisyet nye acömec acek. Kunyo cemöce kule okolyoyisye mpo akwek om yisyoni po cömisyet.
Puryo kot amöce ani kule okonu ntarastinek, ntene oporwok wule moktoy piko alake kule cikolyoyisye. Sukuŋet oŋnket kule po cömisyet nyimwoŋ manta.
Omnye oŋnket akwek poypoyetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo, nka kot ki mokoryo neto kuyu wule kiyunto, ntene kiweckey kwek panan kupo akwek, kule sukuŋet omokoren akwek kupunte pananiyantit nyenyi.
Kunyo okonok ŋomnonet nyimwani om ŋolyontoni kule, roke awany akwek yawut yisyet nyo kyocec kenyit nyankwe. Oyiku akwek cepo tayta; puryo kot ku kule oyiyisye pate, ntene kyocöme kule kyiyisye.
Otosyikey kuyunyoto okoy awany yisyet. Otitir awany yisyonoto kuyu wule kikyokoytekey oyiyisye tukuk ce oponte.
Ye möce cito kule okolyoyisye okonu, kucöme Yiyintet kokotutyet nye muce kukon; neto ntene puryo kot kuce moponto.
Puryo kot kuroke kule cetorwok akwek nyikisinto sukuŋet cikuskus nyikisinto nyepo alak.

Omnye oponte akwek yawut tukuk ce caŋ kuporkey kule misyini akalye piko co möce kokolyoyisyet, nto punto pesyosyek ce omöce akwek kokolyoyisyet oŋnkuponto cekto tukuk ce caŋ, mosukukalyak akwek cekto yoto. Om aret nyeyunyitenyi kuye mosiciyoyec piko tokol.
Kuyu wulo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Cito nye kiruruc ce caŋ, kunye moponto ce caŋ, nto nye kiruruc ce ŋeri kunye puryo kot kurorci.’’
Cikostoy Yiyintet koromun nye kikoci Tito mukuleytap kokolyoyisyet nye kerkey oko nyinyacek, kumac kule kukalyak akwek.
Kicesom acek neto kuco wulo omite akwek, ntene kimite kuyiytat kwine nkit kule aco.
Kociyoku neto oko yeya akenke nye ciyweye koromun om wule mite pikap Yiyintet om yisyenyi nye mwoytoti Lokoywek ce toponec.
Kunyo kikwey pikap Yiyintet neto kule cepesetate oko acek ye cemwoytoti yisyet nyepo cömisyet nyepo woyinto nyepo Mokoryontet oŋnkuporu kule cemöce kakalyayet.
Ceripekey acek koromun kule mente kot cesutu kaŋunyŋunyet om wule ceriptoy kokotutecutecu konu piko.
Yisyet nye cetyikini acek kunye ce möce kule kyiy kito nyepo manta om taytap Yiyintet oko taytap piko.
Kunyo kociyoku acek cekto oko yeyanyo ake nye kucekir acek neto aret ce caŋ okoy cinket kule titirot koromun kule okolyoyisye. Kunyo omnye kenenokey neto akwek, möce koromun kule akalyak akwek.
Nto Tito kunye cito nye kyiyisyi acek tukway cikalyak akwek. Nto mpo yeya cut alak cekwontoykey neto kuce sutu woyintap Kristo om kaynetap pikap Yiyintet.
Oporci akwek cekto cömisyet nyimwoŋ sukuŋet kukäs pikap Yiyintet tokol oŋnkunket kule cepoye acek manta ye cesilenokey akwek.
Puryo kot kuroke osilwok ani akwek ŋalek ce nöme kokolyoyisyet nyo mite cesutyini pikap Yiyintet.

Oŋnket kule omöce kule cikolyoyisye, kunyo kwosilkey ani om wule mite pikap Meketoniya omwoci kule, “Mpo yeya cepo Akaya kuce kiyiytakey kukolyoyis kuceke kenyit nyankwe.’’ Kunyo kokowurur cömisyet nyimwoŋ cekto.
Koyoku yawut mpo yeya cutecu sukuŋet mente kwek silotet nyinyacek ŋal cepo kutit pate, ntene kupoyit manta kuyu wulo kwomwowu kule oyiku akwek yiytotin okolyoyisye.
Nto pesyet ake ye kacekwantekey acek pikap Meketoniya oŋnkwocenyoru kule puryo kot oyiku akwek yiytotin, kupuryo kot cecurokyisyi acek nkit, yoto mosocurokisye mpo akwek omnye kicesilkey wokutil.

Kunyo kwasot kule misyini omwoci mpo yeya cutecu kunyosyeno kukwa wule omite akwek oŋnkwokuyiyta kokotutek co kyokurte akwek kutompo kot kupunte pesyet, sukuŋet ye kopunu ani conyoru kukuciyta topon, yoto kupor kule okonu akwek kokotutek nye ocöme nye puryo kot omnye kocisimncok
Möce oŋnket kule, “Nye kakol kupuswek ce ŋeri, kunye nyoru omik ce ŋeri, nto nye kakol kupuswek ce caŋ, kunye nyoru omik ce caŋ.’’
Kunyo misyini kukon ci ake tokol kuyu wule kacämnta nkit om moyenyi nye puryo kot kumwowu kule kokoyte püc pate nto kocisimnci. Omnye cöme Yiyintet nyo konu om ŋerekwek.
Kunyo muce kukonok ce caŋ kusir ce omöce sukuŋet onyoru ce caŋ om kiy ake tokol nye omöce akwek, sukuŋet akalya yisyet tokol nye topon.
Kuyu wulo mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Pciytoy Yiyintet püc pate, kupcici pononik, Pure cömisyet nyenyi okokoy okoy okokoy.’’
Kunyo Yiyintet nyo kocini kolintet kupuswek oŋnkukoci omik ce ome, kunye mosukukonok kukoci kuteris kupityo kupuswek cikwok, sukuŋet kupityo kupuswek ce caŋ cepo poypoyemwoŋ.
Mosukukonok Yiyintet akwek oyiku mokoren kuyemak sokolyoyisye okokoy, sukuŋet kukasta piko ce caŋ Yiyintet om kokotutek ce cikwakwek ce kyokoci kupunte wule mite cekto.
Omnye puryo kot kukolyoy pikap Yiyintet nkit pate tukuk cu okonu akwek, ntene sutu mpo kakastayet nyewo om wule mite Yiyintet
Kunyo om yisyet nyimwakwek nyitenyi, kunye sutu kukasta piko ce caŋ Yiyintet omnye oyeni akwek lokoywek ce toponec cepo Kristo, oko kokolyoyisyet nye okolyoy piko alak.
Yoto ye mosukusomwok cekto akwek koromun omnye oponte poypoyet nye pciyat nye kikoporwok Yiyintet.
Cikaste Yiyintet om kokotutekyi ce caŋ ce mociyite.
Osomok ani Paulo nkit, om kokolyoyisyet oko tolosyetap Kristo. Ani nyo cemwowu kule oyiku tala ye cepontekey oko akwek, ntene oyiku nyeker om wule omite akwek ye mocepontekey.
Osomok akwek kule ye cepontekey oko akwek monte cesutwo anyekeritu om wule mite piko co sote kule kyiyisyi acek cerupe cepo koret.
Manta kule cemite acek koret, ntene puryo ceporye kyiyisye cepo koret.
Karik ce kyiyisye om poryet kuce puryo kot kupo koret, ntene kyiyisye karikap Yiyintet cepo swamet ce turpupe totet tokol nye wuyi. Kyorontoy tintenotet nyepo mwiynan.
Citurpupi ŋolyo ake tokol nyepo silot nye kacemwoy cekerekte ŋomnonet nyepo Yiyintet. Cenome ŋolyo kwek mopusyo oŋnkyewec kuywey Kristo.
Ye kopurukey akwek kule kocepoyitu manta, yoto kuye moceyiytekey acek cemutyi musankut piko co mocömisyi.
Oköse akwek tukuk kuyu wule yunto wulo po saŋ. Mite pa citake wule omite akwek nye nkete kule oyiku citap Kristo? Kunyo möce kukäskey wule yunto neto nkit, omnye cepoye mpo acek Kristo kuyu neto.
Omnye puryo kot oliloni ani nka kyosilikey wokusirto om kamukeywek ce kikonec acek Kristo. Kamukeywek coto kuce cetecenok, ntene puryo kot kuce citurpupenok.
Mömöce ani akerkeyitu nye osyeme kule omuyok akwek om poronokwani.
Omnye mosukumwoy citake kule, “Koromec koromun oŋnkuponto swamet poronokap Paulo, oŋnkurok yec ku moponto neto swama ye cepontekey oko neto, oŋnkupuryo kiy ŋalekyi!’’
Möce konket nyoto kule puryo kot kupciyotin ŋalek ce cesile acek om poronokyo ye mocepontekey oko ŋalek ce kyiye ye cepontekey oko akwek.

Ntene puryo kot kuroke cesutkey acek nkit nto ciyoyeckey acek nkit oko piko co sutekey parak. Perper coto koromun. Kiwecekey oŋnkuyoyeckey picoto kwicek nkit oŋnkusutekey parak kuyoyeckey kopurto nye nyimwa nkit!
Ntene acek kuce puryo kot cemöce kusirte silotet nyenyo ye cemokyini, mosukuŋete pate wule tento yisyet nye kikonec Yiyintet. Yisyet nyinyacek nyoto kunye kiciy om wule omite akwek.
Acek kuce kicenyosye cesutwok akwek lokoywek ce toponec cepo Kristo kutompo kot kuco citake, kunyo ye kocesilkey acek om wule omite akwek; kupuryo kot kocesirte kukeyte ye cemokyini.

Kunyo puryo kot cesilekey yisyet nye kikwiy piko alake kusirte ye ŋete nye kikonec Yiyintet. Ntene ce möce kule kuner kutosyikey koyenet nyimwoŋ, sukuŋet cimuc kot kyiy yisyet nyewo om wule omite, nto yisyet nyoto kunye ŋete ye kimwoy Yiyintet.
Yoto kuye sukuŋet cimuc acek cemwayte lokoywek ce toponec om korosyek alak kukeyte wulo omite akwek nye puryo kot cesilekey yisyet nye kikwiy citake keny om komosta nyenyi.
Ntene kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Ci tokol nye möce kule osilkey kuroke kusilkey om yisyet nye kikwiy Mokoryontet.’’
Omnye poyitu cito manta ye kacämnta Yiyintet neto, ntene puryo kot kuye kosilkey neto kwine nkit.
Osome ani kule omuytoco kuminiŋ, nka kot kaperperitu kutya.
Acorokyok ani akwek, kuyu wulo corokyok Yiyintet. Akerkeyekey akwek cepto nye mukul nye menket moron nye kyomokyi cito ake, cito nyoto ku Kristo.
Ntene oponte muyotet kule muce kuwuryo kasoteywek okoy otay nyimwoŋ nyepo manta nyepo Kristo kuyu wulo kiperpertoy Erenet Kawa kwiyisye mwiynanet nyewo nyepo ŋomnon.

Omnye omuci akwek omuytoci kot olimnci ci ake tokol nye kocomwowok Yesu ake yec, nye puryo kot ku Yesu nyo kicemwowok acek oŋnkocäm yec lokoywek oko ototoywek alak nye puryo kot ku Muyet Nyetilil oko lokoywek ce toponec co kyonyorte wule cemite acek.
Osoti kule puryo kot oyiku nye miniŋ koromun om wule mite co cekure “Kiyokik cewoyec.’’
Pesyet ake moyiku muswokin om ŋalalet, ntene oponte ŋomnonet nye oŋnketi kiy ake tokol. Kicemwowok acek akwek ŋalecoto tokol, oko om aret ake tokol nye mukoktos.
Kyomwowok lokoywek ce toponec cepo Yiyintet, nye kipuryo kot osomok kule ayal okonu kiy ake tokol. Kyosutok opoyitu akwek tayta opoyitu ani letut. Kyayiy yoto so miyat?
Kyanyapan so pesanik cepo pikap Yiyintet cepo wulyo ake omnye kyacäm kokolyoyisyet nyimwa, yo kyoyiyisyi om wule omite akwek?

Nteye kyomite wule omite akwek, kipuryo kot ayimak ani kule akalya ye kyomöce pesanik, omnye kisutwo ani mpo yeya cepo Meketoniya kiy ake tokol nye kyomöce. Kuyu wulo kiyunto yoto om kunyo, kuyunyoto wule mosukwiytakey om pesyosyek cokwoni, puryo omuci ani kot okonok akwek nyikisin.
Owolikey cepo manta om Kristo nye mitowune wule omite kule, puryo kot kusise silotet nye oponte ani om koretap Akaya tokol kumukul.
Omne somwowu ani kuyinyi? Omnye mocömok ra? Nkete Yiyintet kule ocömok ani!
Mosotosyikey ani ayiye ŋalek cu amite ayiye yawut, sukuŋet mente kunyor kiyokik cut alake kito nye mokusilekey kumwoy kule yiyisyi cekto kuyu wulo kyiyisyi acek.
Puryo kot ku kiyokik co cepo manta, po mwiynan, perperisyi om yisyet nyimwa oŋnkuweckey kule ciku kiyokikap Kristo.
Kunyo puryo kot cimuce cikite! Nka mpo Setanit komuce kuweckey nkit kukerkeyit oko malayket nyepo lakweyet!
Kunyo puryo kot ku ŋolyo nye cikite ye keporkey mutworikyi kwiye cepo manta cepo lakweyet. Mosukunyor om letut ce yeme om tukuk ce kikwiy.
Kotosyi omwowok kule, mente kot kusot citake kule oyiku ani solwo. Ntene ye osote kuyunyoto, kuroke osuto kule oyuye nyoto, sukuŋet osilkey silotet nyenyu nye miniŋ.
Manta kule ŋalek cu omwowu yawut kuce munomwowo Mokoryontet kule omwowu. Oŋololi kuyu solwo om ŋolyontoni po silotet.
Ntene omnye mite piko ce caŋ ce silekey cepo koret, kunyo mosilekey mpo ani kuyunyoto.
Oyiku akwek ŋerekotin kot omuytoci piko ce perper! Oyiku ŋomec koromun!
Omnye omuytocini ye kakwiyak citake oyiku mutwor, mpo ye koŋomok, mpo ye katëcak, mpo ye kanyilak, mpo ye kasyecak.
Osornene ye macämnte kule, kiciku nyokorec ye mokyiy tukucoto. Ntene ye möce citake kule osilkey om kiy ake tokol - Oŋololi kuyu solwo - Osilekey mpo ani.
Puraniyek so cekto? Oyiku mpo ani. Lekokap Israel so cekto? Oyiku mpo ani. Mucokoronikap Apram so cekto? Oyiku mpo ani.

Mutworikap Kristo so cekto? Oyiku mpo ani. Oŋololi ŋalecu kuyu punmetyo. Oyiku mutworin nyepo Kristo kupël cekto. Kyataŋany om yisyet nye wuyi, kicerotyo mopusi kuwany pesyosyek ce caŋ, kicepasa aret ce caŋ, kyacilile met aret ce caŋ.
Kipasa Yutayek aret mut korokonik sosom ok sokol.
Kipasa Romek aret somok. Kicewirena rwontok aret akenke. Kipuryet rapet nye kyowete aret somok. Kyopur peko orit awany sawanik tiptem ok amwan pet oko komoy.

Ye kyowesetoti ani poninek ce caŋ kyonyoru yoto toŋoŋutek cepo oyinosyek ce keyin, oko corik, oko toŋoŋutek ce kitaŋanya mpo yeya Yutayek oko lamek. Kyonyoru toŋoŋutek om moŋosyek, oko toŋoŋutek cepo tyoŋik cepo samiyita, oko toŋoŋutek cepo ruretok, oko toŋoŋutek cepo coronutek cepo mwiynan.
Kyoyiyisye ataŋany, opuri pesyosyek alak nye puryo kot orwe rwonto. Kikwama rupet oko melelya. Kyopur pesyosyek alak nye moponte omik ce oyome, oko koto nye ominye, oko sirok ce malac.
Kunyo puryo kot omwowu ani ŋalek tokol. Oponte pesyosyek tokol nyikisinto nyimwani nyepo yisyet nye nöme pikap Yiyintet.
Ye puryo kot kuponto citake swamet, opur ani nye moponte swamet, ye kesuci citake miyotyet, opur mpo ani kwapi.
Ye kosilkey ani, mosilkey om ŋalek ce poru kule moponte ani swamet koromun.
Kopurto kupeyok okokoy kaynetap Yiyintet nye kwanitap Mokoryontet Yesu! Nye nkete kule puryo kot operperisyi ani.
Ye kyomite Tamasko, yoto kumwoci kinko Areta poytoyintet kukoci sikarek kurip kurkotik cepo moŋet sukunäma ani.
Ntene ciwuteno cikaput nyewo oŋnkyipunteno pastit om totetap moŋet okoy omweye wule mite neto.
Mososilkey ani nka kot puryo kot kwiye kiy nye topon. Ntene mosaŋalale kirwotik oko ŋoŋutek ce kikono Mokoryontet.

Oŋnket ani cito akenke Kristoyintet nye kicenäm oŋnkyekwer kuwo koret nyepo somok wulin po torot om kenyisyek taman ok amwan co kitil. Moŋnket kule kukwiyakay kuyunyoto manta nto kuponto porto nto om muyet nto kyakäs ani ŋoŋutyet, Yiyintet nye nkete.
Oŋnket kule kicesut cicoto kuwo wule topon (ntene moŋnket yec kule kikwiyakay kuyunyoto nto kyakäs ani ŋoŋutyet, Yiyintet nye nkete.)
Kilim neto om wuloto ŋalek ce wuŋotin ce memuce kot kuŋalale cito.
Kunyo mosilkey ani kupo cicoto, ntene puryo kot osilkey om ŋalek ce nömo ani, tos pate om tukuk ceporu purenotet nyimwani.

Nto kwomöce ani kule osilkey, nto kupuryo kot oyiku solwo, omnye nto kwomwowu ŋalek cepo manta. Ntene puryo kot osilekey, omnye momöce kule kusotyo citake kule opoye ani parak kusir ce kikäs oyiye nto ŋalek ce kilim oŋololi ani.

Ntene sukuŋet kuripo mente kot osutkey ani om silotet kupo tukuk cepo kakitat ce kyakäs aret ce caŋ. Kicekono ani mwoninto nyepo porto nye yu kötet nye mite porto, nye yiyisyi kuyu kiyokintetap Setanit sukuŋet kupiro oŋnkukerekta mosilkey kusirto.
Kyosom ani Mokoryontet aret somok kule kunumuneno kiyitenyi.

Kuwec kumwoy kule, “Poypoyet nyimwani kunye yemiŋ nyi, omnye swamet nyimwani kunye tökune purenotet nyeŋuŋ.’’ Kunyo oyiku ŋerekat koromun osilkey omnye moponte swamet, sukuŋet kuripo swamet nyepo Kristo.
Kunyo oŋerekyini purenotet; oko cupisyet, oko nyikisinto, oko toŋoŋutek, oko wuyinwek kupo kaynetap Kristo. Omnye ye oyiku puren kuye yoto ye oponte swamet.

Oyiyisyi ani kuyu solwo. Ntene akwek kuce kwosokyo ayiy kuyunyoto. Akwek kuce kweroke acämnta ani. Omnye nka kot moponte latik, ntene puryo kot oyiku miniŋ om aret ake tokol om wule mite, “Kiyokikwok coto.’’
Kyoporwok kule oyiku ani kiyokintet om tukuk ce kyayiy om wule omite akwek om muytocinotet nyewo, coto ku pelutok oko tukuk cepo kakitat, oko yisyonutek cepo swamet.
Ntene kyoyiku akwek miyotec kulene kupël pikap Yiyintet alak, tos ani nkit pate nye mnosomok kokolyoyisyet. Osomok akalya omnye mnoyiyisye cepo manta!

Aret nyepo somok nyitenyi nye oyiku ani yiytat aco wule omite akwek, momöce kule cataŋanyak. Omocok akwek, ntene momöce pesan. Omnye puryo kot kukiy nyepo kwak kukonorci lekok poyik tukuk, ntene poyik ce konorcini lekok tukuk.
Mosaŋerec ani ye koyiyisye tukuk tokol ce oponte oŋnkokoytekey mpo ani nkit sukuŋet akalyak akwek. Omuci ocäm ani kuminiŋ aŋnkacämak ani akwek koromun?
Kunyo mosocam akwek kule kipuryo kot onyikisyok ani. Ntene mosukumwoy citake kule, kyatecak oyiyisye mwiynanet.
Kyomwowok ani so kuyunyoto ayiyisye ci ake tokol om nyo kyoyoku kuco wulo omite?
Kyosom ani Tito kuco kucontoykey yeya Kristoyintet ake, omwowu so kule kiŋomwok akwek Tito? Puryo kot kyiyisye acek oko neto kasoteywek ce kerkey oko kopurto nye kerkey?

Pesyet ake osoti akwek kule om ŋalecu tokol kuce cemite acek ceyetekey om wule omite akwek. Puryo kot kuyunyo! Ceŋololi kuyu wule moktoy Kristo kule ceŋalal om taytap Yiyintet. Mpo yeya cämanik, nto kiy ake tokol nye kyiye kunye kyiye kule sukuŋet cikalyak akwek.

Oponte muyotet kule ye kopunu wulo omite akwek, mosiconyorwok kupuryo kot oyiye kuyu wule omoktoy ani, oŋnkokäs akwek kule puryo kot ayiye ani kuyu wule omoktoy akwek. Oponte Muyotet kule mosonyoru wokutyet oko corokyinotet, nyerunotet, soynonet, cupisyet, ŋomset, silotet, oko cukurotet.

Oponte muyotet kule ye kaco yec mosukusorneno Yiyintet nyimwani om tayta nyimwakwek, kunyo mosarir ani om wule mite piko ce caŋ ce kikwiy miyotyet ce tompo kot kurenynkey om ŋalek ce somis ce kikwiy cepo sakwayanatet oko corokyinotet nye miyat.
Aret nyepo somok nyitenyi orutocok ani akwek kuyu wulo cemwoytoy kule, “Cemute musankut ye kaŋalal piko muncururwanik oyeny nto somok.’’

Yo kyopontekey oko akwek om panta nyepo oyeny, kyosowu yoto piko ce kikwiy miyotyet ikye, oŋnkosowu mpo piko alak tokol. Kunyo asowok mpo yawut ye amite wule low, nteye kaco yec aret nyepo somok kupuryo ci nye muce kucilile toŋoŋutek.
Mosokäs akwek nkit kule ŋolole Kristo kupunte wule amite ani. Puryo kot kupuren Kristo om wule omite akwek, ntene yiyisyi swamet nyenyi om wule omite.

Omnye nka kot kimoponto neto swamet yo kicewuyitocini murtowontet, ntene sopot yawut om swamet nyepo Yiyintet. Moceponte mpo acek swamet om koyomotet nye ceponte oko neto, ntene om tilyanatet nye ceponte acek oko akwek kunye mosicesopce oko neto om swametap Yiyintet.
Akäskey akwek nkit oŋnkomutyikey musankut oŋnket kule ceponte koyenet. Oŋnket pa kule mitowune Kristo wule omite akwek? Tos pate ye kyosute koromun.
Asoti ani kule mosonket akwek kule puryo kot cisute acek.
Cesome acek Yiyintet sukuŋet mente kot ayiy akwek lelis, nye puryo kot ku kule sukuŋet kuporu kule kuciy acek topon, ntene sukuŋet ayiy akwek cepo manta; nka kot ku kuporukey kuyunye kicisute acek.
Omnye puryo kot cimuci acek kot kyiy tukuk ce toyekey oko ŋalek cepo manta, kyiye pate ceporyecini.
Omnye ciku acek ŋerekotin ye moceponte swamet oŋnkoponte akwek. Kunyo cesome kule onyolu akwek owoŋnkyi.
Osilwok ani parwani kutokumite wule low om wule omite, sukuŋet ye kaco mente conyercok oyiyisye kamukeywek ce kikono Mokoryontet. Kamukeywek cutecu kuce otecenok puryo kot oturpupenok.
Kunyo mpo yeya, cemutakwey! Asyem anyoru toponiyet, alimnte ŋomnonet nyimwani, acömncine akwek kwakwek nkit. Opurte kalyet, kuye sukuŋet opurte akwek Yiyintet nyepo cömisyet oko kalyet.
Osupayikey om ŋatutet nyetilil nyepo tupcet, Kasupayak akwek pikap Yiyintet tokol.
Poypoyetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo, oko cömisyetap Yiyintet, oko koyomotet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil kopur oko akwek tokol.
Cone parwani wule amite ani Paulo; kiyokintet nye kipuryo kot kukweya ani piko nto kukweya cito, ntene kikweya Yesu Kristo nkit oko Papa nyo kiŋet Yesu kotutune met.
Ani oko mpo yeya ce cepontekey kuce cesilwok akwek pikap Yiyintet ce mite koretap Kalatiya.
Cesomwok onyoru poypoyet oko kalyet nye cone wule mite Papanyo oko Yesu Kristo.
Kristo nye kiywey cömisyetap Yiyintenyo oŋnku Papanyo oŋnkukoytokey neto sukuŋet konum miyotyonik cicacek om pesyosyecu miyotec.
Kunyo kante kupoyit woyinto wule mite Yiyintet okokoy okoy okokoy. Yunyoto.
Kwakitenak ani akäs kule omoce akwek kule kyaste lakwar Yiyintet nyo kikurok om poypoyetap Kristo, oŋnkolimnte yec lokoywek alak.
Ŋalek cepo manta kucu kule, puryo kot kumite yec lokoywek alake ce toponec. Komwowu kuyunyoto omnye mite piko alake ce mosok akwek ce syeme kule cewecwec piko cepo Kristo.
Ntene nka mpo acek nto mpo malayket nye cone torot, oŋnkusyem cokumwowok akwek lokoywek ce pciyotin ce puryo kot kukerkey oko lokoywek co kicemwowok acek, kuporkey kule misyini kucup Yiyintet cicoto.

Kicemwowu acek ŋalecu kunyo om tay, kunyo omwowu ani yec otosyini kule, ye komwowok akwek ci ake tokol lokoywek ce toponec ce puryo kot kukerkey oko lokoywek co kyocäm akwek, misyini kucup Yiyintet cicoto.
