Poru ra yawut ŋalekwani cutecu kuyunye asyeme kule sukuŋet kucäma piko? Puryo kot kuyunyo! Amöce kule kucämnta Yiyintet! Osoti akwek kule asyeme ani kule aŋerec piko? Nto kwosyeme kule aŋerec piko pate, nto puryo kot oyiku mutworintet nyepo Kristo.
Omwowok ani akwek mpo yeya kule, lokoywek ce toponec co kyomwowok akwek kuce kipuryo kot kutowu cito.
Kipuryo mpo kot kukono nto kuneta ani ci ake tokol. Ntene Yesu Kristo nkit nye kiŋoŋwo kuporwo ŋaleca.

Kyolim akwek ŋalek cepo manta cepo kopurto nye kyoponte ani ye kitorupe ntarastinek tokol cepo Yutayek. Oŋnketi akwek wule kyotoŋoŋntoy ani pikap Yiyintet, nye kipuryo kot omuye, nye kyosyeme kule opot kupotyo.
Kyopëli ani piko cepo pinta nyimwani om aret nye kyorupe tinitap Yutayek oko om aret nye kyorupe ntarastinek cepo mpo kukunyo.
Ntene Yiyintet nkit om poypoyenyi nye kikweya ani kutompo kot ceyiyo, nto om letut kukono oyici neto yisyet,
oŋnkuporwo kuŋoŋwo Werinyi kule saŋet womwoci lamek lokoywekyi ce toponec. Kipuryo kot awo wule mite ci ake tokol watepe kukono ŋomnonet nyepo kito nye mayiy.
Kipuryo mpo kot awo ani Yerusalem wakäs kiyokik co kinyosyo kwek kiyokik. Puryo kot kuyunyo. Kyanyosye awo Arapia, nto om letut oketukey yec Tamasko.
Yoto om letutap kenyisyek somok, onomen ani awo Yerusalem orutoci Petero, kule saŋet kukono lokoywek. Wopur oko neto awany pesyosyek taman oko mut.
Ntene kipuryo kot amuc ani yoto kot akäs kiyokik alak. Kyakäs pate Yakopo mutakwametitap Mokoryontenyo.
Owolikey ani om taytap Yiyintet kule po manta ŋalek tokol cu osile nye puryo kot ku mwiynan.
Nto om letut, onomen awo okoy opunte koretap Siriya.
Ntene kipuryo kot konketo Kristayek cepo Yuteya om pesyosyecoto tokol.
Kilime cek pate kumwowu piko kule, “Citye kisyeme kule ataŋanyec acek kunyi mite yawut kumwoytoti koyenet nye kisyeme neto ikye kule opot kupot.’’
Kunyo kukasta cekto Yiyintet om wule amite ani.
Nto om letutap kenyisyek taman ok amwan onomen ani aketitekey yec Yerusalem cepetekey Parnapa, yoto akwer cepetekey oko Tito.

Kyawo alaŋnte omnye kiŋoŋwo kuporwo Yiyintet kule roke awo ani wuloto. Wocetuye acek om kirwoket nye kiwuŋat oko kiyokik cewoyec nkit, oŋnkoporci cekto lokoywek ce kyomwoci ani lamek. Kipuryo kot amöce ani kule kupot pöc pate yisyemwani nye kyayiy, nto yisyet nye kyomite oyiye yoto.
Kipuryo mpo yoto kot cisimnci kule cewon Tito nye kicepontekey acek tukway, nka kot ki ci nye Kirikin.

Ntene kimöce piko alak kule cewon neto. Kikwa picoto ce kipuryo kot kupo luket nyinyacek oŋnkwokowut orit kuyu wotik kule sukuŋet kuwot oŋnkukäs kalyet nye ceponte acek om Kristo. Kimöce cekto kule cewecwecec acek ciku mutwor.
Ntene kipuryo kot cecömnci ŋalekwa mpo kisic, sukuŋet ceripok acek opurte okokoy lokoywek ce toponec.

Komwowu kule kantoyik co sutekey kule ciku cewoyec. Akure ani cekto kantoyik. Ntene yoyece Yiyintet piko tokol, omnye puryo kuköse neto kule yunto tontap cito nyepo saŋ. Kunyo kipuryo kot kuneta ani kantoyicoto ŋolyo nyelel.
Ŋalek ce kikäs cekto pate om wule amite ani kucu kule, kikono Yiyintet yisyet nye omwoytoti omwoci lamek lokoywek ce toponec, kuyu wulo kicikoci Petero yisyet kumwocinot Yutayek lokoywek ce toponec.
Omnye Yiyintet nyo kikocini Petero kwek kiyokintet nyepo Yutayek kunye kikono mpo ani oyiku kiyokintet nyepo lamek.

Kunyo Yakopo oko Kefa oko Yowana ce kicinket kule cekto kuce tolocikap piko cepo Yiyintet, kuce kinket kule kikono ani Yiyintet yisyoni pciyat. Yoto cisupaykey oko cekto cenämnkey yewuniyek, oŋnkyelimncine kule ani oko Parnapa mosicipe acek wule mite lamek, kupa cekto wule mite Yutayek.
Kimite ŋolyontet akenke nye kicecomncine kule misyini cisoti acek pononik. Ŋolyontet nyoto kunye kyoyisye ani swama okokoy kunyi.
Ntene yoto ntowo kuco Petero okoy kupun Antiyok, apolyi ani neto koromun om taytap piko tokol om ŋalek ce kitoku ce kipuryo kot kupo manta ce kikwiye.

Kikwomisyi neto kunyo oko mpo yeya cepo lamek kutompo kot kukwa piko ce kiyoku Yakopo; Ntene ntowo kupun picoto, kutoyis Petero nye komokwomisyi oko piko cut, omnye kinyokorit om wule mite piko co kimöce kule roke cewon lamek.
Yoto kuyomokey Petero oko Yutayek ce nyokorec oŋnkwiy ŋolyontoni po perperyo okoy kowut mpene Parnapa wule mite cekto picoto kinyokorec.

Nteyu kowo akäs ani kule puryo kot kurupe cekto aret nye rotat nyepo lokoywek ce toponec, yoto omwoci ani Petero om taytap piko tokol kule, “Yiku nyi Yutoyin, kunyo kwemite kwak puri kopurto nyepo lamek nye puryo kot kupo Yutayek, omne sesimnci nyi kule misyini kopur lamek kapurto nyepo Yutayek?’’
Po manta kule kiceyiyec acek ciku Yutayek, ntene puryo kot ciku lamek co ponto miyotyonik.

Kunyo cinket acek yec kule satoktos cito kunyol om wule mite Yiyintet om koyenet nye keyen pate Yesu Kristo, ntene puryo kot ku kule kocerip ntarastinek; kunyo kiciyen mpo acek Yesu Kristo sukuŋet cesatokisye cenyolu om wule mite Yiyintet kupunte koyenet nye ceponte om wule mite Kristo.

Kunyo ye cemite acek cesyeme kule cesatokisye om wule mite Yiyintet om koyomotet nyenyo nye kiciyomekey oko Kristo, oŋnkutok kuporkey yec kule ciku pic ce ponto miyotyonik kuyu wule yunto lamek, kupor pa ŋalecato kule yiyisyi Kristo yisyet nye kolyoy miyotyonik? Puryo kot kuyunyo mpo kisic!
Ye kasyem ani yec atec kuyoŋ ntarastinek ce kikyawirte kupotyo, kuporkey kule amite owurtoy.
Nto kuyu wule yunto ntarastinek, kyamey om wule mite ntarastinek saŋet arup soponto nyepo Yiyintet. Kicepakäca ani oko Kristo om murtowontenyi.

Kunyo kimosope kwani nkit, ntene Kristo kunye mitowune soponto nyimwani orit. Soponto nye osope ani yawut, kunye soponto nye osope om koyenet nye oyentyini Weritap Yiyintet; nye kicäma oŋnkukoyito soponto nyenyi kumeco ani.
Puryo kot otoye ani poypoyetap Yiyintet. Ye muce kot kusatokis kunyol piko om wule mite Yiyintet kupunte ntarastinek, kuporkey kule kime Kristo püc pate.
Akwek Kalatiyek solonocu! Kicepanak? Akwek kuce kuciporwok akäs om konyek kule kicewuyitoci Yesu kumeci murtowontet.
Kunyo omwowo ani pa akwek ŋolyontoni akenke: Kyonyoru Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet omnye kyorup Ntarastinek nto omnye kyolim oŋnkocäm lokoywek ce toponec?
Omuci akwek osolwonken kulene? Kyocece ocäm Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet, kunyo omöce yawut kule wociwaŋnte om ŋalek cepo swamet nyimwoŋ nkit?
Mokwek ŋal cepo püc pate ce puryo kot kuponto latik ŋalek tokol co kyayiy akwek. Ŋalek cepo manta kucu kule, puryo komokomukoktos kot kuyuyit nyo.

Ye kikonok Yiyintet akwek Muyet Nyetilil oŋnkwiy ŋalek cepo kakitat om wule omite akwek, kuporkey pa kule yiye Yiyintet kuyunyoto omnye orupe akwek ntarastinek nto omnye kyolim oŋnkocäm lokoywek ce toponec.

Kerkey ŋaleca oko wule mwoytoy silutekap Yiyintet om ŋalek ce nöme Apram ce mwowu kule; “Kiyen Apram kucäm Yiyintet, nto om letut nyepo koyenet nyenyi nyoto, yoto kucäm Yiyintet Apram kwek ci nyepo manta.’’
Kunyo yunyoto om wule omite akwek, misyini aŋnket kule, piko ceponto koyenet nyoto kuce mucokoronik cepo Apram.

Kiŋor silutekap Yiyintet kule mosukusat Yiyintet kunyol lamek om wule mite neto om koyenet. Kumwoy silutekap Yiyintet cepo lokoywek ce toponec ce nöme Apram kule, “Mosukukoci Yiyintet kupeyok piko cepo koret tokol kupunte wule mite nyi.’’
Kuyen Apram kucömis yoto cikoci neto kupeyok, kunyo cikocini piko tokol kupeyok ye kocömis kuyu wulo kicikocinto Apram.

Kunyo piko tokol ce kenekey kule ceripe ntarastinek, kuce kicesoci. Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kurupe oŋnkuywey ŋolyo ake tokol nye kicesil kitaputap ntarastinek kunye kicesoci cicoto!’’

Porukey yawut topon kule, puryo ci nye muce kusatakay kunyol om wule mite Yiyintet ye karup ntarastinek, omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Mosicisop ci ake tokol nye nyolunot om wule mite Yiyintet om koyenet pate.’’
Ntene puryo kukenekey ntarastinek koyenet omnye mwowu silutek kule, “Ci ake tokol nye yiye ŋalek tokol ce mwowu ntarastinek kunye mosukopurto neto nyoto ntarastinek.’’

Kristo kunye kisorwec acek om wule mite cupisyet nyepo ntarastinek, omnye kinum neto nkit cupisyet nyo sutu ntarastinek. Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Ci ake tokol nye kiciketyi ketit kunye cupot.’’

Kunyo kikwiy Kristo kuyunyoto sukuŋet kupeyokap Yiyintet co kikikurtoci Apram cikoci coto lamek kupunte wule mite Kristo Yesu, oko kule siceŋet mpo acek om koyenet cenyoru kokotutyet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil nyo kikurtoy Yiyintet.

Mpo yeya, mosoporwok ani ayuye soponto nyepo kwak kule, “Ye kokwicin piko oyenku oŋnkusil kirotyet, kupuryo yec cito ake om picoto nye muce kot kot kwiri kirotyet nyoto; nto mpo kutayi ŋolyontet ake om kirotyanato.’’

Kunyo Kikurtoci Yiyintet Apram oko mucokorenyi, puryo kot kumwowu kule, “Oko mucokoronikyi,’’ Nye poru kule pic ce caŋ, mwowu pate kule, “Oko wule mite mucokoreŋuŋ.’’ Nye poru kule akenke pate. Nto nyoto akenke ku Kristo!

Ŋolyontet nye amöce ani kule omwowu kunyi kule, kikwiy Yiyintet kirotyet oŋnkukurto kumwoy kule mosorip kirotyanato, kunyo ntarastinek ce kikwoni letutap kenyisyek pokolwokik amwan ok sosom kuce puryo kot komuce kot kwiri oŋnkunum kirotyet nyo kikurto Yiyintet keny.
Kunyo ye nömekey tukuk ce konu Yiyintet oko ntarastinek, kupuryo kot kunömekey oko kirotyenyi. Ntene kikoci Yiyintet Apram kirotyet omnye kikurtoci neto.

Kunyo omne sicekon ntarastinek? Kicekon cetos sukuŋet kupor wule yunto kawontyontit; ntene kicemöce kule sukopur pate okoy pesyet nye cone mucokoretap Apram nyo kikicekurtoci. Kisut malaykanik ntarastinek. Kiyoŋe citake kwenutap Yiyintet oko malaykanicato.
Ntene puryo kot cemöce cito nye yiyisyi kuyoŋe kwen omnye mite cito akenke, nyoto ku Yiyintet akenke nkit pate.

Porukey pa ŋalecu kule toyekey ntarastinek oko kurtoyetap Yiyintet? Puryo kot kuyunyo! Omnye nto kicekon ntarastinek ce ponto kamukeywek ce muce kusop piko, nteporukey kule cimuce cesat kunyol piko om wule mite Yiyintet kupunte wule mite ntarastinek.
Ntene kimwoy silutekap Yiyintet kule “Kupayta miyotyet koret kumukul, sukuŋet kunyor piko ce kikoyen kokotutyet nyo kicekurto nye cekonu om koyenet nye ponte cito om wule mite Kristo.’’
Kutompo kot kuco koyenet, kicemite yoto ciku acek rototin om mopusi om poytoyisyetap ntarastinek cekonye okoy ciŋoŋ koyenet nyitenyi musukuco.
Kunyo kerkey ntarastinek oko konetintet nye kiripec acek okoy kuco Kristo. Sukuŋet kuco cokusatec cenyolu om wule mite Yiyintet cepunte koyenet.
Kunyo kipunto yawut pesyetap koyenet, kuporkey kule kimokuripec acek konetintet nyankwe.
Kyopunte akwek tokol koyenet sukuŋet oyiku lekokap Yiyintet ce kikoyomokey oko Yesu Kristo.
Omnye kicepatisanak oyomekey oko Yesu Kristo, kunyo kyolac kerkeyinto nyepo Yesu Kristo.

Kunyo puryo kot kumite pciyatet nyepo Yutayek oko Kirikik, nto nye pciye mutworik oko co puryo ku mutworik, nto nye pciye moronik oko koruk, oyiku akwek tokol akenke om koyenet om wule mite Yesu Kristo.
Nteyu oyiku akwek tokol pikap Kristo, kuporkey kule oyiku mucokoronikap Apram ce mosonyoru kokotutyet nye kikurto Yiyintet.
Ŋalek ce amöce ani omwowu kucu kule, ye tominiŋ wero nye mosikonti tukuk tokol cepo kwan, kwoyecin neto yoto oko mutworintet, nka kot ku neto nyepo tukuk tokol,
Ye tokuminiŋ weroto kumite piko alake ceripe neto oko tukukyi okoy kupunto pesyet nyo kikwey kwan.
Om aret nyeyunyoto kiciku mpo acek mutworik cepo poytoyisyet nyepo oyik cepo koret ye kitompo ciku piko cewoyec.
Ntene ntowo kupunto pesyet nye yiytat topon, yoto kuyok Yiyintet Werinyi nkit nye kiyi korko oŋnkyepayta kuyu wule yunto ntarastinek cepo Yutayek.
Yoto kutyacec acek piko ce kipaytec ntarastinek sukuŋet ciku lekokap Yiyintet.
Kito nye poru kule oyiku akwek lekokyi kunye kiyok Yiyintet Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Werinyi kuco mukuleywek cicacek orit. Muyet Nyetilil nyoto kunyo kursyi kule, “Apa,’’ nye mwowu kule, “Papa.’’
Kunyo kimo oyiku yawut mutwor, ntene oyiku lekokyi. Nteye ye oyiku lekokyi kuporkey kule oyiku kontiyik.
Kipuryo kot oŋnket akwek ikye keny Yiyintet, kunyo kyoyiku yoto mutwor cepo oyik ce puryo kot ku yiyik mpo kisic.

Ntene yawut om pesyosyecu kyonket Yiyintet, nto momwowu kule kikonketok Yiyintet akwek, omne samac yec kule cewekyikey wule mite poytoyisyetap oyik ce moponto swama oŋnkupuryo kot kuponto latik. Omne samac akwek kule ceketyikey ciku mutwor cikwa!
Toripe ntarastinek cepo pesyossyek oko orok, (oko wule yunto pesyoyek alake cewoyec) oko kenyisyek!
Kunyo kwasot ani kule mosukupot püc pate yisyet nye kyayiye ataŋany om wule omite akwek.
Mpo yeya, osomok kule opur kopurto nye kerkey oko nyimwani, omnye akerkeyekey ani oko akwek, tompo oyiwo ani akwek ŋolyo nye miyat.
Omuci akwek asot omne somwowok ani lokoywek ce toponec om panta nyo kipo tayta; omnye kyomnyoni.

Ntene kipuryo kot anyila nto mpo ataya ani akwek, nka kot kisyemak kunyikisyok porto nye kyomnyoni. Kyatoroca yoto kuyu wule omuci atorokte malayketap Yiyintet oko kuyu wule omuci atorokte Yesu Kristo!
Kyoyiku yoto ŋerekotin, kukwiy kulene yawut? Omwowok ani nkit kule, nto kimukoktos yoto, ntokyomuci akwek kot olotu konyek cikwok oŋnkokono!
Kunyo kwoyiku ani so yawut puniyontet nyimwoŋ omnye omwowok ŋalek cepo manta?
Mite piko alake ce poru ŋerekwek kucämak akwek, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kutoponec ŋalek cemöce. Ŋalek cemöce cekto pate ku kule cepciyak akwek om wule amite ani sukuŋet oŋerekyi akwek cekto.
Ŋolyo nye topon kwak okokoy ye ŋerekyok akwek piko alake om ŋalek ce toponec, nka mpo ye mocepontekey oko akwek.
Lekokwani ce minkec, otoŋonyi ani om mwoninto kuyu korko nye möce kucämnkey sukuŋet oyiyok akwek om aret nyepo oyeny oŋnkopurune Kristo wule omitowune akwek.
Amöce ani kule ntokopontekey oko akwek om pantanyi, saŋet oŋnket ŋolyontet nye momwowu. Omnye asotok ani akwek koromun.
Omwowo ani pa yawut akwek piko co möce kule kupaytec ntarastinek? Puryo kot olime akwek ŋalek ce mwowu ntarastinek?
Mwowu ntarastinek kule kiponto Apram werik oyeny, kipo werit ake korko nye mutworin, nto werit ake kupo nyo korko nye momutworin.
Kiceyi werit nyepo korket nyo mutworin kuyu wulo keyitoy piko tokol, ntene werinyi nyepo korket nye momutworin kunye kiceyi nyo om kurtoyet nyepo Yiyintet.
Tyonkoc nyi nye poru ŋalek cepo orit. Kerkey korucoto oyenku oko kirotyanik oyeny. Korket akenke kunye cone tulwetap Sinai nyoto ku Akar nye yiye lekok ce mutwor.
Kerkey Akar oko tulwetap Sinai nye mite koretap Arapia nye ciyuye Yerusalem nyepo pesyosyecu, omnye mutworin Yerusalem oko lekokyi.
Ntene kerkey Yerusalem nyepo torot oko korket nye momutworin, nyoto ku yeyonyacek.

Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Iŋerec korko nye son, nye tompo kot kuyi lekwa! Pol om ŋerekwek, nyi nye tompo kot käs mwonin nyepo lekwa! Omnye mosukuyi korko nye kicetay lekok ce caŋ, kupël korko nyo pontekey santenyi.’’
Ntene akwek mpo yeya, oyiku akwek lekokap kirotyet nyepo Yiyintet kuyu wulo kiyunto Isaka.
Kitaŋany om pesyosyecoto werit nyo kiceyi kuyu wule ceyitoy piko tokol kutaŋany werit nyo kiceyi om swametap Muyet Nyetilil. Kunyo kuyunyoto mpo yawut.

Ntene mwowu ne silutekap Yiyintet cu mwowu kule, “Kwet korket nyo mutworin oko werinyi; omnye puryo kot komukoktos kot kontiyis kupcicin tukukap kwan werit nyepo korko nye mutworin oko werit nyepo korko nye momutworin.’’
Kunyo mpo yeya, puryo kot ciku acek lekokap korko nye mutworin, ntene ciku lekokap korko nye momutworin.
Kikutyacec acek Kristo sukuŋet komo kyiku mutwor. Kunyo oyoŋnkye okwilokisye, monte yec kot tokunämak kutiŋnkyok ŋony mucokit nyepo mutworyontit.
Ani nyo Paulo nkit nye oŋololwok akwek, kunyo möce alim topon. Ye kocäm akwek kot cewonak, koporukey kule puryo kot kuponto Kristo latik mpo kisic om wule omite akwek.
Omöce ani kule otosyikey yec akwil ŋolyontoni omwoci citake tokol nye kacäm kot cewon kule, mosukuratakay cito nyoto kurip ŋalek tokol ce mwowu ntarastinek.
Nto piko alak ce mite wule omite akwek ce syeme kule cerup ntarastinek sukuŋet cesatokisye om wule mite Kristo. Omite akwek piko coto saŋ om wule mite poypoyetap Yiyintet.
Ŋaleca ku cecemite acek cikeni om Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet nye mite kwiyisyi om koyenet nyinyacek.
Omnye ye kiciyomekey acek oko Kristo, kupuryo kot ku ŋolyo nyewo mpo kisic ye kacewonak nto ye puryo kot cewonak. Ŋolyontet nyewo ku koyenet nye yiyisyi kupunte cömisyet.
Kyomite akwek oyiyisyi topon! Ŋo nye kikerektak ye marup ŋalek cepo manta? Kiperperak picoto kulene?
Nka kot kiperperak cito nyoto kwiyisye ŋalek ce yune; kipuryo kot kukwone ŋaleca wule mite Yiyintet nyo kikurok akwek,
kuyu wulo cemwoytoy kwak kule, “Muce mumarek ce tukusic kukoci kukut pusyek cepo teret nyewo.’’

Ntene tomite ani okenenokey akwek kule puryo kot omuci yec kot asot ŋalek alak, omnye kiciyomekey cepoyitu Mokoryontet akenke. Mosukumutyi Yiyintet musankut ci ake tokol nye mosok akwek nka kot ku nye yu ne.

Mpo yeya, omne yu toce mite citoŋonyo ani okoy kunyi; ye kokomwoytoti ani kule topon wonset. Nto yunye kipo ŋaleca manta, nto puryo kot oponte ani wuyin om ŋalek ce omwoytoti cepo murtowontetap Kristo.
Kuyu piko co mosok akwek, amöce ani kule kutosyikey cek om aret nyimwa okoy wokulotokis cekto nkit.

Nto akwek mpo yeya, kicekurok oŋnkityaktak, kunyo monte kyiyisye kalyet nyoto sukuŋet kupaytak corokyinotet nyepo tukuk ce möce porwonik cikwok, kunyo oyiyisye koromun cömisyet okolyoykey akwek kwakwek nkit.
Omnye ciyomntos ntarastinek tokol kwek akenke om ntarastit akenke nyo mwowu kule, “Cäm lyatyeŋuŋ kuyu wulo cömntoykey nyi nkit.’’
Nteye kowuskey kuyu tyoŋin oŋnkataŋanynkey akwek nkit, kumöce oripkey omnye omuci kwayarantekey akwek nkit.
Ŋolyontet nye omwowok ani akwek kunyi kule, ayaste kwiyis Muyet Nyetilil kupayta soponwek cikwok, ntene monte ciŋerec porto om tukuk ce möce porto nyepo cito.

Omnye tukuk ce möce porwonikyo kuce toyekey oko tukuk ce möce Muyet Nyetilil. Nto tukuk ce möce Muyet Nyetilil kuce toyekey oko tukuk ce möce porto nyepo cito. Coto tukway kuce punik ce senkerekey, kunyo puryo kot oyiye akwek tukuk ce möce kule kyiy.
Nteye ntowok akwek Muyet Nyetilil, kupuryo kot omite yec ŋonyutap ntarastinek.
Tukuk ce toku koromun ce yiye porto nyepo cito kucu, kuyu sakwayanat, simnyo, makatet nye miyat.
Sayetap ototoywek, ponisyet, puniyontit, wokutyet, corokyinot, cemukuleyo, mucesta,

oko pokitet, oko tumwonik ce miyotec, oko ŋalek alak tokol cekerkey oko coto. Kunyo osowok ani yawut kuyu wulo kikyasowok ikye kunyo kule, puryo kot kunyoru piko ce yiye ŋaleca poytoyisyetap Yiyintet.
Ntene konu Muyet Nyetilil, cömisyet, ŋerekwek, kalyet, muytocinotet, poypoyet, toponiyet, cikaseninkey,
sikenotet oko ripetapkey. Puryo yec ntarastit nye toye ŋalek ceyucutecu.
Piko cepo Kristo kuce kipakäc soponto nyepo corokyinotet oko tukuk tokol ce möce porto.
Muyet Nyetilil nye ceponte acek; kunye roke kurip soponwek cicacek.
Puryo kot kuroke cenyim nto puryo kot kuroke cewuskey acek nkit, nto mpo cecorokyi citake.

Mpo yeya, ye kacenäm citake tokol kwiye ŋolyo nye miyat, roke asat akwek piko co oponte mukuleywek ce toponec cito nyoto kawur, ntene roke ayiy kuyunyoto om aret nye topon, oŋnkosyem oripkey akwek nkit sukuŋet mente cesyemak mpo akwek kuyu cicoto.
Otorcikey akwek kwakwek nkit terekok, omnye om aret nyeyunyoto kuye mosorup akwek ntarastinek cepo Kristo.
Omnye ye sotekey citake kule oyiku nye tokunot oŋnkurok kupöc pate, ku keperperkey cicoto nkit.
Ntene roke kukäskey ci ake tokol wule yunto neto nkit, nteye köse kule oyiye ŋalek ce toponec, kumöce kusilkey om tukuk ce kikwiy nye puryo kot kuyoyece ce kikwiy cito ake.
Omnye ponto ci ake tokol terekwet nyenyi nkit nye tore.
Möce cito nyo cinete lokoywek ce toponec kupcicin mokoryontit nye ponto oko konetintet nyenyi.
Monte ciperperkey akwek kwakwek nkit, omnye puryo kot ciperpere Yiyintet. Tukuk ce kole cito; kuce tukuk ce mosukukis cicoto.

Ye kakol cito mparet nyepo corokyinotet nyepo porto nyenyi, ku mparanato nye mosukukise omik cepo met. Nteye kakol cito mparet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil, ku mparanato nye mosukukise omik cepo soponto nye mopoku.
Kunyo puryo kuroke cecosye acek mokyiy ŋalek ce toponec. Omnye ye kakyiy yisyonutek ce toponec, mosukupunto pesyosyek ce mocekisisye acek omikyo.
Omnye om pesyo tokol nye kacenyoru poroyinto, kumisyini cikalye piko tokol, ntene kupëlis mpo yeya co kikoyen.
Akäs pa akwek nyukutanik cewoyec ce kosilwok ani om yewumwani nkit.
Piko tokol ce möce kule cesilkey ciporu momitek cepo porwonik cikwa kuce syeme kule cisimncok cewonak akwek. Kunyo yiye kuyunyoto pate kule sukuŋet mente citaŋanyec kupo murtowontetap Kristo.
Omnye nka mpo picoto cewone, kuce puryo kot kurupe mpecek ntarastinek, kunyo möce cek kule cewonak akwek sukuŋet kusilkey om momitek nye mite porwonik cikwakwek.

Ntene puryo kot osilekey ani om kiy ake tokol, tos pate om murtowontetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo. Omnye om murtowontet nyenyi, kunye asute kule kipok ŋalek cepo koret om wule amite ani oŋnkyamey om wule mite ŋalek cepo koret.
Puryo kot ku ŋolyo nyewo ye kacewon cito nto ye puryo kot cewon. Ŋolyontet nyewo koromun pate, kuye ketililkey cito.
Nto om wule mite piko co rupe ŋalecu om porwonik cikwa, osomncini ani cekto kule opurte kalyet oko kokolyoyisyet wanak oko Israel nyepo Yiyintet.
Mawaŋnte omwowu kule, kuceke yawut kuwo tay, mente kot tokutaŋanya yec ci ake tokol; omnye momitek ce oponte om porto nyimwani kuce pelutok ce poru kule ayiku ani mutworintetap Yesu.
Mpo yeya, osomwok kule opurte akwek poypoyetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo. Yunyoto.
Cone parwani wule amite ani Paulo nye kiyokintetap Yesu Kristo om cömisyetap Yiyintet. Osilwok akwek pikap Yiyintet ce minye Efeso ce kikoyen soponwek cikwa Yesu Kristo.
Kante onyoru poypoyet oko kalyet nye cone wule mite Papanyo Yiyintet oko Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo!
Kante cikaste Yiyintet oŋnku kwanitap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo! Omnye kikonec acek kupeyok om koyomet nye ceponte oko Kristo, omnye kikonec kokotutekyi tokol cepo wulin po torot.
Kikweyec acek ciku pikyi om Kristo kutompo kot citany koret sukuŋet ciku piko ce tililec ce moponto lelis om tayta nyenyi.
Kicäm Yiyintet keny kule masawecec acek cekwa wule mite neto ciku lekokyi cepunte wule mite Yesu Kristo. Kicäm om ŋerekwekyi oko yiytayatet nyenyi nkit.
Kikwiy ŋolyontoni kule sukuŋet cinket acek kokotutekyi ce woyec ce kicekonec püc pate kupunte Werinyi cämenet.
Kicityacec acek oŋnkyikalyec miyotyonikyo kupunte met nyepo Kristo. Ponto Yiyintet poypoyet nyewo koromun,
kikonec acek kuyemec kuyunyoto om ŋomnonet nyenyi tokol oko kuyu wule nketitoy.
Kikwiy Yiyintet kito nye kimöce kuporwec acek yiytayet nye wuŋat nye kiciyta keny kule mosawaŋnte aponune Kristo.
Yiytayet nyepo Yiyintet nye mosukuwaŋnta ye kopunto pesyet nye topon; kunye mosukoyomo yoto tukuk tokol ce kicitany cepo torot oko ŋony oŋnkwek Kristo kantoyintet nyewo.
Kikyiy tukuk tokol kuyu wule kikikwiyta oŋnkutilta Yiyintet. Kunyo kikweyec Yiyintet acek Yutayek ciku pikyi om koyomotet oko Kristo nye kikwiyta oŋnkutilta neto nkit kutompo kot citany koret.
Kunyo misyini acek Yutayek co ciku piko cepo tayta ce cikeni Kristo, cikaste woyinto nyepo Yiyintet.

Kunyo yunyoto mpo om wule omite akwek lamek co kyoyen Kristo yo kicemwowok lokoywek cepo manta, coto kuce lokoywek ce toponec ce kisutwok akwek kosopotet. Kikoci Yiyintet pelutyet nye poru kule oyiku akwek pikyi, pelutyet nyoto ku Muyet Nyetilil nye kikurto.
Muyet Nyetilil kunye poru kukwile kule mocenyoru acek tukuk co kikurtoci Yiyintet pikyi, oŋnkuporwec kupoyit manta kule mosukutyakta piko ceci. Kunyo akente cikaste woyinto nyenyi.
Kunyo kuceke ye kyalim koyenet nyimwoŋ om wule mite Yesu Kristo oko cömisyet nye ocöme akwek piko tokol cepo Yiyintet,
tompo kot ayaste ani kuceke yoto nye mokostoy Yiyintet osomwok akwek ye osome sayutekwani.
Osome Yiyintetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo, Papa nyepo woyinto, sukuŋet kukonok Muyet Nyetilil nyepo ŋomnonet nye muce kuŋoŋwok Yiyintet sukuŋet oŋnket neto.
Osome kule kuyotokis kasoteywek cikwok okäs lakweyet oŋnkonket kokenotet nyo kicekurcok, oko mokoryontit nyewo koromun nye cikite kuce kupeyok ce kikurtoci neto pikyi.
Oŋnkonket kule cemosi nyewo koromun swamet nyenyi nye mite kwiyisyi om wule cemite acek co ciyeni. Swamet nye ceponte kunye kerkey oko swamet nyewo
nye kikwiyisye neto yo kiŋete kotutune met Kristo oŋnkukoci kopure yewunyi nyepo tay om torot.
Poytoy Kristo om wuloto poytoyik tokol cepo torot, oko mokorenik ce ponto kamukeywek oko swamet. Kaynenyi kunye nyewo kupël kaynok tokol cepo koroni oko cepo koret nyin ake.
Kikoci Yiyintet kupayta Kristo tukuk tokol, oŋnkukoci Yiyintet neto metit nyepo porto.
Porto nyoto ku pikap Yiyintet. Neto kunye kocini kupeyok
Kikyopoku akwek ikye om leliswek oko miyotyonik ce kyoyiye.
Kyorupe yoto soponto nye miyat nyepo koret. Kipoytok yoto muyet nyepo swametap oyinot nyepo parak, nyoto kunye poytoy mpo yawut piko ce meyweye Yiyintet.

Kicekerkeyekey acek tokol oko cekto. Kicipuri kopurto nye kicerupe corokyinotet nyenyo nyepo tukuk cepo koret oko tukuk ce möce porwonikyacek. Kunyo kuyu wulo yunto sopontap koret, misyinec mpo acek kumutwec Yiyintet musankut.
Ntene ponto Yiyintet poypoyet nyewo koromun nye mociyoyece nye cömec acek.
Omnye nka kot kikicepoku acek om miyotyonik ce kiceponte, ntene kukonec Yiyintet soponto citutu oko Kristo. Kunyo poypoyetap Kristo kunye kisopok akwek.
Kiciŋetec acek citutune met oko Kristo oŋnkuyomec oko neto sukuŋet cepoytoyisye oko neto om poytoyisyet nyepo torot.
Kikwiy ŋolyontoni sukuŋet kupor kuwany kenyisyek ce caŋ cekwoni poypoyenyi om cömisyet nye kipor Yesu Kristo.
Omnye kicisopok akwek om cömisyetap Yiyintet kupunte koyenet nye oponte. Kipuryo kot kukule om yisyet nyimwakwek nkit, ntene om kokotutyetap Yiyintet.
Puryo kot kumite ŋolyo nye roke cesilekey omnye puryo kot ku yisyet nyimwakwek nkit.
Kityacec Yiyintet acek sukuŋet kyiy yisyonutek ce toponec om koyomotet nye ceponte oko Yesu Kristo, kiyiytowec keny kuyunyoto kule kyiy.
Möce asot akwek wule kyoyunte ikye, akwek Lamek co kicekurok kule, “Mowonotin’’ Kikurok akwek kuyunyoto piko co kurekey kule, “Ciku wonotin.’’ Ntene wonset kunye po porto nyepo saŋ pate.

Kyoyiku yoto kweyotin om wule mite Kristo. Kyoyiku toyek ce kipuryo kot opoye pikap Yiyintet ce kweyanik. Kipuryo kot oponte akwek kirotyet nye kikyiy om kurtoyet nye kikurtoci Yiyintet pikyi. Kyomite yoto ominye koret nye kipuryo kot oponte kokenotet oŋnkipuryo mpo kot oponte Yiyintet.
Ntene om koyomotet nye oponte yawut oko Kristo akwek piko co kyomitowune wule low, kuce kicekurok olekititu om korosyontetap metap Yesu Kristo.
Yesu Kristo nkit kunye kisutwec acek kalyet, omnye kikoyomo Yutayek oko lamek kwek akenke. Kikoturpup neto totet nye kipciye picoto kwek punik; omnye kikwiyisye porto nyenyi.
Kinum ntarastinek oko ŋalek alak tokol ce ponte ntarastinek cepo Yutayek. Kikwiy kuyunyitenyi kule sukuŋet kuyomokey Yutayek oko Lamek kwek aret akenke. Yoto kuye kisutu kalyet.
Kimeci neto murtowontet kule sukuŋet kunum puniyontit. Murtowontet kunye kiyomo neto Yutayek oko lamek kwek porto akenke oŋnkuwec kukwa wule mite Yiyintet.
Kunyo kico Kristo cokumwayta lokoywek ce toponec ce kipoyit piko tokol, Lamek co kimite wule low, oko Yutayek co kilekite wule mite neto.
Acek Yutayek oko lamek cepunte tokol wule mite Kristo om koyomotet oko Muyet Nyetilil siceŋet cepunte taytap Yiyintet Papanyo.
Kunyo, kimoyiku akwek Lamek toyek ce punonik alak, ntene oyiku pikap koret wanak oko pikap Yiyintet, coto kuce piko cepo kanyi.
Oyiku akwek kereryantet akenke nyepo koto nye mite cetece, koto nye kicece kiyokik oko workoyik. Nto Yesu Kristo nkit kunye tolocta.
Yesu kunye tiye kuyoŋnto koto tokol oŋnkukoci kutekakay okoy kwek koto nyetilil om Mokoryontet.
Om koyomotet oko neto kunye omite akwek cetecok wanak oko piko alak tokol sukuŋet oyiku koto nye minye Yiyintet kupunte Muyet Nyetilil.
Om ŋolyontoni kuye sukuŋet osomwok Yiyintet ani Paulo nyo mopusyontet nyepo Yesu Kristo kupo Lamek.
Kwalim akwek kupoyit manta kule kikono ani Yiyintet yisyoni om poypoyenyi kupo toponiyet nyimwakwek.
Kiŋoŋwo oŋnkuporwo ani Yiyintet yiytayatet nyenyi nye wuŋat. (Kwosil ani ŋalek ce tukusic ce nöme ŋalecato,
Nteye kosuman akwek ŋalek ce kwosil mosonket wule oŋnketitoy ani ŋalek ce wuŋotin cepo Kristo.)
Kipuryo kot cemwoci piko ŋalecutecu wuŋotin om pesyosyek co kitil. Ntene kukuporci Yiyintet yawut om Muyet Nyetilil kiyokikyi ce tililec oko workoyik.

Ŋolyontet nye wuŋat kunyi kule, yomntoskey Yutayek oko Lamek oŋnkunyor tokol kupeyok cepo Yiyintet kupunte lokoywek ce toponec. Kwek cekto piko cepo koto akenke oŋnkunyor tokol kirotyet nyo kimwowu Yiyintet kupunte wule mite Yesu Kristo.
Kicekono ani oyiku mutworintet nyepo Lokoywek ce toponec om kokotutyet nye pciyat nye kikono om swamenyi nye yiyisyi.
Oyiku ani miniŋ koromun om wule mite piko tokol cepo Yiyintet, oŋnkurok kikono Yiyintet yisyoni pciyat nye osutyini Lamek lokoywek ce toponec cepo Mokoryontit nyepo Kristo nye mopoku.
Oŋnkanet okoy kukäs piko tokol wule mokyiyta yisyet nyepo Yiyintet nye wuŋat. Yiyintet nye kitonye tukuk tokol kunye kirip kuwuny yiytayatet nyenyi okoy kutil kenyisyek co kitil.
Kule sukuŋet konket om pesyosyecu malaykanik oko poytoyik cepo torot wule yunto ŋomnonet tokol nyepo Yiyintet. Ŋomnonet nyoto kunye yomntos pikap Yiyintet.
Kikwiy Yiyintet kuyunyoto kuyu wule yunto yiytayet nyenyi nyepo keny, coto kuce kikoyitita kupunte Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
Om koyomotet nye ceponte acek oko neto, oŋnkupunte koyenet nye ceponte om wule mite neto, kunye kicityacec cimuc cipe taytap Yiyintet.
Kunyo kosomok ani kule monte komuyok toŋoŋutek cu otoŋonyi ani om kaynemwakwek. Ponto latik ŋalecu tokol om wule omite akwek.
Kunyo om ŋolyontoni, kuye saŋet akotuŋe taytap Papa.
Nyoto kunye Papa nye nyortoy kaynet nyepo manta piko tokol cepo koret torot oko cepo koret ŋony.
Osome ani Yiyintet om Mokoryontit nyepo woyinto nyenyi, kukonok akwek onyoru swamet om mukuleywekwok orit kupunte Muyet nyenyi Nyetilil.
Sukuŋet kutec Kristo konyi mukuleywekwok orit kupunte koyenet. Osome kule onyoru akwek tikityek ce kwilotin oŋnkonerye om cömisyet,
saŋet akwek wanak oko pikap Yiyintet tokol onyoru swamet nye oŋnket kule para koromun, oŋnkukoy, oŋnkukoy kuwo parak, oŋnkukoy kuwo ŋony koromun cömisyet nyepo Kristo.
Osome ani kule oŋnket akwek cömisyet nyenyi, nka kot mocimuce kot cinket topon, kuyunyoto oŋnkonyoru kupeyok ce yemok.
Wule mite Yiyintet nye muce kwiy tukuk ce caŋ, kupëlis ce cesome nto ce cisoti acek, om swamet nye mite kwiyisyi om wule cemite acek.
Kopurune woyinto wule mite Yiyintet, kupunte pikap Yiyintet oko Yesu Kristo, kuceke pinta ake okokoy okoy okokoy! Yunyoto.
Kunyo osomok ani akwek. Ani kunye oyiku mopusyontet omnye oyiye yisyet nyepo Mokoryontet. Möce opurte soponto nye oyoyeci oko nyo kikonok Yiyintet ye kikurok.
Otoloyitu, oŋnkopoypoyitu, oŋnkomuytocini okokoy, sonyoru cömisyet okolyoykey akwek kwakwek nkit.
Kikoyomok Muyet Nyetilil oyiku akenke, kunyo asyem orip koyomet nyoto, opurte kalyet akwek kwakwek nkit.
Mite porto akenke oko Muyet Nyetilil akenke, kuyu wulo mite konketotet akenke nye kikurtowok akwek Yiyintet.
Mite Mokoryontet akenke nkit oko koyenet akenke, oko patisanet akenke.
Mite Yiyintet akenke nkit nye Papa nyepo piko tokol oŋnku nye Mokoryontet nye poytoy tukuk tokol, nye yiyisyi om tukuk tokol, oŋnkumitowune tukuk tokol wule mite neto.
Kicikoci ci ake tokol om acek kokotutek ce pciyotin kuyu wule moktoy Kristo.
Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Yo kiweti torot wule low, kikwer neto yoto oyik ce miyotec. Kikoci piko kokotutek.’’
Kunyo poru ne ŋolyontoni mwowu kule, “Yo kiweti neto torot wule low.’’ Poru kule kinyosyo kuco ŋony.
Kunyo neto nye cito nye kirek kuco ŋony, kunye neto nye kiwo torot wule low koromun sukuŋet kupayta koret tokol kumukul.
Neto kunye kikoci piko kokotutek, kukwey piko alak kwek kiyokik, kwek alak workoyik, kwek alake mwoytoyik cepo lokoywek ce toponec, kwek alake mesewek, kwek alake konetik.
Kikwiy kuyunyitenyi sukuŋet kuyiyta piko tokol cepo Yiyintet om yisyet nyepo Kristayek, nyoto kunye yisyet kutec porto nyepo Kristo.
Kunyo mosiciyomekey acek om koyomotet nyoto akenke om koyenet nyinyo oko ŋomnonet nye ceponte nye conket Weritap Yiyintet. Mosiciku piko cewoyec okoy cepunte koyinto nyepo wule tento Kristo.

Yoto kuye komo cekerkeyekey acek oko lekoy ce sute yomet kuroye wuli oko wuli, nto yomet nyoto kunye konetisyet nyepo piko ce perperisyi. Piko coto kuce ntocini piko alak kumosokis kwiyisye ŋomnonet nye kitowu cekto nkit.
Ntene moceŋalal yoto ŋalek cepo manta om mukuleyto nyepo cömisyet, misyini cenerye om aret ake tokol om wule mite Kristo nye metit nye ntowec.

Yomntos Kristo kutuyo tukuk tokol cepo porto oŋnkupayta. Nomntos tukuk tokol sukuŋet kwek porto akenke. Kunyo ye keyis tukuk tokol topon kuyu wule cemoktoy, yoto kuye sukuner porto tokol topon om cömisyet.
Kunyo osomwok ani aŋnkasyem asowok om kaynetap Mokoryontet kule ayaste monte yec tocipur kupurto nye kerkey nyepo Lamek co ponto soponto nyepo kasoteywek ce puryo wol.
Ponto kasoteywek cikwa menonet, puryo kot kuponto cek soponto nyo konu Yiyintet, omnye puryo kot kunkete oŋnkupuryo kot kucöme mpo kisic.
Kimo kuponto kalilan ake tokol, kicämnta pate kule kyiye ŋalek ce miyotec nye kimokuyweyisyi ye mokwiy ŋolyo ake tokol nye samis.
Ntene kipuryo kot anetkey akwek ŋalek cepo Kristo ceyucoto!
Kyolim akwek kupoyit manta ŋalek cenöme Yesu. Kicinetak kuyu konomikyi ŋalek cepo manta ce mite wule mite neto.
Kunyo awirte kapurto nyimwoŋ nyepo keny nye kiwur nye kipo corokyinotetap koperperisyet.
Misyini awec kulelakitu mukuleywek cikwok.
Misyini alac siret nyepo soponto nyelel nye kicitany kukerkeyit oko Yiyintet nye porukey om soponto nyepo manta nye rotat oŋnkutilil.
Kunyo awirte koperperisyo, möce kuŋalal ci tokol ŋolyo nyepo manta om wule mite yeyanyi, omnye ciku acek tokol luket akenke nyepo porto nyepo Kristo.
Ye Kotepe kot onyeru, monte kusutwok nyerunotet kot yiy miyotyet, monte cipurte nyerunotet kot kwimen koret.
Monte cikoci setani nyewo nyepo oyik poroyinto.
Misyini kwasta cito nyo kicorin corsyet oŋnkucec kwiyis sukuŋet kunyor omik om aret nyepo manta, oŋnkucec kukalya pononik.
Ye oŋololi, monte kot kukwane kutuwak cikwok ŋalek ce miyotec, oyiyisye pate ŋalek cetoponec ce kolyoy, sukuŋet kukalya ŋalek ce oŋololi akwek piko co lime.
Monte kot cinerec Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet, oŋnkupor kukwil kule mosukupunto pesyet nye mosukutyacak Yiyintet. Omnye Muyet Nyetilil kunye pelutyet nye poru kule opoye akwek Yiyintet.
Awirte meyintap mo ake tokol oko sokornat oko nerekwek. Monte kyiyisye polot oko cupisyet, awirte senkerat ake tokol.
Ntene otoloyitu oŋnkopoypoyitu om mukuleywekwok om wule mite ci tokol om akwek. Akalyakey akwek kwakwek nkit kuyu wulo kikalyak. Yiyintet kupunte wule mite Yesu Kristo.
Omnye oyiku akwek lekokap Yiyintet ce camanik, kunyo misyini akerkeyitu neto.
Misyini kurip soponto nyimwoŋ cömisyet kuyu wulo kicämec acek Kristo oŋnkukon soponto nyenyi kupo acek sukuŋet kwek kokotutyet nye poŋu topon nye korosyontet nye ŋerece Yiyintet.
Kunyo ye oyiku akwek lekokap Yiyintet, kupuryo kuroke kot celimncok sakwayanat nto kopurto nye miyat nto moroŋyantit.
Puryo mpo kot ku topon oyiyisye ŋalek cepo kawotyontit, nto perperyo nto ŋalek ce somis. Ntene möce akaste Yiyintet pate.

Möce oŋnket ŋalecu kule, puryo kot komuce kot kunyor kontisyet om poytoyisyet nyepo Kristo oko nyepo Yiyintet ci nye yiye sakwayanat, nto nye ponto kopurto nye miyat, nto nye moroŋya (omnye moroŋyantit kunye poru sayet nyepo kerkeyik)
Monte kuperperak ci ake tokol kwiyisye ŋalek cepo mwiynan pate omnye ŋalek ceyucoto kuye sukuŋet kunerekyi Yiyintet piko ce puryo kot kulimncini neto.
Kunyo ayaste kwiyat kwicek nkit piko ceyucoto.
Kyomite akwek ikye menonet, ntene omite yawut wule mite lakweyet.
Omnye lakweyet kunye sutu kupuswek wok cecaŋ cepo toponiyet oko tililinto oko ŋalek cepo manta.
Asyem anetkey ŋalek ce ŋerece Yiyintet.
Ayaste monte ayiy tukuk cepo menonet ce puryo kot kuponto latik co yiye piko, ntene otoru kukwa wule lakwey.
Omnye ŋolyo nyepo kalilan koromun mpo ye moceŋalale wule wuŋat ŋalek ce yiye cek.
Nteye kocipor ceŋany tukuk tokol kukwa wule lakwey yoto kuye cipor kutok topon wule yunto tukucoto.
Omnye toku topon kiy ake tokol nye kaceŋany kutok, kuyunyoto sukuŋet cemwoy kule, “Ŋet cito nyo mite rwonto! tutune met! Mosukukoniŋ Kristo lakweyet.’’
Kunyo möce orip topon wule opurtoy akwek, monte cipur kopurto nyepo piko co perper, ntene opur kuyu piko ce ŋomec.
Oyiyisye topon poroyinto ake tokol nye oponte, omnye miyotec pesyosyecu.
Kunyo monte ceperperitu, ntene möce asyem oŋnket kito nye möce Mokoryontet kule ayiy.
Monte cepokitye komek ce muce kowurtak, ntene möce opiyony Muyet Nyetilil,
Möce otumncinikey kwakwek nkit om tumwonik cepo kakastayet, oko om tumwonik ce kostoy Yiyintet, oko tumwonik ce tililec. Möce otumnci Mokoryontet tumwonik ce rurtos ce kwone mukuleywekwok.
Akaste Yiyintet Papa okokoy om kiy ake tokol kupunte kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo!
Möce ayweyikey akwek nkit omnye oyweyi akwek Kristo.
Möce koruk ayweyi sanik cikwok, kuyu wulo oyweyi akwek Mokoryontet.
Omnye moron kunye nyewo om wule mite korkenyi, kuyu wulo nyewo Kristo om wule mite pikap Yiyintet, nyoto kunye porto nyenyi, nto Kristo nkit kunye Kosopintet.
Kunyo misyini kuywey koromun koruk sanik cikwa, kuyu wulo yweye cekto pikap Yiyintet om Kristo.
Möce moronik acäm koruk cikwok kuyu wulo kicämnta Kristo pikap Yiyintet oŋnkukoyito soponto nyenyi kumeci cekto.
Kikwiy kuyunyoto kule sukuŋet kowun kutililitu pikap Yiyintet om ŋolyontenyi oko peko,
kule sukuŋet kukwer pikap Yiyintet kukwa wule mite neto kuponto toponiyet tokol nyetilil nye moponto lelis, oŋnkupuryo kot kuponto tisyet nto nye moponto kiy ake tokol nye miyat.
Kunyo misyini moronik kucäm korukwa kuyu wulo cömtoy cek porwonik cikwa nkit. Ci nye kacäm korkenyi kunye kacämnkey neto nyoto nkit.
Omnye puryo ci nye senkere porto nyenyi nkit, ntene poye oŋnkurip topon kuyu wulo riptoy Kristo pikap Yiyintet.
Omnye ciku acek piko cepo porto nyepo Kristo.
Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Om ŋolyontoni kuye sukuŋet kupakakta cito kwan oko kamet oŋnkuyomokey oko korkenyi, yoto kwek piko oyenku porto akenke.’’
Mite ŋalek ce woyec cepo manta ce wuŋotin om ŋalecu po silutekap Yiyintet. Asoti ani om kasoteywekwani kule nömekey oko Kristo oko pikap Yiyintet.
Ntene nömekey mpo yec ŋalecu oko akwek, kunyo möce kucäm ci ake tokol om akwek korkenyi kuyu wulo cömtoykey neto nkit, oŋnkumöce konket korko kule oyweyi santenyi.
Akwek lekok, yisyemwakwek kuyu Kristayek aywey poyik co kiyok, omnye yisyet nyoto nyepo manta.
Ntarastit nyi kule, “Ywey kon oko komet.’’ Kunye po tayta nye ponto kurtoyoni kule,
sukuŋet kunyol kiy ake tokol om wule mite nyi, oŋnkipur koret wany kenyisyek ce caŋ.
Poyik, monte cesut lekokwok om aret nye miyat nye muce kusutyi kunerekis, ntene möce anet kuneryo kuyweyis topon kuyu Kristayek.
Akwek mutworik, möce aywey mokorenikwok om muyotet, möce oyiyisye mukuleyto akenke nye topon kuyu nye ayweyi Kristo.
Monte kyiye kuyunyoto ye mite cek kukösok kuyu piko ce möce kule ciŋerece piko, ntene oyiye yisyet nye möce Yiyintet om mukuleyto akenke kuyu mutworikap Kristo.
Oyiye yisyonutek om ŋerekwek kuyu nye oyicini Mokoryontet nye puryo kot ku kule oyicini piko.
Möce oŋnket kule mosukukoci Mokoryontet musyaret ci ake tokol nka mpo mutworin nto nye puryo ku mutworin; kupo yisyet nye topon nye yiye.

Akwek mokorenik, möce oyiye mpo akwek kuyunyoto om wule mite mutworikwok, mönte cimuyi cekto, möce oŋnket kule opoye akwek, oko mutworikwok Mokoryontet akenke nye mite torot, nye mutyini musankut ci ake tokol kuyoyec kukerkeyit.
Ŋolyontet nyepo letut, möce otitir om koyomotet oko Mokoryontet oŋnkoyiyisye swamet nyenyi nyewo.
Anäm loŋet nyepo Yiyintet, sukuŋet amukte tekutek ce miyotec cepo setani nyewo nyepo oyik.
Omnye puryo kot cepoye acek piko, ntene cemite ceporye oyik ce miyotec ce motoku ce mite koret torot, oko ce poytoyisyi, oko ceponto kamukeywek, oko ceponto swamet nyewo, om kenyisyecu po menonet.
Kunyo anäm yawut loŋet nyepo Yiyintet sukuŋet amukte pesyet nye miyat, nteye koporye kot awany, yoto kuye anyoru ye koyoŋe.
Kunyo oyoŋnkye topon, okoci kwek ŋalek cepo manta porowet nye orote suwenutek cikwok, oŋnkolac tililinto kwek loŋet nyepo karnet nye kerektoy teket.
Akante kukwilakay yiytayatet nye omwoytoy lokoywek ce toponec cepo kalyet kwek kweyonik cikwok cepo kerenkokwok.
Anämate okokoy koyenet kwek loŋet, sukuŋet kukerekta kotyek tokol ce loyotin ce wutu oyinoto nye miyat.
Acäm kasopotet kwek nyo kutwetap karnet nyimwoŋ oŋnkwek ŋolyontetap Yiyintet rotwetap cok nye konu Muyet Nyetilil.
Ayweye ŋalecu tokol om somset nye osome kokolyoyisyet nyepo Yiyintet. Osome om pesyo ake tokol om swamet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil. Kunyo otitir, monte kyaste, osomnci pikap Yiyintet okokoy.
Osomwo mpo ani sukuŋet kukono Yiyintet lokoywek ce ye kaŋalal amuc aŋalal om nyikanatet aparte lokoywek ce toponec ce wuŋotin.
Oyiku ani kiyokin nyepo lokoywek ce toponec nka kot omite mopusi. Osomwo sukuŋet aŋalal om nyikanatet kuyu wulo misyini aŋalalye.
Tekiko yeya nyacek oŋnku mutworintet nyepo manta om yisyetap Mokoryontet kunye mosukumwowok akwek ŋalek tokol ce nömo ani, sukuŋet oŋnket akwek wule opurtoy ani.
Kunyo koyoku kuco cokumwowok wule cipurtoy acek om wuli oŋnkutitirok.
Kante kukoci Yiyintet Papa oko Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo kalyet oko cömisyet mpo yeya tokol om koyenet.
Opurte poypoyet piko tokol co yene Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo om cömisyet nye puryo kot kupoku.

Cone parwani wule ce mite acek Paulo oko Timosewo mutworikap Yesu Kristo. Cesilwok akwek pikap Yiyintet tokol ce kikoyomokey oko Yesu Kristo ce mite Filipi, wanak oko kantoyikwok kosik oko kokolyoyikwok.
Kante kukonok akwek Yiyintet Papa oko Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo poypoyet oko kalyet.
Okostoy ani Yiyintenyu okokoy om pesyo ake tokol ye kasotak akwek.
Nteye osome osomwok akwek tokol om ŋerekwek.
Omnye kwakalya ani akwek om yisyet nye cemwoyoyt lokoywek ce toponec kuceke pesyet nyo kipo tay okoy yewut pesyoni.
Kunyo aŋnket ani kupoyit manta kule Yiyintet nyo kinyosye yisyenyi om wule omite akwek kunye mosukutosyi yisyenyi kuwo tay okoy kupunto ye pesyetap Yesu Kristo.

Omite akwek mukuleymwani orit! Kunyo ŋolyo nye porukey topon ye kasot kuyunyoto om wule omite akwek. Omnye kukyiyisye tokol topon yisyoni kikono Yiyintet. Nka mpo yawut amite mopusi oko mpo ye oyiku tyakat yo oporye oyete kule kukwilokis lokoywek ce toponec.
Yiyintet nkit kunye nkete kule omwowok ani ŋalek cepo manta ye komwowu kule cömisyet nyewo nye oponte ani om wule omite akwek; kunye cone mukuleytap Yesu Kristo nkit.
Osomwok kule, roke kutosyikey kuner okokoy cömisyet oŋkuwoyit ŋomnonet oko kasoteywek cepo manta.
Sukuŋet amuc akwek kot akwey ŋalek cepo manta cepëlisyi, sotililitu nye moponte lelis ye kopunto pesyet nyepo Kristo.
Oŋnkunyor soponwek cikwok ŋalek cepo manta ce konu Yesu Kristo nkit om woyinto oko kakastayetap Yiyintet.
Mpo yeya, amöce kule oŋnket akwek kule ŋalek ce kukwiyokis om wule amite ani kuce kwekoci kutosyikey lokoywek ce toponec.
Kunyo kukunket kupoyit manta piko tokol ce ripo ani om kaytap kinko nyewo oko piko tokol ce mite wuli, kule amite ani mopusi omnye oyiku mutworintetap Kristo.
Rotisyet nyi amite ani kunye kwekoci kukwilokis mpo yeya ce caŋ om wule mite Mokoryontet, kunyo kutosyikey cek kunyor nyikanatet nye puryo kot kumuytos ye mwoytoy lokoywek cepo Yiyintet.
Ntene mwoytoy piko alake om cekto ŋalek cepo Kristo om corokyinot oko nyekernatet, kumwoytoy piko alak ŋalekyi om toponiyet.
Yiye picoto kuyunyoto om cömisyet nye ponto om wule amite ani, omnye kikonket kule kikono ani Yiyintet yisyet nye oporye oyetyecini lokoywek ce toponec.
Nto piko alak kuce puryo kot kumwoytoy ŋalekap Kristo kupoyit manta, ntene mwoytoy pate om mukuleywek cepo corokyinot. Sote cek kule cimuci cesutwo ani wuyinto ye tomite mopusi.

Puryo kot ku ŋolyo nyewo! Oyiku ŋerekat kuyu wulo cimuce cemwayta ŋalekap Kristo om aret ake tokol nye mukoktos, nka ye kacemwayta om aret nye topon nto om aret nye miyat. Kunyo mosotosyikey ani aŋerec,
omnye oŋnketi kule mosicityakta om letut om somotet nye osome akwek oko kokolyoyisyet nye cone wule mite Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yesu Kristo.

Ŋoloyontet nye amöce koromun om mukuleymwani oŋnkokeni kunyi kule, puryo kot oyostoy yisyenyu. Om pesyosyek tokol, nka mpo pantanyi mosonyoru titiret nyewo koromun, sukuŋet soponto nyimwani tokol osutu koyweyisyet om wule mite Yesu Kristo, nka ye tosope nto ye kamey.
Kristo kunye soponto om wule amite ani.
Ntene ye kotosyikey ani tosop oŋnkyiy yisyet nye topon nyepo latik, kuporkey kule puryo mpo kot oŋnket kule oŋnkono yisyet nye topon nyepo manta nye makwey.
Omnye nömo ani ŋalecutecu tukway. Amöce ani koromun kule nto kapakakte soponto nyi aponte oŋnkowo wopur oko Kristo, omnye kito nyoto nye topon nye pëlisyi.
Ntene kito nye topon nye pëlisyi koromun om wule omite akwek kunyi kule, roke topur ani osope.
Oŋnket ani kupoyit manta kule mosopur osope oŋnkyipurcine oko akwek tokol, sukuŋet kutosyikey ŋerekwekwok oko koyomotet.
Kunyo ye kaco ani yec okoy wule omite akwek, mosonyoru ŋerekwek ce kosilekey om wule omite kuyu yeyamwoŋ om Yesu Kristo.

Kunyo ŋolyontet nye pëlisyi yawut kunyi kule, roke kopurto nyepo soponwek cikwok oko nyepo piko alak kopur kuyu wule moktoy lokoywek ce toponec cepo Kristo, sukuŋet nka mpo ye kaco ani nto kopuryo kot aco, mosalim kule cokwilokisye oŋnkoponte soponto nyepo koyomotet nye kyoyiku akenke oŋnkoyiku luket nye tyikyini kiy akenke, nyoto ku koyenet nyepo lokoywek ce toponec.
Monte ciywey punik cikwok, opurte nyikanatet okokoy, mosukupor kule opëlisyi akwek opël cekto, omnye Yiyintet kunye konok akwek opëlisye.
Omnye kicekonok akwek kupeyok nye oyicini yisyet Kristo, ntene puryo kot omnye oyeni akwek neto pate, ntene möce ataŋany om kaynenyi.
Kunyo ciyomekey oko ani om poryet. Cicitenyi kunyo kyolim akwek oporyecini ani ikye, kunyo to ku cicitenyi kunye tomite ani oporyecini kuyu wulo olime akwek.
Tosukey ra swamet om soponwek cikwok ye opoye Kristo nto puryo? Oponte akwek tolosyet oko kokolyoyisyet om wule mite ci ake tokol om akwek?
Kunyo oŋereco ani kuyema topon ye opurtoy kasoteywontet akenke, oŋnkoyomekey, oŋnkoyome soponwek cikwok, oŋnkocomncine ŋolyo ake tokol akwek kwakwek nkit.
Monte cipurte corokyinot nto silot nyepo perperyo. Ntene möce otoloyitu oŋnkosut piko alak kwek cewoyec kupëlok akwek.
Monte cisot tukuk ce nömok akwek, ntene osoti tukuk ce nöme piko alak.
Möce oponte akwek kopurto oko kasoteywek ce kerkey co kiponto Yesu Kristo.
Kikerkey Yesu okokoy oko Yiyintet, Ntene kipuryo kot kusyem om swamet kule oyoyeckey oko Yiyintet,
Ntene kicämnta nkit kwasta woyinto, Oŋnkusutkey kuyu mutworin, oŋnkwek ci, oŋnkuporkey kuyu ci nye yu acek.
Kutalayit oŋnkurup aret nyepo koyweyisyet okoy kunyor met, met nyepo murtowontet.
Om ŋolyontoni, kuye sukuŋet kukoci Yiyintet neto atepto nyewo om torot, oŋnkukoci kaynet nye pële koynok tokol.
Sukuŋet om kaynetap Yesu, Kuye kukutuny tukuk tokol cepo torot oko koret ŋony, oko cepo kapkompic oŋnkusay neto.
Oŋnkurarta kutor tokol kule Yesu kunye Mokoryontet, om woyinto nyepo Yiyintet Papa.

Kunyo coronutekwani, kuyu wulo kyoyweya ani akwek okokoy yo kicepontekey, kunyo ayweya yawut koromun kupëlis ye mocepontekey. Olimnte ŋalek ce omwowok. Otosyikey oyiyisye om koyweyisyet oko potanet, sukuŋet awaŋnte kosopet nyimwoŋ.
Omnye mite Yiyintet nkit kwiyisyi om wule omite akwek, sukuŋet kuwecak ocömisye oŋnkoywey arup ŋalekyi ce ŋerece neto.
Oyiye kiy ake tokol nye puryo kot oŋunyŋunyi nto otinteni.
Sukuŋet oporukey oyiku piko ce tililec ce puryo kot kuponto lelis, kuyu lekokap Yiyintet ce toponec ce minye koret nyepo piko ce kiwuryo ce mosotin.

Mosokoci akwek cekto lokoywek cepo soponto. Ye kayiy kuyunyoto mosonyoru ani ŋolyontet nye kosilekey om wule omite akwek om pesyetap Kristo, omnye mosukupor kule kipuryo kot kupotyo püc pate titiret nyimwani oko yisyonutek tokol ce kyayiy.

Koyenet nyimwakwek kunye korosyontet nye cikocini Yiyintet, kunyo muce pesyet ake kot kacitata korotik cikwani sukutosyi kuwoyit korosyontet nyimwoŋ. Ye keyakay kuyunyoto mosaŋerec koromun wanak oko akwek tokol.
Kunyo misyini aŋerec mpo akwek tokol wanak oko ani.
Asoti ani kule ye kacäm Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo, mosoyoku Timosewo kuco lakwar wule omite akwek. Amöce kule kutitiro lokoywek ce kwone wule omite akwek.
Timosewo pate nye sote ŋalek ce karkey oko cikwani, oŋnkusotok akwek.
Sote ci ake tokol tukuk ce nöme soponto nyenyi nkit pate, ntene puryo kot kusote yisyetap Yesu Kristo.
Kunyo oŋnket akwek nkit latik ce ponto Timosewo. Oŋnket yisyet nye kikyiy acek tukway kuyu werit oko kwan. Kikyiyisye tukway cemwaytate lokoywek ce toponec.
Asoti kule mosoyoku ani neto kuco wulo omite akwek ye konket wule mosukupeta ŋalek cikwani nkit.
Kunyo okenekey Mokoryontet kule mosamuc ani nkit aco lakwar okoy wule omite akwek.
Kwasot kule roke oyoku yeyanyo Epafrotito kuketkey wulo omite akwek. Neto kunye kiyokintet nyimwakwek nye kikalya ani koromun. Kyiyisyi ceporye yisyet kukolyo ani.
Möce neto kule nto akäsak akwek, kunyo kukusot koromun omnye kyolim akwek kule kikimnyan.
Kikimnyan manta nye kikirik kume ntene kukalya Yiyintet. Kipuryo kot kukalya Yiyintet neto nkit pate, ntene kikalya mpo ani kusop neto omnye kinumuneno lokik ce caŋ.
Kunyo amöce koromun kule oyoku neto kuco wulo omite akwek sukuŋet aŋerec akwek ye kokäs neto oŋnkupok lokik cikwani ce kwoponte.
Oŋerekyi neto om ŋerekwek tokol kuyu yeya om Mokoryontet. Möce kule ayweyi akwek piko tokol ce kerkey oko neto.
Omnye kicilile yosic kume om yisyet nyepo Kristo, kikoyito soponto nyenyi sukuŋet kukalya ani om kaynamwakwek.
Kunyo mpo yeya, ŋalek ce owoŋnte ani kucu kule, kante kukonok Mokoryontet akwek ŋerekwek ce caŋ, Puryo kot kuyuye moketyikey ŋalek ce kyosil ikye, mosukutosyi kukalyak opur topon.
Oripkey piko ce yiye ŋalek ce miyotec, ŋokica kuce piko ce simncini kule cewon porto nyepo saŋ.

Omnye ciku acek piko ce kicewonec wonset nyepo manta, omnye cesoye Yiyintet om swamet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil oŋnkyesilekey pate soponto nye ceponte om Kristo. Puryo kot cikenekey acek mpo kisic wonset oko sokwonutek.
Ye kekenekey piko wonset oko sokwonutek, oŋnkusot kule cimuce cisopec ye karup ntarastinecutecu, kuporukey kule opëli ani cekto om ŋalecutecu.
Omnye kicewona ani ye kyoponte pesyosyek sisit pate, oyiku Isroloyin sikwo, nyepo kotap Penyamin, oyiku Puraniyantet sikwo. Oyiku Farasayantet nyepo manta kuyu wulo ceriptoy ntarastinek.
Kunyo kyoyiku nyikan koromun nye kyotoŋonyi pikap Yiyintet. Kyoyiku ci nyepo manta nye kipuryo kot oponte lelis omnye kyoripe ntarastinek tokol.
Ntene osute ani yawut tukuco tokol kuyu tukun ce puryo kot kuponto latik omnye kyoyentyi Kristo.

Puryo kot ku tukuk ceyucoto pate, ntene asute kule puryo kot kuponto latik tukuk alake tokol, nye pëlisyi pate kuye konket Yesu Kristo Mokoryontenyu. Kyawirte tukuk oko toponiyet nye ponto tukucoto tokol. Kyosut kukerkeyitu tukuk tokol tutwek sukuŋet onyoru Kristo.

Oŋnkoyomekey ani oko neto ciku akenke. Kunyo kimo oponte yec toponiyet nye nyimwani nkit nye kerkey oko nyo cenyoru ye cerupe ntarastinek. Oponte ani yawut toponiyet nyepo manta nye cekonu kupunune koyenet om Kristo. Toponiyet nyoto kunye cone wule mite Yiyintet nye ciyoyeke koyenet.
Ŋolyontet nye amocë ani pate ku kule oŋnket Kristo oŋnkonket swamet nyepo kotutunetap met nyenyi, oŋnkyeyemnte tukway toŋoŋutek ceci oŋnkakerkeyitukey ani oko neto om met nyenyi.
Oŋnketi mpo kule mosiciŋeta otutune met oŋnkonyoru soponto.
Puryo mpo kot osutekey ani kule kwayitite ŋalecu tokol, nto mpo kule kyonyolu owoŋnkyi. Ntene amite otosyinikey asyeme kule anyoru ŋalecu omnye kisuto keny Kristo oyiku nyenyi.
Mpo yeya, oŋnket kule tompo kot opunte wule mite ŋalecu, ntene ŋolyontet nye oyiye kunyi, amöce ayutye ŋalek ce kyopokokyi let oŋnkasyem oyiyisye sukuŋet anyoru tukuk ce mite tay.
Kunyo amite olopoti otokyinikey aret nyoto saŋet apëlisye anyoru kokotutyet nyepo soponto nyepo torot nyo konu Yiyintet kupunune wule mite Yesu Kristo.
Möce cisoti kuyunyitenyi acek co kicenerye ciku Kristayek. Ntene ye ponto piko alake om akwek kasoteywek ce pciyotin, mosukuporwok akwek Yiyintet topon.
Kunyo nka kot kuyunyoto, kuroke cetosyikey cipe tay cerupe ntarastinek cetecu kicerup acek kuceke keny okoy kunyi.
Mpo yeya, asyem akwek tokol opur kuyu wule ayunte ani. Kiciporwok aret nyepo manta, kunyo möce olimnci piko co rupe aret nyo kiciporwok.
Kwomwowok ani akwek ŋalecutecu aret ce caŋ, kunyo otosyini omwowok aponte lokik. Mite piko ce caŋ ce kokopur kopurto nye miyat kwek punik cepo murtowontet nye kimeci Kristo.

Kunyo mosukowoŋnkyi picoto kwaranta soponwek cikwa om wule mite mata nye momise. Omnye soye picoto corokyinotet nyepo porwonik cikwa. Silekey cek tukuk ce kotosutyini kolilonis. Sote cekto pate tukuk cepo koroni.
Ntene ciku acek piko cepo koret nyepo torot. Kunyo cemite cekeni Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo nye mosukucone torot cokusopec.
Mosukuwec neto porwonikyacek ce kuskus kukerkeyitu oko porto nyenyi nye ponto woyinto. Mosukwiy neto ŋalecu tokol om swamet nye yiyisye ye wece tukuk tokol cepo koret.

Kunyo mpo yeya, ocömok ani akwek koromun, oŋnkomöce kule nto akäsak. Oŋereco ani akwek koromun, kunyo oyiku pelutyet nyimwani nye poru yisyet nyimwani. Mpo yeya, möce oyiyisye topon om soponwekwok om wule mite Mokoryontet.
Osomok ani akwek Ewotia oko Suntike kule roke asat oŋnkocomncine ŋalek cikwok kuyu pic ce tupco om Kristo.

Mpenyi corwemwani nyepo manta nye kicintosi tukway, amöce ani kule kalye nyi koruco, omnye kiciyisye acek oko cekto yisyet nyewo koromun cemwayte lokoywek ce toponec wanak oko Klement, oko piko tokol ce kicesil kaynokwa kitaput nyepo soponto.
Roke aŋerec akwek okokoy om soponwek cikwok om wule mite Mokoryontet. Kunyo otosyini omwowu kule, aŋerec!
Oporci piko tokol kule oyiku akwek toloyec. Karik kuco Mokoryontet.
Monte cisot kiy ake tokol, ntene om somutek cikwok tokol ye omite osome Yiyintet kiy ake tokol nye omöce, kumöce osome okokoy om mukuleyto nye kostoyisyi.
Mosukurip kalyet nyepo Yiyintet mukuleywekwok oko kasoteywekwok om Yesu Kristo. Kalyet nyoto kunye puryo kot komuce kunket kasoteywek cepo piko.
Mpo yeya, ŋalek cepo letut kucu, orip kasoteywek cikwok om ŋalek cepo manta, oko cepo sikonotet, oko ce rototin, oko ce tililec, oko ce toponec, oko cepo koyweyisyet.
Oyiyisye ŋalek co kyolim oŋnkokäs akwek oyiye ani, oko konetisyet oko yisyonutek ce kyonket akwek om wule amite ani. Kunyo mosopurte akwek kalyet nyo konec acek Yiyintet.

Oponte ani ŋerekwek ce caŋ koromun om soponto nyimwani, om wule mite Mokoryontet! Omnye om letutap pesyosyek ce caŋ, kwacec akwek yawut akalya ani. Puryo kot omwowu kule kikyotaya nye mokolyo, ntene omnye kipuryo kot oponte poroyinto.
Oŋnkupuryo yec kot omwowu ani ŋalecu kuyunyi omnye asoti kule kicetaya, omnye kyanetkey wule opurtoy ani kwani nkit.

Oŋnket wule mopurte ye moponte tukuk ce yeme oko ye oponte tukuk ce yeme. Kyanetkey ani ŋalecu sukuŋet amuc apur kuyu ci nye yemo kiy tokol, mpo ye koyomisye okoy opiyony nto mpo ye monoyomisye okoy opiyony, nto ye komokoren nto mpo ye kapanan.
Amuci amukte wuyinto ake tokol om swamet nye kono ani Kristo.
Ntene kyayiy akwek topon akalya ani om toŋoŋutekwani.
Oŋnket akwek Filipik kule om pesyosyek co kipo tay yo kyomwoytoy ani lokoywek ce toponec yo kyocone Maketoniya kwakwek nkit om pikap Yiyintet ce kikalya kukono pesanik ce kyoyiyisye.
Mpo ye kyomite Sesolonika, kyosutwo ani akwek yoto kokolyoyisyet nyepo pesanik aret oyeny.
Puryo kot amöce kule anyoru kokotutek, ntene amöce pate kule akäs latik ce kotosyikey om wule omite akwek.

Kunyo aponte ani yawut tukuk tokol ce yemo kusirte ce amöce. Kuyema topon yawut tukuk omnye kwonyoru kokotutekwok ce kwokonu akwek ce kusutu Epafrotito. Kerkey kokotutecu oko korosek ce poŋu topon ce puntoy wule mite Yiyintet oŋnkuŋerec neto.
Kunyo Yiyintemwani om Mokoryontinyi nyewo koromun nye mosukukonok akwek tukuk tokol ce omöce kupunte wule mite Yesu Kristo.
Kopurune Woyinto wule mite Papanyo Yiyintet okokoy oko okokoy - Yunyoto.
Asupay pikap Yiyintet tokol ce kipoyit Yesu Kristo. Kesupayak akwek mpo yeya cepo wuli ce cepontekey oko ani.
Kesupayak akwek pikap Yiyintet tokol ce mite wuli, ntene kupëlis piko ce mitowune kaytap Kinko nyewo.
Kunyo opurte akwek tokol poypoyetap Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo.
Cone parwani wule amite ani Paulo nye kikwey Yiyintet kwek kiyokintetap Yesu Kristo. Oŋnkucone wule mite yeyanyo Timosewo.
Cesilyini pikap Yiyintet mpo yeya ce cikenekeny om Kristo cepo koretap Kolosaya. Kante kukonok Yiyintet Papanyo poypoyet oko kalyet.
Cikostoy acek okokoy Yiyintet kwanitap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo ye ce mite cesomwok.
Omnye kicelim koyenet nye oponte akwek om wule mite Yesu oko cömisyet nye ocöme piko tokol cepo Yiyintet.
Kwone ŋalecutecu tukway kokenotet nyo kicekonorwok akwek om torot. Kokonotet nyoto kunye po ŋalek cepo manta cepo lokoywek ce toponec co kyolim akwek kunyo.

Mite lokoywecoto toponec kukonu kupeyok oŋnkutosyinikey om koret tokol kuyu wulo yunto om wule mite akwek, kuceke pesyet nyepo tay nyo kyolime poypoyetap Yiyintet oŋnkonket ŋalecato kuyu ŋalek cepo manta.
Mutworintet nye kerkey oko acek Epafra oŋnku cämanenyacek kunye kinetak akwek ŋaleca. Neto kunye cito nye kikoyen nye yicin yisyet Kristo om kaynenyacek.
Kico neto cokumwowec acek cömisyet nye oponte akwek nyo kikonok Muyet Nyetilil.

Kunyo, kuceke pesyet nye kicelim acek ŋaleca, munakyaste mpo pesyo akenke nye mocesomwok. Cesome acek kule roke oŋnket akwek topon cömisyet nyepo Yiyintet oŋnkonyoru ŋomnonet om mukuleywekwok orit saŋet oŋnket ŋalek tokol ce konu Muyet Nyetilil.

Cesome kule otosyikey akwek opurte okokoy soponto nye ponto latik om wule mite Yiyintet, oŋereci akwek neto koromun, saŋet ayiy yisyonutek wok tokol cepo toponiyet, oŋnkotosyikey anetkey ŋalek ce caŋ cepo Yiyintet.
Cesome kule roko kukwilak akwek Yiyintet om woyinto nyepo swamenyi nyewo, sukuŋet amuc otitir om swama oŋnkomuytoci oŋnkoŋerec om kiy ake tokol nye kacontyok.
Oŋnkokaste Papa Yiyintet nye kikonok ayem onyoru otepto nyimwoŋ om koret nyepo lakweyinto om wule mite pikyi cetililec.
Omnye neto kunye kisorunenec acek wule mite poytoyisyet nyepo menonet, oŋnkukwerwec cekwa okoy wule mite poytoyisyet nyepo Werinyi Camanet.
Kunyo Werit nye kikalyec acek miyotyonikyo oŋnkutyaktec.
Kristo kunye tonto nye toku nye kerkey oko Yiyintet nyo puryo kot kutoku. Neto kunye Werit poretyet nyewo nye poytoy tukuk tokol ce kicitany om koret tokol.

Om wule mite neto kunye kitany Yiyintet tukuk tokol ce mite koret torot oko koret ŋony, cetoku oko cemotoku wanak oko swamet nyepo oyik oko poytoyik oko kamukeywek. Kitany Yiyintet koret tokol kupunte wule mite neto, oŋnkwek nyenyi.
Kimite neto om towunot kutompo kot citany kiy ake tokol, neto nye nöme kuyomo kwek kiy akenke koret tokol.
Neto metitap porto, nto porto nyoto ku pikap Yiyintet ce kikoyomekey. Neto kunye lukune soponto nyepo porto, sukuŋet kopoyit tay om tukuk tokol.
Yiyintet nkit kunye kicäm oŋnkukwey kule mokunyor Werit tonto nyepo Yiyintet.

Kunyo kicäm Yiyintet kupunte wule mite Werit, sukuŋet kuket kuwec koret kuco wule mite neto. Kisut Yiyintet kalyet om metap Werinyi nyo kimeci murtowontet, kunyo kiwec tukuk tokol kukwa yec wule mite neto. Tukucoto tokol kuce mite koret tokol torot oko ŋony.
Kyomitowune akwek ikye wule low om wule mite Yiyintet, kunyo kikyawecekey akwek oyiku punik cepo Yiyintet om tukuk cemiyotec ce kyayiy oŋnkasot.
Kunyo kikweyak akwek yawut Yiyintet aketitekey wule mite neto kupunte metap porto nyepo Werinyi, nye kiceyi, oŋnkume sukuŋet kuwecak akwek otililitu oŋnkotoponitu nye komoponte miyotyo mpo kisic.

Kunyo misyini otosyikey om koyenet nye kwilat nyepo manta nyo kyonyoru, monte kyastekey ciluclucak kot akwane kokenotet nyo kyonyoru nyo kyolim akwek lokoywek ce toponec. Lokoywecutecu toponec kuce kicemwaytate koret tokol kumukul. Kunyo ani Paulo kunye kicekweya oyiku mutworintet nyepo ŋalecu.
Kunyo oyiku ani yawut ŋerekat om toŋoŋutekwani. Omnye om toŋuŋutek cikwani cepo porto nyimwani kuye okolyoy awaŋnte toŋoŋutek cepo Kristo ce kiŋet kupo porto nyenyi, coto ku luketap Yiyintet.
Kunyo kikweya Yiyintet oyiku mutworintet nyepo pikap Yiyintet. Kikono ayiy yisyoni kupo toponiyet nyimwakwek. Yisyet nyoto kunye omwoytoti topon lokoywekyi.
Ŋalecutecu kuce kikiwuŋe Yiyintet piko cepo pinutek tokol kuwany kenyisyek ce caŋ ntene kuŋoŋ om letut kuporci pikyi.

Omnye kikwiy Yiyintet kuyunyitenyi kule oporci pikyi ŋalekyi ce wuŋotin, ŋalecutecu kuce po mokoryonti oko woyinto ce mokyini Yiyintet piko tokol, nto ŋalecoto kucu kule mitowune Kristo wule omite akwek orit, nye poru kule mosonyoru akwek woyintotap Yiyintet.

Kunyo cemwocini acek piko tokol ŋalek cepo Kristo. Cisowu oŋnkyinet ci ake tokol om ŋomnonet ake tokol nye mukoktos, sukuŋet cekweru ci ake tokol kuco wule mite Yiyintet. Kukokwek cito nye kikil nye ponto koyomotet oko Kristo.
Otitiri ani aŋnkataŋany ye sukwiyokis ŋalecutecu, oyiyisye swamet nyewo nye konu Kristo nye mite kwiyisyi om wule amite ani.
Kunyo akany omwowok wule kyotitirte ani oyiwok akwek yisyet oŋnkoyici piko ce mite Laotisea oko mpo piko alak tokol ce tompo kot kukäsa ani om konyekwa.

Ayiye kuyunyoto sukuŋet kutosyikey kutitir mukuleywekwa ce toponec oŋnkuyomokey cekto kwek akenke om cömisyet, oŋnkunket mokoryontit tokol nye konu ŋomnonet nyepo ŋaleca, oŋnkunyor ŋalekap Yiyintet ce woŋotin, nyoto ku Kristo.
Kristo kunye Funkuwet nye yote wule kiwuŋekey Mokoryontit tokol nyepo ŋomnonet oko kokenotetap Yiyintet.
Komwowok ani akwek ŋalecu sukuŋet mente kot tokuperperak citake om ŋalek alak cepo tintenot nyepo mwiynan nka kot ku ŋalek ce toponec ceyune.
Omnye nka kot mopontekey ani oko akwek om porto ntene cepontekey oko akwek om kasoteywek. Kunyo ayiku ŋerekat koromun akäs kopurto nye kwilat oko koyenet nye oponte akwek om wule mite Kristo.
Kuyu wulo kyocäm akwek Yesu Kristo kwek Mokoryontet, kunyo misyini oyomekey oko neto.

Opur kuyu pic ce kwilotin tikityet cekwok om wule mite neto; atec kuneryo soponwek cikwok om wule mite neto, oŋnkokwilokisye okokoy om koyenet nyimwoŋ kuyu wule kicinetitak, oŋnkotosyikey akaste okokoy Yiyintet nyewo.

Misyini oripkey akäs kule mente kot kumasak citake om konetisyet nyepo ŋalek cepo mwiynan ce moponto latik ce kwone konetisyet nye kirup piko kuceke keny, oko ŋomnonetap oyik cepo koret, ce puryo kot kukwone wule mite Kristo nkit.
Omnye mitowune soponto tokol nyepo Yiyintet wule mite Kristo kuyu cito.
Kunyo kicekonok akwek soponto tokol, oŋnkyiyomok oyiku akenke oko neto. Neto kunye nyewo nye poytoy poytoyik oko kamukeywek alak tokol.

Yo kyoyomntosikey akwek oko neto kuye yoto ye kicewonok akwek. Ntene puryo kot ku wonset nyo wone piko porto, ntene wonset nyepo Kristo nkit, nyoto kunye sorunet nye kicityacec cekwane swamet nyepo porto nyi ponto miyotyet.

Omnye yo kicepotisonok akwek kuye kicemuyok yoto oko Kristo. Nto patisanet yec kuye kyotutune met oko Kristo kupunte koyenet nyimwoŋ om swamet nyepo Yiyintet nye yiyisyi nye kiŋet Yesu Kristo kotutune met.

Kikipok ikye soponwek cikwok om wule mite Yiyintet om miyotyonik ce kyoponte, oko yec omnye kyoyiku akwek Lamek ce kyomite saŋ om ntarastinek. Kunyo kikwerwok akwek yawut Yiyintet kwonyoru soponto kuyu Kristo! Kikukalyec Yiyintet acek miyotyonikyo tokol.
Kupël neto ntarastinek, oŋnkunum wule kicesil pesenutek cicacek ce miyotec, oŋnkukwertoci murtowontet kupok.
Nteye kimite Yesu Murtowontet, kutyacekey nkit kucone wule mite poytoyisyet nyepo oyik oko kamukeywek ce kinöme neto. Kipël neto oyik oŋnkunam kuyu sira oŋnkuwesetot kupartat kukäs piko tokol.
Kunyo puryo kot kurok kwiwok akwek citake ntarastinek ce nöme omik ce moyam, nto yisyet, nto ce nöme pesyosyek ce tililec, nto ce nöme sakwet nyepo arawet nye kolel, nto ce nöme pesyetap Sapat.
Ŋaleca tokol kuce rurwet nyepo ŋalek ce mosukukwa, nto ŋalek cepo manta ku Kristo.

Monte kot acäm kot kumutwok musanku citake tokol nye sutekey kule oyiku nyewo opëlisye, omnye köse neto ŋoŋutok ce kweyotin. Kusyem kukerekey ŋalek cepo mwiynan oko soyutek cepo malaykanik. Kwontos cicoto pöc pate om kasoteywek cepo koret.
Kikwasta neto nye kimo kurupe Kristo nye metit nye poytoy oŋnkupoye porto tokol oŋnkotuyo om wule kicituye om melilok oŋnkuner kuyu wulo moktoy Yiyintet kule kuner.
Kyopoku akwek oko Kristo, kicityakenak poytoyisyet nyepo oyik cepo koret! Kunyo omne sopur akwek kuyunye opoye koroni? Omne sacäm akwek cirwokwok kule,
“Monte kot anäm kiyi? Monte kot acemcem kiyin? Monte kot otiny tukuk alak?’’
Puryo kot kuponto tukuco latik ye kokyiyisye. Ntarastinecoto kuce kikwiye oŋnkunet cito.

Porukey manta kuyunye ponto ŋaleca ŋomnon om ŋalek ceponto ce ceripekey oko muyotet nyepo kopreperisyet nyepo portap cito. Ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kuponto latik cepo manta ce muce kot kurip tukuk ce möce porto.
Kyotutune met akwek oko Kristo, kunyo misyini asat mukuleywek cikwok kukäs tukuk ce mite torot wule mite Kristo kukepure ŋecerenyi om yewutap tay nyepo Yiyintet.
Okoci kukäs pate kasoteywek cikwok tukuk ce mite torot, ntene monte cekäs tukuk ce mite koret ŋony.
Omnye kyopoku akwek, kunyo kiwuŋokis soponwek cikwok oko Kristo om wule mite Yiyintet.
Kristo kunye soponto nyimwakwek nyepo manta, nteye coni kuporukey neto, mpo akwek mosoporukey oko neto oŋnkonyoru woyinto nyenyi!
Kunyo misyini apakäc corokyinotet nyepo koret nyo mite kwiyisyi om wule omite akwek, kuyu sakwayanat, simnyo, corokyinot nye samis, oko sayet nye miyat (Omnye sayet nye miyat kunye kacesay kerkeyik)
Omnye mosukukwontyi nerekwekap Yiyintet piko co puryo kot kuyweye cek neto om tukuk ceyucutecu.
Kyomite akwek ikye pesyosyek alak opurtoy soponto nye yunyoto oko piko alak ce kyominye tokol.
Kunyo oyiku akwek yawut Kristayek, misyini ayaste tukucu tokol, kuyu nerekwek, nyerunotet, kowotyontit, oko mwiynanet, oko ŋalek ce somis ce kwone kutuwak cikwok.
Monte ciperperkey akwek kwakwek nkit om ŋal cepo mwiynan, omnye kyowirte akwek soponto nyo kipo keny kupetakey kopurto nye miyat.
Kunyo kyolac soponto nyelel. Nyoto kunye cito nye mite cilelite okokoy sukuŋet oŋnket Yiyintet nyo kitonyok akwek akerkeyitu oko neto.

Om soponto nyitenyi lel kunye puryo kot kumite pciyatet om wule mite Yutoyintet oko Kirikintet, nto cito nye wonat oko cito nye mawonat, nto cito nye lomin, nto piko ce Lamek alak tokol, nto ci nye mutworin oko cito nye momutworin, ntene Kristo kunye po ŋalek tokol, oŋnkumitowune kiy ake tokol wule mite Kristo.
Kunyo ye kikweyak akwek Yiyintet oyiku pikyi ce cämanik, kumisyini opurte moyet oko mukuleyto nye kolyoyisyi, oko tolosyet oko poypoyet oko muytocinotet.
Okolyoykey akwek nkit, nteye ponto ci ake tokol om akwek ŋolyo nye ŋunye om wule mite citake, kumisyini kumuyta oŋnkukalya nyin, kuyu wulo kikokalyak akwek Mokoryontet.
Ntene ce pëlisyi om ŋalecu tokol ku cömisyet; Omnye cömisyet kunye kwile kuyomntos sukuŋet kutoponitu tukuk tokol kwek akenke.
Kalyet nye konu Kristo kunye roke kwek ketintet om mukuleywekwok orit. Kikurok akwek Yiyintet sukuŋet onyoru kalyet nyitenyi soyiku pic ce kikwek porto akenke, kunyo okostoyisyi.

Lokoywekap Kristo wanak oko mokoryontit tokol nye ponto kuce roke kopurune mukuleywekwok orit. Onetisye oŋnkorwokyikey akwek nkit om ŋomnonet tokol. Otumnci Yiyintet tumwonik cepo kakastayet oko tumwonik cepo ŋerekwek oko tumwonik cetililec, okostoy Yiyintet om mukuleywekwok orit.
Kunyo tukuk tokol ce oyiye akwek, nto ŋalek ce oŋololi; kuce roke oyiye om kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu ye omite akwek okostoy Yiyintet Papa kupunte wule mite Yesu.
Misyini aywey akwek koruk sanikwok, omnye roke ayiy kuyunyoto kuyu kristayek.
Misyini acäm moronik korukwok, monte cewuse.
Akwek lekok, yisyemwakwek kuyu Kristayek aywey okokoy mpo kon oko mpo komet, omnye ŋerece ŋalek ceyucoto Yiyintet.
Akwek poyik oko cepyosok, monte cewuse lekokwok, omnye sutyini ŋalek ceyucoto kumuyo pate.
Akwek mutworik, aywey mokorenikwok cepo koret om ŋalek tokol, monte oyiyisyi pate ye mite cek kukosök sukuŋet kukastak.
Ntene oyiye kiy ake tokol oyicini Mokoryontet kukowoŋnkyi om mukuleywekwok tokol ntene nye puryo kot oyicini piko.
Misyini oŋnket kule mosukuyokwok akwek Mokoryontet, mosonyoru musyaret nye kikonorci neto pikyi, omnye Kristo kunye Mokoryontet nye oyicini akwek yisyet.
Nto ci ake tokol nye yiye ŋalek ce miyotec, nka kot ku cito nye yune, mosicikoci nyoto musyaret nyepo tukuk ce miyotec ce kikwiye; omnye yoyece Yiyintet piko tokol.
Akwek mokorenik, opoytoy mutworikwok topon oŋnkoyoyeci topon, oŋnketi kule oponte mpo akwek Mokoryontet nye mite torot.
Otosyikey osome okokoy, oŋnkoripkey ye okostoy Yiyintet.
Nteye omite osome, osomwec mpo acek sukuŋet kukonec Yiyintet kuyotwec kurket cenyoru poroyinto cemwaytate lokoywek ce wuŋotin cepo Kristo, omnye ŋalecato ce kisokyo ani sicekerta mopusi.
Kunyo osomwo saŋet aŋalal ŋalek ce toku om aret nye topon kuyu wule omuktoy.
Oŋomekitu koromun om ŋalek ye oŋololyini piko co tompo kot kucömis co tokumite saŋ, oyiyisye topon poroyinto nye oponte.
Möce kutoponit ŋelyepta nyimwoŋ oŋnkoŋerece piko, oŋnkumöce oŋnket ŋalek cepo manta ye owekyini citake tokol ŋolyo.
Yeyanyo nye cämanet Tukiko nye kikoyen nye yiyisyi oŋnku mutworintet nye kerkey oko acek om yisyetap Mokoryontet nye mosukuco cokwumwowok akwek ŋalek tokol ce nömo ani.
Kunye koyoku kuco wule omite akwek, kule sukuŋet cokuŋerecak kumwowok ŋalek cekwone wule ce mite acek oko wule cipurtoy acek tokol.
Contoykey neto Onesimo cito nyinyacek nye kokoyen oŋnku yeyanyo nye ceman nye cone koremwoŋ. Mosukukwa cek oŋnku kwokumwowok ŋalek tokol cekwone wuli cemite acek.
Kesupayak akwek Aristariko nye cepontekey acek tukway om mopusi oko Marko nye tupco oko Parnapa.

Oko Yoswa nye cekure kaynet ake Yusto (Kunyo kyolim akwek ŋalek cepo Marko, roke atoroc oŋerekyi neto ye kaco wule omite akwek) Picutecu pate kuce Yutayek ce kikwek Kristayek ce mite kwiyisyi oko ani yisyet nyepo poytosyisyetap Yiyintet. Kukukalya ani cekto koromun.

Kesupayak akwek mpo Epafra nye cito akenke nyepo koremwoŋ oŋnku mutworintet nyepo Yesu Kristo. Neto nye somwok akwek okokoy nye memunye kule saŋet okwilokisye oyiku Kristayek ce kwilotin ce kikoywey cömisyet tokol nyepo Yiyintet.
Omwowok ani nkit yisyet nyewo nye yiye neto om kaynamwakwek oko mpo pikap Laotisea oko piko cepo Yerapoli.
Kesupayak akwek Luka cepsakityantet nye cämanet nyinyacek oko Tema.
Osupoywec koromun mpo yeyanyo ce mite Laotisea oko yeya Nimfa oko pikap Yiyintet ce mite kanyi.
Ye kacesumonwok akwek parwani okoyite wocesumontyi pikap Yiyintet cepo Laotisea, nto kapok oyiytekey mpo akwek cesumonwok parwet nye mokucone Loatisea.
Omwoci Arkipo kule, “Möce käs kule keyiy okoy wany topon yisyetap Mokoryontet nyo kicekoniŋ.’’
Yewumwani nkit nye kosile ŋalekyu: Ani Paulo nye kasupayak akwek. Kunyo Monte ceyutye kule amite ani Mopusi. Osomwok kule opurte akwek poypoyetap Yiyintet.

Cone parwani wule ce mite acek Paulo oko Silfano oko Timosewo. Cesilwok akwek pikap Yiyintet ce mite Sesolonika. Piko coto kuce po Papa Yiyintet oko Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo. Kante opurte akwek poypoyet oko kalyet.
Cikostoy acek akokoy Yiyintet om wule omite akwek tokol, oŋnkyeŋalalenak okokoy ye ce mite cesome.

Omnye cisoti acek om taytap Yiyintet oŋnku Papa; kuyu wulo oyiyisye akwek koyenet nyimwoŋ kutok oko kuyu wulo konok cömisyet nyimwoŋ oyiyisye om swamet, oko kuyu wulo kwilat koromun cömisyet nyimwoŋ om wule mite Yesu Kristo.
Mpo yeya, cinket acek kule cömok Yiyintet; kunyo kikweyak oyiku pikyi.

Omnye kipuro kot cesutwok acek lokoywek ce toponec om ŋalek pate, ntene kicesutu mpo swamet oko Muyet Ntetilil oko ŋomnonet tokol nyepo ŋalecato. Oŋnket wule kicipurtoy acek yo kicepontekey oko akwek. Kicipur kuyunyoto kupo topiniyet nyimwakwek.
Kyacec mpo akwek yoto opurte kopurto nye kerkey oko nyinyacek oko nyepo Mokoryontet. Nka kot kyonyuru yoto wuyinwek ce caŋ, ntene kyatoroc akwek lokoywek om ŋerekwek co konu Muyet Nyetilil.
Yoto oporukey oyiku piko ce kekasenak piko tokol co kikoyen cepo Meketoniya oko Akaya.
Omnye kipuryo kot ku ŋolyontetap lokoywek pate ce kyotaste celime Meketoniya, ntene kipunte koyenet nyimwoŋ ceŋalale om wulyo tokol. Kunyo puryo kot ceponte acek yec ŋolyontet ake nye mocemwowu.
Ŋolole picoto nkit wule kyotoroktec acek akwek yo kicetorocec, oŋnkumwoy wule kyawektekey akwek ayaste kerkeyik oŋnkowekyikey wule mite Yiyintet. Sukuŋet oyici Yiyintet nye sopot yisyet nyepo manta,
oŋnkoken Werinyi nye mosukucone torot. Nyoto ku Yesu Kristo nyo kiŋet Yiyintet kotutune met, kunye kosopintet nye kisorwec om wule mite nerekwek cepo Yiyintet ce mosukukwa.
Mpo yeya, oŋnket akwek nkit kule kipuryo kot kupoyit püc pate rutoyenyacek yo kicekwoni wule omite akwek.

Oŋnket kule kikicitaŋanyec acek kunyo oŋnkyecupec om Filipi kutompo cepunu wule omite akwek om Sesolonika. Ntene kutitirec Yiyintenyo okoy cemwowok lokoywek ce toponec cekwone wule mite neto, nka kot kimite piko ce caŋ ce kitoyisyi.
Puryo kot kumasat konetisyet nye kicinetak acek akwek, nto mpo ku kule ponto kosotey ce miyotec, nto mpo kule cesyeme ciperper ci ake tokol.

Ntene ce möce kule ceŋalal okokoy kuyu wule moktoy Yiyintet, omnye kikweyec oŋnkukonec lokoywek ce toponec. Puryo kot cesyeme kule ciŋerec piko, ntene ce möce kule ciŋerec Yiyintet nyo syeme mukuleywek cicacek.
Oŋnket akwek kupoyit manta kule, kipuryo kot cekwa wule omite akwek cesutu ŋalek cepo kutit saŋ pate, puryo mpo kot ciyiyisye ŋalek ce kicewunye kule cemöce pesanik, Yiyintet nye nkete coto.
Kipuryo kot cesyem kule cenyoru kakastayet nye cone wule mite ci ake tokol, kuyu nye cone wule omite akwek, nto mpo nye cone wule mite piko alake,
Nka kot kicimuci acek cemakenak akwek tukuk alak kuyu kiyokik cepo Kristo. Ntene kicetoloyitu yo kicepontekey akwek kuyu yeyo nye ripe lekokyi.
Kunyo kicecämak acek koromun, yoto okoy cekonok, puryo kot ku lokoywekap Yiyintet pate, ntene kicekonok mpo soponwek cicacek.

Mpo yeya, möce asot kupoyit manta kuyu wulo kiciyisye acek cetitir! Kiciyisye pet oko komoy sukuŋet mente kot cesutyi nyikisin ci ake tokol om akwek, oŋnkurok yec cemwowok lokoywek ce toponec ce kwone wule mite Yiyintet.
Akwek kuce oŋnketi ŋalecato oŋnkonket mpo Yiyintet nkit, kule kicipurte acek kapurto nyetilil nyepo manta nye kipuryo kot kupunto lelis om wule omite akwek co kyocömisye.
Oŋnket wule kiceriptok acek akwek kuyu wulo riptoy kwan lekokyi.
Kicititirok, oŋnkyipaypayak oŋnkyesomwok kule opurte soponto nye ŋerece Yiyintet nyo kikurok kwonyoru poytoyisyenyi oko wonyinto.

Mite ŋolyontet ake nye cikostoy acek Yiyintet okokoy, nyoto kunyi kule, yo kiciporwok acek akwek ŋolyontetap Yiyintet, olim yoto oŋnkoyen nye puryo kuyu ŋolyo nyepo cito, ntene kuyu ŋolyontetap Yiyintet. Kunyo yunyoto kupoyit manta, omnye mite Yiyintet kwiyisyi om wule omite akwek co kyoyen.
Nto akwek mpo yeya, kyotaŋany toŋoŋutek ce kerkey oko cepo pikap Yiyintet cepo Yuteya. Kuyu wule kitaŋany pikap koremwoŋ, kunyo kitaŋany mpecek Yutayek,
co kipoköce Mokoryontet Yesu oŋnkupakäc workoyik oŋnkukwetec acek saŋ. Puryo kot kuŋerece piko coto Yiyintet, kunyo punik cekto cepo piko tokol.
Omnye kusyem kule cekerktec mente cemwoci Lamek wule mocisopto. Miyotyet nyitenyi nye kinyit miyotyonik cikwa ce caŋ ce kikwiy cekto. Kunyo konyor cekto yawut om letut nerekwek cepo Yiyintet.
Mpo yeya, yu kowo cepakaktak acek akwek kumuniŋ, kunyo nka kot puryo kot cekosekey om konyek, ntene kicepontekey oko akwek om kasoteywek, kicesyem koromun kule cekasenak yec konyek.
Kicemöce kule ceketukey wule omite akwek. Kyasyem ani Paulo aret ce caŋ kule aco wule omite akwek, ntene kukurekta Setanit.
Ntene akwek nkit, nye puryo kot ku piko alak, oyiku kokenotet nyinyacek. Kunyo om akwek nkit kuce cesilekey acek om taytap Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo ye kaco.
Akwek kuce cesilekey oŋnkoyiku ŋerekwek cicacek cepo manta.
Yoto yu kowo cekäs kule komocimuci tocemuytoci, cecäm kule cipur Asene kwacek nkit,
oŋnkyiyoku Timosewo yeyanyo nye kyiyisyi acek tokol yiysyetap Yiyintet cemwoytoy lokoywek ce toponec cepo Kristo, sukuŋet kuco cokotitirok oŋnkukalyak koyenet nyimwoŋ.
Sukuŋet mente kot kumasak ci ake tokol omnye konyoru toŋoŋutek coto. Oŋnket akwek nkit kule toŋoŋutek ceyucoto kuce tukuk ce poru cömisyet nyepo Yiyintet om wule cemite acek.
Omnye yo kicepontekey, kicemwowok kutompo kot kupunto pasyosyek kule mosicitaŋanya, kunyo kukwiyokis yawut kuyunyoto.

Kuyiyit nyoto sukuŋet oyoku ani Timosewo, omnye kimomuci kot tomuytoci yec. Kyoyoku ani neto kule cokukäs wule yunto koyenet nyimwoŋ. Kwomöce kule oŋnket kule titirot koyenet nyimwoŋ kot kwamukte oyinot, nto pesyet ake kupoyit püc pate yisyet nye kikyiy acek.

Kunyo kuweckey yawut Timosewo okoy wule ce mite acek kusutu lokoywek cekwone wule omite akwek cepo ŋerekwek ce nöme koyenet oko cömisyet nyimwoŋ. Kumwowec kule asotec acek akwek topon okokoy oŋnkomöce koromun kule cekäsec kuyu wulo cemöce mpo acek kule cekäsak akwek.
Mpo yeya, koyenet nyimwoŋ kunye kwetitirec acek om wuyinwekyo oko toŋoŋutekyo tokol.
Kunyo ponto soponto latik om wule cemite acek yawut ye kwokwilokisye akwek,
Cimuci acek yawut cikaste Yiyintet om wule omite akwek. Cikostoy om ŋerekwek ce ceponte om taytap Yiyintet kupo akwek.
Cesome acek neto pet oko komoy om mukuleywekyo, kule sukuŋet cekäsak akwek om konyekyo, sicekonok swamet nye omöce om koynet nyimwoŋ.
Yiyintenyo nkit oŋnku Papa oko Mokoryontenyo Yesu, kunye roke kuyiytowec acek aret sukuŋet cekwa wule omite akwek!
Mokoryontet nkit kunye roke kukonok kutosyikey kuwoyit cömisyet nyimwakwek om wule omite akwek kwakwek nkit, oko wule mite piko tokol; kuyu cömisyet nye ceponte acek om wule omite akwek.

Om aret nyeyunyoto kuye mosicekwil acek mukuleywek cikwok oŋnkonyolu opoyitu manta, oŋnkotililitu om taytap Yiyintenyo oŋnku Papa om pesyet nyo coni Mokoryontenyo Yesu wanak oko piko tokol ce kikwek pikyi.

Mpo yenya, ŋolyontet nyepo letut kunyi kule, oŋnket kucone wule cemite acek wule yunto kopurto nye misyini cipurte sukuŋet kuŋerec Yiyintet. Ntene kapurto nyoto kunyo oponte akwek. Cesomok acek yawut koromun om kaynetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu kule otosyikey ayiy kupëlis.
Omnye oŋnket konetisyet nyepo ŋalek co kicinetak acek akwek om kamukeywekap Mokoryontet Yesu.
Kito nye möce Yiyintet kunyi kule, otililitu nye puryo kot oponte sakwayanat mpo kisic.
Möce ci ake tokol om akwek konket kule misyini komüt korket nyenyi om aret nye topon nyetilil,
Nye puryo kot ku om aret nyepo corokyinotet nye miyat kuyu wulo yiytoy piko co puryo kot konket Yiyintet.
Kunyo om ŋolyontoni, puryo kot kuroke kot kowurta nto mpo kot kumas citake yeyanyi. Kicemwowok acek ŋelyontoni ikye, kicisowok koromun kule mosukotaŋany Yiyintet piko ce yiye ŋalecutecu miyotec.
Kipuryo kot kukurec acek Yiyintet kule sukuŋet cipurte yec soponto nyepo sakwayanatet, ntene möce kule cipurte soponto nyetilil.
Kunyo ci ake tokol nye katay konetisyoni kunye kupryo kot kutay konetisyet nyepo cito, ntene kukatay cicoto Yiyintet nyo kikonok akwek Muyet Nyetilil.
Puryo kot kuroke cesilwok ŋalek ce nöme cömisyet wule roke acämnte piko alak co kicömis. Kikonetak akwek Yiyintet wule roke acämntekey akwek kwakwek nkit.
Kunyo kopurto nyeyunyoto omite akwek oporcini mpo yeya tokol cemite Meketoniya, kunye kopurto nyoto nye cesomok kule otosyikey kupëlis.
Otosyikey opurte pate soponto nye topon oŋnkasot oyiyisye yewuniyek cikwok sukuŋet onyoru pesanik cepo omik ce oyome kuyu wulo kikicemwowok acek kunyo.
Om aret nyeyunyitenyi kuye kuyweyak piko ce puryo kot kucömis. Puryo kot kuroke okenekey citake tokol om tukuk ce omöce.
Mpo yeya, cemöce acek kule oŋnket akwek ŋalek cepo manta ce nöme piko co kipok, sukuŋet monte cemuye kuyu wulo yunto piko co puryo kot kuponto kokenotet.
Cecöme kule kime Yesu oŋnkotutune met; kunyo ciyeni kule mosukoŋet Yiyintet kotutune met piko co kipok kuyene Yesu.
Konetisyetap Mokoryontet nyitenyi cemwowok kule, acek co cesoptosi om posyonoto coni Mokoryontet kuce cepeti tay cintoci piko co kipok.

Mosukuco polotet nye ŋetŋete piko. Nyoto kunye kutit nyepo malayket nyewo nyo kontitap Yiyintet. Mosukurek Mokoryontet nkit kucone torot kuco ŋony. Mosukunyosyo kuŋetyo kotutune met piko co kipok kukicäm Kristo.
Yoto cirurucec acek piko co cesoptosi om pesyonoto oŋnkyepetekey cekto cetorokte Mokoryontet cetuye om polyet om wulin po parak, oŋnkyipur oko Mokoryontet okokoy.
Kunyo aŋereckey otitirkey akwek kwakwek nkit oyiyisye ŋelacutecu.
Mpo yeya, puryo kot kuroke cisilwok acek ŋalek ce nöme pesyosyek oko kenyisyek ye mokwiyokis tukucutecu.
Omnye oŋnket akwek nkit topon kule mosukuco pesyetap Mokoryontet kuyu corintet nye coni komoy.
