Pesyosyek coto kuye mwowu piko kule, “Mite kiy ake tokol topon nye puryo ŋoyenot.’’ Yoto pakenke kuye mosukwaran cekto lakwar! Puryo ci nye cilile. Mosukukerkeyit oko mwoninto nyo contyini korko nye karik kucämnkey lakwet.
Ntane akwek mpo yeya, puryo kot omite wule po menonet, kunyo puryo kot kuroke kucerak pesyonoto kuyu corin.
Opoye akwek tokol lakweyet; oŋnkoyiku piko cepo pet. Puryo kot ciku acek piko cepo komoy nto mpo ciku cepo mononet.
Kunyo puryo kot kuroke ceruye kuyu piko alak; misyini cekosu oŋnkyepoypoyitu.
Ruytos piko ye komoy, oŋnkupokitos ye komoy.
Ntene cepoye acek pet, kunyo misyini cepoypoyitu, misyini cenäm koyenet oko cömisyet kwek loŋet nyepo teket, oŋnkyilac kutwet nyepo karnet kwek kokenotet nyepo kosopotet.
Kipuryo kot kukweyac acek Yiyintet nye kimecec kule sukuŋet cetaŋany kunerekyec neto, ntene kikweyec sukuŋet cenyoru kosopotet kupunune wule mite Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
Omnye kimecec acek sukuŋet cipur wanak oko neto. Ye cesoptosi nto ye kacepoku om pesyet nye coni.
Kunyo roke otitirkey akwek nkit oŋnkokyokyey kuyu wulo oyiytoy yawut.
Mpo yeya, cesomok acek akwek kule aywey topon piko co yiyisyi om wule omite, piko co kuce kikwey Mokoryontet sukuŋet kunetak oŋnkuntowok.
Aywey cekto koromun oŋnkocäm yisyet nye yiye. Opurte kalyet akwek kwakwek nkit.
Mpo yeya, cesomok acek kule, asowu co puren, otitir piko co muytos, akalye piko co moponto swamet, omuytoci ŋalek cepo piko tokol.
Möce akäs kule puryo ci om akwek nye yokte miyotyet kuyakte miyotyet ake, Ntene möce otyikyi ayiy ŋalek ce toponec okokoy om wule omite akwek kwakwek nkit oko om wule mite piko tokol.
Oŋerece okokoy.
Osoye Yiyintet okokoy.
Okostoyisye om ŋolyo ake tokol. Möce Yiyintet kule ayiy akwek kuyunyoto om soponto nye oponte om Yesu Kristo.
Monte cekerekte Muyet Nyetilil.
Mönte cenyil lokoywek cepo ŋorsyet.
Ntene asyem wule yunto ŋolyo ake tokol, oŋnkorip ŋalek ce toponec.
Asanekey miyotyo ake tokol.

Yiyintet nyo kikonec kalyet kunye roke kukonok akwek otililitu om aret ake tekol, oŋnkorip topon mukuleywek cikwok oko soponwek cikwok oko porwonik cikwok, sukuŋet komoponte lelis ake tokol om pesyet nyo coni Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
Neto nyo kikurok akwek kunye po manta, kunyo mosukwiy kuyunyoto kupoyit manta.
Mpo yeya, osomwec mpo acek tokol.
Asupay mpo yeya tokol om kasupoyisyet nye ceŋotukekey nye poru tupcet.
Kosomok ani akwek om kamukeywekap Mokoryontet kule osumontyi pawani mpo yeye tokol.
Kunyo opurte akwek tokol poypoyetap Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo.
Cone parwani wule ce mite acek Paulo oko Sila oko Timosewo. Cesilwok akwek pikap Yiyintet cepo Sesolonika. Piko coto kuce kipoyit Yiyintet Papanyo oko Mokorykntet Yesu Kristo.
Kante kukonok akwek Yiyintet Papa oko Mokoryontet Yesu poypoyet oko kalyet.

Mpo yeya, misyini cikaste acek Yiyintet okokoy om wule omite akwek. Ŋolyo nyepo manta ye kaciy acek kuyonyoto, omnye mite kunere koyenet nyimwoŋ koromun, oŋnkutosyinikey cömisyet nye oponte akwek om wule mite piko alake.

Kunyo cesilekey acek nkit om ŋalek ce nömok akwek om taytap pikap Yiyintet. Cesilekey acek omnye omite akwek otosyinikey omuytoy oŋnkocömisyi nka kot oponte toŋoŋutek tokol oko nyolilutek ce omite opunte yawut.
Akwek kuce oporu wule mosukumutita Yiyintet musankut nyepo ŋalek cepo manta, kunyo mosukupor ŋalecutecu kule oyeme akwek onyoru poytoyisyenyi nye omite akwek yawut otoŋonye.
Mosukwiy Yiyintet ŋolyontet nyepo manta, mosukutaŋany neto piko co mite kutoŋonyo akwek yawut,
oŋnkutyacak akwek co omite otoŋonyi yawut oko mpo acek. Mosukwiy kuyunyoto om pesyet nyo porukey Yesu kucone torot oko malaykanikyi ce ponto swamet nyewo.
Mosukulay mata nyewo nye rikitite, sukuŋet kutaŋany piko co menket Yiyintet: oko piko co puryo kot kuyweye lokoywek ce toponec cepo Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo.
Mosukutaŋany cekto om aranet nye mopoku, oŋnkukweyokis om taytap Mokoryontet nye puryo kot kunyoru woyinto nyenyi nyewo.
Mosukwiyokis ŋalecu om pesyet nye coni neto cokunyor woyinto om wule mite pikyi oŋnkunyor kuywey piko tokol co kikoyen. Mosoyiku akwek alak om picoto omnye kyocäm lokoywek co kicemwowok acek.

Kunyo po wulo sukuŋet cesomwok acek okokoy. Cesome Yiyintenyo kule kukonok akwek soponto nyepo latik nyo kikurcok kwonyoru. Cesome kule roke kukonok Yiyintet om swamenyi tukuk ce omöce akwek cepo toponiyet oŋnkusat kunyol yisyet nyepo koyenet nyimwoŋ.
Om aret nye yunyitenyi kuye sukuŋet kunyor woyinto kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu om wule omite akwek, oŋnkonyoru akwek woyinto om wule mite neto om poypoyetap Yiyintenyo oko Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo.
Mpo yeya, ŋalek ce nöme pesyet nye cone Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo, oko ye mosicirurucec acek sukuŋet cetuye oko neto.

Cesomok acek akwek kule monte kupotpotenis kasoteywek cikwok lakwar nto mpo onyeru om ŋalek ce cemwowu kule kupunto pesyet nyepo Mokoryontet. Pesyet ake kimwoy citake ŋaleca nye kiŋorsyi nto nye kimwoytoy lokoywek. Nto kicemwoy pesyet ake kule kicesil acek parwet nye mwowu ŋalecato.
Monte kot kuperperak ci ake tokol om aret ake tokol. Omnye puryo kot kwititoy pesyonoto okoy kunyosyo kuco cukurotet nyepo letut; oŋnkutok neto nyo miyat. Nyoto kunye weti wule mite mata nye momise.

Mosukutay neto kiy ake tokol nye soye piko oŋnkutay kiy ake tokol nye sute piko kule po Yiyintet. Mosukusutkey kwek nyewo nyepo kiy ake tokol, oŋnkowut kotap Yiyintet oŋnkopur ŋony kusutkey kwek Yiyintet.
Puryo kot tosoti akwek kule kyomwowok ani ŋalecutecu tokol yo kicepontekey oko akwek?
Oŋnket akwek kito nye kerektoy Neto okoy kwitita pesyet nye kicekwey sukuŋet kuporkey.
Omnye mite yawut kwiyisyi miyotyet nye motoku, ntene ŋolyontet nye mokwiyakay kunye puryo kot kwiyoktos okoy cinate kuwo tapan neto nyo kerektoy.
Yoto kuye mosukoporkey kutok Neto nye miyat.

Mosukupakäc Mokoryontet Yesu nyoto miyat kwiyisye muyet nye cone kutinyi oŋnkwaranta om pesyenyi nyewo ye kaco neto. Mosukuco Neto nye miyat om swametap Setanit oŋnkwiy tukuk wok tokol cepo kakitat oko pelutok cepo mwiynan ce cikite,
oŋnkwiyisye kaperperisyo ake tokol nye miyat om wule mite piko co mokwaran. Mosukwaran picoto omnye kipuryo kot kutoroc oŋnkucäm ŋalek cepo manta sukuŋet kusopco.
Om ŋolyontoni kuye kukoci Yiyintet kwiyis mwiynanet om wule mite cek sukuŋet kucäm cekto ŋalek cepo mwiynanet.
Kunyo ŋalek ce mokutok kucu kule, mosicewosontyi cemutyi musankut piko tokol co puryo kot kuyen ŋalek cepo manta, ntene kucäm pate ŋerekwek cepo miyotyet.

Mpo yeya, misyini cikaste acek Yiyintet okokoy om wule omite akwek co kicämak Mokoryontet, Omnye kikweyak Yiyintet opoyitu tayta ce kicisop om swametap Muyet Nyetilil sukuŋet kwiyak oyiku pikyi cetililec
Kikurok akwek Yiyintet kwonyoru ŋalecu kupunte lokoywek ce toponec co kicemwowok acek. Kikurok sukuŋet kwonyoru woyinto nyepo Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
Kunyo mpo yeya, okwilokisye oyoŋnkye topon akwil ŋalek cepo manta ce kicinetak om kutit nto parwet.
Cesomwok Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo nkit oko Yiyintet Papanyo nye kicämec om poypoyenyi nye mopoku oko kokenotet nye topon.
Kante kutitir neto mukuleywek cikwok oŋnkukonok okwilokisye sukuŋet ayiy oŋnkomwowu ŋalek ce toponec.
Mpo Yeya, osomwec acek sukuŋet kutosyikey kutisto lakwar lokoywekap Mokoryontet oŋnkupëlis kuwoyit kuyu wulo kiyunto om wule omite akwek.
Osomwec mpo sukuŋet kusorwec Yiyintet om wule mite piko ce kiwuryo oŋnkwiye miyotyet, omnye puryo kot kuponto piko tokol koyenet.
Ntene Mokoryontet kunye po manta, mosukukwilak onyoru swamet oŋnkuripok topon om wule mite Neto nye miyat.
Kikonec acek Mokoryontet cikasenakey akwek, kunyo cinket kule oyiyisyi akwek kupoyit manta, kunyo motosyikey ayiye ŋalek ce cemwowok acek.
Kante kuntoci Mokoryontet mukuleywek cikwok okoy onyoru cömisyet nyepo Yiyintet oko muytocinotet nye konu Kristo.
Mpo yeya, cemwowok acek cinkolonwok om kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu kule, oripkey wule mite mpo yeya alake tokol ce puren ce puryo kot kuripe ŋalek co kicinet acek.
Omnye oŋnket akwek nkit topon kule misyini orupe kuyu wulo kiciytoy acek. Kipuryo kot ciku puren yo kicepontekey oko akwek.
Kicole omik tokol ce kikyome, kiciyisyi om swamet pet oko komoy sukuŋet mente cekonok akwek wuyin ake tokol.
Kiciy kuyunyoto nye kipuryo kot ku kule omnye kimocimuci kot cemwowok akwek kule apayec, ntene kiciy kuyunyoto kule sukuŋet akäsenec wule yunto soponto nyinyacek nye roke arup.
Kicemwowok ye kitocepontekey oko akwek kule, “Puryo kot kuroke kwomis ci ake tokol nyo puryo kot kumöce kule oyiyisye.’’
Cemwowu acek ŋalecato omnye kicelim kule mite piko alake ce puren ce puryo kot kwiye yisyet ake, ntene cukure cekto yisyonutek cepo piko alak.
Cemwocini acek oŋnkyisowu picoto om kaynetap Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo kule, misyini kopurto cekto soponto nye topon oŋnkwiy yisyonutek sukuŋet kunyor pesanik ce kolyekey.
Ntene akwek mpo yeya, monte cecosye ye mayiy yisyet nye topon.
Ye katay ci ake tokol nye mite wule omite akwek macäm ŋalecu mite parwani kocesilwok acek, okäs cico topon, oŋnkoyaste kwiyat nkit, sukuŋet kusornen neti nkit.
Ntene monte cesut nyoto akwek puniyo, asowu kuyu yeya.
Kunyo Mokoryontet nkit nyo konu kalyet kunye roke kukonok akwek kalyet om pesyosyek tokol, oŋnku om aret ake tokol. Opurtekey akwek Mokoryontet.
Ani nyo Paulo nkit om yewumwani nye kosile kasupoyisyoni. Kasupayak koromun. Osile ani kwak yunyitenyi. Yewumwani nyitenyi nyepo manta.
Opurte akwek tokol poypoyetap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
Cone parwani wule amite ani Paulo nye kiyokintetap Yesu Kristo om kamukeywekap Yiyintet Kosopintenyo, oko Yesu Kristo nye kokenotet nyinyacek.
Osiluŋ Timosewo werimwani nyepo manta om koyenet. Kante kukoniŋ Yiyintet Papa oko Yesu Kristo Mokoryontenyo poypoyet oko cömisyet oko kalyet.
Amöce ani kule ipur nyi Efeso kuyu wulo kikyosomiŋ yo kyonomeni aweti Meketoniya. Mite piko alake wuloto ce mite kunete konetisyet nyepo mwiynan, kunyo misyini mwoci kwasta lakwar.

Mwoci picoto kwasta ŋalaletap tyonkocok oko koynok ce caŋ cepo mpo kuko ce moponto ye ŋete, omnye sutu ŋaleca tintenotet pate, ntene puryo kot kwiye yisyetap Yiyintet nye kiceyiyta, nyoto kukokenotet nye kicinket.
Komwowu ani ŋalecu sukuŋet kuŋetŋet kutosyi cömisyet nye cone wule mite mukuleyto nyetilil oko konketotet nye toku oko koyenotet nyepo manta.
Kupotyi piko alak aret om ŋalecu, kunyo kuwekyikey cekto aret nyepo ŋalalet nyepo perperyo.
Möce kule ciku konetik cepo ntarastinekap Yiyintet, ntene oŋnkurok yec kupuryo kot konkete ŋalek cikwa nkit, oŋnkupuryo mpo kot kunkete tukuk ce ŋolole kuyunye nkete.
Cinket acek kule toponec ntarastinek, ye kokyiyisye topon kuyu wule cemoktoy.

Misyini cinket kule kipuryo kot cekon ntarastinek kupo piko ce toponec, ntene kicekon kupo piko ce yirye ntarastinek oko sokoranik oko co puryo kot konket Yiyintet, oko co ponto miyotyet, oko co puryo kot kuponto tini, oko co miyotec mukuleywekwa. Kicekon kupo piko co poköce mpo kwan nto mpo kamet, oko co porisyi,
oko co ponto sakwayanatet, oko co ponto soponto nye miyat, oko co core piko, oko co mwiynec oŋnkuŋolole ŋalek cepo mwiynan nto mpo kwiy kiy ake nye monomekey oko konetisyet nyepo manta.
Mitowune konetisyet wule mite lokoywek ce toponec ce kicekono, coto kuce lokoywek ce toponec ce kicekono ani, coto kuce lokoywek ce toponec cekwone wule mite nyewo oŋnku Yiyintet nyepo kupeyok.
Okostoy ani Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo nye kikono swamet om yisyemwani. Okostoy omnye kisuto opoyitu latik okoy kukweya oyici yisyet,
nka kot kyoŋolole kwapi oŋnkocup ani neto. Ntene kikalya Yiyintet omnye kipuryo kot oŋnketi ce kyoyiye yoto.
Yoto kukono ani Yesu poypoyenyi nyewo oŋnkukono koyenet oko cömisyet nye ceponte acek om koyomotet oko Yesu Kristo.
Ŋolyontet nyepo manta nye roke cetac oŋnkyiyen kupoyit manta kunyi kule! Kico Yesu Kristo koret cokusop piko ce ponto miyotyet. Ani akenke om cekto nye miyat kupëlis.

Ŋolyontoni nye sukuŋet kukalya kurire ani Yiyintet, kumöce kule sukuŋet ayiku koporunotet nyepo tayta nyepo muytocinotet. Kimöce kule oyiku ani kantoyintet nye porcini piko co mokuyen om letut sukunyor cekto soponto nye mopoku.
Om wule mite neto Kinko nye mopoku, nye puryo kot kume, nye puryo kot kutoku, nye Yiyintet akenke nkit, kunye roke kopurune koyweyisyet oko woyinto okokoy oko okokoy. Yunyoto.
Lekwenyu Timosewo, kakoniŋ ntarastini, nömekey ŋalecu oko ŋorsyet nye kiceŋor keny nye nömiŋ nyi. Kunyo roke yiyisye ŋaleca kwek karik ce meporye poryet nye topon.
Rip koyenet nyeŋuŋ oko kasoteywek ce toku topon. Kutay piko alake morip ŋalek cepo kasoteywek cikwa, kunyo kukwaranta koyenet nyimwa.
Om picoto ku mpo Imenayo oko Alekisanta. Picoto kuce kwokoyte ani kupa wule mite Setanit sukuŋet wocinet kwasta komo kucupe cekto Yiyintet.
Kunyo ŋolyontet nyepo tayta; asome kule, somet oko kakastayet kuce möce osome okostoy Yiyintet kupo piko tokol.
Osomnci kinkonik oko poytoyik ce ponto kamukeywek, sukuŋet cipurte soponto nye topon, nye paypay, nyepo kalyet, nye ciyweye Yiyintet, oŋnkyeripkey om kiy ake tokol.
Topon koromun ye kaciy kuyunyoto omnye ŋerece Yiyintet Kosopintenyo,
nye möce kule cisop piko tokol oŋnkunket ŋalek tokol cepo manta.
Omnye mite Yiyintet akenke oŋnku mite cito akenke nye yomntos Yiyintet oko piko, nyoto ku Yesu Kristo,
nyo kikokoytokey kwolis sukusop piko tokol. Ŋolyontet nyoto kipor kupoyit manta om pesyet nyepo manta kule möce Yiyintet kule cisop piko tokol.
Kuyunyoto sukuŋet cekweya ani oyiku kiyokintet oŋnkoyiku konetintet nyepo Lamek nye mwoytoy lokoywek cepo koyenet nyepo manta. Omwowu ŋalek cepo manta nye moperperisyi.
Amöce ani kule kusome moronik om wulyo tokol, coto kuce kikokenekey Yiyintet kupoyit manta, oŋnkusome kuyitoy yewuniyekwa ce tililec nye puryo kot kuponto nerekwek nto mpo tintenotet.
Amöce mpo kule kuŋomekitu koruk oŋnkulackey om aret nye topon. Puryo kot kuroke kulet koruk putek nto kukoci yitik Sapunek nto karik ce piciyec, nto kulac sirok cepo pesan ce caŋ.
Ntene möce kwiye yisyet nye topon kuyu wule cemoktoy om wule mite koruk co yweye Yiyintet.
Misyini kunetkey koruk om sisyot oŋnkuyweyis om kiy ake tokol.
Puryo kot acömncini ani kunetis koruk nto mpo kule kupayta moronik. Misyini kusistos.
Omnye kicenyosyo citany Atam nto cikere Awa.
Ntene korket kunye kiciperper sukuŋet kwiri ntarastitap Yiyintet. Puryo kot ku Atam nye kiciperper sukuŋet kwiy miyotyet, ntene korket nye kiciperper sukuŋet kwiy miyotyet.
Ntene mocisop korko omnye koyi lekok. Ye komuytoci kurip topon koyenet oko cömisyet oko tililinto, oŋnkuripkey.
Ŋolyontet nyepo manta kunyi kule, ye kamac cito kule oyiku kantoyintet kosintet nyepo pikap Yiyintet, kukamac yisyet nyetilil nye topon.

Misyini Kantoyintet kosintet nyepo pikap Yiyintet kwek cito nye moponto lelis, Misyini kuponto korket akenke, oŋnku cito nye paypay nye ripekey, oŋnkuponto tolosyet. Misyini kutoroce kuŋerekyini toyek ce mocinket kukwa kanyi, oŋnkuponto ŋomnonet nye muce kunetis.
Puryo kot kuroke kwek pokityo, nto pororin, ntene ci nye siken oŋnkuponto tolosyet nye puryo kot kucorokyini pesan.
Misyini kwek cito nye muce kurip topon piko cepo kanyi oŋnkunet lekokyi kuyweyis om aret ake tokol.
Omnye ye puryo kot konket cito kurip piko cepo kanyi nkit, komuce kulene kot kurip piko cepo Yiyintet?
Puryo kot kumisyini kwek ci nye kotokowute koyenet. Omnye muce kusilekey kusutkey torot okoy kosuci cemutyi musankut kuyu wulo kicemutyini setani nyewo nyepo oyik.
Misyini kwek ci nye yweye piko tokol cepo saŋ. Sukuŋet mente kot cenyil oŋnkosuci musatit nyepo setani nyewo nyepo oyik.
Piko ce yiyisyi kukolyoy pikap Yiyintet kuce misyini kwek piko ce ponto kopurto nyepo soponto nye topon nyepo manta ce cikenekey. Puryo kot kumisyini kuye komek ce caŋ, nto moroŋis cepo pesan.
Misyini kukwil cekto topon koyenet nyepo manta nye kicipor oŋnkuponto ŋomnonet nye toku.
Misyini cenyosye cesyem cekto kunyo, nteye kacekäs kule yeme, yoto kuye cikoci kwiyis.
Misyini kuponto mpo korukwa kopurto nyepo soponto nye topon om koyenet om kiy ake tokol.
Misyini kuponto kokolyoyintet korket akenke, oŋnkomuce kurip lekokyi oko piko cepo kanyi.
Omnye piko co yiye topon yisyet nyepo kokolyoyisyet kuce muce cekto nkit kunyor cinket topon, oŋnkomuc kuŋalale om nyikanat ŋalek ce nöme koyenet nyimwa nye ponto om wule mite Yesu Kristo.
Ye amite osiluŋ ani parwani, asoti kule mosaco lakwar okoy cakäsiŋ.
Ntene ye kotepe kot olilennkey, mosukumwowuŋ parwani wule misyini cipurte acek nkit piko cepo kaytap Yiyintet, coto kuce pikap Yiyintet nye sopot oŋnku tolocta nye tiye ŋalek cepo manta.

Puryo ci nye muce kutay kule woyec koromun ŋalek ce wuŋotin cepo tininyo ce mwowu kule: “Kicipor neto kuponto porto nyepo cito, Kipor Muyet Nyetilil kule po manta neto. Kikäs malaykanik neto, Kicemwayte ŋalekyi wule mite piko cepo yemosyek tokol, Kiciyen neto om koret tokol, kunyo, kicesut kuwo torot om woyinto.’’
Mwowu Muyet Nyetilil kutok topon kule, om pesyosyek ce kwoni, mosukuwirta piko alake koyenet, mosukucäm oyik cepo mwiynanet ake konetisyet nyepo oyik ce miyotec.
Konetisyet nyoto kunye cone wule mite piko ce mwiynot ce perperisyi. Piko coto kuce kipok kasoteywek cikwa kuyunye kicepele karin nye layat.

Netisyi pico kumwoy kule puryo kot kuroke cimütis koruk, nto kule kyam omik alak, oŋnkurok yec kitany Yiyintet omicoto kule sukuŋet kyome om letut ye kacesomnci kukostoyis piko co kikoyen, oŋnkunket cepo manta.
Omnye topon kiy ake tokol nye kitany Yiyintet, momite kiy nye roke cetay, ye kacesomnci kupeyok oŋnkyam om kakastayet.
Omnye ŋolyontetap Yiyintet oko ŋalek ce kocesomncine kuce wece kutililit kiyoto.
Ye kenet nyi ŋalecu mpo yeya, kuye meseyeku kiyokintetap Yesu Kristo nye topon, oŋnku yoto ye poyekey nyi nkit ŋalek cepo koyenet oko konetisyet nyepo manta nyo kwerip nyito.
Möce tay sanekey wule mite piko co menket Yiyintet, oko tyonkocok cepo perperyo co puryo kot kurok ceŋalale. Tosyikey nkit netkey soponto nyepo Yiyintet.
Omnye ponto latik alak ye kacerip porto, ntene kuponto latik ce caŋ ye kocerip tinit nyepo manta, omnye kurtoy coto soponto nyepo pesyosyecu oko soponto nye mosukuco letut.
Po manta ŋolyontono, nye roke cecäm kupoyit manta.
Kuyunyoto omne sukuŋet cetitir acek kyiyisye swamet, omnye kicikenekey Yiyintet nye sopot nye kosopintet nyepo piko tokol co kikoyen.
Polyi oŋnkinet ŋalecu.
Mente ayaste kot kunyiliŋ ci ake tokol omnye teyiku miniŋ, ntene porci piko co kikoyen kukäseniŋ om ŋalalet nyeŋuŋ oko kopurto nyeŋuŋ, oko cömisyet nyeŋuŋ, oko koyenet nyeŋuŋ oko om tililinto nyeŋuŋ.
Möce syem koromun weti sumanet nyepo piko tokol nyo cesumone silutekap Yiyintet, oko mwaytayet nyepo lokoywek oko konetisyet okoy opunu ani.
Mente kot ayaste kupeyok co ponte nyi co kicekoniŋ ye kiŋolole workoyik oŋnkukemeriŋ poyik yewuniyekwa.
Möce yeyisye yisyonutek cutecu oŋnkikwilakisye nyi nkit sukuŋet kukäs ci tokol yisyet nyeŋuŋ nye tosyinikey.
Ripkey nyi nkit oŋnkirip konetisyet nyeŋuŋ. Tosyikey iyiy ŋalecutecu, omnye ye keyiy, mesesopkey nyi nkit oko piko co lime ŋalekuk.
Mente kot polyi poyo nyewo, ntene ŋolyolyi kuyu Papaŋuŋ. Sute oyiperik oyoyecine kuyu mpo yeyeŋuŋ.
Sute cepyosok cewoyec kuyu mpo komet, sut tipik kuyu mpo cekwomet om mukuleyto nye tilil.
Ywey koruk co musukik, coto kuce musukik cepo manta.

Ye ponto korko nye musuk lekok nto mucokoronikyi, kumoce kunetkey kunyo kunket yisyonutek cepo tinimwa om wule mite mpo kwan oko mpo kamet. Om aret nye yunyitenyi kuye kwici cekto yisyet mpo kwan oko mpo kamet oko mpo kukomwa oko mpo kokomwa. Omnye ŋalek ceyucoto kuce ŋerece Yiyintet.
Korko nye musuk nyepo manta kunye moponto ci nye kolyoy, nye kikokenekey oŋnkutosyinikey kusome Yiyintet kokolyoyisyet pet oko komoy.
Ntene korko nye musuk nye weti wule mite ŋerekwek kunye kime nyo kusope.
Möce koci cekto ntarastini, sukuŋet komo kuponto lelis.
Ntene ye puryo kot kuripe cito piko tilyonutekyi, nto nye puryo kot kuripe piko cepo kanyi, kuporukey kule katay cito nyoto koyenet oŋnkowurta cito nyoto kusir cito nye puryo kot kuyen.
Mente osil kaynetap musuk korko nye tokuminiŋ okoy ye kiyosit nye ponto kenyisyek tomonwokik lö, oŋnku nye kikomüt santet akenke pate.

Misyini ku musuk nye kiciyweye om yisyonutekyi ce toponec, nye kinet lekokyi topon, nye kitoroce toyek, nye kiwune kerenkokap pikap Yiyintet, nye kikolyoy ce ponto wuyinwek, oŋnkunye kikokoytokey kwiye yisyonutek tokol ce toponec.
Mente osil koynokap koruk musukik ce tokuminkec, omnye ye kotepe kot kucorok porwonik cikwa kumac kule cimütec yec, yoto kuye kwasta nye komo kurupe Kristo,
kuye kalel kwiri kawalemwa nye kipo tay om wule mite Kristo.
Ŋalek alak kucu kule, netekey cekto kupuren kowurta poroyinwek cikwa, kupesetoti kupunte korin kuŋololote ŋomso pate, oko ŋalek cepo porwonik cikwa, oŋnkuŋalale ŋalek ce meroke kuŋalale.
Amöce ani kule cimüt koruk musukik ce tokuminkec, sukuyi lekok oŋnkurip korikwa, sukuŋet mente kukoci punikyacek poroyinto kot kuŋalalenec kwapi.
Omnye kuweckey keny musukik alake oŋnkurup Setanit.

Ntene ye ponto korket nye kikoyen koruk ce musukik ce tilyonutekyi ce mite konyi, kuroke kurip neto cekto, puryo kot kuroke kwosyi nyikisinto pikap Yiyintet, sukuŋet co kurip musukik ce mite kwicek nkit ce moponto ci nye mokurip.
Misyini poyik co yiye yisyet nye topon kuyu poyik kunyor musyaret aret oyeny, nto kupëlis poyik ce titire kumwoytoti lokoywek oŋnkunetis.
Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet “Mente arat yeyito kutit ye mite kuwore nkanuk’’. Oŋnkumwoy yec kule, “Misyini cito nye yiyisyi kunyor musyaret.’’
Mente kot acäm lelis nye nöme pontet ake tokol okoy ye komwoy piko ayenku nto somok kule lelat.
Polyi reny piko tokol ce yiye miyotyet om taytap piko tokol sukuŋet kunyokoritu piko cut alake.
Komwowuŋ oyomiseniŋ om taytap Yiyintet oko Yesu Kristo oko Malaykanik ce tililec kule, misyini rip ntarastinecu nye puryo kot yele kereryantet ake, ntene yiye yoyeci pate.
Mente kot osorci lakwar kot kemer ci ake tokol yewuniyekuk kupo yisyetap Yiyintet. Mente kot wutekey miyotyonik cepo piko alak, ripkey tililitu.
Mente taye peko nkit, ntene iye nfinyonik tukusic sukuŋet kukalyiŋ moyet oko porto nye mnyoni kwak okokoy.
Toku nye cimuce cekäs topon miyotyonik cepo piko alak, kunyo sute miyotyonicoto cekto wule mite musankut, ntene mosukutok cekäs miyotyonik cepo piko alak om letut.
Om aret nye yunyoto kuye ceköse kutok topon yisyonutek ce toponec, nka kot mpo ce puryo kot kutoku topon, kupuryo kot kuwuŋotos.
Misyini mutworik tokol kukäs kule roke kuywey mokorenik cikwa, sukuŋet komo kuŋolole ci ake tokol kwapi kaynetap Yiyintet oko konetisyet nyinyacek.

Mutworik co kikoyen mokorenik cikwa kuce puryo kot kuroke kunyilsyo meyweyis kumwoy kule omnye mpo yeya cut, ntene möce kwiyis kunyol topon, omnye mokorenik co mokunyor latik om yisyet nye yiye cekto kuce mpo yeya mpecek ce cöme cekto. Misyini net ŋalale yisyonutekyu.
Ci ake tokol nye nete konetisyet ake tokol nye pciyat oŋnkupuryo kot kucöme ŋalek cepo Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo oko konetisyet nyepo tininyo.

Kunye ponto cito nyoto silotet nyewo koromun, oŋnkupuryo kot konket kiy. Ponto corokyinotet nye miyat nyepo tintenotet oko wokutyet nye nöme ŋalek pate. Kunyo sutu ŋaleca corokyinotet oko wokutyet oko ŋomset oko kasoteywek ce miyotec;
oko tintenotet nyepo okokoy nye moponto ye ŋete nyo cone wule mite piko co kowuryo kasoteywek cikwa, ce kimokuponto ŋalek cepo manta. Sote cekto kule tinit kunye aret nye cenyorune mokoryontit.
Kupoyit manta, sutyini tinit cito kwek mokoryo koromun, ye kayem neto tukuk ce ponto.
Omnye kipuryo kot cekwante acek kiy koret, kunyo puryo kot cepetoy kitake!
Ye ceponte omik oko sirok kuroke kuyemec coto.
Ntene piko co möce kule ce mekoren kuce sucini syemutok oŋnkunäm musatit nyepo cerokyinotet nye miyat nyepo perperyet ce cute cekto okoy kupa wule mite arantayet.

Omnye corokyinotet nyepo pesan ku wule lukune miyotyonik cepo wok tokol. Kusyem piko alake kule cenyoru pesanik okoy kumosokis om aret nyepo koyenet, kunyo kokowurta cek mukuleywekwa om kasoteywekwa ce caŋ ce miyotec.
Ntene nyi nyo yiku citap Yiyintet, kunye möce ripkey om wule mite ŋalecato tokol, syem tyikyi pate toponiyet, poyitu Yiyintet, nye ponte koyenet oko cömisyet oko muytocinotet oko sikenotet.
Syem porye poryet nye topon nyepo koyenet, rip kwil koromun soponto nye mopoku nyo kicekurciŋ yo kiwolikey renynkey om tayatap piko ce caŋ.
Komwowuŋ om tayatap Yiyintet nyo kocini tukuk tokol soponto, oko taytap Yesu Kristo nyo kiwalkey kupor topon koyenenyi om taytap Pontio Pilato kule,
Ywey ntarastinek, oŋnkirip tililitu om koyenet nye meponte lelis, okoy Pesyet nye cone Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo.
Mosukupor Yiyintet yec Yesu Kristo om pesyenyi nyepo manta. Yiyintet nyoto kunye cikostoy oŋnku poytoyintet nkit, nyepo kinkonik, oŋnku poytoyintet nyepo mokorenik.

Neto nkit kunye sopot okokoy, mitowune wule mite lakweyet nye puryo kot kurice ci ake tokol. Puryo ci kenyis nye kikäs neto. Kopurune wule mite neto koyweyisyet ake poytoyisyet nyewo okokoy oko okokoy. Yunyoto.
Mwoci sowu piko co mokoren ce ponto tukuk cepo koret mente kusilkey, mente kukenekey tukuk cepo mokoryontinek, ntene kukenekey Yiyintet nyo konec acek tukuk tokol sukuŋet kuŋerecec.
Mwoci kwiy ŋalek ce toponec, oŋnkumokoren kwiy yisyet nye topon, oŋnkwicin topon oko piko alak tokol.
Om aret nye yunyoto kuye sukuŋet kukonore torot mokoryontit nye kwilat nyepo pesyosyek cepo tay oŋnkomuc kunyor soponto nyepo manta nye cemöce.
Arenyo Timosewo, rip kiy ake tokol nye kicekoniŋ. Ripkey ŋalalet nye puryo kot kupo Yiyintet oko tintenotet nyepo mwiynanet nye kure piko alake kule ŋomnon.
Sutekey piko alake kule ceponte, kunyo kupotyi picoto aret nyepo koyenet. Opurte akwek tokol poypoyet.
Cone parwani wule amite ani Paulo nye kicäm Yiyintet kwek kiyokintetap Yesu Kristo, nye kiciyok cokumwoy ŋalek ce nöme soponto nyo kicekurto, nyoto kunye ceponte acek om koyomotet oko Yesu Kristo.
Osiluŋ werimwani camanet Timosewo. Kante kukoniŋ Yiyintet Papa oko Yesu Kristo Mokoryontenyo poypoyet oko cömisyet oko kalyet.
Okostoy ani Yiyintet nye ayicini yisyet kupoyit manta kuyu wule kikwiytoy mpo kukomwani. Okostoy ye amite asotiŋ nyi okokoy ye osome pet oko komoy.
Tasoti ani lokik, kunyo amöce koromun kule akäsiŋ sukuŋet aŋerec kuyema.
Tasoti koyeneŋuŋ nyepo mukuleyto orit. Koyenet nyoto kunye ponto mpo kokoŋuŋ Loyis oŋnkuponto mpo komet Ewunike.
Kunyo kosotuŋ ani nyi kule rip topon kokotutek co kikoniŋ Yiyintet yo kyokemeriŋ yewuniyekwani.
Omnye kipuryo kot kukonec Yiyintet mukuleyto nyepo nyekernan, ntene kikonec swamet, oko cömisyet oko ripetapkey.
Kunyo mente alilan ye memwayte ŋalekap Mokoryontet, mente mpo alilan om wule amite ani nyi oyiku mopusyontenyi. Taŋany toŋoŋutek om swametap Yiyintet kupo toponiyetap lokoywek ce toponec.
Kisopec Yiyintet oŋnkukurec ciku pikyi, nye puryo kot kupo tukuk ce kikyiy acek, ntene om cömisenyi nkit oko poypoyet. Kikonec poypoyet nyoto ikye towunot kupunte koyomotet oko Yesu Kristo.
Kunyo kuciporwec yawut omnye kico kosopintenyo Yesu Kristo. Kiker neto swamet nyepo met. Kunyo kikopor soponto nye mopoku kupunte lokoywek ce toponec.
Kikweya ani Yiyintet oyiku kiyokintet oŋnku konetintet nye amwocini piko lokoywek ce toponec.
Kuyunyoto omne sukuŋet kunyi amite yawut otoŋonyi kuyunyitenyi. Ntene moliloni, omnye oŋnketi kupoyit manta cito nye kyoyen, oŋnkonket kule muce kurip neto topon kito nye kikonorwo okoy pesyonoto.
Rip topon ŋalek cepo manta co kyanetiŋ ani nyi sukuŋet rip oŋnkipurte koyenet oko cömisyet nye ceponte acek om koyomotet oko Yesu Kristo.
Rip topon cepo latik co kicekoniŋ om swametap Muyet Nyetilil nye mitowune wule cemite acek.
Nketi nyi kule kimweyeno ani ci tokol om koretap Asia, om coto ku mpo Pukelo oko Eromokene.
Roke kukalya Yiyintet piko cepo kotap Onesiporo, omnye kiŋerec kutitiro ani aret ce caŋ. Kipuryo kot kunömnci kalilan kule oyiku ani mopusyo.
Pakenke yu kowo kupun neto Rom, yoto kuceny wule amite okoy kunyorwo.
Nketi topon yisyonutek ce caŋ ce kikwiy neto om Efeso. Roke kukoci Mokoryontet neto poypoyenyi nkit om pesyonoto po letut.
Nyi werimwani, poyitu swama om poypoyet nye cone wule mite koyenotet nyepo Yesu Kristo.
Näm ŋalek ce kilim nyi oneti ani om taytap piko ce caŋ cekikäs, oŋnkikoci ŋalecato kunäm oŋnkurip piko co kenekey nyi cekto, ce muce kunet mpo piko alak.
Mpenyi, taŋany toŋoŋutek cekuk kuyu sikorintetap Kristo nye topon.
Sikorintet nye mite poryet kunye puryo kot kucöme kowutekey yisyonutek cepo piko cepo ka omnye tyikyini kule oyiyisye topon saŋerec nyewo nyenyi.
Puryo ci nye orerene ŋweyek nye muce kot kupëlis kunyor kokotutyet nye cipëlisye ye puryo kot kurip ntarastinek cepo ŋweyek.
Kopotintet nye yiyisyi om swamet kunye roke kunyosyo kunyor omik ce kacekis cepo tayta.
Möce sot ŋalecu omwowuŋ ani, omnye mosukukalyiŋ Mokoryontet okoy nket ŋalek tokol.
Sot Yesu Kristo nye kimocokeretap Tauti kunye kiciŋet kotutune met, kuce lokoywek ce toponec coto ce amwoytoy ani.
Otoŋonyi omnye amwoytoy lokoywek coto toponec, kunyo oyiku mpo ratat pinkonok kuyu corin. Ntene puryo kot kuratat pinkonok ŋolyontetap Yiyintet.
Omuytocini ani kiy ake tokol kupo toponiyetap piko kweyanik cepo Yiyintet, sukuŋet kunyor mpecek soponto nye mitowune wule mite Yesu Kristo wanak oko woyinto nye mopoku.
Manta koromun ŋalecu mwowu kule: “Ye kicepoku acek oko neto, mosicesopce mpo oko neto.
Ye kocetosyikey cemuytoci, kuye mosicepoytoyisye oko neto, Ye kacetay acek neto, mosukutayec acek mpo neto.
Ye puryo kot ciyeni acek, ntene kukwilat neto okokoy. Omnye memuce kot kutaykey neto nkit.’’
Sotyi pikuk ŋalecu, oŋnkisowu cekto koromun om taytap Yiyintet, mente kuwokut kutintentyin om ŋal ce muponto latik ce puryo kot kusutu toponiyet ntene wurtoy pate piko ce lime.
Syem koromun porukey om taytap Yiyintet yiku ci nye ce cömntoy kuyu cito nye puryo kot kolilone om yisyenyi. Ntene nye nete kutok topon ŋolyontetap Yiyintet nyepo manta.
Sanekey koromun ŋalalet nyepo perperyo nye puryo kot kupo Yiyintet, nye kwetyini piko wule low om wule mite Yiyintet.
Konetisyet nyoto kunye kerkey mwayet nye kiyenyakay nye mite kwome panyek. Om picoto oyeny ce netisyi ku Umenayo oko Pileto.
Kimosokis kutay aret nyepo manta, kunyo wurtoy cek koyenet nyepo piko alak ce kikoyen kumwowu kule kipunto keny kotutunetap met nyinyacek.

Ntene mocetwoye cetyem tolocta nye kipolyi Yiyintet ŋony. Nto ŋalek ce kicesil tolocta kucu kule: “Nkete Mokoryontet piko ceci, kunyo ci ake tokol nye mwowu kule opoye Yiyintet, kunye misyini kwasta miyotyet.’’

Mite koto nyewo terokok saninek oko pokulinek cepo wok tokol, kicitanye alak karik cepo pesanik, citanye alak sapunek, citanye alak ketik, citanye alak menonik. Ponto alake latik koromun, kupuryo kot kuponto alake.

Ye kasatkey citake kutililit om wule mite tukucutecu miyotec kuye mosukwek nyoto terek nyepo latik om wule mite mokoryontenyi, nye kicitapan kutililit kupoyit Yiyintet oŋnkyiyta kwiy yisyo tokol nye topon.

Yaste corokyinotet nyeŋuŋ nye kipo lekwantit, tyikyi rip ŋalek cepo manta oko koyenet oko cömisyet oko kalyet pontekey wanak oko piko ce kure kaynetap Mokoryontet om mukuleywekwa ce tililec wulin po orit.
Sanekey tintenotet nyepo perperyo nye puryo ŋomnon, nketi nyi kule sutu coto wokutyet.
Puryo kot kumisyini kwek pororin cito nye mutworintetap Mokoryontet, möce kwek ci nye tala om wule mite piko tokol, oŋnku konetintet nye topon nye muytoy,
nye paypay ye mite kukete piko co tintentyintos oko neto om poypoyet, omnye muce kukoci Yiyintet poroyinto kurenynkey picoto oŋnkunket ŋalek cepo manta.
Yoto kuye mosukusow cekto om kasoteywekwa oŋnkucilile musatit nyepo Setani nyewo nyepo oyik nye kinäm oŋnkukoci kurup kuyu wule moktoy neto.
Möce nketi nyi ŋalecu! Kule mite wuyinto om pesyosyek cepo letut.
Mosukwek piko soyi, cemoroŋis cesilekey, oŋnkuperperis, mosukucup Yiyintet, ce meyweye poyik co kiye cekto, ce puryo kot kuŋerece, ce puryo kusote Yiyintet,
Ce puryo kot kukolyoyisyi, ce kawot, ce ŋomnsi, ce pararot, ce nyekerec, ce senkere ce toponec.
Ce ŋomntoyisyi, ce silekey koromun, mosukucäm ŋerekwek kupël Yiyintet.
Mosukurip tinit wulo po saŋ, ntene oŋnkutay swamet nyenyi. Asanekey koromun picoto.
Peti picoto alake wokowut korin oŋnkupayta koruk co moponto swamet, ce kinyikisyi miyotyonik cepo leliswekwa oŋnkupayta corokyinotet tokol.
Korucoto kuce syeme okokoy kule cinetkey ntene puryo kot kunkete ŋalek cepo manta.
Kuyu wule kitoyis Yane oko Yampure kutay Moses. Kunyo toye mpo picutecu ŋalek cepo manta kuyunyoto. Kiwuryo kasoteywek cepo picutecu oko koyenet nye moyeme.
Ntene puryo kot kupuntoy cekto wule low, mosukonket piko tokol perperyemwa kuyu wule kiyunto pico ayenku Yane oko Yampure.
Ntene kwerup nyi konetisyet nyimwani oko kopurto nyimwani, oko kito nye otyikyini ani, om soponto, oko muytocinotet nyimwani, oko cömisyet nyimwani, oko titirotet nyimwani,

oko toŋoŋutek cikwani, oko nyalilya nyimwani. Nketi nyi tukuk tokol ce kikwiyokis om wule omite ani om Antiyok oko Ikoniyom oko Listira. Toŋoŋutek cewoyec ce cotitir omuytoci, ntene kukalya Mokoryontet acone wule mite coto tokol.
Mosicitaŋany kupoyit manta piko tokol co möce kule cipurte kopurto nyepo Yiyintet om koyomotet oko Yesu Kristo.
Ntene mosukutosyi kuwuryo koromun piko ce miyotec oko koperperik. Mosukuperperis, oŋnkuperperkey cekto nkit.
Ntene tosyikey nyi yiy ŋalek cepo manta co kicinetiŋ oŋnkwikwil cömisyet.
Nketi nyi kule silutekap Yiyintet ce muce kukoniŋ ŋomnonet nye sutuŋ kosopotot om koyenet nye ponte om Yesu Kristo.

Silutek ce kicesil kuce kintoci Yiyintet cesil tokol, kunyo ponto latik koromun ye kocinetisye kwek ŋalek cepo manta, oko ye cerenye co kimosokis, oko ye kacesate leliswek oko ye kocinetisye kopurto nye topon.
Sukuŋet kukwilakay kunetkey citap Yiyintet okoy kuyem kwiy topon yisyo ake tokol nye topon.
Kasowuŋ ani om taytap Yiyintet oko taytap Yesu Kristo nye mosukumutyi musankut piko tokol ce kipok oko ce ceptos, oko omnye mosukuco poytoyisyenyi, omwowuŋ kule.
Mwayte ŋolyontet, syem mwayte ye toponec pesyosyek nto mpo ye miyotec, ketu, reny, titir, netisye om muytocinotet.

Omnye mosukupunto pesyosyek ce memuce kot kulimnta piko konetisyet nyepo manta, ntene mosukurup corokyinotet nye nyimwa nkit, oŋnkoruruc konetik cikwa nkit ce mosukumwoci ŋalek ce lime yitik cikwa nkit.
Mosukutoyis nye komo kulime ŋalek cepo manta, oŋnkulim ceptyonkocok cepo mwiynanet pate.
Ntene misyini ripkey nyi nkit om aret ake tokol, yiy yitite yisyeŋuŋ kuyu mutworintetap Mokoryontet.
Omnye karik cikoyito ani oyiku korosyontet, kopunto pesyet nyimwani nye opokokte soponto nyi.
Kwoporye poryet nye topon, kunyo kwawany kamwenet, Kworip koyenet.

Kunyo konyo ani yawut kutwet nye kwopëlisye, nyoto kunye kutwet nyepo tililinto nye mosukukono Mokoryontet, nye ketintet nyepo manta om pesyonoto. Puryo kot kukono ani nkit, ntene kocini mpo piko tokol co koŋisyi om koyenet ye mokucone neto.
Syem sorukey co lakwar okoy wuli amite ani.
Omnye kukusuci Tema ŋerekwek cepo koret, kunye kutaya kunomen kuwo Sesolonika. Kuwo Kresene Kalatiya, kuwe Tito Talmatia.
Opontekey ani pate oko Luka. Kweru okwantekey Marko omnye ponto latik mokukalya ani yisyet.
Kwoyokte Tekikos kuwo Efeso.
Ye keco, sutwo kotit nye kyopokokyi Krapo om Troa. Sutu mpo kitapunek, ntene kupëlis kitapunek cepo syerok.
Kokwiwo ani kumiyat koromun Alekisanta kitoŋintetap karik, mosukuyokyi Yiyintet nkit om ŋalek ce kikwiwo.
Möce ripkey wule mite neto, omnye kitintentyi om swamet ŋalek ce kicemwowu acek.
Puryo ci mpo akenke nye kikalya ani ye kyoŋololi oyetekey nyepo tayta, kitaya ci tokol. Puryo kot kurok kuyityi Yiyintet cekto lelisto nyoto.
Ntene kiripo ani Mokoryontet kukono swamet okoy amuc kot aŋalale ŋolyontet nye yeme kulim Lamek tokol, cesoruneno metap tilisyet.
Mosukusorwo ani Yiyintet om wule mite miyotyet ake tokol oŋnkukwero topon okoy wule mite poytoyisyenyi nye mite torot. Kunyo kopurune woyinto wule mite neto okokoy oko okokoy. Yunyoto.
Osupoywo ani Prisika oko Akwila oko pikap kotap Onesiporo.
Kipur Erasto Korinso, kunyo kyopokokyi Trofimo Melito omnye kimnyone.
Syem sorukey co lakwar kutompo kot kukatitit koret. Kesupayak Epulo oko Pute oko Lina oko Klautiya oko mpo yeya alak tokol.
Kopurune Mokoryontet mukuleyŋuŋ. Opurte akwek tokol poypoyetap Yiyintet.

Cone parwani wule amite ani Paulo nye mutworintetap Yiyintet oŋnku kiyokintetap Yesu Kristo. Kicekweya ani oŋnkyiyokto wakalye otosyi koyenet nyepo pikap Yiyintet kweyanik oŋnkanet cekto kunket ŋalek cepo manta cepo tininyo,
nye kokenotet nyepo soponto nye mopoku. Kikurto Yiyintet soponto nyitenyi ikye keny om towunot; kunyo puryo kot kuperperisyi.
Oŋnkuŋoŋwec ŋolyontoni om pesyet nye yeme. Kicekono ani kule mwayte ŋolyontoni, kunyo omwowu kuyu wulo kimwowo Yiyintet kosopintenyo.
Osiluŋ ani nyi Tito werimwani nyepo manta om koyenet nye ceponte. Kante kukoniŋ nyi Yiyintet Papa oko Yesu Kristo kosopintenyo poypoyet oko kalyet.
Kyopokokyiŋ ani nyi Kurete kule sukuŋet sat yisyet nye kikiŋet nye kimöce kule takyiy om wuloto. Kyomwowuŋ yoto kule kwey poyik ce kentoci pikap Yiyintet om moŋet ake tokol.
Pontet nye cekweye kunye moponto lelis ake tokol. Misyini kuponto korket akenke pate, oŋnkukikoyen lekokyi ce puryo kot kusokaran nto ce kimosokis.

Kosintet kunye kantoyintet nye ripe piko cepo Yiyintet, kunyo puryo kot kuroke kuponto lelis, puryo kot kumisyini ku ci nye silekey koromun, nto nye nyeru lakwar, nto pororin, nto nye moroŋya nyepo pesanik.
Misyini kwek ci nye poyisyi oŋnkucome tukuk ce toponec. Misyini kwek cito nye ripekey nkit, nye siken, nye paypay oŋnkumuytoy.

Misyini kwek cito nye kwilat om lokoywek ce toponec; nye cikenekey oŋnkurupe konetisyet nyinyacek. Om aret nye yunyitenyi kuye mosukotitir neto piko alak om konetisyet nyepo manta, oŋnkupor ŋolyontet nye masat om wule mite piko co toye ŋolyontonoto.
Omnye mite piko ce caŋ ce mosotin ce perpere piko alak om ŋalekwa cepo perpereryo, nto piko ce pëlisyi om koperperisyonoto ku piko co kuweckey kukwane tinitap Yutayek.
Roke cekerekta ŋalekwa, omnye mite cekto kumose piko cepo kestonik tokol kunete konetisyet nye puryo kot kuroke cinet, omnye möce kule cenyoru pesanik om aret nyepo sornon.
Kimwey akenke om picoto, nyoto kunye sute cekto kule workoyontemwa, kimwoy kule, “Pikap Kurete kuce kaperperot, cepo kwak, tyoŋin ce miyotec, oŋnkucemoyetis ce puren.’’
Kimwoy neto cito nyoto ŋalek cepo manta, kunyo misyini polyi nyi cekto koromun sukuŋet kunyor koyenet nyepo manta,
nye komo kurupe cekto tyonkocok cepo Yutayek oko ntarastinek cepo piko co kitay ŋalek cepo manta.
Tilil kiy ake tokol om wule mite piko co tililec kwicek nkit, ntene puryo kiy nye tilil om wule mite piko co kiwuryo oŋnkupuryo kot kucömisyi, omnye kiciwurta ŋomnonet oko kasoteywek cikwa.
Sutakey cekto kule cinket Yiyintet, oŋnkurok kutoye Yiyintet om yisyonutekwa ce yiye. Kisenkeris oŋnkutoyis nye puryo kot kuyeme kwiy kiy nye topon.
Möce kule net nyi ŋalek ce rupe konetisyet nyepo manta.
Mwoci poyik kutoloyitu oŋnkuŋomekitu oŋnkuripkey ce ponto koyenet nye kwilat, oko cömisyet oko muytocinotet.
Mwoci mpo cepyosok kopurto soponto nyetilil. Puryo kumisyini kot kwek semsemot nto mpo kwek pokitis. Misyini kunetis cek konetisyet nyepo ŋalek cepo manta ce toponec,
sukuŋet koruk ce minkec kucäm sanikwa oko lekok,
oŋnkuripkey kutililitu oŋnkwek koruk ce toponec om korikwa ce yweye sanikwa. Sukuŋet komokuŋolole kwapi ci ake tokol lokoywek cepo Yiyintet.
Oŋnkimwoci mpo Oyiperik kuripkey kuyunyoto.
Möce ripkey mpenyi nkit sukuŋet poru yisyonutek ce toponec om kiy ake tokol nye yiye. Misyini netisye kupoyit manta oŋnkiyiyisye swama.
Yiyisye ŋalek ce toku cepo manta ce memuce kot kunyil kutay citake, sukuŋet kusornen punik cekuk omnye moponto ŋolyo nye miyat nye mokuŋalalenec acek.
Möce kuywey mutworik mokorenikwa, oŋnkuŋerec om kiy ake tokol, nye puryo kot kutintentos.

Mpo kucor kiy ake tokol nyepo mokorenikwa. Ntene misyini kupor kule ciku toponec okokoy oŋnkyiye yisyet nye kacemwowec, sukuŋet kusut kakastayet om wule mite konetisyetap Yiyintet kosopintenyo om kiy ake tokol nye yiye.
Omnye kiceŋany kutok poypoyetap Yiyintet kosut kosopotet om wule mite piko.
Netec kuporwec acek kupeyok coto kule kyaste soponto nye puryo kot kupo Yiyintet oko corokyinotet nyepo koret. Oŋnkyeripkey cipurte soponto nye topon nye rotat nye cöme Yiyintet;
ye ce mite cikeni pesyet nyepo kupeyok ce cemöce koromun. Pesyet nyoto kunye pesyet nye mosukutok woyinto nyewo nyepo Yiyintenyo oŋnkukosopintet Yesu Kristo.
Kikonnkey neto nkit cokusorwec acek om wule mite miyotyonik alak tokol, oŋnkusatec cetililitu oŋnkuwecec ciku pikyi, oŋnkukonec kyiy yisyonutek ce toponec.
Net nyi cekto ŋalecu, oŋnkiyiyisye kamukeywek tokol ye mite titiri, oŋnkipolyi piko co lime ŋalek cekuk. Mente kot kunyiliŋ ci ake tokol.
Möce sowu pikuk kuywey poytoyik oko piko co ponto kamukeywek, oŋnkulimnci oŋnkuyiytakey kwiy yisyo ake tokol nye topon.
Mwoci mente kuŋom kuŋalale cek kwapi ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kuponto parar, ntene möce kuponto sikenotet oko kopurto nye topon nyepo okokoy om wule mite piko tokol.

Omnye kiciku acek ikye perper nye kipuryo kot ciyweyisyi. Kikicepotye cerup aret ake nye kiciku mutworik cepo corokyinotet cepo ŋalek wok tokol. Kicipurtoy sokornatet oko corokyinotet, nye kicesenkeri piko oŋnkyesenkerkey acek kwacek nkit.
Ntene ntowo kupor Yiyintet kosopintenyo toponiyet oko cömisyenyi om wule mite piko,

yoto kusopec acek. Kipuryo kot ku kule omnye kiciy acek kiy ake tokol nye topon, ntene om cömisyenyi nkit kunye kisopec kusir kowunet nye kikonec acek Muyet Nyetilil nye yiyotet nyelel oko soponto nyelel.
Kikonec acek Yiyintet Muyet Nyetilil kuyomec kupunune wule mite kosopintenyo Yesu Kristo,
sukuŋet cesatec cenyolu om wule mite Yiyintet kusir poypoyenyi oŋnkyenyoru soponto nye mopoku nye cemite cikeni.
Ŋalek cepo manta coto. Amöce ani kule titirci nyi ŋalecato sukuŋet piko co yene Yiyintet kusot kukoytokey kwiyis yisyonutek ce toponec. Toponec oŋnkuponto latik ŋalecutecu om wule mite piko.
Ntene syem koromun tay tintenotet oko pararet nyepo ŋalek ce nöme ntarastinek. Puryo kot kuponto ŋaleca latik mpo kisic.
Möce sowu aret oyeny cito nye sutu pciyatet; nto kapok yaste kwiyat neto nkit oko ŋalekyi.
Nketi nyi kule kuwur cicoto oŋnkuporu miyotyonikyi kule masat.
Ye koyoku ani Artema nto Tukiko kuco wule mite nyi kuroke syem koromun ico okoy punu wuli amite ani om Nikopoli, omnye kwayiytekey kule wopur wuloto okoy awany pesyosyek cepo koytityet.
Syem koromun kalye Sena nye nkete ntarastinek oko Apolo sukuŋet kusorkey lakwar kucec poninekwa oŋnkikas kule kanyor cekto kiy ake tokol nye möce.
Mwoci kunetkey piko ceco kukoytokey kwiyis yisyonutek ce toponec, sukuŋet kunyor tukuk ce kolyoy cekto, puryo kot kuroke kupurto kapurto nyepo soponto nye moponto latik.
Kesupayak akwek piko tokol ce cepontekey oko ani. Asupay mpo akwek coronutek cicacek om koyenet. Opurte akwek tokol poypoyet nyepo Yiyintet.
Cone parwani wule amite ani Paul nye ratat om mopusi kupo Yesu Kristo, oŋnkucone wule mite yeyanyo Timosewo. Cesiluŋ acek nyi corwenyo Filemon nye kyiyisyi tokol,
oko yeyanyo Apia oko sikorintet nye kyiyisyi tokol Arkipo oko pikap Yiyintet tokol ce tuytos koŋuŋ.
Kante kukonok akwek Papanyo oko Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo poypoyet oko kalyet.
Yeya Filemon, osomuŋ ani okokoy ye amite osome, oŋnkokostoy Yiyintemwani.
Omnye olime cömisyet nye ponte nyi om wule mite pikap Yiyintet tokol oko koyenet nye ponte om wule mite Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo.
Osome kule roke kutosyikey kupoyit swama koyomotet nye ceponte acek oko nyi kuyu piko ce kikoyen sukuŋet cinket kupeyok tokol ce ceponte om soponnwekyo om wule mite Kristo.
Yeya, kosutwo ani cömisyet nye ponte nyi ŋerekwek ce caŋ oko titiret, omnye kweŋerec nyi mukuleywekap pikap Yiyintet tokol.
Kwomuci ani oyiku nyikan om Kristo kot omwowuŋ kule yiy kito nye misyini ceyiy.
Ntene cömisyet kunye sutwo ani osomiŋ ye kotoyiye kuyunyo. Oyiye kuyunyoto nka kot koyiku ani Paulo kiyokintet nyepo Yesu Kristo. Kunyo amite yawut mpo pantanyi oyiku mopusyo kupo kaynetap Yesu.
Kunyo kosomiŋ om kaynetap Onesimo nye Werimwani nkit om Kristo. Omnye kwoyiku ani kwan om koyenet omite mopusi.
Kipuryo kot kuponto neto latik om pesyosyek alak om wule mite nyi, ntene ponto yawut om wule cemite acek tukway ani oko nyi.
Kunyo koyoku kuketkey wule mite om mukuleyto akenke.
Kwomöce ani kule opurte neto om wuli ye tomite mopusi kupo lokoywek ce toponec, sukuŋet kukalya om otepto nyeŋuŋyi.
Ntene puryo kot amöce kule osomiŋ ŋolyo nye puryo kot cäm nkit, puryo kot kuroke cisimnciŋ kule talayitu, ntene möce ye kecäm nyi nkit.
Pesyet ake kiwete Onesimo wule mite nyi kuwany pesyos ce ŋeri kule sukuŋet kuketkey kwopur tukway okokoy.

Kimo kumutworin yawut, ntene kitosyikey kupël mutworin omnye kikwek yeya om Kristo. Kikwek cito nyepo latik koromun om wule amite ani oŋnkuponto latik ce caŋ om wule mite nyi kuyu mutworin oŋnku yeya om Mokoryontet!
Kunyo; ye cömo ani nyi nye cicintosi tukway, kuroke toroc ŋerekyi neto kuyu wulo ketetorokto ŋerekyo ani.
Ye kikwiy neto ŋolyo nye miyat om wule mite nyi, nto ye ponto pesento nyeŋuŋ, yitwo ani pesento nyoto.
Kosil ani nkit om yewumwani kule, “Ani Paulo nkit nye mosoyoku peaento.’’ (Puryo kot kuroke osotuŋ ani nyi kule yoco ani nyi soponnüŋ)
Kunyo yeya, kalya comwo ŋolyontoni om kaynetap Mokoryontet, roke ŋerec mukuleyto nyimwani kuyu yeya om Kristo.
Oŋnket ani kupoyit manta ye osile ŋalecu kule meseyiy kuyu wulo kosomiŋ, oŋnkonket kule meseyiy tosyikey kukeyta.
Ntene yec oŋnkoyiytowo koto nye moru, omnye, oŋnket kule mosukuwec Yiyintet somet nyo osome akwek, mosukukalya Yiyintet aco okoy wule omite akwek.
Kasupayiŋ Epafra nye cepontekey om mopusi om kaynetap Yesu Kristo.
Kunyo kesupayiŋ piko co kyiyisyi acek tokol, Marko oko Aristariko oko Tema oko Luka.
Opurte akwek poypoyetap Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo.
Kiŋololyi Yiyintet mpo kukonyo om kenyisyek co kitil aret ce caŋ oko om wok ce caŋ kupunune wule mite workoyik.
Ntene kuŋololwec acek om pesyosyecu po letut kupunune wule mite Werinyi. Kitany Yiyintet koret kupunte Werit oŋnku neto nye kikwey Yiyintet kupayta tukuk tokol cemite koret.

Lekecece neto om lakweyet nyepo woyintap Yiyintet. Kerkey neto Yiyintet kuwoŋnkyi, kunyo ripe neto koret kumukul om swamet nyepo ŋolyontenyi. Nto om letut yu kowo kowun miyotyonik cepo piko tokol, kopure yewutap tay nyepo Yiyintet nyewo koromun om koret.
Kikoci Yiyintet Werit kwek nyewo kupël malaykanik, kuyu wulo nyewo mpo kaynet nyenyi kupël nyepo malaykanik.
Omnye tompo kumwoci Yiyintet kenyis malayket ake tokol kule, “Yiku nyi Werimwani; koyiku ani pesyoni Papaŋuŋ!’’ Tompo mpo kot kumwoci kule, “Mosoyiku ani Papanyi, oŋnkwek neto Werimwani.’’
Ye kikirik kuyok Yiyintet Werinyi poretyet kuce koret, kimwoy kule, “ Misyini kusay malaykanik tokol cepo Yiyintet neto.’’
Kimwoy Yiyintet ŋalek ce nöme malaykanik kule, “ Yiyintet kunye wece malaykanik kwek yomet, oŋnkuwec mutworikyi kwek ŋelyepik cepo mata’’
Ntene mwowu ŋalek ce nöme Werit kule, “Ayi Yiyintet, ŋecereŋuŋ nyepo poytoyisyet kunye pure kenyis okoy kenyis! Poytoy pikuk om poytoyisyet nyepo manta.
Cöme ŋalek ce tililec, oŋnkitay senker ce miyotec. Kunyo Yiyintet nye Yiyinteŋuŋ kunye kikwey nyi, oŋnkuŋapeniŋ mwayta nyepo ŋerekwek cepo woyinto nyewo koromun, kupël ce kikoci coronutekuk’’
Kumwoy mpo kule, “Mokoryontet, nyi kunye kitany koret om yun kipo towunot, Kitanye yewuniyekuk koret torot.
Mosukupotyo coto, mosukuyosekitu tokol kuyu siroy, ntene meseŋetu nyi;
Meseriny nyi cekto kuyu kotit. Mpecek mosukuwecweckey kuyu siroy. Ntene yuye nyi nyoto okokoy, nye puryo kupoku soponŋuŋ.’’
Tompo kot kumwoci Yiyintet kenyis malayket kule: “Pure nyi yu po yewumwani nyepo tay, okoy okoci punikuk kwek ŋeceret nyepo kerenkokuk.’’
Kunyo malaykanik tokol kuce mukuleywek ce muyet pate ce yicini yisyet Yiyintet. Ce yoktoy neto wokukalya piko ce mosukunyor kosopotet.
Kunyo misyini cekwil topon ŋalek cepo manta ce kicelim sukuŋet mente kot cemosokisye kupotwec aret.
Kicipor kule po manta lokoywek ce kisutyi malaykanik mpo kukonyo, nto ci ake tokol nye kipuryo kot kurup nto kuywey kunye kinyor nyo citaŋany kuyem.

Kunyo cimuci acek kulene kot cecilil ye puryo kot ce cöme ŋalek cepo kasopotet nyewo nye tenyo? Mokoryontet nkit nye kinyosyo kupor kosopotenyi, nto piko co kilim ŋalekyi kuce kiporwec acek kule manta ŋalecu kupoyit manta.
Kunyo kitosyi Yiyintet tukukyi cepo manta ce poru, omnye kikwiy pelutok ceporu swamet oko tukuk wok ce caŋ cepo kakitat. Kipciyta mpo kokotutek cepo Muyet Nyetilil kuyu wule moktoy neto.
Kipuryo kot kukoci Yiyintet malaykanik kwek poytoyik cepo koret nye mosukuco, koret nyi ceŋolole acek.
Ntene mwowu om wulyo ake om silutekap Yiyintet kule “Yiyintet! Cito ku kiy ne nye muci nyi kot sot? Nto ci pate kunye kiy ne nye muci nyi kot rire?
Kitany nyi neto kopur pesyos ce ŋeri kuminiŋ kupël malaykanik, kilokyi nyi neto kutwet nyepo woyinto oko koyweyisyet,
oŋnkupayta tukuk tokol ce kitany.’’ Mwowu ŋaleca kule, kikoci Yiyintet cito kupayta tukuk tokol, ntene kuyu wule yunto yawut puryo kot ceköse acek kule poytoy cito tukuk.

Ntene ceköse yawut Yesu Kristo nyo kicirek kuminiŋit kupël malaykanik kuwany pesyos ce ŋeri, sukuŋet kumeci piko tokol kupunte poypoyetap Yiyintet. Ceköse kule kicilokyi Woyinto oko koyweyisyet om met nye kitaŋany.

Ŋolyo nyepo manta kule Yiyintet nye kitany oŋnkuripe tukuk tokol, kunye kisat kunyol Yesu kupunte toŋoŋutek, sukuŋet kukwer lekok ce caŋ kwokunyor woyinto nyenyi. Omnye Kristo kunye ntocini cekto wokunyor kosopotet.
Neto kunye söte kutililitu piko om miyotyonikwa, neto wanak oko piko co kicesat kutililitu kuponto Papa akenke. Kuyu wulo puryo kot kunomkyini kalilan Yesu ye mokukure cekto kule mpo yeya.
Mwowu kule, “Mosomwoci ani mpo yeyamwani kayneŋuŋ, mosakastiŋ nyi om kwenutap luket nyimwa tokol.’’
Mwowu mpo yec kule, “Mosokenekey ani Yiyintet.’’ Mwowu mpo yec kule, “Amite ani yu opontekey oko lekok ce kikono Yiyintet.’’

Kunyo lekok kuce piko ce ponto porto oko korotik. Kuweckey Yesu nkit kukerkeyit oko cekto nye kiponto porto nye kerkey nyimwa. Kikwiy kuyunyoto kupunte met nyenyi sukuŋet kwaranta setani nyewo nyepo oyik . Setanit kunye kiponto kamukeywek om wule mite met,
yoto kuye sukuŋet kutyac piko co kikwek mutworik cepo okokoy ye kisoptos, omnye kiyweye met.
Omnye porukey kupoyit manta kule kipuryo kuco neto cokukalya malaykanik, ntene kuyu wulo mwowu silutek kule, “Kukalya lekokap Apram.’’
Kunyo kiweckey neto kukerkeyit mpo yeyanyi om aret ake tokol sukuŋet kwek Tisintet nyewo nye paypay oŋnkupo manta om yisyetap Yiyintet nye kolyoy piko miyotyonikwa.
Kunyo muce Yesu yawut kukalya piko co cesyeme, omnye kicesyem neto oŋnkyitaŋany.
Mpo yeyamwani ce tililec, ce kikur Yiyintet kunyor woyinto nyepo torot! Asot pa akwek Yesu Kristo, nye kiyok Yiyintet kwek Tisintet nyewo nyepo koyenet nye ciyeni acek.
Kiywey kukenekey neto Yiyintet nyo kikwey neto kwiy yisyenyi kuyu wule kiywey mpo Moses Kotap Yiyintet tokol.
Cito nye tece koto kunye nyoru kakastayet kupël koto nkit. Kuyunyoto ponto Yesu cikasta koromun kupël Moses.
Cito kunye kitece koto ake tokol nye tekat. Ntene kitece Yiyintet tukuk tokol.
Kikwiye Moses cepo manta tokol om kotap Yiyintet orit kuyu mutworintet, kuŋalale yoto tukuk ce mosukumwoy Yiyintet om pesyosyek ce kwoni.
Ntene Kristo kunye po manta kuyu weritap Yiyintet nye ponto kamukeywek kupayta kotap Yiyintet. Kunyo ciku acek konyi ye kacenäm cekwil koromun kokenotet nyoto nye mite cikeni.
Kunyo kuyu wulo mwowu Muyet Nyetilil kule, “Ye kolim pesyoni kutitap Yiyintet,
monte cekwil mukuleywekwok, kuyu wulo kikwiyta mpo kukomwoŋ, ye kitoye cekto Yiyintet, kuyu wulo yo kyomite kitela, yo kyosyem Yiyintet.
Wuloto ku wule kisyemeno ani mpo kukomwoŋ, mwowu Yiyintet, okoy kukäs cekto yisyonutekwani ce kyayiy awany kenyisyek artam.
Kunyo kyonerekyi ani piko ce kipo pesyosyecoto, okoy omwowu kule, ‘Kimosokis cekto okokoy om mukuleywekwa, puryo kot konkete arosyekwani.’
Kyonyeru okoy awalkey okurtoci kule, ‘Puryo kot amuci kot okoci cekto wule kemuŋe.’ ’’
Mpo yeya, oripkey sukuŋet mente kot kumite kwenumwakwek cito nye ponto mukuleyto nye miyat nye yunyo nye muce kutay Yiyintet nye sopot.

Ntene kito nye möce kule ayiy akwek nye tokunömec om ŋolyontoni mwowu kule, “Pesyoni’’ Kunye möce kule cititirkey acek kwacek nkit om pesyo ake tokol oŋnkyekäs kule puryo kot kumite ci ake tokol om akwek nye kapayta miyotyet okoy kunyekerit kutay Yiyintet.
Omnye ciku tokol akenke oko Kristo, ye kacekwil ce nöme ŋolyontet nye topon nye kiceponte kunyo okoy kupunte pesyet nyepo letut.
Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule; “Ye kolim pesyoni kutitap Yiyintet, monte cekwil mukuleywekwok, kuyu wulo kyoyunte yo kyotoye Yiyintet’’.
Mpo ŋo piko co kilim kutitap Yiyintet, oŋnkurok kutoyis? Coto ku piko tokol ce kikweru Moses kukwane koretap Misiri.
Mpo ŋo piko co kinyercini Yiyintet kuwany kenyisyek artam? Picoto kuco kiwurta kwiy miyotyet okoy kupok kuwoŋnkey kuŋetune muswek cikwa kitela.
Piko oŋnkoco co kiwolcinikey kukurtoy Yiyintet kule, “Puryo kot okoci cekto wule kemuŋe?’’ Picoto kuco kitoyisyi.
Kunyo ceköse yawut kule kipuryo kot kowut cekto orit omnye kipuryo kot kuyen.
Kunyo ye kikurtowec Yiyintet kule mosicenyoru kamuŋet nyo kimwoy. Kumöce ciyweyisye sukuŋet mente kot cekäs kule kopotyi akenke om akwek nye monyor komuŋnto nyoto.
Omnye kucelim lokoywek ce toponec kuyu wulo kilime cekto piko cepo keny. Kipuryo kot kunyor cekto latik om lokoywek ce kilim omnye kipuryo kot kuyen.

Kunyo acek co kicecäm kule mosicenyoru kamuŋet nyo kikurtowec Yiyintet, kuyu wule kimwoy kule, “Kyawalkey akurte om nerekwekwani kule, Puryo kot amuci okoci cekto wule kemuŋe.’’ Kimwoy Yiyintet kuyunyitenyi nka kot kikipok yisyenyi om pesyet nye kitonye neto koret.
Omnye kimwoy ce nöme pesyetap tisap om komosta ake om silutek kule, “Kimuny Yiyintet ye pesyetap tisap nye puryo kot kwiye yisyenyi ake tokol.’’
Mwowu mpo yec om ŋalek ce nöme ŋalecu kule, “Puryo kot amuci kot okoci cekto wule kemuŋe.’’
Puryo kot kupa wokomuny oko Yiyintet piko co kinyosyo kulim lokoywek ce toponec omnye kitoyis. Kunyo mite piko alake ce ce cömncini kupa orit oŋnkuwokomuny oko Yiyintet.

Poru kupoyit manta kule, kikwey Yiyintet pesyet ake nye cekure kule, “Pesyoni.’’ Kimwoy ŋaleca om letut kukatil kenyisyek ce caŋ kupunune wule mite Tauti om silutek ce kicesil kule, “Ye kolim pesyoni kutitap Yiyintet, Monte cekwil mukuleywekwok.’’
Nto yunye kikikontoci Yoswa piko okoy kunyor kamuŋet nyepo Yiyintet, nto kipuryo kot kuŋolole Yiyintet ce nöme pesyet ake yec.
Kunyo tokumite pesyet nye munye pikap Yiyintet kuyu wulo kimunye neto om pesyetap tisap.
Omnye citake tokol nye kanyor komuŋnto nyo kikurto Yiyintet kunye kemuny om yisyonutekyi kuyu wulo kimunye Yiyintet om yisyonutekyi.
Kunyo möce cesyem koromun okoy cenyoru komuŋet nyoto sukuŋet kupuryo kot kumite akenke om akwek nye kopotyi, kuyu wulo kiyunto cekto omnye kipuryo kot kunyor kamuŋet.

Sopot ŋolyontetap Yiyintet oŋnkuponto swamet. Ŋatip kupël ŋatipinto nyepo rotwetap cok. Mute kuwo orit koromun okoy kuponto ye tuytos soponto oko mukuleyto, oko okoy wule tuytos melilok oko mwaytap kowet. Ŋolyontoni kunye syoce topon corokyinotet oko kasoteywek cepo mukuleywek cepo piko.
Puryo kiy nye muce kuwunynkey om wule mite Yiyintet. Toku kiy ake tokol nye kicitany om konyekyi. Kunyo wociportoykey acek tokol, om tayta nyenyi.
Kunyo misyini cekwil acek koromun koyenet nye ceponte, omnye ceponte Tisintet nyewo nye kinyosyo kuwo taytap Yiyintet, nyoto ku Yesu Weritap Yiyintet.
Tisintet nyewo nyoto kunye puryo kot kutoye mekalyec kurirenec om purenotet nye ceponte. Ntene neto kunye kicesyem om aret ake tokol kuyu wulo cesyemntec acek.
Kunyo misyini cetitir cekwa tay wule mite poypoyet nyepo ŋeceretap Yiyintet sukuŋet cenyoru kokolyoyisyet oŋnkyenyoru poypoyet nye kolyec om pesyet nye ce möce kokolyoyisyet.
Cekweye tisintet nyewo ake tokol kucone kwenutap piko oŋnkyikoci kwiy yisyet nyepo Yiyintet om kaynetap piko. Sukuŋet kukoytoy kokotutek oko korosek ce tise miyotyonikwa.
Omnye puryo kuponto neto swama om aret ake tokol, komuce kupaypayit om wule mite piko ce menket kiy oŋnkwiye leliswek.
Omnye puryo kot kuponto swamet neto nkit, kumisyini kukoytoy korosek cepo miyotyonik ceci nkit oko miyotyonik cepo piko tokol.
Puryo ci nye kweyekey nkit kwek tisintet nyewo. Ntene Yiyintet nkit nye kure sukwek tisintet nyewo kuyu wulo kikurto Aron.
Kunyo kipuryo kot kusutkey Kristo nkit sukwek tisintet nyewo, ntene Yiyintet kunye kikwey neto nyo kimwowu kule, “Yiku nyi Werimwani, koyiku ani pesyoni Papaŋuŋ.’’
Kimwoy om komosta ake kule: “Yiku nyi tisintet nyewo okokoy kenyis, nye rupe tisyontitap Melikisantek.’’
Ye kimite Yesu koret kisome kukurtoy om kutit nyewo oko lokik kusome Yiyintet nye muce kot kusorune neto wule mite met. Celimnci neto omnye kiyweye Yiyintet.
Kunyo nka kot ki Weritap Yiyintet, ntene kinetkey kuyweyis kupunte toŋoŋutek ce kitaŋany.
Nteyu kowo cesat kunyol, yoto kwek neto wule lukune kosopotet nyepo piko tokol co yweye neto.
Yoto kukwey Yiyintet neto kwek tisintet nyewo, nye rupe tisyontitap Melikisantek.
Ceponte acek ŋalek ce caŋ ce mocemwowu ce nöme ŋolyontoni, ntene korom ye mocerorwok omnye oyiku wuyec ye monket.
Omnye nka kot kwoyiku akwek pesyosyecu konetik, ntene omöce yec cito nye kenetak ŋalekap Yiyintet cepo tayta. Ye koto oyome omik ce wuyec, kunyi tolwe ceko.
Omnye lekwa ci tokol nye luwe ceko, omnye menkete cepo manta oko ce puryo kot kupo manta.
Po omik cewuyec piko ce woyec co kikonetkey oŋnkonket ŋalek ce miyotec oko ce toponec.

Kunyo roke cipe tay om konetisyet nyewo nye kilot, oŋnkyepokokyi let konetisyet nyo kinyosyi nyepo Kristo. Puryo kot kuroke yec ce konu konetisyet, nye ciyene Yiyintet oko kuyu wule cerenyntoykey om miyotyonikyo cepo keny.
Coto ku konetisyet nye nöme Potisonisyet, kakameretap yewuniyek, kotutunetap met oko musankut nye mopoku.
Kunyo cipe tay! Mosikyiy pate kuyunyoto ye kacäm Yiyintet.
Omnye cimuce kulene ceketu kot kurenynkey yec piko co kimosokis? Kikinyor lakweyetap Mokoryontet Yiyintet, kikicemcem kokotutyet nyepo torot, oŋnkunyor Muyet Nyetilil.
Kikonket cekto keny kule topon ŋolyontetap Yiyintet, oŋnkunyor swamet nyepo koret nyin coni.
Yoto kwasta cekto koyenet nyimwa, komokomukoktos kot cewec cekto yec kot kurenynkey, omnye mite kuwuyitocini murtowontet Weritap Yiyintet oŋnkuparta kunyil piko.
Kocini Yiyintet kupeyok teŋekap koret kwak ye koropentyi kuye peko, yoto kupityo omik cepo latik om wule mite piko co potisyi.
Ntene ye kopityo kotok, oko samiyita, kupuryo kot kuponto yoto latik, oŋnkurik kucup Yiyintet, nto nyepo letut cepele mata kuloyo.
Ntene mpo yeya, nka kot kaceŋalal acek kuyunyi, ntene cikenenokey akwek kupoyit manta. Cinket kule oponte kupeyok cepo kosopotet nyimwoŋ.
Puryo kot kuwurat Yiyintet, kunyo puryo kot kuyutye yisyet nye kyayiy oko nye tomite oyiye nyo kyoporci om yisyet nye kyokalye pikap Yiyintet.
Ŋolyontet nyewo nye ce möce acek kunyi kule, kutitir ci tokol om akwek okoy pesyet nyepo letut, sukuŋet kwitita kupoyit manta tukuk ce okeni akwek.
Mocemöce kule opuren, ntene ce möce kule akerkeyitu piko ce kikoyen oŋnkumuytoy, sukuŋet kunyor tukuk ce kikurto Yiyintet.
Yo kiwolekey Yiyintet kukurtoci Apram. Kiwalkey neto kwine nkit, omnye kipuryo nyewo nye pële neto nye mokuwolyikey.
Kimwoy kule, “Mosokoniŋ ani nyi kupeyok oko mucokoronik ce caŋ’’
Yoto kumuytoci Apram okoy kunyor tukuk ce kikurtoci Yiyintet.
Ye kewalkey cito, kuwolyinikey citake nyewo kupël neto, nto kawalet kunye sate kuwany tintenot ake tokol.
Möce Yiyintet kule oporu kutok topon piko ce mosukunyor tukuk ce kikurto neto kule puryo kuwecwece kenyis kito nye tyikini, yoto kutosyi kawalet nyenyi kirotyet.

Kunyo kikwiyisye Yiyintet tukuk oyeny, ce mocimuce kot cewec oŋnkupuryo kot kuperperisyi Yiyintet, tukucoto ku kurtoyenyi oko kawalenyi. Kunyo acek co cemwecini wule mite neto kuce möce cekwilokisye om kurtoyet nyo kicikoci taynyacek.
Ceponte acek kurtoyet nyitenyi kunye kito nye kwile mukuleywekyacek, po manta nye cikenekey, punte siret wule kiceŋar om kotap Yiyintet nyepo torot okoy kupunto otepto nyetilil nyepo orit.
Kinyosyo Yesu kuwo wuloto om kaynenyacek, omnye kikwek tisintet nyewo nyepo okokoy nye kirupe tisyontitap Melikisantek.
Melikisantek kunye Kinko nye kipo Salem oŋnku tisintet nyepo Yiyintet nyewo nyepo torot. Kunye kituye Apram kucone poryet wule kikiporye kot kukwet kinkonik. Yoto kusomnci Melikisantek neto kupeyok.

Kukoci Apram neto taman om pokol cepo tukuk tokol ce kikipor. (Ŋolyontet nyepo tayta nye poru kaynani, Melikisantek ku kule, “Kinko nyepo toponiyet,’’ kunyo omnye ki Kinko nyepo Salem, porwec kaynenyi kule, “Kinko nyepo kalyet.’’)
Puryo kot cinket kwan nto kamet nto mpo kukonyi. Mocinket ye kiceye nto ye kime. Kerkey neto oko Weritap Yiyintet, kunyo tisintet neto okokoy.
Kunyo möce okäs woyinto nye kiponto. Apram nye kukonyo nyewo kunye kikoci neto taman om pokol cepo tukuk ce kikiporune poryet.
Kunyo mucokoronikap Lefi ce tisik kuce cömncini Ntarastit koruruc taman om pokol om wule mite pikap Israel. Kunyo ruruce cekto wule mite mpo Yeyamwa pikap Israel nka kot ku mucokoronikap Apram coto.
Melikisantek kunye kipuryo ku mucokoretap Lefi, ntene kinyor taman om pokol ce kikoci Apram nye kicekurtoci oŋnkusomnci kupeyok nyo kikikurtoci Yiyintet.
Ŋolyontet nyepo manta kunyi kule, somncini nye miniŋ nyewo kupeyok.
Nyoru tisik co poku taman om pokol, ntene ce nöme Melikisantek, kinyor cito nye sope taman om pokol kuyu wulo mwowu silutek.
Omnye cimuce mpo cemwoy kule, Lefi nyo nyoru taman om pokol kunye kikon taman om pokol kupunte Apram,
omnye kitompo kot ceyi Lefi nye kitokumitowune porto nyepo kukonyi Apram yo kinyoru Melikisantek.

Kicikoci pikap Israel Ntarastinek kupunte tisyontit nyepo Lefik. Kunyo ntoyunye kinyolunot yisyet nyepo tisik, nto kipuryo kot kuroke kutok yec tisintet ake nye pciyat, nyoto ku tisintet nyerupe Melikisantek nye puryo kot ku Aron.
Omnye ye kacewecwec tisyontit, kumöce mpo kule cewecwec ntarastinek.
Mokoryontet nyo nye ceŋolole om ŋalecu kunye po aret ake. Aret nyoto kunye tompo kot kwiyis cito mpo akenke kwek tisintet om meset nyetilil.
Cinket kutok topon kule kicone Mokoryontenyo kotap Yuta. Kunye kipuryo kot kuŋalale Moses ce nöme tisik cekwone koto nyitenyi po Yuta.
Kunyo kutok topon koromun kule, kutok Tisintet ake nye kerkey oko Melikisantek.
Kipuryo kot kwek neto tisintet om ntarastinek cepo piko, kikwek tisintet om swametap soponto nye moponto ye ŋete.
Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Meseyeku tisintet okokoy, om tisyontit nyepo Melikisantek.’’
Kunyo kicinum citore tapan ntarastit nyepo keny, omnye puryo kot kuponto swamet oko moponto latik.
Omnye puryo kot kusat ntarastinekap Moses kunyol kiy ake tokol. Kunyo kucekon yawut kokenotet nye topon nye cimuci cekwa celekityi wule mite Yiyintet.
Ntene mite kawalet nyepo Yiyintet. Kipuryo kot kumite kawalet yo kiyiku alake tisik.
Kikwek Yesu tisintet om kawalet yo kimwowu Yiyintet kule, “Kakuwalkey Mokoryontet kunyo puryo kot kuwece kasoteywekyi, ‘Meseyeku nyi tisintet okokoy.’ ’’
Kunyo pciyatet nyepo Yesu kunye kwile kule kirotyet nyenyi kunye topon nyepo manta.
Mite mpo pciyatet ake yec. Ki caŋ tisik coto omnye kipok nye kipuryo kot komuce kutosyikey om yisyemwa.
Ntene Sope Yesu okokoy. Kunyo puryo kot kuweti yisyenyi oko tisyontit wule mite citake.
Kunyo muce neto yawut oko okokoy kusop piko co kwoni wule mite Yiyintet kupunte neto, omnye sope okokoy sukuyetyecini cekto om wule mite Yiyintet.
Kunyo Yesu nye Tisintet Nyewo nye yemekey oko tukuk ce cemöce acek. Kunye Tilil, moponto lelis, nto miyotyo, kweyat om wule mite piko co ponto miyotyet, oŋnkukicilaŋnta kuwo kopurune torot wule low.

Puryo kot kukerkey oko tisik alak, momöce kule kukoyto kwak korosek cepo miyotyonik kunyosye kunyo cepo ceci nkit ntekere cepo miyotyonik cepo piko tokol. Kikon korosyontet nyepo aret akenke nkit nye yeme. Yoto kuyo kikonukey neto nkit.
Kweye ntarastinekap Moses piko co puryo kot kutoponec kuwoŋnkyi kwek Tisik. Ntene kurtoyet nyepo Yiyintet nye kiwalkey nye kiconi letutap. Ntarastinek kunye kikweye Werit nyetilil okokoy.
Kunyo, ŋolyontet nyewo nye cemwowu acek kunyi kule; Ceponte acek Tisintet nyewo kupoyit manta nye yunyo, nye pure yewutap tay nyepo ŋeceretap Yiyintet nyepo Kamukeywek om torot.
Mite kwiyisyi kuyu Tisintet nyewo om Otepto Nyetilil nye Pëlisyi, nyoto kunye wemet nyepo manta nye kitec Mokoryontet, nye kipuryo kot kutece ci.
Cekweye Tisintet ake tokol kule sukuŋet kukoytoy kokotutek oko korosek ce cikocini Yiyintet. Kunyo misyini kuponto mpo Tisintet nyinyo nyewo kito nye koytoy.
Nto yunye kupo neto koret, nto komoyeku Tisintet mpo kisic, omnye mite tisik ce caŋ ce koytoy kokotutek kuyu wulo mwoytoy Ntarastinekap Yutayek.

Yisyet nye yiye cekto kuyu tisik kunye kerkeyinto oŋnku rurwet nyepo meset nyetilil nye mite torot. Kerkey wule kiyunto om Moses. Omnye ye kikirik kutec wemet, yoto kumwoci Yiyintet neto kule, “Käs kule ketec kiy ake tokol kuyu wulo kukuciporuŋ om tulwo.’’

Ntene kuyu wulo yunto, kicikoci Yesu yisyet nyepo tisyontit nyewo kupël nyimwacek, kuyu wulo topon kirotyet nye kikwiytoy neto om kwenutap Yiyintet oko piko, omnye kiyoŋe kirotyet nyitenyi tukuk ce toponec kupëlis.
Omnye nto kipuryo kot kuponto lelis kirotyet nyo kipo tayta, nto kipuryo kot kumöce Yiyintet kukon kirotyet nyepo oyeny.
Ntene kireny Yiyintet pikyi yo kiŋolole kumwowu kule, “Mwowu Mokoryontet kule, mite kukwoni pesyosyek, ye masayiy ani kirotyet nyelel oko pikap Israel oko kotap Yuta.

Puryo kot kukerkey kirotyet nyoto oko nyo kyoyiye ani oko mpo kukomwa, om pesyet nyo kyokwerune ani cekto kukwane koretap Misiri. Kipuryo kot kurip kuywey kirotyet nyoto kyoyiye ani oko cekto. Kunyo kyayaste ani nye kimolimncini, yunyoto wule mwoytoy Mokoryontet.

Mwowu Mokoryontet kule, kirotyet nye masayiy ani oko pikap Israel om pesyosyek ce kwoni kunyi, Mosokoci kupurune ntarastinekwani kasoteywekwa orit, mososil mukuleywekwa orit. Mosoyeku ani Yiyintemwa, oŋnkwek cekto pikwani.
Puryo ci om cekto nye muce kunet citake nto mpo kunet yeyanyi kumwoci kule, ‘Roke nket Mokoryontet.’ Omnye mosukonketo piko tokol, kuceke lekwa nye miniŋ okoy cito nyewo.
Omnye mosakalye ani leliswekwa, nye kamosoti yec miyotyonikwa.’’
Ye kaŋalale Yiyintet kumwoy kule kirotyet nyelel, kuporkey kule sute Yiyintet kule kiyosit kirotyet nyo kipo tay, kunyo kiy ake tokol nye mite kuyositu kunye mosukupot lakwar.
Kiponto kirotyet nyo kipo tay ntarastinek cepo sayet oko otepto nye tilil nye kikweye cito.
Kicetec yoto wemet saŋ nye cekure Otepto Nyetilil. Kimite orit kito nye yoŋe tarit, oko meset, oko mukatyantet nye kacesoci kupoyit Yiyintet.
Otepto nyepo oyeny kunye kiceŋare siret. Kumite otepto nye cekure. Tilil wule po Cetililec.

Nye kimite meset nyepo Saput nye kicepele korosek ce poŋu oko santukut nyepo kirotyet nye kicilume Saput, oko teret nyepo Saput nye kimite orit Mana, oko koroktap Aron nye kiponto sokek ce kipityo, oko rwontok oyeny ce kicesil ntarastinek.

Kimite parak om yoto tyoŋik alake ce cekure Cerupin ce poru woyintop Yiyintet, ce kiponto kepepok ce keyene otepto nyepo yo cikolye miyotyonik. Ntene puryo kot kumite yawut poroyinto nye cimuce cerorune wule kiyunto tukucoto tokol.
Kiceyiyta tukucoto kuyunyoto. Kunyo kiwute tisik pesyosyek tokol wemet nyepo saŋ wokwiye yisyonutekwa.

Ntene Tisintet Nyewo nkit pate kunye kiwute wemet orit nyepo oyeny aret akenke om kenyit akenke. Kisute yoto korotik ce kikoytoy kwek korosek cepo leliswek ceci nkit oko leliswek ce kikwiye piko nye puryo kot kunkete kule kyiye miyotyet.
Nete Muyet Nyetilil kupor kutok topon om tukucutecu kule tompo kuyatakay aret nye weti Otepto Nyetilil nye Pëlisyi, ye tokumite kutekat Wemet nyepo saŋ.
Pelutyet nyitenyi nye poru wule yunto pesyosyecu. Poru kule kokotutek oko korosek cepo tyoŋik ce kocikoci Yiyintet kuce puryo kot kusöte kunyol mukuleytap cito nyo soye.

Omnye nömekey coto tokol oko omit, oko ce ceye, oko sokwonutek wok tokol ce cipukte simnyo. Ntarastinek coto kuce nöme wule po porto saŋ ce mite kwiyisyi okoy kupunto pesyet nye mokusat Yiyintet tukuk tokol.

Ntene kico Kristo kuyu Tisintet nyewo nyepo tukuk ce toponec ce mite yawut. Wemet nye yicini neto kunye nyewo oŋnkusatat nye pëlisyi, nye puryo kot ku wemet nyo kikwiye piko. Kunye puryo kot kupo koroni kicitonye.

Yo kiwute Yesu Otepto Nyetilil nye Pëlisyi aret akenke kuwany kupok, kipuryo kot kusut yoto korotik cepo warek nto tuka wokukoyto kwek korosek, ntene kiweto korotikyi nkit oŋnkukonec acek kosopotet nye mopoku.
Kunyo nteye korotikap warek oko cepo yeyik oko aryantet nyepo rorta nye kacepel kuce ye kocitotoci piko ce puryo kot kutililec, komuce kowun kutililitu om miyotyonikwa.

Kunyo, omnye manta coto, ku aret cetya nyun ce muce kowun korotikap Kristo nye kikonnkey kupunte Muyet nye mopoku kwek korosyontet nye nyolunot om wule mite Yiyintet. Korotikap Yesu kuce wece kutoponitu kasoteywek cicacek sukuŋet kyiy yisyet nyepo Yiyintet nye sopot.

Kunyo, Kristo kunye söte kirotyet nyelel sukuŋet kunyor piko co kikur Yiyintet soponto nye mopoku nyo kikurto. Muce kwiyakay ŋolyontoni omnye kime Kristo sukusop piko kukwane miyotyonikwa co kikikwiy ye kitokupoytoy ntarastit nyepo keny.
Ye mite kirotyet nye kiwalkey cito, kumöce cinket kule kime cicoto.
Omnye puryo kwiyisyi ŋolyo nyepo kirotyet ye tokusope nyo kiwölekey kukurto. Yiyisyi pate ye kame cito nyo kikurtoy.
Kuyunyoto omne sukuŋet ciyisye korotik cekwil kunyol kirotyet nyepo tay.

Kinyosye Moses yoto kumwoci piko ntarastinek tokol kuyu wule kiyunto. Nto om letut kunäm korotikap tuka oko warek oŋnkutankware peko, oŋnkutotoci kitaputap ntarastinek oko piko tokol kwiyisye ketit nye mwa koromun nye cekure Isop oko putekap kecirek ce murwonec.
Kimwoy kule, “Koroticu kuce kwile kukwilakay kirotyet nyo kukonok Yiyintet kule orip.’’
Om aret nye yunyoto kutotoci Moses korotik wemet oko kiy ake tokol nye kyiyisye ye cesoye.
Kito nyepo manta kuyu wulo yunto ntarastinek kunyi kule, korotik kuce wune kutililit kiy ake tokol. Kunyo puryo kot cimuce cikalya miyotyonik ye puryo kot citata korotik
Kunyo tukucutecu ce akerkeye oko tukuk cepo torot kuce kicesat kutililitu om aret nye yunyitenyi. Ntene tukuk cepo torot kuce möce korosek ce pëlisyi.
Omnye kipuryo kot kowut Yesu Otepto Nyetilil nye kicitanye yewuniyek, nye kerkeyinto nyepo manta. Ntene kiwo torot, wule mitowune yawut kuporyewec acek om taytap Yiyintet.
Kiweti Tisintet nyewo aret akenke om kenyit akenke Otepto Nyetilil, kisute yoto korotik cepo tyoŋik, ntene kipuryo kot kokoytokey Kristo kuwo orit aret ce caŋ,

omnye nto kikwiy kuyunyoto nto kimuce kutaŋany aret ce caŋ kuceke ye kicitany koret. Ntene wule kikwiyta kunye kiporkey yawut aret akenke om pesyosyecu po letut, sukuŋet kunum miyotyonik, omnye kikoytokey nkit kwek korosyontet.
Mosukume ci tokol aret akenke, nto om letut kuco musankut.

Kuyunyoto kicekon Kristo aret akenke kwek korosyontet nye numu miyotyonik cepo piko ce caŋ. Mosukuco aret nyepo oyeny, nye puryo kot kuconi kule casat miyotyet, ntene coni cokusop piko ce mite kukonye neto.

Ntarastinekap Yutayek kuce poru pate kuyu rurwet nyepo wule yunto kerkeyinto nyepo tukuk ce toponec ce mite tay, nye puryo kot kuporu wule yunto tukucoto kupoyit manta. Kunyo komuce kulene ntarastinek kot kusat kunyol piko ce kenekey korosek pate, cekyicini Yiyintet kila kenyit?
Nto yunye piko co soye Yiyintet, kuce kiciwun miyotyonikwa kupoyit manta nto puryo kot konkete kule mite miyotyet. Nto kiciyoŋnto nye mokyiye korosek.
Kunyo kuyu wule yunto korosek co cikoytoy kila kenyit kuce sowu kunket piko miyotyonikwa om kenyit ake tokol.
Omnye puryo kot komuce kenyis kot kowun miyotyonik korotik cepo yeyik oko warek.
Omnye ye kikirik kuco Yesu koret, kimwoci Yiyintet kule: “Puryo kot möce nyi korosek oko kokotutek, ntene kiyiytowo ani nyi porto.
Puryo kot ŋerekyini korosek ce cepele kumukul, nto kokotukek ce numu miyotyonik.
Yoto omwowu kule, ‘Yiyintet omite yu kule ayiy kito nye möce nyi kule ayiy ani, kuyu wulo kicesilyo ŋalek ce nömo ani om kitaputap Ntarastinek.’ ’’

Kimwoy nyepo tayta kule, “Kipuryo kot möce nyi nto ŋerekyini korosek oko kokotutek oko mpo korosek cepo tyoŋik ce cepele.’’ Kimwoy kuyunyoto nka kot cikoytoy korosecutecu tokol kuyu wulo mwoytoy ntarastinek.
Oŋnkumwoy yec kule, “Yiyintet amite yu saŋet ayiy kiy tokol nye möce nyi kule ayiy ani.’’ Kunyo kinum kuwec Yiyintet korosek tokol co kipo tay, sukuŋet kuker yeto korosyontet nyepo oyeny.
Omnye Yesu Kristo kunye kiwany yisyet nye kimokyini Yiyintet. Omnye kisatec acek cetililitu om miyotyonik aret akenke om porto nye kime, kuyem nyoto.
Yonye tisintet Yutoyintet ake tokol kila pesyo oŋnkwiy yisyet nye koytoy kokotutek ce caŋ ce kerkey, ntene puryo kot komuce kot konum kokotutecoto miyotyonik.
Ntene Kristo kunye kikon kokotutyet akenke nyepo okokoy nye numu miyotyonik oŋnkopure yewutap tay nyepo Yiyintet.
Kunyo mite kopure wuloto okokoy pesyet nye mokukoci Yiyintet kwek punikyi ŋecerok cepo kerenkokyi.
Kunyo om korosyontenyi akenke, kunye kisat kunyol okokoy piko ce kimo kiponto miyotyo.
Kwile mpo Muyet Nyetilil kumwowu nyepo tayta kule,
“Mwowu Mokoryontet kule, Mosayiy ani kirotyani oko cekto om pesyosyecoto, mosokoci kopurune ntarastinekwani mukuleywek cikwa, mososil kowut kasoteywekwa orit.’’
Oŋnkumwoy yec kule: “Yoto kuye komosoti yec miyotyonikwa oko ŋalek ce miyotec ce kikwiy.’’
Kunyo, ye kicikalya pic miyotyonikwa kupuryo kot kutocemöce yec kokotutek ce numu miyotyet.
Kunyo mpo yeya, cimuci yawut ciwut Otepto Nyetilil nye puryo kot cemuytosi, omnye kime Kristo kupo acek.
Neto kunye kiyotwec aret nyelel nyepo soponto nye cepunte totetap siret, nyoto kunye porto nyepo Kristo nkit.
Ceponte Tisintet nyewo nye poytoy kotap Yiyintet.

Kunyo akente cekwa celekite wule mite Yiyintet nye ceponte mukuleyto nyepo manta, oko koyenet nye kwilat, oko mukuleywek ce kicesit cinum kasoteywek ceponto leliswek, oko porwonik ce kiciwune peko ce tililec.
Möce kule cekwil kokenotet nye ceponte, omnye cinket kupoyit manta kule mosukoyitita Yiyintet kurtoyet nye kikurto.
Möce kule cisot wule moceriptekey. Cikalyekey acek kwacek nkit om cömisyet oŋnkyiy yisyet nye topon.
Monte kyaste nye komo cetuytosi om kirwoket kuyu wulo yiytoy piko alake yawut. Ntene möce cititirkey koromun kuyu wule kokäs kule karik Pesyetap Mokoryontet.
Omnye ye kocetosyikey kyiy miyotyet cinketi oŋnkurok yec kicinket ŋalek cepo manta. Kupuryo kot kumite yec korosyontet ake nye muce kunum miyotyonik.
Kito nye koŋet pate ku cemuye om kito nye mokwiyakay, nyoto ku musankut nyepo mata nye loye nye mokwaranta piko co toye Yiyintet!
Cepoköce kume nye mocesoye ci ake tokol nye koyiri ntarastinekap Moses, ye mite piko oyenku nto somok ce kiköse ye kiyiye cicoto ŋolyontonoto.

Kunyo asot pa, mosukutaŋany kulene cito nyo nyile Weritap Yiyintet? Ŋo nye nyile kule puryo kot kupo latik korotik cepo kirotyet nyo kisope neto miyotyet? Ŋo nye cupe Muyet Nyetilil nyepo poypoyet? Sot pa misyini cicoto kunyor taŋanynta nye tya?
Omnye cinket cito nye kimwowu kule, “Mosoyoku ani,’’ Oŋkumwoy yec kule, “Mosukumutyi Mokoryontet pikyi musankut.’’
Ŋolyo nyepo muyot koromun ye kesuci cito yewuniyekap Yiyintet nye sopot!
Möce asot wule kyoyunte akwek om letut yu kowo kulucok lakweyet nyepo Yiyintet. Kyotaŋany om tukuk ce caŋ oŋnkurok otitir nye kipuryo kot kupëlok wuyinwek.
Kicecupok pesyosyek alak om taytap piko tokol oŋnkyitaŋanyak oŋnkoyomekey mpo oko piko alak ce kicitoŋonye kuyunyoto.
Kyotaŋany mpo oko piko ce mite mopusi, oŋnkomuytoci om ŋerekwek cenyapan tukukwok tokol, omnye kyonketi kule ceponte kito ake nye topon nye pëlisyi nye pure okokoy.
Kunyo monte kyaste titirotet nyimwoŋ omnye mosukukonok kokotutyet nyewo.
Möce omuytoci sukuŋet ayiy kito nye möce Yiyintet, oŋnkonyoru kito nyo kikurto neto.
Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Om poroyinto nye miniŋ yawut, ye mosukuco neto nyo coni, puryo kot kulilenekey.
Ntene mosokuyen oŋnkusopco pikwani co yiye cepo manta. Nteye kotepe kot kuketitakey ake let, kupuryo kot oŋerekyini ani nyoto.’’
Puryo kot ciku acek piko co ketitoykey let okoy kupotyo. Ntene ceponte koyenet, kunyo mosicisopec.
Koyenet kunye poru kule po manta tukuk ce ce mite cikeni, oŋnkyinket kule po manta co moceköse om konyek.
Om koyenet nyimwa, kunye kisutyi piko ce kipo keny kucämnta Yiyintet cekto.
Om koyenet kunye sukuŋet cinket acek kule ŋolyontetap Yiyintet kunye kitany koret om tukuk ce toku kukwane tukuk ce motoku.

Om koyenet kunye kisutyi kucämnta Yiyintet kule topon korosyontet nyepo Apel kusir nyepo Kain. Kicämnta Yiyintet kule po manta Apel kupunte koyenet nye kiponto, omnye Yiyintet nkit kunye kicäm kokotutyetap Apel. Kunyo nka kot kime keny kutoku kwiyisyi koyenenyi.

Om koyenet kunye kisutyi cesut Enok kuwo torot kusope nye kipuryo kot kume. Kipuryo kot cenyor neto omnye kisut Yiyintet kuwo torot. Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, kiŋerece Enok Yiyintet kunyo kutompo kot cesut kuwo torot.
Puryo kot kuŋerekyini Yiyintet ci tokol ye moponto koyenet. Omnye ci tokol nye coni wule mite Yiyintet kunye misyini kuyen kule mite Yiyintet, kunyo kocini musyaret piko ce cenye wule mite neto.

Om koyenet kunye kikoci kulimnta Nuwa kosowunotetap Yiyintet nye kimwoci tukuk ce kikwoni ce kipuryo kot komuce Nuwa kot kukäs. Yoto kulimnci neto Yiyintet, kutec Rapet nye kisop neto oko piko tokol cepo kanyi. Yoto kumutyi musankut koret oŋnkunyor kupeyok co cenyoru ye ponte koyenet.
Om koyenet kunye kisutyi Aprayam kulimnci Yiyintet yo kikure kunomen kuwo koret ake nye kikikurtoci kule sokoci kwek nyenyi. Yoto kunomen Aprayam nye kipuryo kot konkete wule weti.
Om koyenet kunye kisutyi Aprayam kumiŋis kuyu tontet om koret nye kikikurtoci Yiyintet neto. Kiminye wemanik kuyu Isaka oko Yakopo, ce kikikurtoci Yiyintet mpecek.
Kikonye Aprayam moŋet nye kicetec topon, moŋet nyoto kunyo kicece oŋnkutec Yiyintet nkit.
Om koyenet mpo kunye kinyorta Sara swamet okoy kukoyakay nka kot kikiyosit nye kimemuce kuyi lekoy. Kinket neto kule kikurto Yiyintet kunyo kikenekey Yiyintet.
Kunyo nka kot kime cicitenyi akenke Aprayam, kiyi mucokoronik ce caŋ cete kokelik cepo torot oŋnkucaŋit cete coŋintap ŋaynet nye mite ruretyet tapan.

Kipok picutecu tokol kuponto koyenet. Kutompo kot kunyor cek tukuk ce kikurto Yiyintet, ntene kikäs cekto kutokumite tukucoto wule low, oŋnkuŋerekyi, oŋnkucäm kutor kulim piko kule minye cek koret kuyu toyek ce wuwen.
Piko ce mwowu ce yucoto kuce poru kutok manta kule cenye cekto koret nye nyimwa nkit.
Nto yunye kimite cekto kusote koret nyo kikwone, nto kwemuce kunyor poroyinto nye kaketitekey wuloto.
Nto om wule yunto, möce cekto yawut koret nye topon, nyoto ku koret nyepo torot. Kunyo sukuŋet melilone Yiyintet ye kacekur kule Yiyintetap picoto. Omnye kikwiytoci neto nkit cekto moŋet.
Om koyenet kunye kusutyi Aprayam kukoyto werinyi Isaka kwek korosyontet, ye kisyeme Yiyintet neto. Aprayam kunye kikurtoci Yiyintet, oŋnkurok yec kucäm kule okoyte werinyi akenke kwek korosyontet.
Kikimwoci Yiyintet neto kule, “Mesenyeru mucokoronik kukwane wule mite Isaka.’’
Kinket Aprayam kule muce Yiyintet kot koŋet kotutune met piko, kunye kipor kuyunyoto omnye kiceketyi Isaka kuyunye ketutune met.
Om koyenet kunye kikoci Isaka kusomnci Yakopo oko Esawu kupeyok cekwoni om letut.
Om koyenet kunye kikoci Yakopo ye kikiyosit kusomnci kupeyok werikap Yosep tokol yo kitepene korokto oŋnkusay Yiyintet.
Om koyenet kunye kikoci Yosep kuŋalale ye kikirik kume kule mosukupete lekokap Israel Misiri oŋnkumwayta wule möce cemuyta koyek ceci.
Om koyenet kunye kikoci kwanitap Moses oko kamet kuwuny neto kuwany arok somok, omnye kikäs cekto kule lekwa nye topon koromun kunyo kimeneywey ntarastinekap kinko.
Om koyenet kunye kikoci kutay Moses yu kowo kuner kuwoyit mocekure weritap ceptap kinko Farawo.
Yoto kucäm kule ataŋany oko pikap Yiyintet kusir ye koto ŋerece ŋerekwekap miyotyet nyepo pesyos tukusic.
Kikäs neto kule cupisyet nyepo toŋoŋutek kupo Kristo kunye Mokoryontit nyewo kupël mokoryontit tokol nye kimite Misiri. Omnye kinket neto kokotutyet nye mosukunyor om letut,
Om koyenet kunye kikoci Moses kuŋete koretap Misiri nye kipuryo kot kuywey ntarastinekap kinko Farawo, oŋnkumuytoci koromun kuyunye kiköse Yiyintet nye motoku.
Koyenet nyenyi kunye kikoci kucec sakwetap keytayet, oŋnkumwayta ciyile korotik kurkotik, sukuŋet mente kot kupakäc malayket nyepo met werik poretok cepo pikap Israel.
Om koyenet kunye kikoci kway pikap Israel ruretyet nye arra kuyu koret nye yamat. Ntowo kusyem pikap Misiri kule kyay yoto kwaranta peko tokol.
Om koyenet kunye kikoci kulul totetap moŋetap Yeriko, om letut yu kowo komut pikap Israel kuwany pesyosyek tisap.
Om koyenet kunye kikoci kusop nye mnacepakäc Rakap cemoroniyontet oko piko co kipuryo kot koyene Yiyintet, omnye kiwuny neto topon wotik.
