Momwowu yec ŋal ne ce caŋ? Puryo kot oponte poroyinto nye moŋalale mpo, Parak, Samuson, Yafesa, Tauti, Samuel, Kition oko workoyik.
Om koyenet kiporye cekto tokol korosyek alak okoy kupëlis. Kikwiy ŋalek cepo manta okoy kunyor tukuk ce kikurto Yiyintet. Kirat cekto kutuwakap ŋetumwek,
oŋnkomis motik ce rikititos koromun. Kipuryo kuponto swamet, ntene kinyor swamet, kiponto swamet om poryet okoy kuporye kot kupël lukosyek cepo piko alak.
Om koyenet kunye kimuce kunyor koruk kotutune met pikwa ce kipok. Piko alak ce kitay mocityakta kuce kicitaŋany kupok, sukuŋet ciŋet kotutune met kunyor soponto nye topon.
Kicecup alak oŋnkyepas, cerate alak nyororonik, oŋnkyekerta mopusi.
Kicewire rwontok, cesacasac alak ceyepe rotokap cok, kupesetat kulokoti syerokap kecirek oko cepo warek, kiponon, kicitaŋany, oŋnkyinyalil.
Kunäm koret cekto kwapi koromun! Kupesetat kumpakate pate kitela, oko lakamosyek kuminye kepenonik oko mwenonik.
Kicämnta Yiyintet picutecu tokol kupo koyenemwa. Ntene kipuryo kot kunyor tukuk ce kikurto Yiyintet,
omnye kikwiytowec Yiyintet acek yiytayatet nye pëlisyi. Kito nye kimöci Yiyintet ku cenyolu acek wanak oko cekto.

Nto acek kuce ceponte luket nyewo nyepo muncururwanik ce kimutwec. Kunyo akany cewirte acek kiy ake tokol nye muce kukerektec, oko miyotyet nyo kinämec kukwilec. Okany cirway ŋweyek nye kacemuytoci om kamwenet nyi ceponte.

Akente cirotote cetokyikey Yesu nye kicece koyenet nyinyacek oŋnku neto kunye mosukoyitita. Kupo ŋerekwek ce kimite kukonye neto, kunye kikoci neto kumuytoci om murtowontet nye kipuryo kot kolilan. Kunyo kikopure yewutap tay om yepo ŋeceretap Yiyintet.
Asot pa wuyinto nye kipunte Yesu, kimuytoci senkeratet nyewo nyepo piko ce miyotec! Kunyo monte cecosye nto mpo kwilyo mukuleywekwok.
Omnye om wuyinto nye oporye akwek miyotyet, kunye tompo oporye okoy cepakäcak awaste korotik.
Kwoyutye akwek so ŋalek cekwilok ce kimwowok Yiyintet kuyu lekokyi? Mwowu kule, “Lekwenyu, mente kot areny kataŋanyetap Mokoryontet, Mente anyokoritu ye kapolyiŋ.
Omnye toŋonye Mokoryontet ci tokol nye cöme, oŋnkunyolile ci tokol nye kacäm kwek lekwenyi.’’
Omuytoci toŋoŋutek kuyunye kopirok Papa, omnye toŋoŋutek ce otoŋonyi akwek kuce poru kule sutok Yiyintet kuyu Lekokyi. Mite pa lekwa nye puryo kot kupire kwan?
Ye puryo kot cepirok akwek kuyu wule yunto lekokyi, kuporukey kule puryo kot oyiku lekokyi cepo manta, ntene oyiku pate pantayek.
Ceponte acek mpo papa cepo koret ce kiyec cepirec, ntene ciyweyi cekto. Kunyo puryo kot kuroke ne ciyweye acek kupëlis Papa nyepo torot sukuŋet cesopce!
Kipirec acek mpo papa kisic kuyu wule kostoy kule topon. Ntene pirec acek Yiyintet kupo toponiyet nyinyacek sukuŋet cenyoru tililinto nyenyi.
Puryo kot kutopon pirotet om pantanyi, ntene mwa nye puryo kot kutopon, ntene om letut mosukunyor kalyet oko tililinto co kicepire.
Kunyo onömnci torot yewuniyekwok ce nyelnyeltos oŋnkokwil kutuŋokwok co potontos.
Otosyikey apesetate arup aret nye rotat, sukuŋet mente kumnyan kerenket nye mwole, ntene kusop .
Otyikyi opurte kalyet oko piko tokol oŋnkopurte soponto nyetilil, omnye puryo ci nye muce kot kukäs Mokoryontet ye moponto soponoto.
Oripkey mente kwasta ci tokol poypoyetap Yiyintet. Oripkey mente kot kupitenak akwek ketit nye mwa nye muce kowurta piko ce caŋ om mwonet nyenyi.
Oripkey mente kusekweyan nto nye moponto tini ci ake tokol om akwek kuyu Esawu nyo kikwalya poretyantit nyenyi kuyu werit nyewo kwale omik cepo aret akenke.
Oŋnket akwek kule kimac om letut kule onyoru kupeyok ce kosomnci kwan, ntene ceyete omnye kipuryo kot kurenynkey om ŋalek ce kikwiy nka kot kisyem kurir lokik kule anyoru.
Puryo kot akwa akwek kuyu pikap Israel ye kikwoni tulwetap Sinai, nye kiponto mata nye loye oko menonet nye tuyi mis oko yomet kisonet,
oko kontit nye ciye oko polotet. Nteyu kowo kulim piko polotet, yoto kusom kule mente kot tocelim ŋolyo ake,
omnye kipuryo kot komuce kumuytoci ntarastit nye kimwowu kule, “Mpo ye karik kutiny pate tyony tulwet mosicewire rwontok kume.’’
Ki ŋolyo nyewo koromun nye kicekäs yoto okoy kumwoy Moses kule, “Komuyi oŋnkapotan.’’
Ntene omite akwek yawut kukoyoŋe taytap tulwetap Siyon oŋnku moŋet nyepo Yiyintet nye sopot nye Yerusalem nyepo torot, wule kerurukyikey malaykanik ce caŋ ce mociyite.
Kakwa akwek wule mite koyomotet nyepo poretokap Yiyintet ce kicesil kaynokwa om torot. Kakwa wule mite ketintet nyepo piko tokol, wule mite mukuleywek cepo piko cepo manta ce kicesat kunyol.
Kakwa wule mite Yesu Kristo nye kisat kirotyet nyelel om korotikyi ce kicitata ce porwec ŋalek ce toponec kupël co kipo Apel.

Kunyo, möce oripkey mente kot otay malim ŋalekap nyo ŋololwok, kuyu cekto co kitay molimnci neto nyo kisowu cek om wuli po koret, kuce kipuryo kot kusopco. Cimuci acek kulene cesopce ye kacetay mocelimnci neto nyo sowec kucone torot!
Kitimtim polotet nyenyi yoto koret, ntene kukurto yawut kumwoy kule, “Mosotimtim koret yec, ntene puryo kot ku koret nkit pate, mosotimtim mpo torot.’’
Ŋolyontoni mwowu kule, “Yec’’ Kunye poru kutok topon kule, tukuk ce kicitany kuce citimtime oŋnkyinum sukuŋet kuŋet co mocitimtime.
Kunyo misyini cikostoyisyi acek omnye kicenyoru poytoyisyet nye mocimuce kot citimtim. Kunyo akany cikaste cikoci Yiyintet sayet nye misyini nye yeme ceponte koyweyisyet oko muyotet.
Omnye Yiyintenyo kunye mata nye orontoy.
Otosyikey acämnkey akwek kwakwek nkit kuyu mpo yeya om Kristo.
Mente ceyutye moŋerekyi atoroc oŋnkopay toyek. Mite piko alake ce kikwiy kuyunyoto okoy kuŋerekyi malaykanik nye kipuryo kot kunkete.
Möce asoti piko ce mite mopusi oŋnkosut kuyunye opontekey tokol om mopusi. Möce asoti mpo piko co mite kutoŋonye oŋnkosut kuyunye otoŋonyi mpo akwek oko cekto.
Möce kuywey piko tokol komütisyet, nye puryo kumisyini kowurta morono nto korko komütisyet nyenyi. Omnye mosukumutyi Yiyintet musankut piko co syepisyi, oko sakwoyotik.
Monte ciku pic ce corokyini pesan, okany kuyemak tukuk ce oponte, omnye kimwoy Yiyintet kule, “Puryo kot oyostok ani mpo kisic oŋnkupuryo kot owirtiŋ.’’
Kunyo sukuŋet cenyoru nyikanatet ceŋalal ce mwowu kule, “Mokoryontet kunye kokolyoyintemwani, puryo kot amuye. Mosukwiyena ani ne cito ake?’’
Möce osoti kantoyikwok co kimwowok lokoywekap Yiyintet; Asot topon wule kipurtoy om kopurto nyimwa. Möce otyikyi Koyenet nyimwa.
Yesu Kristo kunye yunyoto omutun, oŋnkuyunyoto yawut, oŋnku mokuyuyit nyoto okokoy.
Mönte kot kumasak konetisyonik ce lelac kot ape tapan; Omnye poypoyetap Yiyintet kunye kwile mukuleywek cikwok, puryo ku ntarastinek ce nöme omik ce tompo kot kukalya ci tokol nye rupe ntarastinek.
Puryo kot kuponto kamukeywek tisik ce yiyisyi om kotap wemet kot kwam korosek ce mite meset nyetilil.
Sutu tisintet nyewo korotik cepo tyoŋik okoy Otepto Nyetilil nye Pëlisyi, sukuŋet kukoyto kwek korosek cepo miyotyonik, ntene cepele panyekap tyoŋicoto kayta saŋ.
Kunyo kitaŋany mpo Yesu kuyunyoto kumeci kurketap moŋet saŋ sukuŋet kowun miyotyonik cepo piko om korotikyi nkit.
Kunyo akente cipe kayta saŋ wecenyoru tokol kalilanta nye kinyor Yesu.
Omnye puryo kot kumite moŋet nye ceminye acek kenyisyok om wuli po koret, ce mite cecenye moŋet nye mosukuco.
Kunyo akente cetosyikey cikoci Yiyintet korosek ce cikoste kupunte Yesu, om kutuwak ceŋolole kuŋoŋu kaynenyi.
Monte ceyutye mayiy tukuk ce toponec oŋnkokolyoykey kwakwek nkit, omnye korosek coto ce ŋerece Yiyintet.

Ayweyi kantoyikwok oŋnkolimnci ntarastinek ce mwowu. Omnye mite cekto kuripe mukuleywekwok nye memunye, omnye mosukuporci cekto Yiyintet yisyet nye kikwiy. Ye kaywey akwek cekto mosukwiyis topon om ŋerekwek, nteye puryo, mosukwiyisyi kunerekotin. Kunyo puryo kot kukolyok akwek ceyuco.
Otosyikey osomwec mpo acek, cinketi acek kule ceponte ŋomnonet nye cinketi cepo manta, omnye cemöce kule kyiye okokoy ŋalek cepo manta.
Otosyinikey ani osoysoyok akwek kule osomwo sukuŋet kuketwo Yiyintet aco lakwar okoy wule omite akwek.
Yiyintet nye kiŋet kotutune met Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo, neto kunye mesewontet nyewo nyepo kecirek, omnye kitata korotikyi ce kikwil kirotyet nyepo kenyisyok.

Akente kukonok akwek Yiyintet nyepo kalyet kiy ake tokol nye topon nye omöce sukuŋet ayiy ce möce neto. Roke kwiy neto kito nye ŋerekyini kupunte Yesu Kristo. Kunyo kopurune woyinto wule mite Kristo okokoy okoy okokoy! Yunyoto.
Mpo yeya, osomok kule omuytoci om ŋalecu po kotitirotet. Kosilwok pate parwet nye nwac.
Omoce ani kule oporwok kule kucityakta yeyanyo Timosewo kuwete mopusi. Ye kotepe kot kupun wuli lakwar, mosocontekey okoy wule omite akwek.
Osupoywec kantoyikwok tokol oko pikap Yiyintet tokol! Kesupayak mpo yeya cepo Italia.
Opurte akwek tokol poypoyetap Yiyintet.
Ani nyo Yakopo nye Kiyokintetap Yiyintet oŋnkupo Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo. Osupoyi pikap Yiyintet cepo arosyek taman ok oyeny ce kiseretyi koret tokol.
Mpo yeya, möce aŋerec akwek ye kokwontyok syemutok wok ce caŋ,
omnye oŋnketi kule ye kacesyem koyenet nyimwoŋ yoto kuye omuytoci.
Ntene möce akäs kule komuytoci nye puryo kot osutoy okoy pesyet nyepo letut, sukuŋet opoyitu manta owoŋnkyi nye puryo kot kupotwok kiy.
Ye moponto ci ake tokol om akwek ŋomnonet, kumöce kusom Yiyintet nye mosukukoci. Omnye kocini Yiyintet piko tokol poypoyet nye puryo kot kukweye.
Ntene möce kusome kuponto koyenet nye puryo kot kuponto montuwok oyeny. Omnye cito nye ponto montuwok oyeny, kunye kerkey nyo oko peko cepo ruretyet ce wuse yomet kuroye wuli oko wuli.
Cito nye yunyoto kunye puryo kot kuwoŋnkyi om kasoteywekyi, nye potpotone om kiy ake tokol nye yiye, kunye mente kot kusot kule mosonyoru kiy kucone wule mite Mokoryontet.
Möce kusilkey yeya nye panan ye kelaŋnta Yiyintet nyoto.
Oŋnkuŋerec mpo yeya ake tokol nye kocirekto. Omnye mesukupot Mokoryontit kuyu taptet nyepo ketit.
Omnye mwoku asista oŋnkulay kupel ketit okoy kosuto taptet oŋnkupot toponiyet nyenyi. Kunyo mosikyaranta kuyunyoto cito nye mokoryo ye mite kwiyisyi yisyonutekyi.
Ŋerekat kuponto kupeyoy cito nye kwilat om koyenet ye kacesyem, omnye ye kacesyem kot komukta; mosukunyor soponto kwek kokotutyet nyo kikurtoci Yiyintet piko ce cöme neto.
Ye kacesyem cito kuyunyoto, kupuryo kot kuroke kumwoy kule, “Kasyema Yiyintet.’’ Omnye memuce setanit kot kusyem Yiyintet, oŋnkupuryo kot komuce Yiyintet kot kusyem ci ake tokol.
Ntene cesyeme cito ye kuperperit oŋnkocut cerokyinotet nyenyi nkit.
Yoto kuye mosukusic cerokyinotet kupuswek okoy kuyi miyotyet, nteye kaner miyotyet kuwoyit, yoto kuyi met.
Mpo yeya camamnik koromun! Monte ciperperak.
Kokotutyet nye tilil tokol kunye cone torot wule mite Papa Yiyintet, nye kitoŋintet nyepo lakweyet nyepo torot, nye puryo kot kuwecwecekey, nto mpo kusut menonet, omnye kamilkey.
Kicitanyec acek cenyoru ŋolyontenyi nyepo manta, sukuŋet cepoyitu manta om otepto nyepo tayta om tukuk tokol ce kicitany.
Mpo yeya, möce oŋnket ŋalecu! Möce kulimntoy ci tokol lakwar, ntene nye mosorcini ye mokuŋalal, oŋnkupuryo kot kunyeru lakwar.
Omnye mosutu nerekwek cepo cito tililinto nyepo Yiyintet.
Kunyo möce owirte soponto ake tokol nye samis oko kopurto ake tokol nye miyat. Ocäm Yiyintet ake ŋolyontenyi nyo kicekol mukuleywekwok. Ŋolyontonoto kunye muce kusopok.
Ntene möce oyiku pic ce yiyisye ŋolyontet, nye puryo kot olimntoy pate kulimntan nye opeperisyi.
Omnye cito nyo lime ŋolyontet pate oŋnkupuryo kot kwiyisye kukerkey nyo oko cito nye kosekey ciyoyit, kukäskey wule yunto neto nkit.
Kösekey yoto wule yunto nkit oŋnkuwo, yoto pakenke lakwar kuyutye wule koyunto neto.
Ntene ci tokol nye kakäs topon ntarastinek cepo manta co tyoce piko, oŋnkurip nye puryo kot kulimntoy pate ntene yiyisye ŋalek ce lime, mosukunyor nyoto kupeyok om kiy ake tokol nye yiye neto.
Ye sote cito kule opoye tini, ntene oŋnkupuryo kot kuripe ŋelyepta nyenyi, kupuryo kot kuponto tinit nyenyi latik oŋnkuperperisyi nyoto.

Tinit nye tilil nyepo manta nye puryo kot ciwurta om taytap Yiyintet nye Papa kunyi kule: Ye kocerutoci ceköse lekok pononik oko musukik om toŋoŋutek ce ponto, oŋnkuripkey cito om wule mite simnyontet nyepo koret.
Mpo yeya, omnye oponte akwek koyenet om Yesu Kristo Mokoryontenyo nyepo woyinto, mente cecäm piko alak oŋnkotay alak om wule yunto soponto nyimwa nyepo saŋ.
Nteye kaco pesyet ake tuyet nyimwoŋ cito ake nye ponto komolilyet nyepo saput oŋnkelac sirok ce toponec, oŋnkuco yec pananet ake nye kelac sarkotok.
Ye koŋerekyi nyo kelac sirok ce toponec oŋnkomwoci kule, “Co nyi cepure ŋeceret nyi topon!’’ Ntene Omwoci pananet kule, “Yoŋe nyi yun.’’ Nto kule “Co cepure nyi yu po kerenkokwani.’’
Kupuryo kot kalel akwek yoto omnye koporu kweyisyet oyiyisye miyotyet?
Mpo yeya, olimnte! Kikwey Yiyintet pononik om koret sukuŋet kumokoren cekto om koyenet oŋnkunyor poytoyisyet nyo kikurtoci piko ce cöme neto.
Ntene onyile akwek pananet! Ŋo co toŋonyok akwek oŋnkukwerok kok wokuwosontyok? Mokorenik coto!
Coto kuce ŋolole kwapi kaynet nye topon nyo kicemulok cekurenok akwek.
Mosayiy akwek topon ye kayitite ntarastit nyepo poytoyisyet nyo kicesil silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Cäm latyeŋuŋ kuyu wulo cömntoykey nyi nkit.’’
Ntene ye kacäm akwey piko kuyu wule yunto soponwek cepo saŋ, yoto kuye kalel ayiy miyotyet, oŋnkumutwok ntarastinek musankut kule koyiri ntarastinek.
Omnye ci tokol nye kalel kwiri ntarastit akenke kunye kalel nyoto kwiri ntarastinek tokol.
Omnye neto nyo kimwoy kule, “Mente ayiy sakwayanat.’’ Kunye nyoto akenke mpo nyo kimwoy kule “Mente oporisye.’’ Ye mneyiy sakwayanat, ntene oŋnkiporisye kukeyiri yoto ntarastinek.
Kunyo aŋalal oŋnkoyiyisye kuyu piko ce mocemutyi musankut kuyu wule yunto ntarastinek ce tyoce piko.
Omnye puryo komuce Yiyintet kukalya cito nye mutyini musankut cito nye puryo kot kukolyoyisyi, ntene pëlisyi kokolyoyisyet kupël musankut.
Mpo yeya, toponiyo ne ye komwoy cito kule, oponte koyenet. Ye puryo kot kuporu yisyonutekyi? Muce ra koynenyi kusop neto?
Nteye mite yeya ake nye moron nto korko nye moponto sirok oŋnkupuryo kot kuponto omik ce kam.
Topon pa ye kocemwoci kule, “Opurte kalyet, ololoŋitu oŋnkoyomisye opiyoŋnkye. Ye puryo kot koci cekto omik cepo porto ce kam?’’
Kunyo ye koyenet nkit pate nye puryo kot kumite yisyonutek; kukerkey nye kime koyenet nyoto.

Ntene mosukumwoy cito ake kule, “Oponte ani koyenet, iponte nyi yisyonutek ce toponec.’’ Mosawec ani omwowu kule, “Porwo ani pa, muce ra kuponto cito koyenet oŋnkurok kupuryo kot kuponto yisyonutek? Kuye mosoporuŋ ani koyenet nyimwani oko yisyonutek.’’
Yeni nyi so kule mite Yiyintet akenke nkit? Topon! Kunyo yene mpo oyik kuyunyoto, oŋnkuyweyisyi mpecek.
Yiku nyi solwo! Möce nyi kule ciporuŋ kule puryo kot kupunto koyenet latik nye moponto yisyonutek?
Asot pa kukonyo Apram wule kicesatita kunyol om wule mite Yiyintet om yisyet nye kikwiy omnye kikoyto werinyi Isaka om otepto nye cepele korosek.
Puryo kot oköse akwek kule koyenet nyenyi oko yisyonutek kuce kikwiyis wanak? Yoto kuye kicekwil kupoyit manta koyenet nyenyi om yisyet nye kikwiy neto.
Kwitita yoto kupoyit manta silutekap Yiyintet ce mwowec kule, “Kiyentyi Apram Yiyintet, sukuŋet kucäm Yiyintet kule po manta Apram okoy cekure corwetap Yiyintet.’’
Kunyo kokäs kule cesate kunyol cito om wule mite Yiyintet om yisyet nye yiye, ntene puryo kot om koyenet nyenyi nkit pate.
Kuyunyoto om wule mite korket nyo kicemoroniyo Rakap. Kisatakay neto kunyol om wule mite Yiyintet om yisyet nye kikwiy omnye kiŋerekyi wotik Yutayek oŋnkukalya kuwuny okoy kumwey kurup aret ake.
Kunyo kuyu porto nye kime nye moponto soponto, kuyunyoto mpo koyenet nye moponto yisyonutek kunye kime mpene.
Mpo yeya, puryo kot kuroke oyiku konetik piko ce caŋ om akwek, omnye oŋnket kule acek co ciku konetik kuce mucemutwec musankut nyewo kupël piko alak.
Omnye kyiye acek tokol leliswek aret ce caŋ. Kunyo ye mite ci nye puryo kot kulele kenyis om ŋalek ce ŋolole, kunye nyoto nyepo manta nye muce kurip soponto nyenyi tokol.
Cikocini karnet kutitap Farasit sukuŋet kulimwec, kunyo cimuci cekwer kuwo wulyo tokol wule ce möce.
Akäs pa mpo Rapet, nka kot ku kiy nyewo koromun, ntene kosute yomet nyewo, ntene yiyisye kito nye miniŋ nye pire peko oŋnkukwer cito nyo kwere kuyu wule moktoy.
Kuyunyoto mpo ŋelyepta, kiy nye miniŋ koromun, ntene oŋnkusilekey koromun om tukuk ce woyec. Akäs pa woket nye muce kulay kupok kukapel mata nye kisic!

Kerkey ŋelyepta oko mata, ŋelyepta kunye koret nyepo miyotyet nye mitowune wule ce mite. Mitowune porto nyinyo, oŋnku nye pciytoy miyotyet kunäm porto tokol. Neto kunye kocini kunäm mata nye cone kapkompic porto nyinyacek tokol.
Muce cito kunet tyoŋik, kunyo kikonet kot kunay tyoŋik tokol oko toritek oko erenok, oko tyoŋik cepo peko okoy kucömis kopur topon.
Ntene puryo ci nye muce kenyis kot kurip kunet okoy kopur ŋelyepta topon. Ŋelyepta kunye miyat, nye sokoran oŋnkuponto mwonet nyewo.
Cecupisye ŋelyepta, cikaste Mokoryontet oŋnku Papa, oŋnkyiyisye cecup mpo yeya ce kicitany om tonto nyepo Yiyintet.
Kutit kunye akenke nye kwone ŋalek ce cikoste oko ce cecupisye. Mpo yeya, puryo kot kuroke kuyuyit nyo.
Memuce kot kukosune yeto akenke peko ce misyontet oko ce toponec.
Mpo yeya, puryo kot kwiye mokoywet sapipunek, oŋnkupuryo kot kwiye sapipunek omik ce mokoyek. Kunyo puryo mpo kot kuwecekey peko ce misyontet kwek peko ce toponec.
Mite pa cito ake om wule omite akwek nye ŋom nye nkete ŋolyo? Möce koporune soponto nyenyi nye topon om yisyonutek ce yiye om toŋoŋutek oko ŋomnonet.
Ntene ye ponte corokyinotet nye mwa oko soynonet nye mite mukuleyŋuŋ, kupuryo kot kuroke silkey kwinyi nkit mwowu mwiynanet kerekte ŋalek cepo manta.
Puryo kot kucone ŋomnonet nyoto torot, cone koret, nye puryo kot ku topon oŋnkupo oyik.
Omnye! wule mitowune corokyinotet oko soynonet, kumite wuloto cokurotet oko miyotyonik wok tokol.

Ntene mpo yeya, tilil ŋomnonet nyepo torot, ponto kalyet, sikenotet oko corwantit, oŋnkuponto kakalyayatet nyewo nye konu Mokoryontit nyepo yisyonutek ce toponec, puryo kot kuponto kweyatet oko koperperisyo.
Nto kupuswek cepo toponiyet kuce kole piko co sutu kalyet.
Cone ono poryet oko wokutyet nyo oponte akwek? Cone corokyinotet nyimwoŋ nye omöce ŋerekwek ce mite kuportos om porwonikwok orit.
Omöce tukuk ntene puryo kot onyoru, yoto kuye oyiye wokutyet oko poryet. Monyoru tukuk ce omöce omnye puryo kot osome Yiyintet.
Puryo kot onyoru ye kosom omnye puryo kot osome topon, osome tukuk kule kyiyisye om ŋerekwekwok nkit.

Akwek piko co mocikenekey! Puryo kot oŋnket kule, ye keyiku corwet nyepo koret yoto kuye keyiku puniyontetap Yiyintet? Ci ake tokol nye möce kule oyiku corwetap koret, kunye yiku nyoto puniyontet nyepo Yiyintet.
Monte cisot kule po püc pate silutekap Yiyintet ce mwowu kule: “Soponto nyepo Yiyintet nye konec acek, kunye ponto corokyinotet nyeker koromun.’’
Ntene poypoyet nye konu Yiyintet kunye ponto yec swamet kupëlis. Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Toye Yiyintet piko co silekey, ntene kocini kupeyok co toloyec.’’
Kunyo okoytekey akwek ape wule mite Yiyintet. Otay Setani nyewo nyepo oyik yoto kuye kumweyenok.
Akwa alekityi Yiyintet, yoto kuye kunok kulekitit om wule omite akwek. Awun yewuniyek cikwok piko co oponte miyotyonik! Awec Mukuleywek cikwok piko co oyiku kaperperot!
Onyeru yawut, orirye, omesye, awec roryet nyimwoŋ kwek mesyet! Awec ŋerekwek kwek nerekwek ce caŋ.
Onetkey otoloyitu om taytap Mokoryontet, mosukulaŋntak.

Mpo yeya, monte cerenyenkey akwek kwakwek nkit. Ci tokol nye kareny yeyanyi kunye kareny nyoto ntarastit oŋnkumutyi musankut. Ye kemutyi musankut ntarastinek kuye kemerupe ntarastinek coto, ntene mutyini pate musankut.
Yiyintet nkit kunye konu ntarastinek oŋnku ketintet. Neto mpo kunye sope oŋnkwaranta. Nyi kuŋo nye muci kot mutyi musanku cito ake nye akerkeyekey.
Alim pa piko co mwowu kule, “Mosicipe yawut nto tun okoy moŋet nyi nto nyin, wule mwocipur kenyit akenke kyiy kamonkesyantit okoy cenyoru latik ntene akany.’’
Puryo kot oŋnketi ŋolyontet nyepo pesyet nyepo tun, oko wule mosukopurto soponto nyeŋuŋ. Akerkeyekey akwek cekwerut nye coni lakwar oŋnkupot yec lakwar.
Ntene roke omwowu kule, “Ye kacäm Mokoryontet ye tocesoptosi mosayiy nyi nto nyin.’’
Kunyo osilekey akwek yawut, oŋosekey kunyo miyotyo silotet nyoto tokol.
Ye nkete cito kwiy ŋalek cepo manta, oŋnkurok kupuryo kot kwiy, kakwiy cito nyoto ce miyotec.
Akwek mokorenik ce oponte tukuk, alim pa yawut! Orirye oyome mnyat om toŋoŋutek ce karik kukwontyok!
Kinuntyo mokoryontinekwok oŋnkwam solopik sirok cikwok.

Kukurwotyeci Sapunek oko karik cepo pesanik cikwok. Wule kerwotyeci ku wule mosukwek muncururwanik ce wosontyok akwek. Mosukwam panyek cepo porwonik cikwok kuyu mata. Kworuruc akwek mokoryontit om pesyosyek cepo letut ye karik ye ŋete koret.
Monokoci akwek musyaret piko ce kipote mparenikwok. Alim mpa rirek cikwa! Kupunto yitikap Mokoryontet nyepo kamukeywek tokol rirek cepo piko co kisisyi om mparenikwok.
Kwopur koret oponte soponto nye topon oko ŋerekwek. Kwoyokwoyitu sukuŋet opoyitu pesyet nye cetilenok.
Kwomutyi musankut oŋnkapakäc cito nye moponto lelis nye memuce kot kuporyenok kuyetkey.

Kunyo mpo yeya, omuytoci okoy kuco Mokoryontet. Akäs wule muytocini kopotintet okoy kwiy mparenyi omik ce toponec. Muytocini neto okoy kuteryec koret kuropen ropta nyepo tayta oko ropta nyepo yo karik kwek kemey.
Misyini omuytoci mpo akwek. Osat topon mukuleywekwok, omnye karik pesyetap Mokoryontet.
Mpo yeya, monte ciŋunyŋunyi akwek kwakwek, nkit, sukuŋet mente cemutwok musankut. Mite ketintet yuteyu keyoŋe yepo kurket.
Mpo yeya, möce asot workoyik ce kiŋolole om kaynetap Mokoryontet. Möce kwek cekto kito nye ceköse om muytocinotet ye mite toŋoŋutek.
Cekure acek kule ponto cekto kupeyoy omnye kimuytoci. Kyolim kule kimuytoci Yopu, oŋnketi kule kikoci Yiyintet neto tukuk om letut. Omnye ponto Mokoryontet poypoyet nyewo oko kalyet.

Mpo yeya, kito nye pële tokol kunyi kule, monte ciwolyikey koret torot, nto mpo koret ŋony. Ye owolikey kawalet ake tokol. Omwowu pate kule, “Puryo’’ ye puryo kupoyit manta. Oŋnkomwowu kule, “Yunyoto’’ ye yunyoto kupoyit manta, sukuŋet mente kot kuwosontyok Yiyintet.
Mite pa cito ake om akwek nye ponto wuyinto? Kuroke kusom. Mite pa cito nye ŋerekat? Roke nyoto kutum tumwonik ce kostoyisye.
Mite pa cito nye mnyone? Roke nyoto kukur poyik cepo pikap Yiyintet, ce mosukusomnci cicoto oŋnkuŋape mwayta om kaynetap Mokoryontet.
Sayet nye kacesay om koyenet kunye mosukusop cito nye mnyone. Mokusop Yiyintet cito nyoto kukalya ye kikwiy miyotyet.
Kunyo oŋoŋu oporcinikey miyotyonikwok akwek kwakwek oŋnkosomncinikey kwakwek nkit sukuŋet osopce. Ponto Swamet nyewo koromun sayet nye topon.
Eriya kunye ci nye kikerkey oko acekto. Kisom koromun kule mente kuropen ropta. Yoto kutay moropen ropta kuwany kenyisyek somok ok orok lö.
Oŋnkusom yec, yoto kuropen ropta okoy kupityo omik.
Mpo yeya, ye kotepe kot kumasakay cito ake om akwek marup aret nyepo manta, oŋnkuwec cito ake kot kuketkey yec,
kuroke kunket ŋolyontet nyi kule, ci tokol nye kawec cito nye miyat kwasta lelisto nyenyi mosukusop soponto nyepo cito nye miyat oŋnkusut mpo kokolyoyisyet nyepo miyotyonik ce caŋ.

Cone parwani wule amite ani Petero kiyokintetap Yesu Kristo. Osilwok akwek kweyanikap Yiyintet ce miŋisyi kuyu wuwen ce kiseretyi korosyek cepo Ponto, oko Kalatiya oko Kapontokiya oko Asia oko Pisiniya.

Kicekweyak akwek kuyu wule moktoy Yiyintet Papa. Kicesatak oyiku piko cetililec kupunte Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Yiyintet, sukuŋet aywey Yesu Kristo oŋnkowunok om korotikyi. Kunyo kutosyikey poypoyet oko kalyet om wule omite akwek.
Möce cikaste acek Yiyintet Papa kwanitap Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo! Omnye kikonec acek soponto nyelel om kokolyoyisyenyi nyewo omnye kiŋet kotutune met Yesu. Konec acek ŋaleca kokenotet nye sopot.
Kunyo cemite cekonye kule cenyoru kupeyok ce caŋ ce kikonorci Yiyintet pikyi. Kikonorwok akwek kupeyocu om torot wule puryo kununtos nto kuwuryo nto mpo kupotyo.
Ripok topon swamet nyepo Yiyintet omnye kyocäm Yiyintet, kunyo mosicisopok om pesyet nyepo letut ye poru ŋalek cepo kosopenyi.
Möce aŋerec om ŋalecoto, nka kot kuroke orirye yawut kuminiŋ om toŋoŋutekwok ce caŋ ce otoŋonyi.

Poru toŋoŋutecoto kule po manta koyenet nyimwoŋ. Muce saput kuwur kupot, ntene cesyeme cepele mata sukuŋet cekäs kule topon. Kunyo yunyoto mpo koyenet nyimwoŋ nyepo latik kupël Saput, misyini cesyem sukuŋet kutitir, sonyoru akwek kakastayet oko woyinto oko koyweyisyet om pesyet nye ciŋoŋu kutok Yesu Kristo.
Ocöme akwek neto nka kot kupuryo kot okäs, Oyeni neto nka kot kupuryo kot oköse yawut; oŋerekyini om ŋerekwek ce caŋ koromun.
Omnye omite onyoru musyaret nyepo koyenemwoŋ, nyoto kukosopotet nyepo mukuleywekwok.
Kosopet nye yunyitenyi kunyo kicenye workoyik koromun oŋnkuŋor kokotutecutecu mosukukonok akwek Yiyintet.

Kiŋor Muyet Nyetilil nyepo Kristo nye kimite wule mite workoyik. Toŋoŋutek ce mosukunyor Kristo oko woyinto nye mosukuco om letut. Ntene kisyem cek kule cinket pesyo ne pesyonoto oŋnku mosukuco kulene.

Kiŋany kuporci Yiyintet workoyik yisyet nye kikwiye cek, kunyo kipuryo kot kupo toponiyet nyimwacek nkit. Yoto kuye kiŋolole cek ŋalek cenöme ŋalecu kwalim akwek yawut kukwane wule mite kiyokik cepo lokoywek ce toponec. Kimwoy cekto ŋalecato om swametap Muyet Nyetilil nye kiciyok om torot. Ŋalecutecu kuce möce mpo malaykanik kule nto cinket.
Kunyo oripkey oŋomekitu om kasoteywekwok, oŋnkokasekey kupeyok ce mosicekonok akwek pesyet nye ciporu Yesu Kristo.
Aywey Yiyintet. Monte kupaytak yec kopurto nyimwoŋ nyepo corokyinotet nyo kyoponte ye kitompo kot osowu.
Möce otililitu om tukuk tokol ce oyiye kuyu wulo tilil Yiyintenyo.
Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule “Misyini otililitu akwek omnye oyiku ani tilil.’’
Okure akwek neto kule Papa ye osome Yiyintet, Yiyintet kunye mutyini piko tokol musankut koyoyec wule yunto yisyet nye kikwiy cito. Kunyo misyini opur koret om aret nye oyweyi neto.
Omnye oŋnket akwek kito nye kikyale sukuŋet cityakenak wule mite soponto nye moponto latik nyo kikonok mpo kukomwoŋ. Kipuryo kot kukiy nye wure kuyu pesya nto Saput.
Kicityacak kyalenak korotikap Kristo ceponto latik. Kicikoyto neto kuyu lekwap kecir nye moponto tisyet nto mpo simnyontet.
Kicekwey Yesu kupoyit ŋalecu kutompo kot citany koret, kunyo kucipor om pesyosyecu po letut kupo toponiyet nyimwakwek.
Kyoyen akwek Yiyintet kupunte wule mite neto. Yiyintet kunye kiŋet neto kotutune met oŋnkukoci woyinto, sonyoru akwek koyenet oko kokenotet om wule mite Yiyintet.

Kunyo yawut omnye kwopukte akwek simnyontet nyepo mukuleywekwok, oŋnkoywey ŋalek cepo manta, oŋnkocämnkey akwek nkit kupoyit manta, kuroke kwek cömisyet nyimwoŋ kiy nye yiyisyi oŋnkucone mukuleywekwok orit.
Kuceyiyok aret nyepo oyeny kupunte ŋolyontet nye sopot nye mopoku nyepo Yiyintet. Kunyo oyiku lekokap Papa nye sope okokoy nye puryo kot kume.
Kuyu wule mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule: “Kerkey piko tokol suswek, kerkey woyinto nyepo cito taptok cepo samiyita! Yamntos suswek, kulelece taptok.
Ntene pure ŋolyontetap Mokoryontet kenyis ce mopoku.’’ Ŋolyontonoto ku lokoywek ce toponec co kicemwowok akwek.
Kunyo awirte onumunekey akwek nkit miyotyonik tokol, oko mwiynanet, oko koperperisyet oko corokyinotet oko cupisyet.
Kuyu lekoy ce rwerun ce möce ceko pate, kuyunyoto mpo akwek roke omäc ceko ce tililec cekwone torot, sukuŋet onerye oŋnkosopce.
Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Kwacemcem akwek nkit tolosyetap Mokoryontet.’’
Kunyo akwa wule mite Mokoryontet nye rwantet nye sopot nye kitay piko kule puryo kot ku topon cetekse, ntene kikwey Yiyintet kule topon.

Akwa akerkeyitu oko rwontok ce ponto soponto oŋnkokany cetektak cetekenak kayta nye tilil nyepo kotap Yiyintet, wule mosoyiyisye akwek kuyu tisik ce tililec cecöme Yiyintet. Punte korosecoto wule mite Yesu Kristo.
Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Akäs mosokoci Siyon rwantet nye kweyan, rwantet nyoto kunye ponto latik koromun, puryo kot kolilone ci tokol nye kacäm neto.

Ponto rwantani latik ce caŋ koromun om wule omite akwek piko co cömisyi; ntene om wule mite piko co puryo kot kucömisyi kucu kule, Rwantet nyo kitoye tekik kule puryo kot kuponto latik kunye kiweckey kwek rwantet nye pële tokol nye tiye koto tapan.’’

Mwowu silutekap Yiyintet yec kule, “Rwantanitenyi kunye noce piko koputis, Kitawet nye mosikonoc piko koputis.’’ Mosicinoc cekto omnye kipuryo kot kuyen ŋolyontet. Kicäm Yiyintet kule kopur cek kuyunyoto.

Ntene oyiku yemet nye kweyat, oyiku tisikap kinko, oyiku yemet nye tilil, oyiku piko cepo Yiyintet ce kicekweyak sukuŋet oporu yisyetap Yiyintet nyepo kakitat. Yiyintet kunye kikurok akwane wule mite menonet kwonyoru lakweyenyi nye cikite.

Kipuryo kot oyiku akwek ikye om pesyosyek alak pikap Yiyintet ce kweyotin, ntene kunyo oyiku yawut pikyi. Kipuryo kot oŋnket akwek ikye wule yunto tolosyetap Yiyintet, ntene kunyo kwonyoru yawut tolosyenyi.
Coronutekwani, osomok ani akwek kuyu pic ce toyek oŋnkuwuwen om koroni! Ntene monte cecäm tukuk ce cöme porto, ce mite kwak kuportos oko soponto.

Möce opurte kopurto nye topon om kwenutap piko co menket Yiyintet. Sukuŋet nka mpo ye kowosontyok akwek kule oyiye miyotyet kuye kukäs cekto yoto yisyonutek ce toponec, oŋnkukasta cek Yiyintet om pesyet nye coni cokumut musankut.
Aywey akwek kamukeywek cepo ci tokol nyewo om kaynetap Mokoryontet. Aywey mpo Kinko nyewo nye pëlisyi om kamukeywek.
Aywey mpo poytoyik ce kikoyok neto cokutaŋany piko ce yiye miyotyet oŋnkokaste piko co yiye ce toponec.
Omnye möce Yiyintet kule akerekte akwek ŋalalet nyepo piko co perper om ŋalek ce toponec ce oyiye.
Möce kule opur kuyu pic ce tyokotin. Monte ciyisye katyakatet nyo oponte kwek siret nye yene miyotyet, ntene opur kuyu mutworik cepo Yiyintet.
Aywey piko tokol, acäm piko cikwok co kikoyen. Aywey Yiyintet oŋnkaywey Kinko nyewo
Möce akwek mutworik aywey mokorenikwok, oŋnkoporci kayweyisyet nyepo manta, nka mpo ye toponec oŋnkutoloyec nto mpo ye wusisyi.
Omnye ye nkete cito kule opontekey Yiyintet oŋnkumuytoci wuyinwek nka mpo ye kopuryo kot kumisyini kunyoru cicitenyi kupeyokap Yiyintet.
Omnye monyoru kakastayat ne, ye komuytoci pirisyet nye misyini, roke onyoru omnye kwalel? Ntene ye kwomuytoci toŋoŋutek omnye kwayiy ŋolyo nyepo manta, mosukukonok Yiyintet kupeyok om ŋolyontonoto.
Kicekurcok akwek ŋolyontonoto. Omnye kitaŋany Yesu Kristo kupo akwek oŋnkupokokwok pelutyet sukuŋet arup akwek neto letut.
Kipuryo kot kwiy neto miyotyo, oŋnkupuryo ŋolyo mpo akenke nyepo mwiynan nye kicone kutinyi.
Kipuryo kot kuwec kucupis ye kicecupe. Kipuryo kot kunyer neto ye kitoŋonye, ntene kikokenekey Yiyintet nye ketintet nyepo manta.
Kristo nkit kunye kikesen miyotyonik kyacek om murtowontet, sukuŋet cepoku acek nye komokyiye miyotyet oŋnkyesopce om ŋalek cepo manta. Kunyo mwayok ceci kuce kisopok akwek.
Kyokerkeyekey akwek kecir ce kipotyi aret nye pete, kunyo kiceketwok kwarup mesewontet oko ripintet nyepo soponwekwok.

Kunyo mpo akwek koruk möce aywey sanikwok. Nteye mite sanikwok alak ce puryo kot kucöme ŋolyontetap Yiyintet, kuye kucömis omnye kakäs cek kopurto nye topon nye oponte akwek. Puryo kot omuci akwek kot omwowu ŋolyo,
omnye mosukukäs cekto wule yunto tililinto oko koyweyisyet nye oponte akwek.
Puryo kot kuroke otase toponiyet nyimwoŋ tukuk ce ciloce, kuyu putek ce kacilet oko sonoyek oko raranik oko sirok.
Möce kuporkey toponiyet kwine nkit om mukuleyto nye paypay nye cone soponto nyepo cito orit. Puryo kot kumite kito nye muce kot kowurta soponto nyoto, oŋnkuponto latik ce caŋ om taytap Yiyintet.
Omnye kikwiy kuyunyoto koruk cepo keny ce kikoyen ce kikenekey Yiyintet. Kitililitu cek kuyunyoto kuywey sanikwa.
Kiyunyoto Sara, omnye kiywey neto Apram omnye kikure, mokoryontenyu. Oyiku akwek yawut tipikyi ye kayiy ŋalek ce toponec nye puryo kot omuye kiy ake.

Mpo akwek Moronik, mocë opurte poypoyet oko korukwok om soponto nyepo kamütisyet. Misyini oŋnket kule puryo kot kuponto cek swamet nye kerkey moronik. Kunyo misyini aywey omnye mosukunyor mpecek tokol kuyu akwek kokotutyet nyepo soponto nye konu Yiyintet. Ayiy kuyunyoto sukuŋet mente kot kukerekta kito ake somset nyimwoŋ.
Ŋolyontet nyepo letut, möce kule oponte akwek tokol kasoteywek ce kerkey, acämnkey akwek nkit kuyu mpo yeya. Möce opoypoyitu akwek kwakwek nkit.
Monte ceyokune miyotyet ake miyotyet ake, nto koyokune cupisyet ake. Ntene möce ayakte osomnci kupeyok, omnye kikurkyok Yiyintet kupeyok ye kikurok.
Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Ye möce cito kule aŋerekyi soponto; oŋnkunyor soponto nye topon, kumöce kurip ŋelyepnyi maŋalal ŋolyo nye miyat, oŋnkuripkey maŋalal kutinyi mwiynan.
Misyini kwasta kuwecekey wule mite miyotyet oŋnkwiy ce toponec, puryo kot kuroke kucas ye cenye kalyet.
Omnye ripe Mokoryontet kuköse piko co toponec, Oŋnkulime somset nye some picoto, Ntene tukyini patay piko co yiye ce miyotec.’’
Ŋo nye muce kowurtak ye omöce akwek kule kyiy ŋalek ce toponec?
Ntene nka mpo ye kotaŋany ye omite oyiye ŋalek cepo manta, kumöce aŋerec monte cemuye piko, monte cisot!
Aywey Kristo om mukuleywekwok, oŋnkokoci kwek Mokoryontemwoŋ. Ayiytekey pesyosyek tokol sukuŋet owekyi ci tokol nye katepenak kule ororwo kokenotet nye oponte akwek.
Ntene möce ayiy kuyunyoto om tolosyet oko koyweyisyet. Möce oponte ŋomnonet nye topon sukuŋet soponto nyimwoŋ nye oponte om Kristo kusutyi kolilonis piko co ŋololenok kwapi.
Topon ye kacetaŋany ye kyiye ce toponec ye möce Yiyintet kule kwiyokis kuyunyoto, kusir ye kakyiy miyotyet.

Omnye kime Kristo nkit kumeci miyotyonik cikwakwek aret akenke oŋnkuwany kupok. Kime cito nye topon kumeci piko ce miyotec, sukuŋet kuntowok akwek ape wule mite Yiyintet. Kicepakäc neto kume met nyepo porto, ntene kotutune met om Muyet.
Kiwo muyenyi nye sopot wokuŋololyi oyik ce kimite mopusitap met.
Oyik cutecu kupo piko co kipuryo kot kuywey Yiyintet ye kimuytocini neto om pesyosyek co kitece Nuwa rapet. Kisopce peko yoto piko ce ŋeri pate ce kipuntoy sisit ce kimite rapet.

Poru pecu patisanet, nto patisanani kunye sopok akwek yawut. Kunyo puryo kot kunumu simnyontet nyepo porto, ntene sopok kurtoyet nye kacemwoy om wule mite Yiyintet kucone mukuleyto nye topon orit. Sopok patisanet kupunte kotutunetap met nyepo Yesu Kristo,
nye kiwo torot, nye mite yawut kukepure yewutap tay nyepo Yiyintet kupoytoy malaykanik tokol oko kamukeywek oko swamet nyepo torot.
Kitaŋany Kristo toŋoŋutek cepo porto, kunyo misyini otitir mpo akwek kuyunyoto oŋnkarup kosoteywekyi, omnye ye kataŋany cito om porto nyenyi, kuye yoto ye komokwiye miyotyet.
Kunyo kuceke yawut kuwo tay, ye tomite koret misyini soponto nyimwoŋ kwek soponto nye poytoy Yiyintet nye puryo kot kupoytok corokyinotet nyepo porto nyepo cito.

Kyawany akwek pesyos ce caŋ co kitil oyiye ŋalek co yiye piko co menket Yiyintet, kyopurtoy soponto nye kyoyiye sakwayanatet oko corokyinotet oko pokitet oko arosyek ce miyotec oko sokwonutek cepo pokitet oko sayet nye miyat nye osoye kerkeyik.
Kunyo kukukite picoto yawut ye puryo kot kukosök akwek opontekey oko cekto om soponto nye miyat nyo yiye cek kucupok akwek.
Ntene mosukuror kumwoy musankut nyepo ŋalek cikwa om taytap Yiyintet nye mosukumutyi musankut piko co kipok oko ce soptos.
Kicemwoci lokoywek ce toponec piko co kipok sukuŋet kopur soponto nyimwa nyepo muyet kuyu wule moktoy Yiyintet, nka kot kicemutyi porwonikwa musankut kuyu piko tokol.
Karik pesyet nye pekune tukuk tokol. Misyini oripkey akwek nkit oŋnkopoypoyitu sukuŋet omuc osome.
Ntene kupëlis möce acämnkey owoŋnkyi akwek kwakwek nkit, omnye yene cömisyet miyotyonik ce caŋ.
Atorockey akwek om korikwok nye puryo kot oŋunyŋunyi.
Kikokoci Yiyintet ci ake tokol om akwek kokotutyet nyenyi nkit, kunyo möce oyiyisye okokoy kuyu ripikap tukuk ce toponec ce kikonok Yiyintet.

Ye ponto ci tokol ŋolyo nye möce kule omwowu, kumisyini kuŋalal ŋolyontet nyepo Yiyintet. Nteye mite cito kukolyoyisyi, kumöce kwiyisye swamet nye kocini Yiyintet neto, sukuŋet cikasta Yiyintet om tukuk tokol kupunte wule mite Yesu Kristo nyo ponto woyinto oko swamet okokoy oko okokoy. Yunyonto.
Coronutekwani, monte cikite mata nyepo mwoninto nyo otoŋonyi, kuyu nye mite kwiyoktos ŋolyo nye monket akwek. Yiyoktos ŋaleca kusyemak akwek.
Ntene möce aŋerec omnye otoŋonyi toŋoŋutek ce kipo Kristo sukuŋet kuyemak ŋerekwek om pesyet nye ciporu woyinto nyenyi.
Möce osutkey kule ceponte kupeyoy ye kacecupok omnye oyiku konomik cepo kristo. Omnye poru ŋalecato kule Muyet Nyetilil nyewo nyoto, kunye Muyet nyepo Yiyintet nye mitowune wule omite akwek.
Puryo kot kuroke kutaŋany ci ake tokol om akwek omnye koporis nto omnye corin nto omnye sokoran, nto omnye wutekey ŋalek cepo piko alak.
Ntene ye yiku Kristoyin oŋnkitaŋany mente alilan, kaste Yiyintet omnye ponte kaynetap Kristo.
Kapunto pesyet kucec musankunek. Mosicenyosye cewosontyi piko cepo Yiyintet. Kunyo ye kacecenec acek, mosiciwaŋnta ra kulene om wule mite piko co puryo kot kucöme lokoywek ce toponec cepo Yiyintet.
Kuyu wulo mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Korom koromun ye mosisop piko ce toponec, kunyo mosukwiyakay kulene om wule mite piko co menket Yiyintet, oko piko co ponto miyotyet?’’
Kunyo piko co toŋonye kuyu wule moktoy Yiyintet, kuce misyini kutosyikey kwiy ŋalek ce toponec oŋnkukenekey Kotoŋintemwa nyo yititoy kurtoyenyi.
Osomwok akwek poyik cepo pikap Yiyintet ce mite wule omite akwek, oŋololi mpo ani kuyu Pontet. Kyakäs toŋoŋutek cepo Kristo, kunyo okeni kule mosonyoru woyinto nye mosiciŋoŋ. Osomwok kule,
oyiku mesewek cepo kecirek cepo Yiyintet ce kicekonok orip. Orip topon kuyu wule moktowok Yiyintet, ntene nye puryo ku kule omnye omöce musyaret, ntene omnye omöce kule kyiy.
Monte cepayte kwapi piko co kicekonok, ntene oporci kopurto nye topon nye kakäsenak.
Nteye kopunto pesyet nye porukey kutok Mesewontet Nyewo, kuye sonyoru mpo akwek musyaret nyepo woyinto nye mopoku.

Kunyo möce aywey mpo akwek, oyiperik poyik cikwok cewoyec. Möce alac akwek tokol siret nyepo tolosyet oŋnkokalyekey yisyonutek. Omnye mwowu silutekap Yiyintet kule, “Toye Yiyintet piko co silekey, ntene oŋnkukoci kupeyok piko co poypoyec.’’
Kunyo opoypoyitu oyem opurune yewutap Yiyintet nye ponto swamet, sukuŋet koŋetak oŋetye om pesyet nye kikwey neto.
Ye osoti koromun, owirci kasoteywekwok coto oponte wule mite neto, omnye ripok.
Okösu oŋnkoripkey! Mite puniyontet nyimwoŋ Setani nyewo nyepo oyik kuwesetoti kutule kuyu ŋetuny kuceŋoti cito nye möce kule atakum ayam.
Okwilokisye om koyenet nyimwoŋ oŋnkotay oyinot cekwol yitik, omnye oŋnket kule mite mpo yeya mwoŋ alake om koret tokol ce mite kutoŋonye toŋoŋutek ce kerkey cikwok.

Ntene om letut kuminiŋ ye kataŋany, mosikusatak Yiyintet nkit nyepo kupeyok tokol nyo kikurok akwek kwonyoru woyinto nye mopoku om koyomotet nye oponte oko Kristo, oŋnkukonok swamet oko kwilatet oŋnkotitirok.
Kopurune swamet wule mite neto okokoy oko okokoy. Yunyoto.

Kosilwok ani parwani nwac kusir wule mite Silifano yeya nye oŋnket oŋnkokenekey. Omöce ani kule akwilak akwek oŋnkomwowok ŋalek cikwani kule kokotutyetap Yiyintet nyitenyi nyepo manta. Okwilokisye koromun om ŋolyontoni.
Kesupayak akwek pikap Yiyintet cepo Papulon ce kikwey Yiyintet mpecek kuyu akwek, oŋnkusupayak werimwani Marko.
Asupaykey akwek nkit om ŋatutet nye poru cömisyet nyepo Kristayek. Kante kopurune kalyet tokol wule omite akwek co opoye Kristo.

Cone parwani wule amite ani Simon Petero, mutworintet oŋnku kiyokintetap Yesu Kristo. Osilwok ani akwek piko ce ponto koyenet nyepo latik nye kerkey nyinyacek. Omnye Yiyintet nyinyacek oko kosopintenyo Yesu Kristo om yisyenyi nyepo manta kunye kikonec acek tokol koyenoni.
Kutosyikey poypoyet oko kalyet kupunte ŋomnonet nye oŋnket Yiyintet oko Kristo Mokoryontenyo.
Kikonec acek swametap Yiyintet tukuk tokol ce cemöce, sukuŋet cipur kopurto nyepo Yiyintet oŋnkyinket Kristo nyo kikurec acek kwocenyoru woyinto nyenyi oko toponiyet.

Om aret nyeyu nyitenyi kuye kikonec kokotutek ce woyec ce toponec ce kikurto, sukuŋet kukalyak akwek kokotutecutecu ocilile arantayet nyepo corokyinotet nye mite koret, oŋnkwonyoru soponto nye kerkey nyepo Yiyintet.
Om ŋolyontoni, kumöce asyem koromun otosyi toponiyet om wule mite koyenet nyimwoŋ, otosyi ŋomnonet om wule mite toponiyet nyimwoŋ.
Otosyi ŋomnonet nyimwoŋ om ripotetapkey, oŋnkotosyi muytocinotet, oŋnket Yiyintet oŋnkotosyi cömisyet nyepo tupcet nye oponte kuyu mpo yeya.
Nto om tupcet kuyu mpo yeya, otosyikey ocäm piko tokol.
Ye oponte akwek kopurto nyeyu nyitenyi nye mite kutosyinikey okokoy, kuye mosukukunok oyiyisye om swamet opoyitu latik oŋnkukonok onyoru ŋomnonet nye yeme om wule mite Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
Ntene korat nye memuce kukästa ci ake tokol nye moponto kopurto nyoto oŋnkiyutye kule kiciwun miyotyonikyi co kipo tay.
Kunyo mpo yeya, asyem oyiyisye swama koromun akwil kursyet nyo kicekurok oko kweyatet nyo kikweyak Yiyintet, puryo kot osutoy akwek mpo kisic ye kayiy kuyunyoto.
Om aret nye yunyoto kuye mosicekonok akwek kamukeywek ce owute poytoyisyet nye mopoku nyepo Mokoryontenyo oŋnku Kosopintenyo Yesu Kristo.
Kunyo mososilwok ani ŋalecutecu okokoy nka kot conket akwek, oŋnkokwilokisye om ŋalek cepo manta ce kyonyoru.
Asoti ani kule ŋolyo nye topon ye kasotwok kulelakitu ŋalecu om kasoteywekwok ye tosope.
Oŋnket kule om pesyos ce ŋeri mosawirte porto nyitenyi nune kuyu wulo kikurtowo kumwowo Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo.
Kunyo mosasyem koromun okonok akwek ye omuci kot osot ŋalecu om pesyosyek tokol ye kamey ani.
Puryo kot kyiyisye acek tyonkocok ye cemwowok kamukeywek cepo ye coni Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo. Kicekäs woyinto nyenyi om konyekyo.
Kicemite acek yeto ye kikocini Yiyintet Papa neto Woyinto oko kakitatet, ye kicone kutit wule mite Yiyintet nyepo woyinto nye kimwoy kule, “Nyi kunye Werimwani Camanet, nye oŋerekyini Koromun!’’
Kicelim acek nkit kutit nyitenyi kucone torot ye kicepontekey acek oko neto om tulwet nyetilil.

Kunyo cikenekey koromun ŋolyontet nye kimwoy workoyik. Mosayiy akwek topon ye kotepe kot alimnte ŋalecato, omnye kerkey ŋaleca oko tarit nye kwenye menonet okoy korir koret, oŋnkukweny mukuleywekwok kokelyet nyepo ye kayec koret.
Ntene nye pëlisyi kunyi, möce oŋnket kule puryo ci nye muce kuror wule yunto ŋorsyet nyepo silutekap Yiyintet.
Omnye puryo kot kumite workoyonti nye kicemwoy kenyis om cömisyet nyepo cito. Ntene kintoci Muyet Nyetilil piko ye kiŋolole lokoywek ce kwone wule mite Yiyintet.

Kuyu wulo kimite mpo keny workoyik ce mwiynec ce kipontokey piko, kuyunyoto mosukutok konetik cepo mwiynanet om wule omite akwek. Mosukusut cek konetisyet nye sutu arantayet nyewo. Mosukutuckey kutay Mokoryontet nye kisope cekto, kunyo mosukusutyikey kwarantakey cek nkit lakwar.
Kunyo mosukurup piko ce caŋ kapurto nyepo picoto miyotec, mosukuŋalale piko kwapi aret nyepo manta kukesac ŋalek ce oyiye akwek.
Om corokyinotet nyimwa kuye mosukunyor latik om wule omite akwek koneticutecu po mwiynan omnye komwowok ŋalek cepo koperperisyo pate. Kicemutyi cek musankut keny, kunyo mite ceyiytoy aranet nyimwa.
Kipuryo kot kusop Yiyintet malaykanik co kikwiye miyotyet, ntene kiwirta kupa tokol wule mite mata nye momise, wule kicerotyi wule mite menonet kukonye pesyet nyepo musankut.

Kipuryo kot kusop Yiyintet koret nyepo keny, ntene kikon peko ce kilum koret nyo kipo piko ce menket Yiyintet. Kisop yoto cito akenke, nyoto ku Nuwa nye kimwoytoy ŋalek cepo manta, wanak oko piko alak tisap.

Kimutyi Yiyintet musankut moŋosyek cepo Sotom oko Komora oŋnkwaranta kupele mata kwek aryantet pate. Kikwiy kuyunyoto sukuŋet kwek kaporunot om wule mite piko co menket Yiyintet kuyu wule mosiciyita cekto om letut.
Kisor Yiyintet Lot omnye ki cito nye topon nye kisenkere miyotyet nyepo sakwayanat nyepo piko ce kiwuryo.
Kiminye Lot wule mite picoto, kunyo kilime oŋnkukäs ŋalek tokol okoy kunerec mukuleynyi nye kitopon om ŋalek ce miyotec ce kikwiye picoto.
Kunyo nkete Yiyintet wule soruntoy piko cepo Yiyintet om wule mite syemutok, oŋnkunket wule mokuripto piko ce miyotec om wule mite toŋoŋutek okoy pesyet nyepo musankut.

Nto piko ce nyoru musankut nyewo kuco rupe corokyinotet nye samis nyepo porwonikwa oŋnkunyil kamukeywekap Yiyintet. Nyikon koromun koneticutecu mwiynot, oŋnkunyilysi nye puryo kot kuyweye cepo torot; cupe pate,
Nka mpo malaykanik co ponto swamet nye pële nyepo picutecu mwiynot kuce puryo kot kucupisyi ye cewosontyini om taytap Mokoryontet.
Kunyo kerkey picutecu oko tyoŋin cepo samiyita ce kicitany kule sicetece oŋnkyepakäce kupok. Cupe tukuk ce puryo kot konket cekto. Mosikyaranta cek kuyu tyoŋin cepo samiyta.

Mosukuyokune ŋalecato toŋoŋutek kupo toŋoŋutek cek kikon cekto. Ŋerekwek ce ponto cekto pate kuye kayiy ye pet kwen ŋolyo nye ŋerece corokyinotet nyepo porwonikwa. Konok kalilan oko sornon ye koyomisye akwek oko cekto, omnye ŋerekyini cek orosyek cepo mwiynanet ye yiye kuyunyoto.

Puryo kot kumöce kule nto cekäs kiy ake tokol, ntene möce kule cekäs pate koruk cemoronisyek. Puryo kot kupoku mucesta ye mokwiy miyotyet. Ntocini cek piko co moponto swamet kupa wule mite musatit! Kicinet mukuleywekwa kucäm corokyinotet. Kicup Yiyintet cekto!
Kikwasta aret nye rotat, kunyo kipotyi aret. Kirup pate aret nye kiwete Palam weritap Peori nyo kicöme pesanik ce kinyor om aret nyepo miyotyet.
Kunyo kicepolyi celel neto om miyotyonikyi. Kiŋalal sikiryet nyenyi nyo moŋolole, kuyu cito okoy kukerekta punmetyontit nyepo workoyontet.
Kerkey picu oko koŋik co kosune peko ce kiteny, kerkey oko polik ce wuse yomet. Kikonorci Yiyintet cekto otepto nyimwa om mwenet orit wule mite menonet.
Ŋolole cek ŋalek cesilekey oŋnkuperperisyi oŋnkwiye corokyinotet nyepo sakwayanatet nyepo porwonik sukuŋet kutec kunäm co kucec kule cemweye wule mite piko co purtoy kopurto nye masat.
Kurtocini cekto piko cut kule monyoru kalyet oŋnkurok yec ku mutworik cekto nkit cepo miyotyet, omnye mutworin cito nyepo tukuk co kipayta cito nyoto.

Kicilile piko miyotyonik ce mite koret kupunte ŋomnonet nyepo Mokoryontenyo oŋnku kosopintet Yesu Kristo; oŋnkuketyikey kupayta yec tukucoto picoto, kuporkey kule mosukuwur soponto nyepo picoto nyepo letut kupël soponto nye kipo tay.
Kitopon nto kipuryo kot konket cek kenyis aret nyepo manta kusir ye kinkoket cek oŋnkuweckey kutay ntarastit nyetilil nye kicikoci.

Tukuk ce kikwiyokis om wule mite cekto kuce poru kule po manta tyonkoconi mwowu kule, “Ketyinikey ŋokit kwam kuŋuŋntak ce keŋuŋu nkit.’’ Mwowu yec kule, “Ketitoykey nkururwet nye kociwun wokomilmile yec sakatyet.’’
Coronutekwani! Parwemwani nyitenyi nyepo oyeny nye kwosilwok akwek. Kwasyem om poronok tukway kule osowu kasoteywek cikwok cepo manta omnye kwasotwok ŋalecu.
Omöce ani asot akwek ŋalek co kiŋalale workoyik cetililec ikye keny oko ntarastit nyepo Mokoryontet oŋnku Kosopintet nyo kimwowok akwek kiyokik.
Nyepo tayta, möce oŋnket kule om pesyosyek cepo letut mosukutok piko alake ce poytoy soponwek cikwa corokyinotet nyepo porwonikwa. Mosukucasenekey akwek kucupok.
Mosukumwoy kule, “Kikurtoci neto cek kule mosaco. Ano yawut? Kipok mpo kukonyacek, kunyo mite kiy ake tokol kuyu wulo kiyunto kuceke kicitany koret!’’
Toye cek macäm ŋalek cepo manta kule kiŋalal Yiyintet ikye keny, yoto citany wulin po torot oko ŋony. Kitanyakay koret kucone wule mite peko om kwenutap peko.
Kunyo peko mpo yec kuce kiyin kwaranta koret nye kipo tay.
Ntene ŋolyontetap Yiyintet nyoto akenke kunye mite kuripe koret nyi mite yawut, sukuŋet kyarante koret mata nye loye. Cemite ceripe okoy pesyet nye mosicemutyine musankut piko co miyotec oŋnkyaranta.
Coronutekwani! Ntene monte ceyutye ŋolyontoni akenke kule, kerkey pesyet akenke oko kenyisyek elifut akenke om wule mite Mokoryontet, oŋnkukerkey kenyisyek alifut akenke oko pesyet akenke.

Puryo kot kwiye Yiyintet möt ŋolyo nye kikurto kuyu wulo sotitoy piko alake, ntene muytocini om wule omite akwek, omnye puryo kot kumöce kule kupot ci ake tokol, ntene möce kule kurenyenkey ci tokol kwasta miyotyonik.

Ntene mosukuco pesyetap Mokoryontet kuyu corin. Om pesyonoto kuye mosukupot wulin po torot om karumnta nyewo koromun. Mosukulayo kupotyo kokelik om torot om mata nye loye, oŋnkupot koret oko kiy ake tokol nye mite orit.
Kunyo ye kacaranta tukuk tokol ce mite koret kuyunyitenyi, mosoyeku akwek piko ceyune? Misyini kutililitu soponwekwok oŋnkoywey Yiyintet,
omite okonye pesyetap Yiyintet. Asyem koromun sukuŋet kuco lakwar. Pesyet nyoto kuye mosicepël wulin po torot oŋnkyaranta kuloy kupotyo kokelik om torot om mata nye loye.
Ntene cekonye acek ce kikurto Yiyintet, coto ku koret nyelel nyepo torot oko koret nyelel nyepo ŋony, wule mosukopurune toponiyet nyepo tililinto.
Kunyo coronutekwani, ye omite okonye pesyonoto, kumöce asyem opur otililitu nye moponte lelis om taytap Yiyintet oŋnkopurte kalyet oko neto.
Akäse muytocinotet nyepo Mokoryontet kuyu poroyinto nye kikonok akwek sukuŋet cisopok kuyu wulo kisilwok akwek yeyanyo Paulo kwiyisye ŋomnonet nye kiŋoŋnkyi Yiyintet.

Ŋalecutecu kuce mwowu neto om poronokyi tokol ye sile ŋalek ce nöme ŋolyontoni. Mite ŋalek cewuyec ce mite poronokyi. Ŋolole piko co perper ce puryo kot kukwilotin kwiyisye mwiynanet kuyu wulo mostoy cek mpo ŋalek alak cepo silutekap Yiyintet. Kunyo mokwarantakey cek nkit.
Ntene akwek coronutekwani, kicisowok akwek keny ŋalecutecu, kunyo oripkey sukuŋet mente kot kumasak piko co yirye ntarastinek okoy otay aret nyimwoŋ nye kwilat nyepo manta.
Ntene otosyikey onerye om poypoyet oko ŋomnonet nye oŋnket Mokoryontenyo oŋnku Kosopintet Yesu Kristo. Kopurune woyinto wule mite neto kuceke yawut oko okokoy okoy okokoy. Yunyoto.
Cesilwok acek ŋalek ce nöme ŋolyontet nyepo soponto nye kimite kuceke towunot. Kicelim oŋnkyekäs acek om konyekyacek kirotote, oŋnkyename yewuniyekyo.
Ciŋoŋ cipor soponto okoy cekäs acek, ce nöme soponto nye mopoku nye kiciporwec nye mitowune wule mite Papa.
Kunyo cemwowok acek akwek kito nye kicekäs oŋnkyelim, sukuŋet oyomekey akwek oko acek om koyomotet nye ceponte acek oko Papa oko Werinyi Yesu Kristo.
Cesilwok acek ŋalecu sukuŋet kuyemec ŋerekwek.
Kunyo ŋolyontet nye kicelim acek kucone wule mite Werinyi nye cemwowok acek kunyi kule, Yiyintet kunye lakweyet, puryo kot kumite menonet mpo kisic om wule mite neto.
Kunyo ye kacemwowu kule ceponte koyomotet oko Yiyintet oŋnkurok yec cemite wule mite menonet, kuporkey kule coperperisyi pate om ŋalek ce cemwowu oko yisyet nye kyiye.
Ntene ye kicipurte lakweyet, kuyu wulo ponto neto lakweyet kuye mosicipurte acek koyomotet kwacek nkit, yoto kuye mosukowunec korotikap Werinyi Yesu kunum miyotyonik tokol.
Ye kacemwowu acek kule moceponte miyotyo, kaciperperkey acek nkit oŋnkupuryo kot ceponte ŋalek cepo manta.
Ntene ye kacerenynkey cemwoci Yiyintet miyotyonikyo, mosukukalyec oŋnkuwunec om wule mite miyotyonik tokol, omnye Yiyintet kunye po manta oŋnkwiye ŋalek cepo manta ce toponec okokoy.
Ye kacemwowu kule mnakyiy kutoku kule kociperperisye oŋnkuporkey kule puryo kot kumitowune ŋolyontetap Yiyintet wule cemite acek.
Lekokwani, kosilwok ani ŋalecu sukuŋet mente kot ayiy miyotyo. Ntene ye kotepe kot kwiy citake miyotyo, ceponte Yesu Kristo nye mite kuyetyewec acek om wule mite Papa.
Yesu Kristo nkit kunye aret nye cikolyenec acek miyotyonikyo, nye puryo kot ku miyotyonik cicacek nkit pate, ntene oko mpo miyotyonik cepo koret tokol.
Ye kacerup ntarastinekap Yiyintet kuye sukuporkey kule cinket acek neto kupoyit manta.
Ye kotepe kot kumwoy citake kule, oŋnket Yiyintet, oŋnkurok yec kupuryo kurupe cicoto ntarastinek cepo Yiyintet, kuporkey kule mwiyny cico oŋnkupuryo kot koponto ŋalek cepo manta.
Ntene ci ake tokol nye rupe ŋolyontet nyepo Yiyintet kunye cito nyo nye kicäm Yiyintet kuwoŋnkyi.
Ye komwoy citake kule opoye Yiyintet kumisyini kurup cicoto kopurto nye kipo Kristo.
Coronutekwani, puryo kot osilwok ani ntarastit nyelel, ntene ntarastini kunye po keny nye kyolim akwek kuceke keny. Ntarastit nyepo keny ku lokoywek co kyolim ikye.

Ntene yec ntarastit nyi osilwok ani kunye lel, nto ŋalek cepo manta ce mite ntarastini kunye ceköse kule mitowune wule mite Kristo oko wule omite akwek. Omnye mite kutile menonet kunyo mite koluwu yawut lakweyet.
Ye komwoy citake tokol kule oponte lakweyet oŋnkurok yec kusenkere cicoto yeyanyi kutokumite cito nyoto wule mite menonet okoy mpo pantanyi.
Ci ake tokol nye cöme yeyanyi kunye ponto nyo lakweyet oŋnkupuryo kot kuponto kiy nye muce kusokyi citake kwiy miyotyet.
Ntene mitowune menonet wule mite ci ake tokol nye senkere yeyanyi, wesetote cicoto menonet orit oŋnkupuryo kot konkete wule weti, omnye kikokor menonet konyek ceci.
Osilwok ani akwek lekokwani, omnye cikolyoy miyotyonikwok om kaynetap Kristo.
Osilwok ani akwek mpo Papa, omnye oŋnket akwek neto nye kimite kuceke towunot. Osilwok ani akwek oyiperik omnye kyopël akwek oyinot cekwol yitik!

Kosilwok ani kwek lekok omnye oŋnket akwek Papa. Kosilwok ani akwek mpo papa, omnye oŋnket akwek neto nye kimite kuceke towunot. Kosilwok ani akwek oyiperik, omnye oponte akwek swamet oŋnkumitowune Yiyintet wule omite akwek, kunyo kyopël akwek oyinot cekwol yitik.
Monte cecäm koret nto mpo tukuk ce mite koret. Ye kacäm citake koret, kupuryo kot kumitowune cömisyetap Papa wule mite neto nyoto.

Om kiy ake tokol nyepo koret, kuyu corokyinotet nyepo miyotyet, oko tukuk ce köse piko oŋnkumäc, oko tukuk tokol cepo koroni ce silekey piko, kuce puryo kukwone tukucoto mpo akenke wule mite Papa, ntene kwone pate koret.
Mite kupote koret oko kiy ake tokol nye corokyini piko. Ntene musukusop okokoy cito nye yiye yisyet nye möce Yiyintet.
Lekokwani, karik ye ŋete koret! Kicemwowok akwek kule musukuco puniyontet nyepo Kristo; kutok yawut punikap Kristo ce caŋ, kunyo cinketi kule karik ye ŋete koret.
Kipuryo kot kupo picu luket nyinyacek, nto kipure wule cemite acek, kunyo kipete cek wule cemite acek sukuŋet kuporkey kule puryo kot kupo cek luket nyinyacek.
Ntene kiŋapenak Kristo Muyet Nyetilil, kunyo oŋnket ŋalek cepo manta.

Kosilwok ani akwek nye puryo kot ku kule omnye monket akwek ŋalek cepo manta, ntene omnye oŋnket akwek ŋalecato po manta, oŋnkonket mpo kule puryo ŋolyo nyepo mwiynan nye muce kenyis kucone wule mite ŋalek cepo manta.
Kunyo ŋo nye mwiyn? Cito nyoto kunyo toye kumwowu kule Yesu kunye puryo kot ku Kristo. Cito nyoto kunye puniyontet nyepo Kristo. Toye cico Papa oko Werit.
Omnye ci ake tokol nye katay Werit kukatay mpo cicoto Papa. Nto ci ake tokol nye kacäm Werit, kupontokey cicoto mpo oko Papa.
Kunyo orip topon om mukuleywekwok lokoywek co kyolim akwek keny. Ye korip akwek ŋalek co kyolim kuceke keny, kuye mosopurte koyomotet oko Werit oko Papa.
Kito nye kikurtowec acek Kristo nkit ku soponto nye mopoku.
Kosilwok ani ŋalecu ce nöme piko co syem kule cemasak akwek.

Ntene akwek nkit kuce kiŋapenak Kristo Muyet Nyetilil. Ye tokopurune Muyet Nyetilil wule omite akwek, kupuryo kot omöce akwek citake nye kenetak. Omnye nete Muyet Nyetilil ŋolyo ake tokol, oŋnku ŋolyo nyepo manta ŋolyo ake tokol nye nete neto nye puryo mwiynan. Kunyo arup konetisyet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil oŋnkopurune wule mite Kristo.
Kunyo lekokwani, opurune wule mite Kristo cekwilokisye om pesyet nye cone neto nye puryo kot ceponte kalilan nye cewunyekey.
Oŋnket akwek kule po manta Kristo, kunyo misyini oŋnket kule ci tokol nye yiye ŋalek ce toponec kunye lekwetap Yiyintet cito nyoto.

Akäs pa, kicämec acek Papa koromun! Cemosi koromun cömisyet nyenyi, sukuŋet cekurenec lekokyi. Kunyo ciku lekokyi cepo manta. Kunyi kito nye kisac sukuŋet menketec acek koret, omnye kipuryo kot konket koret Yiyintet.

Coronutekwani, ciku acek yawut lekokap Yiyintet, ntene puryo kot cipor kutok topon wule mosicipurte. Cinket acek kule pesyet nye toku Kristo kuye mosicekerekeyitu oko neto, omnye mosicekäs wule yunto neto nkit.
Ci ake tokol nye kosekey Kristo kunye misyini kutililkey kuyu wule tilil Kristo.
Ci ake tokol nye yiye miyotyet, kunye ponto lelisto nye kokwiri ntarastinekap Yiyintet, omnye ye kakyiy miyotyet kukerkey nye kokyiri ntarastit.
Oŋnket akwek kule kico Kristo, sukuŋet kunum miyotyonik cepo piko, oŋnkonket kule puryo kot kuponto neto miyotyo.
Kunyo puryo kot kwiye miyotyo ci ake tokol nye ponto soponto nyepo Kristo, ntene ci ake tokol nye kotosyikey kwiye miyotyet kunye tompo kot kukäs nto mpo konket cicoto neto.
Lekocu! Mente kot kumasak citake. Po manta ci tokol nye yiye ŋalek ce toponec.
Nto cito nye tosyinikey kwiye miyotyet kupo cito nyoto Setani nyewo nyepo oyik, omnye kikwiy Setani nyewo nyepo oyik miyotyet kuceke towunot. Kunyo kico Weritap Yiyintet wule mite neto cicoto.
Puryo kot kwiye miyotyet omnye kikwek lekwetap Yiyintet.

Ŋalek ce poru kupoyit manta pciyatet om wule mite lekok cepo Yiyintet oko cepo Setani nyewo nyepo oyik kucu kule, ci tokol nye puryo kot kwiye ŋalek cepo manta nto nye puryo kot kucöme yeyanyi kunye puryo kot ku lekwetap Yiyintet cito nyoto.
Lokoywek ce kyolim akwek kuceke keny kucu kule, misyini cecämnkey acek kwacek nkit.

Puryo kot kuroke cekerkeyitu acek oko Kain nye kipo oyinot cekwol yitik, omnye kipar mutakwam. Omne sukupar Kain mutakwam? Omnye kikwiy neto tukuk ce puryo kot kupo manta, ntene kwiy mutakwam tukuk ce kipo manta.
Kunyo mpo yeya, monte cikite ye kotepe kot kusenkerak koret.
Kicinket acek kule kicekwane met oŋnkyekwa wule mite soponto, cinket kuyunyoto omnye cecöme acek mpo yeyanyo. Ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kucömisyi, kuminye nyo wule mite met.
Porin ci tokol nye senkere yeyanyi, kunyo oŋnket akwek kule, puryo kot kuponto ci nye porin soponto nye mopoku.
Kito nye porwec cömisyet kunyi, kikoyto Yesu soponto nyenyi kumecec acek. Kunyo misyini cikoyte mpo acek soponwek cico cepokyi mpo yeya!
Ye mokoryo citake nye ponto tukuk ce caŋ oŋnkuköse yeyanyi nye moponto kiy oŋnkurok kutukyi yeyanyi patay, komuce cicoto kulene kumwoy kule ocöme Yiyintet om mukuleynyi?
Lekokwani, puryo kot kuroke kwek cömisyet nyinyecak ŋalek ce ceŋololi pate, ntene misyini kwek cömisyet nyepo manta nye poru yisyet nye kyiye.
Kunyo ye kakyiy yisyet nyeyunyitenyi kuye sicinket kule cepoye acek manta, oŋnkyekwilokisye om taytap Yiyintet.
Ye komutwec acek mukuleywekyo musankut, kunyo cinket kule nyewo Yiyintet kupël mukuleywek kyacek oŋnkunket kiy ake tokol.
Kunyo Coronutekwani, ye puryo kot kumutwec acek mukuleywekyo musankut, kuye ceponte titiret om taytap Yiyintet.
Oŋnkyenyoru acek kiy ake nye kucesom, omnye cerupe ntarastinyi oŋnkyiye ŋalek ce ŋerekyini neto.
Ntarastit nye kikonec kunyi kule ciyen acek kaynetap Werinyi Yesu Kristo oŋnkyecämnkey acek nkit kuyu wulo kimwowec neto.
Ye karup ci ake tokol ntarastitap Yiyintet kopurune Yiyintet wule mite neto. Cimuci acek cinket kulene kule mitowune Yiyintet wule cemite acek? Cinket omnye porwec Muyet Nyetilil nye kikonec neto.

Coronutekwani, monte ciyen ŋalek cepo piko tokol ce sutekey kule ceponte Muyet Nyetilil, ntene asyem okoy oŋnket kule cone Muyet nye ponto picoto wule mite Yiyintet. Omnye kuseretyi koret wulyo tokol workoyik cepo mwiynanet.
Ye sonket akwek kule cöne Muyet nyoto wule mite Yiyintet kuye kaŋalal cito kupor kule; kico Yesu koret kuyu cito.
Nto ci tokol nye kotoyis macäm kuyunyoto kunye puryo kot koponto cito nyoto Muyet nyepo Yiyintet oŋnkupuniyontet nyewo nyepo Kristo nyo kyolim akwek kule musukuco. Kunyo mite yawut koret.
Lekokwani, opoye akwek Yiyintet kunyo kyopël workoyik co mwiynec, omnye Yiyintet nyo mitowune wule omite akwek kunye ponto swamet nyewo kupël puniyontet nyewo nyepo Kristo nye mite koret.
Ŋolole workoyik cepo mwiynanet ŋalek cepo koret, kunyo limncini koret ŋalek, omnye po cekto koret.

Ntene cepoye acek Yiyintet. Limwec acek ci ake tokol nyepo Yiyintet. Puryo kot kulimwec acek ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kupo Yiyintet om aret nye yunyitenyi kuye sicinket acek pciyatet nyepo Muyet Nyetilil nyepo manta oko nyepo mwiynanet.
Coronutekwani! Akany cecamnkey acek kwacek nkit, omnye cone cömisyet wule mite Yiyintet. Lekwatap Yiyintet ci ake tokol nye ponto cömisyet oŋnkunket Yiyintet.
Puryo kot kunket cito nye moponto cömisyet Yiyintet, omnye Yiyintet kunye cömisyet,
Kiporwec Yiyintet cömisyet nyenyi, omnye kiyok Werinyi nye akenke kuco koret sukuŋet cenyoru acek soponto kupunune wule mite neto.
Cömisyet kunyi kule, kipuryo kot ku kule omnye kicecäm acek Yiyintet ntene omnye kicämec acek oŋnkuyok Werinyi sukuŋet kwek korosyontet nyepo miyotyonik cicacek.
Coronutekwani, ye kicämec acek Yiyintet kuyunyoto, kunyo misyini cecämnkey mpo acek kwacek nkit.
Puryo ci nye kikäs Yiyintet kenyis. Kunyo ye kacecämnkey acek kwacek nkit, kuye sukopurune Yiyintet wule cemite acek oŋnkwitita cömisyenyi om wule cemite acek.
Cinket kule cemitowune acek wule mite Yiyintet, oŋnkumitowune neto wule cemite acek, omnye kikonec Muyet Nyetilil.
Kicekäs acek kunyo cemwocini piko alak kule kiyok Papa Werinyi cokwek kosopintet nyepo koret.
Ye ketor citake tokol kumwoy kule Yesu kunye Weritap Yiyintet, kopurune Yiyintet wule mite cito nyoto oŋnkopurune cicoto wule mite Yiyintet.

Cinket acek nkit cömisyet nye ponto Yiyintet om wule cemite, kunyo kicecämec. Yiyintet ku cömisyet, nto ci tokol nye ponto cömisyet kunye mitowune cicoto wule mite Yiyintet oŋnkopurune Yiyintet wule mite cicoto.
Kikyiy kwitita kunyol cömisyet om wule cemite acek sukuŋet cetitir om pesyet nyepo musankut, omnye kerkey soponnwek cicacek om koroni oko nyepo Kristo.
Puryo kot kumite muyotet om wule mite cömisyet. Kwete cömisyet nye kinyol muyotet ake tokol. Kunyo puryo kot kunyolu cömisyet om wule mite cito nye muye, omnye sutu muyotet toŋoŋutek.
Cecömisyi acek, omnye kinyosyo Yiyintet kucämec acek.

Ye komwoy, citake kule, “Ocöme Yiyintet.’’ Oŋnkurok yec kusenker yeyanyi, kokwek cicoto mwiyn. Omnye puryo kot komuce neto kucäm Yiyintet nyo tompo kot kukase konyekyi ye puryo kot kucöme yeyanyi nye köse konyekyi.
Kunyo ntarastit nye kikonec acek Kristo kunyi kule, Misyini ci nye cöme Yiyintet kucäm mpo yeyanyi.
Lekwetap Yiyintet ci ake tokol nye yene kule Yesu kunye ŋapanet. Nto ci ake tokol nye cöme Papa kucöme mpo lekwenyi.
Aret nye sicinket kule cecöme acek lekokap Yiyintet kuye kacecäm Yiyintet oŋnkyerup ntarastinekyi.
Cömisyet nye cëcöme acek Yiyintet kunye poru kule cerupe ntarastinekyi, Puryo kot ku wuyec ntarastinekyi om wule cemite acek.
Omnye ci ake tokol nye lekwetap Yiyintet kunye kukupël koret. Cimuce acek kot cipël koret om koyenenyo nye ceponte.
Ŋo nye muce kupël koret? Cito nyoto kunye yene kule Yesu kunye Weritap Yiyintet.

Yesu kunye cito nye kico, kiconto peko cepo patisanenyi oko korotik cepo met nyenyi. Kipuryo kot kuconto peko nkit pate, ntene kiconto peko oko korotik. Kunyo Poru Muyet Nyetilil kule po manta ŋalecu.
Mite muncururwanik somoku.
Coto ku Muyet Nyetilil oko peko oko korotik, kunyo yicintos cutecu ku somok.
Ye cecäme acek kule manta ŋalek ce mwowu piko, ntene woyec kupëlis ŋalek ce mwowu Yiyintet. Kimwoy Yiyintet ŋalek ce nöme Werinyi.
Kunyo ponto ci tokol nye cöme Yiyintet ŋalecu om moyenyi. Ntene ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kuyene Yiyintet kunye mwiyn, omnye puryo kot kucäm ŋalek ce kimwoy Yiyintet ce nöme Werinyi.
Ŋalek cepo Yiyintet cepo manta kucu kule, kikonec acek neto soponto nye mopoku, kunyo mitowune soponto nyoto wule mite Werinyi.
Ponto soponoto ci ake tokol nye kupoyit Werit oŋnkupuryo kot kuponto soponoto ci ake tokol nye puryo kot kupontokey Werit.
Osilwok ani ŋalecu akwek piko co cöme kaynetap Werit nyepo Yiyintet sukuŋet oŋnket kule ceponte soponto nye mopoku.
Cikenekey acek neto, omnye cinket kupoyit manta kule limwec ye kocesom kiy ake tokol kuyu wulo moktoy neto.
Nteye cinket acek kule limwec okokoy ye kacesom ku yoto ye cinketi mpo yec kule cenyoru kiy ake tokol nye kacesom acek neto.

Ye kakäs citake tokol kwiye yeyanyi miyotyet nye puryo kot kupo ŋokis, kuroke kusomnci Yiyintet sukuŋet kunyor cicoto soponto. Nöme ŋalecu piko co puryo kot kwiye miyotyet nyepo ŋokis. Mite miyotyet ye sutu met, kunyo puryo kot omwowok ani kule osom Yiyintet om miyotyet nyeyunyo.
Miyotyo ye kakyiy ŋolyo ake tokol nye miyat, ntene kumite miyotyet nye puryo kot kupo ŋokis.
Cinket acek kule puryo kot kumite lekwetap Yiyintet nye tosyinikey kwiye miyotyet, omnye ripe Yiyintet neto topon, oŋnkupuryo kot komuce kowurta oyinoto neto nyoto.
Cinket kule cepoye acek Yiyintet nka kot kupoytoy oyinoto cekwol yitik koret tokol.

Cinket kule kico Weritap Yiyintet, kunyo kikonec ŋomnonet sukuŋet cinket Yiyintet nyepo manta. Mitowune soponnwek cicacek wule mite Yiyintet nyepo manta oko wule mite Werinyi Yesu Kristo. Nyitenyi kunye Yiyintet nyepo manta, nyitenyi kunye soponto nye mopoku.
Lekokwani, oripkey akwek topon om wule mite yiyinwek cepo mwiynan!
Ani nyo Pontet, osilyini parwani Cepyosyet nye kikwey Yiyintet oko lekokyi ce ocöme ani kupoyit manta. Puryo kot ku ani nkit nye ocöme, ntene oŋnkucöme mpo piko tokol ce nkete ŋalek cepo manta.
Omnye mosukopurune ŋalek cepo manta wule cemite acek. Mosicipurte okokoy okoy okokoy.
Kante kukonec acek Yiyintet nye Papa oko Werinyi Yesu Kristo poypoyet oko cömisyet oko kalyet. Kante kopur soponnwek kyacek ŋaleca kupoyit manta om cömisyet.
Kyanyoru ani ŋerekwek ce caŋ koromun yu kowo oŋnket kule purtoy lekok cekuk alake ŋalek cepo manta kuyu wulo kimwowec acek Papa.
Kunyo, cepyos puryo kot osiluŋ ani nyi yawut ntarastit nyelel, ntarastit nyitenyi kunye po keny nye mwowu kule misyini cecämnkey acek kwacek nkit.

Cömisyet nyi oŋolole ani kunye poru kule misyini cipurte acek kopurto kuyu wule yunto ntarastinekap Yiyintet. Ntarastit nye kyolim akwek kuceke keny kunyi mwowu kule, misyini opurte akwek tokol cömisyet.
Mite piko kaperperik ce caŋ ce kuseretyi koret, picoto kuce puryo kot kucöme kule kico Yesu Kristo kuyu cito. Cito nye mwowu kuyunyoto kunye perperisyi oŋnku puniyontet nyewo nyepo Kristo.
Kunyo oripkey akwek mente kupotwok tukuk cepo yisyet nye kyayiy sukuŋet onyoru musyaret nye yemok.
Ci ake tokol nye weti tay kot kukeyte konetisyet nyepo Kristo, kunye moponto cito nyoto Yiyintet. Nto ci nye ripe konetisyenyi kunye pontokey nyoto Papa oko Werit.
Kunyo ye kaco ci ake tokol wule omite akwek nye puryo kot kusutu konetisyet nyitenyi, monte cetoroc cico kuco korikwok, monte mpo cisupay.
Omnye ci ake tokol nye kesupay kunye yicintos oko neto om ŋalek ce miyotec ce yiye.
Oponte ani ŋalek ce caŋ ce omöce kule omwowok akwek, ntene puryo kot omoce kule osilunenok karatasit oko winet, ntene mosoco ani okoy kwoceŋalal kuyemec om ŋerekwek.
Kesupayiŋ lekokap cekwomet nye kikwey Yiyintet. Kesupayiŋ koromun.
Ani nyo Pontet, Osilyini parwani Kayo nye ocöme kupoyit manta
Arenyo corwenyu. Osome ani kule roke pur topon om kiy ake tokol, oŋnkosom kule roke purte nyi soponto nyepo porto kuyu wulo ponte soponto nye topon om mukuleyto nyeŋuŋ.
Kyaŋerec ani koromun omnye kukwa mpo yeya oŋnkukwomwoy kule ponte nyi koyenet nye kwilat nyepo ŋalek cepo manta. Omnye purtoy nyi ŋalek cepo manta.
Puryo ŋolyo nye ŋereco ani kupël ye kalim kule purtoy lekokwani kapurto nyepo manta.
Corwenyu, ponte nyi koyenet nyewo koromun om yisyet nye yicini mpo yeya, nko mpo toyek.
Kiŋalaleniŋ nyi cekto topon om wuli om taytap pikap Yiyintet. Kunyo kalye nyi cekto kutosyikey kupa tay om aret nye ŋerece Yiyintet.
Omnye kucäm cek kule cipe tay om yisyet nyepo Kristo nye puryo kot kumöce kule cenyoru kokolyoyisyet nye cone wule mite piko co puryo kot kuyen.
Kunyo cikalye acek piko ceyucutecu sukuŋet ciyomekey tokol oŋnkyiy yisyet nyepo manta.
Kyosilyi parwet pikap Yiyintet, ntene Tiotrepe nye möce kule oyiku kantoyintet nyimwa kunye puryo kot kulime ŋalek cicacek.

Kunyo ye kaco ani kuye mosoporwok ŋalek ce miyotec ce cikite cepo mwiynan ce ŋolonenec acek. Ntene puryo kot kwiy pate ŋalek coto, puryo mpo kot kutoroce mpo yeya ye kakwa, oŋnkukerektoy mpo yeya alak ce möce kule ceŋerekyi picoto oŋnkusyem kule cekwet picoto kupete wule mite pikap Yiyintet.
Corwenyu, mente arup kiy ake tokol nye miyat, ntene rup muste kiy nye topon. Ci ake tokol nye yiye ce toponec kunye po nyoto Yiyintet.
Ŋolole ci tokol topon Temetrio, poru mpo ŋalek cepo manta wule yunto neto. Cetosyini mpo acek kule topon neto, kunyo nketi kule cemwowu acek ŋalek cepo manta.
Oponte ŋalek ce caŋ ce omöce kule omwowok akwek, ntene puryo kot omöce kule oyiyisye kalamut oko winet.
Asoti ani kule mosakasiŋ lakwar, kunyo yoto kuye mosiceŋalal tukway.
Opurte kalyet, Kesupayiŋ coronutekuk ce mite wuli. Osupoywec coronutek cicacek tokol.

Cone parwani wule mite Yuta, nye mutworintetap Yesu Kristo oŋnku mutakwametitap Yakopo. Osilwok akwek piko co kikur Yiyintet, piko coto kuce kikopurto cömisyetap Yiyintet Papa oko ripset nyepo Yesu Kristo.
Kante opurte akwek kuyemak kokolyoyisyet oko kalyet oko cömisyet.

Coronutekwani, kwasyem koromun kule osilwok ŋalek ce nöme kosopotet nyo ceponte acek tokol okoy asot kule misyini otitirok akwek yawut sukuŋet oporyeci koyenotet nyo kikokoci Yiyintet kowoŋnkyi pikyi.

Omnye kukwa piko alake kucorkey okoy kwokowut wule omite akwek. Piko coto kuco wece lokoywek ce nöme poypoyetap Yiyintenyo sukuŋet kwiy ŋalekwa cepo sakwayanat oŋnkutay cekto Yesu Kristo nye konetintenyo oŋnku Mokoryontenyo nye akenke pate. Kiŋor silutekap Yiyintet ikye keny musankut nye mosukunyor cekto.
Amöce ani kule osotwok akwek ŋalek alak ce kyonket tokol. Ŋalecato kuco kisope Mokoryontet Yiyintet kusor piko kukwane Misiri oŋnkwaranta om letut piko co kipuryo kot kuyen neto.

Amöce ani mpo yec kule osotwok ŋalek ce nöme malaykanik co kipuryo kot kurip wule ŋete kamukeywek cikwa, yoto kwasta wule kiminye. Kirate Yiyintet cek nyororonik om wule mite menonet nyepo okokoy sukuŋet cewosontyi ye kopunto pesyet nyewo.
Asot pa Sotom oko Komora moŋosyek ce kilekitec, kuce kikwiy mpecek sakwayanatet; kunyo kinyor toŋoŋutek om wule mite mata nye momise sukuŋet kwek kasowunot om wule mite piko tokol.
Om aret nye kerkey mpo nyoto, kunye ponto piko cutecu ŋoŋutok ce wece cek sukuŋet kwiy miyotyet kowurta porwonik cikwa. Nyile kamukeywek cepo Yiyintet, cupe cek cewoyec ce mite torot.

Nka mpo malayket nyewo Mikael om tintenotet nye kiponto oko Setani nyewo nyepo oyik om ŋalek ce nöme kule ŋo nye mosut musto nyepo Moses. Kipuryo kot kusyem Mikael kule acup Setani nyewo nyepo oyik, ntene kimwoy pate kule, “Kuwosontyiŋ Yiyintet.’’
Ntene cupe picutecu tukuk ce puryo mpo kot konkete cek nkit, nto mpo tukuk co nket kuyu wulo nketitoy tyoŋik cepo samiyita, kuce tukuk coto ce wurtoy kwaranta cekto.

Mite picoto kwapi koromun! Kurup cek aret nyo kirupe Kain. Kukukoytokey cek nkit kurup aret nyepo leliswek kuyu wulo kikwiyta Palam. Kwesokyi cekto pesanik. Kutoyis kuyu wulo kitoyisyi Kora, kunyo kukwaran kuyu Kora.

Kerkey cek simnyontet nye kilekenit om omikwok cepo sakwetap koyomotet. Omisye cekto mesanikwok nye moponto kalilan. Sötekey cek nkit pate. Kerkey oko polik co sute yomet ntene onkupuryo kot kuropene. Kerkey ketik ce puryo kot kwiye omik, kuyu ketik cepo yo karik kwek kemey koret ce kicikor oŋnkuyom.
Kerkey cekto peko cepo ruretyet ce wuse yomet om ŋalekwa cepo kililan cetoku kuyu pukantet. Kerkey cekto oko kokelik ce mutukey ce kiyiytoci Yiyintet otepto nye mite wule mite menonet nye tuyi.
Enok nye mucokoretap Atam, pinta nyepo tisap nyepo Atam kunye kiŋor ŋalecu nöme cek kumwoy kule, “Akäs! Kaco Mokoryontet oko malaykanikyi ce tililec
ce caŋ cokuwosontyi piko tokol. Oŋnkumutyi musankut piko ce menkete Yiyintet ce ponto miyotyonik om yisyonutekwa ce miyotec ce kikwiy, oko om ŋalek tokol ce miyotec ce kiŋalale cekto neto kwapi.’’

Picutecu kuce ŋunyŋunye kwak oŋnkureny piko alak. Rupe pate corokyinotet nye miyat nyepo porwonik cikwa. Sutekey kuŋalal ŋalek cepo silotet oŋnkuperper piko alak kule sukuŋet cenyoru aret nye möce cekto nkit.
Ntene akwek coronutekwani, möce asot ŋalek co kimwowok kiyokikap Mokoryontet Yesu Kristo.
Kimwowok kule, “Ye kopunto pesyosyek nyepo letut, mosukutok piko ce kencururok, piko coto kuce puryo kot kopunto tini, ntene rupe pate corokyinotet nyepo porwonik cikwa nkit.’’
Picutecu kuce sutu pciyatet. Kipayta picutecu corokyinotet nye kiceyito nye puryo kot kupo Muyet Nyetilil.
Ntene akwek coronutekwani, möce onerye akwek nkit om koyenet nye tilil koromun, oŋnkosom om swamet Muyet Nyetilil.
Misyini opurte akwek nkit cömisyet nyepo Yiyintet, oŋnkoken soponto nye mopoku nye mosukukonok Mokoryontenyo Yesu Kristo om kokolyoyisyenyi.
Mite piko alake ce mocömntoy topon, oporci piko coto poypoyet,
Oporci yec piko alak poypoyet nye oripkey, ntene asenker sirok cikwa ce kimolokonitu om miyotyonik cepo corokyinotet.
Kunyo om wule mite neto nyo muce kuripok akwek mente kot osute, oŋnkupartak oŋereci nye moponte lelis om taytap woyin nyi.

Om wule mite Yiyintet akenke kosopintenyo, kupunte wule mite Yesu Kristo Mokoryontenyo. Kopurune Woyinto oko koyweyisyet oko swamet oko kamukeywek om kenyisyek ce kitil oko yawut oko okokoy oko okokoy! Yunyoto.

Ŋalecu kuce ŋoŋutokap Yesu Kristo ce kikoci Yiyintet sukuŋet nyo kuŋoŋnkyi kuporci mutworikyi tukuk ce mosukwiyokis lakwar. Kimwoy Yesu ŋalecu omnye kiyok malaykenyi kuco wule mite mutworintenyi Yowana.
Yowana kunye mwowu ŋalek tokol ce kikäs. Ŋalecutecu kuce po manta ce nöme lokoywek ce kwone wule mite Yiyintet oko ŋalek cepo manta ce kiŋoŋ kupor Yesu Kristo.
Ponto kupeyoy nye sumone ŋalecu po workoyontini oŋnkuponto kupeyoy co lime oŋnkurup ŋalek ce mite kitapuni, omnye karik pesyet nye yitite ŋalecu.

Ani Yowana nye osilyini lukosyek tisap cepo co kikoyen ce mite koretap Asia. Kwek cikwok poypoyet oko kalyet ce kwone wule mite neto nye mite, oŋnku nye kimite, oŋnku nye mosukuco, oŋnku kwone wule mite mukuleywek tisapu ce mite ŋeceratap poytoyisyet om taytap Yiyintet.

Oŋnkukwone wule mite Yesu Kristo, nye muncururwet nyepo manta, oŋnku nye kipoyit tayta kotutune met, oŋnku nye poytoy kinkonik cepo koret. Kristo kunye kicämec oŋnkutyacec cekwane wule mite miyotyonik kyacek om korotikyi.
Kunyo kikonec ciku poytoyik ce tisik cepo Yiyintet Papanyi. Kopurune woyinto oko swamet wule mite Yesu Kristo okokoy okoy okokoy! Yunyoto.
Akäs, mite kucontoykey polyok! Mosukukäs ci tokol neto oŋnkukäs mpo piko tokol co kipore neto ŋotit. Mosukumesyo kurire piko tokol neto. Kunyo Kuyuyit nyoto! Yunyoto.
Mwowu Mokoryontet nyepo kamukeywek tokol kule, “Oyiku ani nyepo tayta (omeka) oŋnkoyiku nyepo letut,’’ (olufa) nye mite oŋnku nye kimite, oŋnku nye mosukuco.

Ani nyo yeyamwoŋ Yowana nye ceyemntoy oko akwek toŋoŋutek oko muytocinotet nyo nyoru co po poytoyisyenyi nyewo om Kristo Yesu. Kyomite ani koret nye kikwen peko nyepo Patmo omnye kikyamwayte wuloto ŋolyontetap Yiyintet nyepo manta nye kuŋoŋ kopur Yesu.
Ye kipesyetap Mokoryontet kowuto anyoru ani swametap Muyetap Mokoryontet, yoto alim om pataymwani kutit nyewo nye kerkey kontit.

Nye kimwoy kule, “Silyi kitaput tukuk ce kekäs nyi, oŋnkikoyite kitaput kuwo wule mite luket nyepo piko co kikoyen cepo moŋosyecu tisap: Efeso, Simurna, Perkamani, Siyatira, Sortes, Filatelfia oko Laotikea.’’
Yoto owekyikey ani kule akäs cito nye kiŋololwo, akäs sokotik tisap cepo Sapunek ce yoŋe tarinek.
Nto om kwenutap sokoticoto, kimite cito nye kerkey Weritap Cito nye kelac siret nye puntoy kerenkok, oŋnkurate teket nyenyi porowet nyepo Saput.
Kilel metit nyenyi kuyu siret nyelel piw. Kukerkey konyek ceci oko mata nye rekitite.
Kukerkey kerenkok ceci oko tayet nye kiciloci mata oŋnkyesit kulecec. Kikerkey polotet nyenyi oko karumnta nyepo peko ce caŋ ce sururtoy.
Kunäme yewunyi nyepo tay kokelik tisap, kucone kutit nyenyi rotwetap cok nye ŋatip koromun. Oŋnkulelit tokoyta nyenyi kuyu asista nyepo pet kwen.
Nteye kotoköse ani neto; yoto oputyi yepo kerenkokyi kuyunye kamey. Ntene kunämena yewunyi nyepo tay oŋnkumwoy kule, “Mente omuyi! Oyiku ani nyepo tayta oŋnko yiku nyepo letut.
Oyiku nye sopot! Kikyamey, ntene käs pa oyiku sopot kenyis okoy kenyis. Oponte kamukeywek cepo met oko kapkompic.
Kunyo sil yawut tukuk ce kwekäs, ce mite kwiyoktos yawut oko ce mosukutok om letut.

Kito nye wuŋat nye poru kokelik tisapu ce köse nyi ce mite yewumwani nyepo tay, oko sokotik tisap cepo Sapunek ce yoŋe tarinek kucu kule; Kokelik tisap kuce malaykanik tisap cepo lukosyek cepo pikap Yiyintet tisap. Nto sokotik tisap cepo Sapunek ce yoŋe tarinek, kuce lukosyek tisap cepo pikap Yiyintet.’’

“Ŋalek cepo malayket nyepo pikap Yiyintet cepo Efeso silyi kule; “Kwone ŋalecu wule mite neto nyo nöme kokelik tisap om yewunyi nyepo tay, oŋnkuwesetote kwenutap sokotik tisap cepo Sapunek ce yoŋe tarinek.

Oŋnket ani yisyonutekuk tokol, oŋnkonket swamet nyeŋuŋ, oko muytocinotet nyeŋuŋ. Oŋnketi kule puryo kot muytocini nyi piko co miyotec, oŋnkwesyem piko co kurekey kule ciku kiyokik oŋnkurok yec kupuryo kot ku kiyokik cekto, okoy nyoru kule mwiynot pate.
Oŋnketi kule muytocini nyi oŋnkitaŋany kupo kaynemwani, ntene mopoku swamet.
Ntene ponte ŋolyontet nye onyercineniŋ kunyi kule, puryo icömo ani nyi yawut kuyu wulo kiyunte kunyo.
Kunyo möce sot co kiwurte! Oŋnkirenynkey iyiyisye kuyu wulo kiyunte kunyo. Nteye puryo kot renynkey mosaco ani oŋnkyonumu sokotyet nyeŋuŋ nyepo Saput nyo mite sokotik tisap co yoŋe tarinek.
Ntene ponte ŋolyontet akenke nye topon nyi kule senkeri tukuk ce yiye piko co rupe Nikolaitanik, kuyu wulo osenkeri mpo ani nkit.

“Kunyo nye ponto yitik ce limnte, kunye misyini kulimnta ŋalek ce mwocini Muyet lukosyek cepo pikap Yiyintet! “Nto co koporyo kot kupëlis, mosokoci kwam omik cepo ketit nyepo soponto nye kipite mparetap Yiyintet.’’
“Nto malayket nyepo pikap Yiyintet cepo Simurna silyi kule, “Kwone lokoywecu wule mite neto nyepo tayta oŋnkupo letut, nye kime oŋnkusop yec.

Oŋnketi ani toŋoŋutek cekuk oko pananiyantit nyeŋuŋ, ntene yiku mokoryo kopoyit manta! Oŋnketi ŋalek ce miyotec ce ŋololeniŋ co kurekey kule ciku Yutayek, oŋnkurok yec kupuryo ku Yutayek cekto; ntene luket nyepo setanit!

Mente omuye mpo kisic om kiy ake tokol nye karik otaŋanye. Limnte! Mosukusyemak Setani nyewo nyepo oyik; kukertak mopusi alak om akwek, mosotaŋany kuwany pesyosyek taman. Otitir om swamet nka kot mpo koyek met, mosokonok ani soponto kwek kokotutyet nye kopëlisye.
“Kunyo nye ponto yitik ce limnte, kunye misyini kulimnta ŋalek ce mwocini Muyet lukosyek cepo pikap Yiyintet! “Puryo kot kutoŋonye met nyepo oyeny piko co kiporyo kot kupëlis.’’
“Nto malayket nyepo pikap Yiyintet cepo Perkamo, silyi kule, “Kwone lokoywecu wule mite neto nyo ponto rotwetap cok nye ŋatip koromun.

Oŋnketi ani wule minye nyi, minye wule mite ŋeceretap poytoyisyetap Setanit. Ntene kipuryo kot taya om koyenet nye ponte om wule ani, nka mpo yo kicepoköce Antipa muncururwet nyimwani nye cikenekey nyo kicepakäce kayta nyewo wule minye Setanit.

Ntene oponte ani ŋalek tukusic ce osenkereniŋ: mite om akwek piko alak ce rupe konetisyetap Palam nye kinet sukuŋet kwiy pikap Israel miyotyet kwam omik ce kicesoci oyik kerkeyik oŋnkwiy sakwayanatet.
Kunyo mpenyi ponte piko alak ce rupe konetisyet nyepo Nikolaitanik.
Renynkey yaste miyotyonik cekuk! Nteye puryo, mosoaco lakwar okoy wule mite oŋnkoporye cekto oyiyisye ŋotipcet nyi cone kutimwani.

“Kunyo nye ponto yitik ce limnte, kumisyini kulimnta ŋalek ce mwocini Muyet lukosyek cepo pikap Yiyintet! “Mosokoci nye koporyo kot kupëlis Mana nye wuŋat. Mosokoci ci ake tokol om cekto rwantet nye miniŋ nyelel nye kicesil kaynet nyelel nye menkete ci tokol, nkete pate cito nyo kinyor.’’
“Nto malayket nyepo pikap Yiyintet cepo Siyatira, silyi kule: “Kwone lokoywecu wule mite Weritap Yiyintet nyo loytos konyek ceci kuyu mata, nye lekecectos kerenkokyi kuyu tayet nye kacesit.
Oŋnketi ani ŋalekuk tokol ce iyiye nyi, oŋnketi cömisyet nyeŋuŋ, koyenet nyeŋuŋ, oko yisyet oko muytocinotet. Oŋnketi kule yiye yawut yisyonutek ce caŋ kusir ce kipo tay.
Ntene oponte ŋolyontet akenke nye osenkereniŋ kunyi kule, muytocini korkono cekure Yesepel, nye kurekey kule oyiku kiyokintetap Yiyintet. Neto kunye nete oŋnkumas pikwani okoy kwiy sakwayanatet.
Kwokoci neto poroyinto kurenynkey kwasta miyotyonikyi, ntene mocöme kule ayaste sakwayanatet.
Kunyo mosowirci neto kwiririt wule mosukutaŋany koromun oko piko co yiye sakwayanatet oko neto. Mosayiy ŋolyontoni tos pate ye karenynkey cekto kwasta miyotyonik ce kikwiye oko neto.

Mosapakäc mpo piko co rupoti neto, sukuŋet lukosyek tokol cepo pikap Yiyintet konket kule ani kunye oŋnketi kasoteywekap piko tokol oko tukuk ce möce. Mosokoci ci ake tokol om akwek kuyu wule tento yisyet nye kiyiy.

“Ntene akwek piko alak cepo Siyatira ce puryo kot orupe konetisyet nyoto. Akwek co puryo anetkey ŋalek ce kure alake kule, ‘Ŋalek ce wuŋotin cepo Setanit.’ Komwowok kule puryo kot akonok nyikisinto ake.
Möce akwil koromun ŋalek co oponte yawut okoy opunu ani.

Co kepëlis oko co kakwil kwiy yisyonutekwani okoy pesyet nyepo letut, kuce mosokoci kupayta yemosyek, kuyu wulo kikono ani Papanyu kamukeywek. Mosukupoytoyis kwiyisye kipoket nyepo karnet oŋnkutitir cekto kuyu terenik cepo menonik. Mosokoci ani neto nyoto kokelyet tapoyantet nyepo kororn.
